1106606069.content: But you said you'd stay here with me! The lab door doesn't open for people who break their promises.

1106606071.content: Since you've just realized that you want to stay here, I'll let you go sleep on that sofa.

1106606072.content: Ookuninushi points at it, then leans back towards her monitor. Sleep is calling to me again, so I walk over to the sofa, grab a blanket, and flop onto my face.

1106606073.content: The softness of the blanket and a faint scent touch my nose—someone has clearly used it before. That's when I see the little bunnies on it.

1106606074.content: The sofa and this blanket... Do you usually sleep here, Ookuninushi? Is it really alright for me to take a nap with them?

1106606075.content: Yes, it is. You don't have to ask.

1106606076.content: When did I earn such privileges?

1106606077.content: Ookuninushi avoids my gaze, emotion sparkling in her pink eyes.

1106606078.content: You do already know the BunBuns, after all.

1106606082.content: I drift off to sleep. The real world slowly fades from my awareness, except for the bunny blanket covering me.

1106606083.content: Halfway between sleeping and waking, I feel something press down next to me, but I'm not awake enough to figure out what's happening.

1106606084.content: My body feels warm and seems to get lighter, but my arms seem to be growing heavier.

1106606085.content: A tingling creeps up my neck, lasting until dawn, when I finally, reflexively, open my eyes.

1106606086.content: I see a sleeping girl's face. The morning light is softly glimmering upon her cheeks.

1106606088.content: I blink, finally feeling like I've returned to the waking world. There's a girl sleeping here, holding my arms tight.

1106606089.content: What are you doing here? You're sleeping in my arms... and you said you're not a little bunny.

1106606090.content: In the quiet morning, I watch her eyelids flutter, and wait for our breaths to synchronize.

1106606091.content: Then a sound, muffled by intervening walls, reminds me that it's late.

1106606092.content: It's morning, bunny. Time to get up.

1106606093.content: Half asleep, Ookuninushi won't open her eyes. She mutters something indistinct in response.

1106606095.content: Then will you at least let go of my hand?

1106606096.content: Mmm... No... I want to hold it.

1106606098.content: There's no talking sense with you when you're dreaming...

1106606102.content: Her cheek is warm from her deep slumber.

1106606104.content: I pinch Ookuninushi's nose, and after only a few seconds her cheeks turn red. She shakes her head, but when she's unable to free herself, she has to open her mouth.

1106606108.content: She shakes her head a few times, then draws closer to my arm. It looks like she's trying to hide herself with it.

1106606110.content: Ookuninushi squeezes her knees together and tries to curl up into a ball, her body trembling briefly as she does so.

1106606111.content: You still won't get up? Are you actually some sort of robot? BunBun-Ookuninushi?

1106606112.content: I playfully put my finger beneath Ookuninushi's nose.

1106606113.content: The warmth travels to my heart. At the sight of her peaceful face, I feel like going back to sleep, too.

1106606114.content: All of a sudden... I don't want to wake you up anymore.

1106606115.content: Time passes slowly. Finally, she starts to move and slowly opens her eyes.

1106606116.content: What time is it? Ugh... What are you doing here? Am I still dreaming?

1106606117.content: She rubs her eyes, cheeks still rosy from sleep, particularly where her face was pressed into the couch. I'm only a few inches away from her, and I can almost see my reflection in her eyes.

1106606118.content: It's daytime already. Was I in one of your dreams, too?

1106606119.content: I don't dream of dummies like you.

1106606121.content: Having just awoken, and undoubtedly remembering the events of the day before, Ookuninushi's cheeks flush.

1106606122.content: A-Admin! If you're already awake, why are you still here?!

1106606123.content: You wouldn't let go of my arm...

1106606125.content: After apparently trying to push me away, but failing in the endeavor, Ookuninushi grabs the blanket and wraps herself up in it, muttering under the undulating material.

1106606126.content: I miscalculated. I should have incorporated the next day in my plan. Now I don't have time to do a reading.

1106606127.content: Before I can say anything, her red cheeks peek out from beneath the blanket again.

1106606128.content: But researchers are used to things not going to plan, so don't feel surprised.

1106606130.content: Anyway, the BunBuns are upgraded, so come and take a look.

1106606131.content: After completing yesterday's data collection, I fixed the problems with BunBun-0's and BunBun-3's AIs. I also helped them continue with their fortune telling and studies.

1106606132.content: They've been divining for a while, but now the test is almost complete.

1106606133.content: I think back to what we did yesterday, and my curiosity is piqued. We sent the BunBuns off. What sort of data did they bring back?

1106606135.content: BunBun-0 is still bouncing around on the ground, and BunBun-3 silently directs its gaze at me.

1106606137.content: I approach BunBun-3 and extend my hand. Still silent, it reaches out to touch it.

1106606143.content: Understand what? Do you mean... me?

1106606144.content: Suddenly, all of the things Ookuninushi and I did yesterday flood back into my mind.

1106606145.content: The shell I finished arranging, the coffee I drank, the pictures I gave out.

1106606146.content: After we sent the BunBuns away, it returned with the data—about me.

1106606147.content: So the purpose of all our activities yesterday, wasn't to take the BunBuns out—it was to take me out?

1106606149.content: BunBun-0 is a lively child who never gives up and loves busy environments. One and Two are the support pillars of the home, and Three silently supports everyone. The Tarot is showing our road ahead, and I am the BunBuns' parent.

1106606150.content: We make progress and adventure together, we seek the truth, and we meet other BunBuns. I'd always thought that just this world of BunBuns was big enough.

1106606151.content: Even when I'm alone in my lab doing research nobody else understands, even when I have to write those stupid reports to get funding, I still have my BunBuns.

1106606152.content: I turn around and see her pink eyes looking at me.

1106606153.content: I thought I didn't care about anything besides science and my BunBuns, but now I'm getting greedy.

1106606154.content: Ever since I met you... I've wanted you to join me.

1106606155.content: I wanted BunBun-0 to memorize your actions and your scent. I wanted BunBun-3 to follow your commands in battle. I wanted the data about you to remain in here.

1106606156.content: We are looking at each other. Step by step, she comes closer to me.

1106606157.content: At first, I just wanted to collect some data, to make a record of you. But... but...

1106606158.content: I take a step back and sit down in the chair.

1106606159.content: But then you came in yourself.

1106606160.content: Because... I saw how cute you looked when you were concentrating. I thought your world must be a beautiful place.

1106606161.content: As it turns out, without realizing it, I've reached a tacit understanding with you.

1106606163.content: Her cheek is inches away from me.

1106606165.content: So am I a part of the BunBun world now? Maybe you can assign me a BunBun number?

1106606166.content: Now you're being a dummy again! You're not a BunBun. You're one-of-a-kind in the BunBun world.

1106606167.content: So... now that you've come in, I won't let you leave again.

1106606168.content: You have to help me gather data and perform maintenance. I don't... I don't want to lose you.

1106606170.content: It's a big responsibility. Are you sure you're up to it?

1106606171.content: Since you're the one who offered, I have no reason to refuse.

1106606173.content: Light flickers off of the tears in her eyes. She slowly lowers her head.

1106606174.content: Like a drop of water, or like a cloud, that warm, fragrant touch fills my senses.

1106606175.content: You'll stay with me? Then it's a promise.

1101101001.content: The Bane Energy around the ruins is off the charts. It's even preventing clouds from gathering in Gaea's simulated sky.

1101101002.content: Bright flowers sway amongst bushes that are no longer being blown by the wind...

1101101003.content: Gazing ruefully at the target just out of reach, calmly waiting to be torn to pieces by the monsters...

1101101004.content: Submerged in the stream of Visbanes, my consciousness drifts away.

1101101007.content:
Warning, #{nickname}#'s allotted time is up.
Mitir reminds you to take a break and enjoy a healthy lifestyle as you work.

1101101009.content: The pain has gone down to about eighty percent of what it started as, but it still feels like it's shattering my bones. I reluctantly tap Mitir, then clench my jaw against the pain as I try to stand back up...

1101101011.content: I turn toward the sound of the voice. I'm able to make out a short girl looking at me in concern.

1101101012.content: Her eyes are gentle and clear as she patiently waits for me to answer.

1101101013.content: I'm sorry, I'm cutting into your training time, Lil' Osi...

1101101014.content: Oh, Admin, you don't need to apologize to me for that... Your body...

1101101015.content: Here, let me take a look.

1101101016.content: The short girl kneels down beside me. She steadies me with one hand while taking out a bottle of pain relief spray with the other.

1101101017.content: She sprays it onto my chest, making me feel itchy.

1101101019.content: Yeah, but I'm clearly not good enough yet. I've been doing terribly in training recently.

1101101020.content: Why have you set it to the Modifier difficulty?

1101101022.content: But Admin, you already have your role in battle, and your own way of fighting. You shouldn't be doing this kind of training...

1101101023.content: Osiris's expression is serious as she looks at my injuries, scolding me just like Miss Shu does.

1101101024.content: Haha... Were you watching me for long?

1101101025.content: I feel embarrassed that Osiris just witnessed my poor performance.

1101101026.content:
Well, yeah. The next combat exam is starting soon...
I'm sorry, I shouldn't be telling you what to do—it's not like I'm going to pass, either...

1101101027.content: Huh? Do you mean this exam is hard for Mods too? I thought...

1101101028.content: I wasn't trying to mock you, Osiris. I'm sorry.

1101101029.content: Oh, no, it's alright. I know I'm nowhere near ready yet. So don't keep thinking I'm so much stronger than you—that's definitely not the case.

1101101030.content: In fact—and don't take this the wrong way—but knowing that the great #{nickname}# can't do it either actually makes me feel a little bit better...

1101101031.content: I mean, if the Admin can't do something, then I definitely can't...

1101101032.content: I find it reassuring to hear Osiris talk about me like that.

1101101035.content: The young girl lifts her head when I pat it and leans her forehead against my palm. She makes a worried expression.

1101101037.content: Osiris slowly extends her arm, then gently takes hold of my wrist.

1101101038.content: Osiris, we've done loads of exams together, haven't we?

1101101040.content: And I know this one has to be done on our own, but that doesn't mean we can't do a quick team test together and see if there's anything you need to work on.

1101101041.content: Oh yes! I'd be grateful for any feedback you have for me!

1101101042.content: After asking Mitir to reset the challenge, Osiris and I find ourselves back in the middle of the street.

1101101043.content: The road is approximately 30 meters wide and littered with abandoned vehicles. It's no place for melee combat.

1101101044.content: Admin, you're hurt so it'll be safer if you find some high ground and stay there. I'll handle these Visbanes!

1101101045.content: Osiris suggests this to me as she watches the Visbane horde approach.

1101101046.content: Fighting this many Visbanes will take too long—we need to break through them instead engaging in a full-on skirmish. Come with me!

1101101047.content: Okay, I trust your judgment, Admin... But don't break through the crowd too quickly. Focus on the accuracy of your shots!

1101101048.content: I nod, then slow my steps as I take aim at the Visbanes in front of me.

1101101049.content: Eight Divine Grace bullets go flying out of my gun, each one hitting a Visbane in the legs.

1101101050.content: Osiris! We need to stop them from moving!

1101101052.content: Her scythe gleams as it slashes through the air, separating the Visbane from its leg. It falls to the floor and screams.

1101101054.content: I get a bad feeling as we pass the street corner where I was just injured.

1101101055.content: Dozens of Visbanes have formed an impenetrable wall. I slow down, furiously trying to think of a strategy as I pull the trigger.

1101101056.content: Osiris takes a more active approach, swinging her scythe furiously to take Visbanes out one by one.

1101101057.content: (If I can keep this up, it'll take pressure off the Admin...)

1101101058.content: Beside me, the girl clenches her Access Key and leaps toward the terrifying horde.

1101101061.content: Osiris throws her scythe, which distracts the four Visbanes running toward me and gives me the chance to knock them down.

1101101062.content: (Wait a minute... These Visbanes are in a wedge-shaped formation, and the different species have different movement speeds... That means...)

1101101063.content: Watching Osiris move suddenly gives me an idea.

1101101064.content: Osiris! There are gaps between the Visbanes when they move—maybe we can break through there! Try to squeeze yourself through one!

1101101066.content: I form a platform with my arms and give Osiris a boost as she leaps above me, waiting for an opportunity to strike.

1101101068.content: As she lands, Osiris takes out all of the Visbanes surrounding her. She nods at me as a signal to give her another boost up.

1101101069.content: Admin, they're regrouping! Get to a high point and cover me!

1101101071.content: Using this strategy of switching between pushing through and getting behind the enemy, we finally reach the end.

1101101073.content: Osiris jumps up and gives me a high five.

1101101074.content: The fact that it wasn't the official exam does nothing to dampen Osiris's delight.

1101101075.content: Your analysis of the situation was spot on, even without Lord Mimir's help.

1101101076.content: That's only because I had you there to give me time to think. You're a great partner.

1101101078.content: Right back at ya, Lil' Osi.

1101101079.content: Osiris giggles as she bows at me, her braid arcing through the air.

1101101082.content: After this, I practice a couple more times with Osiris, giving us both the opportunity to observe flaws in the other that need addressing.

1101101083.content: By the time we leave the training room, it's so late that all the lights have been switched off.

1101101084.content: I didn't realize how late it'd gotten... Shall we go grab a drink?

1101101085.content: Oh yeah, I'd kill for a latte. What do you want, Admin? My treat!

1101101086.content: I'll have a Glory Orange Juice. But you've helped me out so much today, Osiris, I can't let you get this too.

1101101087.content: Okay, let's do this, then: I'll buy your Glory Orange Juice, and you buy my latte.

1101101089.content: With that sorted, Osiris and I go to separate vending machines to buy each other's drink.

1101101090.content: Maybe it's because we passed the test, but Osiris can't get the smile off her face. She looks happier than I've seen her in a long time.

1101101091.content: I rub the area where I was wounded earlier, but thanks to Osiris's swift intervention, it barely even hurts anymore.

1101101093.content: Parched, the two of us begin drinking in big gulps.

1101101096.content: Osiris lets out a contented sigh, while I belch like Mimir.

1101101097.content: Each of us suddenly realizes that the other is watching us, and we let out embarrassed chuckles.

1101101098.content: We've never really seen each other drinking so greedily... Haha...

1101101099.content: Let me think... Miss Shu is usually so busy, so apart from Ver, I think you're the one I've trained with the most.

1101101100.content: Because... Well, you know, my body...

1101101101.content: I know. You can't wait to be back with everyone, right? I can help you.

1101101103.content: Osiris lowers her head and she begins to fiddle with a corner of her clothing, unsure of what to say.

1101101107.content: If so, I could be your assistant, if you wanted?

1101101111.content: If you're my assistant, you would be the one helping me, Lil' Osi. I should be thanking you. And besides, we're friends, aren't we?

1101101113.content: And we make a great team, right?

1101101115.content:
Miss Shu says that it's every Modifier's duty to conquer their fears.

It's so much easier when you're around, Admin.

I... want to be able to shield everyone from pain.

I know I can do it—I just know I can.

...

1101102004.content: After that evening, Osiris trains hard with me and often comes to my office to help with my work.

1101102005.content: She is focused, and when she reviews documents for me, she often spots things that I've missed.

1101102006.content: I can't help but think... that when she puts her mind to it, she's better at my job than I am.

1101102007.content: Once I'm done, I get up and go stand next to Osiris.

1101102008.content: As I do, I hear a panicked voice coming from outside...

1101102010.content: Lord Mimir is carrying a large cardboard box on his back and lumbering toward us like an elephant.

1101102011.content: Lord Mimir, are you moving in or something?

1101102012.content: Don't just stand there—come and give me a hand, rookie! You too, Osiris!

1101102013.content: A big blue cat begins to cry out in protest. Osiris and I rush over to help, and together we carefully place it on the ground.

1101102014.content: Phew, that was heavy! Thank you, Admin.

1101102015.content: Sorry... I've been getting you to help me with the random jobs Lord Mimir should be doing...

1101102016.content: Hey, I can hear you! What do you mean, the random jobs I should be doing?!

1101102017.content: The box isn't sealed, and my curiosity gets the better of me. I pull back one of the flaps to get a peek inside...

1101102019.content: A box filled with storage disks. That's it.

1101102020.content: There isn't any coolant in this box, Lord Mimir. How odd...

1101102021.content: What do you take me for? I'm not gonna slack off to steal a sip of coolant during work!

1101102022.content: Actually, there's some here... Here, Lord Mimir. Take this as a thank you.

1101102023.content: Giggling, Osiris picks up a jar of coolant I hadn't seen in the corner of the room.

1101102024.content: Ah, well, that's done it. Fine, Osiris, you caught me!

1101102026.content: Lord Mimir takes big gulps of coolant, unable to resist the temptation and stressed out by the move.

1101102027.content: So, Lord Mimir, what's with all the storage disks?

1101102028.content: Oh, those... are commercial contraband left unclaimed during a field mission.

1101102029.content: According to Miss Shu's rules, you should hand them over to CORG...

1101102030.content: That's what I was going to do, but the person who left them behind is one smart cookie—I think they've hidden something else in there.

1101102031.content: That's why I came to you, rookie. I've already processed a massive batch of these, but I was hoping you two would be able to handle the rest. Oh, my head's killing me... I'm overheating...

1101102032.content: Mimir exits the room, muttering to himself, and leaves Osiris and me staring at each other.

1101102033.content: Curious, I try putting one of the storage disks into my terminal.

1101102034.content: It shows a dark room. Suddenly, a girl with long hair appears in the doorway, her face pale and her eyes empty. Soundlessly, she suddenly throws herself toward the screen.

1101102036.content: As Osiris screams, I remember what the big blue cat just said to us.

1101102037.content: That's what I was going to do, but the person who left them behind is one smart cookie—I think they've hidden something else in there.

1101102038.content: Er... Osiris, what did Lord Mimir say this stuff was? Commercial contraband or something?

1101102039.content: I pair my terminal to the decryption AGI Mecha, then look at the huge box of storage disks with a long sigh.

1101102040.content: We're gonna have to go through these one by one... Here, Osiris, take this latte.

1101102041.content: Ooh! Glug, glug, glug... Okay, let's do this!

1101102042.content: Osiris guzzles her latte down like Mimir did his coolant, and a look of steely determination enters her eyes.

1101102043.content: So... I'll take half, and you do the other half?

1101102044.content: She nods, and I configure the AGI Mecha to do smart playback.

1101102045.content: I put the display in split-screen mode, and Osiris and I begin working on our own terminals.

1101102047.content: Unfortunately, the first thing to pop up on Osiris's screen is definitely NSFW.

1101102048.content: She realizes it quicker than I do and squeals in panic.

1101102051.content: I make Osiris jump, and she accidentally throws the terminal into her own face.

1101102052.content: Let's put this in the storage box...

1101102054.content: This time it's something on my screen.

1101102055.content: I didn't think about the fact that dividing up the work would increase the likelihood of Osiris seeing this content...

1101102056.content: There's a knock on the door. Startled, Osiris rushes to switch off the AGI Mecha.

1101102057.content: Her nervousness is contagious, and I find myself holding my breath.

1101102058.content: Eventually, the person at the door leaves. I turn around.

1101102059.content: Osiris's eyes close, like an AGI Mecha that's overheated and shut down.

1101102060.content: Admin, I think we should go somewhere we won't be disturbed...

1101102061.content: I think about where we can go, and ultimately decide that the only options are her bedroom or mine.

1101102062.content: Her room is closer, so that's where we end up.

1101102063.content: Clutching her terminal, Osiris looks at the storage disks with trepidation, as though each one was an unexploded bomb.

1101102064.content: Osiris, the storage disks aren't connected to the interface yet.

1101102066.content: You've got to remember this is just work.

1101102067.content: I-I'll give it everything I've got!

1101102068.content: Unlike meticulous Shu or dogged Ver, Osiris is completely out of her comfort zone with this assignment.

1101102070.content: We make our way through a couple of normal videos, but then the scene changes to something that could have come from a thriller movie.

1101102071.content: Surely there's no way this ever got released?

1101102072.content: I remove the storage disk currently plugged into Osiris's terminal and throw it in the storage box.

1101102073.content: This is all Lord Mimir's fault... There's no way this kind of stuff should be checked manually.

1101102075.content: Osiris, I don't want to force you to do this. Leave it all to me and I'll do it.

1101102076.content: N-no way! I-I'm your assistant, #{nickname}#... If I can be your partner for training, I can be your partner for this!

1101102077.content: I just need to think of it as a work assignment. All I'm doing is helping you finish your work.

1101102078.content: She continuously repeats, "It's only work," under her breath to help get her through it, shaking her green braid in her hand like a rattle.

1101102080.content: Suddenly, the terminal screen turns bright red.

1101102081.content:
Before the picture gets even more distorted, I quickly eject the disk.
But even so—

1101102083.content: Osiris bristles like a cat and buries her head in my chest. I try to console her.

1101102084.content: Why don't you go and take a break, Lil' Osi?

1101102085.content: I'm sorry I can't be of help.

1101102086.content: It's fine, everyone has limits. I'll come find you when I'm done.

1101102087.content: Tell you what—how about this afternoon, you help with the medical tests? The documents are on the desk in my office. Do you think you'd be able to log all the data for me?

1101102088.content: Yes, that I can do. Thank you, #{nickname}#...

1101102089.content: Later that day, I finally toss the last of the "commercial contraband" disks back into their box.

1101102090.content: I stand up and look around. Osiris's room is clean and cozy. Stars made from woven rope hang everywhere, and the windchime by the window tinkles gently in the breeze.

1101102091.content: But what catches my attention most is the stack of gift boxes in the corner of her room.

1101102092.content: Oh... Last time Leviathan bought me ice cream, I made some cute ice cream plushies for her...

1101102093.content: This bubble gun is for Zenki. I just wish she'd stop being such a trouble-maker...

1101102094.content: This is from when Hel fell in love with my cat—I thought I'd give her this cute little kitty.

1101102096.content: Osiris scrutinizes her terminal as she matches the data on screen with each of the gift boxes.

1101102098.content: So, Admin, are you done? These are gifts I want to give everybody.

1101102099.content: Seeing my surprise, Osiris hurries to explain herself.

1101102102.content: Osiris's cat leaps nimbly onto the top of the mountain of presents and looks me straight in the eyes, as though showing off her master's achievements.

1101102103.content: I sorted them all out while you were working. Lord Mimir already came by to pick some up.

1101102104.content: And of course there's something for you too, #{nickname}#! Here you go.

1101102105.content: Osiris takes the white cat in her arms, then picks up an expertly-wrapped gift from the very top of the pile.

1101102106.content: Barely able to suppress my curiosity, I open the present she hands me.

1101102107.content: It's a daisy chain wristband made from bionic materials, and it exudes a light, floral fragrance.

1101102108.content: She blushes and smiles as she searches my face for the expression she hopes to see.

1101102109.content: I smile and nod in thanks, and her smile grows even bigger.

1101102110.content: The medical team is probably waiting for us, Osiris.

1101102112.content: As we enter the room carrying the presents, everyone turns to look at us expectantly.

1101102113.content: Well, if it isn't Osiris! And the Admin's with her, too!

1101102114.content: Wanna get some ice cream with us later, you two?

1101102115.content: Ah, Leviathan! Just who we're looking for. Osiris and I have something for you.

1101102116.content: Oh wow! So many plushies! Are they all for me?!

1101102117.content: Yes! The Admin and I have done our best to collect as many as possible.

1101102118.content: Admin, Osiris, you guys are the best!

1101102119.content: Here you go, Osiris. Your medical report. Heehee...

1101102121.content: This had better not be one of your pranks, Zenki.

1101102124.content: B-but I didn't get you guys anything...

1101102125.content: It's fine. Just get Ganglati to help Lord Mimir out next time, if you can.

1101102127.content: We'd come to get test results, but it's looking more like a birthday party at the moment.

1101102129.content: I can't help but sigh as I look at all the presents still left in my arms.

1101102130.content: We don't get much work done after returning from the medical center. Twilight filters through the windows and Osiris sits beside me, patching up a ragged doll.

1101102133.content: So naughty! Hmm, are you sure it can be fixed?

1101102134.content: It's fine, it's not her fault. She got startled when Ausar appeared.

1101102135.content: And it's not like I can always be there for the cat and Ausar. Sometimes I wish she could go into the Imago Room.

1101102136.content: Oh, yes, Ausar with a cat...

1101102138.content: And the queen of the netherworld...

1101102139.content: Ausar would pick the little cutie up...

1101102142.content: Do you really think Ausar is a cat person?

1101102144.content: Speaking of Ausar, how has she been lately?

1101102145.content: Oh, same old, same old... locked up in her room.

1101102146.content: However, I think she's really gotten into children's fairy tales recently. She's always telling me about them.

1101102147.content: She talks to you... about fairy tales?

1101102148.content: Yeah, ones like "Why Would the Wolf Eat an Apple When a Little Girl Would Do?" and "As King, the Lion Shouldn't Be So Kind"...

1101102149.content: That's a bit of an odd thing to get obsessed with...

1101102150.content: But kudos to you, Lil' Osi, for getting Ausar interested in something like that.

1101102152.content: She smiles awkwardly, then rushes toward me as though she's just remembered something.

1101102153.content: But... with the exam and all, I haven't been able to read stories to her for a few days now. I bet she's mad.

1101102154.content: Ah, true, we have been neglecting her lately, what with all the training. We should make it up to her.

1101102155.content: I mean, we couldn't not prepare for the exams.

1101102156.content: Admin, shall we go visit her together when you've got the time?

1101103002.content: Heartbeat and vital signs are normal, helmet is positioned correctly... Yes, let's start.

1101103003.content: #{nickname}# and Osiris, please follow the voice instructions and continue to breathe evenly.

1101103006.content: After who knows how long, I gradually come to and find myself and Osiris slumped against a wall in the Imago Room.

1101103008.content: Uhh... I can't feel my feet... Can you help me up, Admin?

1101103009.content: Sure. Here we go—I've got you.

1101103010.content: I kneel down and motion for Osiris to climb on my back.

1101103012.content: You're welcome. But... do you know which room Ausar's in?

1101103013.content: All of the rooms around us look identical.

1101103014.content: Ausar only ever goes in two of the rooms. Go to the left, Admin.

1101103015.content: Osiris guides me toward one of the doors.

1101103016.content: The pale orange door is ajar, and Ausar can be seen darting back and forth inside.

1101103017.content: Intrigued, I take two steps forward so that Osiris and I can sneak a peek at what she's up to.

1101103019.content: Ausar picks up a potato chip and flips it in the air like a coin.

1101103022.content: She takes another sip of soda, then has a big stretch. An enigmatic smile rests on her face.

1101103023.content: She seems happy enough to me... Osiris, are you sure we should go in?

1101103024.content: Let's observe for a little while longer.

1101103025.content: Actually, the last time I came here... there wasn't anything inside. Where did she get those snacks from?

1101103026.content: I think it has something to do with my consciousness... There's a room which, every so often, gets filled with whatever Ausar and I want the most.

1101103027.content: You just said Ausar only ever goes in two of the rooms. So does that mean...

1101103028.content: She's either here or in the room with all the stuff.

1101103029.content: Not too shabby. I've gotta say, I'm actually kind of envious of Ausar's life right now.

1101103030.content: Heh-heh, you're more than welcome to live forever in my Imago Room if you want, Admin.

1101103031.content: Osiris and I whisper our conversation like two burglars who have broken into Ausar's home.

1101103032.content: "Only the reverent and obedient can earn forgiveness and protection!"

1101103033.content: Ausar suddenly waves her hand and shouts menacingly, her eyes wide with fury.

1101103034.content: "Selfish intruder... Your paranoia and insanity will bury you!"

1101103035.content: That made me jump. What is she doing?

1101103036.content: Is she... performing a fairy tale? Although I'm pretty sure there's nothing like this in "The Lion and Vulture's Fortress of Courage"...

1101103037.content: "Those who don't cherish friendship will be transformed into statue of ices and frozen in the castle for one hundred years!"

1101103038.content: Engrossed in her own world, Ausar paces between the bed and the door as she acts out her one-woman show.

1101103039.content: The lion would never talk like that...

1101103040.content: "There's no use curling up into a ball like a hedgehog! Stand up and accept your fate!"

1101103041.content: Ausar suddenly turns and starts storming out of the room.

1101103042.content: Uh-oh, she's coming this way. Hide, Osiris!

1101103044.content: Faced with imminent danger, Osiris chooses to hide behind me like a frightened bunny.

1101103045.content: Presumptuous fox! In the name of the Lion King, I hereby sentence you to...

1101103046.content: The door is flung open and Ausar freezes in place.

1101103048.content: She makes a little squeak as emotions flash across her face, and I see the light fade from her eyes.

1101103049.content: Ahem... Hi Ausar! Er, lovely weather we're having today, huh? Haha...

1101103050.content: My little laugh clearly doesn't fool Ausar.

1101103051.content: She grabs ahold of me and Osiris and hoists us into the air.

1101103052.content: Ausar? C-calm down... I-I-I only saw a little bit...

1101103053.content: A-Ausar, your performance of the lion was awesome!

1101103057.content: We weren't making fun of you, I swear!

1101103058.content: Osiris and I see the deadly intent in Ausar's eyes and begin apologizing profusely.

1101103059.content: A suspicion begins to form in my mind.

1101103060.content: Are they the same person? Ausar is probably just as embarrassed as Osiris...

1101103061.content: Ausar finally releases us, her face a furious scarlet and her jaw clenched. She shoves us away and heads back into the room.

1101103062.content: (She's shutting us out. We should go and apologize to her properly.)

1101103063.content: There's a loud crash as Ausar slams the door to the Imago Room in our faces.

1101103064.content: However, she leaves the door unlocked. Osiris and I wait a second, then rush inside.

1101103065.content: Ausar... t's my fault we dropped by unannounced, but that's still no way to treat a guest...

1101103066.content: Quiet! You spy on me and then lecture ME about manners?! What kind of sicko are you?

1101103068.content: What is it you wanted to do?

1101103069.content: I told #{nickname}# you'd gotten into fairy tales recently, and we decided to get you a little present.

1101103070.content: I hand Ausar her gift, but it doesn't seem to cheer her up.

1101103071.content: What's the point of this? Do you think I actually care about this kiddy stuff?

1101103072.content: Based on what we just saw... I'd say yes...

1101103073.content: I don't care why you're here!

1101103075.content: I already can't stand you, and now you've become just as annoying as Osiris.

1101103076.content: Ausar flips through the books carelessly, then slams the box shut.

1101103077.content: Okay, I'll play along with you. Go back and lie—tell them I really liked it.

1101103078.content: Ausar flicks her head to one side, while Osiris and I stare at each other, speechless.

1101103079.content: So... what do you like that isn't too "kiddy," Ausar? Osiris and I will do our best to get it...

1101103080.content: Jeez... Do you really think you can get me what I want?

1101103081.content: I don't know, but that's how it is for my friends.

1101103082.content: I can't leave this place unless I take control of Osiris.

1101103083.content: Your so-called teammates will start whispering again as soon as they see me, and they'll probably even gossip about you two behind your backs.

1101103084.content: So if there's nothing else, I'd like you both to leave right now. Or did you come all this way for a little chit-chat?

1101103087.content: She picks up a blanket and wraps herself up in it, refusing to answer my question.

1101103090.content: Ausar... are you bored in here?

1101103091.content: Of course. But it's not like the daily things mediocre people like you do are interesting.

1101103092.content: Ausar puts her feet up and rests her head in her hands. Although what she's saying isn't particularly nice, her tone is a lot gentler than it just was.

1101103093.content: It's such a simple exam, and yet you need to train until the dead of night every day. I could just take it for you and be done with it.

1101103094.content: But that'd be cheating, Ausar... Thanks for giving me feedback on those other exams, though. You and the Admin both.

1101103095.content: Don't mention it. It was annoying to watch you and your precious Admin make absolutely no progress.

1101103096.content: I've seen you in action before, Ausar, and I know we're nowhere near as good as you yet...

1101103097.content: Memories of her tearing apart a Spealght AGI Mecha with her bare hands flash through my mind.

1101103098.content: Hahahahahaha! If you want to see it for yourself, you can always try again.

1101103099.content: Now that we're talking about something Ausar's interested in, she seems to perk up. She crosses her legs triumphantly.

1101103100.content: However, those memories aren't exactly happy ones, and I hesitate to keep the conversation on this road.

1101103101.content: You have a talent for destruction, Ausar, but it can't be easy, borrowing Osiris's body to do it.

1101103104.content: #{nickname}# just doesn't want you to exhaust yourself.

1101103105.content: Exactly. I just wish I could see your heroics on the battlefield.

1101103106.content: Pfft, there's nothing to worry about there.

1101103107.content: Her tone is frosty, and her expression tells me to mind my own business.

1101103108.content: Would you like to get out of here for a breath of fresh air?

1101103109.content: Oh, I have an idea—Ausar, would you like to try being the Admin's assistant?

1101103112.content: As long as you're not as destructive as you used to be, no one will think it's weird.

1101103113.content: Pfft... No one wants to be known as a violent maniac... It's just a pain. You're clearly better at that kind of stuff than me.

1101103114.content: You'll never learn if you don't try, right?

1101103115.content: You and your dumb ideas... Sure, whatever makes you happy...

1101103116.content: Make sure you get some rest. I can't promise it'll be an easy job.

1101103117.content: But Ausar seems to have stopped paying attention to us. She turns away and hides her face in the shadows.

1101103120.content: Work hard like the animals in your fairytales, Ausar!

1101103121.content: Alright, alright, don't get too excited...

1101103124.content: In some place very far away, a girl finally has another dream.

1101103125.content: She dreams that she's a sheep, and a mysterious power is compelling her to jump in a river.

1101103126.content: All of the other animals on the riverbank step back, and none offer to help her... Except one, who jumps into the river after her.

1101103127.content: As she begins to sink to the bottom, a hand reaches down and grabs hers. She holds onto it for dear life.

1101104001.content: The clock on the AGI Mecha shows says it's eight o'clock. One hour to go until work.

1101104002.content: My heart is racing as I approach Osiris's room. I don't think I was even this nervous on my first day at Aether Gazer.

1101104003.content: Because I know who's in there today...

1101104005.content: Since Osiris and I get along so well, she lets me come in her room whenever I like. But I still knock first, out of politeness.

1101104006.content: You know the answer to that. I know you always just come strolling into Osiris' room, so why are you hiding today?

1101104007.content: Just in case you were still asleep or getting dressed. I don't want a repeat of what happened last time in the Imago Room.

1101104008.content: What? I need to get dressed? Being your assistant is ticking me off already.

1101104009.content: I mean... you need to at least put some shoes on.

1101104012.content: We've got a lot of walking to do today, and it'd be best if you didn't attract too much attention.

1101104013.content: Fiiiiiiine. You guys and all your annoying rules.

1101104014.content: We've got a lot of walking to do today, and I don't want you to hurt your feet.

1101104015.content: I don't need to walk—it's so unnecessary...

1101104016.content: Don't you need Divine Grace to fly? Why don't you try living a day in Osiris's shoes?

1101104018.content: What are you standing there for? If you want me to dress like Osiris, bring me her clothes.

1101104020.content: You are you, Osiris is Osiris... I didn't want you to worry about clothing, so I bought an outfit just for you.

1101104021.content: It's a good thing I came prepared. I pass Ausar the dress I bought in Division Six, then leave the room and wait.

1101104022.content: However, the thought of Ausar wearing Osiris's clothes makes me feel uncomfortable.

1101104023.content: This seems worthy of my status. I guess you had the right idea.

1101104024.content: Ahem, so... for all intents and purposes, today you are my assistant. Shall we go to the office?

1101104026.content: Without warning, Ausar goes running off ahead of me.

1101104027.content: But it's fine—so what if she gets there before me? She'll just be sitting waiting for me.

1101104029.content: Er... Ausar? What happened to my door?

1101104030.content: I stare in shock at the hole that's been punched through the mechanical door. Through it, I can see the most likely culprit, who's sitting across from my desk with her arms crossed.

1101104031.content: How would I know? Everything in this building is so cheap. I just touched it and it broke.

1101104032.content: She begins complaining immediately upon my arrival, but I notice she's careful to avoid my gaze.

1101104033.content: I spot the AGI lock that's been blocked due to too many incorrect passwords, and I can guess what's happened in my absence.

1101104034.content: Oh... that lump of iron locked me out!

1101104035.content: Of course I should have expected you to... Never mind, I'll just report it to the Logistics Department.

1101104036.content: Huh, thanks for the vote of confidence.

1101104039.content: (Sigh) After all, I'm your Administrator. It's my job to solve problems like this.

1101104040.content: Looks like you've learned a lot from hanging out with Osiris all this time.

1101104042.content: And I'm looking forward to spending time with you, too, Ausar.

1101104043.content: I pull up a repair order on my terminal and send it to her.

1101104044.content: Input your fingerprint on the terminal.

1101104045.content: Huh? How do I do that?

1101104046.content: Just press your finger down on it.

1101104049.content: Nothing, stop rushing me! ...Is this right?

1101104050.content: She extends her index finger and, her face full of concentration, jabs clumsily at the terminal screen. It doesn't respond, and her red pupils betray her uncertainty.

1101104052.content: I take Ausar's hand and move her finger down to the spot below the screen.

1101104054.content: Don't take this the wrong way, but are you not very good with modern technology?

1101104055.content: And what's wrong with that? I can still learn your job well enough!

1101104056.content: My question sends her flying into a rage. She squeezes my hand hard and stamps on my feet.

1101104061.content: I don't think you taught me how to do this right. Why isn't it working?

1101104062.content: There's a mistake in the Assessment Score row, so the database won't let you upload it.

1101104063.content: What a pile of junk. Why doesn't the terminal just correct your errors automatically?

1101104064.content: I... don't think that's possible. You just need to focus a little more on the details.

1101104065.content: Shut up! Just show me what I need to do and I'll correct it.

1101104066.content: I shrug. She sits in my lap, pouting, and continues to jab at the screen.

1101104067.content: It's hard to tell who is whose assistant at the moment.

1101104069.content: Ausar, can you fetch me that stool from the warehouse? Lord Mimir wants me to send him some coolant, and I can't reach it.

1101104070.content: Idiot... Stay where you are. I'll get it for you.

1101104072.content: She levitates into the air and brings a bottle of coolant down to me.

1101104073.content: Thanks. Here, let me help you down...

1101104074.content: What do you think you're doing?

1101104075.content: I reach out to help this girl who looks like Osiris, but her question rings out like a warning shot.

1101104076.content: Sorry, I keep... I thought you were going to fall.

1101104077.content: I manage to swallow what I was about to say: "I keep on thinking you're Osiris."

1101104078.content: Ha... Hahaha... You were afraid I'd fall? You've clearly been spending too much time with Osiris—you positively reek of compassion.

1101104079.content: She lifts my chin and looks into my eyes.

1101104081.content: She scoffs at my silence, then...

1101104082.content: ... without warning, drops from the air and into my arms.

1101104083.content: I hope your concern is genuine.

1101104084.content: My heart stops when her delicate body lands in my arms, and my breathing accelerates.

1101104085.content: I'm thrown off guard by this sudden physical contact and nearly lose my balance. I awkwardly work my arms around so they're supporting Ausar's back and legs.

1101104086.content: I look down, and she grins up at me like a naughty little kitten.

1101104087.content: Look at you all flustered. Guess you weren't exaggerating.

1101104088.content: It's not that... How can you expect me not to be worried when you just fall out of the air like that?

1101104089.content: I complain, but her seriousness amuses me, and my anxiety slowly fades.

1101104090.content: Pfft. I'm sure you have to hold Osiris a lot during training. How is this any different?

1101104091.content: So that's what you wanted to know? Why didn't you say so earlier?

1101104092.content: The girl who two hours ago proclaimed, "I can still learn your job well enough!" is now clearly feeling bored.

1101104093.content: Hey, bonehead, when do we get a break? You've been staring at that screen for hours.

1101104094.content: That's the third time you've asked today. We can take our lunch break in one hour.

1101104095.content: Being your assistant is so boring... Is there nothing more interesting we could be doing?

1101104096.content: How come when you and Osiris are together, you're always talking and laughing?

1101104097.content: Er, isn't that what we're doing?

1101104098.content: I reply to Ausar's nonsensical ramblings as I pick up all the work she hasn't been doing.

1101104099.content: There are things that Osiris and I aren't good at, and there are things that you're not good at, either. All the talking and jokes come from when you share your strengths and weaknesses with your colleague.

1101104100.content: Share with your colleague... Urgh, kill me now. Besides, I don't have any weaknesses...

1101104102.content: No, I don't! I don't want to talk about this with you. I'm hungry—go get me something to eat.

1101104103.content: Osiris's snack box is right there. It has some Tikala Chili Pepper Strips I bought, and Osiris's home-made cream puffs. Which would you prefer?

1101104105.content: I think about it. Neither Ausar nor Osiris should need too much food to feel satisfied.

1101104108.content: It's nearly lunchtime. You shouldn't eat so much right now.

1101104109.content: Say, Ausar. Do you know what Osiris does while you're inhabiting her body?

1101104110.content: Let me see. Well, she's not watching those zoo animals anymore...

1101104111.content: The green-haired girl is pacing back and forth in the Imago Room. She doesn't speak for a long time...

1101104112.content: Oh... that lump of iron locked me out!

1101104113.content: Ausar, wait! That's not how you open that door!

1101104115.content: Looks like you've learned a lot from hanging out with Osiris all this time.

1101104118.content: Of course, there are also times you just get this urge to...

1101104119.content: Ausar's new clothes... I'm a little jealous, Admin.

1101104122.content: Admin... is holding hands with Ausar.

1101104123.content: They're just some daily tasks I do with #{nickname}#. But looking back on it like this always makes me blush.

1101104124.content: How come when you and Osiris are together, you're always talking and laughing?

1101104126.content: The girl suddenly gets the feeling that she's acting strange today. Her emotions race through her like a rollercoaster.

1101104127.content: So she takes a more careful look, hoping to hear more praise about her.

1101104128.content: Sorry, I keep... I thought you were going to fall.

1101104129.content: As an observer, it becomes even clearer how much Admin cares for her.

1101104130.content: But why does she feel so... anxious... when she sees how Ausar and #{nickname}# are together?

1101104131.content: Should she be more brazen like Ausar, and literally throw herself into the Admin's arms?

1101104132.content: No, I can't do that.. But... I am jealous...

1101104133.content: Osiris shakes her head vehemently, her cheeks in her hands.

1101104134.content: The copper clock on the wall continues to tick away patiently, unceasingly. Time has never felt so long.

1101104136.content: Suddenly, she hears a sound coming from the Imago Room...

1101104137.content: And then two familiar faces appear before her.

1101104138.content: Practice makes perfect! This time it only took me 5 minutes to get the Cryptics' equipment to bring us here...

1101104141.content: "Playing"? Didn't I do everything I was supposed to do? What's wrong with wanting to finish work early?

1101104142.content: Seeing her attitude, I merely give a gentle smile in reply.

1101104143.content: Sure. Aether Gazer is not one of those garbage companies that chains you to the desk even after you've finished your work.

1101104144.content: I step away from Ausar and lean in toward Osiris.

1101104145.content: (I'm so sorry, Lil' Osi... Ausar and I feel so bad for abandoning you in here.)

1101104147.content: What are you two whispering about?

1101104149.content: Huh? I thought you said we weren't going to say anything to her? You traitor!

1101104151.content: I ignore Ausar as she thumps my shoulder blade, and I give Osiris a high five. I then give Ausar a piggy-back ride over to her bed and help her settle down.

1101104152.content: I'm sorry. Next time I'll get the Cryptics to find some way for you to move about for longer.

1101104153.content: Pfft, I already said I don't mind... I'm happy enough just getting a change of scenery once in a while.

1101104154.content: Her voice is weak from exhaustion. It almost sounds tender.

1101104155.content: You're hardly convincing me, in the state you're in.

1101104156.content: Hey, #{nickname}#, what do you think I'd get in the Assessment Score?

1101104158.content: Don't play dumb. The one we did earlier, while I was sitting in your lap.

1101104160.content: Osiris always gets full marks, so what about me?

1101104161.content: I look from left to right as both Ausar and Osiris stare at me.

1101104163.content: Um, 9 points, I guess? With a one-point deduction for breaking the door.

1101104164.content: You guess? I can tell you're just indulging me... Never mind. Maybe there are some things I'm not great at.

1101104165.content: Hey, it's not the end of the world if you're not good at something, as long as you do your best. Isn't that right, Osiris?

1101104167.content: I think you'd just about pass. You should ask Osiris for advice more when you're in the Imago Room.

1101104168.content: Just about pass? How biased are you?

1101104169.content: It's all right, Ausar. I can teach you.

1101104170.content: You just need to keep on trying.

1101104171.content: Pfft... I'll get full marks next time.

1101104173.content: Okay—if you get full marks, Ausur, then I'll buy you a bag of potato chips, and Osiris, if you do, I'll buy you a cream puff!

1101104175.content: The jade lamp illuminates the darkness, and the three of us talk deep into the night.

1101105001.content: Wakey wakey! How long do you plan on sleeping in front of me!

1101105002.content: Don't be like that, Ausar. Let #{nickname}# sleep...

1101105003.content: My head's killing me... What's going on?... I think I can make out two people telling me to get out of bed...

1101105004.content: As my vision clears, they disappear.

1101105005.content: I usually read my memo pad as soon as I wake up, so I stretch and reach out to grab it from the bedside table.

1101105006.content: Let's see here... A suggestion to optimize the DreamLink, the name of a comic book Ausar and Osiris like...

1101105008.content: The notes I scribbled down on the pad before going to sleep remind me of a harsh reality...

1101105009.content: Oh, shoot! It's a work day!

1101105010.content: Because I ended up doing most of the work yesterday, then stayed hooked up to the machine and talked to Ausar and Osiris until late at night, I completely slept through my alarm.

1101105011.content: No wonder I saw those two people telling me to get out of bed...

1101105012.content: I look over at the alarm clock and am depressed by what I see. I think about all the groveling I'm going to have to do...

1101105013.content: By the time I get to the office, the package Hermes sent me has been sitting in the doorway for hours.

1101105014.content: I'm so sorry I'm late, Admin!

1101105015.content: No sooner have I stepped into the office than Osiris comes running in after me, a rice ball in her hand.

1101105016.content: I shouldn't have stayed up so late chatting with Ausar last night...

1101105018.content: I was late too. I only just got here, actually.

1101105019.content: Guess we're both gonna have to write up a tardiness report... What's this box?

1101105020.content: I'm impressed at how efficient Olympia Express is. I ordered this last night before going to bed, and it's arrived already.

1101105021.content: "I Was Reborn in Another World as the God of the Dead," "A Girl From the Underworld Is My Bride"...

1101105022.content: Osiris plugs a storage disk into her terminal, and her face lights up in surprise.

1101105023.content: Install the comic disks and place them in Lord Mimir's pocket. This is the data.

1101105024.content: This is becoming ridiculous, you two. Sleeping in and leaving all the hard work to me—what exactly do you take me for? Huh?

1101105026.content: But Lord Mimir, the Admin has been working hard too. Don't be too harsh on #{nickname}#...

1101105027.content: You haven't even had breakfast yet, have you, Admin? Here, I've brought you some.

1101105028.content: Osiris hands me a rice ball and I take it gratefully. We immediately get to planning out the day's work.

1101105029.content: What are you, children? What's with all these fairytale books?

1101105030.content: We had no choice. They were necessary expenses.

1101105031.content: We need enough sample data to improve the DreamLink, so we thought it'd be best to get content that both Ausar and Osiris would like.

1101105032.content: That's what you said last time!

1101105033.content: But that was for the charity event, wasn't it?

1101105034.content: Oh, Admin, I didn't want you to go to that much trouble... Why don't you deduct the cost from my allowance?

1101105035.content: I don't mind. The important thing is that you and Ausar like them.

1101105037.content: Rookie, aren't you scared I'll report you to Shu for petty theft?

1101105038.content: Haha, no, I'm not. Because you read all those comic books I bought, right?

1101105039.content: Wha... How did you know that?

1101105041.content: The terminal's still warm. And look at all these empty boxes of coolant on the floor...

1101105042.content: I'm sorry, but we really need your help today, Lord Mimir... How about I give you some of my allowance so you can buy more coolant?

1101105043.content: I will, too. What do you say?

1101105044.content: You two need to stop acting like I'm the bad guy here.

1101105045.content: The blue cat extends its tail and uses it to pat Osiris and me on the head.

1101105048.content: You can be one wily son of a gun when you want something, huh?

1101105049.content: Lil' Osi gets all the credit for this. She's the one who told me what everyone's hobbies are—including yours, Lord Mimir.

1101105050.content: You don't say! I remember you bought me some canned cat food when you first arrived at Aether Gazer...

1101105051.content: You got so angry and I was terrified of you...

1101105052.content: Heh-heh... But I'm glad you become friends with me, and everyone else!

1101105053.content: Right. Now let's go and bring a smile to some new friends' faces.

1101105055.content: With a quick smile at Osiris, I take her hand in mine and we walk off.

1101105056.content: Those two brats really like to make life difficult for me...

1101105057.content: They don't know how easy they've got it, thanks to me.

1101105058.content: First, we need to channel Osiris and Ausar's shared positive memories through the old DreamLink...

1101105059.content: Next, we need to combine the negative memories recorded last time, then use Mimir's computing power to estimate Ausar's personality parameters.

1101105060.content: Finally, we'll use the code I wrote to import the optimized data values into the improved device.

1101105061.content: The appearance module and new personality simulation algorithm also need to be iterated, of course.

1101105062.content: I'm the technical consultant for this optimization project. And these comics... I've read half of the data, so are you okay with listening to my instructions on these two points?

1101105063.content: Ausar isn't going to like this new design of yours...

1101105064.content: The Cryptics experts also usually enjoy reading comics...

1101105065.content: Not everyone enjoys reading papers as though they're novels. We're not all Heimdall.

1101105066.content: Have you quite finished chatting? If so, can you please unload things? I'm struggling here!

1101105067.content: Maybe you're right. Imagination is the fuel for scientific progress, but academia requires rigor.

1101105068.content: Ignoring Mimir's protestations, Heimdall goes straight toward it and flips through the topmost comic.

1101105069.content: ... Is this "A Girl From the Underworld Is My Bride"?

1101105070.content: I look at the comic's title, then at Osiris standing next to me. Her eyes meet mine and she blushes again.

1101105071.content: It seems that both Ausar and Osiris get embarrassed when other people find out about their hobbies.

1101105073.content: Heimdall flicks through the comic in silence, expressionless and focused.

1101105077.content: A meaningful smile spreads across Heimdall's face.

1101105078.content: It's good. You've got good taste, Osiris.

1101105079.content: Were you just reading the comic?

1101105082.content: I told #{nickname}# we should go somewhere together once this was done.

1101105085.content: I was just interested in seeing this place you guys seem to love so much. And if I don't get my way, the consequences will be dire.

1101105086.content: But Ookuninushi still needs to work... Why don't you use my body—

1101105087.content: No. You and #{nickname}# have to go together.

1101105088.content: Think of a way to make it happen.

1101105090.content: Heh-heh, I've got it! I'll tell the Admin about Ausar's wish.

1101105091.content: You'd better say yes if you want me as a friend.

1101105092.content: And is it really just my wish? Don't you also need an opportunity to do the thing you've been planning?

1101105094.content: Expenses approval: complete... Absence inspection: complete... Dimensional Variable initiating...

1101105095.content: I work non-stop until 2 PM and finally catch up with what I should have done in the morning.

1101105096.content: I realize I haven't eaten a thing all day except for Osiris's rice ball and suddenly start to feel a bit peckish...

1101105097.content: Just as I'm thinking this, I bump into Osiris, who's carrying a cake.

1101105098.content: Oh, Admin. You were working so hard I thought I'd bake you a cake. Here, have some.

1101105099.content: I can think of nothing better right now!

1101105102.content: Heehee, I'm glad to hear it!

1101105103.content: She laughs joyfully, then quickly takes a notebook out of her jacket and starts scribbling something down.

1101105104.content: So you like keeping a journal, too?

1101105106.content: I walk up behind her to try and see what she's writing...

1101105107.content: "22:00 on the 17th: #{nickname}# really likes the marmalade layer cake I bought from the restaurant..."

1101105108.content: Hey hey hey, you're not allowed to look!

1101105109.content: She blushes all the way down to her neck and tries to wave me away, but it doesn't work, so she just sighs and lets me have it.

1101105110.content:
"Admin wants to try a blueberry one next time... Oh, but the restaurant doesn't sell that flavor..."

"I brought Admin a rice ball for breakfast and got praised!"

"This blueberry cake took ages to bake, but Admin looked happier than I've ever seen them when they tried it!"

1101105114.content: Cream puffs, cookies, layer cakes... Looks like I've eaten lots of desserts that you made me.

1101105115.content: Wait, does this mean that every time you make me a dessert, you...

1101105116.content: Since you always work overtime, I...

1101105118.content: Thank you, Lil' Osi. But I also train with you because it saves time.

1101105119.content: You're petting me again... It's not good for you to sit at your desk for so long, #{nickname}#. If you got sick, I'd...

1101105121.content: Oh... I'd come and look after you!

1101105122.content: Okay, so I can work overtime with no worries!

1101105123.content: No! You need to look after yourself more, #{nickname}#.

1101105124.content: She sighs gently, then walks over and lightly brushes a crumb from the corner of my mouth.

1101105125.content: Every day feels like a fairy tale when you're by my side, Lil' Osi.

1101105126.content: Well... if you'd like, I can keep on making desserts for you. But only if you promise to give me compliments.

1101105127.content: Of course. Nothing makes me happier than having your cooking.

1101105128.content: If I organized a story time at Aether Gazer just like they have in books, would you come?

1101105130.content: But you're so popular, Lil' Osi, that I'm worried I wouldn't get a seat.

1101105131.content: Don't worry about that. I'd bake a cake and save you the seat closest to me...

1101105132.content: Actually, no... My dream would be for us both to be up there with a book, reading it for everyone.

1101105133.content: We... could give it a try now?

1101105134.content: Osiris looks down at her knees, then looks back up at me and softly asks the question.

1101105137.content: Osiris holds onto the chair as she carefully moves over to perch on my lap.

1101105138.content: You know, you should come tell me when I've been sitting at my desk too long, Lil' Osi.

1101106001.content: Um... Don't move. I'll do it...

1101106002.content: You Aether Gazer guys just love inventing useless gadgets, don't you?

1101106003.content: Ausar, holding bunny ears and blushing, is in her usual uncooperative mood.

1101106004.content: Cute, huh? And isn't it much lighter than the one you were wearing before?

1101106006.content: If you don't like the style... we could get Heimdall to make a different one for you?

1101106007.content: No! I already said there's no need!

1101106008.content: Not much of a morning person, are you? Here, have this latte.

1101106009.content: I don't drink... Osiris, why isn't it moving?

1101106010.content: Ausar snatches the latte from me and puts it to one side.

1101106013.content: You're wearing it the wrong way again...

1101106014.content: I walk over to Ausar and put her hat on the right way, fixing her hair as I do. For once, she lets me do it.

1101106015.content: My relationship with Ausar seems to be improving a lot lately. It probably has something to do with Osiris.

1101106017.content: Okay, let me talk you through the new and improved version of the DreamLink.

1101106018.content: It works by projecting your personality into a new space. This means there is also the option to reverse project the DreamLink by swapping the input and output stack ports.

1101106019.content: Of course, Ausar's form isn't really residing in your body. It's simply another one of Gaea's "projections," and no one can see or touch her unless they're hooked up to the DreamLink.

1101106020.content: Unless they're hooked up to the DreamLink... Wait a second, does that mean me and...

1101106021.content: Think of it like this: Only the Admin and Osiris will be able to establish low-level communication with her.

1101106023.content: Heimdall removes her glasses and takes a sip of coffee.

1101106024.content: Ausar will be able to remain active for around ten hours. I suggest you spend the time you have with both of them well, Admin.

1101106025.content: (Yawn)... Hey, why am I so sleepy, #{nickname}#?

1101106026.content: I dunno what you're asking me for—you tell me. I saw all the comics by your bed in the Imago Room.

1101106027.content: Were you up all night reading?

1101106028.content: Of course not! It's just that the Imago Room has been so boring lately, and Osiris has been busy writing her letters...

1101106029.content: I'm sorry. I promise I'll visit more.

1101106031.content: No! Sh-she means reports! I've been writing reports!

1101106032.content: You guys are both acting in exactly the same way today...

1101106033.content: She blushes and grabs my hand, then awkwardly tries to fish something out of her pocket.

1101106034.content: I've got some mission reports here, but we've got today off so there's no rush. We can hand them in to Miss Shu when we go back, okay?

1101106035.content: No! We absolutely cannot hand these in to Miss Shu!

1101106036.content: What? Has she been on a mission Miss Shu doesn't know about? Is it that big of a secret?

1101106037.content: All right... We won't turn them in, then. Let's talk about it later.

1101106039.content: Osiris bows her head, then looks up again at me.

1101106040.content: What? Have I got something on my face?

1101106042.content: Where are you off to, Ausar?

1101106043.content: I can't watch any more of this...

1101106044.content: Wait, you're going the wrong way. It's this way! Huh? Hey!

1101106045.content: It's not easy, but I manage to bring both Osiris and Ausar with me through the crowd when we visit the Feline Enclosure.

1101106046.content: What's so great about these big orange lumps? They're even dirtier than that pasty little doughball Osiris has...

1101106048.content: Is it trying to scare me?

1101106049.content: No! I don't think it saw you. It was probably just yawning... Just leave it be.

1101106050.content: Ausar punches the air angrily, and her projected form flickers as it comes into contact with a physical entity.

1101106051.content: Pfft, this sucks. I'm out of here. Later, losers.

1101106052.content: Ausar skulks off without waiting for a response.

1101106053.content: Pasty Little Doughball is such a cute name for her.

1101106054.content: Haven't you given her a proper name yet, Osiris?

1101106055.content: No, I can't think of one that fits... Do you have any ideas, Admin?

1101106056.content: I dunno. Off the top of my head... Snowy? Doughy? Doughball?

1101106058.content: I think that's an adorable name for her! And it works well, too, because she's already so cute. Just like her owner... Oh...

1101106059.content: I quickly cut myself off, but I've already said too much. My face suddenly feels like it's on fire.

1101106061.content: It's alright. She is very cute.

1101106062.content: ... So is that how you see me, Admin?

1101106063.content: Osiris's face is even redder than mine, and her hand goes into her pocket as though she's got something to take out. But just as she's about to...

1101106066.content: Osiris practically jumps into the air in fright.

1101106067.content: It's nearly feeding time, so I have to ask you to move on to the next enclosure.

1101106068.content: Oh, no problem. Admin, let's go!

1101106069.content: Osiris quickly stuffs whatever it is back in her pocket, then pulls me by the hand to the next place. I can feel her trembling...

1101106070.content: What was that in her pocket...?

1101106071.content: We must be going around in circles, as we once again bump into Ausar in the aquarium.

1101106072.content: The atmosphere is subdued, and beside me, Osiris appears to be deep in thought.

1101106073.content: What's going on with you two?

1101106074.content: Oh nothing. We were just told to leave by one of the employees.

1101106075.content: Sorry, it was my fault for being so slow...

1101106076.content: I'm sorry for leaving you on your own.

1101106077.content: That's not what I was asking... (Sigh)...

1101106078.content: Ausar crosses her arms and sighs in frustration.

1101106079.content: We can hear a vehicle approaching. We turn and see it's the aquarium's sightseeing cart, pulling a school of fish behind it.

1101106080.content: Shall we get on, Ausar? Oh, and you too, Osiris...

1101106081.content: I regret my question as soon as I ask it, because I see the cart only has seats for two.

1101106082.content: Are you kidding? Can you see how slow that thing's going? No way. If that looks fun to you, by all means, get on without me.

1101106083.content: Ausar pushes past Osiris and me as she walks off.

1101106084.content: W-wait a second, Ausar. We still need to line up...

1101106085.content: The aquarium glass reflects the rainbow-colored fish onto Osiris's face, but her attention doesn't seem to be on what's in front of her.

1101106086.content: Osiris, are you okay? You seem distracted.

1101106087.content: It's our day off. I hope you're not spending the whole time thinking about work and training!

1101106088.content: Oh, no, I'm not... I was thinking about you, actually.

1101106090.content: Admin... what do you think of me?

1101106091.content: A shadow engulfs us as a whale swims overhead and the sightseeing cart heads into the deep ocean section.

1101106092.content: It's much darker here. Osiris looks scared and she nestles closer to me.

1101106093.content: Why do you ask that? I see you as... my cute little partner.

1101106097.content: Osiris keeps quietly asking follow-up questions, as though she's waiting for a specific answer.

1101106098.content: The light gets a little brighter. Osiris hesitates, then a look of determination enters her eyes.

1101106100.content: A sudden jolt announces the end of the tour, and Osiris goes back to looking like a lost little girl.

1101106102.content: White birds wheel overhead as the three of us are greeted by the setting sun. Some young children wave up at them in glee.

1101106103.content: Oh, I didn't realize it had gotten so late...

1101106104.content: Time flies when you're having fun. And we saw so much, Admin... It's like...

1101106108.content: Well, the day's not over yet. Is there anything else you want to see, Lil' Osi? I can see a gift shop over there.

1101106109.content: She nods and timidly grabs my hand. I walk over to the full shelves and start looking for something for her.

1101106110.content: So much stuff... Hats, fish tanks, animal jewelry...

1101106112.content: (This is the last stop in the zoo. What should I do? We're about to leave and I still haven't given the gift yet...)

1101106114.content: I finish paying, then turn and put the kitty ears I just bought on Osiris's head.

1101106115.content: You always start hemming and hawing whenever you have something on your mind. Just like you have been today.

1101106117.content: Remember what you asked me in the aquarium earlier?

1101106118.content: Admin... what do you think of me?

1101106119.content: Well, I'd like to know what you think of me.

1101106122.content: Your fox? Oh, from your favorite story!

1101106123.content: Yeah... It's one of my most precious memories.

1101106124.content: How much of a difference is there between me and her beloved fox?

1101106126.content: But, since she's feeling so confused...

1101106127.content: I place my hands on her shoulders. She looks up at me with a smile, her sadness and doubt already hidden.

1101106128.content: You can also be my little lamb if you want! Because we've been friends for so long, from the very beginning, right?

1101106130.content: Let's talk about the fairy tale later. I don't know what you've got on your mind, Lil' Osi, but at the end of the day I'm still your Administrator.

1101106131.content: I can tell if you're really happy or you're just faking it, you know.

1101106132.content: So is there anything I can help you with?

1101106134.content: Her eyes glimmer. Then she buries her face in my chest.

1101106136.content: I'm... not okay. Because you're so kind to me, and I keep holding back.

1101106137.content: Tears run down her cheeks, and I'm reminded of that day we trained together.

1101106138.content: When she looked so shy and helpless...

1101106139.content: Place your hand on Osiris's head

1101106142.content: Her voice is muffled by my chest, and she clings to my shirt.

1101106143.content: There's no need to cry. You know, whenever I'm with you, I always find the courage to face the things I'm afraid of.

1101106144.content: The thought of her hidden vulnerabilities gives me the strength to confront anything.

1101106146.content: And her fragility just makes me want to protect her even more.

1101106154.content: When I come back to my senses, my mouth is dry and my words rasp out of my throat.

1101106156.content: I can hear a tremor in her voice. Then she places an envelope in my hand.

1101106157.content: I don't know when this started, but whenever I see Osiris's face, I always feel an urge to stroke her head.

1101106158.content: Always timid, she focuses what little strength she has into caring for me.

1101106161.content: Yes, but can you face away from me while I do? I'm feeling too shy.

1101106162.content: Why don't you read it out for me instead?

1101106163.content: (Whimpers) Don't be so mean to me, Admin...

1101106164.content: You two idiots are finally getting the idea!

1101106165.content: Osiris opens the envelope, takes out the letter, and looks at me, still embarrassed.

1101106166.content: I'm scared... Admin, can I stand behind you to read it, please?

1101106167.content: I'll feel less shy if you're not right in front of me...

1101106168.content: Sure. Don't worry, I won't make fun of you.

1101106169.content: She nods and stands close behind me, speaking softly.

1101106173.content: Sorry, I'm just used to saying "No worries" to you whenever you apologize.

1101106174.content: Starting a speech with "I'm sorry" is a very Osiris thing to do, heh-heh...

1101106176.content: She also feels a bit strange, standing behind me like this, and we both chuckle together. She gains confidence the more she reads.

1101106177.content:
I'm sorry because I'm lying whenever I say I don't mind what you do, Admin. I remember every time you've trained with me, inspired me, encouraged me not to give up.

When I think back on it, I realize your words always light up the dark for me. When I'm all alone in the Imago Room, I can't help but think back on everything you've ever said to me...

So... I should count myself lucky, right? I shouldn't ask for any more, should I?

Just so long as we can continue being friends. So long as I never have to hear you say no...

I'm sorry, I'm being as weak as I always am. You must think I'm pathetic. I must be a burden to you.

But it's okay. And if you get tired, it's fine, too. You can just rest for a while.

1101106183.content:
Because if you get sick, Admin, I'd be very sad... Sadder than anyone else, for sure.

But don't worry, because I know you. You're always encouraging me to never give up, so I know you can do the same!

Did you know that just one smile from you can get me back on my feet?

And that you can rely on me for anything?

Because I know I can rely on my fox for anything.

This is embarrassing to say, but I don't want to be just your assistant.

I want to be... more than that.

1101106190.content: What is it you want to be?

1101106191.content: I spin around and take her into my arms.

710410101.content: "A long-awaited new band," my foot! These people know nothing about music theory!

710410102.content: I can't take it anymore. I'm going up there to teach them what real art is.

710410104.content: Think about what the impact on the public good would be for a second... How about you wait and give them another chance?

710410105.content: Hmph! Allowing this sort of thing to be performed in Omorfies would be the true crime against the public good here!

710410106.content: Please don't say that. Barging on stage without going through the proper channels indicates a disdain for public order.

710410107.content: You... Fine. There's no need to remind me that you're a soldier, and a commander to boot.

710410108.content: While the two members of the audience have continued to argue, the band has also started playing something else: a new arrangement of the famous Omorfies song, "Sea of Stars."

710410109.content: Oh my... What a mess... You can't just do anything you like, you know!

710410110.content: Like I said just now, these people know absolutely squat about music theory.

710410111.content: Let's go talk to the organizers of the show.

710410113.content: Well, you're concerned about public order, aren't you? So I'm going to use the proper channel.

710410114.content: (Sigh)... You should have done that earlier.

710410115.content: I'm sure they'll listen to what I have to say.

710410116.content: It's time they learn what "Sea of Stars" actually sounds like.

710410201.content: ... The two of them are being so slow this time.

710410202.content: Hades is leaning against the car door and playing listlessly with her terminal.

710410203.content: Senator Hades? I apologize, but I must perform a routine check because of the celebration. Would you please show me your driver's license?

710410204.content: Go ahead. Do what you have to do.

710410205.content: Um... The format of this license doesn't look right...?

710410206.content: Ah. That's because it was issued fifty years ago.

710410207.content: F-fifty years ago...?! That means it's long expired.

710410208.content: I guess it is. I haven't renewed it since then.

710410209.content: Then I have to ask you to come with me—for driving without a valid license.

710410211.content: I bought the tea that Lady Hera likes.

710410213.content: Mintha, this is a routine check. They need to see your driver's license.

710410215.content: This license is alright... Senator Hades?
