410051021.content: And indeed, less than a minute later, an individual whose face is almost fully hidden in a scarf walks into a part of the alley lit by a street lamp, holding a briefcase. There's something familiar about their physique and movements.

410051022.content: They open the briefcase to show the Panthera the contents. Inside the case are dozen of green-colored pills stored in little glass vials. The Panthera representative nods, and a black plastic bag is produced by someone in his group. It's obvious to Luwu that it's stuffed full of cash.

410051023.content: Neither side wastes any time with polite chatter. They promptly exchange the briefcase and money, then turn to leave.

410051024.content: (Don't they have to bargain at all???)

410051025.content: Luwu didn't expect the deal to be over so quickly, and without any words exchanged to boot. She hurriedly turns off her video camera and comms, then leaps down onto the street, knocking the briefcase out of its holder's hand in the process.

410051026.content: The first to respond to the intrusion is the person who originally brought the briefcase; it's as if they expected this to happen. They immediately turn and run.

410051029.content: In contrast, the three dozen or so Panthera members were not at all prepared for this hijack. However, experienced as they are in street scuffles, they soon surround Luwu before she can catch up to the masked person.

410051030.content: B---, how dare you touch my stuff! Do you know who I am?!

410051032.content: The seller has already disappeared in the shadows, and Luwu is anxious to escape this encirclement. She's doing everything she can to not use her Divine Power on these humans.

410051033.content: "Get out of my way"? Hey, missy, did you hit your head on something or what? This is ----ing Panthera turf! You're not going anywhere now!

410051034.content: ... Stay where you are. Trust me.

410051035.content: Who the h--- do you think you are? Get her, brothers!

410052001.content: ... You said it yourself. I'll help you leave the thug life, then.

410052002.content: Groans and wails can be heard all over the alley. The leader of the thugs is lying on the ground and no longer saying anything. As he spies Luwu approaching, he instinctively tucks himself into a ball and turns his back towards her in self-preservation.

410052003.content: This is proving to be quite the headache for Luwu. She had to knock unconscious the few fighters who consumed Frenzyx, then injure the rest of them when they refused to turn tail and run at the first sign of trouble.

410052004.content: The seller has long left with the money, and there's no sign of them now except for the empty briefcase in the alley. Luwu picks up this piece of evidence. The masked one was wearing gloves, which means there won't be any fingerprints she can pull from it.

410052005.content: Just your regular, run-of-the-mill briefcase. The code's 0-0-0. I see a layer of anti-shock foam here...

410052006.content: It's not like Luwu was expecting to get any evidence from this plain briefcase that pointed to the identity of the masked person, anyway.

410052007.content: But she lifts up the layer of foam, as she habitually does, to check for hidden compartments. A piece of paper falls out from inside.

410052009.content: The sight of the familiar handwriting on the paper sends Luwu into a mild tizzy.

410052010.content: In Xu Heng, every master craftsman leaves their signature on their works, just like an artist adds their seal to their pieces. This is something Luwu, as a former detective, is keenly aware of.

410052011.content: As she turns, Luwu's spear appears in her hand. She picks up the leader by the collar, the tip of her spear pressed to his skin. He's now a pitiful, trembling version of his former self.

410052012.content: You have one chance to tell me the truth. Where is Zhiming?!

410052013.content: W-wha wha wha what? Who the --- is Z-Zhiming?

410052014.content: A deep frown appears on Luwu's face. With her experience, she knows the fellow is telling the truth.

410052015.content: I need you to get in touch with the person who delivered the briefcase just now. Tell them that you people have dealt with me and they can return now.

410052016.content: I-I... don't know how to reach them...

410052017.content: Are you asking for another fight or what?

410052018.content: I'm not lying!!! They're the one who gets in touch every time there's a deal! We have no ****ing clue who the **** they are!

410052019.content: I mean, there's a reason they were all wrapped up like that! Clearly, they don't want us to know who they are!

410052021.content: It was supposed to be five days from now. But now that you jumped us like that...

410052022.content: HANDS UP, ALL OF YOU! What's going on here?!

410052023.content: A sudden gunshot ends Luwu's interrogation of the Panthera men. The powerful beam of a flashlight has lit up a good portion of the alley. Luwu squints as she looks at the person holding the flashlight. She slowly puts down her spear.

410052024.content: What the—? You again?! You've come here just to make trouble, haven't you?

410052025.content: There was an illegal exchange of substances happening here earlier.

410052026.content: What exchange? What the ---- did they trade? Where are the goods? And where's the money?

410052027.content: The man who brought the goods escaped, and these men took the items in question. You can ask them for the details when you get back to the station.

410052028.content: The policeman turns off his flashlight and nods. He pulls out his handcuffs and walks towards Luwu and the Panthera leader.

410052029.content:
Luwu lets go of the Panthera leader's collar.
The handcuffs go on Luwu with a couple of clicks, and the policeman gives her a shove.

410052032.content: Who do you think you are, telling me how to do my job? And tell me, who's the one who hurt all these people?

410052033.content: They're the criminals. And they're the ones who started it.

410052034.content:
Hey, you blasted dingus, I asked you who the one who hurt all these people.
You over there. Tell me, who did this to you?

410052035.content: ... It's her. It was all her.

410052036.content: And now you start making arrests.

410052037.content: Of course! Look at you, acting like you've done nothing wrong!

410052038.content: Hurry up. You need a night or two in jail to straighten you out.

410052040.content: The station she's locked up in turns out to be a dark space that's somehow worse than a regular jail or prison. Luwu fiddles with the bullet in her pocket, counting down the time in her head.

410052041.content: Around dawn, she hears the sound of a familiar voice.

410052042.content: Is she really a guest of Meruism's?

410052043.content: Yep. We import quite a number of goods from her company.

410052044.content: Look at that small hovering lamp on your desk, for example. Doesn't the sticker on it say "Tian Lu Traders"?

410052045.content: ... Fine. Since no one was killed, I'll let her go this time. She's only one person, after all. But tell her to cool her jets a little.

410052046.content: Since you're here to free her, you must know the rules?

410052048.content:
Mmm...
All good. You can take her with you now.

410052051.content: The aromas of a myriad of wonderful snacks permeate Gharpur's morning air. However, neither Kali nor Luwu show any inclination for breakfast as they walk back to Meruism headquarters.

410052052.content: I can understand why you weren't able to catch the person who handed over the Frenzyx. But how in the world did you manage to get arrested by that cop?

410052053.content: You want me to run from a cop? That's evading arrest.

410052054.content: Please, it's not like you don't know what the cops here are like. Do you think they'd really come after you if you ran?

410052055.content: In any case... I'm sorry you had to clean up after me.

410052056.content: It's alright. That's part and parcel of running a gang for you. I spring folks from jail more often than I go grocery shopping.

410052057.content: You'll have to keep your eyes out for the Panthera now—in case they want revenge for the humiliation you caused them.

410052058.content: I think you'd better stay inside from now on. Since you didn't find any leads last night, Meruism will think of another way...

410052059.content: I did find something, you know.

410052060.content: So you know who the person who handed over the Frenzyx is?

410052061.content: Although they were masked, their physique and movements reminded me of someone. But I'm not entirely sure yet. And take a look at this...

410052062.content: Luwu takes out the paper that fell from the briefcase out of her pocket. After some thought, she also produces the piece of paper that was dangling from the workroom door the day before.

410052063.content: The two sheets are different sizes, and the characters written on them are also different. But the strokes that make up the character are unmistakably alike in some way...

410052064.content: Zhiming's emblem?! You mean you found her?

410052065.content:
No. I found this in the briefcase that was used to hold the Frenzyx pills.
Although I can't imagine why or how, there's some kind of link between Zhiming and Frenzyx.

410052067.content: I can't say yet. But you've seen the kinds of things Zhiming usually deals with in her experiments and projects. This sort of shady substance simply isn't in her wheelhouse.

410052068.content: ... There's a question I've been wanting to ask. If Shashvat's healthcare industry is more or less monopolized by the rich folks, how is it that the Frenzyx is coming from Gharpur?

410052069.content: I was expecting to find loads of small underground labs or workshops here. But I realized when I arrived here that it's simply not possible to have that here in Gharpur.

410052070.content: Each gang controls all business that happens on their turf, and the Panthera wouldn't have needed to buy Frenzyx from someone if it was being made in their area. That deal yesterday wouldn't have happened either.

410052071.content: Therefore, the first idea I had may be the right answer after all. In Shashvat, medicines can only originate from the pharma firms in the affluent district.

410052072.content: And most of the Frenzyx in Gharpur are coming from...

410052073.content:
Vimoksha Pharma...
Wait, Luwu—are you saying that Frenzyx is being created by Boss Seema? That can't be true.

410052074.content: Madam Seema isn't the one I'm thinking of, Kali. The person who brought the briefcase? I thought they seemed familiar because I think we saw them just yesterday morning...

410052075.content: ... You're talking about Kumar. Madam Seema's brother.

410061001.content: Luwu is creeping through the grass. The quiet of the summer night means that the insect calls around her just barely disguise the sound of her footsteps. However, the noise of her communicator vibrating is loud and clear.

410061002.content: She sighs when she sees the name of the caller, then finds a hiding place by the side of the road to take the call. There may be only vegetation around her, but she's still on private property.

410061003.content: Kali? Whatever you have to say, make it quick. I'm inside Vimoksha Pharma right now.

410061004.content: Are you sure you want to do this? Wouldn't it be better if we just talk face-to-face with Boss Seema tomorrow?

410061005.content: I get that you trust Madam Seema, and I understand why. But if Frenzyx is coming from Vimoksha Pharma, do you really think talking to her would help?

410061007.content: This has something to do Zhiming's whereabouts. I can only think of a few reasons why the Quad can't reach her—and all these reasons are beyond the scope of simple "human activity."

410061008.content: Now that I have a clue about where she it, no matter how unclear it is, I have to follow up on it. Otherwise, I won't be able to sleep at night.

410061009.content: Don't worry, I've been trained in counter-reconnaissance. And with my Divine Grace to provide me with cover, I won't be discovered.

410061010.content: That doesn't sound very reassuring at all...

410061011.content: Fine. I know I can't talk you out of this. But like I said before, I'm here if you need any help at all.

410062001.content: The security mechas Luwu encounters do not pose much hindrance. As she approaches the center of the park, the buildings and various other facilities start looking better maintained as well.

410062002.content: A garage, a recycling center... Is that an abandoned factory? And over here we have... factories and warehouses.

410062003.content: This late at night, no one is working inside the facility. Though the roads by the factory are fully illuminated by street lights, there is no trace of employee activity at all. It's obvious to Luwu where she needs to go.

410062004.content: However, just as Luwu is about to scurry over there, a blinding beam of bright is shone on her, causing her to raise her hands and cover her eyes.

410062006.content: Her subconscious action lasts less than a second. Luwu realizes that she's been discovered and quickly jumps aside.

410062007.content: I thought I told you before that we don't allow visitors in without a prior appointment.

410062008.content: Seema? How is this even possible...?

410062009.content: The owner of Vimoksha Pharma has brought with her a large group of mechas that have quietly surrounded Luwu. Dozens of lights have lit a roughly five-meter-wide circle around her.

410062010.content:
"Tian Lu Traders employee sneaks into Vimoksha Pharma."
The Jivitabad press is going to have a field day with this.

410062012.content: This is my property. I have the right to know everything that goes on here.

410062013.content: The police will be here soon. You should start working on your excuses now.

410062014.content: I'm here to look for somebody.

410062017.content: Although the two women are standing some distance apart, Luwu clearly sees Seema narrow her eyes ever so slightly.

410062019.content: Of course. Her accomplishments as a polymath scholar are well-known here, too.

410062020.content: ... You know that I don't mean that.

410062021.content: Although I'm not terribly interested in commerce, I'd be very interested in working with Zhiming. If she ever comes to Vimoksha Pharma, I would treat her as an honored guest.

410062022.content: But as you can see, she isn't here. I don't understand why you're looking for a person from Xu Heng in an ordinary pharmaceutical factory in Shashvat.

410062023.content: You know my situation and why I don't want to draw too much attention to myself. I don't care what you do in the slum, but this is the first and last time you'll break into Vimoksha Pharma.

410062024.content: Luwu can tell that Seema does know something about Zhiming, but for some reason is refusing to talk about it. There's also far more in her reaction to Luwu's intrusion than just anger.

410062025.content: It's as if she's dealing with something she didn't want to see happen but predicted would occur anyway.

410062026.content: About five minutes later, a police car enters the Vimoksha compound, and out comes the second cop who was at the tavern fight the other day.

410062027.content: The policeman speaks to Seema to find out what's happened, then takes out his handcuffs so he can restrain the lawbreaker. However, he's taken aback when he recognizes Luwu. Then his lips move like he's cursing and he slaps his hand to his forehead.

410062028.content: This makes it three days in a row, lady. Three. I can give you a police uniform for free if that's what you like looking at.

410062029.content: I know the drill now. How much do you want?

410062030.content: You... Can't you wait till we get back to Gharpur to talk about this?!?

410062031.content: I don't flippin' care that you're from Xu Heng or that you're a guest of Meruism's—you're staying the night in jail. I don't give a hoot how much money you're offering. Screw that.

410062032.content:
Ugh... It's time to go.
And the rest of you, scram. I don't have the friggin' time for any of you today.

410062033.content: First thing the next morning, Luwu is unceremoniously yanked out of jail. A glance at the yawning policeman makes her realize that the harsh language he used at Vimoksha Pharma the night before was all part of a show he put up for Seema.

410062034.content: Luwu isn't sure how she should feel about this information. She sighs and shakes her head, and at that moment, she suddenly catches sight of the other person who's being released with her. She knows that face.

410062036.content: Xu Heng lady. Don't even think of trying anything funny with me. This is police turf, you know?

410062037.content: How did you get yourself tossed into jail now? Didn't the Akkadians let all of you out two days ago?

410062038.content:
... Well, my boys and I had to eat.
We aren't like the bigger gangs, you know. We don't have the money to bribe the police, so if we fail, we have nothing to blame but our own bad luck.

410062040.content: ... They're pretty much all scattered to the wind now. I heard a couple of them say they'd found proper jobs, though I'm not sure where they've gone. The rest of them have left me too.

410062041.content: It's just my blasted luck to have run into you Xu Heng people...

410062042.content: Wait. Did you meet somebody else from Xu Heng? Say, a woman with white hair and a blind right eye?

410062043.content: A skinny, flat-chested twerp. And she sure could talk circles around you... Yeah, her. You know her or something?

410062044.content: Do you know where she's gone?

410062045.content: She left. My boys and I saw her leaving Gharpur and wanted to squeeze her for some cash. But they got spooked by what she said and didn't do anything in the end.

410062046.content: You know her, don't you? So why are you asking me these questions...? Ah, I get it now. She's your enemy and you're after her, aren't you?!

410062047.content: Luwu isn't sure what to say to this delinquent who's clearly fired up at the prospect of revenge—and she honestly can't be bothered to explain things to him, either. She gestures at him instead.

410062048.content: Tell me everything she said—especially anything related to where she was going and what she was going to do.

410062049.content: If you tell me the truth, the money is yours. But if you lie to me, however small the lie is, I'll make sure you won't make a single cent ever again. Trust me, I'll know if you're lying.

410071001.content: So Zhiming was asking around about Vimoksha Pharma before she left Gharpur?

410071003.content: She left around the time Meruism banned Frenzyx from our turf. Maybe she had the same thoughts as you and decided to ask some questions.

410071004.content: Our boys have been trying to get news of her too. A number of folks in the neighborhood told us that they saw Zhiming, but said nothing about her having asked around about anything.

410071005.content: If she was looking into Vimoksha Pharma, I suppose she would have summoned everyone before her and talked to each one individually...

410071006.content: I feel like you know her even better than I do... Are there any unusual places on the outskirts? Seems that this was the question she asked most often.

410071007.content: There's nothing out there. It's all abandoned land with grass tall enough to hide a dozen men in. Neither Gharpur nor the Affluent District want to have anything to do with it.

410071008.content: Could we take a break for a bit...? I mean, you were just released from the jail, but you're already talking about this.

410071009.content: What do you think I should be talking about now, then?

410071010.content: Do you know why I didn't turn up to get you out this time?

410071011.content: Because you don't think I should've snuck into Vimoksha Pharma? And you think that I'm not following the rules of Gharpur?

410071012.content: Neither! It's because I've already told you so many times to ask me if you need help. But you don't seem to remember that at all.

410071013.content: Meruism has given me enough help as it is.

410071014.content: So what are you going to do now? Let me guess... or is it so obvious that I don't need to?

410071015.content: You're going to the Panthera to find someone who's willing to admit that Vimoksha Pharma really is linked to Frenzyx, then you'll go back to Vimoksha Pharma with the witness and confront Seema?

410071016.content: ... That sounds like a pretty good idea.

410071017.content: Kali throws her hands up in the air. She's done trying to change Luwu's mind.

410071018.content: You're not opposing my investigation anymore?

410071019.content: Just be more careful this time... Besides, I have a question that needs answering too.

410071020.content:
Azim still isn't back yet.
He has a match scheduled for this afternoon, and if he doesn't show up, he'll need to pay damages that far exceed the potential prize money.

410071021.content: So there's no way he won't go... unless he's in trouble.

410071022.content: So you think there's something fishy about his "job" at Vimoksha too... He looked awful when we saw him there the other day. But overworking himself couldn't have caused that.

410071023.content: And like you said, many of the boys who tried to rob you the other day have suddenly found "decent work"... I've actually been hearing many stories like that on the streets lately. But no one can tell me what this "work" is.

410071024.content: Although occurrences like abductions and disappearances aren't exactly big news here in Gharpur, if we put two and two together...

410071026.content: The numbers on the communicator clock are moving slowly. Luwu is seated in a corner of the arena, silently observing the scene. The continued absence of one of the competitors is starting to cause a stir.

410071028.content: His opponent and the crowd below the ring are mocking Azim for his supposed cowardice, and the referee begins to read out the penalty for breach of contract as stipulated in the agreement Azim signed... but he stops when a figure steps into the ring.

410071029.content: Azim is unable to attend this match. I'm here to pay the breach of contract penalty on his behalf.

410071031.content: The attention of the crowd in this small arena soon zeroes in on the well-dressed Kumar, and a sudden hush falls over them. Kumar ignores the stares, hands a suitcase to the referee, and turns around to leave.

410071032.content: The referee, having received the money, quickly and politely moves on to the next match, and the interest around the match thus ends.

410071033.content: You look like you're in a hurry. Don't you want to watch the other matches?

410071034.content: Kumar shudders at the greeting that's come out of nowhere. At the sight of Luwu, who's leaning comfortably back in her seat, his gaze fills with fear. It looks like he wants to do nothing more than leave.

410071035.content: You aren't wearing your scarf now, and the Panthera boys sure aren't around to help you.

410071036.content: W-what... What on earth are you talking about?

410071038.content: You aren't as good at disguising your feelings as Seema is. If I were you, I would choose to earn an honest and decent living instead.

410071039.content: You know it'll all catch up with you in the end. There are dozens of reasons why a man engaged in illegal dealings in Gharpur could disappear. Not that anyone would care.

410071041.content:
Just someone working security at a trading company.
Sit down. It's no coincidence that I ran into you here.

410071043.content: Kumar sits down next to Luwu. The noise of the arena turns out to be the best way to keep the ensuing conversation between just the two of them.

410071046.content: Why are you here instead of him?

410071047.content: He really is fine. We just needed him to stay at the factory. He's raising money for his daughter's medical treatment and can't afford the penalty, so I paid it for him.

410071048.content:
But what use does a pharmaceutical firm have for a professional fighter?
How do you plan on explaining this to me? Is he a subject in a study?

410071050.content: A commercial secret, you say. Or is it a crime?

410071052.content: If you're more inclined to speak during a formal interrogation, then yes. After all, you've already admitted that you're selling Frenzyx.

410071053.content: You don't have any proof. And I have the right to remain silent.

410071054.content:
Of course.
Though I am curious: You were rather fearless when you threatened me a couple of days ago. What's changed since then?

410071055.content:
How did a person with money and status end up selling deadly substances?
And why would someone who's watching Azim's every move be willing to spend money to help him?

410071056.content: I don't understand you, Kumar, so I can only speculate here...

410071057.content: Perhaps you went through something in the last two days that's changed your mind. Or perhaps you're being coerced into doing this. Or perhaps it's both...

410071058.content: Please stop... I can't tell you anything else...

410071059.content: This has nothing to do with right and wrong. I just can't betray myself... or what I belong to.

410071061.content: Seema... isn't my sister. She's my sister-in-law. My brother was a champion fighter way back when. I grew up watching him fight, and used to imitate his moves. But I had no talent for it.

410071062.content: My brother was a good man like you, Madam Luwu. He was the one who suggested Vimoksha be built near Gharpur so that it could provide some help to the poor in need of healthcare.

410071063.content: But later on, my brother was invited to fight in an exhibition match in the Affluent District. The script for the fight called for him to be humiliated by a local fighter, but instead of doing so, he gave that clumsy man a real hard blow.

410071064.content: I was there, sitting in the audience, and blast, that was one perfect punch. You could see the guy's face change...

410071065.content: As Kumar recalls the fight, blow by blow, he begins to mime his brother's actions with his hands.

410071066.content: But he soon puts his fists down and the light in his eyes flickers out. He licks his dry lips.

410071067.content: ... So your brother... was the fighter who was killed in the ring. I heard the story from Azim.

410071068.content: Nobody knows what really happened. Maybe someone tampered with his gloves. Or maybe there was something wrong with the water he had before the match... In the end, the organizer just gave paid us, though frankly, the amount would have been peanuts to the rich.

410071069.content: Loss will change a person. That's what happened to both my sister-in-law and me... And that's all I can tell you.

410071070.content: It sounds like you're trying to justify what you're doing.

410071071.content: No... What I mean is, anything can happen, but I have no wish to see more people get pulled into this.

410071072.content: And is Zhiming involved in this business of yours?

410071073.content: She provided us with some technical help. But I swear, I have no idea where she is now. No one wants to get into trouble.

410071074.content: Kumar's face is set in a resolute expression. Luwu glances at him and nods.

410071076.content: I won't ask you any more questions. But I do hope that by the next time we meet, you'll have made the right choice.

410071077.content: So you're still sticking your nose in this?! I know you're a great fighter. But this isn't something a single person can handle.

410071078.content: Who do you think will help you? Meruism? The cops?!

410071079.content: It doesn't matter if anyone helps me or not—or if this is a personal matter...

410071081.content: I just see a case in which both the laws and ethics have been violated. I see that the rights of innocent people are being infringed upon, while the ones responsible are being disguised and protected.

410071082.content: Some people say that I speak my mind too freely and am too rigid in my thinking. Maybe they're right. But that doesn't mean I'm in the wrong, either.

410071083.content: If Zhiming were here, she might be able to fully convince you. But I'm not so skilled at speaking. There's only one principle I believe in, and it's one I've held since I was a child.

410071084.content: This is the second time I've asked this question since arriving in Gharpur. Kumar...

410071086.content: It's been some time, but Luwu still hasn't returned yet. Kali doesn't know that Luwu has run into Kumar, but right now she has something even more pressing to attend to.

410071087.content: Visbanes? But I don't see anything on the Bane Energy monitor.

410071088.content: It's true, Kali. Our people were asking around about Zhiming when they heard that a carouser roaming the outskirts yesterday saw a person from Xu Heng simply disappear into thin air.

410071089.content: The carouser mumbled something at the tavern, but no one believed him. It was rumored a few months ago that there was treasure to be found there, and many people went there to try their luck. But in the end, they found nothing.

410071090.content: We checked out that place just now, and I saw Visbanes hiding in the grass. I immediately told everyone to leave.

410071091.content: ... How on earth did Visbanes get mixed up in this too?!

410071092.content:
Well, we can figure that out later...
Great job, by the way. Give me the coordinates—I'll go take a look myself.

410072001.content: Kali lets out a sigh of relief as the last Visbane finally falls to the ground. She dusts off the dirt from her gloves, then takes out her communicator to call Luwu.

410072002.content: The dry wasteland is accumulating the heat of the afternoon sun. There's nothing here worth paying attention to, and certainly no leads, either.

410072003.content: However, a call from Meruism comes in before she can pull up Luwu's contact information on her communicator.

410072005.content: No. But this may be even worse...

410072007.content: It's the Panthera. Their boss has come with his men and they're making quite the fuss.

410072009.content: He... says that Luwu beat up his men and took his stuff. And he's here because everyone knows that Luwu is connected to Meruism.

410072010.content: So the Panthera want us to hand over Luwu to them if we don't want a fight to break out... Kali?

410072011.content: ... I haven't seen anything like this happen for some time now.

410072012.content: Kali's face falls and she clears her throat. Then she turns around and beings walking back to Meruism. Gone is her usually gentle, sunny expression.

410072013.content:
Do they think we're wimps or something?!
I'm heading back now. Let's see just how sharp the claws of these "panthers" are!

410081001.content: Having left the arena, Luwu is watching Kumar drive away. She nods very slightly to herself—she's feeling a little less worried.

410081002.content: Interesting. So many companies in the affluent district never met up with Zhiming, despite their efforts, but somehow this small pharma firm got what they wanted from her. Just what is going on...?

410081003.content:
I should let CORG handle this.
I've got to figure out what to do next about the Frenzyx issue, too. I suppose I could go to the police in the affluent district if I have no other choice. Maybe they'll intervene after all if the target they need to investigate is Vimoksha Pharma.

410081004.content: While Luwu is racking her brain for ways to get Vimoksha Pharma formally investigated, the crowd on the street surges in one direction, as though they're being pulled along by a current.

410081005.content: Let's go, let's go! The Panthera are picking a fight with Meruism on their own turf! Let's go...

410081006.content: What? Excuse me, what's going on?

410081007.content: The Panthera wants Meruism to hand over this person from Xu Heng called Luwu. They say that if they don't, they'll... Wait!! Don't tell me you're the Luwu they're fighting over!

410081008.content: "They say that if they don't, they'll..."? What will they do?

410081009.content:
Make a real scene, of course! Throw punches, send tables flying, and what have you...
Did you really snatch away the Panthera's goods all by yourself? How???

410081010.content: This is not good. Luwu hands the passerby a small tip, then hurries towards Meruism's turf.

410081011.content: As she follows the growing crowd to her destination, Luwu hears someone who's speaking very loudly over the wall of people. The person who answers the first voice seems to be Kali, though the difference in forcefulness between the two is like night and day.

410081012.content: She's about to push through the crowd to reach Kali when she hears someone behind her calling her name.

410081014.content: You're from Meruism...? But why? People are saying that the Panthera are here for me.

410081015.content: That's exactly why. If you stay away, the two sides may just bicker for a bit and then part ways. But once you make your presence known, the Panthera will have to fight to get you.

410081016.content: I'm the reason this is happening—Meruism should never have been implicated. If they want me, then I should be the one they get.

410081017.content: If a fight is all it will take to make them see reason, maybe this will be a good opportunity, after all.

410081018.content: Please tell me you won't be going all out with them.

410081019.content: I can handle humans even without my Divine Power. Don't worry.

410081021.content: The argument happening past the wall of people is sounding increasingly strident. Luwu quickly pushes through the crowd with her spear in her hand.

410081022.content: At the same moment she locks eyes with a burly man who's now right in front of her, she hears the very end of what the Meruism Modifier was trying to tell her.

410081024.content: ... Aren't you the referee from the arena?

410081025.content: Had I known you'd be such a pain, I'd have taught you a lesson or two about messing with the Panthera back at the ring the other day.

410081026.content: Kali, you said that you didn't know where she was, but here she is. Do you have anything else you want to say?

410081027.content: Kali exchanges a few words with the Modifier who failed to stop Luwu, and a look of exasperation appears on her face. She smacks her head a couple of times so she can collect herself.

410081028.content: No, I don't. Luwu is a guest of Meruism's, and if we even can't protect our guests on our turf, we may as well leave now.

410081029.content: Besides, you keep saying that Luwu's taken your stuff, but you also refuse to tell us what this "stuff" is. If you wanna start something, Ravana, you ought to find a better excuse.

410081030.content: Do people really think that all the time I've spent refereeing means I've lost the will to fight?!

410081031.content: If you start something here, you and your people can forget about leaving this place.

410081033.content: Luwu shakes her head at Kali, then walks towards the small mountain of a man that is Ravana.

410081034.content: I will go with you, if that's what you want. But first, you must beat me. And leave Meruism out of this.

410081036.content: I'll be okay... I know what I'm doing.

410081037.content: Are you saying you want to have a one-on-one with me?

410081038.content: You can fight with a few minions as well, if you're that scared.

410081039.content: Hahahaha... I'm a 16-time champion who's never lost a fight! Not in the ring, and not on the streets!

410081040.content: You want to fight me? Show me proof of your worthiness!

410082001.content: Is this enough? Or are you just scared?

410082002.content: ... Very good. It's been a while since I've had an opponent as interesting as you, anyway.

410082003.content: The grin on Ravana's face simply widens as he watches Luwu knocking out his minions in minutes. He jumps down from his perch and approaches Luwu, moving his fists, which sends shivers down the spines of the onlookers.

410082004.content: Ravana is at least a foot taller than Luwu. He looks down at his petite opponent contemptuously, as though he's staring at an ant he can crush to death with a single movement of his foot.

410082005.content: No rules. We fight until only one of us is left standing. You ready for this?

410082006.content: Don't worry, he-man. Even if you lose, I'll spare your life.

410082007.content: Before she's even finished speaking, Luwu's eyes narrow and she raises her spear, holding it horizontally in front of her. She feels as though she's been struck head-on by a truck. She stumbles several paces backwards, spear shaking in her hand.

410082009.content: Ravana slowly retracts his fist. Though her opponent is human, Luwu knows it's time for her to get serious.

410082010.content: This man is more dangerous than he looks, both in terms of his physical fitness and his fighting skills.

410082011.content: You've got some reflexes on you.

410082012.content: "No rules," you said. Are you just use your fists?

410082013.content: The best weapon is the body!

410082014.content: Ravana charges at Luwu with a speed that is completely incongruous with his size. Giving Luwu no room to use her spear, he rains blows down on her with both his fists and legs.

410082015.content: The sound of his iron-hard muscles striking Luwu's spear sound akin to the noises at the blacksmith's forge. Again and again they boom out, sucking the air out of the room.

410082016.content: Not one onlooker believes the fight is unfair because only one side is wielding a weapon, just like no audience member in the Colosseum thought the gladiators fighting with swords and shields had any sort of undue advantage over the ferocious beasts they battled.

410082017.content: Luwu soon adapts to Ravana's extraordinary attacks and gradually finds her footing again. She's now able to instinctively counter his every move thanks to her martial arts training.

410082018.content: She blocks a punch from Ravana by holding her spear horizontally, then moves her back hand in front of her. Her two-meter-long spear immediately turns into a short sword around 50 centimeters long. Then, out of nowhere, she flicks the sword upwards, bringing it dangerously close to Ravana's chin.

410082019.content: Ravana takes two steps back. He's about to draw closer again when he sees Luwu moving her grip to the middle section of her spear.

410082020.content: I know a thing or two about the spear skills they teach in Xu Heng. Nobody holds a spear like that!

410082021.content: Looks like you don't know enough. "When one advances, the spear retreats." Always stay nimble to get the right distance between you and your opponent.

410082022.content: You're all talk. Come at me!

410082023.content: Both Luwu and Ravana are drawing immense pleasure from the fight. Their shared realization that the other party is a tough opponent after all only stokes the flames of their fighting spirit even higher.

410082024.content: The crowd is holding its collective breath at this scene, which wouldn't be out-of-place in an action movie. Even the members of the Panthera and Meruism have almost forgotten they were on the verge on a full-on brawl just moments ago.

410082025.content: Naturally, Luwu doesn't have time to register the audience's reactions. She's the only one who knows just how much pressure Ravana is putting on her.

410082026.content: The two fight for about ten minutes, after which they are still evenly matched, and neither is showing signs of fatigue. Several times, Luwu even has the urge to use her Divine Power and end the match once for all, but she manages to resist the impulse.

410082027.content: And when the battle has lasted just slightly longer than a typical human should be able to endure, a special ending bell suddenly rings out.

410082029.content: The sound of an explosion coming from the west is so sudden and violent that both Luwu and Ravana back away from each other in confusion.

410082030.content: Everyone is momentarily frozen by this new, unexpected development. Then they look in the direction the sound came from, but all they can see is a large cloud of black smoke in the distance.

410082032.content: Unlike most of the onlookers, who look rather confused, Ravana seems a little unhappy, and the fighting spirit in his eyes is quickly fading.

410082033.content:
Let's call it a draw for today. But we should definitely continue this another time.
I must say, lady from Xu Heng, you're not too bad.

410082035.content: The two gangs have nothing more to talk about. Ravana leaves with the Panthera's people, while Kali and the members of Meruism form a protective circle around Luwu.

410082036.content: Seeing that the fun is over, the spectators disperse, whispering to each other about both the explosion that just occurred and the mind-blowing match they just watched.

410082037.content: That was incredible, Luwu! I really need to have you teach our people to fight when you have the time.

410082038.content: Anyone can learn martial arts, as long as they're willing to put in the work.

410082039.content: That Ravana character was pretty good himself. No wonder he was willing to come to Meruism turf even after all of his followers had been beaten up.

410082040.content: Who do you think would have won?

410082041.content: I'm not sure, honestly. He has pretty good stamina. The outcome would depend on who got tired and made a mistake first, I guess.

410082042.content: Did you notice something, Kali? That odd look on Ravana's face when the explosion happened?

410082043.content: It was almost as if he was in a hurry to get out of here... but it seems like the explosion happened in the affluent district. So why would he concern himself with that?

410082044.content: Oh, that's right—we received some new information about Zhiming. But I'm not sure how credible it is...

410082045.content: The two share what they've learned. Kali expresses disappointment at Kumar's implicit confession, and Luwu too sighs in resignation when she hears Kali didn't find any new leads out and about.

410082046.content: So what is this rumor of "treasure" in the outskirts you just mentioned?

410082047.content: Oh, that. It's probably some tall tale made up at a tavern. Someone claimed to have seen a golden light shining from the ground there one night, and then they saw heavy fog and heard a tinkling sound coming from inside it.

410082048.content: That was quite a few months ago, though... Don't tell me that you believe that rumor?

410082049.content: Well, we're out of leads, and it's a place that Zhiming's been to. Plus, Visbanes have also appeared there...

410082050.content: Are there still Visbanes around? I'll take over this case, then.

410082051.content: Their conversation is interrupted by a cold and languid voice. It's only now that Luwu and Kali notice there is an unnatural silence behind them.

410082052.content: They turn around. They, along with the silent folks on the side of the road, see a group of heavily armed soldiers standing in the middle of the street.

410082053.content: Luwu's eyes fall on the figure at the very front of the group, and her eyes grow ever wider. It's only when she sees a lack of expression on the other person's face that she slowly calms down.

410082056.content: Looks like you've already paid the courtesy call to Meruism on my behalf, bonehead.

410082057.content: You took your time. They told me that you were coming two days ago.

410082058.content: Shashvat is a huge place. And why would I make this little slum in Jivitabad my first stop?

410082059.content: Had I not heard that you were in a fight with someone here, I would never have found you so quickly.

410082060.content: However, I heard that right before Zhiming went missing, she was at Meruism... You should have told me something this important at the start.

410082061.content: We're looking for Zhiming ourselves. And we have no leads, apart from the one you just told us.

410082064.content: Nothing. I just thought that people from Meruism wouldn't be so friendly to me, that's all.

410082065.content: ... We aren't spoiling for a fight, you know.

410082066.content: Let's just all focus on finding Zhiming for now. Kali, shall we head back to Meruism HQ?

410082067.content: CORG's arrival has caused quite the stir at the Meruism headquarters. After all, the nature of Brahmā's relationship with CORG isn't exactly a secret. However, no one knows why things are that way.

410082068.content: Baize is calm and appears unconcerned by the fuss of it all. Kali and Luwu take her upstairs without any untoward events occurring.

410082069.content: Baize, how is it that you didn't know that Zhiming was here at Meruism? Did the Quad not tell you?

410082070.content: Obviously, the Quad had no idea too.

410082071.content:
Since you're also looking for Zhiming, let's exchange intel.
Kali, what was Zhiming doing here at Meruism?

410082073.content: Baize stares at Kali for quite some time. Without saying a word, she massages the bridge of her nose.

410082074.content: Hmm. That's odd. I can understand why nobody else knows what mission Zhiming was on at the time. But how it possible that she was here for two whole weeks and none of you knew what she was up to...?

410082075.content: There's no way that she was here on holiday in Shashvat, then decided to hide away in a secluded place.

410082076.content: Did CORG come up empty as well?

410082077.content: The only thing we know for sure is that she never left Shashvat. But we have no idea if she's alright. By the way, we ran into quite a few Visbanes on our way here and took care of them. You're welcome.

410082078.content: And you, local, what else have you learned? We don't have the time to start from square one.

410082079.content: Luwu and Kali glance at each other and then nod. There's no need to hide anything about this situation from CORG, since they have shared interests.

410082080.content: They tell Baize what's happened recently in Gharpur, including Zhiming's long wait for Brahmā, Luwu's investigation on Panthera, Vimoksha Pharma and Frenzyx, and the fragments of clues to Zhiming's whereabouts that they've found.

410082081.content: "Frenzyx"... What in the world was Zhiming up to?

410082082.content: Since we're on this topic, Baize—do you think you could get me inside Vimoksha Pharma?

410082083.content: You want to investigate Vimoksha Pharma???

410082084.content: ... You can just say no if you don't want to.

410082085.content: I took a look at the police logs on my way here. I must say, Luwu, it's quite an accomplishment to get arrested three days in a row.

410082087.content: What reason could you possibly have for hijacking a gang deal and beating up dozens of men? And did you sneak on to someone's private property because you didn't have all the evidence you needed?

410082088.content: Even if I hadn't fire you back in the day, as a cop, you still wouldn't have the right to do all of this.

410082089.content: ... I don't want to talk about that.

410082090.content: It looks like you still haven't learned your lesson yet, even after all these years.

410082091.content: What lesson do I still have to learn, since I'm no longer a cop?

410082092.content: The air in the room has become very still. Kali smiles awkwardly, her eyes darting back and forth between Baize and Luwu. Then she frantically goes to take a few cans of milk tea from the fridge.

410082093.content: A can for both of you?

410082095.content: If I may—CORG doesn't have jurisdiction over the Frenzyx matter to begin with. And since the police don't give two hoots about it, what's wrong with letting Luwu investigate?

410082096.content: Unacceptable. I'll take over that case as well. Since Zhiming is involved, the matter isn't that simple anymore.

410082097.content: I have no right to stop Meruism from doing anything. But I strongly suggest that you don't try to run circles around me. Doing that will put both Meruism and CORG in a difficult position, if trouble arises.

410082098.content: As for you, Luwu, I hear that you've been doing well at Tian Lu Traders.

410082099.content: My job right now is to investigate Vimoksha Pharma.

410082100.content: Yes. But now that I've taken over the case, this job of yours has come to an end.

410082101.content: You're pushing me aside after I've come so far in the investigation?

410082102.content: What else can I do? Allow an ordinary civilian like you to tag along on CORG operations?

410082105.content: After cutting off Luwu's exclamation with a pause, Baize slowly breaks a smile. It's a dangerous smile, especially since she keeps her expression neutral the majority of the time.

410082106.content: Back when we were still working together, there was something I said to you again and again for years. You really ought to have memorized it by now...

410091001.content: I'll show myself out. We ain't that close, anyway.

410091002.content: I think I understand now why Boss Brahmā isn't a fan of CORG.

410091003.content: Really? Personally, I don't understand the friendships and rivalries between the Prime Modifiers.

410091004.content: One more thing, Baize. You must have heard that explosion earlier too.

410091005.content: Yeah. That came from the direction of that Vimoksha Pharma place you were talking about. Maybe there was an accident at one of the factory buildings there. Who can say?

410091006.content:
But it wasn't that loud, so I reckon it was a fireworks explosion or something like that.
Why do you ask? Surely, the police in the affluent district will take care of it.

410091008.content: Baize shrugs. She sends a small group of her team to the Panthera's turf, while she leads the rest of them to the outskirts.

410091009.content: CORG's departure restores the slum to its usual noise and chaos. Some people take the chance to flash obscene gestures at the soldiers' backs, while others stare at the weapons in their hands with envy. Most of them, however, are looking blankly at the logos on their armor...

410091010.content: Kali, Luwu. Who were those people?

410091011.content: The duo turn around to see Lila by the Meruism entrance, watching the CORG soldiers depart. They're going in the same direction Azim went.

410091012.content: Oh, them... They're policemen who are even more powerful than the chief of the Jivitabad police.

410091013.content: Wow! Then... could I ask them to look for my papa?

410091014.content: Don't worry about your papa, Lila. He'll be back as soon as he finishes his work. Then you and I will punish him then together, okay?

410091015.content: Papa... everyone's saying that a person who has been gone for a very long time will never come back...

410091016.content: ... That's absolute nonsense. Your daddy would never leave you behind, Lila. Ever.

410091017.content: The two of us went to see him yesterday. He's doing really important work right now and earning lots and lots of money.

410091018.content: He's working hard for you, Lila. So you must work hard, too, to put his mind at ease, okay? I've never lied to you before, darling, have I?

410091020.content: Luwu watches this scene silently, feeling a little low-spirited. Baize has already left with her team, and Luwu has no reason to question her or CORG's competence.

410091021.content: Besides, as Baize said, if she acts on her own again, she would be crossing the line. Even though she is a Modifier.

410091022.content: But the realization that she's now free to whatever she wants leaves Luwu feeling lost, as though she's just had a half-finished puzzle suddenly taken from her.

410091023.content: ... Kali. Do you still have the videos you showed me earlier?

410091024.content: Those clips of Zhiming? Yeah. Our surveillance videos are saved for two months.

410091025.content: May I take a look at them again? And those knick-knacks that Zhiming created—I'd like to take them, too.

410091026.content: Are you going back to Xu Heng?

410091027.content: Given what Baize said, it would be prudent of me to do so. So yes.

410091028.content: Wasn't she a little too harsh on you? I mean, it can't hurt for you to help.

410091029.content: ... There's no point dwelling on that. She has her reasons.

410091030.content: Alright. And I won't ask about what happened between the two of you...

410091031.content: You already have the key to the workroom. If you want to look at the videos, you can just pull them up in the room upstairs.

410091032.content: Do you have enough boxes, Luwu? Or would you need more?

410091033.content: ... Aren't these boxes from Tian Lu Traders? You mean you held on to them after receiving the merchandise?

410091034.content: Yeah. These boxes are light and sturdy, and they come with an anti-shock lining too. You can't find these anywhere in Shashvat, you know.

410091035.content: This smells like a business opportunity... I get it now. These should be enough for now, thanks.

410091036.content: Are these all Zhiming's? Do you need help with them?

410091037.content: No, thank you. I can take care of them myself.

410091038.content: But Luwu only says that to prevent what happened in the workroom last time from happening again. In the end, it takes Luwu about half an hour or so to sort out and pack everything in the workroom.

410091039.content: ... How in the world did she make all of these in just two weeks?

410091041.content: Luwu goes through the clips several times, trying to spot any clues she might have missed previously. But it soon becomes clear that she and Kali did not miss anything on their first pass.

410091042.content: The streets of Gharpur are narrow and winding. As such, even the camera installed on the third level of the Meruism building can't record anything past the borders of Meruism's turf.

410091043.content: There's really no way to figure out where a person's headed based on their travel over such a short distance...

410091044.content: Wait a minute—this dip over here...

410091045.content: As her gaze shifts offhandedly from the ground to the empty sky, something catches Luwu's eye, and she pauses. Then she quickly pulls up the map of Gharpur and studies it.

410091046.content: This west-facing camera... does it capture the area where the explosion was just now?

410091047.content: Luwu's eyebrow shoots up. She feels like she's just discovered an unimportant coincidence in one's life that nevertheless sends a brief tingle down one's spine when one realizes.

410091049.content: Ravana's reaction to the explosion was odd indeed. Now more alert, Luwu opens up the backup file for the current day's surveillance video.

410091050.content: Just as Baize said, the explosion happened in a spot not far from the slum. But although the boom can be heard clearly, all that can be seen on the screen is a cloud of black smoke.

410091051.content: What if we make two observation points... and extend the lines of sight... I was roughly here when I saw the black smoke...

410091052.content: Bingo. It really did happen inside Vimoksha Pharma... Does Ravana know something that we don't?

410091053.content: Having triangulated the approximate location of the explosion, Luwu looks at the black smoke and falls into deep thought.

410091054.content: The Panthera have monopolized the supply of Frenzyx, so it's highly possible that Ravana is linked to Vimoksha Pharma somehow. But what about that link would make Ravana abandon our fight?

410091055.content: ... Does he know the story behind the explosion???

410091056.content: The more Luwu looks at the black cloud of smoke, the fishier it all seems to her. So she zooms in on the cloud and makes a clip of its formation, then sends the clip back to Tian Lu Traders to see if someone can identify its cause.

410091057.content: But as she lets the video play, she spots a flash of white flame in the rolling black smoke. She freezes in shock.

410091058.content: She's spotted a symbol, albeit one that appears only fleetingly: A diamond shape with the simple character for "four" written inside. It's a symbol all Modifiers from Xu Heng recognize.

410091060.content:
"Situation critical, help needed."
This is a unique SOS summons from a Quad Modifier. Although this one disappeared rather quickly, the signal was the right color, font, and appearance.

410091062.content: ... We're still within the Jivitabad city limits. Is no one dealing with the Visbanes roaming about?

410091063.content: I need our soldiers to remain where they are. Modifiers, follow me. We're going into the Source Layer to check things out... Hmm?

410091064.content: The person who's quickly approaching Baize and her team has no intention of concealing her identity. Baize sighs and gestures for her subordinates to wait, then walks over to the interloper alone.

410091065.content: What are you doing with that bum bag, bonehead? Playing tourist?

410091066.content: That explosion from earlier happened on Vimoksha Pharma premises, and it was from a Quad Signal. Zhiming's in danger, and so are the humans inside.

410091067.content: Luwu shows Baize the clip. The latter licks her lips, then turns around to beckon an underling over.

410091068.content: I'm pausing this operation. We have an emergency. Call HQ and have them send two more squads here.

410091069.content: I'll go to Vimoksha right now.

410091071.content: Just as Luwu is starting to move, Baize grabs her wrist. Luwu turns around, shocked, and tries to pull her hand away. But Baize seems very determined to keep her there.

410091073.content: Like I said, I'm now in charge of this matter. You stay in Gharpur. I'll call for you when I need you.

410091074.content: Do you even know what the Quad Signal means? You want me to wait here when lives are at stake?!

410091075.content: If all we needed to do to stage a rescue is barge inside, I would have already left by now. Things aren't that simple.

410091076.content: Zhiming's been unreachable for days. Either she took herself off the grid, or the connection is very bad wherever she is... or worst case scenario, she is trapped or even lost to us altogether.

410091077.content: Now look at this Quad Signal. It looks so rough around the edges, and it came and went in a flash, as if its discovery would be disastrous. Why do you think that's so?

410091078.content: ... It means she was in a hurry. And worried about something.

410091079.content: I've been thinking that Zhiming is in a mystical location, like the Primordial Layer. But if she's at Vimoksha Pharma...

410091080.content: Luwu, this may sound like unfounded speculation to you, but there've been cases of Cognizant Visbanes acting in the guise of humans.

410091081.content: What if we end up alerting the enemy and fail to keep control the situation, like what happened with Turing? That would be a grave mistake.

410091082.content: Baize stares directly into Luwu's eyes and shakes her head ever so slightly. But Luwu looks as determined as ever. She takes a deep breath and grips her blade a little more tightly.

410091083.content: You look like you want to say something.

410091084.content: It would be a grave mistake to stay on the sidelines and watch while people die, too.

410091085.content: Baize. After all these years, I still think back to the last case we were on together.

410091086.content: ... You're saying that you've been doing some soul-searching?

410091087.content: Maybe you were right. If I hadn't hesitated back then, there would have been just one more casualty.

410091088.content: But I can't help but think that if I had located the perpetrator and the hostage earlier, before the Visbanes appeared, maybe no one would have died that day.

410091089.content: I don't care whether or not I'm a cop right now, Baize. I can't sit idly by and watch the same thing happen again. I just can't.

410101002.content: Yes. Given the unexpected development, CORG will be here to take over in a bit.

410101003.content: The perpetrator and the hostage are both inside, and the hostage is hurt. And you say I should wait for "a bit"???

410101004.content:
I don't have the time to explain all this to you. I still have some things to take care of.
Don't do anything stupid. That's an order.

410101005.content: Before Luwu could respond, the conversation was concluded by a busy tone on the communicator terminal. Luwu stood on the street, looking blankly at the newly set-up cordons on both ends and the old house where the perpetrators were hiding. The house was just paces away from her.

410101006.content: The muscles in her legs tensed while the debate raged on in her head. Taking a step forward would be disobeying her orders, while taking a step back meant doing nothing. No matter what she chose, she would never be fully convinced she was making the right choice. In that case...

410101007.content: I'm not gonna stand here and watch while people die inside...

410101008.content: Luwu pulled out her gun and charged through the front door into the house.

410101009.content: She doesn't really remember how the battle unfolded. All she can remember are the broken bodies on the ground, the monster rushing toward her no matter how many shots were fired at it, and the spear that magically appeared in her hand when a strange power was triggered...

410101010.content: And how, just as everything around her was making her feel utterly confounded, she discovered Baize was standing in front of her.

410101012.content: This was the first time Luwu had seen her superior so visibly agitated. Eventually Baize calmed down, but this only led to an argument between them.

410101013.content: Would you open your eyes?! If you hadn't awakened today, we would've suffered two more losses.

410101014.content: Stop being so stubborn. You're a Modifier now; you fight Visbanes. One wrong decision could lead cost us far too many lives.

410101015.content: You can only save other people if you're alive too, and you can only keep order in the lives of other people by doing so in your own life. Why can't you understand such a basic thing?

410101016.content: If I had become a Modifier earlier... would that have saved those two people?

410101017.content:
Don't keep speculating... It's a waste of time.
Do you blame me for not going in with you?

410101018.content: I'd always thought that you were a responsible officer who always does her job. But today, I've come to realize that all these cases are just games to you.

410101019.content: Modifiers are meant to use their powers to protect humans. So tell me, just what do you protect with your approach?

410101020.content: Just how much do you remember about Gaea now, you bonehead? A little knowledge truly is a dangerous thing...

410101021.content: Modifiers are meant to protect others, not become gods worshipped by humans.

410101022.content: Just because I'm a Modifier now doesn't mean I've forgotten that I'm human too...

410101023.content: Baize rolled her eyes. She suddenly fired at Luwu, who quickly summoned her Access Key in response. Her Divine Grace crushed the bullet into a thin piece of metal, while Luwu did not move an inch.

410101025.content: Our power does not decide who we are.

410101027.content: You used a power that's beyond the capability of an ordinary human, to interfere in human affairs. This kind of power can only corrupt them. In the end, when standing at the edge of a cliff, the only thing they'll be able to do is to look up and hope fervently for another "miracle" to save them.

410101028.content: But power is not what I wanted to talk to you about, Luwu. Good and evil are the two sides of human nature, and they're also the methods humans use to interact with each other.

410101029.content: If you can only train your hostility on the most vicious of criminals, and can no longer control what you do to complete strangers, you are no longer merely human.

410101030.content: ... That's absurd. I can't possibly be a police officer and stand on the sidelines while injustice is happening.

410101031.content: Delaying justice delayed means sacrifices will be made. I cannot possibly watch that happen.

410101032.content: Then you should not be a police officer.

410101034.content: I'm not joking. Why do you think CORG has put me in this role?

410101035.content: Cops are the people who're most likely to come into contact with Visbanes. They're also the people most likely to make a situation escalate, if their responses are inadequate.

410101036.content: We need professionals who know how to stick to the rules, not play cowboy or appoint themselves martyrs.

410101037.content: You can hold on to your gun as a souvenir. You can't hurt anyone with it, anyway. And take some time to see how the other Modifiers conduct themselves...

410101038.content:
What are you still standing there for? Was I not clear enough?
You're fired, Officer Luwu.

410101039.content: The sun has vanished below Jivitabad's skyline, and the slum is soon swallowed by the dark of night. By the time Luwu emerges from her memories, daylight is gone.

410101040.content: ... I've seen a lot in my job at Tian Lu Traders over the years. I've learned a little about why Modifiers shouldn't meddle in the affairs of humans.

410101041.content: But I've also learned it's possible for Modifiers' powers and the human way of life to come together and achieve great things, and how. Tian Lu Traders and the Quad, Aether Gazer over in Ain Soph, and the Astral Council in Omorfies... These are all excellent examples.

410101042.content: Power doesn't determine who anyone is, Baize. It's how you use the power, and what you use it for.

410101043.content: Some have used their power to protect society, while others have used it to help people who are suffering or to solve problems... Though I'm not that capable myself.

410101044.content: I've practiced martial arts since I was a child and grew up to become a police officer. All I want in life is to see the forging of a righteous path in this world.

410101045.content: Even if you say that I am just being foolhardy... I don't care anymore. I'll keep trying to save those who can be saved.

410101047.content: Looks like my decision not to apply to CORG back then was the right one.

410101048.content: You would've been rejected, anyway. CORG doesn't need someone as stubborn as you.

410101049.content: If you insist on going, then sign here. We'll treat it as an agreement you've become a temporary member of CORG.

410101051.content: You know what that means. But remember, there won't be any reinforcements for half an hour or so. And if something goes wrong, I will hold you fully responsible.

410101052.content: ... Remember to always have a way out in the back of your mind.

410101054.content: You don't have to thank me for that.

410101055.content: Baize lets go of Luwu's wrist, takes two steps back, and puts away her Access Key, her eyes still cold.

410101056.content: I heard that you were caught sneaking into Vimoksha Pharma last night?

410101057.content: I didn't think too much of it then. But if they can trap Zhiming in there, I suppose it's not so strange that I was spotted too.

410101058.content: So you're just gonna bash your way in today, huh? I have to remind you, we have no real evidence that Zhiming is in Vimoksha Pharma right now.

410101059.content: It's possible that Zhiming is trapped in the Source Layer. Maybe she tried to trigger a rift near Vimoksha Pharma, but only had time to release a flare before she was swallowed by it.

410101060.content: If that was the case, there would be no need for her to try and conceal the Quad Signal by triggering an explosion... But I'll concede that it's a possibility.

410101061.content: So you have to keep yourself in check, even if you're going to fight your way in. Just make scrap out of a few AGI Mechas or something. Don't you go all in unless you see a Visbane.

410101062.content: I'll lead a team to the Source Layer, and I'll contact you if I find Zhiming there. And if there's any compensation to be made after this, it's all on you.

410101063.content: I'll leave the Source Layer to you, then. Be careful.

410101064.content: As if she's just realized that her argument with Baize has taken up too much time, Luwu nods gravely at Baize and makes a beeline for Vimoksha Pharma.

410101065.content: You heard her. Hide this zone and erect a Source Layer passage, then get ready to go.

410101066.content: By the time Baize finishes giving the order, Luwu is already nowhere to be seen. She shakes her head and walks towards her subordinates, who are working busily behind her.

410102001.content: Luwu can't bring herself to kill a human, but she's going to have to find a way to incapacitate these people without doing too much damage.

410102003.content: Anyone who stands in Madam Seema's way must die!!!

410102005.content: Are you just going to stand there and watch, Seema?

410102006.content: Luwu notices a figure standing some distance away. Seema is watching all of this with great indifference.

410102007.content: ... I heard about your husband. What in the world are you trying to do?

410102008.content: Seema is standing with her back to the street lamp, and it's hard to see the expression on her face. About ten seconds later, she raises her hand.

410102010.content: Though Seema does not speak very forcefully, her thugs, who are dressed in makeshift uniforms, instantly stop and move away from Luwu, as if they're robots.

410102011.content: Luwu, who's holding her spear defensively, looks around in surprise. These humans aren't acting like humans at all. Just how did Seema manage to get this level of control over them?

410102012.content: What did you do to these people?

410102013.content: They are my employees. I just made them more obedient, that's all.

410102014.content: The first time I heard told about you, I thought that you might make a good business partner for Tian Lu Traders.

410102015.content: This is the third time we've met, and each time, things seem to get even worse.

410102016.content: This is the second time you've trespassed on my property. How do you think I should welcome you?

410102017.content: We have a saying in Xu Heng: What's done by night appears by day. You know full well why I'm here.

410102018.content: Whatever it is you're planning, selling an illegal substance is an absolutely terrible idea. You can't hide the truth about it when everyone on the streets knows of it.

410102019.content: So you're here for Frenzyx? But it's no longer being produced.

410102020.content: That doesn't matter. Those who manufactured and sold it must still be punished.

410102021.content: I'm also here for Zhiming. I have evidence that she was on your turf, so you'd better tell me where she is now. Otherwise, I'll be conducting my own search.

410102023.content: That doesn't matter, either. What's important is that I know she's in danger.

410102024.content: ... You'll have the chance to see her. Just not at this moment.

410102025.content: Are you the only one here? I've heard that CORG is investigating me. Are their Modifiers on the way here as well?

410102027.content: Luwu is sure that she sees Seema break into the smallest of smiles when she says "Modifiers." Alarms start going off in her head.

410102028.content: She turns around as quickly as she can and raises her spear to block an incoming punch. But unlike what happened during her fights in Gharpur, her Access Key bends for a moment, as though it's merely a plastic pipe, then explodes into a blooming ball of Divine Grace.

410102029.content: Hah. It can't even withstand a single blow.

410102030.content: The attacker's fist retracts. However, the scarlet-colored Bane Energy that has wrapped around it continues traveling forward, striking Luwu in the chest like a cannonball.

410102031.content: It's a terrifying power that almost causes her to pass out right there and then. She's sent flying to the side, leaving behind spots of blood that look dark and weak in the light of the street lamps.

410111001.content: ... So you are the... Cognizant Visbane?

410111002.content:
Luwu is on her knees. She wipes the blood from her mouth as she eyes the humanoid creature who's now walking towards her.
This is the first time she's facing a Cognizant Visbane.

410111003.content: While she's read about these strange and powerful creatures in combat records, she still can't help but feel afraid. Faced with an oppressive force so powerful, her Divine Grace alone may not be enough to defeat it.

410111004.content: Cognizant Visbanes are far less effective in combat when in human form. But even so, Luwu isn't sure that she can defeat Ravana.

410111005.content: It's a real pity that we couldn't finish that fight at the market.

410111006.content: But all of you Modifiers become so very, very weak without your Access Keys.

410111007.content: You're not fit to fight me without that spear.

410111008.content: I fought with you for so long and yet I didn't see you for what you truly are. That was my mistake.

410111009.content: What in the world exactly you plotting here? Are you trying to complete at Vimoksha Pharma what Novich failed to do at Spealght Industries?

410111010.content: Novich? That wimp who's always following Turing around like a puppy? He was completely useless in Xu Heng too.

410111011.content: Are you also working for Turing? Were you in Xu Heng as well?!

410111012.content: Ha! Are you mad cos we messed with your home?

410111013.content: ... All of you will pay for this.

410111014.content: Bold of you to say that when you can't even stand up right now.

410111015.content: What do you want to do with her?

410111016.content: Seema walks over slowly. She looks at Luwu as though she's a defective item that will be disposed of. There's neither hostility nor contempt, just pure indifference.

410111017.content: Do you know her? You have to tell me now if she's useful, like Zhiming.

410111018.content: She's just someone who works security at a trading company. I don't care if you finish her off or lock her up down there. The Fist of Revenge has been initiated, and Zhiming is useless now too.

410111020.content: No one here will satisfy your curiosity, Modifier. Since CORG will be here soon, we'll send you to them as a welcome present!

410111021.content: Any last words? I'll grant you time for some as a reward for our fight.

410111022.content: Luwu takes a few glances at Ravana. Eventually her eyes fall on Seema, who's turned around and is about to leave.

410111023.content: Madam Seema... Your eyes are full of so much pain.

410111024.content: ... And why do you care? You'd do better to worry about yourself.

410111025.content: Whether you wish to end things or seek revenge, it's not too late to stop whatever you're doing now...

410111026.content: Your husband was a good man. He wouldn't want you to do this.

410111027.content: He died because he was a good man.

410111028.content: You're a good person too. Clearly, you are unwilling to tolerate or surrender to injustice.

410111029.content: How arrogant of you. And stubborn... And now you, too, are going to die because you've bitten off more than you can chew.

410111030.content: Is that what you really think? That your husband was unwilling to sacrifice himself to help folks in Gharpur... If you think he's to blame for his own death, then he did all of those things in vain.

410111031.content: No... That's not what I think of him. That is the judgment placed on him by Shashvat.

410111032.content: Seema looks back at Luwu. She must see the look of determination on Luwu's face, for she starts laughing mockingly.

410111033.content:
There was no room within the "rules" of Shashvat for him.
Do you want me to convince myself to betray his beliefs and accept those ugly ways of life?

410111034.content: But surely you can try to change the things you can't accept.

410111035.content: I can't even change the slum, let alone the whole of Shashvat.

410111037.content: ... Are you trying to delay the inevitable with your prattle?

410111038.content: The one thing I've heard mentioned the most since my arrival here is the rules. There may be a specific set of rules in Gharpur, but we Mods have our own rules.

410111039.content: The people here have enough to feed and clothe themselves, but they still have no freedom and live like prisoners. I've seen and heard of so many incredible things over the last few days...

410111040.content: Gangs fighting on the streets in broad daylight, the police throwing people into jail and then just letting them go without questioning... A boxing champion beaten to death because he didn't want to put on a show... A child who's seriously ill but can't go to the hospital in New Town for treatment...

410111041.content: I want to do something about all of these unfair things. But there's someone always telling me that I'm just a human being, just a visitor from Xu Heng. I can't fight the rules that people here are accustomed to, and in the end, nothing changes...

410111042.content:
I think... they are mistaken.
I've never thought that I could change the status quo with my power alone. That's not within my capabilities.

410111043.content: I just don't think those things are right. Why do bad things happen to people who've done no wrong? Why must their lives be disrupted by injustice?

410111044.content: I just want to do my best to find some justice in a world with so much inequality.

410111045.content: I just want to find something... worth believing in.

410111047.content: You've had enough last words, Xu Heng lady.

410111048.content: Luwu sees Ravana approaching her with both fists clenched. But she continues looking at Seema.

410111049.content: I asked two other people the same question recently, and like you, they hesitated. But it was just hesitation, not disagreement.

410111050.content: Even if your "rules" are deeply rooted and utterly corrupt, there are still people who believe that they can be changed.

410111051.content: The fight isn't over yet. You still have a chance to choose...

410111052.content: Ravana has started gathering Bane Energy in his right fist, which could strike Luwu any moment. But she doesn't try to duck. Instead, she calmly pulls out her gun and points it at Ravana's temple.

410111054.content: The bullet that comes out of this ordinary weapon shines with the light of Divine Grace, and the impact of this close-range shot forces Ravana, who wasn't at all prepared for this, a step back.

410111056.content: But before Ravana can collect himself, his sight goes black, as though his eyes were suddenly covered by thick cloth. He hears the sound of robes flapping and tries to punch in its direction, but hears only the response of a metallic hum.

410111057.content: The wide-area Blinder effect vanishes as quickly as it appeared. Ravana gradually recovers his vision, but when he does, he discovers there's a small box lying on its side in the spot Luwu was in moments ago.

410111058.content: Did you really think that I'd come alone and unprepared? My gun isn't the only thing I have.

410111059.content: Luwu reappears some 50 meters behind Ravana, surrounded by nine light guns. With her Access Key now in her right hand and her gun in her left, she's completely shrugged off her weakened position from before.
