410111060.content: Is this gun also your Access Key?

410111061.content: No, it's only a firearm from my cop days. But I like using it, so I know how I can use it with Divine Power on Visbanes.

410111062.content: You think you've won because you played a little trick on me? You have no way to get out of here, not on your own.

410111063.content: I have no plan to leave by myself.

410111064.content: And the two of you have been truly helpful. Now I know Zhiming's somewhere underground, and there's also something called the "Fist of Revenge."

410111065.content: We can't let her live. She knows too much.

410111066.content: Is that so?... I hope punishment by the law will make you reflect on your actions—for the sake of those you've hurt and those you were going to hurt.

410111067.content: As she speaks, Luwu notices that Ravana has become somewhat distracted. She does not dwell on it, however, and takes out the last two items from her pocket.

410111068.content: The light from a flare rises high enough to be seen by everyone in Gharpur, and in the same instant, Luwu disappears from both Ravana's and Seema's sight.

410111069.content: Ravana! What do you think you're doing?!

410111070.content: Don't you dare take that tone with me, human!

410111071.content: My things have been filched, and someone has sneaked underground. I'm going to get my stuff back. Your puppets and machines can take care of everything else.

410111073.content: Ignoring Seema completely, Ravana walks away with a deep frown on his face.

410111074.content: Having suddenly lost her greatest support, Seema clenches her fists several times, refusing to believe it. A cold, cruel look appears in her eyes.

410111075.content: I don't need you either, you freak.

410111076.content: The defense measures increase exponentially as Luwu gets closer to the building in the center of the park. There are security mechas on high alert and those dazed humans everywhere.

410111077.content: As I expected. It won't be easy to get inside...

410111078.content: Luwu lets her right arm, which has been raised high above her head, fall to her side again. A person looking at her from the right would have seen a magic trick of sorts, as though she'd just lowered an invisible curtain and revealed herself behind it.

410111079.content: Looks like they haven't caught up yet. This camouflage coating's real useful. But it's a pity that I can't hold on to it while I'm fighting.

410111080.content: I wonder how is Zhiming doing... I have to locate her as quickly as possible.

410111082.content: Luwu's eyes naturally fall on the most heavily defended building in the park.

410111083.content: There's no time to put the fabric covered in the camouflage coating back into her pocket. Luwu reluctantly throws it away, picks a route that's away from the street lights, and rushes towards the building, gun raised.

410121001.content: ... I should've thought of that earlier.

410121002.content: The AGI Mechas and instrumentalized humans pose little threat to Luwu since she has zero reservations about using her gun array. She quickly clears a path for herself with her long spear, waving it through the crowd.

410121003.content: She finally manages to break through and rushes into the lobby of the building. But then she comes to a sudden stop, unable to stop herself from taking a step back.

410121006.content: Luwu tries to use her spear to drive away approaching Visbanes. The sound of hurried footsteps and machine parts moving behind her causes her to quickly turn her head and yell.

410121007.content: But the security mechas and humans pursuing her don't appear to have seen the Visbanes at all. They continue to charge at Luwu.

410121008.content: Hey, open your eyes! Look at these things—

410121009.content: Luwu pushes away an approaching human with her spear. She's about to explain things, when she sees the human being knocked into the swarm of Visbanes by the people behind him.

410121010.content: His body is pierced by several sharp blades all at once. The Bane Energy corruption and the cuts causes him to instantly melt into a puddle, which then quickly vanishes.

410121011.content: Luwu watches this happen, dumbfounded, then looks at the people who are still rushing her, despite the scene in front of them. Finally, she understands that these "people" have lost their most fundamental survival instincts. There's no hope for them.

410121013.content: The joints in her right hand, the one holding her spear, crack a little. For the first time since she arrived in Gharpur, Luwu feels a deadly rage.

410121014.content: If a Modifier may only train their hostility on the most vicious of criminals, then Seema's frittering away of human lives is reason enough for Luwu to aim at her.

410122001.content: Visbanes, AGI Mechas, Modifiers, bounty hunters, opponents who have no mind... Despite how spacious Vimoksha Pharma is, the place feels crowded.

410122002.content: Luwu needs to get to the elevator at the end of the hallway and see if it can bring her underground. Even though she isn't familiar with the building, given how many Visbanes are there, that more than likely is her destination...

410122003.content: Is there nothing in this blasted building except Visbanes and mechas?!

410122004.content: It's a good thing there aren't any human civilians here.

410122005.content: If this Boss Seema really is as ruthless as you say, no human could survive this, anyway.

410122006.content: One more thing. It's rather narrow in here and there's nowhere for us to go. If the Cognizant Visbane was watching us right now, this would be the best place for it to attack us.

410122007.content: It is strange that Ravana hasn't appeared yet. He looked quite anxious when I saw him earlier, so perhaps he's dealing with something else right now.

410122008.content: Well, whatever's keeping him busy, it's also keeping my team safe for now.

410122009.content: Don't say that, boss. You know we'd follow you to the ends of the earth.

410122010.content: Save that hot air for the tavern. Stay safe and don't gamble with your lives out here.

410122011.content: A single Cognizant Visbane wiped out CORG's entire presence in Rostach. Don't tell me you want to go up against something like that?

410122013.content: Your orders are to get straight out of dodge once we get out of this building... Hold on, the elevator's coming.

410122014.content: Marduk points his weapon at the elevator. Everyone else, when they are not fighting, looks at him in confusion.

410122015.content: Marduk squeezes the trigger just a tad as he watches the doors open. Once he gets a clear view of what's inside, he spits out a curse that Luwu has to pretend to not hear...

410122016.content: Inside the elevator are several human civilians, carrying makeshift weapons and wearing the same clothes as the zombified thugs. However, their expressions and movements indicate that they're still in control of their faculties.

410122017.content: These people clearly didn't expect to run into this situation. The sounds of gunshots and the howling of the Visbanes echoing through the hallway leave them all stunned for a moment.

410122018.content: What are you all waiting for?! That's the person Miss Zhiming said would come help us!!!

410122019.content: The stunned silence is finally broken by the yelling of a powerful-looking man. He's the first to jump out of the elevator, his riot baton held up high and at the ready. He waves excitedly to Luwu through the swarm of Visbanes.

410122021.content: Luwu isn't sure what draws her attention first, the yelling or the name "Zhiming." Azim's surprise appearance makes her feel both ecstatic and anxious.

410122022.content: Step back, all of you! These monsters are really dangerous. Don't let them touch you!!!

410122023.content: But this piece of advice has come too little too late for some. A number of people have followed Azim out of the elevator in nervous excitement, and they draw the attention of several Visbanes who are some distance away from Luwu and Marduk.

410122024.content: Luwu swiftly deploys her light guns while Marduk rushes to intervene with his drone. However, the duo fail to wipe out the surge of Visbanes moving towards the elevator.

410122025.content: Luwu can feel her heart in her throat when she sees the Visbanes' blades pointed at Azim. Then, all of a sudden, she sees Marduk's drone fire an armor-piercing bomb at the wall.

410122027.content: The bomb explodes, sending shrapnel flying through the hallway. One after another, a dozen figures rush in from the gap that has been created, blocking the Visbanes from the elevator.

410122028.content: Whoa! What a tough wall that was!

410122029.content: Kali? And everyone else from Meruism...?

410122030.content: Luwu is no stranger to this group of much needed saviors, who've come in the nick of time—after all, she met a number of the Modifiers during her time at Meruism HQ.

410122031.content: Kali is the first through the breach. Apart from her, this is the first time Luwu is seeing the others from Meruism in battle.

410122032.content: Although the Meruism Modifiers usually keep a low profile in Gharpur, they are still led by a Prime Modifier, so combined, their strength is just about on par with that of Tian Lu Traders.

410122034.content: It's okay! Let's talk about it after we leave this place.

410122035.content: I hope we aren't too late, Pops?

410122036.content: You were supposed to be here five minutes ago.

410122037.content: It's not our fault. We ran into CORG along the way and they insisted on having this stupid inspection, even though the Bane Energy alarms were blaring.

410122039.content: They're lucky Boss Brahmā wasn't there. She would have totally blown her top.

410122040.content: Alright. Now, like we agreed: Since CORG is here, it's time for us to leave.

410122042.content: Come on, everyone! Let's get them all!

410122043.content: With the breach, some of the Visbanes have been surrounded, and they're soon eliminated. The two groups converge and surround the human civilians.

410122044.content: Even without Marduk and his bounty hunters, the Modifiers present are more than capable of handling the situation at hand.

410122045.content: Word on the street is that you went to Vimoksha Pharma by yourself again. I knew that nothing good could come of it.

410122046.content: It's been four days, Luwu. That makes four nights in a row I haven't been able to sleep properly.

410122048.content: Oh, no, don't be. I was just joking.

410122050.content: Not yet, but she might be underground. Oh, Azim?

410122052.content: Why are you in such a daze? What's on your mind?

410122053.content: N-nothing. It's just that when I saw you fighting those monsters, it felt like I was watching a movie.

410122054.content: The Modifiers look at each other wryly and don't try to explain themselves. After all, once CORG has dealt with the humans' memories, it will be like none of this ever happened to them.

410122055.content: Oh, you were looking for Miss Zhiming, weren't you? I think they took her underground.

410122056.content: To the basement of this building?

410122057.content: Yeah. I think Seema lent that space to Ravana, but no one knows what's inside. Nobody who's been brought inside has ever been seen again.

410122058.content: You mean people have been brought inside there? So you're saying that there are humans besides the folks we see here in this place?

410122059.content: There are a few drug testers upstairs who didn't want to come with us, maybe a dozen or so. I can go and get them now.

410122060.content: They didn't trust Miss Zhiming's plan and thought it'd be better to wait for the end up there. I told them that Seema wouldn't let us go, but they just wouldn't believe me...

410122061.content: Oh, there are also some plant workers here, though I have no idea how many. Seema told them they had to sleep here tonight, and she disconnected their network access.

410122062.content: Testers? For what kind of drug? Frenzyx?

410122063.content: No. Miss Zhiming said it's some kind of drug that controls the nervous system.

410122064.content: You must've seen those crazy people who'd only carry out Seema's orders. They took too much of this drug. The ones who could withstand its effects became her thugs, and those who couldn't became stupefied and were thrown down below.

410122065.content: Frenzyx is just the byproduct of this substance, and it's sold to people like me, who are in good physical shape and fight often. Then, during these deals, Ravana and his thugs would pull tricks, abduct the buyers, and bring them here.

410122066.content: Damn. I shouldn't have believed in Seema...

410122067.content: Did Zhiming take this drug as well?

410122068.content: No. She made it, but she didn't take any. But she was forced to make it. Seema threatened to kill her.

410122069.content: If Zhiming hadn't convinced Mr. Kumar to let us go, and made these weapons for us too, we'd still be sitting ducks up there.

410122070.content:
... I have so many questions. I'll have to talk to her myself.
One last thing: Do you know what the "Fist of Revenge" is?

410122071.content: Azim, who's been gradually calming down during the conversation, suddenly turns pale when he hears that name. He starts shaking all over.

410122072.content: T-that... That's a monster. A true monster.

410122073.content: You people may be able to deal with it. Maybe... I don't know.

410122074.content: Seema conducted all of those experiments to create those monsters... They're going to destroy all of Gharpur—no, all of Jivitabad...

410122075.content: Azim falls silent and stares blankly out of the window. With some difficulty, he raises his hand and points in a direction.

410122076.content: Two giant, dark figures that look like humans, but clearly are not, are following Seema as she walks casually towards the shadows outside the park. She turns around, as if she's aware of someone watching, and looks at the people in the building.

410122077.content: ... Whatever. You lot can play with the remaining consumables.

410122078.content: Naturally, the people inside the building can't hear what Seema is saying. All they see is her walking away as if nothing has happened. But from the darkness that lays in front of her, Visbanes and AGI Mechas are rushing toward the building from all directions.

410122080.content: The "Fist of Revenge"... What a literal name. She's going to bring that thing to the affluent district and kill the people who murdered her husband.

410122081.content: Could we possibly ask you to arrest her, Officer Luwu?

410122082.content: Luwu is taken aback for a moment. Then she nods solemnly at Kali, who's giving her a thumbs up.

410122083.content: Yes, I'll capture her as soon as I can. I'll leave this building to you guys, then. Please keep an eye out for Zhiming, and watch out for Ravana.

410131001.content: The weapons are cocked, and the bullets are loaded. Against the background noise of distant fighting, the sounds of a gun's bolt action can be heard more clearly than ever.

410131002.content: Seema stops walking, as do the two dark figures who are behind her. She sees Luwu emerging from the shadows in front of them and shakes her head in disinterest.

410131003.content: That was fast. If you're blocking my way, then you must know where I'm headed.

410131004.content: So you still refuse to give the world a chance to punish the people you hold responsible or the unjust system that supports them.

410131005.content: Not everybody is as idealistic as you are. And not everyone has a mission like you do.

410131006.content: You won't be able to kill me, Modifier. I know what you are. You're not allowed to use your power to hurt humans.

410131007.content: You've already caused so much harm. I don't have to punish you in my capacity as a Modifier.

410131008.content: Luwu points the muzzle of her gun down at Seema's leg and pulls the trigger. The muzzles flashes, and then... there's the sound of metal against metal.

410131010.content: It's fast enough to stop a bullet...?

410131011.content: Luwu aims her gun at the exposed skin of the biological weapon in front of Seema and empties her clip.

410131012.content: But the Fist of Revenge does not move a millimeter. Instead, its squirming flesh squeezes the rounds out of its body, knocking the bullets to the ground one after another. In two seconds, its body has returned to normal.

410131013.content: Luwu's muscle memory, honed from days long past, activates. She removes the empty clip with one hand and reaches to her waist with the other. It's only when she touches her belt that she realizes there's no clip there.

410131014.content: This is a gang leader Ravana killed. He was once an ordinary person, and I have turned him into this. I could produce dozens or even hundreds like him if I wanted to.

410131015.content: But I haven't done that—because I don't need to. I need him for a select few people only.

410131016.content: And how many lives have you taken in this vendetta you hold against "a select few people"?

410131017.content: You don't remember, and you don't care—because you've gone mad. You no longer respect the sanctity of life.

410131018.content:
You don't have the right to judge me.
You could always call the police and the army, and tell them to drag me away to face my punishment.

410131019.content: But you, Madam Luwu, merely work security at a trading company.

410131020.content: Or are you telling me you're going to use your Modifier powers to deal with a human being here...?

410131021.content: I must say, this is the first time I've seen someone use their humanity as a shield.

410131023.content: A blade tears its way through the darkness. Luwu can hear the sound of swift, approaching footsteps. Baize casts one glance at Seema and the Fist of Revenge before dismissing them, then stops beside Luwu.

410131025.content: It's already quite the circus inside. If I kept dragging my feet, you can bet I'd get chewed out by that Meruism brat.

410131027.content: She hasn't been found yet, but she's probably in a basement under the central building. We've got to deal with this first...

410131028.content: This? This is a piece of cake.

410131029.content: Baize takes two steps forward, takes out her CORG ID, and looks squarely at Seema.

410131030.content:
I'm from CORG's Egregious Crimes Department.
Seema, you are being charged with the following.

410131031.content: The suspect, Seema, is accused of having voluntarily assisted in Visbane activity and violating CORG's Basic Security Regulations. In addition, she is suspected of assault and battery, homicide, illegal detention, illegal human experimentation, the production and sale of drugs that do not meet standards set forth by the law...

410131032.content: These alone could put you in the clink for a really long time... Is there anything you wish to say?

410131035.content: Looks like we'll have to add one more charge. Resisting arrest?

410131037.content: Ah... Yes, that's right. It's been a while since I last encountered that one.

410131038.content: I'll leave this creature to you—I have to get the situation in the park under control. By the time I get back, I want to see her in handcuffs.

410132001.content: Seema can hear the sound of a heavy object crashing to the ground in the distance, but she doesn't look back. She just continues entering the passcode for the garage door instead.

410132002.content: Another Fist of Revenge is standing behind her like a sculpture. As Seema pushes open the door, it turns around and raises its arm, which has been transformed into a sharp blade, at Luwu.

410132003.content: You really aren't that good, you know? You just keep using the same couple of moves over and over again.

410132005.content: Luwu swings her spear, and a malformed head rolls over to Seema. She puts her foot on it to make it stop, as though it were a soccer ball.

410132006.content: Look at this. The thing you call "justice" is simply using power to erase the things you do not like.

410132007.content: There's no difference between you and me. Everyone wants to be on the side of the most basic rules of this world. And what differentiates us is power.

410132008.content: If that were true, then Modifiers should be in charge of this world.

410132009.content: Wouldn't that be amazing? If a "good person" like you were put in charge of determining what is right and wrong in this world, justice as you envision it would be upheld.

410132010.content: In a social order determined solely by power, the people will have to live in fear and confusion.

410132011.content: The best rule I know, and also the worst rule, is that people can always adapt to endless change.

410132012.content: Justice is not about domination or judgment. It's just about what people expect this change will be.

410132013.content:
I still have to find Zhiming.
Seema, there isn't much time left for you now. Just surrender and confess to your crimes.

410132015.content: Luwu's eyes are sharp like those of a falcon, and she assumes a fighting stance. Her body and her spear both suddenly vibrate in the very instant the Fist of Revenge's blade draws close to her.

410132016.content: Like I said—you really aren't as great as you were made out to be.

410132017.content: Luwu's spear becomes like a meteor lighting up the night sky. Its silver light penetrates the creature's head before it can block the attack with its claws or its massive blade made of bone. Luwu twists her spear-wielding hand forcefully, and the Divine Grace that explodes forth from the tip of her weapon obliterates her opponent's ability to move.

410132018.content: Seema is sitting in the driver's seat of a vehicle when she witnesses Luwu destroying the Fist. Expressionless, she presses a few buttons. An opening appears in the garage roof, and the car starts to slowly rise into the air.

410132020.content: Luwu pulls out her gun and trains it on Seema. Seema has a mildly sardonic smile on her face.

410132021.content: You can't shoot me. I just saw you empty your clip.

410132022.content: You have a good memory. But as a friend has told me many times, I always need to have a strategy in the back of my mind.

410132023.content: I have one bullet left. From here, I can hit you anywhere.

410132024.content: As she holds her gun in one hand, Luwu retrieves a pendant from her pocket with the other. She removes a bullet—the bullet that she's been carrying with her for years—from the pendant and, before Seema can react, loads it into the gun.

410132025.content: ... Do you really believe that those leeches from the affluent district will pay a price one day?

410132026.content: Yes. I believe that all wrongs will be righted.

410132027.content: Then... when it finally happens, please witness it on my behalf.

410132028.content: Seema pulls on the lever, and the small aircraft suddenly gains altitude.

410132029.content: The raised front of the vehicle blocks the line of sight between Luwu and Seema. Luwu ends up not firing a single shot. At the end, she doesn't even look at Seema, but nods at something behind her instead.

410132031.content: A minute later, the aircraft slowly returns to the ground, and Seema quietly slumps in the pilot's seat. A back door on one side is pushed open, and a despondent figure emerges.

410132033.content: You don't have to thank me... I would have done it even if no one came.

410132034.content: I've already told her before that she's wrong, so wrong...

410132035.content: There is an uncontrollable tremor in Kumar's voice. The stun gun in his hand falls to the ground. His eyes, tinged red, are fixed on the non-lethal weapon, and he finally crushes it to pieces with a single stomp of his foot.

410132036.content: When people choose the path they think is right and pay the price for it, their pursuit of "rightness" still can't make up for the pain of loss.

410132037.content: ... What's going to happen to her?

410132038.content: She's killed too many people, and working with Visbanes is a crime that CORG will never forgive. The best way forward for her is to have her memories wiped and then work at CORG afterwards. She'll never be free again.

410132040.content: I just received news that the entrance to the building's basement is locked. Is Zhiming down there?

410132041.content: Yes... and only Seema, Ravana, and I are authorized to access it. But I can grant access remotely from here.

410132042.content: Zhiming is being held in the deepest level underground, in... an altar-like room there.

410132043.content: But it's really dangerous down there. It's full of... monsters. What if going in releases them into the world...?

410132044.content: None of them will be going anywhere.

410132045.content: Luwu gives Kumar a smile of encouragement and pats him on the shoulder.

410132046.content: I still remember you told me that day at the arena that you wanted to be like your brother.

410132049.content: You can leave the rest to us.

410132050.content: Luwu takes one last look at Seema as she hands the handcuffs from Baize to Kumar, then rushes off to the central building.

410132051.content: Ravana wouldn't have disappeared without a reason. He wouldn't be working with Vimoksha Pharma just for Frenzyx, either.

410132052.content: It's clear to Luwu that the most difficult battle is still yet to come.

910837001.speaker: 孟章
910837001.content: Hahaha. That's a good question. What exactly should I say to fool this lie detector?

910837002.speaker: 我
910837002.content: Well, since you've said that, I'll curb my expectations. Anyway, it was just a random question.

910837003.speaker: 孟章
910837003.content: In fact, I'm working on a huge project in secret—a massive machine the size of several floating islands combined...

910837004.speaker: 孟章
910837004.content: When I'm finished, I'll take you with me to the outer reaches of the sky—all the way up to the stars.

910837007.speaker: 孟章
910837007.content: I'm joking—I just said that off the top of my head. I'm actually assembling a giant wooden block.

910837010.speaker: 孟章
910837010.content: Wait, no, that's not right—I don't even have wooden blocks. I made all of that up.

910837013.speaker: 孟章
910837013.content: It's in good working condition, I guarantee it. It's terribly easy to fool something like this. Now it's my turn to ask you a question!

910838001.content: After hearing my question, a pained expression seems to appear on Mengzhang's face.

910838002.speaker: 孟章
910838002.content: Admin! And here I thought you were an upstanding, law-abiding citizen. What prompted you to ask such a pernicious question?

910838003.speaker: 我
910838003.content: Well, perhaps what's worth celebrating is that this is only a hypothetical—I haven't actually done it.

910838004.speaker: 孟章
910838004.content: Fine. Soup dumplings are a delicacy, naturally. Cilantro, on the other hand—putting aside its flavor for the moment—is a common herb.

910838006.speaker: 孟章
910838006.content: But if you were to sprinkle soup dumplings with cilantro—

910838008.speaker: 孟章
910838008.content: Ah, yes. If you were to cover soup dumplings in cilantro, the result—in theory—would be... edible.

910838011.speaker: 我
910838011.content: Would you eat those theoretically edible soup dumplings? Also, I'm adding another condition—I brought them for you from Yuyi Isle, and by this point, you haven't eaten soup dumpling in three years. At least.

910838012.speaker: 孟章
910838012.content: You're a good, law-abiding citizen, Admin. But "upstanding"...

910838014.speaker: 孟章
910838014.content: ...You meet that criterion as well, naturally. So my answer is, of course... I would eat the soup dumplings.

910838016.speaker: 我
910838016.content: That's true? Really? This bracelet isn't broken, is it?

910838017.content: After giving his answer, Mengzhang's bracelet opens automatically. However, he reaches out and closes it once more.

910838018.speaker: 孟章
910838018.content: Even if a little cilantro is left over after tipping them out, the soup dumplings would be none the worse for it. If I didn't eat them, it would be an affront to your goodwill. I couldn't do that.

910838020.speaker: 我
910838020.content: I see... That's very kind, thank you. However, I forgot to mention one thing—the soup dumplings are filled with cilantro.

910838023.content: I take his bracelet from him.

910838024.speaker: 我
910838024.content: Alright, alright. Let's move on. It's your turn to ask me a question.

910839003.content: The bracelet's indicator light flashes a few times, and then the bracelet opens.

910839004.speaker: 我
910839004.content: But I've heard that you often help children and sometimes get into trouble as a result, like getting chased by a vicious dog, falling into a river... stuff like that.

910839005.speaker: 孟章
910839005.content: Ahem... Perhaps there's no need to bring up specific examples.

910839006.speaker: 孟章
910839006.content: The truth of the matter is that I simply won't refuse their requests, that's all. After all, there's a limit to what children can do. As an adult, it's only right to help them.

910839007.speaker: 我
910839007.content: Oh, so you just like helping others. On that note, how long has it been since you awakened? A few decades?

910839008.speaker: 孟章
910839008.content: Yes, it has been a few decades.

910839009.speaker: 我
910839009.content: Then as far as you're concerned, am I basically a child?

910839010.speaker: 孟章
910839010.content: Um... If you must know, then yes.

910839011.speaker: 我
910839011.content: Then if I were to make a request...?

910839012.speaker: 孟章
910839012.content: No, no, Admin. You're not the same as those children.

910839013.content: His tone wavers at the end of his sentence, as if to warn that the next thing he will say will grow increasingly jarring.

910839014.speaker: 孟章
910839014.content: Who are you? You're an important member of Aether Gazer, one who's resolved every incident you've been faced with. How could an ordinary child be compared to you?

910839016.speaker: 孟章
910839016.content: I've never found it easy to seek your advice to begin with, so I never expected you would have a request to make of me. Make sense?

910839017.speaker: 我
910839017.content: You sure have a knack for dealing with people.

910839018.speaker: 孟章
910839018.content: The only people I don't deal well with are children. However... my curiosity has genuinely been piqued. Since you've asked, you don't really have some matter that you need my help with, do you?

910839019.speaker: 我
910839019.content: Nope. I did, but I've just decided not to tell you.

910839021.speaker: 我
910839021.content: Huh? Isn't your bracelet already off? How is it still making noise?

910839022.content: I look down and realize that my bracelet has opened.

910839023.speaker: 我
910839023.content: I guess that counts as an answer. Works for me—

910839024.content: Just as I'm turning to leave, Mengzhang suddenly comes forward and secures the clasp again.

910839026.speaker: 孟章
910839026.content: That was a question off the top of my head—it shouldn't count. Let's call it a mechanical error. Moreover, I have a question I'd very much like to ask you...

910839027.content: He is still smiling, but now there's slightly more sincerity in it.

910840003.speaker: 我
910840003.content: I'm surprised you would think that others keeping their guard up around you is a good thing.

910840004.speaker: 孟章
910840004.content: Haha. Well, I've made a habit of embellishing the things I say. If I were to make a sweeping, improper remark and you happened to believe me, we'd have a problem.

910840005.speaker: 我
910840005.content: I don't think that's what I'm keeping my guard up against.

910840006.speaker: 孟章
910840006.content: Do you mean to say there are other reasons you're keeping your guard up around me?

910840007.speaker: 我
910840007.content: Correct... But now it's looking like there's even more.

910840008.speaker: 孟章
910840008.content: Hahaha. Still, as friends, I do hope that we can be honest with each other.

910840009.speaker: 我
910840009.content: Are you telling tall tales now that the lie-detecting bracelet is off?

910840011.content: His gaze lowers slightly, but then his eyes quickly narrow again and go back to their usual look.

910840012.speaker: 我
910840012.content: Fine. Although I can't verify what you've said... I believe you anyway.

910841002.speaker: 我
910841002.content: Fine. The truth is, maintaining a basic level of caution around others is an essential quality for an Administrator...

910841003.speaker: 孟章
910841003.content: Oh? I was just thinking how wonderful it would be if that were true.

910841004.speaker: 我
910841004.content: I was also thinking about whether that was just the answer you wanted to hear. Too bad there's actually something to be said for this thing's lie-detecting capabilities.

910841005.speaker: 孟章
910841005.content: You mean, you intend to guess my thoughts and preferences?

910841006.speaker: 我
910841006.content: I was just hoping to make one good guess. Looks like I succeeded.

910841007.speaker: 孟章
910841007.content: Are my thoughts really so hard to guess?

910841008.speaker: 我
910841008.content: When you said that, did you see a little being with wings and a club appear in front of you and bop you on the head?

910841009.speaker: 孟章
910841009.content: Goodness gracious, Administrator. Where did you learn to talk in circles like that?

910841010.speaker: 我
910841010.content: There's no talking in circles around you when you understand everything I say. Meanwhile, your words, no matter how simple and straightforward they are, always contain some unfathomable deeper meaning.

910841011.speaker: 孟章
910841011.content: It sounds too cryptic when you put it like that. I simply say whatever comes to mind... I just think a little too much sometimes, that's all.

910841012.speaker: 我
910841012.content: In that case, why don't we try speaking a little more plainly? Are you free later?

910841013.speaker: 孟章
910841013.content: I could travel the long road to Ain Soph—provided there's enough time, of course.

910841015.speaker: 孟章
910841015.content: I'm free. Where are we going?

910842002.speaker: 孟章
910842002.content: I didn't realize you saw me that way, Admin. I'm hurt...

910842003.speaker: 我
910842003.content: "Fine" means "neither good nor bad." It doesn't mean "bad..." Surely, that's something you can understand.

910842004.speaker: 我
910842004.content: You mean, the answer you were actually expecting is...

910842005.speaker: 孟章
910842005.content: (Cough) Of course. Don't people usually hope that others will judge them positively?

910842006.speaker: 我
910842006.content: I'd say your conduct is top notch.

910842008.speaker: 我
910842008.content: It just seems to me like you always have your gaze focused elsewhere—like on the distant clouds—rather than on any one individual.

910842009.speaker: 孟章
910842009.content: I thought you'd lowered your estimation of me because you believed me too unfettered. I didn't realize it was just the opposite.

910842010.speaker: 我
910842010.content: From the average person's perspective, you're clearly a competent guide. But as a friend, it's hard to ignore the sense of aloofness.

910842011.speaker: 孟章
910842011.content: Even having the smallest attachment would be an indulgence, given the responsibility on my shoulders... There's always a trade-off.

910842012.speaker: 我
910842012.content: A small attachment... Surely you've had half a true friend before?

910842015.speaker: 孟章
910842015.content: Hahaha... You count as one, not half of one.

910843002.speaker: 孟章
910843002.content: That's an embellishment if I've ever heard one. Anyone would be able to tell that's false.

910843003.speaker: 我
910843003.content: (Cough) Then... you, sir, are a gentleman and a scholar! A paragon of virtue and a role model for my generation!

910843004.speaker: 孟章
910843004.content: We don't have a leak in here, do we? Why does it feel like there are stars falling on my head?

910843005.speaker: 我
910843005.content: I may have exaggerated a bit. But the way I see it, you really are a nearly perfect person... uh, I mean Modifier.

910843007.content: Mengzhang strokes his chin as he looks at me with interest.

910843008.speaker: 我
910843008.content: Do you really want to know?

910843010.speaker: 我
910843010.content: (Cough) Then... you, sir, are a gentleman and a scholar—

910843011.speaker: 孟章
910843011.content: Stop, stop. I've heard this before.

910843012.speaker: 我
910843012.content: There are only so many compliments that can be given. Unless you can think of some others?

910843013.speaker: 孟章
910843013.content: How about... "Your countenance reminds me of stars falling over the wilderness, of the rising sun. You hang poignantly like a bright moon in an empty sky, waiting placidly like the first ice to melt in spring—" Mmmph...

910843014.content: Forgetting decorum as goosebumps rise all over my body, I quickly cover his mouth.

910843015.content: The air around us settles into silence. But it's not long before an electronic voice breaks it.

910843020.speaker: 孟章
910843020.content: ...Is this thing broken? I'd better take it back and examine it. Perhaps I can improve it and hang it over the Quad entrance...!

910843021.content: Mumbling unintelligibly and rapidly, Mengzhang shuffles off into the distance before flying completely out of sight.

910843022.speaker: 我
910843022.content: H-Hey! Tell me what you meant first!!

910844002.speaker: 孟章
910844002.content: Now that's a surprise... Are you curious about the Old Town, or about my past?

910844003.speaker: 我
910844003.content: Both. When it comes down to it, the Old Town and your past are one and the same.

910844004.speaker: 孟章
910844004.content: Hahaha... Aether Gazer sure is well-informed. You mean to say that you've been digging around in my personal life?

910844006.speaker: 孟章
910844006.content: I see. Then what about my past is there to wonder about?

910844007.speaker: 我
910844007.content: All we could find were some written documents. They don't compare to personal history by a long shot.

910844008.speaker: 孟章
910844008.content: My personal history... That's nothing but a pile of rubble now. Time keeps marching on—there's nothing worth discussing at this point.

910844009.speaker: 孟章
910844009.content: Those reasons don't really hold water. I'd rather hear a purer reason.

910844010.speaker: 我
910844010.content: A "purer" reason? You sure know how to beat around the bush. It's hard to avoid speculating... about your intentions in asking me that.

910844011.speaker: 孟章
910844011.content: To find an answer, naturally. If you were to ask me why I wish to find this answer... I do indeed want to go back for a visit. Should I find a companion to come along with me, then all the better.

910844012.speaker: 我
910844012.content: Based on your approach up 'til now, I'm sure you've gotten used to doing things on your own. Why seek a companion? You know that just doesn't hold water. I'd like to hear a "purer" reason.

910844013.speaker: 孟章
910844013.content: Alright. I was just thinking of finding an opportunity to spend some time alone with you.

910844014.speaker: 我
910844014.content: ...I had no idea you were capable of speaking your intentions so plainly.

910844015.speaker: 孟章
910844015.content: The Quad, Aether Gazer... Our dealings always depend upon a great crown.

910844016.speaker: 孟章
910844016.content: However, I've always wanted to know you in your entirety—the person beneath the crown.

910844018.speaker: 孟章
910844018.content: Perhaps we could become good friends? Haha. But that's just a thought, nothing more.

910844019.speaker: 我
910844019.content: Why do you want to go back there all of a sudden, though?

910844020.speaker: 孟章
910844020.content: The truth is, I left some things there... in that old house. I remembered them all of a sudden and wondered if I could get them back.

910844021.speaker: 我
910844021.content: I see—so you wanted someone to help you get your stuff.

910844022.speaker: 孟章
910844022.content: ...Not exactly. I was hoping you could come and see my old home.

910844023.speaker: 我
910844023.content: In that case, I'll take a good look around your old place to see what you're all about—then I'll decide if I want to become your friend.

910844024.speaker: 孟章
910844024.content: So rigorous, Admin... As for "what I'm all about"... even I'm not entirely sure. Hahaha.

910844025.speaker: 我
910844025.content: I was just kidding. Haven't we been friends for a while now? It's not just me thinking that, right?

910844026.speaker: 孟章
910844026.content: I thought it was just me thinking that way.

910844027.speaker: 孟章
910844027.content: Its light extinguished, we throw the bracelet into the trash as we head outside.

910845002.speaker: 我
910845002.content: I would, but... going to Xu Heng's Old Town would be quite a trek. If I do get the free time, I'd rather catch up on sleep.

910845003.speaker: 孟章
910845003.content: In this hypothetical scenario, we have everything we need except an easterly wind. You'd be free, full of energy, and have nothing else to worry about. I'd plan the route—all you'd need to do is follow.

910845007.speaker: 我
910845007.content: If I had time off under such ideal circumstances, why would I spend it in a ghost town?

910845008.speaker: 孟章
910845008.content: But that's my... Uh, no, you're quite right.

910845010.speaker: 我
910845010.content: Then again... if I was free, full of energy, and tired of the same old vacation plans... I wouldn't be opposed to exploring some ruins.

910845011.speaker: 孟章
910845011.content: Exploring...? Hahaha. If you really want to come along next time, I'll be sure to set plenty of traps for you.

910828001.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910828001.content: Oh? That's a surprisingly basic question!

910828002.speaker: 我
910828002.content: I wasn't thinking too hard about it—I just thought we could get the bracelet off quickly and be done with it... Wait a minute. What do you mean, "a surprisingly basic question"?

910828003.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910828003.content: Well... I thought you'd ask something more...

910828005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910828005.content: ...U-Um, never mind! Speaking of which, why hasn't the bracelet come off yet?

910828006.speaker: 我
910828006.content: Because you haven't answered the question.

910828007.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910828007.content: Oh, I almost forgot... I didn't realize it until you asked, but I don't think I read much of anything.

910828008.speaker: 我
910828008.content: Makes sense—we're usuallyso busy. Even when we do get time off, it's hard to get into a relaxed enough headspace to read a book.

910828009.speaker: 我
910828009.content: But without an answer, the bracelet won't come off... Let me try a different question.

910828010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910828010.content: That's okay—maybe I do have an answer.

910828011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910828011.content: When I was little, my friends would read me stories to encourage me. I think they all came from the same book.

910828012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910828012.content: So, my favorite book would be that one. I'm not sure if an answer like that counts, though...

910828014.speaker: 我
910828014.content: Such an obnoxious tone... Speaking of story books, I have a few of those. Maybe you'd like to read one.

910828015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910828015.content: Really? It would be amazing if you happened to have the one I "listened" to as a kid. I really do miss it...

910828016.speaker: 我
910828016.content: We can take a look later.

910828017.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910828017.content: Okay! Oh! The bracelet came undone. Alright then, Admin—it's time for me to ask you a question!

910829001.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910829001.content: The memory that left the deepest impression on me... I'll need to think about that.

910829002.speaker: 我
910829002.content: If it's too hard to answer, I can ask another question.

910829003.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910829003.content: No, that's okay. I have an answer for this one.

910829004.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910829004.content: The memory that left the deepest impression on me was the one of us eating barbecue together for the first time, of course!

910829005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910829005.content: You looked super surprised back then, though I'm not sure why... Was it because I ate too much?

910829006.speaker: 我
910829006.content: I remembered it as soon as you said it! I'd truly never seen someone eat as much barbecue as you did... The empty plates next to you were stacked as high as a mountain! It's hard to forget something like that...

910829008.speaker: 我
910829008.content: Huh? But... the bracelet still opened up. I guess it'll open as long as you answer, regardless of whether it's true or false.

910829009.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910829009.content: False? Uh-uh, that won't do! Let me try again!

910829010.content: Ver tries to re-secure the opened latch, muttering her new answer to herself as she closes it.

910829011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910829011.content: The memory that left the deepest impression on me was the one of me rescuing you from the Source Layer!

910829014.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910829014.content: Aaah! Wait, wait, it was... It was...

910829015.content: Ver again forces the bracelet closed. But based on the gradually dimming light on its surface, it seems to be nearly out of battery.

910829016.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910829016.content: It was in the orphanage, when...

910829018.content: The light goes out. It looks like it's completely out of power... That's a really poor battery life.

910829019.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910829019.content: I'm sorry, Admin! I have no idea what it's basing its judgments on. Those were definitely my most important memories...

910829020.speaker: 我
910829020.content: I get it—don't worry about it. Well, it's your turn to ask a question now.

910830001.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910830001.content: Vacation... Sounds luxurious. As I understand it, a vacation is when you go somewhere to enjoy yourself for a couple of weeks and have not a care in the world.

910830002.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910830002.content: To be honest, I still don't know what a real vacation is like.

910830003.speaker: 我
910830003.content: Why don't you try imagining one, then? If you suddenly found yourself with the time for a vacation, where would you go?

910830005.speaker: 我
910830005.content: In Omorfies? That would be wonderful. I'd want to go there too.

910830006.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910830006.content: No, the beach in Ain Soph!

910830007.speaker: 我
910830007.content: The one packed with tourists and shops as far as the eye can see...?

910830008.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910830008.content: That's the one! If that many tourists go there, it must be a lot of fun! I bet it would be great to go on vacation there.

910830010.speaker: 我
910830010.content: Maybe it was a fun place to begin with, but all that tourism took the fun out of it...

910830011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910830011.content: I don't mind! If we really do get the chance one day, would you go there with me?

910830012.speaker: 我
910830012.content: If it's just to the beach in Ain Soph, we'll definitely get the chance. Plus, the West Coast Film Festival there is also worth checking out.

910830013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910830013.content: The Film Festival... That's right, I seem to remember hearing about back-to-back movie screenings in the plaza. Why don't we go next time?

910830014.speaker: 我
910830014.content: Sure! But it'll depend on the weather. It seems like this year's festival falls on a week it's likely to rain, so catching an outdoor movie might not be in the cards.

910830015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910830015.content: No problem! As long as you're with me, I'll be happy enough just to walk around together.

910830016.speaker: 我
910830016.content: So... I'm basically your way to break even?

910830017.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910830017.content: No, you're a necessity! Huh... that came out weird.

910830018.content: Ver extends a finger and starts speaking clearly and methodically.

910830019.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910830019.content: It doesn't matter how fun a place is—if you're not there with me, it won't mean anything at all. Your presence is an essential part of any fun outing!

910830021.content: Seeming to understanding the implications of her words, Ver shifts somewhat self-consciously before putting her hand down. The bracelet has long since come undone.

910830022.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910830022.content: Um, you're welcome... So, it's my turn to ask you a question.

910831002.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910831002.content: What? You still haven't finished your work yet, Admin...?

910831003.speaker: 我
910831003.content: Nope, but I should be able to get it all done tomorrow.

910831004.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910831004.content: Then, after you finish your reports...

910831005.speaker: 我
910831005.content: I'll be free as a bird! I should be able to take a day off.

910831006.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910831006.content: A whole day? There must be a lot you could do then, right? Like... going out... or something...

910831007.speaker: 我
910831007.content: You want to go out? Let's go together, then!

910831008.content: Ver was obviously not expecting this sudden reply from me. She's taken aback for a moment, but then furiously nods her head.

910832002.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910832002.content: Huh? And I got all excited for a moment...

910832003.speaker: 我
910832003.content: I really do want to go eat some barbecue, but honestly, I have too many reports to take care of.

910832005.speaker: 我
910832005.content: I'll have to put in some extra work tomorrow, but if I get it all done, I can go out the day after.

910832007.content: I suddenly notice that the bracelet has come undone.

910832008.speaker: 我
910832008.content: Hm... Does the bracelet unlock regardless of which way you answer? Why did it take until now for it to—

910832010.content: Fortunately, the light on the bracelet starts to dim, and with it, the racket quickly stops as well.

910832011.content: I look up to see Ver smiling at me.

910832012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910832012.content: Then the day after tomorrow—it's a date!

910833002.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910833002.content: I didn't realize that you actually preferred rainy days, Admin! It seems like must people prefer sunny days.

910833003.speaker: 我
910833003.content: I think it's because it's easier to fall asleep to the sound of rain.

910833004.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910833004.content: On that note... I think rainy days are quite special.

910833006.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910833006.content: Because of some stuff from my past... I used to like to lean on the windowsill and watch the raindrops. When it was sunny, the light hurt my eyes so much, I had to huddle up in a corner.

910833007.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910833007.content: Plus, my room would get quite lively on rainy days. My two friends who usually liked to play outside would come over to see me, since they were stuck inside.

910833008.speaker: 我
910833008.content: I see. Those two friends... Are you still in touch with them?

910833009.content: Ver freezes up for some reason. She looks at me for a while without saying anything.

910833010.speaker: 我
910833010.content: Sorry... Should I not have asked that?

910833011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910833011.content: No, no, it's fine. I'm... still in touch with those friends.

910833012.speaker: 我
910833012.content: That's great. It's a shame, but after losing my memory, I can't remember anything from my childhood. I don't even know if I had any good friends as a kid...

910833013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910833013.content: Someone as gentle as you... definitely had good friends.

910833014.speaker: 我
910833014.content: Maybe... Wait, did you just say "gentle?"

910833015.content: Ver looks up at me with a big smile on her face.

910833016.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910833016.content: Yep! To be honest... I think you've always had a gentleness that draws people to you.

910833018.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910833018.content: I think the bracelet still has some battery left. I could put it back on and repeat what I just said—it's definitely true!

910833019.speaker: 我
910833019.content: N-no, that's fine, there's no need to do that!!

910834002.speaker: 我
910834002.content: But I really don't like gloomy rainy days very much... At least the bracelet still came open.

910834003.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910834003.content: I believe you, Admin. You wouldn't lie, especially not about something so silly. It must be a bug in Zenkibo's program.

910834004.speaker: 我
910834004.content: Yeah... Although, now that I think about it, I do feel like I have some distinct memories about rainy days... Maybe I really liked rainy days before I lost my memory?

910834005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910834005.content: Well, now I can't help but think that there's more to this lie detector technology than meets the eye! But... distinct memories about rainy days? Can you remember anything more specific?

910834006.speaker: 我
910834006.content: It's just a vague impression—I can't describe it. It's this damp, but pleasantly warm feeling... Amnesia's a tricky thing.

910834007.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910834007.content: Maybe it was a memory of, like, playing with friends while hiding from the rain.

910834008.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910834008.content: Like seeking shelter under a veranda, but getting all wet from a gust of wind, then seeing who got the least drenched! Hahaha.

910834009.speaker: 我
910834009.content: Maybe, actually... Oof, now my head's starting to hurt. I'd better not try to remember more.

910834010.speaker: 我
910834010.content: Speaking of which, that was quite a vivid picture you painted there, Ver. Almost like you'd experienced it yourself...

910834011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910834011.content: Oh, no, not at all. I just think rainy days are kinda special and came up with that on my own.

910835002.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910835002.content: Oh, I see! You mean I'm still not doing enough, right?

910835004.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910835004.content: Tell me! That's what the Administrator meant, right?

910835005.content: Ver brings her face right up to the opened bracelet, which flashes a couple times in reply.

910835006.speaker: 我
910835006.content: You've done the best you can within your capabilities.

910835007.content: In a serious manner, Ver props up her chin with one hand while holding the bracelet in the other, giving the impression of an academic pedantically analyzing semantics.

910835008.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910835008.content: That just makes it sound like you're trying to let me down easy. I get it, I'm still nowhere near strong enough yet. I understand completely...

910835011.speaker: 我
910835011.content: Does that mean you were lying just now? I'm so confused...

910835012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910835012.content: UHHH... Anyway, problem solved so let's get out of here now, c'mon!

910836002.speaker: 我
910836002.content: This really is a lie detector!

910836003.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910836003.content: ...I could hear my heart suddenly start pounding when you said that...

910836004.speaker: 我
910836004.content: U-Uh, sorry about that! I won't say anything like that next time... Actually, there shouldn't even be a "next time." We'd better go report this to Shu.

910836005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910836005.content: That's a Zenkibo prank for you...

910836006.content: I walk a few paces, only to discover that Ver hasn't budged. She seems to want to say something, but hesitates.

910836008.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910836008.content: Well, don't pranks normally upset people?

910836009.speaker: 我
910836009.content: Yeah. Didn't those weird questions and lie detecting make you uncomfortable?

910836012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910836012.content: Hearing you say "so-so" just now was more upsetting than any prank... (Sniffle)...

910836013.speaker: 我
910836013.content: Huh? Oh... No, that was a lie... Honest!

910819002.content: Ausar doesn't answer immediately. Instead, she tilts her head and gives the bracelet a forceful tug. I stumble, but manage to steady myself by grabbing on to her shoulder.

910819003.speaker: 我
910819003.content: (Does that question really require this much thought...?)

910819004.speaker: 我
910819004.content: You won't get the bracelet off by staying silent.

910819005.speaker: 冥王
910819005.content: I spend most of my time just zoning out, okay?! It's not like there's anything else to do.

910819007.speaker: 冥王
910819007.content: This thing dares to contradict me?

910819009.content: As if to underscore its expert judgment, the bracelet repeats itself once more in a goading tone.

910819010.speaker: 冥王
910819010.content: Tch. Thanks to Osiris' habits, I basically do nothing but read fairy tales...

910819012.speaker: 冥王
910819012.content: Urgh! You've gone too far, you hula hoop!

910819013.speaker: 我
910819013.content: W-Wait! There's no need to summon your sword wings, is there?

910819016.speaker: 我
910819016.content: It's okay if you don't want to say... I was just curious about how you usually spend your time...

910819017.speaker: 冥王
910819017.content: Tch... Go ask Osiris if you're so curious.

910819018.content: Ausar shrugs noncommittally. She then takes my hand and refastens the bracelet on my wrist, looking equal parts embarrassed and annoyed.

910819019.speaker: 冥王
910819019.content: Whatever... That last one didn't count. I'll allow you to ask me one more question.

910819020.speaker: 我
910819020.content: Wouldn't it be fairer if you asked me a question now?

910820001.speaker: 冥王
910820001.content: I'm not fond of conjectures, and I don't want you to make any.

910820002.speaker: 冥王
910820002.content: Heh. But what is this, a quiz game?

910820003.speaker: 我
910820003.content: Where did you hear that from?

910820005.speaker: 我
910820005.content: Um, I see... Well, if you like, I could get a "Yes" and a "No" pillow and put them on the couch...

910820006.speaker: 冥王
910820006.content: I-I'm not interested in having a pillow fight!

910820008.speaker: 我
910820008.content: Please, just answer my next question.

910820009.content: I grasp Ausar's hand and give her a pleading look.

910820011.speaker: 冥王
910820011.content: A free and ordinary life in which I get to see some interesting things happen, I guess.

910820012.speaker: 冥王
910820012.content: Like hearing Osiris tell stories, or wearing the new outfits you buy me.

910820013.speaker: 冥王
910820013.content: Being able to go out whenever I feel like it to make those friends of yours see me in a new light!

910820014.speaker: 冥王
910820014.content: Heh, and when you run into a problem none of you can solve, I'll make you get on your knees and beg me to...

910820015.content: Ausar's excitement grows more palpable with each word she says. The corners of her mouth curl at me in a wicked smile, and a maniacal glint flashes in her eyes.

910820017.speaker: 我
910820017.content: I see... It's such a detailed plan.

910820018.speaker: 冥王
910820018.content: Huh? If you're trying to mock me...

910820020.content: I wave my hands to interrupt her, then give her a serious look.

910820021.speaker: 我
910820021.content: As your Administrator, I'll work with you to make it a reality.

910820022.speaker: 我
910820022.content: Still... it really is an interesting idea map. But I'll skip the part where I kneel, of course...

910820023.speaker: 冥王
910820023.content: Don't act like you know me so well. I wasn't being serious...

910820026.content: Before the bracelet can render its verdict, Ausar grabs and destroys it.

910820028.speaker: 冥王
910820028.content: Don't be ridiculous. It's my turn to ask a question, so answer truthfully.

910821003.speaker: 我
910821003.content: Such a blunt answer... Can I ask, then, exactly what your opinion of me is?

910821004.speaker: 冥王
910821004.content: Stubborn, narrow-minded, and slightly more useful than the other puny insects.

910821011.speaker: 我
910821011.content: How could it say your evaluation of me is true?! There must be something else going on here...

910821012.speaker: 冥王
910821012.content: Hahahaha! Your expression right now! Adoration with a hint of devastation... It's marvelous! Excellent!

910821013.content: Pleased by my confused expression, the capricious Ausar cackles merrily.

910821014.speaker: 我
910821014.content: Hm... If you ask me, your expression right now is even more marvelous.

910821016.speaker: 我
910821016.content: Think about it—hardly anyone knows about you to begin with. I'm guessing I'm the only person who's ever seen you laugh this happily.

910821020.content: Ausar breaks the bracelet and casts it aside.

910821022.speaker: 冥王
910821022.content: I've had enough. I don't need this thing to validate me.

910821023.speaker: 冥王
910821023.content: Still, I'm surprised that my joy at your expense would make you happy? You've given me... something to think about...

910821024.speaker: 冥王
910821024.content: Whatever. That's fine. Prepare yourself now—I'm asking the next question.

910822002.speaker: 冥王
910822002.content: It's not often that we agree, #{nickname}#.

910822003.speaker: 我
910822003.content: I actually don't have a preference. Sweet and savory foods are both good to me.

910822004.speaker: 冥王
910822004.content: In that case, we should try potato chip-stuffed cream puffs.

910822006.speaker: 冥王
910822006.content: Wh-What's with that twisted face you're making? I didn't even do anything to you...

910822007.speaker: 我
910822007.content: I-I suffered an emotional attack... But why that food and not cream puff-flavored potato chips?

910822008.speaker: 冥王
910822008.content: You did just say that you like sweet and savory foods...

910822009.speaker: 我
910822009.content: But that's not the same thing... I'd prefer for certain snack vendors to not make such bizarre flavors, if possible.

910822010.content: Ausar shoots me a blank stare, then walks right over to my snack box, opens up a bag of chips, and starts crunching on its contents.

910822013.speaker: 我
910822013.content: Collector's edition bubblegum-flavored potato chips—or maybe collector's edition potato chip-shaped bubblegum...

910822015.content: Ausar wipes her mouth on my hand, then grabs me and makes a run for the door.

910822017.speaker: 冥王
910822017.content: To raze the place that made this abomination to the ground!

910823003.speaker: 我
910823003.content: Your previous attempt to make cream puffs was a bust, wasn't it?

910823004.speaker: 冥王
910823004.content: Uh... How do you know that? Osiris was supposed to dispose of them...

910823005.speaker: 我
910823005.content: Well... how do you suppose Osiris disposed of those burnt cream puffs?

910823006.speaker: 冥王
910823006.content: You mean, you took those disasters and...

910823007.speaker: 我
910823007.content: Ate them, yes, all of us together. They didn't exactly taste great, so I'll go with this: I'm still looking forward to the successful batch.

910823008.speaker: 冥王
910823008.content: ...You could end up waiting an awfully long time for that.

910823009.speaker: 我
910823009.content: I don't mind. I'll be happy when that day finally comes.

910824002.speaker: 我
910824002.content: Look, the bracelet thinks so, too!

910824003.speaker: 冥王
910824003.content: That's surely an overstatement. It just so happens to suit me, that's all.

910824006.speaker: 冥王
910824006.content: Uh... What are you doing? Repeating what the bracelet says is just plain childish.

910824007.speaker: 我
910824007.content: I think it suits you because of your personality! Your personality!

910824008.speaker: 冥王
910824008.content: Okay... Why are you fawning all over me all of a sudden...?

910824009.speaker: 我
910824009.content: Think about it—anyone would be stunned to see a Modifier as powerful and beautiful as you show another side of themselves outside of battle!

910824011.content: Incredulous, Ausar's mouth is agape at my compliments.

910824012.speaker: 我
910824012.content: If you get the chance, why not give another style a try sometime?

910825002.speaker: 我
910825002.content: Ahaha, I guess dresses do suit you slightly better...

910825003.speaker: 冥王
910825003.content: The way someone dresses is determined by their mood, I suppose.

910825004.speaker: 我
910825004.content: It just seems to me that your mood is never particularly good.

910825006.speaker: 我
910825006.content: Maybe going for a different style could even change your mood. Why not try that sometime, if you get the chance?

910825007.speaker: 冥王
910825007.content: I don't think so. I think something like that would suit Osiris better.

910825008.speaker: 我
910825008.content: Not necessarily. Sometimes, I think it would be fun if Modifiers swapped outfits.

910825009.speaker: 冥王
910825009.content: Oh? Is that so? I would never have taken you to be such a deviant.

910825011.speaker: 我
910825011.content: I was only thinking you could try seeing a different side of yourself! What did you think I meant??

910825013.speaker: 冥王
910825013.content: Um... huh?? I was obviously just thinking—

910826003.speaker: 冥王
910826003.content: I have no interest in such make-believe stories...

910826005.speaker: 我
910826005.content: You sure seem resistant to the idea of sharing your interests with me.

910826006.speaker: 冥王
910826006.content: It's not like I was ever friends with everyone... I'm only asking because you've piqued my interest.

910826007.speaker: 我
910826007.content: I see! I'm so glad that we share an interest!

910826008.speaker: 冥王
910826008.content: Tch, sounds to me like you only like those kinds of stories because I do...

910826009.speaker: 我
910826009.content: Well, I guess I can't completely deny that. Stories like that are easier to remember and tell to you later.

910826010.speaker: 冥王
910826010.content: According to your human theories, the fun of stories lies in large part in the "sharing" of them.

910826011.speaker: 我
910826011.content: That's right! Even though it's nice to occasionally read more intellectually challenging stories, I still prefer light-hearted comedies because of that.

910826012.speaker: 我
910826012.content: Speaking of which, I'd be blown away if one day you were to tell me a story, instead of Osiris.

910826013.speaker: 冥王
910826013.content: Ugh... You're always obsessing over things that will never happen... but suit yourself.

910827003.speaker: 我
910827003.content: Hey! There's no need to take it out on me! Besides, aren't you the one always hating on those stories for being nothing but make-believe?

910827004.speaker: 冥王
910827004.content: Uh... I wasn't talking about you... Besides, th-that's because... it's perfectly normal to get tired of hearing the same stories over and over again, isn't it?

910827006.speaker: 冥王
910827006.content: It's just boring old fiction. I couldn't care less! I only use them to kill time!

910827009.content: I throw the bracelet to the side and gently pat Ausar on the shoulder to comfort her.

910827010.speaker: 我
910827010.content: So, you really do prefer more heartwarming stories, right?

910827012.speaker: 冥王
910827012.content: Unlike innocent fairy tales, stories of conflict and intrigue don't usually end well. When I finish reading one, I feel like I've wasted my time.

910827013.speaker: 我
910827013.content: Same... The stories go on and on and there are too many characters to count. They're exhausting to read.

910827014.speaker: 冥王
910827014.content: Right? Love and hope might be naive concepts, but at least they aren't as tasteless.

910827015.speaker: 我
910827015.content: Haha. So, for you, the way a story ends is what matters most.

910827016.speaker: 冥王
910827016.content: That's not just my opinion—that's the way it should be.

910827018.speaker: 冥王
910827018.content: Is having an interest in common with me really that exciting...?

910827019.speaker: 我
910827019.content: Of course! That reminds me: Does the break room have a projector? Wanna watch a movie?

910827021.speaker: 冥王
910827021.content: But you have to let me enjoy myself. You're not allowed to do anything else today.

910810001.speaker: 金乌
910810001.content: Hehehe, since you're asking, the answer's obviously...

910810002.speaker: 我
910810002.content: I know exactly what you're going to say...

910810003.speaker: 金乌
910810003.content: The hero of the Prime Codex!

910810005.speaker: 我
910810005.content: ...It's obviously you... Wait, what? You mean, you don't think you're the stronger one?

910810006.speaker: 金乌
910810006.content: I'd never just lie through my teeth like that.

910810007.speaker: 金乌
910810007.content: The truth is, I took the "Sun Chaser" title from the Prime Codex.

910810008.speaker: 我
910810008.content: Right, you have told me about this.

910810009.speaker: 金乌
910810009.content: I took the title to motivate myself to become as wise, brave, and righteous as the hero is!

910810010.speaker: 金乌
910810010.content: But at present, I still have a long ways to go!

910810011.speaker: 我
910810011.content: You've always been willing to help others. At least, that's what I think.

910810012.speaker: 我
910810012.content: If you hadn't gotten scratched while helping that cat, or slipped and fell while picking up banana peels, or when you were helping that old lady take out the trash you hadn't— Mmmph!

910810013.content: Before I can finish speaking, Jinwu hastily covers my mouth.

910810014.speaker: 金乌
910810014.content: Ahhh! Okay, okay! No more talking about that... Anyway, I'll do my best!

910810015.speaker: 金乌
910810015.content: Is it my turn to ask you questions now?

910811001.speaker: 金乌
910811001.content: Video games... I have played some, but I was never any good at them. We don't have any gaming devices in Ruomu Palace, so I never had the chance to practice.

910811002.speaker: 金乌
910811002.content: But if I did get the chance, I think I'd like them!

910811004.speaker: 我
910811004.content: Well, as it so happens, I have lots of games on my terminal. Wanna try some?

910811006.speaker: 我
910811006.content: This one's a simple stacking game, this one's a matching game, this one's a fighting game...

910811007.speaker: 金乌
910811007.content: They all look really fun... What does this lit-up button mean?

910811008.speaker: 我
910811008.content: Oh, you opened up the card draw screen. Uh... it's kind of like those prize draws that shops do. Wanna give it a go?

910811009.speaker: 金乌
910811009.content: Ooh, so it's a game of luck, right? Alright then, here goes nothing...!

910811010.content: Jinwu presses the button, and then rays of light shine in our faces from the screen.

910811012.content: I stare at the terminal until I'm sure that my eyes aren't deceiving me.

910811013.speaker: 我
910811013.content: They're... They're all the rarest level? Wh-Wha... What???

910811014.speaker: 金乌
910811014.content: So, does that mean I have good luck?

910811015.speaker: 我
910811015.content: It's better than good—it's almost too good to be true... Wow...

910811016.speaker: 金乌
910811016.content: Too good to be true? Master used to tell me to watch out for stuff like that. That doesn't sound good...

910811017.speaker: 金乌
910811017.content: Do you need me to give you more of my luck...?

910811018.speaker: 我
910811018.content: Yes, please! My teachers never said anything about this.

910811019.speaker: 金乌
910811019.content: Okay! By the spirits of heaven and earth, I channel my luck to you!

910811020.content: Jinwu makes some bizarre gestures with her hands, and I actually feel a soothing warmth envelop me.

910811021.speaker: 我
910811021.content: Thank you! Okay, now it's your turn to ask me a question.

910812003.speaker: 金乌
910812003.content: Eeep! I'm so sorry! It actually wasn't fun at all!

910812006.speaker: 金乌
910812006.content: Well, this is a lie detector, right?! Won't it blow up if anyone lies? I just don't want you to get hurt...

910812007.speaker: 我
910812007.content: I don't think Zenkibo would pull a prank that crazy...

910812008.speaker: 我
910812008.content: Well, I feel bored myself just thinking about you on the mountain, especially since it was just you and your master. I can't imagine how you passed all that time.

910812009.speaker: 金乌
910812009.content: It was actually fine until the first time I came down the mountain with Master. Once I saw what it was like in the outside world, being up there all the time suddenly became a chore.

910812010.speaker: 金乌
910812010.content: Luckily, I ended up getting another chance to come down here. Even more luckily, I met you, my destined companion!

910812011.content: Confronted with this sudden heartfelt declaration, I scratch my head bashfully as I consider how to respond.

910812012.speaker: 我
910812012.content: Um... I think meeting you was also...

910812013.speaker: 金乌
910812013.content: So, let's do our best to defeat the Yaoguai!

910812014.content: Looks like there was no need for me to say anything more.

910812015.content: After all, this is Jinwu—she's pure and bright, like a little ball of sunshine.

910812016.speaker: 我
910812016.content: Alright, it's your turn to ask me a question.

910813002.speaker: 金乌
910813002.content: I had no idea you were really interested in the Astral Arcanum!

910813003.speaker: 我
910813003.content: I'm always interested in learning new things. But what is the Astral Arcanum, exactly?

910813004.speaker: 金乌
910813004.content: Well... You just go "Boom!" "Bang!" "Woosh!" and you can solve all sorts of problems!

910813005.speaker: 我
910813005.content: Maybe I shouldn't expect to understand it right away...

910813006.speaker: 金乌
910813006.content: If you're interested in Astral Arcanum, I can give you a palm reading to see if you've got what it takes to learn it!

910813008.content: I skeptically extend my hand. Jinwu takes it into her hands and examines my palm carefully, mumbling cryptic terms and phrases.

910813009.speaker: 金乌
910813009.content: Hmm, prominent Mount of Jupiter... Mm-hm... Wavy head line... Interesting...

910813011.speaker: 金乌
910813011.content: You've got what it takes, Administrator! I'm certain of it!

910813012.speaker: 我
910813012.content: Really? Great! If we get the chance, then, let's—

910813013.content: Before I can finish my sentence, Jinwu is already standing behind me.

910813014.content: I feel a soft, warm touch on my back, as if she's trying to spread my arms.

910813016.speaker: 金乌
910813016.content: Let's try sword flying! This building's the perfect height. That was the first move I learned, so you can definitely learn it too!

910813017.speaker: 我
910813017.content: Huh? Wait, no! I'm pretty sure I can't! I'm just a human, after all...

910814002.speaker: 我
910814002.content: Uh... But I don't know anything about it. It must be really hard to learn.

910814003.speaker: 金乌
910814003.content: I didn't know anything about the Astral Arcanum before I learned it, either!

910814004.content: For a moment, I can't think of a single rebuttal...

910814005.speaker: 我
910814005.content: You say that, but you started learning at a young age. It's probably too late for me now.

910814006.speaker: 金乌
910814006.content: Not at all! I'll teach you!

910814008.speaker: 金乌
910814008.content: Are you sure? Okay... I was thinking that if you learned sword flying, we could fly around the sky together.

910814009.speaker: 我
910814009.content: That's sort of hard to imagine...

910814010.speaker: 我
910814010.content: Actually, I think there's a training simulation device that allows you to do something like that.

910814011.speaker: 我
910814011.content: Why don't we go and try it out together?

910814012.speaker: 金乌
910814012.content: Really? I want to see it!

910815003.speaker: 我
910815003.content: You did have a big hand in opening the restaurant in Xu Heng. I'd love to have some of those amazing dishes again.

910815005.speaker: 我
910815005.content: You mean... you're going to cook something for me?

910815006.speaker: 金乌
910815006.content: That's right! You don't have any other plans today, do you? We can always do it another day if you do!

910815007.speaker: 我
910815007.content: I dunno, I feel a little weird about it... Wouldn't that be a lot of trouble for you to go to on just a regular old day?

910815008.speaker: 金乌
910815008.content: Not at all! Cooking's no trouble for me.

910815009.speaker: 金乌
910815009.content: Besides, if you're worried about today not being a special occasion... I heard that there was some sort of holiday recently. I think it had to do with expressing your feelings.

910815010.speaker: 我
910815010.content: Recently? Oh, you're right... But that holiday's about...

910815011.content: After some thought, I decide not to finish that sentence.

910815012.speaker: 金乌
910815012.content: Oh, never mind! What matters is it was a happy holiday, right?

910815013.speaker: 金乌
910815013.content: So, I'm gonna make you a tasty feast!

910815014.content: Jinwu looks at me, her eyes shining.

910815015.speaker: 我
910815015.content: Um, okay! Thank you for the care, then.

910816003.speaker: 我
910816003.content: ...Um, I've had the Xu Heng food you've made before. The flavor was certainly unforgettable. But recently, I've noticed that you've been adding a wild assortment of sauces to your food, so I'm kinda worried that you've been learning some strange recipes...

910816004.speaker: 金乌
910816004.content: That's because I've been watching videos about Shashvat street food. It's really fun cooking with lots and lots of spices!

910816005.speaker: 我
910816005.content: Shashvat street food, huh...? Really? Are you sure that counts as proper instruction in cooking?

910816007.speaker: 我
910816007.content: I'm not sure... But I am sure that I could never eat something like that...

910816008.speaker: 金乌
910816008.content: If that's how you feel, then I can just make you traditional Xu Heng food.

910816009.content: Jinwu rests her chin on her hand in earnest contemplation and puffs out her cheeks.

910816010.speaker: 我
910816010.content: Huh? It sounds like you want to...

910816011.speaker: 金乌
910816011.content: That's right, I want to have a meal with you!

910816012.speaker: 我
910816012.content: Where's this coming from all of a sudden? To be clear, if it's regular Xu Heng cuisine, that sounds great. I'm just curious about why.

910816013.speaker: 金乌
910816013.content: Because there was a holiday recently, right? What was it called again...

910816015.content: After some quick thinking, I decide not to tell her.

910816016.speaker: 金乌
910816016.content: You can't remember either, huh? At any rate, it was a happy holiday, right?

910816018.speaker: 金乌
910816018.content: Then let's eat together! I'll go get the ingredients and spices ready! ...Uh, wait, no! I mean, no spices! ..No, wait, that's not right, either!

910816019.content: Jinwu keeps muttering as she pulls me along. I try to keep up with her brisk pace.

910817002.speaker: 金乌
910817002.content: It figures that you're that my destined companion. That's exactly what I think!

910817003.content: Jinwu bounds up to me excitedly, taking my hands in hers and spinning around in circles.

910817004.speaker: 我
910817004.content: Hahaha! Yeah, after all, the Prime Codex embraces both ancient and modern times with a thorough understanding of a myriad of human experiences. It's a top-notch tome!

910817006.speaker: 金乌
910817006.content: Huh? Why is that one a lie?

910817007.speaker: 我
910817007.content: ...Oh, alright. The truth is, all I know about it is what you said—that it's "an ancient and sacred text"...

910817008.speaker: 金乌
910817008.content: Oh! So, you don't actually know much about it... That makes sense. You do usually seem to be really busy.

910817010.speaker: 金乌
910817010.content: Want to come to my room, then?
