910817012.content: What a strange and wonderful question.

910817013.speaker: 金乌
910817013.content: I have loooads of classics like the Prime Codex in my room! Anything you'd like to read, I've got it.

910817014.speaker: 我
910817014.content: "Classics," eh? I have heard that you moved a ton of manga into your room.

910817015.speaker: 金乌
910817015.content: Hmph! So now you show your true colors! "Manga" is just a superficial way to refer to such precious tomes. The mysteries contained within can only truly be understood by someone destined to understand them.

910817016.speaker: 我
910817016.content: Oh, I see. Then is it really okay for me to borrow from your collection? It sounds like these manga are really important to you.

910817018.speaker: 金乌
910817018.content: But you're my most important companion, so I'll make an exception! But, again, they're not just ordinary manga!

910817019.speaker: 我
910817019.content: O-Of course... Thank you very much.

910817020.speaker: 金乌
910817020.content: And no saying "thank you"! That makes us seem too much like strangers.

910817021.speaker: 我
910817021.content: But it would feel rude to not say anything at all.

910817022.speaker: 金乌
910817022.content: Then just say "Woohoo!" That's the protagonist's catchphrase.

910817023.speaker: 我
910817023.content: No, please! Just let me thank you like I normally would!

910818003.speaker: 金乌
910818003.content: That's okay, Admin. Even if you don't like the Prime Codex, it won't hurt my feelings... (Sob)...

910818005.content: Jinwu's face suddenly falls. Not knowing what to do, I go over to console her.

910818006.content: Then, head lowered while she weeps, Jinwu suddenly throws open her arms and hugs me for an unknown reason.

910818008.speaker: 金乌
910818008.content: I understand... why you took such a big risk to lie to me, Admin. You didn't want to hurt my feelings...

910818009.speaker: 我
910818009.content: No, you have it all wrong. I wasn't lying, because... Well, you see, I haven't actually read any of it.

910818010.speaker: 我
910818010.content: Wait a second—what do you mean "took such a big risk?"

910818011.speaker: 金乌
910818011.content: Because it's a lie detector! Won't it blow up if someone lies? And if that happened, I wouldn't get to see you anymore... (Bawl)...

910818013.content: I look around the empty space, but there are no tissues in sight. Instead, I fold a corner of my shirt and try to dry the tears on her face. Jinwu remains perfectly still, like a docile kitten.

910818014.speaker: 金乌
910818014.content: Still, I'm shocked that you haven't actually read any of Prime Codex, Admin...

910818015.speaker: 我
910818015.content: I have actually said before that I wanted to read it, but you told me it was "a secret ancient text" that couldn't be shown to just anybody... And that was the end of it.

910818016.content: Clearly remembering this incident, Jinwu scratches her head bashfully.

910818017.speaker: 金乌
910818017.content: Hahaha, right... The truth is, I only said that because I'd lost the copy I had on me...

910818020.speaker: 我
910818020.content: It's still in print, right? You could just buy another copy.

910818021.speaker: 金乌
910818021.content: Well, I know everything that happens in the Prime Codex by heart, so not having a copy handy isn't a big deal.

910818022.speaker: 我
910818022.content: Would you like to browse the manga shop together, then?

910818024.speaker: 我
910818024.content: But since you're a devoted manga fan, you've probably already read all the books they have in stock...

910818025.speaker: 金乌
910818025.content: Of course I have! But I read them all alone. What's that saying again...?

910818027.speaker: 金乌
910818027.content: "It's not about the manga you've read, it's about the bookstore you read them in"?

910818028.speaker: 我
910818028.content: I'm not sure that's a saying... But since you've said it, shall we—

910801001.speaker: 执明
910801001.content: What kind of question is that? I have no interest in discussing my life outside of work.

910801005.speaker: 我
910801005.content: Um, well, I heard that you have quite the book collection. I'm actually a big reader as well—that's why I wanted to talk to you.

910801006.speaker: 执明
910801006.content: I do have a few books, but you could hardly call it a collection. Some were given to me by other people, others I just happened to find. I'm reluctant to throw any of thme away, so they've piled up over time.

910801008.speaker: 执明
910801008.content: ...This was developed by a Modifier from Aether Gazer? I'd like to take it apart and see how it works.

910801009.speaker: 我
910801009.content: Wait, don't do that! Zenki's really proud of this bracelet—she'd be crushed if you broke it.

910801010.speaker: 执明
910801010.content: What makes you think I'd break it?

910801011.content: Despite saying this, Zhiming stops reaching out to pull apart the bracelet and instead runs her fingers over its surface.

910801012.speaker: 我
910801012.content: No matter where the books come from, reading them is enjoyable, right? Sometimes, when work gets really busy, reading helps me forget all my troubles.

910801013.speaker: 执明
910801013.content: Really? Even though you're so well-liked at Aether Gazer?

910801014.speaker: 执明
910801014.content: When you read, it feels like you're transported to the world inside the book, where none of the opinions or trivialities of the outside world matter. It's just you and the book. I enjoy that feeling.

910801015.speaker: 执明
910801015.content: ...I didn't mean that I was rejecting the outside world.

910801016.speaker: 我
910801016.content: I know. You're a Quad representative, after all—you're more than capable of doing any task.

910801017.speaker: 我
910801017.content: So... why don't we discuss our book collections the next time we have a chance?

910801018.speaker: 执明
910801018.content: Fine, but I'm deciding the time. And... no one else is allowed to join. It'll just be us two.

910801019.speaker: 执明
910801019.content: There are actually two books I... (Cough) I'll tell you about them next time.

910801020.speaker: 执明
910801020.content: I believe it's my turn to ask a question.

910802003.speaker: 我
910802003.content: You don't mince words, do you? Don't you think you're being a bit harsh, though?

910802004.speaker: 执明
910802004.content: Things will end badly if you mess up the stuff in the lab. And you're not a researcher, so why do you want to see it?

910802005.speaker: 我
910802005.content: You're in the lab for most of the day, right? People leave marks on the places where they spend the most time. That's why I'd like to see yours.

910802006.speaker: 执明
910802006.content: It's not as interesting as you think. Everything in the lab is subject to regulations, and after each experiment there are reset procedures carried out. It's a dull place.

910802007.speaker: 我
910802007.content: But you clearly enjoy it, so how could it be dull?

910802008.speaker: 执明
910802008.content: Something could be both enjoyable and dull. Besides, I enjoy doing scientific research because...

910802009.speaker: 执明
910802009.content: Wait... Why am I telling you this?

910802010.speaker: 我
910802010.content: This IS a question and answer game, Zhiming. The only way to get a true answer is to open up about yourself first.

910802012.content: She studies my face, undecided for several seconds.

910802013.speaker: 执明
910802013.content: I enjoy scientific research because I need it, and because I'm good at it.

910802015.speaker: 执明
910802015.content: What were you expecting to hear? Why do you do the dull work that you do for Aether Gazer?

910802016.speaker: 我
910802016.content: Now suddenly you're asking me questions...

910802017.speaker: 我
910802017.content: Because I want to do something that helps everyone—so I can ease their burden and not get left behind.

910802018.speaker: 执明
910802018.content: Then I think you have your answer about me.

910802019.speaker: 执明
910802019.content: Right, that one doesn't count as a follow-up question... It didn't have anything to do with what I wanted to ask, so it doesn't count.

910802020.speaker: 执明
910802020.content: This next one is my actual question.

910803001.speaker: 执明
910803001.content: I'm well. There's no need to be concerned.

910803003.content: Though instantly exposed by the bracelet, Zhiming simply folds her arms without betraying the least bit of shame.

910803004.speaker: 执明
910803004.content: That doesn't count as a lie. As far as I'm concerned, I'm relatively stable and healthy now.

910803005.speaker: 我
910803005.content: You mean you've gotten used to being in this state of health? That must be hard.

910803006.speaker: 执明
910803006.content: ...There's no need to give me that look.

910803007.speaker: 执明
910803007.content: Everyone is dealt a different hand in life. This is just one way that I'm different from other people, that's all.

910803008.speaker: 我
910803008.content: True. If we were talking about academic research, then I'd be the one working hard.

910803009.speaker: 我
910803009.content: But sometimes I have to get tutoring from the Cryptics. I think that's kind of like your need for rest, no?

910803010.speaker: 执明
910803010.content: You're just talking in circles now. I told you, you don't need to worry about me.

910803012.content: Before the bracelet can make its report, Zhiming makes a few gestures and temporary silences it.

910803014.speaker: 我
910803014.content: Mm-hmm. I'll say the exact same thing again next time.

910803016.content: As she puts down the bracelet, Zhiming seems to be sizing me up without realizing it.

910803017.speaker: 执明
910803017.content: Weren't you saying you wanted to take a break? Where are you going?

910803018.speaker: 执明
910803018.content: And also, you should prepare yourself for my next question for you.

910804003.speaker: 我
910804003.content: It's not something I've ever felt any doubt over.

910804004.speaker: 我
910804004.content: Do you think there's something unusual about me—a human—and you—a Modifier—being here together right now?

910804006.speaker: 执明
910804006.content: So, your answer is that you ignore all objective differences and rely on your subjective feelings to form your opinions?

910804007.speaker: 执明
910804007.content: I'm a little surprised, but that is quite like you.

910804008.speaker: 我
910804008.content: What kind of answer were you expecting to hear?

910804009.speaker: 执明
910804009.content: I wasn't expecting a particular answer. I was just curious about your perspective.

910804010.speaker: 执明
910804010.content: You are a special sort of person, after all. Among humans, you're keeping a secret you can't share with them. Among Modifiers, meanwhile, you're unable to keep apace with everyone in training.

910804011.speaker: 我
910804011.content: When you put it that way, I suppose I should be exhausted.

910804012.speaker: 执明
910804012.content: Is that how you really feel?

910804013.speaker: 我
910804013.content: No, I just suddenly realized that I have a sunnier disposition than I thought.

910804014.speaker: 执明
910804014.content: So you are capable of some introspection, after all.

910804016.speaker: 执明
910804016.content: I'm just making an observation. Don't think about it too much.

910804017.speaker: 执明
910804017.content: Your sunny disposition does shine brightly, #{nickname}#.

910805003.speaker: 执明
910805003.content: What are you smiling about? I don't believe you. No one who actually feels inferior could admit to it so confidently.

910805004.speaker: 我
910805004.content: I knew a lie like that wouldn't get past you.

910805005.speaker: 我
910805005.content: I didn't say that because I expected a certain reaction, and I wasn't surprised by the reaction I got. Honest.

910805006.speaker: 执明
910805006.content: It must have been hard for you to try to say something so dishonest and mean it.

910805007.speaker: 我
910805007.content: But that said, sometimes I do feel a little bad when I'm with everyone.

910805008.speaker: 我
910805008.content: When I see everyone in battle, especially ones against tougher enemies, I feel so frustrated with myself for not being able to go to the frontline.

910805009.speaker: 我
910805009.content: No matter how hard I train or how hard I try to keep the situation under control, I always end up needing everyone else's protection.

910805011.speaker: 执明
910805011.content: That's why I want to do better. I want people to think of my strengths when they see me, and nothing else.

910805013.speaker: 执明
910805013.content: She's very busy. I... Anyways, she probably already knows.

910805014.speaker: 我
910805014.content: Gengchen's never mentioned it, so she clearly already thinks you're doing a great job.

910805016.content: Zhiming seems to hesitate for a moment before coming to a decision. She then looks at me with a serious expression on her face.

910805017.speaker: 执明
910805017.content: You've been doing a good job too, Administrator.

910806002.speaker: 执明
910806002.content: A sincere, but meaningless response. You could say that to anyone.

910806003.speaker: 我
910806003.content: I clearly gave the answer some serious thought first, though!

910806004.speaker: 执明
910806004.content: Give me three reasons why you gave that response.

910806007.speaker: 我
910806007.content: That's because every individual is complex...

910806008.speaker: 执明
910806008.content: Can you not come up with even one good quality of mine?

910806009.speaker: 我
910806009.content: I... But that's really how I feel.

910806010.speaker: 我
910806010.content: No matter how I think about it, I can't help feeling I'm biased.

910806011.speaker: 我
910806011.content: Because you're a living, breathing person capable of a full range of emotions, and you're standing right in front of me.

910806012.speaker: 执明
910806012.content: I assume you didn't become Aether Gazer's Administrator for your skill with rhetoric.

910806013.speaker: 我
910806013.content: Didn't you just accuse me of being perfunctory?

910806014.speaker: 执明
910806014.content: I won't deny that. It's just that... your answer... was somewhat pleasing to hear.

910807003.speaker: 我
910807003.content: Huh? But I haven't even said anything yet!

910807004.speaker: 执明
910807004.content: Do you think I haven't distinguished myself enough? In what area?

910807005.speaker: 我
910807005.content: No, no, not at all! I wouldn't dare say something like that. I just hadn't finished thinking yet...

910807006.speaker: 我
910807006.content: You're a Quad representative and the main person maintaining the Astral Engine. You've more than distinguished yourself.

910807007.speaker: 执明
910807007.content: You hesitated for such a long time. There must be something you think I need to work on.

910807010.content: I try to yank off the bracelet, but before I can, the voice defiantly makes its conclusion in full.

910807012.speaker: 我
910807012.content: Hey! What's up with this bracelet?!

910807013.speaker: 执明
910807013.content: Wait, why should I care what you think...

910807014.speaker: 我
910807014.content: It might be strange to echo that in my current situation, but there's actually not much point in caring about what other people think.

910807015.speaker: 执明
910807015.content: As Aether Gazer's Administrator, you surely have your own perspectrive on Modifiers that would be worth taking into consideration.

910807016.content: Before I can respond, Zhiming, having concluded her logically sound argument, reaches out and grabs my wrist. I can feel an overwhelming intensity in the coolness of her fingertips.

910807018.speaker: 执明
910807018.content: I'm not letting you go until you've given me an honest and comprehensive evaluation.

910808002.speaker: 执明
910808002.content: That's too broad of an answer.

910808003.speaker: 我
910808003.content: I can't think of anything I need at the moment. But I'd enjoy any thoughtful gift that a friend gives me.

910808004.speaker: 执明
910808004.content: Then do you prefer practical or decorative gifts?

910808005.speaker: 执明
910808005.content: And do you prefer to be surprised by what you're getting or to know what it is in advance? Do you feel disappointed when you don't receive a gift on an anniversary, or do you prefer regular, thoughtful gestures?

910808006.speaker: 我
910808006.content: That's, uh... a very detailed question.

910808008.speaker: 我
910808008.content: If I have to say something, you can never go wrong with giving me Ain Soph Coins!

910808010.speaker: 我
910808010.content: Does this mean you want to get a gift for me?

910808014.speaker: 执明
910808014.content: I found a gift shop on that street up ahead.

910808015.speaker: 执明
910808015.content: Before you embarrass the both of us, let me make one thing clear first—you can't just go in and pick the most expensive item they have.

910809002.speaker: 执明
910809002.content: And I wasn't planning to give you one.

910809007.content: Amid the repeated announcements from the bracelet, Zhiming and I look at each other and silently agree to stop talking for the moment.

910809008.speaker: 我
910809008.content: Looks like being too polite isn't good, either, especially not in the presence of a lie detector.

910809009.speaker: 我
910809009.content: In that case, why don't we try being a little more honest and do a gift exchange?

910809011.speaker: 我
910809011.content: Huh, I thought you'd tell me that was a childish idea.

910809012.speaker: 执明
910809012.content: Gengchen once organized a similar activity for everyone at the Quad. Although, it was only because Luliang had stockpiled a bunch of goods when she first started up her business...

910809013.content: As she recollects the event to herself in a low voice, her cheeks rise up to form a faint smile. That lasts until her gaze happens to meet mine.

910809015.speaker: 执明
910809015.content: I wasn't talking about that to gain your sympathy or goodwill. I just happened to think of it.

910809016.speaker: 执明
910809016.content: And I certainly don't need you to pander to me during a gift exchange.

910809017.speaker: 我
910809017.content: What? Since when is a gift exchange something that requires people to pander to each other...?

910809018.speaker: 执明
910809018.content: So, shall we decide on the rules and deadline now?

910809019.speaker: 执明
910809019.content: I will prepare the superior gift. I won't lose to you.

910113002.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910113002.content: Over here, Admin! We've been waiting for you!

910113003.speaker: 我
910113003.content: What's going on here? What's everybody up to?

910113004.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910113004.content: Lingguang is showing us how to write wish tags, Admin. You can help us put them up on the tree later.

910113006.content: I look at Ver, then at Lingguang, with some puzzlement.

910113007.speaker: 陵光
910113007.content: This is a custom of the people of Nanjiao Isle. You see that tree over there, Admin? It's very old—it survived the Cloudsong Crisis, though it didn't used to look like that.

910113008.speaker: 我
910113008.content: It's definitely not the size of a century-old tree.

910113009.speaker: 陵光
910113009.content: Well, the Chinese banyan tree is a tree that can grow in profusion. The one we have on Nanjiao Isle is very large and difficult to move. Besides, we couldn't possibly transplant a tree that the people of Nanjiao believe is a source of good luck all the way over to Yu Jing.

910113010.speaker: 陵光
910113010.content: This occurred while we were brainstorming for the New Year's Awakening celebration, so I asked someone from Tian Lu Traders to get us a similar tree.

910113011.speaker: 我
910113011.content: I see... So what are the things you're putting on the tree? I saw Ver holding some of them, too.

910113012.speaker: 陵光
910113012.content: Why doesn't she tell you more about them?

910113013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910113013.content: The people of Nanjiao Isle typically write well wishes for friends, relatives, and even strangers on slips of paper or small wooden signs, then hang them on the tree's branches.

910113014.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910113014.content: Passersby are also free to look at them. A few minutes ago, I saw an old man writing down his wish for health and happiness.

910113016.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910113016.content: I haven't had the time to do mine yet...

910113017.speaker: 薇儿
910113017.content: ... Why don't you write down some well wishes for people too, Admin!

910113018.content: I decide not to draw attention to how abruptly Ver changed the subject.

910113019.speaker: 我
910113019.content: Sure! Then we can hang up both of ours together and I'll be able to see what you write.

910113021.content: I'm holding Ver steady so she can hang the wishes we wrote on the tree.

910113022.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910113022.content: Do you think mine's a little crooked...?

910113023.speaker: 我
910113023.content: No, it looks good to me.

910113024.speaker: 陵光
910113024.content: I heard there's an event going on here, that's aiming to collect as many signatures as possible. Once they've gotten the number they need, some small gifts will be given out. You can come every day to check for them, Admin.

910113025.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910113025.content: Let's return here later, Admin. Who knows—we might even get some replies!

910113026.speaker: 陵光
910113026.content: Oh, look at the time—Luliang must be waiting for us at the Pavilion of Flavors now. Let's quickly add our signatures and then head off.

910113027.speaker: 我
910113027.content: I guess I'll have to wait until next time to see what Ver wished for.

910114001.speaker: ？？？（山奈）
910114001.content: Dad, am I imagining things, or did I see visitors from Tian Lu Traders here recently?

910114002.speaker: ？？？（松鹤）
910114002.content: Yeah, they asked me to go and cook for them. But I already said no.

910114003.speaker: ？？？（松鹤）
910114003.content: My back is terrible enough as is. There's no way I can return to that kitchen. But if you want to go...

910114004.speaker: ？？？（山奈）
910114004.content: The person they want is you, not me.

910114005.speaker: ？？？（山奈）
910114005.content: I have to get going. Remember to take your medicine—it's on the table. I'll be back to prep for the reunion dinner... If you get tired, just leave the rest to me.

910114006.speaker: ？？？（松鹤）
910114006.content: Go, go, go. I'll have dinner ready for you!

910114007.content: Yingzhao and Luliang have been busy dealing with the renovations and soft re-opening of the Pavilion of Flavors. The last piece of the puzzle finally falls into place on the day of New Year's Awakening.

910114008.speaker: 英招
910114008.content: Alright, here's a report on the demographics, as well as the likes and dislikes, of the customers from our soft launch...

910114009.speaker: 英招
910114009.content: The kitchen has already made the necessary adjustments based on the report. We can proceed with the grand opening tonight.

910114010.speaker: 禄良
910114010.content: Oh, you lovely, efficient creature, Yingzhao! I know I can always count on our head butler.

910114011.speaker: 禄良
910114011.content: You've been hard at work for such a long time. But tonight, you'll get to enjoy the marvelous creations of our head chef!

910114012.speaker: 禄良
910114012.content: It's a pity, though... We didn't manage to bring back our previous head chef. His food is just a tiny bit better.

910114013.speaker: 禄良
910114013.content: But tell me, Yingzhao, are there any restaurants you've visited, or dishes you've tasted, that have left a deep impression on you?

910114014.content: Yingzhao isn't sure where Luliang is going with this sudden change of topic, but she answers anyway, like a good employee would.

910114015.speaker: 英招
910114015.content: Well, there was this little snack place Linyu and I visited when we were on the streets... They had pretty good steamed buns.

910114016.speaker: 禄良
910114016.content: Hmm... Where was this place, and is it still in business?

910114017.speaker: 英招
910114017.content: I heard that the owner moved to Yu Jing along with their family. I don't think I've seen the snack shop here, though, so they might have switched to another line of work.

910114018.speaker: 禄良
910114018.content: What a pity. I'd love to try their steamed buns...

910114019.speaker: 英招
910114019.content:
Last week, you promised I could have three days off once we were done with these two things.
Linyu is really looking forward to the Awakening celebration on Banchuan Street tonight.

910114020.speaker: 禄良
910114020.content: Well, of course. Just help me out with this one last thing and you can have your time off with Linyu.

910114021.speaker: 禄良
910114021.content: And it's a quick one, too. I just need you to deliver a message to someone.

910114023.speaker: 天禄贸易员工
910114023.content: Director Yingzhao! Oh, Boss. You're here too.

910114024.content: Luliang gestures at the graceless young man, telling him to get straight to the point.

910114025.speaker: 天禄贸易员工
910114025.content: There's a strange person outside who claims to be a friend of Director Yingzhao's. I don't know if she's telling the truth, but she definitely looks very serious... I came to let you know, as I'm not sure what to do.

910114026.content: A girl dressed in bright yellow is anxiously pacing the hall. It's only when she hears footsteps approaching that she stops and starts looking around instead.

910114028.speaker: 英招
910114028.content:
This is my boss, Luliang.
This is Jinwu. She helped me out when I had to deal with the San Ding Group and the conflict over the Songjade mine.

910114029.speaker: 禄良
910114029.content: Ah. You must be Madam Xihe's disciple.

910114030.speaker: 金乌
910114030.content: My greetings to you, Miss Luliang! ... Do you know my teacher?

910114031.speaker: 禄良
910114031.content: I've had the good fortune of meeting her a few times.

910114032.speaker: 禄良
910114032.content: You seem to be quite clever, and you already know Yingzhao. Would you be interested in joining us at Tian Lu Traders, by any chance?

910114033.speaker: 金乌
910114033.content: Oh, no, no, no. I vowed when I became my master's disciple that I'd be loyal to Ruomu Palace for the rest of my life.

910114034.speaker: 英招
910114034.content:
Boss, please don't joke with her like that...
So tell me, Jinwu, why are you here? What can I do for you?

910114036.content: Jinwu had hurried back to the top of the mountain, but when she reaches it, she finds Ruomu Palace deserted.

910114039.content: The doll in Jinwu's hand wriggles restlessly a few times, forcing her to pause and put another spell on it.

910114040.content: Nian has started gathering Bane Energy again lately, causing the seal placed on it to weaken a little. While it's still working, there's also been some times when it moves.

910114041.content: With New Year's Awakening coming, this is definitely an ominous sign.

910114042.content: Jinwu came to Xihe as a last resort, hoping to find a solution. However, there's no sign of Xihe anywhere in Ruomu Palace. After some time, Jinwu comes across a note in an inconspicuous corner.

910114044.content:
I'll be away for a few days to stock up on supplies for the New Year's Awakening.
See you when I get back.

910114046.content: Jinwu stands at the edge of the cliff and summons her Tenblaze as she tries to recall the sword-control mantra Mengzhang taught her.

910114047.speaker: 金乌
910114047.content: Finally! I get to experience this outside of the painted realm!

910114048.speaker: 金乌
910114048.content: High in the heavens, the flying sword-bearer goes... UP!

910114049.content: Jinwu takes a deep breath, then leaps into the air...

910114051.content: The birds in the woods bear witness to Jinwu dramatically dropping downwards.

910114052.speaker: 金乌
910114052.content: Heh heh, who said flying's hard. I've already gotten the hang of it— AHHHHHHH!

910114053.content: Not even three seconds after making this gleeful proclamation, Jinwu suddenly bumps into something that's passing by and almost falls again.

910114054.content: After steadying herself, she looks over her shoulder and spots a swan goose flying about haphazardly, dispersing groups of smaller birds as she flies into them.

910114055.speaker: 金乌
910114055.content: Hey! How dare you be such a big bully! And right under the nose of the mighty Sun Chaser!

910114057.content: Not only does the swan goose appear unapologetic despite Jinwu's chastisement, she even shamelessly flies around her while making noises of blatant contempt.

910114058.speaker: 金乌
910114058.content: You stupid bird! How dare you?! Stop right there! I'm going to teach you a lesson today!

910114059.content: Jinwu rushes forward using the Tenblaze. The swan goose, sensing something awry in the air around her, quickly changes her flight path.

910114060.content: The chase goes on for quite some time, ultimately ending when the swan goose flies into a tree, fatigued. Jinwu grabs ahold of the bird's wings, then ties her up using some tree branches on the ground.

910114061.speaker: 金乌
910114061.content: Here in Xu Heng, everyone must abide by the local rules of air traffic! You must give way to other, um, birds! Do you understand?!

910114063.content: The tired—and very bound-up—bird nods weakly.

910114064.speaker: 金乌
910114064.content: But since this is your first offense, and you've shown contrition, I'll let you off just with a warning. But if I catch you doing this again... hmph!

910114067.content: Jinwu undoes the bindings, then smooth out the bird's feathers. After watching the bird fly away obediently, she sighs with much satisfaction, hands resting on hips.

910114068.speaker: 金乌
910114068.content: Although it took some time, I've successfully persuaded a swan goose gone astray to return to the path of righteousness. I'm sure Master will be happy about this!

910114069.content: But when Jinwu reaches an arm behind her, she discovers something's missing, and her expression suddenly changes.

910114070.speaker: 金乌
910114070.content: Oh no—where's Nian? Is it on a tree somewhere? No... What about in the grass? No...! What about... Why can't I find it anywhere?!

910114071.speaker: 金乌
910114071.content: If only that stupid bird hadn't crash into me...!

910114072.content: And then, seeming to suddenly remember something, Jinwu immediately turns around and carefully traces her steps. But there's still nothing.

910114073.speaker: 金乌
910114073.content: Oh, right—I put a tracking spell on Nian, just in case... But... why is it moving???

910114074.speaker: 金乌
910114074.content: I saw the mark just blinking away, and so I chased after it... and chased, and chased, and chased! And before I knew it, I was here!

910114075.content: It takes Jinwu a little bit of time, and plenty of acting it out, but she finally finishes the entire story of how she got to this point.

910114077.content: Jinwu puts her hands on her hips in a rather smug manner, although no one present has any idea why.

910114078.speaker: 禄良
910114078.content: Hold on, what is this "Nian" thing you're talking about? Can you give us a little more background?

910114080.speaker: 禄良
910114080.content: So, you're saying the Visbane is probably here...?

910114081.speaker: 金乌
910114081.content: No, I didn't say that. I only came here to ask for help because I spotted a familiar emblem.

910114082.speaker: 英招
910114082.content: Help? Should I call for backup, too?

910114083.speaker: 金乌
910114083.content: No. With you and I together, we should be able to subdue it quite easily.

910114084.speaker: 英招
910114084.content: Then how did you lose it in the first place?

910114085.speaker: 金乌
910114085.content: Well, um... I... I... because... Yu Jing's so big, that's why! And there are so many people here!

910114086.speaker: 金乌
910114086.content: I followed the trail all the way here, and I was this close to catching it when I found myself in a dead end. That was where I lost it.

910114087.speaker: 金乌
910114087.content: You know, this place is so much harder to get out of than my master's Ruomu Tableau. I might still be lost now, had I not seen your emblem out there.

910114088.content: As absurd as Jinwu's response is, Yingzhao isn't too surprised. She looks at Jinwu, who's pouting away, then sighs in resignation and looks over at Luliang.

910114090.speaker: 禄良
910114090.content: You can go take care of this business with Nian.

910114091.speaker: 禄良
910114091.content: And since I have a description of Nian now, I'll let the folks at the Quad know so that they can help look for it too.

910114093.speaker: 金乌
910114093.content: W-wait just a moment, Yingzhao... Let me try to sense where Nian is first.

910114095.content: Jinwu, whose mind had been wandering a little, immediately clicks her heels together. She then closes her eyes, rubs the fingers of her right hand together, and mutters something that Yingzhao and Luliang don't understand.

910114097.speaker: 金乌
910114097.content: I've picked up some traces of Nian's essence. It's coming from over there!

910115001.content: Although Jinwu swears that she's following the trail left behind by Nian, to Yingzhao, it looks like she's just running around aimlessly.

910115002.content: The first location Jinwu homes in on is a Vermilion Wellness outlet in Yu Jing.

910115003.content: Jinwu barges in before Yingzhao can knock, startling a patient who's waiting for a prescription to be filled. Yingzhao hurriedly tugs at Jinwu's sleeve, and the two of them make profuse apologies while simultaneously looking around. But their search turns up nothing.

910115004.content: Then they follow the trail to the shopping district, which is full of visitors who've come for the Awakening celebration. While taking care to not bump into other pedestrians, Yingzhao follows closely behind Jinwu as the latter darts left and right.

910115005.content: Then the two of them come to a snack stall.

910115006.speaker: 金乌
910115006.content: A bowl of noodles for me, please! With extra spicy sauce and scallions!

910115007.speaker: 英招
910115007.content: Are you sure Nian was here, or are you just hungry?

910115008.speaker: 金乌
910115008.content: Of course Nian was here! The Astral Arcanum says that it was definitely here. But why can't we find it... (Slurp)

910115009.speaker: 英招
910115009.content: How about we go talk to the folks at the Quad—

910115011.speaker: 英招
910115011.content: You need to finish your noodles fir— Oh. You're already done.

910115012.content: Jinwu has put down her bowl and dashed off. Yingzhao sighs again, pays for the meal, and follows.

910115013.content: Before they know it, they've left the busiest part of the shopping district and come to a quiet street corner.

910115014.content: In the middle of the road here, there stands a tall and lush Chinese banyan tree, from which many tags with wishes written on them are hanging. They can hear the musical sound of wood knocking against wood as the tags sway gently in the breeze.

910115015.speaker: 金乌
910115015.content: Huh? This tree... it looks so familiar.

910115016.speaker: 英招
910115016.content: Ah. Deputy Lingguang wanted to have a tree like the one on the border between Yang Valley and Nanjiao here, to bring some good luck to the people in Yu Jing. She asked Tian Lu Traders to get a similar one from Nanjiao Isle.

910115017.speaker: 金乌
910115017.content: Ah. No wonder it's a little small.

910115018.speaker: 英招
910115018.content: ...Let's focus on the task at hand. Can you still sense Nian?

910115019.speaker: 金乌
910115019.content: Very faintly. Do you think Nian is hiding from us because it knows we're looking for it???

910115020.content: Yingzhao also checks in with the Quad to see if anyone there has come across Nian. But none of them have.

910115021.speaker: 英招
910115021.content: The Quad has already sent out people to look for Nian. But they're a little shorthanded, since they have to handle security for the event tonight.

910115022.content: Jinwu becomes a little dejected when she hears this. However, her brow is still furrowed and her fingers pinched tightly together, like she's trying really hard to sense something.

910115023.content: Yingzhao sits herself down on a stone slab near the wishing tree. She looks up at the wooden tags hanging above her and allows herself to zone out for a moment.

910115024.speaker: ？？？（陆吾）
910115024.content: Yingzhao? What are you doing here?

910115025.content: Some indeterminate amount of time later, she's brought back to reality by the sound of a cheerful voice.

910115026.content: And before Yingzhao can say anything, Jinwu suddenly pops up beside her.

910115027.speaker: 金乌
910115027.content: Yingzhao! I can sense traces of Nian on her!!!

910115028.content: Jinwu swiftly rushes toward the person in question, aiming to grab ahold of her. But there's a tall lady between them, whom Jinwu has to get by first.

910115029.content: Although Luwu doesn't sense much hostility from the person coming from behind her, the sudden approach still causes her to assume a defensive stance and place herself between this new arrival and Shannai.

910115031.content: Yingzhao has also been surprised by Jinwu's sudden move, but after a moment, she rushes to stop her.

910115032.speaker: 英招
910115032.content: Are you saying that there are traces of Nian's Bane Energy on her?

910115033.speaker: 陆吾
910115033.content: Bane Energy? Ah, I see now... But what is "Nian"?

910115035.content: Pulling Luwu aside, Yingzhao gives her a brief explanation of what's happened.

910115036.speaker: 金乌
910115036.content: Although the seal on Nian is still in place, every year, around New Year's Awakening, it starts to absorb evil energy more quickly than it did before.

910115037.speaker: 金乌
910115037.content: What if the seal fails and Nian escapes? It'll create such a mess.... (Whimper) What if it scares everybody... (Whimper)

910115038.speaker: 陆吾
910115038.content: ... I don't think that's likely to happen. But let me think.

910115039.speaker: 陆吾
910115039.content: Boss. Yes, I'm on my way back now... Huh? You want me to go see someone?

910115040.speaker: 陆吾
910115040.content: You've sent me the address already? Okay, let me take a look... Hmm. Boss. By any chance, is the person you want me to see... Master Song He?

910115041.speaker: 陆吾
910115041.content: He's on my way. Yes, I'll make sure that he gets your message...

910115042.speaker: ？？？（山奈）
910115042.content: Luwu? It's been a while! But you haven't changed a single bit.

910115044.speaker: 陆吾
910115044.content: This is good timing. I'm about to go see your father...

910115045.content: Luwu looks rather surprised to see the person behind her. She instinctively reaches out to help Shannai with a shopping bag she's holding, but is politely rebuffed. The bag has the emblem of Vermilion Wellness printed on it.

910115046.content: It is this slightly shortened distance between the two that allows Luwu to faintly sense a strange energy fluctuation.

910115048.speaker: 山奈
910115048.content: It's my dad. Same old problem. Anyway, why do you want to see him? Is it because you miss his cooking?

910115049.speaker: 陆吾
910115049.content: It's been a while since I tasted his cooking, yeah. But no, it's about something else...

910115050.speaker: 陆吾
910115050.content: You must know by now that the Pavilion of Flavors was acquired by Tian Lu Traders. And you know most of the chefs who worked there were your father's apprentices at one time or another.

910115051.speaker: 山奈
910115051.content: Ah... you want to ask him to return to the Pavilion of Flavors, too.

910115052.speaker: 陆吾
910115052.content: Yeah. What do you think about it?

910115053.speaker: 山奈
910115053.content: I don't think it's going to happen. You're not the first person Tian Lu Traders has sent to talk to my dad.

910115054.speaker: 山奈
910115054.content: You will have to be very, very convincing...

910115055.speaker: 陆吾
910115055.content: Hmm... Hold on. What about you?

910115056.speaker: 陆吾
910115056.content: As I recall, he taught you how to cook, too. I've tasted your food before, and it pretty much tastes like his.

910115057.speaker: 山奈
910115057.content: Oh, you flatter me—I could never fill his shoes. But I'll take you to him. Still, it'll be your job to change his mind.

910115058.speaker: 陆吾
910115058.content: That's fine. It's been a long time since I last saw him, anyway. I should go say hello, at the very least.

910115060.content: Luwu thinks for a moment, then walks over to Shannai. Jinwu quickly follows her.

910115061.speaker: 陆吾
910115061.content: Shannai, could you tell me where you've been so far today?

910115062.speaker: 山奈
910115062.content: Hmm... In the morning, I was at Vermilion Wellness to get some medicine for my dad, then I went to the street market right next to it to buy a door couplet. Then at noon, I had a bowl of wontons at Linlang Lane, and after that, I bumped into you here.

910115063.speaker: 陆吾
910115063.content: It's the exact same route... Did you see a doll, by any chance?

910115064.speaker: 陆吾
910115064.content: Oh, don't worry, nothing bad is happening. It's just that a friend of mine lost her doll, and it seems you went to the same places as it did today.

910115065.speaker: 金乌
910115065.content: Yup, yup. It's about this tall... and it's kind of gray. And it has this ring in its mouth.

910115066.speaker: 山奈
910115066.content: That sounds kind of familiar. Let me think...

910115067.speaker: 山奈
910115067.content: I think my dad broguht a doll home with him yesterday evening, and it sounds like the doll this young lady is describing. Maybe it's the one you're looking for.

910115068.speaker: 陆吾
910115068.content: It's a lead we definitely have to follow up on. Do you know where the doll is now?

910115069.speaker: 山奈
910115069.content: Not really... Why don't you come home with me and take a look?

910115070.speaker: 英招
910115070.content: We will, thank you. Sorry to trouble you.

910115071.content: When Shannai opens the door, the group is immediately greeted by a warm, cozy sense of home.

910115072.content: The dining table is covered with dishes that look to be fresh out of the wok, but they don't see anyone there.

910115073.speaker: 山奈
910115073.content: Dad, I'm back. And I brought some guests with me.

910115074.content: A sprightly looking older gentleman walks out of the kitchen, drying his hand on his apron as he does so.

910115075.speaker: 松鹤
910115075.content: Oh? You're Luwu, aren't you? You haven't changed a single bit!

910115076.speaker: 陆吾
910115076.content: Your daughter said the exact same thing to me earlier.

910115077.speaker: 松鹤
910115077.content: Haha. From the look of things, though, you aren't here to just catch up with me, are you?

910115078.content: Shannai puts down the thing she's been holding and goes to get some tea for everyone.

910115079.speaker: 山奈
910115079.content:
Please make yourselves comfortable, everyone.
Dad, do you remember that gray doll you brought home yesterday? Where is it now?

910115080.speaker: 松鹤
910115080.content: Oh, yes, that doll. I waited in the place I found it for some time, since it was in perfectly good condition and I was hoping someone would return for it, but no one did.

910115081.speaker: 松鹤
910115081.content: Then I remembered you liked things like this when you were a child, so I brought it home for you.

910115082.speaker: 英招
910115082.content: Do you remember where you put it?

910115083.speaker: 松鹤
910115083.content: Hmm? I saw it on the couch just now, before I went into the kitchen. Where did it go?

910115084.speaker: 金乌
910115084.content: Oh no—did it run away again because it sensed us coming???

910115085.speaker: 英招
910115085.content: The Bane Energy in here is so strong... Jinwu, are you still able to pinpoint Nian's location?

910115086.speaker: 金乌
910115086.content: Not in here. This place is full of its essence.

910115087.speaker: 英招
910115087.content: Let's step outside for a second.

910115089.content: The trio immediately dash out of Shannai's home. There, they spot a massive, beastly Visbane right in the middle of the street.

910115090.speaker: 玉京居民B
910115090.content: That can't be a real monster. I bet it's something a company cooked up for publicity. I'm going to take a closer look!

910115091.speaker: 玉京居民A
910115091.content: Best of luck to you—I'm out of here!

910115092.speaker: 金乌
910115092.content: Oh no!! Nian's broken free of the seal after all!!

910115093.speaker: 陆吾
910115093.content: This is not good. Everyone's coming this way now.

910115094.speaker: 英招
910115094.content: We have to stop it and get it out of the street.

910115095.speaker: 英招
910115095.content: Luwu, can you disperse the crowd? Jinwu and I will deal with the beast.

910115096.speaker: 金乌
910115096.content: It's afraid of the color red and the sound of firecrackers!

910115097.speaker: 陆吾
910115097.content: Got it. Be quick, you two.

910115098.speaker: 金乌
910115098.content: If I can seal once, I can seal you a second time!

910116001.content: Having worked together before, Jinwu and Yingzhao easily slip back into a partnership. They strategically set off firecrackers to drive Nian away from the crowds and buildings.

910116002.content: Finally, after Jinwu unleashes a powerful slash with her sword, Nian turns into a cloud of gas and transforms back into a doll.

910116003.speaker: 陆吾
910116003.content: You're done? Looks like I came at the right time. So this is Nian, then?

910116004.speaker: 金乌
910116004.content: Mm-hmm! And this time I'm gonna place ten seals—no, a hundred seals on it!

910116007.speaker: 陆吾
910116007.content: I've dispersed the crowd. I told them this was a special effects show organized by Tian Lu Traders.

910116009.speaker: 陆吾
910116009.content: Don't worry about it. Now that the matter's been resolved, there's no need to dwell on it further... I can't believe this cute little doll caused such a big commotion!

910116010.speaker: 英招
910116010.content: I'll let the Quad know about this so they can call off their search, too. Are you all done with what you needed to do?

910116011.speaker: 陆吾
910116011.content: Oh, shoot. I was so busy with this, I completely forgot about Shannai and Master Songhe!

910116012.speaker: 英招
910116012.content: Then let's head back there together. We ought to tell them what happened, anyway.

910116013.speaker: 陆吾
910116013.content: Sounds good. I still have to deliver the message.

910116014.speaker: 山奈
910116014.content: Are you all alright? I heard someone yelling for help just now.

910116015.speaker: 陆吾
910116015.content: Eh... Heh... It was... a tourist. A tourist who was freaked out by a special effects show, that's all.

910116016.speaker: 陆吾
910116016.content: Master Songhe, I'm actually here to ask you to come back and be head chef at the Pavilion of Flavors.

910116017.speaker: 松鹤
910116017.content: (Sigh) I knew it—the moment you came through that door, I knew you would ask that. I had people from Tian Lu Traders make the same request of me a few days ago.

910116018.speaker: 松鹤
910116018.content: But I'm getting on in years, and I can't move around like I used to. I have to take so much medicine every day...

910116019.speaker: 陆吾
910116019.content: Our boss says you don't have to stand over the stove yourself. All you have to do is to guide the other chefs.

910116020.content: Songhe is quiet for a moment, then he lets out a deep exhale.

910116021.speaker: 松鹤
910116021.content: I know what you want. But you can make that happen even if I don't return.

910116022.speaker: 松鹤
910116022.content: Shannai has been in the kitchen with me since she was a child. She first picked up a wok when she was five, and by the time she was ten, she had better knife skills than some professional chefs out there.

910116023.speaker: 松鹤
910116023.content: She could have found herself a great job if she hadn't insisted on staying to take care of me.

910116024.speaker: 山奈
910116024.content: Dad, I already told you so many times—I'm happy to be here with you.

910116025.speaker: 松鹤
910116025.content: Luwu, help me out here. You'd be doing her a huge favor, too.

910116026.content: Luwu opens her mouth, but ultimately decides not to say anything.

910116027.content: Both father and daughter are acting out of love for each other. This isn't the place for someone on the outside to voice their opinion.

910116028.content: Songhe gets to his feet and goes to his bedroom, leaving the younger crowd to speak amongst themselves.

910116029.speaker: 英招
910116029.content: What are your thoughts on this, Miss Shannai?

910116030.speaker: 山奈
910116030.content: I... I don't know. My dad is in poor health, and I honestly ought to stay with him.

910116031.speaker: 金乌
910116031.content: But do you like to cook?

910116032.speaker: 山奈
910116032.content: I guess... I like to see people enjoy the food I make.

910116033.speaker: 金乌
910116033.content: The restaurant isn't too far from here, so you'd be able to come back and look in on your father whenever you wanted.

910116034.speaker: 山奈
910116034.content: To be honest, I haven't cooked much for people outside of my immediate family. But everyone who's tasted my cooking, including my dad, says that I'm good...

910116035.speaker: 山奈
910116035.content: I have no idea how good I really am. I don't want to go out there and end up embarrassing my dad.

910116036.speaker: 金乌
910116036.content: I think, Miss Shannai, you should give the job a shot.

910116038.speaker: 金乌
910116038.content: What? Did I say something wrong? But if you give up before you even try, how would you know you can't do it?!

910116039.speaker: 英招
910116039.content: This isn't about whether you're right or wrong. It's about what Miss Shannai thinks, and what she wants.

910116040.speaker: 金乌
910116040.content: But the problem is that she doesn't know what to do!

910116041.speaker: 金乌
910116041.content: Besides, doesn't her father's opinion matter, too? Even the person who believes in her most said she should go for it!

910116042.speaker: 陆吾
910116042.content: Stop, stop. Why are the two of you arguing right now?

910116043.speaker: 山奈
910116043.content: I've been thinking about this wrong.

910116044.content: This sudden pronouncement from Shannai causes everyone in the room to fall silent. Everyone is looking at her now.

910116045.speaker: 山奈
910116045.content: I'm the one who's been holding myself back. I'd forgotten that I'm the daughter of Songhe, former head chef of the Pavilion of Flavors.

910116046.speaker: 山奈
910116046.content: Even if I haven't mastered all of my dad's skills, I shouldn't use his health as an excuse to not take a step out into the world.

910116047.speaker: 山奈
910116047.content: I've decided, Luwu. I'm going to try for a position at the Pavilion.

910116048.speaker: 金乌
910116048.content: That's the spirit.... Ow, ow, ow! Let go of me, Yingzhao!

910116051.speaker: 陆吾
910116051.content: Then welcome to the Tian Lu Traders family.

910116052.content: On the way back to the restaurant, Yingzhao walks in the back, holding Jinwu's hand.

910116053.speaker: 英招
910116053.content: Did you do that on purpose just now? It actually worked.

910116054.speaker: 金乌
910116054.content: I have no idea what you're talking about! All I did was to say what I thought. I didn't lie or anything!

910116055.speaker: 英招
910116055.content: ... True. I was totally overthinking it.

910116056.content: For some reason, Yingzhao decides to make a report of the incident to Luliang herself. She resigns herself to her fate while looking over at Luwu and Jinwu, who are flanking Shannai on either side and intently watching her work.

910116057.speaker: 英招
910116057.content: Jinwu told me that Nian abhors firecrackers and the color red. So that's why it didn't do much damage to the town area.

910116058.speaker: 禄良
910116058.content: While there wasn't much damage done, cleaning up is still going to cost quite a bit.

910116059.speaker: 英招
910116059.content: Jinwu says she'll take responsibility... I can help bear some of the costs, too.

910116060.speaker: 禄良
910116060.content: (Scoff) You don't have to be so serious. I'm just glad that we sorted out the Nian issue. Though I sure wasn't expecting everything to come together so nicely.

910116061.speaker: 英招
910116061.content: Yeah, we really did kill two birds with one stone this time.

910116062.speaker: 禄良
910116062.content: That's right. Although we didn't manage to bring Master Song He back in the end, we still got someone who was taught by him. Not bad at all.

910116063.speaker: 英招
910116063.content: Boss, why were you so insistent about getting Master Songhe to return?

910116064.speaker: 禄良
910116064.content: After he retired due to his injury, the new owner of the Pavilion of Flavors wanted to grow the business and decided launching some creative new dishes was the best way to do so. While this gimmick did make some money initially, the novelty soon wore off for diners.

910116065.speaker: 禄良
910116065.content: And as the report you showed me also tells us, the demographcis of the restaurant's customers are very uneven right now in terms of age group, and few customers return. The growth is coming from new customers who've never eaten before at this century-old establishment and came because of its name.

910116066.speaker: 英招
910116066.content: The Pavilion of Flavors's reputation took a real hit from the creative dish strategy. Having Master Songhe return would have signaled to everyone...

910116067.speaker: 禄良
910116067.content: That innovation and progress are happening all the time, and the ones who can't keep up will be left behind.

910116068.speaker: 禄良
910116068.content: But they haven't disappeared, and they still have a significant voice.

910116069.speaker: 禄良
910116069.content: This is the customer segment that we're after.

910116070.speaker: 英招
910116070.content: So... this was just about making money, then?

910116071.content: Luliang flashes a sly smile, then walks out of the restaurant's dining room with her hands behind her back.

910116072.speaker: 禄良
910116072.content: Of course, there's a little part of me that just wants to taste those familiar dishes again.

910116073.speaker: 禄良
910116073.content: Come on, let's go—the guests from the Quad and Aether Gazer will be here soon. It's time to go out and greet them.

910116074.content: Luliang emerges from the building at just the right time.

910116075.content: She waves her arms, greeting both the new friends in front of her as well as her old friends behind her.

910116076.content: The seasons may come and go, but some people and some things never change.

410141003.content: It's customary to knock on a door three times, then say a few words to identify yourself. Zhiming glances at the crack in the door, then continues fiddling with her terminal's holographic screen, head lowered.

410141004.content: She keeps fiddling until she hears someone inside say, "Come in." A floating shield gathers around her. It slowly rotates until it's horizontal, then stretches forward to push open the door.

410141006.content: If there's business on Shuofang Isle you need to see to first, we can talk later.

410141007.content: Zhiming exhales deeply and shakes her head. She puts away her Access Key and walks over to Gengchen's desk. As she leans on the table, she picks up the cup of tea that's sitting there and takes a sip.

410141008.content:
No. Let's talk about the research institute.
We spoke last week about the program that can repair Access Keys.

410141009.content: The Ethereal Enigma has been with you for almost seven years now. Why are you suddenly interested in fixing it?

410141010.content: It's not sudden. Although I've managed to make it workable, I can't just pretend that it's fully functional.

410141011.content: I think it's fine as it is. It has both offensive and defensive capabilities, and it can also be used as a transportation tool and test bed.

410141012.content: Please... The Astral Engine does one thing and one thing only, right? You want something that excels at one thing, not a mediocre, Swiss Army knife of a gadget.

410141013.content: Those fragments are capable of providing immense computing power and improving the efficiency of Divine Grace processing. It'd be a waste to use them in Ethereal Enigma's core.

410141014.content: If we can restore them to their original state, we'd have an Access Key with a considerable amount of power.

410141015.content: But the Key might not work for you.

410141016.content: That's something we can think about later... Processing complete. You may continue now.

410141017.content: Both of them appear to be multitasking. Gengchen has continued working on the documents on her desk, and Zhiming has no intention of putting down her terminal.

410141018.content: I need you to make a trip to Shashvat.

410141020.content:
It's Modifier business.
Go see Brahmā at Meruism and borrow the Book of All Past from her.

410141022.content: She is a Prime Modifier, Zhiming. You must watch your tongue when you're with her.

410141023.content: Odin will arrive in Xu Heng in a couple of days. The two of us will be searching for the Cinders, so I may be away for some time.

410141024.content: Don't worry if you can't reach me. Stay at Meruism and find out as much about the Book of All Past as you can—particularly it still works and if it's in safe hands.

410141025.content: Got it... What is this Book of All Past, anyway?

410141026.content: It's said to contain information about everything that's ever happened in Gaea.

410141027.content: And when you say "everything," you mean...?

410141028.content: Yes—absolutely everything that's ever happened across all eras, in every Sephirah Zone, for all matters both big and small.

410141029.content: Don't be mistaken, Brahmā isn't keeping the Book for herself. She's stayed quiet about it because of certain things that happened with CORG. And there's a reason she's secluded herself in a slum in Jivitabad.

410141030.content: You must not talk about this with anyone else, not even the other Modifiers in Meruism, without her permission.

410141033.content:
Works for me, then.
Should I leave now? I can go once I get my work for Shuofang Isle sorted out.

410141034.content: As soon as possible, please. Mengzhang and I will take care of things on Shuofang Isle while you're away.

410141035.content: Speaking of local governance... Gharpur can be quite chaotic, and Meruism's situation is different from ours. Try not to involve yourself in its goings-on while you're there.

410141036.content: So, you're talking "help within the permissible scope," then...

410141037.content: Looks like someone's gotten into trouble over there.

410141039.content: Ha. Since CORG and Meruism don't exactly get along... Who should I side with if trouble arises?

410141040.content: Gengchen looks up at Zhiming, chuckles, and shakes her head.

410141041.content: You're already a deputy of the Quad. You should have the answers now.

410142002.content: Fine particles of light rise above the coffee table, forming a map of Jivitabad. Exclamations can be heard from the Meruism Modifiers all around.

410142003.content: It's really easy to use. I don't think I even need to teach you how. You'll automatically get an alert when it detects Bane Energy. Note that it's Bane Energy and not Visbanes. You could find anything there.

410142004.content: Say, for example, there are a hundred Visbanes gathered in one spot and one of them yawns. You'll see that as only one dot on the map. Is that clear?

410142005.content: Yep! Still beats feeling our way in the dark, like we usually do.

410142006.content: I'm going to the workroom to rest for a bit. Please don't come by unless it's something important.

410142007.content: A yawning Zhiming goes upstairs and unwinds for a little bit with some music and the news. Afterwards, she walks to the door with her emblem on it.

410142008.content: I should finish that Blinder trap I started on yesterday before I take my nap.

410142009.content: Just as she's about to go in, Zhiming hears footsteps behind her. She closes the door again, slightly annoyed, then turns around and gestures at Kali to keep away from the room.

410142010.content: Whatever it is that you need me to do, do you think we coul—

410142013.content: Do you want to see her? She's downstairs right now.

410142014.content: Zhiming's eyes narrow, but she says nothing. She heads downstairs.

410142015.content: It is eerily quiet downstairs. There's none of that excitement or bustle one would expect from the return of a group's leader. Not even Kali is there.

410142016.content: Seeing a short figure sitting on the sofa, her legs crossed and a can of milk tea in her hand, Zhiming shakes her head with some emotion, then sits opposite her unceremoniously.

410142018.content: I told you the last time we met not to call me that... Anyway. I must thank you for the hospitality Meruism has afforded me the past 15 days.

410142019.content: No need to stand on ceremony—we're all so busy here. I only just learned that you're here at Meruism.

410142020.content: ... I've been here for two weeks. You're the leader of Meruism, yet no one here knew where you were.

410142022.content: Is that really the benchmark we're using...

410142023.content: Let's get down to business. I'm here on Gengchen's behalf, as she's on a trip with Odin. She wants to borrow the Book of All Past.

410142025.content: Brahmā nearly loses the big mouthful of milk tea she just took. She stares at Zhiming with her eyes wide for a long time, then vigorously shakes her head several times.

410142026.content:
I can't do that.
I'm not being selfish here, but I can't possibly pass on something I don't even fully understand to you.

410142027.content: ... Don't tell me you don't know how to use it yet.

410142029.content: ... You should tell Gengchen that yourself. Maybe she has the time now.

410142030.content: Brahmā's eyes dart left and right in response. Exasperated, Zhiming massages her temple, then pulls up her communicator to try and reach Gengchen. But there's no answer.

410142031.content: Is she still on that trip with Odin?

410142032.content: If you can't get her on the line, don't worry about it. Gengchen won't be mad at you... What are you doing?

410142033.content: I'm using the Source Code Comms. This uses the very space of Gaea as the medium for data transmission. It allows me to reach Gengchen even if she is in the Source Layer, so long as the spatial structures nearby are stable, like they should b—

410142034.content: Zhiming's explanation is cut off by a sudden flash of golden light in front of her. Her communicator, which had been working as it should just a second ago, disappears like a hologram being turned off.

410142035.content: She raises her head in shock and sees a displeased-looking Brahmā staring at her, arms crossed.

410142036.content: ... What do you think you're doing?!!

410142037.content: You can't use that mode of communication here.

410142038.content: Huh? Are you afraid of causing a scene or drawing CORG's attention? You could have just told me so, you know. You didn't have to get rid of my communicator with your Prime Power.

410142039.content: It can cause serious problems... I'll explain it to you another time.

410142040.content: How about this—why don't you tell me a little more about the Book of All Past now? If it's broken, I can take care of it. I'm a pretty good tech, you know.

410142041.content: Oh really? Heh heh... If that's the case, we might be able to try something...

410142042.content: ... Did you come to see me because of that?

410142043.content: Of course. I only thought of it when I saw my clever little Tortie...

410142044.content: You might already have an idea of what Gengchen wants the Book of All Past for. Sit tight, Tortie. I'll take you to it in two weeks.

410142045.content: Two weeks is nothing. We're happy to host you for as long as you like.

410142046.content: Kali puts down a bill so she can give Zhiming the okay sign with her hand. Then she peers around Zhiming a couple of times.

410142050.content: If she had the time to stay and chit-chat, she wouldn't have asked me to hang around for another two weeks.

410142051.content: You should head out with me in a bit. I need to buy a new communicator... Brahmā broke mine. Ugh, there's all these ID verifications I'll only be able to do after I get back to Xu Heng...

410142052.content: Kali has no idea what just transpired between Zhiming and Brahmā. She can only scratch her head in embarrassment where she hears about the broken communicator.

410142053.content: What are you looking at? The accounts?

410142054.content: No, no, the new accounting system you put in place for us is great. Now I don't have to look at the books every day.

410142055.content: I'm looking at a report from the manager of our arena. Lately, a lot of folks have been taking illicit substances before their matches. And it's not just happening there; it's occurring at the other rings, too.

410142056.content: Are we talking stimulants? But I thought they weren't banned in Gharpur.

410142057.content: Na, this is something different. The fights in Shashvat used to always be fair, no matter what.

410142058.content: "Fair"... But I think I remember seeing news about a boxing champion acting oddly, then dying in the ring during an exhibition match. And it happened not too long ago.

410142059.content: … Fights are a type of sport for the average person. In the affluent district, matches are just commercial activities or entertainment.

410142060.content: Clearly, Kali doesn't want to dwell on this topic for some reason. She turns her head and spots a sturdy figure approaching cautiously, and she quickly waves at him.

410142062.content: Azim looks around when he hears the familiar voice, then runs over. Beads of sweat are visible on his bronzed skin.

410142063.content: He's taken aback when he notices Zhiming. He looks at Kali again, making sure that this stranger is with her.

410142065.content:
Ah, um... This is our honored guest, Miss Zhiming.
Zhiming, this is Azim. He often fights in our arena.

410142066.content: Are you... from Xu Heng? Wow. This is the first time I've met someone from there.

410142067.content: ... Ah, well, it's just a place.

410142068.content: Ha ha ha, don't say that. Generally speaking, people who can make use of the Photon Rail don't come to Gharpur much. We don't see many faces from the other Sephirah Zones.

410142069.content: Azim, I heard that the fellow you were fighting against just now was on some kind of drug?

410142070.content: Yup. He was on Frenzyx. There's no other way he could have dodged my front jabs.

410142072.content: That's right. We fighters, we all know about this stuff. I still have one of those pills here... I was given it by someone.

410142073.content: Azim produces a small plastic tube from his pocket. Inside the tube is a green-colored pill.

410142075.content: ... Not really. It doesn't even compare to the byproducts from my lab.

410142076.content: The temporary test bed assembled by Ethereal Enigma begins to disappear. Zhiming picks up the green pill with a pair of tweezers and puts it back into the plastic tube.

410142077.content: It's a neurostimulant made up of an ingredient that was quite special, though it likely isn't on the list of banned drugs. But anyone who takes too much of it will die.

410142078.content: What, it's that bad?! Is there a way we can get it banned, then?

410142079.content: ... This is a matter concerning humans, and Gharpur. I'm not getting involved. I'm a deputy of the Quad, not the mayor of Jivitabad.

410142081.content: Just take this one to the drug regulator.

410142082.content: Zhiming isn't even interested in holding on to the pill—its quality is just not of note. However, after Kali leaves, something else occurs to her.

410142083.content: We've yet to find a replacement for the Sephirah Core. We've tried every available method, but we haven't been able to solve the computing power or loading issues.

410142084.content: But speaking of computing power, living things are the most complex and largest computing power terminals in all of Gaea. I mean, Gengchen, who's connected to the Sephirah Core, is a good example of that...

410142085.content: So, if we could use other lives, or more lives, to provide computing power...

410142086.content: What a terrible thought it is. Zhiming pinches her wrist, hard, then releases a long, deliberate exhale. She shakes her head to free herself of this thought, then turns around and walks into her workroom.

410142089.content: I've got to go back to Xu Heng. I've been told that some Cognizant Visbane was found there and my student was hurt.

410142090.content: But didn't Boss Brahmā tell you to hang around for two weeks? You only have one more week to go...

410142091.content: I'll just come back in a week, if I have the time.

410142092.content: Don't allow anyone to go inside my workroom or touch anything in there during my absence. It doesn't need any cleaning. Thanks.

410142093.content: Zhiming waves her hand to signal that the topic is now closed. She quickly departs the neighborhood Meruism is in, without taking any luggage with her.

410142095.content: ... That was a lie. How can I go back to Xu Heng when I haven't seen the Book of All Past yet?

410142096.content: Thank goodness the tracker I placed on Brahmā still works... So, she's just outside of Gharpur, huh...

410142097.content: But Zhiming comes to a halt just before reaching the border of Gharpur.

410142098.content: She looks around at the dozen or so young men who are approaching her, smirks on their faces, then vigorously rubs her temples.

410151001.content: Hey, look, Boss. A chick from Xu Heng. She must be loaded!

410151003.content: Don't you know the rules in Gharpur? You gotta pay if you wanna go on your way.

410151004.content: If you have money, this is the time to hand it over. And if you don't, just hand yourself over. You've got some looks, alright, if we ignore those mosquito bites on your chest. Heh heh...

410151005.content: Zhiming takes a few glances at this motley crew, then at the leader, who's looking rather calm.

410151008.content: You should have asked for twenty.

410151010.content: Do you know at what point during a blackmail process people are most willing to pay up?

410151011.content: It's when they feel they have given up all their secrets and don't know what will happen if they don't hand over the money.

410151012.content: Imagine: Someone could blindfold you, tie you up, hang you upside down. Then they could read out the names and addresses of your friends and family, play audio clips of them screaming to you, while they point a revolver at you.

410151013.content: You might hear the sound of dripping water, of the revolver's cylinder rotating, of indifferent whispers. Blood could be rushing to your head, your limbs might be numb. And there could be a piece of metal, something sharp, passing over your skin...

410151014.content: Even if you knew the revolver probably isn't loaded, the audio clips could easily have been faked, and your harasser might not be willing to kill you for your money... how long would you be able to hold out?

410151016.content: As you know, I come from Xu Heng. One trip on the Photon Rail here costs a few hundred grand, easily. But I've come to Gharpur instead of enjoying myself in the Affluent District. What do you think it is I do?

410151017.content: The big gangs know how to make money better than you. I'm walking out of Gharpur without a single bodyguard, and yet I've stayed safe and sound. Why do you think this is?

410151018.content: ... Are you saying that there are other people here?

410151019.content: You wanted two grand from me, which means you have no idea how much money I have. It means that you're timid and have poor judgment. You are the most pathetic group of people in the entire slum.

410151020.content: You don't have power or status, and ambition isn't exactly in ample supply in you, either. You're a backwards crew that will never go anywhere.

410151021.content: You thought you could make some money by avoiding the big gangs and harassing a stranger in this little corner, but you neglected to consider if this would be profitable for you, or if you would ever get to spend the money.

410151022.content: So you want two grand from me. The question is, if I gave it to you now, would you take it?

410151023.content: Throughout this entire speech, Zhiming's expression is one of nonchalance, and her tone is calm. Her words cause the gang members to break out into a cold sweat.

410151024.content: If this woman from Xu Heng truly has the support of a bigger gang, extorting two thousand from her might lead to bigger trouble down the road.

410151025.content: But not everyone is capable of risk assessment and weighing the pros and cons of a situation.

410151026.content: Are you threatening us, you one-eyed freak? I'll have to teach you a lesson, then!

410152001.content: Who the **** said you could move in on her?

410152004.content: The young man who's been raring for action gets slapped several times on the back of the head by his leader. Stunned, he looks around at his silent companions, but no one is willing to help him.

410152005.content: I apologize for my boy over there. He's an idiot with no filter.

410152006.content: I understand. I suppose that's how things are in the slums, though you seem sensible enough. Rest assured that I won't get anyone to go after you.

410152007.content: But apologies count only if they're made by the offender...

410152008.content: Zhiming's cold gaze falls on the young man who spoke rudely to her earlier. With a shudder, he finally realizes he might have offended someone that even his boss cannot afford to anger. He quickly lowers his head and slaps himself, hard.

410152009.content: Me and my big mouth! I'm sorry! I'm sorry!

410152010.content:
... Okay, that's enough. I've seen enough.
I have a question I want you people to answer.

410152011.content: Are there any places that make medicinal substances around here? Big companies, smaller ones, illegal labs or workshops... I want you to list them all.

410152012.content: Are you talking about Vimoksha Pharma?

410152013.content: A force field created from Divine Grace has flattened the grass within a one-meter radius around Zhiming. She's looking at the tall perimeter wall of the company called Vimoksha Pharma from a distance, but she doesn't pay much heed to it.

410152014.content: There is an eye-catching icon on the map in Zhiming's communicator screen, and it looks like she's almost reached it. But all she sees is grass. There's nothing around her that can provide shade from the sun overhead.

410152015.content: ... Enigma, give me an analysis of the spatial structure of this area.

410152016.content: Four shields immediately appear and spread out in four directions. They hover quietly in mid-air to form a 100-square-meter zone.

410152017.content: Like the reflections in water, data flows dimly across the four boundaries of this zone. Zhiming looks at the results and shakes her head. Her frown slowly softens.

410152018.content: What a crudely folded-up space. Even Linyu wouldn't be fooled by this.

410152019.content: Zhiming summons her Access Key, and Divine Grace gently slices through the air like a carving knife. As it does so, a flat space opens up on both sides, revealing a sight that looks completely out of place.

410152020.content: Using her Access Key to protect herself, Zhiming takes a step towards this rift and immediately disappears into the wild grass.

410152021.content: This is computing power. Lots and lots of it.

410152022.content: Something about this feels very familiar to Zhiming. It's as if she's in contact with the Sephirah Core that's been sealed by Gengchen.

410152023.content: But in contrast to the pure and majestic energy flow of the Sephirah Core, what she's feeling here is more like...

410152024.content: A data space...? Am I looking at the Book of All Past here?

410152025.content: As she walks through this strange location, Zhiming studies the moving strings around her and tries to decipher their meanings. But no matter how she tries, she simply can't memorize them in a way that makes sense.

410152026.content: But what really catches her eye is not these data streams, but a diminutive figure sitting cross-legged in the void, her eyes closed.

410152027.content: She's bathed in a bright but gentle golden light that's constantly changing. All Zhiming can see is something that looks like a half-virtual, half-real circuit in the center.

410152029.content: Zhiming's first impulse is to awaken Brahmā. However, she can tell that the latter's Prime Power is in use, and she spots a softly shining blue pendant on Brahmā's person. Ultimately, she decides against it.

410152030.content: Having spent quite a bit of time with Gengchen over the years, Zhiming knows more about Prime Power than most Modifiers. When a Prime Modifier is using their powers to solve a problem, that means something has gone quite wrong in Gaea.

410152031.content: Brahmā doesn't seem to have noticed Zhiming's presence. Zhiming wanders around this strange space for a while, but she doesn't learn anything new.

410152032.content: In the end, she returns the way she came and folds up the space again, hiding it.

410152033.content: Is she not afraid of drawing the attention of Visbanes, out in the wild like this...?

410152036.content: Zhiming isn't surprised that she runs into Visbanes as soon as she exits the folded space. After all, there's been quite a bit of Visbane activity on the outskirts of Gharpur, which can now be explained by the presence of Brahmā and the Book of All Past.

410152037.content: These Visbanes are fairly weak, like wildlife in the countryside—not quite worthy of either CORG's or Meruism's attention.

410152038.content: Zhiming follows the Visbanes' trail, which quickly takes her out of the tall grass and to the main road. There, she spots an old truck that has stopped on one side.

410152039.content: Did they run into a Visbane attack...?

410152040.content: As she walks towards the truck, Zhiming begins to scan it with her Access Key. She frowns, then opens up the trunk.

410152041.content: She finds a dozen or so unconscious people lying inside. They're all dressed like they might have come from Gharpur. The sight of this makes Zhiming think of fish that have just been caught and brusquely thrown onto the deck of a fishing boat...

410152043.content: Zhiming glances at the driver's seat. The door on that side is closed, and the driver is nowhere to be seen. It's an old truck that isn't equipped with automatic driving features.

410152044.content: She has a bad feeling about this strange situation, but logic says that this is not the right time to concern herself with these humans. She slowly backs away from the scene, using her Access Key to protect her from any possible attack around her.

410152045.content: But before she can even take two steps away from the truck, she spots a tall figure behind her in the rearview mirror. Her four shields near instantaneously deploy, forming a giant tower shield to protect her back.

410152046.content: Taking cover, huh? You're clearly not a warrior. How disappointing.
