410152047.content: A sound like a dull clap of thunder penetrates the shield and reaches Zhiming's ears, but she has no time for this. She's well aware of what she's just encountered, given the monstrous amount of Bane Energy behind her.

410152048.content: Without stopping to think about why a Cognizant Visbane would be here, she tries to pull up the address book on her communicator and look for Gengchen's name. But this is a new device, and she doesn't have Gengchen's contact information on it.

410152049.content: But sound isn't the only thing that can penetrate her shield. Her Access Key suddenly shatters and the resulting shock wave hits Zhiming, interrupting and stunning her.

410152050.content: All she can see, and very vaguely at that, is her communicator being crushed by a massive hand. Then the hand scrunches into a fist, which shatters her consciousness in a single blow...

410161001.content: I already said I only want the people nobody gives a second thought to. What is this person doing here?!

410161002.content: Listen to me, Seema. Have you heard of Modifiers?

410161003.content: Those lapdogs of the people in power? So she's one of them as well...?

410161005.content: Zhiming is slowly regaining consciousness from the sound of a quarrel echoing in an empty room. She can't see much due to the dim lighting around her.

410161006.content: So what are you going to do with her? She's from Xu Heng, you know, and someone from there will come looking for her sooner or later. We won't be able to hide anything when that happens.

410161007.content: Do not question my strength, human. Like I said, the plant will be safe until my plan is complete.

410161008.content: As for her, she may know certain things I have an interest in. We can dispose of her later if I discover that she's of no use...

410161009.content: In her daze, Zhiming spots a number of scarlet lights. They look like Visbanes, and they're standing guard, quiet and unmoving, in every corner of the room.

410161010.content: Although the sight before her clearly tells her she's in the midst of enemies, her Modifier intuition doesn't register any danger. This discrepancy causes Zhiming to quickly sit up. The heel of her boot hits the metal floor, making a clear, crisp sound that echoes through the space.

410161013.content: The sound of heavy footsteps gets closer and closer to Zhiming. She instinctively tries to summon her Access Key to protect herself, but the sense of control she had over the Key, a sense that was as natural as breathing, is gone.

410161014.content: Even more alarmingly, she can barely call on the Divine Grace in her body. It's like all she has within herself is a pool of stagnant water.

410161015.content: You can stop trying that now, Quad member. I've blocked your Divine Power. You're not much stronger than an average human now.

410161016.content: You know, it took quite a few trials on several Modifiers before I got this right. How does it feel to lose your power? Awful, isn't it? Feels worse than death, even?

410161017.content: Zhiming, who's sitting in a corner, finally gives up on her futile attempt to get to her feet. She looks at the burly Cognizant Visbane in front of her and shakes her head.

410161018.content: For a Visbane, you sure are a curious one. I see that you're wearing a lot of belts. Are you into boxing?

410161019.content:
No, I'm into mixed martial arts. It's an interesting sport.
I'll ask you just this once: What is Brahmā up to?

410161020.content: ... I understand the Cognizants are capable of controlling ordinary Visbanes. Those Visbanes roaming the outskirts must be your eyes and ears.

410161022.content: If I knew the answer, I wouldn't be here right now...

410161023.content: Zhiming looks away from Ravana, quietly marveling at the fact that his guise betrays zero hints of his Cognizant Visbane identity. She instinctively casts her gaze at the most eye-catching thing in this dark underground lab instead.

410161024.content: It's a transparent cabin suspended in mid-air with something that looks like a metal rod floating inside. It looks terribly familiar to Zhiming, but try as she might, she just can't place it.

410161025.content: There are numerous pale golden streaks of light connected to this cabin, and attached to the other end of them are pedestals on the ground. Atop these pedestals are human bodies that look rather lifeless.

410161027.content:
Something you don't need to know about.
If you can't tell me what I want to know, you're useless to me.

410161028.content: If you know that I'm from the Quad, then you must also know that you're digging your own grave right now.

410161029.content:
Ha ha. Looks like you have faith in your friends.
Who do you think is going to save you? Jianbing? Or Gengchen?

410161030.content: ... You know this much about the Quad?

410161031.content: Of course. You must always know your enemy before you get into the ring. I also know about you, Zhiming.

410161032.content: Of the four deputies, you've been Gengchen's puppy dog for the longest. Yet you're still the weakest one, and crippled to boot. How can you call yourself a Modifier?

410161033.content: As Ravana speaks, he suddenly launches a punch at the defenseless Zhiming, who instinctively closes her eyes. She feels a rush of air coming at her face like a knife, but she feels no pain from a blow.

410161034.content: The massive fist is already slowly moving away from her by the time she opens her eyes again. She can feel cold sweat forming on her back.

410161035.content: If you aren't at the table, you're probably on the menu. That's just how it is.

410161036.content:
Divine Power: Mediocre and unfocused. Access Key: Might as well be a piece of scrap metal.
You're weak, so very, very weak. You aren't even fit to be my opponent.

410161038.content: ... Just a moment, Ravana. What did you say her name is?

410161040.content: The woman called Seema opens her mouth in shock. She quickly walks over to Zhiming and helps her up.

410161041.content: You're Zhiming? The materials and mechanical engineering whiz?

410161042.content: ... I should be honored that both of you know of me.

410161043.content:
Fantastic. The holy rivers have blessed us...
Ravana. I need this person alive. She's of use to me.

410161044.content: What are you up to now, human?

410161045.content: She's a top scientist in Xu Heng. I need her for my research.

410161046.content: She can work in my lab. Give me that, and I'll stop harping on the fact that you brought in an outsider.

410161048.content: I don't care who you are. My plant, my rules.

410161049.content: Ravana snorts at the sight of Zhiming being held up by Seema. He walks towards a door in the corner.

410161050.content: Whatever. With you in this state, I could break your neck with one hand anytime I want to. But do anything unnecessary, and I'll make sure you're the next thing in the scrap heap.

410161051.content: Zhiming follows Seema, leaving behind that room that looks like the site of a ritual offering, with those bodies standing so eerily still.

410161052.content: Now that her Access Key is destroyed and her Divine Power cut off from her, Zhiming's condition is even worse than that of an average human. Even just walking and breathing feels difficult.

410161053.content: Ravana is no longer in the long and narrow hallway. Zhiming tries several times to summon her Divine Power, but she only feels this growing constriction in her chest. Then she can't stop herself from coughing several times.

410161054.content: Whatever it is you're thinking of doing, don't.

410161055.content: ... Do you know what Ravana is? I can't believe that you're working with that thing.

410161056.content: I don't care what he is. I welcome anything and anyone who can help me with my plan.

410161057.content: The same goes for you. Now, I can't guarantee that Ravana won't go crazy, but know that at the very least, I won't kill you as long as you cooperate with me in my research.

410161058.content: It sure doesn't sound like research the world should know about.

410161059.content: Maybe. I just need to be able to use it.

410161060.content: The elevator rises to a floor marked GF. The light, fresh air in the hall finally restores some of Zhiming's spirit.

410161061.content: But she narrows her eyes in surprise when she sees the logo on the wall.

410161062.content: So I'm in Vimoksha Pharma now...?

410161064.content: So that thing, that byproduct called "Frenzyx," comes from here?

410161065.content: ... How did you know that it's a byproduct?

410161066.content: You can always tell byproducts are byproducts, no matter what they are called.

410161067.content: But why sell it to the people of Gharpur? Does sucking the life out of the poor make you feel accomplished?

410161068.content: Gharpur is already rotten through and through. Does anyone really care what happens when you pour sewage over radioactive waste?

410161069.content: Gharpur is not as bad as you think. Now I miss that blasted place.

410161070.content: You can stop trying to probe me for information. I've already made it clear to you that you're only alive because you are useful to my research.

410161071.content: I won't allow you to leave until you do everything that I ask. No one is allowed to leave this place.

410161072.content: How do you know for sure that I'll be of help? People all have different areas of expertise and interest.

410161073.content: I've read a number of your articles and know what your areas of interest are. If you insist on acting humble in front of me, I'll have to interpret that as you being uncooperative.

410161074.content: You have more faith in me than I do.

410161075.content: So tell me, what is this mysterious research of yours about?

410161076.content: ... That story was easy to follow, wasn't it?

410161077.content: Seema opens the door to the lab for Zhiming, but the latter does not go in. Instead, she frowns and looks over at the woman with a cold, indifferent smile. Maybe it's better to keep quiet right now.

410161078.content: Since the Fist of Revenge is a modified biological organism, surveillance in the affluent district won't clock it. And once it locates the murderers, they won't be able to escape...

410161079.content:
...
Aren't you going to say something?

410161080.content: To tell a person bent on revenge to give up on the idea, is the same thing as destroying them.

410161081.content: If I were a cop, I would throw you into jail and hope that you can learn to be a better person in there.

410161082.content: But right now I'm the one in jail. I could try to talk you around until the cows come home, but you would just brush it off. Who knows—you might even do something drastic to shut me up. So why would I do that?

410161083.content: It's truly is so much easier to talk to smart people.

410161084.content: This is your workspace. All the equipment's offline, so don't waste your time trying to contact the outside world from here.

410161085.content: Where is that "Fist of Revenge" you've been talking about?

410161086.content: You'll see it when it's ready. Now, all you need to do is make what I want.

410161087.content: Well, come on in now and get started.

410161088.content: Zhiming decides not to push it with Seema, since she's severely lacking information. She does what she's been told and enters the workspace.

410161089.content: The lab is rather spacious. Looking at the array of equipment inside makes Zhiming feel like she's really inside a pharmaceutical company.

410161090.content: You'll find all of the records and documentation for the Fist of Revenge at this workbench. You can skip the content that's encrypted, and don't even try to hack into it. Remember, I have a log of all your actions.

410161091.content: I need you to familiarize yourself with all of this as soon as possible. If need be, I can spend some time organizing things for you—

410161092.content: Gene enhancement and control... "The latest iteration of the enhancement agent is too strong for the theoretical endurance of biological organisms."

410161093.content: I see. So Frenzyx is the byproduct of this thing. That explains all of the neurostimulation effects...

410161094.content: Gene adaptations are too sensitive and can easily cause the body to break down. You can't achieve the desired metabolic level by relying on the body's circulatory system, let alone a body structure of this strength...

410161095.content: As if she's suddenly understood something, Zhiming's face becomes grave. Seema, on the other hand, is wearing a smile of satisfaction.

410161096.content: You understood that right away. You truly are a top academic.

410161097.content: What you want is not an assassin pliant to your every need. What you're making is a biological weapon.

410161098.content: Even experimenting with that is a capital crime, I know.

410161099.content: With a laugh, Seema picks up a ceramic knife from the table, puts it to her throat, and makes a horizontal gesture with it.

410161100.content: But I don't care about any of that anymore.

410171001.content:
This is Kumar, my husband's younger brother.
Kumar, this is Zhiming. She's a researcher who will be helping us.

410171002.content: ... Are you seeking to avenge your brother as well?

410171003.content: The young man named Kumar looks at Zhiming blankly, as if he doesn't hear the ridicule in her voice. He suddenly grabs Seema's shoulders.

410171004.content: What do you think you're doing? We agreed not to involve anyone besides than the drug testers!

410171005.content: People are starting to notice what's going on in Gharpur, and we don't have much time. Her knowledge is critical to our completion of the Fist of Revenge.

410171006.content: Since we're running out of time, can't we just go back to the very first design? Why must we create that terrible thing—

410171007.content: It's not good enough, Kumar. It's not good enough... We have to deal with not just those murderers, but the contempt the rich folks have for us poor people as well.

410171008.content: Don't forget that your brother never gave in, even at the very end. So what must we do?

410171010.content: Go back to your work now.

410171011.content: Kumar makes no further protests. He lowers his arms and his tone of voice instantly softens.

410171012.content: Seema pats Kumar's face before he leaves. Then she calmly turns to Zhiming.

410171013.content: Kumar's in charge of the factory production floor. If you need more agent samples, research materials, tools... he can provide them for you.

410171014.content: Do you want me to help you improve this gene enhancement agent?

410171015.content: Genetic engineering, pharmacology, and polymer chemistry are my areas of expertise. Just help me with the agent.

410171016.content: I need a nanotech neural controller that can be implanted and remotely controlled. You can see for yourself the prototype I designed on the terminal. It's up to you whether you want to modify it or redesign from scratch.

410171017.content: A beast on a leash is still a beast. Unstable genes will spiral out of control sooner or later.

410171018.content: I just need it to obey my orders until its purpose is fulfilled.

410171019.content: You're working with Ravana. Why can't you get him to dispatch a few Visbanes to take revenge on your behalf?

410171020.content: Ravana... There's no love lost between us. I lend him the basement, and he supplies me with the consumables I need. That's the extent of our partnership.

410171021.content: I see. I don't think I've ever heard of humans commanding Visbanes either.

410171022.content: That arrogant, pompous monster... That could be said of you, too, Zhiming. I'm surprised that Modifiers still exist in this world.

410171023.content: Unfortunately, while you all wield immense power, you don't know how to change the world. You are just a vassal of power, an accomplice to the concealment of crimes.

410171024.content: Don't question my goal ever again. I may respect you as a scientist, but that doesn't mean I'll forgive such behavior.

410171025.content: Zhiming takes a deep breath and nods. It's probably pointless for her to keep pressing the issue, anyway.

410171026.content: Besides, she'll need time to recover her strength and wait for help from Xu Heng to arrive, and Seema is the only one who can keep her safe from Ravana until then.

410171027.content: I want results in two days.

410171028.content: Two days. Zhiming has a very good idea of what she can do in two days. While she's used to being in labs for periods of 48 hours or more... this is the first time she's been forced to do so.

410171029.content: Seema has left two security AGI Mechas behind to keep Zhiming inside the lab, and inside the lab only. Thankfully, it looks like the room has everything she could possibly need.

410171030.content: Hmm... Would it be possible... to not... drop that chain...?

410171031.content: (Sighs) I'll need a massive amount of computing power to break the block Ravana imposed on my Divine Grace. And my Access Key's broken, too...

410171032.content: Dozens of attempts later, Zhiming finally gives up on the simplest, most intuitive way to solve the problem.

410171033.content: Even while hard at work on a polishing wheel, Zhiming is thinking about the gadgets she made back at Meruism. Unlike the contemptible work Seema has set her to, there is real joy and value to be gleaned from her work there.

410171034.content: ... I hate being cut off from the world like this. I wonder how things are at the Quad.

410171035.content: Gengchen will probably come look for me if she can't reach me. And it's almost time for Brahmā to show me the Book of All Past.

410171036.content: So you think I'm weak, Ravana... Oh, just you wait until the ones who can fight get here. Ten of you wouldn't be a match for one of them!

410171037.content: Zhiming is playing with a small vial in her hand when she hears footsteps approaching from outside the lab. She stops her idle fiddling and seats herself at the test bench, where she watches Seema push the door open and enter.

410171038.content: Since you've set up a cot in your lab, you must have been used to late nights back in school too.

410171039.content: How have you been doing the last couple of days? Find it okay here?

410171040.content: The bed's a little small, and the food isn't great. The mechas that deliver the news don't understand me, either.

410171041.content: As long as you're cooperative, I will try to meet your demands for day-to-day living. Except communication with the outside world, that is.

410171043.content: Zhiming waves the vial in her hand. Seema nods, and two security mechas from Neuhansa roll into the lab and flank Zhiming on both sides.

410171044.content: So you have your agent and your controller... but what are you going to test them on? I need to know how the test environment differs from the application environment.

410171045.content: If we're talking rats or monkeys, I need to know the exact species and place of origin, too.

410171047.content: ... Oh. It's all of those people in Ravana's truck.

410171048.content: Come. Let's get to know our "consumables" better before the testing starts.

410171049.content: There are very few human employees in the building, and only AGI Mechas can be seen in most areas. The occasional humans they run into, all wearing Vimoksha Pharma uniforms, seem too afraid to speak to Seema.

410171050.content: Zhiming doesn't speak the entire time. All she does is create a map of everything along the way in her mind. It's only when Seema brings her into an elevator that she relaxes a little.

410171052.content: I have no interest in trials with human subjects.

410171053.content: You're already a part of our study. I'll let you choose if you want to be on the test site, or off it.

410171054.content: The elevator doors open slowly to reveal a colossal testing ground. Dozens of young people wearing the same clothes have been lined up in the center of the open space. They're surrounded by an impenetrable wall of security mechas.

410171055.content: Seema and Zhiming are on a viewing platform, looking down on them like a prison warden looking down at his charges.

410171056.content: I'd like to introduce someone to all of you today.

410171057.content: Seema has spoken. A hush falls over the huge testing ground, where row after row of young people in their prime have lowered their heads in fear, eyes numb, like they're facing a trial.

410171058.content: This is Miss Zhiming, a famous scientist from Xu Heng. Starting today, she'll be assisting me with the development of the agent and the final improvements to the Fist of Revenge.

410171059.content: She will have access to the lab and the testing ground, as well as cafeteria and break room privileges. However, she's not allowed to leave this building, and, like you, she's bound by the confidentiality agreement.

410171060.content: She'll be the one in charge of your trials from today onwards—

410171061.content: ... Why has she stopped all of a sudden? Did she forget what she was going to say...?

410171062.content: The abrupt pause in Seema's speech causes Zhiming to glance at her without thinking. It's at this point that she suddenly feels the heat of dozens of eyes from below upon her.

410171063.content: This is not a look you would find on people in ordinary circumstances. Zhiming can see fear, suspicion, expectation, eagerness... So many emotions, all at the same time, all within a single set of eyes.

410171064.content: I'm done. The time is now yours. To perform your experiment.

410171065.content: You seem to have rather stringent requirements for your testers, so why don't you choose them yourself? Choose ten of them and inject them with the medicine you brought. That's all you have to do.

410171066.content: Ten of them?! This drug is very dangerous. If something were to happen to just one person, I might not be able to save them. And you want me to use it on ten people?!

410171067.content: I'm not going to explain the concept of consumables to you again.

410171069.content:
Should I demonstrate the process of subject selection to you?
The eight of you in the first row and the two in the middle of the second row, stay where you are. The rest of you, stand aside.

410171070.content: The blood rapidly drains from the faces of the ten people selected by Seema. The other potential subjects quickly scatter, a mix of emotions etched on their faces, to hide in the shadows.

410171071.content: At that moment, another group of people, also wearing drug tester uniforms, push open the gate and walk up to the chosen ten. Like robots, they jab the syringes they're holding into the chests of the subjects, faces devoid of emotion.

410171073.content: AGI Mechas from all sides of the room start moving at Seema's command. They surround the drug testers, who've already started convulsing, their skin now covered with patches of green.

410171074.content: Looking at the weapons held by the mechas, Zhiming finally realizes what this "experiment" is about.

410171075.content: Despite her complete inability to call on the Divine Power in her body, Zhiming springs off the platform and runs towards the open space, which is about to become the site of deadly happenings.

410172001.content: As the clock runs out, the AGI Mechas collectively fall into silence. Looks of relief appear on the faces of the drug testers who are still able to move. Before long, they simply collapse onto the ground.

410172002.content: They're all looking at Zhiming, who's a few paces away, their expressions full of gratitude, resentment, sympathy, disappointment. But no one speaks a single word.

410172003.content: The other subjects, who may or may not be alive, are soon taken away. Zhiming, her face pale, climbs back onto the platform and quickly walks over to Seema.

410172004.content: Regardless of whether this is a clinical trial or some sort of field test... it makes zero sense. This is just you venting your unhappiness.

410172005.content: Unarmed humans have no chance of winning against AGI Mechas. What else is there to test?

410172006.content: Really? Had someone not weakened the effect of the agent, would the ten of them have been beaten so badly?

410172007.content: ... Did you do that on purpose?

410172008.content: I can see that you're incredibly adept at adjusting dosage. While I look forward to working with you, it appears that the two days of freedom you've enjoyed have caused you to forget where you are.

410172009.content: I don't like to see my employees pulling stunts. And neither do I like to see my time being wasted.

410172010.content: If you're somehow taken by the idea that this is a hotel and someone will come pick you up soon, you can give up on that now.

410172011.content: Once someone finds out what's going here, your revenge plot will be over. It doesn't matter if it's someone from CORG or the Quad.

410172012.content: I am baffled. Just where is all of this confidence coming from?

410172013.content: Zhiming's heart skips a beat when she hears that deep voice, tinged with more than a little menace. She knew that Ravana was hatching some strange plan in the building's basement—now it looks like he's able to appear any time he wishes, too.

410172014.content: A true threat of death could emerge at any time.

410172015.content: What are you doing here? Do you need my help with your experiments, too?

410172016.content: Ah, I'm here to give you some good news. You know, since that you've been shut up in that lab all this time.

410172017.content: I'm not interested in whatever "good news" you have for me.

410172018.content: Ravana sneers savagely as he watches Zhiming's demeanor take on an increasingly gloomy aspect. He then looks over at Seema.

410172019.content: So how did it go today? How many of your test subjects died?

410172020.content:
You don't have to come check on the death count every time.
I'll have the mechas bring the unusable consumables down to you in a bit.

410172021.content: You'll be getting more than usual today, and you should thank Zhiming for that—since she's the one who moderated the effect of the agent we used.

410172023.content: Looks like it was the right decision to not kill you.

410172024.content: ... Just what do you want with all of those people?

410172026.content: Seema isn't too happy with my design. If I follow her specifications, there might not be much left for you to take from the next test.

410172027.content: In that case, I'll use you to make up for any shortfall I have.

410172028.content: The Quad will disappear off the face of this world soon, and so will Xu Heng. You'd be wise to just do the work you're told to here. Maybe that way, you'll be able to live longer.

410172029.content: I can't think of any situation in which the Quad would simply disappear, unless Gengchen disbanded it herself.

410172030.content: Ha ha ha... Do you really think that Prime Modifiers are invincible?

410172031.content: If you don't, you should visit the Quad and issue a challenge. I'm sure that would be a showdown to remember.

410172032.content: There won't be any showdowns. But there will be a war to remember, as you'd say.

410172034.content: Still think that I'm just trying to scare you? Xu Heng is finished.

410172035.content: We Revelators have spent a lot of time and effort on this operation. Xu Heng is ripe for the taking, and Master Turing will take care of Gengchen himself.

410172036.content: War. What an exciting thing that is. It's too bad my task is to stay here, in this rotten place. How I wish I could be in Xu Heng myself! I'd crush all those Modifiers with my bare hands!!!

410172037.content:
Ravana paces and growls in annoyance.
Seema continues to sort through the experimental data, as if she hasn't heard a word of the conversation between Ravana and Zhiming.

410172038.content: The overhead lights of the test ground are turned off, and the ensuing darkness is like an echo that will never fade away. Zhiming's rather cheeky smile becomes more and more obvious.

410181001.content: She can hear both humans and mechas moving back and forth through the hallway outside the lab.

410181002.content: Then someone opens the door to the lab. Zhiming, who's sitting at a bench, doesn't even turn her head.

410181004.content: This place isn't exactly brimming with entertainment options, is it? But I didn't expect to see books on military strategy here.

410181005.content: But you always read between eight and nine at night. It's only afternoon now.

410181006.content: Zhiming turns off the screen of text and glances at the surveillance camera in the corner.

410181007.content: You can't predict someone's behavior from their actions over just a few days.

410181008.content: If you have the time to look at surveillance footage, why don't you spend it on improving the agent instead?

410181009.content: I've already looked at the design you sent this morning. You're making more progress than I am.

410181010.content: The drug testers are doomed either way. I'll live a few extra days if Ravana thinks me useful.

410181011.content: Are you here to discuss something with me? Or do you have something to say about my latest design? To be honest, this version of the agent isn't very stable yet.

410181012.content: I don't need it to be stable.

410181014.content: It's been only four days since the last one. What's the big rush?

410181015.content: Some black market traders have brought Frenzyx outside of Gharpur. It's only a matter of time before someone starts looking at this place.

410181016.content: I'm guessing things didn't end well for those traders.

410181017.content: We changed them into their drug tester uniforms yesterday. We have quite the resupply of consumables this time around.

410181018.content: "Consumables." You're really fond of that term, huh?

410181019.content: It's quite accurate, isn't it? For me and Ravana both, they exist to be used.

410181020.content: I don't want to go through the consumables too quickly. But unfortunately, this new design of yours may tank the survival rate.

410181021.content: ... Are you telling me to go watch them die this time, then?

410181022.content: I saw from your performance over the past few days that the results of the trial the day before were pretty good. You're getting the hang of the rules here.

410181023.content: You know, it's hard for me to be invested in your petty quarrels here. After all, Ravana and his friends plan to turn Xu Heng upside down, and I have no idea how many people they'll end up killing.

410181024.content: You've been acting pretty calm, though. It's like you don't really care about what happens there.

410181025.content: A scholar should always be cool and collected.

410181026.content: Let's go. The sooner we start, the sooner we finish. I've got to get back to my book.

410181027.content:
Zhiming slowly walks out of the elevator, looking through the list of testers that Seema gave her.
There will be ten of them. Ten lives. This thin little roster somehow feels extremely heavy in her hand.

410181028.content: As she's standing at the railing of the platform, her eyes fall on the last name, and she raises her head stiffly. Hey eyes meet another pair below, which are also filled with disbelief.

410181031.content: ... I get it now. So it was you. You ganged up with Seema to abduct everyone here...

410181032.content: I shouldn't have given you that Frenzyx pill. You've deceived Kali and Luwu, and even Meruism! You will pay!

410181034.content: Miss Zhiming isn't a liar. She even tried to help us yesterday...

410181035.content: Hmph. Her? Help us? It was just a show.

410181036.content: Azim continues to roar with indignation. He tries to rush the platform, but he's pulled back by terrified drug testers around him. A heated argument breaks out amongst the group.

410181037.content: ... Seema, Azim is friends with a Modifier from Meruism. Detaining him here is just asking for trouble.

410181038.content: Wouldn't that be a good thing for you?

410181039.content: I know very well that Ravana will get to me before any help can.

410181040.content: Azim needs to leave this place. And I know the formula for a drug we can use to wipe his memory.

410181041.content: Why do you want to save him when he thinks that you're the one who put him in this situation?

410181042.content: I've studied memory-erasing drugs as well. Either they only work for a short period of time, or they're likely to cause brain damage. He's better off just staying here.

410181043.content: Besides, why would I care if someone wanted to investigate us? All of our testers are legally employees of Vimoksha Pharma. They've all signed labor contracts with us.

410181044.content: "Legally"... It's amazing how you can say that with a straight face.

410181045.content: The list is in your hand. If you don't want this fellow to die, just don't choose him.

410181046.content: I leave it all up to you. The consumables are all the same to me.

410181047.content: Seema steps back with a slight smile. She crosses her arms and lowers her gaze to look at the testers, who are still arguing below.

410181048.content: Zhiming can hear every single word they're saying, but the sound of the argument only makes her more irritated. Just listening to it makes her feel like she's wasting her time.

410181049.content: I'm counting to five. If I still hear your voices when I'm done, I'll take it to mean you're volunteering for today's trial.

410181050.content: The fracas below dies out by the time she reaches four. Zhiming opens up the list in her hand and shakes her head.

410181051.content: ... What a pain. The only thing you know how to do is to fight amongst yourselves.

410182001.content: What the... Does every experiment end up like this?

410182002.content: No... This is the first time I've seen this too...

410182003.content: By the time the clock runs out in this trial, all ten subjects have gone through a brief rampage and are lying, utterly still, on the ground. Their muscles have shriveled up, and their bodies are covered in dark stains.

410182004.content: The onlookers look blankly at the bodies as they're being carried away, feeling all-consuming fear in their hearts.

410182005.content: Did you expect this to happen?

410182006.content: Do you take me for one of those "highly productive" scientists who run trials just for the sake of running them? There will always be surprises.

410182007.content: Are you asking me this because you think we're going through the "consumables" too quickly and you want to slow down now?

410182008.content: Ravana should be pleased with this result.

410182009.content: I don't want this to happen again. All we have now is data we can't use. The testing ground is not your playground.

410182011.content: Zhiming laughs coldly at the absurdity of Seema's metaphor. She's speaking a little more loudly now, ignoring the fact that the other drug testers are still present.

410182012.content: How dare you call yourself a scientist? You're like a client who has no idea how a job should be done, but is giving "pointers" left and right, anyway.

410182013.content: Did you not look at my designs? Did you not hear me say that the agent is unstable? Do you want me to explain to you just how outrageous your specs for the agent are?

410182014.content: What are you expecting from me? You have this entire building at your disposal, and yet all you give me is a shabby little lab that probably cost less to build than your cafeteria did.

410182015.content: If I followed your specs exactly, the mortality rate in future trials would only climb higher and higher. Your drug testers would be praying for a quick death instead of a long, agonizing one full of pain...

410182017.content: Seema loudly cuts off Zhiming, who's getting more agitated with every word she speaks. Then Seema takes a glance at the testers, who've gone very pale, and drags Zhiming into the elevator.

410182019.content:
More equipment and materials.
You were the one who rejected a number of requests I submitted to Kumar.

410182020.content: A lathe, a casting machine, nanometals, rubber powder... None of these things have anything to do with the experiments.

410182021.content: Have you forgotten about your neural controller?

410182022.content: You have a design for it already?

410182023.content: I have some ideas. I can show you my drafts, if you'd like, though I'm not sure you will understand them.

410182024.content: I can tell you're not that great at designing from the way you did the prototype. It's so bad, if you were put it inside someone's body, it would completely kill their nervous system in less than half an hour.

410182025.content: Though there's still some doubt in her eyes, Seema's expression gradually calms. Maybe it's because she's had the time to collect down on the way back to the lab, or maybe it's because Zhiming's harsh words have hit the nail on the head.

410182026.content: I may not understand mechanics, but I know enough to tell what a design does. The neural controller will have to be tested, too—and if something goes wrong, I'll hold you responsible for it as well.

410182027.content: Let's discuss that after I see that Fist of Revenge of yours.

410182028.content: Focus on the enhancement agent first. The neural controller only comes in during the last step of assembly, anyway. And, to be honest, I don't trust you yet.

410182029.content: If you can't even trust a person who has no other options, the word shouldn't be in your vocabulary.

410182031.content: Another thing. Don't say anything that would scare the consumables in front of them. I don't want to see anything regrettable in the building.

410182032.content: Do you really think I could scare them with my words after what they've witnessed during these horrifying experiments?

410182033.content: Money may be nothing but paper to the rich, but it's life to the poor in the slums. A hundred grand is enough to buy an entire life.

410182034.content: They are my employees, and the labor contract states they will be paid if they... Well, surely they must have thought that they had a chance of surviving when they signed it.

410182035.content: But I'm telling the truth. In the combat setting you've provided, it's difficult to maintain control over the efficacy of the agent, especially when it makes changes to the genome.

410182036.content: Your testers don't need me to tell them how likely it is they'll die or turn into monsters during the experiments.

410182038.content: You? Watch over them? Ha ha...

410182039.content: Was that really funny to you?

410182040.content: I just can't understand why you're refusing to use an obviously better way.

410182042.content: You know that they want hope. So give them hope. Use the good ol' carrot-and-stick approach with a dose of "I'm on your side."

410182043.content: Say something nice to them once in a while. Maybe even sit down and have a meal with them. Grant them a small favor now and then, tell a sob story or two, get them to empathize with you...

410182044.content: There's no need for me to ingratiate myself with the consumables.

410182045.content: Zhiming nods, then nonchalantly flops into her chair.

410182046.content: That's probably what Ravana thinks too.

410182047.content: The atmosphere of the cafeteria freezes the moment Zhiming walks in, holding her dinner tray. There's nothing but tense silence from the drug testers who are already there.

410182048.content: They eye Zhiming steadily, hoping to use their stares and silence to get her to leave, but Zhiming seems to be completely unaware of them. Instead, she walks to the food area and collects what looks like a simple meal.

410182049.content: The dining drug testers are roughly clustered in two groups. Zhiming glances at Azim, who's busy eating in one corner. She walks towards the group of people he's sitting with, tales a seat at a nearby empty table, looks at the food on her tray, and lets out a quiet sigh.

410182051.content: Don't eat it if you don't like it, high and mighty miss from Xu Heng. Why don't you just ask Seema to give you better food?

410182052.content: You must be kidding me. The lab only has cold food. At least I can get a hot meal in the cafeteria.

410182053.content: I've worked so hard to make the drug to Seema's specifications. I thought that would earn me a good meal, but... it's the same old, same old.

410182054.content: You're just as bad as the others are. Ten lives. You're responsible for ten lives. And somehow you still have an appetite?

410182055.content: Enough. She's still in charge of the next trial...

410182056.content: So? Is she going to try the drug on me then? Go on then, pick me! It's not like I'm ever getting out of here!

410182057.content: The tester becomes increasingly agitated as he speaks. He slams his hands on the table and stands up, then reaches out to flip Zhiming's dinner tray.

410182058.content: But before his hand touches the tray, there's suddenly nothing but air beneath his feet and his vision is filled with the floor. It's not until he feels a pain in his arm that he realizes he's on the ground.

410182059.content: Did you... just use... Xu Heng's martial arts?

410182060.content: Everyone stares at Zhiming in surprise. She takes a cursory glance at the tester, who's just stood up and is still looking a little dazed, then calmly picks up a piece of potato and puts it into her mouth.

410182061.content: If I'm just as bad as the others, I'd be sitting at the same table as Seema right now.

410182062.content: At first, I thought that Seema was crazy to imprison me here. But now that I see the way you people behave, I'm beginning to understand why she's so brazen.

410182063.content: You can flip my dinner tray all you want. I can always ask for another portion of food. Even if you were to kill me, the experiments will continue. As long as this building belongs to Seema, you are doomed.

410182064.content: I didn't see any of you speak up in front of Seema, did I? All you're doing is venting your anger on someone who's also being treated as a "consumable."

410182065.content: You're from Gharpur too. But you don't seem to have any backbone.

410182066.content: **** you! Don't pretend you understand Gharpur!

410182067.content: Why? Is it that hard to understand?

410182068.content: It's full of people muddling along in life, having been discarded in a corner of the city like they were garbage. People who have never ever seen the outside world and can only think about how to survive until tomorrow...

410182070.content: In the day, they hang out with hooligans on the street to find ways to make money. At night, they return to their families, regardless of if they love them or are repulsed by them.

410182071.content: They spend their lives on that one street, dealing with the same few people every day... You know, I'd have thought that people who come from such an environment would be more tenacious.

410182072.content: Little did I expect that you would be willing to abandon what little you had in Gharpur to be locked up here and wait to die, all for the empty promise of a hundred grand.

410182073.content: Are you really so naive that you think you'll survive all of the experiments and leave with Seema's money?

410182074.content: Whatever resentment the drug testers had left turns into doubt when they hear about the money. They look at each other, and what they see in each other's expressions only makes them nervous.

410182075.content:
... Speak for yourself.
You shouldn't have started on this if you didn't want to get caught. Even the young pickpockets in the slum understand that.

410182076.content: Whatever sum Seema has promised you, you're never going to get it.

410182077.content: Why do you think I said you have no backbone?

410182079.content:
Don't act like you're already doomed when you're still alive.
Think of your family and friends, your gangs, your businesses. Think about your humdrum daily routines that you're undoubtedly longing for right now.

410182080.content: If you found them dull, you may as well throw in the towel now, rather than perish on the testing ground. Surely you don't put down your fists when you're fighting on the streets? Show 'em what the people of Gharpur are made of.

410182081.content: Take a look at yourselves. You're wearing the same clothes, living the same life, facing the same dangers. These are your streets, and you're now more of a gang than any gang has ever been.

410182082.content: Come together like a gang! Live, and then... take back what is yours.

410182083.content: Zhiming's rhetoric is so audacious, so fantastical, it alarms even the other group of drug testers. The only response to her comes in the form of a muffled sound from the corner.

410182084.content:
Everyone looks at Azim, who's been sitting there in silence.
A hint of a smile appears on Zhiming's face, and she squeezes a ball she's been holding in one hand.

410182086.content: Azim testily picks up his dinner tray that was flipped over, then stares at the knife in his hand for a second. He throws it onto his tray, stands up and walks to Zhiming, and finally seats himself opposite her.

410191001.content: Zhiming is "escorted" back to her lab by two AGI Mechas. At the entrance, she rubs her throat a little. When she looks up again, a slight frown appears on her face when she sees that the door has been left ajar.

410191002.content: But there's no one inside. Instead, she sees a few pieces of new equipment placed in one corner, as well as a large storage box on a table. It's only when she opens the box that her expression relaxes.

410191003.content: A delivery, I see... That was fast.

410191004.content: Well, it's reading time now, anyhow.

410191005.content: She sits down at her desk, stretches a little, and pulls up an e-book. She sees several new processes running in the background on the terminal. Everything is running smoothly.

410191006.content: She gets to her feet again, glances at the surveillance camera, and walks to the storage box.

410191007.content: Now that I have everything I need... what should I make?

410191008.content: As she always does, by eight o'clock, Zhiming has returned everything to their rightful place, including herself, and spends some time pondering the strengthening agent.

410191009.content: After struggling with several ideas for a while, she comes up with an updated design and sends it to Seema. Then she goes straight to bed and promptly falls asleep.

410191010.content: One little Gengchen, two little Gengchens...

410191014.content: Zhiming is awakened from her slumber by a blaring alarm. She drags herself out of bed and pulls on clothes while trying to cover her ears. Sullenly, she walks out of the lab.

410191015.content: Along with her two mecha "escorts," there's another person in the hallway.

410191016.content: Turn off that awful alarm right now.

410191018.content: ... What? Have I been in bed for a week? What did I miss?

410191019.content: I saw your latest design. It looks good. I made some tiny adjustments to it before getting Kumar to whip up a batch.

410191020.content: He's already brought the agent and the consumables to the testing ground. Come with me.

410191021.content: Can't this wait until tomorrow? I'm so tired right now... Besides, do you really need me for this?

410191022.content: You didn't look tired at all when you told them to "come together like a gang" in the cafeteria.

410191023.content: So your big idea was to incite them to cause trouble right under my nose?

410191024.content: Me? Incite them? That was all hot air. You have this building under your thumb. What sort of trouble could they cause you with all these AGI Mechas around, anyway?

410191025.content: You nodded when I said give them hope. Looks like it worked. I mean, it's even worked on you.

410191026.content:
You and that Azim were whispering to each other for quite a long time.
I specifically told you before letting you into the cafeteria that there can be no secrets.

410191027.content: But we know each other. Besides, you must've also seen that he was the one who came to speak to me. We were discussing private matters.

410191028.content: Do you want me to repeat to you what I told him? His daughter has cavernous transformation of the portal vein, CTPV, and now she's all alone in Meruism, with no one to take care of her...

410191029.content: I know what his situation is.

410191030.content: ... That's right, the drug testers are here because they need money. You wouldn't have imprisoned them if you cared.

410191031.content: I do not want anything in Vimoksha Pharma to happen where I can't see it. I will eliminate any complications myself if necessary.

410191032.content: Watch every word you say, Zhiming. We'll know if you've been stirring them up when we get to the testing ground.

410191033.content: It may be in the middle of the night, but the drug testers who have been rushed to the experiment site do not utter a single word of complaint.

410191034.content: The elevator doors open. The subjects shift their gaze form Kumar, who's silently standing in a corner, to Seema and Zhiming. There's a hint of determination in their eyes.

410191036.content: ... I don't usually get to be here. I'd like to see this.

410191037.content: If you feel like you're going to throw up again, get yourself to the washroom immediately.

410191040.content: Here's the list. Make your choices.

410191042.content: Zhiming takes a glance at Kumar but doesn't say anything to him. She walks over to the railing and looks down at the drug testers, standing in neat rows below her.

410191044.content: Volunteers...? What do you think you'r—

410191046.content: The silence is broken by one of the testers, who's clearly taken some time to muster up their courage. After another, brief silence, their answer is echoed by several others.

410191047.content: ... No one ever chooses me. Why, do you think I'm weaker than the others? Huh?!

410191048.content: I'll do it, too. That makes nine of us. Come on, people, we just need one more.

410191049.content: Are... are you people crazy??? Do you have a death wish or something???

410191050.content:
No, we want to live—that's why someone has to step up.
We have to come together like a gang if we want to live.

410191052.content: No way. Remember what I told you? You don't have the right build for this.

410191053.content: ... Stop playing, Zhiming. He has the perfect physique for the trial.

410191054.content: I know, Miss Zhiming. I know... I misinterpreted the situation earlier. I'm very grateful you chose not to say my name so that I can have the chance to see my daughter again.

410191055.content: But I'm a fighter and I've never thrown in the towel in the ring. I'm not going to stand by and watch my brethren from Gharpur do this by themselves.

410191056.content: I know how to fight. I'll get out of this alive.

410191057.content: By the time Zhiming tries to stop Azim, it's too late. She covers her eyes with one hand in exasperation and turns her back on the test subjects. Then, as expected, she hears Seema speak in a rather displeased tone.

410191058.content: Do you think you have the right to save his life?

410191059.content: Just trying to help as much as I can.

410191060.content: Besides, there are other potential drug testers. Why can't we use the people who are administering the drugs or moving the bodies?

410191062.content: To test the neural controller? To completely lose their control over themselves and become tools that listen only to you?

410191064.content:
Seema gives Zhiming a stern look, like a warning, then walks to the railing and announces the start of the trial.
There's no turning back for the ten people left on the testing ground now. Their gazes slowly grow more determined.

410191065.content: Zhiming, with her back still turned to the experiment, has slowly relaxed. No one seems to have noticed that, for a brief moment, she tried to reach for the Divine Power within her, but came up empty. She shakes her head with a wry smile.

410191067.content:
You were standing next to Seema earlier...
I didn't know that you had been abducted too.

410191068.content: Misunderstandings, poor communication... Looks like we have lots to talk about.

410191069.content: Now four people are sitting at Zhiming's table instead of two, but the atmosphere around them seems no more unusual than that of any other table. Though the presence of the two new arrivals came as a surprise, once Zhiming learned more about them, she realized that they were more than welcome.

410191070.content: Azim, is she really from Meruism too?

410191071.content: ... I told you, I'm not from Meruism. I just fight on their turf. Miss Zhiming is a VIP guest of Meruism. You'd be better off seeking her out than hanging around the big gangs.

410191072.content: But she's still not from Gharpur. We're with the big gangs because we need to throw our lots in with someone with authority. She may be capable, but no one here has ever heard of her...

410191073.content: Are you trying to figure out how you can escape from here?

410191074.content: The faces of the trio change in an instant. Though they subconsciously want to distance themselves from Zhiming, they have to smile at each other, trying not to draw too much attention to themselves.

410191075.content: No, no, not at all... You'll get us in trouble, talking like that, Miss Zhiming...

410191076.content: I can tell you how to get out. Want to hear it?

410191077.content: ... Madam Seema must have sent you here to test us. Please tell her that we know what the rules are and won't try to escape.

410191078.content: I take it that your answer is no. I'll be leaving, then. I didn't come to the cafeteria for this lousy dinner, you know.

410191080.content: I want to know how to leave this place. Tell me.

410191082.content: I trust her. And I think you guys do, too. Why else would you choose to sit here...?

410191083.content: You're always worrying that your brother will struggle out there, with one leg missing and no one to take care of him.

410191085.content: And you. You're always saying you haven't saved up enough to propose to the girl from the grain mill in your neighborhood.

410191087.content: I have to get back to Lila and get her cured. I want to see her grow up...

410191088.content: Miss Zhiming is right. Life in Gharpur may not be great, but it's the most precious thing we have.

410191089.content: Azim clenches his fists tightly. The other two testers do not say anything.

410191090.content: Zhiming nods, relieved. Hope is a source of infinite strength. The idea of a real chance will help them keep up their fighting spirit in this place.

410191091.content: Azim, you mentioned a name at the testing ground. I think you said "Luwu"...?

410191092.content: Yeah. I met someone else from Xu Heng before I came to Vimoksha Pharma to purchase Lila's meds. She was also at Meruism.

410191093.content: Do you know her? Is she a cop?

410191094.content: Well... I guess you could say that. I don't know her very well, though. We've only met a few times.

410191095.content: Was she there looking for me?

410191097.content: Azim tells Zhiming about his brief encounter with Luwu. Her brows furrow slightly when she hears that Luwu came to Gharpur alone to investigate Frenzyx.

410191098.content: If that's the case, she probably doesn't know that Ravana and Seema are working together.

410191099.content: That's bad. Meruism may have a strong presence in Gharpur, but so does the Panthera. Seema might have nothing to fear with Ravana on her side...

410191100.content:
And there's something else... But let's not talk about that now.
I'm going to tell you something. Apart from the things I tell you to say, everything else must remain between you and me.

410191101.content: If I can tell that you're thinking of escape, Seema will be able to, too. She's not so obsessed with revenge that she thinks you people are willing to die for her.

410191102.content: I can still see light in your eyes. And if you don't wish to die, you have to escape.

410191103.content: Zhiming points to her left eye, then moves her finger to her blind right eye.

410191104.content: The ones who injected you, that light is gone from their eyes.

410191106.content: Zombies, huh... That's pretty apt, actually. I'm guessing they had neuro-modification surgery done and became Seema's slaves. They are also your enemies.

410191107.content: I just about understand the situation with Seema now. What I need to know now is more about the other people here—the employees of Vimoksha Pharma, the other testers at the tables over there, the folks who were taken away after the experiment, and Kumar.

410191108.content: I can tell you. I've been here a while.

410191109.content: Like us, the employees of the plant live on-site. There aren't many of them, and they aren't allowed to talk to us. I also sense that they're also afraid of Seema for some reason.

410191110.content: That table over there, there's no beef between us. But they don't want to get close to us because they don't want to get in trouble with Seema.

410191111.content: I don't have much to tell you about the people that were taken away. But they never came back, and the newer here haven't heard about anyone being sent back to Gharpur. They're probably dead.

410191112.content: As for Kumar... Pfft. He's a wimp. He supervises the factory production floor and obeys Seema's every command.

410191113.content: Once in a while, we get sent to do odd jobs on the production floor or in the warehouse. He never speaks to us himself—he always uses those mechas instead.

410191115.content: Who knows? I know that we aren't afraid of him. Everyone knows that Seema's the one responsible for the study, the experiments, and the abductions.

410191116.content: Zhiming nods. She's holding a plastic knife in one hand and drawing circles on the plate with it while thinking about something. A moment later, she takes a deep breath and gives the three people around her a serious look.

410191117.content: You should know how difficult it will be to escape from here. In this building alone, there are countless AGI Mechas standing guard.

410191118.content: So you must expect the worst from Seema, and prepare yourselves for the idea that some of you might not make it...

410191119.content: You're the clever one here. Tell us what we need to do.

410191120.content: Three things. First, like I said just now, the testers must come together like a gang. Without that, nothing else can be accomplished.

410191121.content: Do not turn away anyone who wants to join you or help you. The more people you have on your side, the better.

410191122.content: If anyone isn't sure, just say that Meruism has set its sights on this place and they're quite mad about me and Azim being abducted. Let Vimoksha Pharma know that the big gangs are not to be trifled with.

410191123.content: Meruism has set its sights on this place? Really?

410191124.content: Really. And not just Meruism, either... You'll see.

410191125.content: Second, the next round of tests will begin soon. Based on the current version of the enhancement agent, I think everyone should be able to survive this round. Just make sure you dodge the mechas.

410191126.content: So I'll need you to volunteer for the experiment. This will help reassure the testers who're still on the fence. Maybe then they'll be encouraged enough to approach you...

410191127.content: It will also allow Seema to see that you're stable and controllable under the effects of the agent. This will give me more resources and room to maneuver.

410191128.content: The faces of the trio have grown rather gray at this request. But they nod anyway, like they're trying to encourage one another.

410191129.content: Please also convey these two points to anyone else who might be on our side. As for the last thing... Azim.

410191130.content: ... Are you any good at acting?

410191132.content: On the testing ground, the testers are standing with their backs to each other, roaring with great excitement at the AGI Mechas, which have already stopped working. The green marks on their skin dance as though they're alive, and the extraordinary power in their bodies push their power to new, unfathomable heights.

410191133.content: We have eight survivors this time. The agent's effects are stable. Looks like my work here is done.

410191134.content: That new design took you less than half a day. How long have you been keeping it to yourself?

410191135.content: Don't say that. I may have more than one trick up my sleeve, but I don't know how effective each one is until I try it out.

410191136.content: And since you've read my articles, you should already know what it is that I do. Agents like these are not my area of expertise, at all.

410191137.content: But neural controllers are. Since the agent is effective, I'm not going to dwell on whether or not you were trying to waste my time before. But you're not going to keep anything from me in the future.

410191138.content: Give me a date for when I can see the finished product.

410191139.content: Two days, provided I have all the resources I need. And I have to see the Fist of Revenge for myself, and use your production floor.

410191140.content: I can give you the latest blueprint for the Fist of Revenge, but I'm not letting you inside its incubation room.

410191141.content: Kumar, take her to the production floor tomorrow. And keep a close eye on her.

410191143.content: I'll come up with a list of the materials and equipment I need. If you don't have them on hand, you'd best get them pronto.

410191145.content: Zhiming glances at Kumar, and the taciturn man simply nods in reply. Although he's trying his best to appear calm, the little twitches he makes now and then expose his anxiety.

410191146.content: Seema walks over to the railing and snaps her fingers at her "zombies."

410191147.content: Take them to the nurse. This is my first cohort of stable samples, and I don't want them to perish from their injuries.

410191148.content: The zombies surround just about every injured tester, and seven people obediently walk out with them...

410191149.content: The sound of bone breaking as a fist lands shocks almost everyone present. Dozens of eyes turn to Azim, whose fist is still outstretched, and the zombie who has dropped to the ground in front of him.

410191150.content: ****, Seema. I've never felt so good in my life.

410191151.content: This experiment is over. Give us our money, and give us back our clothes and our communicators. We're going back to Gharpur. You owe us this.

410191152.content: ... Very well. As long as you can all keep this to yourselves.

410191153.content: All of the testers are stunned by this development, especially those watching from the side of the testing ground. They look on at Azim with great envy, feeling they should have stood up just now, too.

410191154.content: But Zhiming, whose expression has changed, walks over to Seema and speaks to her in a hushed tone.

410191155.content: There's no way you would agree to that so easily. You plan to kill them, don't you?

410191157.content: Even a child wouldn't believe they will keep the secrets of this place to themselves. Why can't you just come up with an excuse to detain them?

410191158.content: You're the one who said they need a bit of hope.

410191159.content: What's with all that whispering? If you don't want to let us go, just say it! Don't try to fool us again!

410191160.content: **** this. I'm taking my money and walking out of that door right now. The rest of you can rot and die in here!

410191161.content: Looking very agitated, Azim walks away from the other testers and heads towards the viewing platform. His voice is getting louder and louder.

410191162.content: We've all seen dirty tricks too many times in Gharpur. Tell me, who hasn't heard of someone getting silenced after doing dirty work for someone else?!

410191163.content: What? Cats got your tongues? Just admit it—that contract you gave us is complete crap, and you have no intention of letting the people here ever leave!

410191166.content: At Seema's command, the zombies place themselves right in front of Azim. However, the great disparity in numbers seem to make Azim even more agitated. He lets out a roar and rushes forward, shaking his fists at the zombies.

410201001.content: ... Did you tell Azim to say all of that?

410201002.content: Most people will only believe the truth they want to believe. This is true for the drug testers who are still willing to wait here and be killed, even though they clearly have no chance of surviving. And it's true for you.

410201003.content: I don't have enough semiconductors. Bring me more.

410201004.content: Are we still looking at the electrosensitivity issue?

410201005.content:
Yup.
I'm having problems with this cell sensor, too. Can I have one that's more accurate?

410201006.content: Zhiming is deftly playing around with various "components" that are being projected on the design table. Kumar lets out a soft sigh and commands the mechas to bring the items Zhiming needs.

410201008.content: He's alright—he was just knocked out. Just like you asked, Seema arranged for him to be put in the best medical suite, and gave him tranquilizers too.

410201009.content: Good. Then he should be awake soon.

410201010.content: I'm going to take a nap. In the meantime, run a quality check on all the materials I asked for. I'll start in the afternoon.

410201012.content: What is it? Do you have questions for me? Mind you, I usually charge a hefty fee for instruction.

410201013.content: You are a genius, like everyone says. You've easily answered a number of questions I've been racking my brain about all these years...

410201014.content: So then why are you helping Seema? Do you really not know what you're doing? We're already losing so many lives with all those trials. Who knows what will happen when the Fist of Revenge is complete?

410201016.content: Me? Cold-blooded? You should take a look at what you've done.

410201017.content: That's not the same. I have to avenge my brother...

410201018.content: What's not the same? Why, did you go under the knife too? Did you not make the choice to do all those things? To procure the raw materials, produce the test agents, put Frenzyx on sale—

410201020.content: If it's not directly related to the Fist of Revenge, it's not a secret Seema is interested in keeping.

410201021.content: Even knowing about it, I can't stop her, anyway. Do you think she'd ever allow me to leave this place?

410201022.content: ... She wouldn't kill you, at the very least.

410201023.content: Zhiming stops fiddling with the design projection and looks back at Kumar with a strange expression. But he doesn't look like he's joking. She shakes her head at the absurdity of it all.

410201024.content: I know it sounds like I'm defending her right now, but she hasn't always been like this...

410201025.content: So she only changed after your brother died?

410201026.content: She had no intention of carrying out experiments on humans at first. All she wanted was revenge... The first human she tested the agent on, after the animal testing phase, was herself.

410201028.content: But something happened to her after she injected herself with the agent—I don't know what. She became cold, even emotionless. That's when she became so single-minded about the Fist of Revenge.

410201029.content: She's not a bloodthirsty person, she's just... You have understand that the drug took the fear of death and her love of life away from her.

410201030.content: She may be wary of you, but she still respects you as a fellow scientist. So as long as you don't get in the way of her plan...

410201031.content: So if I help her, I'm cold-blooded. And if I get in her way, she'll kill me.

410201032.content: I see that you're feeling conflicted, Kumar. Is that why you're allowing Seema to boss you around like this? You don't know what to do, so you avoid making a choice altogether?

410201034.content:
A madman who kills innocent people is still a murderer.
I know exactly what I'm doing... I'm getting out of here.

410201036.content: Everything I've done so far is for the sole aim of getting out of this building. I'm halfway there now. I'm going to try to leave this afternoon on the warehouse truck, and I'll need you to open the gate.

410201037.content: This... No... Why are you telling me this?!

410201038.content: Because you still have a conscience, Kumar. Because deep down, you don't agree with what Seema's doing. You know that what you're doing is way, way over the line.

410201039.content: I promise you this: If you reveal what's happening here to the world, all of your crimes will be judged fairly—

410201041.content: Kumar manages to cut off Zhiming with a loud interjection. The sound of heavy footsteps behind her tells her the identity of the visitor.

410201043.content: Seema has given her access to the factory production floor to make some parts for the Fist of Revenge.

410201044.content: ... Fine. She still looks pretty weak to me. Keep a close eye on her, Kumar. Don't let her fool you.

410201045.content: Seema wants you to bring Azim to the main gate. Looks like someone from the slum is here for him. Make sure Azim behaves himself and doesn't let the cat out of the bag.

410201046.content: The slum?! Are we on someone's radar already?

410201047.content: Relax. What are you so worried about? No one's coming in here without any evidence.

410201048.content: It does look like Frenzyx's drawn some attention, though. Try to keep a lower profile when you make your delivery to the Panthera tonight.

410201050.content: Miss Zhiming, you should... Please don't go anywhere until I come back. Seema is holding me responsible for you.

410201051.content: Sure. You've got quite a bit going on here, anyway, so I'm just gonna take a look around.

410201052.content: Zhiming casually glances at the assembly line, which looks like it could be the one being used to produce Frenzyx, and quietly touches the paper and pen hidden inside her sleeve.

410201053.content: She's lying on her bed, quietly counting down the time with her eyes closed. Every few minutes, she checks the clock on the wall to see if her count is accurate.

410201054.content: Although she's feeling exhausted after staying up all night without the help of Divine Power, she knows that falling asleep now could lead to far more serious consequences.

410201055.content: For example, it'd be impossible to notice the moment the door is remotely locked if she were asleep.

410201056.content: ... So he told her after all.

410201057.content: Without hesitation, Zhiming rolls over and retrieves a few items from under the table, a spot that happens to be in the surveillance camera's blind spot. She then throws a small metal disc at a window near the hallway.

410201058.content: The disc attaches itself to the surface of the glass and vibrates rapidly, at a frequency invisible to the naked eye, causing the glass to shatter into fragments that fly everywhere.

410201059.content: Zhiming wraps herself in a quilt and rushes out into the hallway. Following the knowledge she's gained from observing the AGI Mechas at the testing ground over the last few days, she opts to dodge an oncoming attack, then slap a chip-like object on the casing of a mecha with a backhand move.

410201060.content:
Command: Destroy.
Target: Other AGI Mechas.

410201061.content: As the battle between two mechas gets underway, Zhiming inserts a ceramic cutter into a switch. Alarms are blaring throughout the building, but that's not her problem now. She uses another disc to shatter the exterior windows.

410201063.content: Standing on the window ledge, she puts everything she can into summoning one remaining fragment of her Access Key. Then she steps on the fragment, takes a deep breath, and jumps off like a surfer.

410201066.content: Seema has just arrived with an army of mechas and zombies. Before she's even through the door, she's met with the sight of Zhiming falling through the air.

410201067.content: The free fall does not last for long, however, for the white shield fragment appears to have some kind of anti-gravity capability. It's supporting Zhiming, albeit rather unsteadily, as she approaches the ground in a stop-start motion.

410201068.content: By the time Seema regains her composure, Zhiming has almost reached solid ground.

410201069.content: Stop her! Don't let her leave Vimoksha Pharma!

410202001.content: The next time she tries to escape, you can just kill her.

410202002.content: The door of the utility closet is locked from the outside, with four mechas standing guard. Seema takes one last look at Zhiming, who's sitting inside with her head down, then turns to leave.

410202004.content: The small bit of Divine Grace that took Zhiming days to summon has been completely exhausted by her escape attempt. As she watches Seema disappear, she begins to be overwhelmed by fatigue.

410202005.content: Why're you acting like this now? I've been wanting to break you into pieces and recast you, you know that?

410202006.content: But since Ethereal Enigma doesn't have any emotions to speak of, naturally, it does not respond to Zhiming's self-deprecating words.

410202007.content: I never noticed before just how natural and easy it is to use you.

410202008.content: ... Have I become too used to sitting in an office?? Maybe it's not such a bad thing that this has happened to me.

410202009.content: Zhiming leans back into a stack of cardboard boxes and exhales deeply. After running through the events of the past 24 hours, she falls asleep, feeling slightly more reassured than before.

410202012.content: Zhiming sits up, rubbing her eyes. Despite the poor conditions of the utility closet, Zhiming seems to have had quite the restful snooze.

410202013.content: Are you here to bring me food? Good timing. I must have slept for, what, seven hours...? I'm hungry.

410202014.content:
You can take your meal in the cafeteria.
Your detention is over. Seema wants me to bring you to the production floor.

410202015.content: ... Why isn't that door opening? Looks like I'm locked in. Please tell me you have the key.

410202016.content: ... I don't understand, Miss Zhiming, why you insisted on escaping. You should know that it's impossible.

410202017.content: And even if you were determined to do so, why tell me about it? You knew that I'd tell Seema—

410202019.content: But you said you weren't surprised.

410202020.content: Yeah, I wasn't surprised. But remember what I said about you, Kumar? That I can see you're feeling conflicted?

410202021.content: So, no choice you make would surprise me. Since you haven't figured out what you want yet, you're going to swing between polar opposite choices.

410202022.content: If you decide to help me, I can leave this place and find the power to solve all the problems here.

410202023.content: If you decide to tell on me, I think I can accept the consequences. Or at the very least, I won't include you in my future plans.

410202024.content: "Future plans"...? Why... why can't you just give up?!

410202025.content: No person would ever give up on life. Anyone in my position and of sound judgment would do the same thing. That goes for the drug testers, too—and for you.

410202026.content: The one thing human beings cannot accept is restrictions on their freedom—their freedom to breathe, to go anywhere they want, to think, to choose...

410202027.content: You've seen the experiments yourself. What kind of freedoms do you think those drug testers have? How much better is my situation compared to theirs?

410202028.content: You ask me why I'm attempting the impossible. It's because I have no other option. This is a prison, Kumar, a slaughterhouse. This is a bog that will swallow you whole if you don't keep moving.

410202029.content: The facts speak for themselves. Be honest with yourself: Do you really not understand what's going on here? Or are you simply refusing to accept the truth?

410202030.content: S... stop talking to me like that... I won't tell Seema what you just said to me, I promise...

410202031.content: The drug testers are now on my side. I may not have been able to make it out this time, but I'll get them to work with me on my next plan.

410202033.content: If you want to tell on me to Seema, you may do so now. Azim, the folks who are with Azim, and I will... will eliminate all of the complications here.

410202034.content: But will you still tell Seema? You're looking for peace inside yourself, but one instance of tattling has destroyed it. You won't be able to come back from it if you do it again.

410202035.content: So, if you don't intend to tell Seema...

410202036.content: Zhiming gets to her feet and straightens out her clothes. Then she walks to the door and knocks on it.

410202037.content: Then congratulations—you're not like Seema. You're free.

410202038.content: I take it you've thought things through?

410202039.content: It looks like you aren't surprised that I tried to escape.

410202040.content: People like you always have a little fire in them. While I wasn't expecting you to be fully compliant, I didn't expect you to use such a crude method, either.

410202041.content: It's getting late. One-third of the two-day deadline you set for yourself has passed, and you've made zero progress.

410202042.content: I'll be able to make the controller and troubleshoot it in time, so long as Kumar gives me all of the materials I need.

410202044.content: ... The stuff is in the warehouse.

410202046.content:
May I at least have a meal first?
And I heard that Azim isn't too badly hurt. I want to see him, too.

410202047.content: Seema's eyes narrow slightly with some displeasure, but she doesn't say no to Zhiming, since her requests are rather reasonable.

410202048.content: Kumar, go with her to the cafeteria, and take a couple of AGI Mechas with you. Azim's there as well, so they can meet there.

410202050.content: I'm okay... And shouldn't I be the one asking you that?

410202051.content: As soon as she walks into the cafeteria, and before she can say much of anything, Zhiming is greeted by all of the drug testers, who seem astonished to see her.

410202052.content: However, once the testers see Kumar and the security mechas behind Zhiming, they fearfully sit back down in their seats.

410202053.content: Aren't you coming in with me?

410202055.content: I can't tell if you're being cowardly or bold here...

410202056.content: Have you been feeling any side effects since the experiment?

410202057.content: We're all doing okay. I think I must have taken a hit to the head while scrapping with that zombie, though, 'cos I still feel a little dizzy.

410202058.content: You weren't hit... You're probably still feeling the effects of the tranquilizers they gave you.

410202059.content: There were some unexpected adverse reactions to the agent. That's on me.

410202060.content: Please. We know that we owe you our lives.
