410202061.content: Everyone saw how you tried to escape today. I'm not sure how you managed to survive that jump, but... You're really brave. No one has ever tried to do what you did.

410202062.content: Don't you people get any funny ideas now. I could have been done for already if Seema didn't still need me. Let's just eat for now.

410202063.content: Azim collects yet another dreary-looking meal from the cafeteria line, then sits down with Azim's group of testers. The other group approaches as well, with no one stopping them.

410202064.content: Um, Miss Zhiming... will there really be more experiments?

410202065.content: Yes. There won't be many more, but like I said the last time, they'll become more and more dangerous.

410202066.content: ... Are you talking about that thing they call the "Fist of Revenge"...?

410202067.content: An abrupt query coming from the next table over causes everyone in the cafeteria to fall into a brief silence. The drug testers on both sides glare at each other. Fortunately, those who were listening to Zhiming the day before have not forgotten what she said.

410202068.content: What do you think you people are doing? Sit down, all of you. Let's talk this out.

410202069.content: Have you all forgotten what Miss Zhiming said? That we have to come together, like a gang?

410202070.content: That's right. We need to stick together from now on. And Azim's right—we need to expect the worst from Seema. The only way we can survive is to come together like we did yesterday.

410202071.content: Zhiming raises her eyebrows and looks at the testers with some surprise. Maybe Azim and the others are more persuasive that she thought. Or maybe they're all so desperate, they'll try anything at this point.

410202072.content: We can talk about the Fist of Revenge later. First, a couple of important things.

410202073.content: Number one: Kumar has agreed to help us.

410202074.content: The testers look over at Kumar, who's still standing outside the door, with surprise. As if to prove Zhiming's claim, he has bent his head to his communicator, turning a deaf ear to the conversation in the cafeteria.

410202075.content: If there's something you need help with—like if you're short on money or want to check if your family is safe—you can ask him for help.

410202076.content: Azim, I remember you saying that you have a bout scheduled for tomorrow? Get him to cancel it for you. Otherwise, you'll have to pay a breach of contract penalty.

410202077.content:
Um... okay.
But can he really be trusted?

410202078.content: He can—as long as you're willing to trust him.

410202079.content: Trust is contagious. Once the most confident testers have thrown in their lots with Zhiming, everyone else soon jumps on the bandwagon as well.

410202080.content: Number two: I have to preface this by saying you'll have to decide for yourselves if you want to do this, because it's very dangerous—you'll be putting your lives at risk...

410202081.content: So. I'm going to attempt to escape one more time. Who wants to join me?

410211001.content: The production floor is silent. The three people there are as well. Kumar is certain he shouldn't be the first to speak, as he can't get a good read on the other two.

410211002.content: ... And... done. This implant is about the size of a fingernail and you can operate it remotely. But its battery life isn't great, so it'll need maintenance from time to time.

410211004.content: I've looked at your draft design for the Fist of Revenge... Again, I can't improve or troubleshoot it without seeing where it will be used for myself.

410211005.content: You don't have to worry about that.

410211006.content: Use the drug testers. Use them to test the performance of the Fist of Revenge.

410211008.content: Miss Zhiming... What did you just say...?

410211009.content: What's the problem? The testers are just consumables, anyway, and neither Seema nor Ravana would ever let them go.

410211010.content: Kumar is taken aback. But Seema is still around and this isn't the time to ask Zhiming about the conversations in the cafeteria and utility closet from the day before. So all he can do is to keep his head down and continue working.

410211011.content: It's just as well. I was just thinking you were getting too close to the consumables. You don't have to spend so much time with them if all you want to do is appease them.

410211012.content: Well, I don't know if I'm a consumable, and neither do they. It's easy for people in similar situations to commiserate with each other.

410211013.content: No one thinks of you as a consumable. Unless you think of yourself that way.

410211014.content: Don't tell me anything if you're trying to guess what's on Ravana's mind like you did before. Like you, I'm unable to change anything.

410211017.content: Seema laughs off Zhiming's comment as she takes the chip from her.

410211018.content: Come to the testing ground at three this afternoon. You'll choose the test subjects for today.

410211019.content: Seema probably wants me to choose the test subjects for the Fist of Revenge test.

410211020.content: I've looked at the Fist of Revenge's design. Although I'm not quite sure what the finished product will be like... those who take part in this test will most likely die.

410211021.content: Taking a bite of a tomato, Zhiming looks up at the stunned faces of the testers. She lets out a long sigh.

410211022.content: This has nothing to do with the escape plan I just talked about. This test will happen, regardless of if Kumar wants to help us or if you're willing to participate.

410211023.content: The only difference is that, if this test doesn't go well, there'll be a second test, a third test, and more... But if it goes well, our showdown with Seema won't be far away.

410211025.content:
It's also possible that she'll release us once the experiments are over.
If you think that Seema will do that, you can pull out now and wait until then.

410211026.content: The drug testers look at each other, but none of them take a step back.

410211027.content: They don't know about Seema's background, and even if they knew the reason for her actions, they wouldn't sympathize with her. After all, they're victims who aren't out of danger yet.

410211028.content: So we're dealing with a question of trade-offs. While more experiments could buy us time, they'll inevitably reduce our numbers... and keeping our numbers up is obviously more important than time.

410211029.content: For us, the best thing would be is the Fist of Revenge passes muster during its first test run. In that case, I'll be able to keep Seema to refining the Fist of Revenge while you all and Kumar check the escape route and prepare the supplies we need.

410211030.content: As long as we act before she decides to dispose of us all, we still have a chance.

410211031.content: Got it. Just one chance... What do you need us to do during the test?

410211033.content: Zhiming looks over at Kumar, who's still standing outside the cafeteria, then takes out a deck of playing cards. She spreads out the cards, face down, on the table.

410211034.content: Draw lots. The folks who draw the highest rankings will be called for the test first. This is our first step towards freedom and victory. And then...

410211035.content: Fight. Fight like you've never fought before. No matter what kind of monster you're fighting, or what kind of threat you're facing—fight Seema and her oppression with your fists.

410211038.content: After naming twenty people as Seema has stipulated, Zhiming sets down the list and nods slightly at the testers standing right below her.

410211039.content: You're not going to try to save Azim today?

410211040.content: Although the effects of the agent he took have almost fully worn off by now, when compared to the others, he's still much more likely to survive. He's one of the best opponents the Fist of Revenge could face off against.

410211041.content: "One of the best opponents"... I suppose it's for the good of the experiment, then.

410211042.content: A failed test run won't benefit anybody.

410211043.content:
Then let's begin.
Distribute the weapons.

410211044.content: A mecha in the corner rolls up to the twenty selected testers, then drops the iron box it's been holding on the ground.

410211045.content: Azim opens the box cautiously. Inside there's an entire arsenal of cold weapons, including daggers, machetes, crowbars, and maces...

410211047.content: Take your pick. You'll need them.

410211048.content: The drug testers can't stop themselves from looking over at Zhiming. Seeing her calm and indifferent look, they decide to set aside their doubts and fear and each choose a weapon.

410211049.content: ... Zhiming, how many of them do you think will survive this?

410211050.content: Zero. The difference in strength is too great.

410211051.content: Zhiming doesn't even bother to whisper this comment, making the testers who are toying with their weapons do a double take. Then they start feeling like the ground beneath their feet is shaking, as though something heavy has landed just outside the testing ground.

410211052.content: A hitherto-secret door, about two persons tall, opens at Seema's command, and a figure walks into the testing ground. But the low light makes it impossible for the testers to get a clear look at it. All they can see is that it seems to be holding a weapon of some kind in its hands.

410211055.content: The testers instinctively tighten their grips on their weapons. Then, all of a sudden, the figure disappears.

410211056.content: In the span of a blink, one of the testers registers a feeling of lightness and the sensation of his back landing heavily on the ground. He fights to raise his head, and then he sees the lower half of his body is still standing some distance away.

410211057.content: The pain finally rushes him like a tidal wave, and his cries of unbearable agony send a shudder down everyone's spines.

410211058.content: Keep calm, everyone! Keep calm! Get closer to each other!

410211059.content: But the deadly attack that came out of nowhere has already thrown the testers into total disarray. With its giant blade made of bone and heavy hammer-like fists, the Fist of Revenge proves to be too much for the testers who choose to fight it head-on.

410211060.content: Within a short few minutes, there are only a few testers still standing. These are the ones who've managed to survive thanks to their physical skills and crude weapons. They're cursing Seema for her cruelty, and Zhiming for her apparent betrayal.

410211061.content: Let's send in the AGI Mechas, too. We need them to get some meaningful data.

410211062.content:
Understood.
It seems like the Fist of Revenge is usable as it is now. I can't think of anything that could stop it.

410211063.content: You might want to think over it again.

410211064.content: Are you thinking of Modifiers and Revelators?

410211065.content:
... It feels so odd to hear those words from the mouth of a human.
The "Revelators"... That's what Ravana calls his kind, isn't it?

410211066.content: And what do you call him?

410211068.content: I'm not talking about that. Don't you see? Although the Fist of Revenge is moving faster and its load is increasing, the reaction time between its moves is getting longer.

410211069.content: ... We need better materials for the neural controller. Tell Kumar to bring in some.

410211070.content: Just like Zhiming says, by the time the AGI Mechas join the battle, although the Fist of Revenge continues to take them out one after another, its movements are gradually slowing down.

410211071.content: Right when everyone's expecting the Fist of Revenge to simply collapse to the ground, it stiffens for a moment, then starts dashing to one side of the testing ground, ignoring Seema's commands.

410211073.content:
Looks like the neural controller has failed. Hopefully, it's just a materials problem.
Do you have a way to make it stop?

410211075.content: Zhiming tries to sense the Divine Grace in her. Though it's recovered a little, she still can't seem to gather it. She sighs under her breath, then walks off the viewing platform.

410212001.content: I guess we're celebrating something here...?

410212002.content: You were complaining about the food in the cafeteria.

410212003.content: Zhiming spends some time peering at the selection of fruit and sweets on the table. She finally picks up a piece of chocolate and pops it into her mouth.

410212004.content: At least the food in the cafeteria is healthy.

410212005.content: I've done everything I can for you. When will you let me go? The day you take out the Fist of Revenge to exact your revenge?

410212006.content: Don't worry. It doesn't matter to me what you think. Since you've helped me with the enhancement agent and neural controller, I won't make things difficult for you.

410212007.content: At least until Ravana decides what he wants to do with you, I'll give you a measure of freedom.

410212008.content: "Freedom"... The one thing the drug testers would dearly love to have.

410212009.content: Are you telling me you feel sorry for them now? You didn't even bat an eye at what happened on the testing ground.

410212010.content: Now that the experiments are over, I have nothing to do with them.

410212011.content: Although I don't know what you plan to do with them... I hope you'll be able to spare Azim's life. Then I'll be able to show my face at Meruism again.

410212013.content: Do you still have reasons to kill people now?

410212014.content: Ravana says you two are enemies, so even I don't do anything to you, there's no way he'll let you leave. The best I can do is to let you live for a few more days. I doubt you'll ever go back to Meruism.

410212015.content: I don't enjoy thinking of myself as doomed...

410212016.content: That reminds me. I haven't seen Ravana around much lately. Do you know what he's up to?

410212018.content: You don't have to hide it from me now. You know very well that our lives are in his hands.

410212019.content: To a Cognizant Visbane, everything besides itself is expendable.

410212020.content: You want to make me believe he'll kill me.

410212021.content: Just like I don't think you have any reason to continue killing, I don't believe that he has any reason to let us live, now that we know his secrets.

410212022.content: We've all been to that basement, after all.

410212023.content: Zhiming balls up the chocolate wrapper and throws it into a garbage can in the corner.

410212024.content:
In your eyes, though I've been to the factory production floor, I've never even left this building.
But in Ravana's eyes, perhaps we're already dead in his basement.

410212026.content: You may not be afraid to die, but Ravana might not even give you the time to exact your revenge.

410212027.content: It doesn't matter if I'm alive or dead—the Fist of Revenge will continue to seek out its targets. Do you understand now why I've been so insistent about the strength of the agent?

410212028.content: Zhiming is left speechless by Seema's extreme obstinacy. She sighs, then notices the notification light on Seema's communicator.

410212031.content: A hardness slowly comes over Seema's face. She glances at Zhiming, then walks out of the lab while simultaneously ending the call.

410212032.content: ... Looks like foolishness is an infectious disease, after all.

410221004.content: Zhiming can't stop herself from breaking into laughter, even though she's well aware of the surveillance cameras around her.

410221005.content: (I'd thought of fifteen different ways Kumar could react, but I wasn't expecting him to choose the most impulsive one.)

410221007.content: But Zhiming doesn't dwell on the question of what Kumar was thinking. After all, collecting data is much more efficient than speculating.

410221008.content: No one forced you to let the testers go. And certainly nobody forced you to ask Seema for permission to do this. You've already done it, so what's with the long face?

410221010.content: Kumar raises his head numbly, but when he sees that it's Zhiming behind the glass, his expression slowly changes to one of anger. He doesn't notice that Zhiming has pressed a small ball into his hand.

410221011.content: You're not going to humiliate me like this, you murderer!

410221012.content: Relax. I'm not here to mock you.

410221013.content: I'm not going to listen to you, you murderer... You helped Seema create a monster, and you caused all those testers to die. Not even the waters of the holy rivers can wash away your sins...

410221014.content: Do you know why you're still alive?

410221015.content: Because I'm part of Seema's family! ****, why on earth did I get involved in this...?

410221016.content: Do you know why you're being kept here?

410221017.content: Because I don't agree with what you people are doing! And you were the one who told me we should save the drug testers.

410221018.content: I should never have believed in you. I should never have believed in Seema. I should have just let them go...

410221019.content: Do you know why you didn't do that before?

410221020.content: Because I knew I'd never succeed... And what's the point of asking me all this now?!

410221021.content: Do you know why you were able to do what you did now?

410221023.content: Because the test run for the Fist of Revenge made you realize time is running short. You realized you had to act immediately if you wanted to have a real shot at surviving.

410221024.content: Kumar's fury slowly subsides. He looks at Zhiming's cold, interrogating eyes and seems to realize something.

410221026.content: If you want to save lives, you must be prepared for sacrifice too. You don't get something for nothing in this world.

410221027.content: My attempt at escape was a risk that no one else had ever taken before. Everyone's convinced that if they resist, they'll die. While they were able to come together on the testing ground, do they really understand the situation they're in when they're off of it?

410221028.content: Yesterday in the cafeteria, when I mentioned escape, I could see what all of you were thinking. You were all waiting for something to push you along.

410221029.content: But you still weren't convinced that this "something" actually exists, just like how the testers expected Seema to let them go eventually...

410221030.content: No matter how you look at it, you all are just waiting here for death to come to you. Resistance without awareness of the situation is merely another kind of death wish.

410221031.content: Especially for you, Kumar. I can't possibly allow someone as irresolute as you to determine the outcome of my plan. I cannot stake everyone's lives, yours included, on a decision you may or may not make in the end.

410221032.content: B-but... I can't agree with you... even if it's for the purpose of saving lives...

410221033.content: You don't have to agree with me, and you don't have to see things through my eyes, either. All you have to do is to figure out what you're going to do next. I'm not asking you to change who you are.

410221034.content: Azim knows all about my plans. He and the other testers are waiting to hear your decision.

410221035.content: Azim... So they all knew they would die in that test? Then why would they do it?

410221036.content: Because they're determined to live, Kumar. While you remain trapped in your guilt from the past.

410221037.content: If you decide that you don't wish to harm even one more soul... then go. Your path forward is clear.

410221038.content: This is probably the best night of sleep Zhiming has had since she was abducted and brought to Vimoksha Pharma.

410221039.content: Every detail, both overt and covert, is in place. Almost every single variable, apart from Ravana, has been accounted for.

410221040.content: ... How many more people will have to die?

410221041.content: But I can't think of any other way...

410221042.content: Zhiming manages to take a light nap while juggling scattered thoughts in her mind. What finally wakes her is a commotion that has arisen not far outside the building.

410221043.content: Is that Kumar? But I already told him the time we'd kick off the plan...

410221044.content: Zhiming hurriedly gets out of bed and goes to the window to look at the hallway. For a second, she's dumbfounded by the sight of a figure surrounded by dozens of mechas under the spotlights, but soon her emotions turn to elation instead.

410221046.content: Then, remembering something, Zhiming quickly covers her mouth and darts behind the wall.

410221047.content: Zhiming's expression returns to its usual calmness as the noise outside gradually dissipates, along with the sound of police sirens.

410221048.content: ... I should go for a walk.

410221049.content: She thinks for a little, head lowered. Then she returns to her room, returns the books and stationery on her desk to their rightful places, and walks alone to the elevator.

410222002.content: It's late at night. Zhiming tapes up the edges of the canvas board in her hand, then massages her sore arms as she looks around the empty workshop. When she looks over her shoulder, she finally spots the person who's been standing by the door for a while now.

410222003.content: I take it that your silence up till now means you're allowing this?

410222004.content: So this is what you've been doing? Placing explosives?

410222005.content: Would these be able to blow a hole in the perimeter wall?

410222006.content: Did Kumar get them for you?

410222007.content: Nah, of course not... When you have the time, you should visit the abandoned factory buildings at the edge of the park. They're part of your property too, you know.

410222008.content: All of this stuff might have been left behind by the previous occupants. Or maybe your people missed them when they were taking inventory.

410222009.content: Does your definition of "freedom" mean you believe I'll tolerate something like this?

410222010.content: Our partnership is over. Now, leaving each other alone is the best way for us to move forward.

410222011.content: So how much time is left before the world gets to see the Fist of Revenge? One more day? Two? I have to prepare myself for that, you know.

410222012.content: Whatever it is you plan to do, you have to wait for the Fist of Revenge to be ready. If you don't, I'll happily send you to Ravana's basement—after all, he needs consumables even more than I do.

410222015.content: Seema folds the letter in her hand and puts it into her pocket, then nods at the person in front of her.

410222016.content: Trust truly is a worthless thing. She's all yours now.

410231001.content: Zhiming is sitting at a workbench. Intentionally or not, she's positioned herself so her body is blocking her screen from the camera's view.

410231002.content: Strangely, an exact image of Zhiming's back is being shown on the screen. A closer look would reveal that this is exactly what the surveillance camera in the corner is seeing.

410231003.content: If I remember correctly, today's the day... That should do it.

410231004.content: Zhiming casts a final glance at the newly restored lab and takes a deep breath. She gets to her feet, then presses a trigger-like device in her hand.

410231006.content: The blast is heard all over Vimoksha Pharma. Zhiming walks slowly into the corridor and stares at the black smoke rising into the sky. She doesn't relax until she's sure that she's seen the character "Four," fleeting though it is, with her own eyes.

410231007.content: I've heard that Luwu is vigilant and doggedly pursues truth and justice. Since you've already found your way here, Luwu, here's hoping you see this...

410231008.content: This time around, Zhiming isn't pulling a high-altitude stunt. She surveys the grounds, which are now swarming with AGI Mechas, then silently walks to the elevator with nothing in her hands.

410231009.content: However, when the elevator pulls up to her floor, there's someone inside.

410231010.content: What are you doing here? I thought you were setting off fireworks outside to celebrate the success of the test run.

410231011.content: I wasn't joking with you last night.

410231012.content: This isn't the time for you to stir up trouble. You know the consequences.

410231013.content: Seema takes a piece of paper from her pocket and throws it at Zhiming. The handwriting on the sheet looks familiar—Zhiming's seen it on Kumar's desk on the production floor before.

410231015.content: Kumar is a weak man, Zhiming. He wouldn't dare oppose someone's hatred. You're looking to the wrong person to help you.

410231016.content: You've chosen a good time to fight back, since neither Kumar nor Ravana are here. But you only have one chance. Are you going to give it a try?

410231017.content: Zhiming, expressionless, does not answer. She walks into the elevator and shoves Seema out.

410232003.content: Zhiming is standing in the middle of the lobby. There's nothing within the five-meter radius around her. The depletion of both her physical stamina and her Divine Grace is almost too much for her to bear, and a violent coughing fit is making it difficult for her to stay standing.

410232004.content: Ravana, Seema, the Fist of Revenge, AGI Mechas, the "zombies"... It's like she's facing a firing squad composed of her accusers.

410232005.content: How do you think so highly of yourself? Even if I'm in the Source Layer, or Xu Heng, you'll never get away.

410232006.content: Ravana casually reaches for an AGI Mecha, crumples it like it's a piece of paper and forms it into a ball of scrap metal, then tosses it at Zhiming's feet. Zhiming furrows her brow at the clanging sound of metal hitting the ground.

410232007.content: You're weak, so very, very weak! Just a few of these things will finish you off!

410232008.content: I wasn't sure you'd be able to come back from Xu Heng.

410232009.content: Ha! Fishing for information now, are we?

410232010.content: Yu Jing is in ruins now, and we have one half of the Sephirah Core already. And your Quad leader, Gengchen, is severely injured, and no one knows where she is.

410232011.content: Since you're so concerned about Xu Heng, take this piece of happy news about it with you when you go down!

410232012.content: Just like the attack she suffered on the outskirts, Zhiming sees Ravana's fist coming at her. This time, though, while she can see things even more clearly, she's unable to put up any sort of resistance.

410232013.content: She takes a deep breath and is, as expected, knocked unconscious. Ravana throws her limp body onto an AGI Mecha, her joints emitting cracking noises when she lands.

410232014.content: Take her downstairs and put her somewhere near the center. I have no idea how useful a Modifier can be as a "unit"...

410232015.content: Are you really going to keep her?

410232016.content: You've created too much trouble, Seema. You've drawn the attention of that Luwu, and CORG as well.

410232017.content:
My task downstairs isn't done yet, and I need more consumables—lots and lots of consumables.
The ones you've been using for your experiments? Do you have any for me?

410232020.content: Kumar has been at the entrance for some unknown length of time, staring blankly at the horrifying scene. The last place his gaze falls is on the unconscious Zhiming, and his expression slowly turns to one of fear.

410232021.content: What are you afraid of, young man? Aren't you the one who reported her escape plan?

410232023.content:
There's nothing I can't do.
Shut up or I'll make you a consumable too!

410232024.content: He's a member of my family, Ravana.

410232025.content: Hmph. Just mind your own business.

410232026.content: Ravana swaggers towards the elevator, AGI Mechas in tow. Staring at Ravana's retreating figure, Kumar clenches his trembling fists.

410232027.content: I-I... I'm going downstairs with you.

410232028.content: Are you now? And you expect to return afterward?

410232029.content: You can't scare me like that... Zhiming was caught because I told on her. I want to see what's going to happen to her.

410232030.content: If I'm the one responsible for her fate... it's only right that I see it with my own eyes.

410232031.content: Seema frowns. She's just about to say something when Ravana sneers, walks back to them, and gives Kumar a solid thump on the back.

410232032.content:
That's the way, my boy.
Mind that your legs stay strong now. Ahahahaha...

410232033.content: Alright. Just set her down here.

410232034.content: Ravana walks over to a pedestal in the center of the lab, then kicks off an emaciated figure who's sitting cross-legged on it.

410232035.content: The Visbanes in the shadows howl and swarm the person, quickly pulling them out of view. Ravana commands the mecha to place Zhiming onto the newly vacated pedestal.

410232036.content: The moment Zhiming is set down, a dazzling stream of golden light appears from the transparent hovering cabin and connects to it. Zhiming's body tenses up, as if something is being drawn away from her through this link.

410232038.content: W-What in the world is this?

410232039.content: The sight of the soft golden light helps a petrified Kumar gather some of his wits, but then he spots an expression of glee spreading across Ravana's face. He shudders.

410232040.content: Ha! Had I known Modifiers were so much more useful than humans, I would have caught a few myself. I would have saved so much time!

410232041.content: At this rate, we'll be done by tomorrow. I wonder what this thing is, and why Turing was so interested in it...

410232043.content: Hmm? You know what's down here now, and you know what the end for Zhiming will be like. So what else do you have to say?

410232045.content: Have you seen any of the consumables here regain consciousness? You won't have to worry about her ever again.

410232046.content: That Luwu person and CORG are up to something. I've got to go take a look. Why are you still here? Or do you want to move in as well?

410232047.content: I... I need a little more time to wrap my head around this... I...

410232048.content: "I-I-I-I-I." Stop doing that. I don't have time for you, so do whatever you want. Just don't screw things up for me.

410232049.content: You guys, watch him carefully. If he touches any of the equipment here, take his arms and legs. But leave me his torso.

410232050.content: Kumar can see the flashing red eyes of the monsters standing in the dark, still as statues, and Ravana's cruel tone also sends shivers down his spine. He can't find the courage to even move his legs. In the end, he just stays where he is, smiling bitterly.

410232051.content: Kumar doesn't move an inch until Ravana has left the lab. He stands in the same spot for quite some time, until he's sure the monsters won't attack him for no reason.

410232052.content: He heard what Ravana said very clearly. Naturally, except the ground beneath his feet, he doesn't dare to touch a thing...

410232053.content: ... So, that means I'm allowed to speak, right? I wonder if these monsters can understand me...

410241003.content: Cold, stagnant air is building up in her chest. She feels slightly weightless, as though her entire body is immersed in liquid.

410241004.content: It feels like she is being hollowed out little by little, like a seaside cliff being worn away by the ocean's waves. It's not like an injury or a sense of pain, but the loss of something even more essential to the functioning of her body.

410241007.content: Zhiming promptly opens her eyes, then turns to look at a rather stupefied-looking Kumar.

410241011.content: I was the one who told you to rat on me. Do you really think I'd drive myself onto a path of no return?

410241013.content: Zhiming lets out a sigh, then looks around at the Visbanes surrounding them. She's suddenly not sure how best to explain things to Kumar.

410241014.content: The Access Key fragments inside her are acting like a processor, working against the golden light above her that's drawing on the computing power of her body. That's all that's saving her from the terrible fate of the people who came before her.

410241015.content: I didn't think you'd really come down here.

410241016.content: You were the one who said I should try to come down here if Seema didn't... Didn't you want me to do that so I could rescue you?

410241017.content: You can't possibly save me. Look at all these things around here.

410241018.content: I just need someone to know where I am and what's happened to me, so even if I die, at least there'll be useful info for the people outside.

410241020.content: I don't get it. What was the purpose of getting me to tell on you? Our plan to free the drug testers was solid. Why are we still taking such risks?

410241021.content: How are Azim and everyone else? And did you get the stuff I asked for?

410241022.content: It's all inside the building, on the dormitory floor. The weapons are hidden in the cafeteria so people can get to them at any time. The locks on the doors are taken care of, too, though control of the AGI Mechas is still a problem...

410241023.content: I'm not surprised. The mechas are some of Seema's most powerful weapons.

410241025.content: So, what do you think our chances of escaping successfully are?

410241026.content: Didn't you say Meruism would come save us? So all we have is to leave the building...

410241027.content: Leave the building... You saw the thing in the lobby just now that they'll have to beat to get outside. What do you think their chances are?

410241028.content: ... Undoubtedly, even if they manage to escape successfully, many of them will die.

410241029.content: Y-you... Now you think that sacrifices are bad?! What is wrong with you?!

410241031.content: Zhiming looks up at the metal rod-like object inside the transparent cabin and inhales very deeply.

410241032.content: After I lost my Modifier powers, I instinctively started to put myself in humans' shoes. I thought about how I could save myself and as many other people as possible, even if it meant some sacrifices had to be made...

410241033.content: If I were human, doing that wouldn't be wrong. Even if I could save only a single human, that would be better than letting every single person perish at Ravana's hands.

410241034.content: But I'm a Modifier. As long as there's a chance I can get my powers back, I shouldn't be thinking that way. Modifiers are meant to protect humankind. So no matter how great the risk is, I have to do it...

410241035.content: You were right. Someone like Gengchen... or Luwu... would never shirk their responsibilities as Modifiers, no matter what.

410241036.content: My inability to set myself on that course really is quite embarrassing...

410241037.content: What.. Powers? What are you talking about?? Does this mean that you'll become like those other people if you stay here?!

410241038.content: Luwu... That's right. I saw her just this afternoon... I'll go look for her—

410241039.content:
Nah, you don't have to.
She should've seen my signal by now. She'll be here with help in a while, just like I told you.

410241040.content: You should go back upstairs. If you stay here too long, you'll draw suspicion. The plan remains unchanged.

410241041.content: Kumar leaves in a state of agitation and apprehension, and the underground lab becomes silent again.

410241042.content: The only sounds are the rhythmic noise from the massive amount of computing power gathered in the transparent cabin, wave after wave.

410241044.content: Zhiming is sitting cross-legged on the pedestal. She looks around this cold, oppressive, silent space, then lowers her head, purses her lips, and stares blankly at her toes.

410241045.content: Where's everyone gone?... I can't believe I actually miss all of that noise and clatter right now...

410241046.content: It's so boring in here... Seriously, put the pedal to the metal, would you, Luwu?

410241047.content: ... I need everyone to be safe and sound...

410241048.content: Several hours—who knows how many—have passed. By this time, Zhiming has so completely adapted to her surroundings, she can even hear sounds coming from several floors away.

410241050.content: There is a stir in the Visbanes around Zhiming, and several of them rush out the door to go upstairs. She breathes a sigh of relief, then fishes out the fragments of her Access Key.

410241051.content: Gengchen is right. You have both offensive and defensive capabilities. Although I can't exactly say you're the best at any one thing, you have been with me through thick and thin. I guess you suit me the best.

410241052.content: Given the situation right now, I'll revisit the topic of restoring you to your original state at another time.

410241053.content: Right now... it's time for you to turn things around!

410241054.content: The four fragments quickly and forcibly connect themselves to the control program of the computing power extraction system. The golden light flowing to the cabin pauses for a moment, then reverses course and rushes toward the Access Key fragments.

410241055.content: "Living things are the most complex and largest computing power terminals in all of Gaea"... You poor trampled souls. May you rest in peace now.

410241056.content: The auxiliary program for Access Key repair. Ethereal Enigma, this time, I'll be using you for an experiment.

410241057.content: Guided by the program, the Divine Power molds and manipulates the computing power, giving the most fundamental energy in Gaea a physical shape. Ethereal Enigma's outline, which has formed around the Access Key fragments in blue lines, is quickly being filled in with white and gray substance.

410241058.content: Four hovering shields quickly appear around Zhiming, and the Divine Grace that's been dormant for nearly ten days in her body surges forth. Together with the boundless computing power here, it destroys the invisible shackles placed by Ravana in an instant.

410241059.content: The surge also destroys the pedestal Zhiming is on. The Visbanes around her finally react in accordance with Ravana's instructions and pounce on Zhiming, with all their fangs and claws bared.

410241060.content: Ugh. You're all such a nuisance.

410241061.content: Ethereal Enigma continues to fly around Zhiming while she directs a Divine Grace beam at the Visbanes coming at her.

410241062.content: This one-sided battle lasts for about a minute. As the dust from Bane Energy slowly dissipates, Zhiming, now quite the figure in white, looks like a water lily blooming in the protective embrace of her Access Key.

410241063.content: There's no time to stay in this surreal space any longer. Zhiming removes the metal rod from the transparent cabin, takes one last look at the lifeless bodies, and power walks to the elevator.

410241064.content: I've got to get up there now.

410241065.content: Who knows how many people turned up? If there're too few of them and they run into Ravana—

410241066.content: Pondering her next move, Zhiming suddenly stops in her tracks, then quickly steps back with the help of Ethereal Enigma.

410241067.content: Right after she does, the hallway ceiling collapses without any warning and a colossal figure drops into the spot she was standing in a moment ago. He looks at her with a savage grin.

410241068.content: So that was part of your plan, huh?! Coming in here?!

410241069.content: Blame yourself for being so stupid.

410241070.content: If I can beat you once, I'll beat you again and again.

410241071.content: Leave that thing in your hand behind and I won't make you suffer too much.

410241072.content: Without responding, Zhiming puts away the metal rod she's holding. She listens carefully to the movements above and smiles faintly, then points her four shields at Ravana.

410242002.content: Even with access to all of her Divine Power, Zhiming finds it very difficult to block Ravana's fist with Ethereal Enigma. The more they fight, the more she feels that Ravana wasn't exaggerating his prowess, after all.

410242003.content: But at least Zhiming has Ethereal Enigma and its various capabilities on hand. A Modifier who could only fight in close quarters, on the other hand, wouldn't last long if their speed and power were constantly being suppressed by Ravana.

410242006.content: Do you want this thing or not?

410242007.content: Zhiming has taken out the metal rod and is waving it in front of Ravana, who stops moving, narrows his eyes, and stares at her.

410242008.content: Are you trying to threaten me with that?

410242009.content: You're a Cognizant Visbane, but you chose to work in secret and with humans to boot. You've gone to great lengths to exploit your human "consumables" and analyze the composition of this thing...

410242010.content: You're the only one who knows just how important it is to you. Personally, I don't care. All I will say is that before I die, I will smash it to smithereens.

410242011.content: Maybe I'll smash your skull first.

410242012.content: Ha. You have one chance. You're welcome to try.

410242014.content: Ravana licks his lips and sneers, and his expression slowly becomes more menacing.

410242015.content: Zhiming can feel her heart in her throat when she sees the muscles in Ravana's legs tense in readiness. She quickly throws the metal rod away and retreats, and four beams of light come around her at the same time.

410242016.content: A massive fist sweeps over the spot where Zhiming was standing just one moment before, scattering the light beams. But it's too late: The metal rod has already been completely vaporized by the beams.

410242017.content: You were right—this item is very important to me. Now that you've destroyed it, I'll get in trouble with Turing.

410242018.content: But more than I loathe any punishment I might get from Turing, I loathe being threatened by others even more—especially someone weaker than me. You couldn't have made a bigger mistake!

410242019.content: I'll have your head, present it to Turing, and tell him you were the one who ruined his plan.

410242021.content: Zhiming can feel Bane Energy, several times more powerful than it was before, rushing at her like a storm. Clearly, she did underestimate Ravana's strength.

410242022.content: She looks left and right, up and down, around the narrow hallway. Without any hesitation, she turns up Enigma's speed to its very limit, turns around, and dashes towards the stairs.

410242023.content: ... It was today, wasn't we? Why can't you just be punctual...?

410242024.content: At the testing ground. Except for the lab, this is the place Zhiming is most familiar with inside this building. It's also the place she detests the most.

410242025.content: There are three doors here: one on the viewing platform, one leading to the hallway, and the last one in the place the Fist of Revenge appeared from during its test run.

410242026.content: With its access to the hallways, this is the only area that's inside the building and underground where Zhiming thinks she can possibly shake off Ravana.

410242027.content: As she enters the testing ground, Zhiming comes up with at least seven ways to lead Ravana astray. However, she abruptly stops walking as she reaches the center of the area.

410242028.content: ... Both Kumar and Seema are up there, and at least they know where I am. So if someone comes down here for me, it means the situation above is under control.

410242029.content: But if I were to bring Ravana up there now... it would all be over.

410242030.content: Zhiming shakes her head, then turns around to watch Ravana as he breaks through the door. She points her Access Key at him again.

410242032.content: Just as well. Now you'll feel how the consumables felt in their last, desperate moments.

410242033.content: Are you that sure you're going to win?

410242034.content: Of course! What else can you rely on? Those Modifiers upstairs?

410242035.content: You know, I hear that most Cognizant Visbanes that die, do so because of sheer arrogance.

410242037.content: Ravana steps into the ring on the edge of the testing ground. He smashes his fists together, as if he's a boxer warming up just before a match.

410242038.content: You're very clever, Zhiming—I'll give you that. You've managed to fool everyone. But for that reason, you seem to be too sure of yourself.

410242039.content: You think that by wasting my time until those maggots upstairs come down here, you'll be able to defeat me with sheer numbers.

410242040.content: ... But who told you that I'm the only one here?

410251002.content: Yeah. How's it going on your end?

410251003.content: After handing Seema over to Kumar, Luwu enters the building with great urgency. By that time, some semblance of order has been restored, and she's also located Kali.

410251004.content: Baize was here earlier, but she's left. I thought you must have run into big trouble... Things over here are fine.

410251005.content: We're almost done with the Visbanes and mechas, although we had to knock out those raving humans one by one. We'll get CORG to send them to their hospital to see if they can be cured.

410251006.content: Oh, that's right—Pops left with his people after CORG arrived. I hope you didn't tell Baize about them?

410251007.content: Whatever beef they have with CORG is between them. There's no reason for me to get involved... Let's go. Kumar says Zhiming is down in the basement. The passage to there is clear now.

410251008.content: Are we going to use the elevator? Funny, I tried the button for the basement earlier but nothing happened.

410251009.content: No... The elevator's too obvious. There might be a Cognizant Visbane down there too, and we won't be able to see what's happening around us. We'd be fish in a barrel.

410251011.content: ... I mean we'd have nowhere to run when the elevator doors open.

410251012.content: Let's go. If Zhiming is down there, we have to get there quickly.

410251013.content: The two of them follow the passage. Along the way, they run into Visbanes coming from both sides a few times, and these encounters leave them feeling a little annoyed.

410251014.content: But as the clamor from the upper levels gradually fade away behind them, they start to hear the sounds of explosions and crashing coming from below.

410251016.content: Luwu and Kali run toward the source of the noise, locating it without much trouble. They've come to a heavy metal door, through which they can already hear Zhiming and Ravana battling it out.

410251018.content: Four light spears appear and pierce into each corner of the door. Then they simultaneously move clockwise along all four sides to detach the door from the door frame.

410251019.content: Kali then kicks down the door, sending it flying into the room. In perfect unison, the two women rush in right behind it, using it as cover.

410251022.content: First, there's the rush of air from Ravana's incoming fist, then nothing. The sight of Luwu and Kali is such a relief to Zhiming. Even though rationality is telling her now is not the time to be sentimental, she can feel some tears coming on.

410251023.content: Look at you two, bashing your way in like that. You don't really have a plan, do you...

410251024.content: Following their sudden entrance, it doesn't take long for Luwu and Kali to distinguish white from dull gold, and thus friend from foe.

410251025.content: As battle veterans, they're both keenly aware of the importance of striking quickly, and they immediately launch an assault against Ravana.

410251026.content: What did you just say, Zhiming? Come on!

410251028.content: While she would have vastly preferred to have more than two Modifiers come to her rescue, Zhiming doesn't hesitate even a little bit. She recalls Ethereal Enigma while Ravana is busy fighting Luwu and Kali.

410251029.content: The four hovering shields split into eight smaller shields, half of which come together to form a trumpet shape in the air. Then, inside this trumpet, a structure enlarges and stretches to connect together, and soon it's transformed into a large-caliber energy cannon.

410251031.content: A blazing white beam strikes Ravana a nanosecond later, creating a burst of flames that engulf him.

410251032.content: The remaining four shields come together in a cross-shaped formation in front of Zhiming, firmly protecting her from the flames and shock waves that result from the beam attack.

410251033.content: Luwu and Kali quickly retreat while staring at the relentless attack in surprise.

410251034.content: ... I say, Zhiming. I thought you're a scientist.

410251035.content: Doesn't this look scientific to you?

410251036.content: No, no, no, what I meant was, I didn't know you could fight so well... That laser's crazy powerful. I'm guessing it could even turn your Access Key into ashes.

410251037.content: Don't let your guard down now. He might not be the only Cognizant Visbane around here.

410251038.content: ... Let's take care of Ravana before we think about anything else.

410251041.content: A beast-like figure emerges from the scorching flames. The beams around him don't seem to bother him much at all.

410251042.content: That was a pretty good attack. It actually had some kick to it. I remember that's how that punk, Ladon, got killed.

410251043.content: But it's too bad I'm not him. I'm not weak like him.

410251044.content: Are you done now? Good. It's my turn.

410251045.content: Ravana twists the beam off him and dashes towards the energy cannon. Zhiming quickly retracts the hovering shields, just in time to prevent damage to her Access Key.

410251046.content: Both Luwu and Kali are gripping their weapons tightly. The sight of Ravana, unmarked by the beam, has rendered them both speechless.

410252001.content: Ravana swings his massive fists left and right, knocking Luwu and Kali's weapons out of their hands. Even Zhiming's beam of light is smashed away as though it were a solid object.

410252002.content: There seems to be nothing the three of them can do against Ravana, and help doesn't seem to be on its way. The odds are truly against them.

410252003.content: Luwu and Kali are totally focused on the fight. Zhiming, on the other hand, keeps looking at the blue pendant hanging from the waist of her coat.

410252004.content: Say, little missy from Xu Heng. Are you checking to see if your outfit is out of place?

410252005.content: You said that you aren't the only Cognizant Visbane here. You must be bluffing.

410252006.content: As soon as Ravana hears Zhiming speak, he goes into a defensive stance. Luwu and Kali take this opportunity to pull away from him and go stand beside Zhiming.

410252008.content: I'm okay... But this isn't the time for pleasantries.

410252009.content: If there's another Cognizant Visbanes upstairs... that would explain why no one else has come down here.

410252010.content: Are you waiting to see Bathin for yourselves? Just how quickly do you want to die?

410252012.content: Ha! No need to wait. You'll all be dead meat by the time he gets here!

410252013.content: Ravana has raised his fist, but Zhiming doesn't react. Instead, she looks down again at the little blue bead at her waist, which is starting to glow. Her brow smooths a little.

410252014.content: And just what kind of trick is this?

410252015.content: I must say it's been quite the challenge to hang on until now. But the game is up, Ravana.

410252016.content: Those fellows upstairs aren't any more powerful than you three. What makes you think they'll be able to save your lives?

410252017.content: ... I never said I was waiting for them.

410252018.content: While Luwu and Kali look on, astounded, Zhiming removes the blue bead and points it at one of the walls.

410252019.content: As if on command, a massive hole appears in the heavy outer wall of the testing ground, as though it were made of paper and just had a sharp object pierce through it.

410252020.content: A thick black mist pours in from the hole. There is the sound of hooves galloping. A visitor wearing heavy armor and riding a mount has arrived, scarlet Bane Energy swirling around him.

410252021.content: Ha! I was just talking about you. What took you so long?

410252022.content: We have to go! Right now!!!

410252024.content: It's only at this moment that they all realizes the person in the black mist has his back turned to the room, and he's still running from something.

410252026.content: If you value your life, get out now!

410252027.content: A thin channel opens up in the black mist, revealing a Source Layer passage between Ravana and the visitor. The rider turns around and gallops towards the passage.

410252028.content: Then bright golden light streams forth, following the black mist into the testing ground. The rider turns around and tries to counter a move from the light, but instead his mount almost ends up rolling over.

410252029.content: Ravana's eyes grow wider. Before he can say anything, a gauntlet protrudes from the black mist and pulls him into the Source Layer fissure.

410252030.content: That was fast! It's like they ran escape drills or something!

410252031.content: This abrupt turn of events has left Zhiming, Luwu, and Kali stunned. It isn't until the golden light dissipates and they see the person behind it, that they remember to put down their weapons.

410252034.content: It takes some time before Luwu recognizes this newcomer. Zhiming, on the other hand, doesn't seem surprised, though she heaves a sigh of relief. Kali runs over to her in surprise and joy.

410252036.content: I knew it was you. You're always the one gallivanting with outsiders.

410252037.content: This isn't "gallivanting"—we were trying to save people... Um...

410252038.content: Brahmā pinches Kali's cheeks and the latter's words become a jumble of sounds. It provides a little bit of levity after several very tense moments.

410252039.content: Oh, are you Brahmā...? I'm sorry to have dragged Meruism into this.

410252040.content: Don't you worry about it. If Visbanes are causing trouble... it's our duty as Modifiers to take care of things.

410252041.content: That dark, murky one from just now hurt a few of our people as well. I wish I'd managed to kill it.

410252042.content: I can't believe there were two Cognizant Visbanes in this place. We would've be done for if you hadn't awakened from your slumber today.

410252043.content: Well, I am the boss of Meruism. Besides, I made you a promise. How could I possibly let you die here?

410252044.content: But tell me, my dear Tortie: What should I do with someone who had the audacity to place a tracking device on me, huh?

410252045.content: It's your own fault for not telling anyone at Meruism where you went... Besides, that thing helped you find me, didn't it?

410252046.content: Heh heh. Someone seems to be in a talkative mood today.

410252047.content: I almost died just now, and so many people had to come and save me. And there are the humans who...

410252048.content: I should have been more cautious. I mean, I knew that things like Cognizant Visbanes exist.

410252049.content: Zhiming gives a brief account of what's happened to her since her abduction, and Kali and Luwu retell the events from outside as well. It's only after piecing all of the puzzle pieces together that everyone fully understands the story.

410252051.content: Even if Shashvat doesn't give two hoots about Gharpur, CORG is not likely to leave the matter alone.

410252052.content: We were lucky that Kumar still had his conscience. The situation would've been much harder to handle otherwise.

410252053.content: Zhiming, you were saying that Ravana was running an analysis on a metal rod in the basement? Where is that rod now?

410252056.content: Brahmā's eyes widen to the size of saucers. It looks like she might faint at any moment. Ultimately, she smacks her forehead in exasperation but says nothing.

410252057.content: Do you know what that was?

410252058.content: I've been trying to construct it for a month... Never mind. Let's not talk about it.

410252059.content: I'm glad you all are okay. You two, especially. I'd be in hot water with Gengchen if anything happened to you under my watch.

410252060.content: Luwu and Zhiming look at each other when they hear Gengchen's name, expressions rather gloomy. Brahmā isn't sure how to proceed.

410261001.content: ... Okay... Okay. I got it, Boss.

410261002.content: Yes, Deputy Zhiming is safe and sound. She should have contacted the Quad already. But it doesn't look like she's planning on returning to Xu Heng right now.

410261003.content:
... Of course, I won't get myself involved in the Quad's business.
I take it you're okay with the broad strokes of the commercial partnership agreement with Gharpur we spoke about?

410261004.content: ... No, no, I can't do that. I work in security. The folks from Business Development should take over.

410261005.content: ... Yes, my job here is done. I'm heading back to Xu Heng now.

410261006.content: After some thought, Luwu decides not to ask if there's been any progress in the search for Gengchen. Since Luliang hasn't brought the matter either, the answer is already obvious.

410261007.content: The sun is already shining brightly in the early morning haze, and the people of Gharpur have begun their day of "muddling along."

410261008.content: The aromas of new and exotic snacks mix together in the streets, like a white mist covering Gharpur's dilapidated buildings.

410261009.content: After ending her call with her boss, Luwu shifts a little on the bench she's sitting on. She glances at Zhiming, who's standing to one side and holding two cups of hot milk tea.

410261010.content: Have you tried this hot before?

410261011.content: No, just the canned variety at Meruism.

410261012.content: Zhiming hands Luwu her tea, which warms her up nicely. After drinking it, both of them throw away their empty cups, but Luwu has no intention of getting up.

410261013.content: I heard that you were also waylaid on the streets here.

410261015.content: What happened to them? I don't think I've seen them around lately.

410261016.content: I was told that they quit being a gang and have all gone their separate ways, since they don't have what it takes to put themselves on a strong footing here. There are just too many others like them in Gharpur.

410261017.content: And by "strong footing," do you mean making this street theirs for the purpose of extortion?

410261018.content: ... Zhiming, do you think things will ever improve here?

410261019.content: The people of Shashvat made Gharpur into a place like this themselves. That matters to you?

410261020.content: What happened with Seema and Vimoksha Pharma must never ever happen again.

410261021.content: I heard that you used to be in the police force. So you must know that what happened here can happen anywhere.

410261022.content: People often think that justice is very fragile, because at the end of the day, it's simply about maintaining a balance. And sometimes, this balance can be lost.

410261023.content: Even if Shashvat didn't separate its people by class, and there wasn't a place like Gharpur, where people can be used like that... frankly, Ravana's actions would have become even more covert instead.

410261024.content: ... I'm sorry, but I can't agree with you.

410261027.content: Because you're one of the few good people in the world.

410261028.content: Good people don't give up on seeking justice just because it's fragile, do they?

410261029.content: ... I'm not sure if you're complimenting or mocking me.

410261030.content: Deputy Zhiming, do you think you're a good person?

410261031.content: Me? I try my best to be.

410261032.content: For a moment, Luwu is at a lost for words. Then she shakes her head and gives a resigned smile.

410261033.content: Can't you tell me why you aren't going back to Xu Heng yet? Just a little?

410261034.content: I promised Brahmā and Gengchen I wouldn't talk to anyone else about this.

410261035.content: Ah, so the chief gave you something to do?

410261036.content: Unfortunately, there isn't anyone I can report to now.

410261037.content: You don't seem to be that anxious about her, though.

410261038.content: If someone has been telling you for years, "Things will continue as usual even if I'm not there," would you be anxious?

410261040.content:
The answer, simply, is no.
And she knows I wouldn't, either.

410261041.content: It's a good thing that Mengzhang's been put in charge of the Quad. Xu Heng needs someone as sharp as him right now.

410261042.content: As for Gengchen... Let's just assume she's okay, since no one's seen any signs that she isn't. Just like Brahmā, if she doesn't want to be found, you won't be able to.

410261043.content: ... I truly hope that's the case for her.

410261044.content: Say, isn't it almost time for you to meet that friend of yours from CORG?

410261046.content: Then I'll take my leave of you here.

410261049.content: Luwu smiles and amiably pats Zhiming on the shoulder. Zhiming stiffens for a moment, then relaxes and mimics Luwu's action, albeit in a somewhat awkward manner.

410261050.content: Luwu looks at Zhiming with some surprise, but the latter has already turned her head away. She waves at Luwu, turns around, and soon disappears into Gharpur's labyrinth of streets.

410261051.content: With a sign, Luwu looks down at the clock on her terminal. The moment the numbers jump forward to the start of a new hour, a pair of combat boots appear in front of her.

410261052.content: ... Why are you the only one here? Aren't you supposed to heading back with everyone else?

410261053.content: They're escorting the prisoners. I can't possibly let you tag along on CORG business, can I? Why are you already playing dumb?

410261055.content: The rookies will be fine with her since she's just a human. They've already left, so we don't have to hurry now.

410261056.content: How do you plan to get to the Photon Rail station? Should I walk you there?

410261058.content: You should have told me earlier if you wanted to hitch a ride... Let's call a cab.

410261059.content: ... Since you're not in a rush, let's walk there. We can chat along the way.

410261061.content: It's been years since we last saw each other. Surely there's lots to talk about?

410261062.content: ... Then you should pick something first, you bonehead.

410261063.content: One storm has subsided for now, but perhaps another storm is already on its way.

410261064.content: Not many people know the full story of this incident that happened somewhere in Shashvat. It seems the greatest impact from it is that Modifier organizations in many Sephirah Zones gained a little information about two Cognizant Visbanes.

410261065.content: As for those who live in Gharpur, the only way it impacted them is they could no longer procure that substance called Frenzyx... but that doesn't really matter to them, does it?

410261066.content: It's still the same old, same old, day in and day out for them. Their lives will still be full of milk tea and wraps, gang and brawls...

410261067.content: The Panthera fell into disarray following Ravana's disappearance and were eventually swallowed up by a little-known gang. It's said the leader of this gang is always carrying around a book on military tactics from Xu Heng, though no one knows if he understands it. And no one dares ask.

410261068.content: Rumor has it that Vimoksha Pharma plans to hire employees from Gharpur on a regular basis. Some have claimed that Vimoksha Pharma is a sweatshop, but these rumors were disproved by the fat salaries brought home by the first batch of hires.

410261069.content: The new boss of Vimoksha Pharma is called Kumar. Like Seema, who seems to have resigned and gone elsewhere, he provides medicines for cheap to the people of Gharpur.

410261070.content: Azim met Kumar once, when he asked the new leader to bring Lila to the city for surgery. According to Azim, Kumar looked tired and haggard, and though he had a smile on his face, he also seemed to have become rather taciturn.

410261071.content: Lila's surgery was a success, and thanks to treatment provided by CORG, Azim was also cured of the effects from the strengthening agent. He has since gone on to become the champion in Gharpur's largest fighting competition.

410261072.content: Azim was also invited to join a professional league based in the Affluent District. But he tore up the invitation letter, even though it contained a promise to help him break into the entertainment industry...

410261073.content: In the slums, where people are muddling along from day to day, no one cares about what will happen tomorrow. Neither does anyone care about what the shadows cast by the buildings have swallowed up.

410261075.content: Even if what you're saying about the Book of All Past is true... were you really able to pull it off?

410261077.content: ... You know you have only one shot at this. And by extension, so does Gaea.

410261078.content: We're lucky that we still have this one shot. There's a reason that the Book of All Past has surfaced in this era.

410261079.content: At the very least, it's a shot worth taking, isn't it?

1104101001.content: As the Commander, I thank you, Artemis, and the Knights of the Lighthouse for your decades of dedicated service.

1104101002.content: You don't have to be so formal. That was just a routine report.

1104101003.content: ... Anyway, I'm glad to hear that everything is as it should be in your region. But you must remain vigilant, nonetheless.

1104101004.content: Yes, of course. I know better than anyone just how important this job is.

1104101006.content: Athena can hear the sound of waves coming from the other end of the call. She can even visualize an image of the roiling sea at night in her mind's eye.

1104101007.content: So please rest assured, Commander, and enjoy your day off tomorrow.

1104101009.content: Surely you haven't forgotten what tomorrow is? Even I remember, Athena!

1104101010.content: Athena can hear the chiding in Artemis's voice. Of all the Knights of Convallaria, Artemis—who's known Athena since she was a child—is probably the only one who dares to speak to her this way.

1104101011.content: No, I've not forgotten. It's just that the Knights have to take on extra security duties now that Stellaris Academy's exam season is approaching. We'll become very busy if anything unexpected happens.

1104101012.content: Seriously, Athena. Do you not trust any of us?

1104101013.content: That's not it at all. I trust each and every one of you who's come all this way to become a Knight of Convallaria. But I don't think it's right for me to take a day off when everyone else is hard at work.

1104101014.content: Tsk. Since you say that you trust everyone, why don't you demonstrate this trust through your actions? Besides—

1104101015.content: You must be even more familiar than I am with the Convallaria Knights' Code, no? Tell me, what does Article 26 of the Code say?

1104101016.content: "Barring emergencies or other unexpected occurrences, each Knight of Convallaria shall have one day off on their birthday."

1104101017.content: Heh, you've memorized it to the letter, I see. I knew I could count on you to remember Grandmother Colleen's words.

1104101018.content: A mysterious smile of satisfaction appears on Artemis's face.

1104101019.content: ... Back in the dark times, every Knight of Convallaria had to be ready and on full alert at all times. This habit has passed down to the present day.

1104101020.content: Grandmother Colleen came up with this one-day-off rule to help the Knights who'd never take a break otherwise rest every now and then. The rule was later included in our Code.

1104101021.content: That's right. Looks like you've memorized the Knights' history from beginning to end too. So surely, as the leader, you should abide by our rules? For your Grandmother Colleen?

1104101023.content: Besides, isn't your visitor from Ain Soph arriving tomorrow? So how about you free up the day so you can spend some time with them?

1104101025.content: Athena looks up in the direction of the Omorfies Photon Rail station. Although it's impossible to see the station no matter how high she's perched, her expression gradually softens.

1104101026.content: (It's been a long time since we last met, #{nickname}#...)

1104101029.content: Hmm. Looks like someone's thinking of you, Admin. I wonder who it is.

1104101030.content: Hera, who happens to be at Aether Gazer on business, looks at me with interest.

1104101031.content: Nah, I think I might have caught a cold or something...

1104101032.content: You'd better stay on your toes, you hear? Aren't you heading for Omorfies tomorrow? Please tell me you remembered that.

1104101034.content: Good. Do you have the gift ready?

1104101035.content: Yes, I've already bought the gifts for the Society of Muses, the Knights of Convallaria, and everyone else... Um, Miss Hera?

1104101036.content: Hera's eyes widen in surprise at my answer... and dare I say, she looks a little mad as well?

1104101037.content: I meant to say, the birthday gift.

1104101039.content: Pfft. No need to raise your voice and embarrass me like that. I don't want anyone to think that I'm a country bumpkin with no knowledge of how to behave in public.

1104101040.content: (Athena's birthday note is still in my mailbox... How did I forget that?!)

1104101041.content: I'll go get something for her now... Oh, Miss Hera, do you have any suggestions for me, by any chance? I seem to recall that the two of you are rather close...

1104101042.content: What?! That's not true at all! You woke up this morning and decided that you'd be rude today, didn't you, Admin?

1104101043.content: ... Look who's raising their voice now.

1104101044.content: (Cough) I may have a suggestion or two for you. After all, I do know that child rather well. I may even be the person who knows her best in the world... But that doesn't mean that we're close, you got it?

1104101046.content: I apologize profusely for my verbal misstep, but Hera simply turns her head to me and answers with a "Hmph."

1104101047.content: Well, if you ask me, I'd recommend you get her some rosin for her bow or some special oil for maintaining her cello strings, but...

1104101048.content: Hera stops short of completing her thought.

1104101050.content: But you probably won't be able to get the high-quality stuff here, so forget about it.

1104101051.content: Hey, don't underestimate Ain Soph, okay? We do have a bustling economy, and you can get goods from all different Sephirah Zones here.

1104101052.content: (Snort) Just because you have everything doesn't mean it's all up to standard. I've personally checked out the concerts and music stores in Ain Soph, and unsurprisingly, they've all been disappointing so far.

1104101053.content: Looks like I'll have to attend a concert or two the next time I go to Omorfies.

1104101054.content: Yes, do go at least once, if you have the chance. I promise you'll understand why I say there's a gap between Ain Soph and Omorfies.

1104101055.content: ... But come to think of it, it'll be difficult for you to hear what I believe to be the best classical music in Omorfies live.

1104101057.content: It's sad but true. There's this young cello prodigy who'd barely proven her talent when she decided to abandon this path...

1104101059.content: Oh, never mind. Back to the birthday gift. Like I said, I'm the person who knows that child best in the world. So naturally, I have more than one idea for you.

1104101060.content: Yes, I think that'd do nicely. She'll love it.

1104101061.content: It's been way too long since I was last in Omorfies. As soon as I step out of the Photon Rail station—no, even before then, I'm pulled into this world of the Capital of the Arts by the massive mural of a starry sky inside the station.

1104101062.content: And just like the last time I was here, the streets and squares still have the same elegant and solemn air to them. However, this time, I can also sense a different energy here.

1104101063.content: I see a balloon artist in brightly colored clothing and makeup passing out their balloon art to every child who walks by with a great big smile.

1104101064.content: (Doesn't that balloon sculpture look a little like Ladon...? Wouldn't that scare the kids...?)

1104101065.content: I see another artist, a "copper man" who's standing stock-still like a statue, but suddenly changes to a different pose whenever a curious passerby comes in for a closer look.

1104101066.content:
(Yikes!!!!
Yes, that's how I found out I wasn't looking at a statue after all...)

1104101067.content: Then there's the band clad in some sort of school uniforms singing rock songs on a makeshift stage.

1104101068.content: Welcome to Omorfies, visitor! The Knights of Convallaria will ensure your safety, so please enjoy Omorfies!

1104101070.content: Even the Knights of Convallaria, whose grave demeanor would often dissuade folks from approaching them, have started to take the initiative to chat with tourists.

1104101072.content: Just as I'm all caught up in these dizzying changes, I hear a voice I've not heard for a long time come from behind me.

1104101073.content: Hi Athena! It's been a while.

1104101074.content: Yes, it has been a while, #{nickname}#. On behalf of the Knights of Convallaria, allow me to welcome you to Omorfies.

1104101075.content: ... You don't have to be so formal, Athena. I'm not some VIP.

1104101076.content: But Athena shakes her head in response.

1104101077.content: You were such a great help to us during the Grand Centenary Ceremony, #{nickname}#.

1104101078.content: Although there were reasons we were unable to let the people of Omorfies know just how great your contribution was, I'll forever remember and be grateful to you on their behalf.

1104101079.content: And I'll always remember to stay vigilant.

1104101080.content: Come on, we haven't seen each other in so long. Let's talk about something else.

1104101082.content: You've been looking left and right like a horse new to patrol duty since you arrived, #{nickname}#. Are you trying to re-acquaint yourself with Omorfies because you haven't been here for a while?

1104101083.content: Not exactly. It's just that there's this new energy here. Everything feels younger compared to the last time I was here.

1104101084.content: We have you to thank for this change, #{nickname}#.

1104101085.content: What's with this flattery again... Also, what do you mean by "horse on patrol duty"...? Is that a reference to the horses of the Knights?

1104101086.content: I'm sorry, that was rude of me. I was just reminded of some of our horses that went on duty for the first time when I saw you... I did not mean to be rude.

1104101087.content: I understand. You're a knight yourself, Athena, so you couldn't possibly compare someone to a horse as an insult.

1104101088.content: That's right. Horses are loyal, brave, and determined. And... they are also very adorable creatures.

1104101089.content: Even I have noticed that whenever Athena talks about horses, she becomes more at ease.

1104101090.content: That's a good sign. Looks like Hera's suggestion for her birthday gift was right on the money.

1104101093.content: I produce the gift I picked out at Hera's suggestion: a golden grooming brush.

1104101097.content: Athena, surprised by the gift, thanks me in a rather solemn manner, and I lower my head sheepishly as I remember that I almost forgot about her birthday. But Athena doesn't seem to notice this.

1104101098.content: I think Ash will be really pleased.

1104101099.content: "Ash"? Ah, is that the name of your horse, Athena?

1104101101.content: Interesting. I'd have thought that you'd give your horse a more... imposing name.

1104101102.content: Athena smiles helplessly at me. Clearly, this isn't the first time someone has made this comment.

1104101104.content: That's a great name! How did you pick it?

1104101105.content: It's based on the color of his coat.

1104101106.content: I see. So he's a gray horse, then?

1104101107.content: He did when he was a foal. But now... it's a little hard to describe.

1104101109.content: Do you want to take a look at him for yourself, #{nickname}#?

1104101111.content: Of course. You chose such a wonderful present for Ash, and he ought to thank you face-to-face.

1104101112.content: Ha ha, that's not necessary... Though how exactly does a horse express its thanks?

1104101113.content: Usually, horses do that by nuzzling their face or nose against you. But Ash... once in a while does something different.

1104101115.content: While Ash has indeed bitten someone before, how he acts really depends on who he's with. I believe you'll get on fine with him, #{nickname}#.

1104101116.content: Really? Why do you think so?

1104101117.content: Ash is usually friendlier to the people who are closer to me. Conversely, when, say, I'm having an argument with Hera and he sees her, you'll see him pin his ears all the way to the back of his head.

1104101118.content: I see. He really loves you, then.

1104101119.content: He's certainly very protective of me. And he definitely is a horse with a big personality.

1104101121.content: Definitely sounds like it, ha ha...

1104101122.content: Ash, this is #{nickname}#, an important guest from Ain Soph and my friend, so behave yourself now.

1104101124.content: I finally meet Athena's steed, Ash, in the Knights of Convallaria's stables.

1104101125.content: Ash is taller than I thought he'd be. As I stand next to him, I find myself to be at eye level with his pectoral muscles.

1104101126.content: His imposing stature aside... he doesn't seem to have the commensurate mature or stable demeanor right now. Instead, he's squealing his head off.

1104101127.content: Oh dear. He looks a little upset.

1104101129.content: Mmm... I'm sorry, Ash, that I haven't come to take you out to graze myself. But I'm sure the stable hands have been good to you, no?

1104101131.content: Okay, okay, I'll try to make more time for you, alright?

1104101133.content: Ash calms down a little. However, he's still twisting and turning his neck, as if he has more to complain about.

1104101134.content: Hmm? You're bored because I haven't taken you out on any exciting missions lately? You silly boy, that means that Omorfies is at peace and the people are safe.

1104101136.content: Yes, and we can thank you for that too, Ash. You'll get a couple extra carrots at dinner today. Fine, fine, an apple too.

1104101138.content: I didn't realize you could talk to horses too!

1104101139.content: You come to pick it up when you spend enough time with one.

1104101140.content: Athena pets Ash on the neck and turns her head to me. But this act of talking to me alone seems to displease Ash again.

1104101142.content: The ear-piercing sounds are back again, and this time, Ash is eyeing me like I'm his mortal enemy.

1104101145.content: Ash quietens down a little, his head lowered. But he's still kicking at the door of his stall.

1104101146.content: Hmm? So you're unhappy that the first time I come to see you after so long, I do so with a stranger?

1104101147.content: I see... Ash is feeling jealous.
