1104101149.content: Ash is shaking his head as if he's trying to deny it, but Athena continues to pet his neck with a knowing smile on her face.

1104101150.content: But #{nickname}# isn't a stranger! You know #{nickname}# is the one who helped saved Omorfies...

1104101151.content: Um, that's stretching things a little, no...?

1104101153.content: Ha, no arguments from me about that one!

1104101155.content: As if he really understands what Athena just said, Ash looks up at me, his head cocked to one side, with a friendlier look this time.

1104101158.content: Calm down, Ash. What do we do when we get a gift, hmm?

1104101159.content: Out of the blue, the majestic Ash actually turns and nods at me, as if he's bowing. (Even though this expression of thanks does seem a little grudging...)

1104101161.content: Want to try grooming him with this brush, #{nickname}#?

1104102003.content: Easy there, #{nickname}#. Horses are very sensitive to various external stimuli. Although Ash is rather special in this regard...

1104102004.content: But I must say, you're no less sensitive than Ash is!

1104102006.content: Ash jumps up with a start the moment I touch him with the grooming brush, as if I've just given him an electric shock. He kicks the rail with his front legs.

1104102007.content: I'm taken aback by this as well and almost throw the brush away from me in panic. Maybe, as Athena said, I am as sensitive and easily frightened as a horse...

1104102008.content: Do you want to try one more time?

1104102010.content: (I can't let such an easy task get me down!)

1104102011.content: Well done, #{nickname}#. I wouldn't expect any less of you. The trick to brushing a horse is to do it following the direction of coat growth.

1104102012.content: So, just like brushing a cat?

1104102013.content: ... I'm sorry, but I don't know enough about cats to comment. I don't have a cat, and neither do any of the other knights.

1104102014.content: Okay, so anyhow, I just have to brush in the direction of coat growth. Got it.

1104102016.content: You don't have to be so cautious. I think Ash has become more used to you.

1104102017.content: Oh, is that so? Then, let's—

1104102020.content: Although this time I didn't jump back with a start, I still pull my brushing hand back immediately.

1104102021.content: Was I brushing in the wrong direction...?

1104102023.content: That was Ash telling you the brushing felt good. Am I right, Ash?

1104102025.content: Ash turns his head away, as if he's reluctant to admit it.

1104102026.content: Oh, is that so...? I really can't hear the difference...

1104102027.content: That's understandable, since you rarely get to spend time with horses.

1104102028.content: Would you prefer that we do this together, #{nickname}#?

1104102029.content: Hmm? That's a good idea... How do we go about it?

1104102031.content: Hold on to my wrist... your palm on the back of my hand. Then Athena guides my hand to Ash's back.

1104102032.content: Yes, just like this. Then we brush a little harder, then a little harder again...

1104102033.content: But if you find a knot or matting, don't try to brush through it with brute force. Try brushing it out from another angle instead. And if that still doesn't work, we'll have to bust out the clipper...

1104102035.content: Is Ash telling us not to use the clipper on him? That he doesn't want to go bald?

1104102036.content: I see that you're getting the hang of understanding Ash too, #{nickname}#.

1104102037.content: But the two of you have nothing to worry about. The stable hands are very careful and take very good care of all the horses here. Very rarely do I need to use the clipper.

1104102038.content: Ah. So the stable hands working for the Knights of Convallaria are a highly professional lot.

1104102039.content: That's right. If only Ash could stop kicking down the fences, rolling around in the mud, he'd cause them a little less trouble...

1104102040.content: Then as if she's warning Ash, Athena applies a little more force to the brushing, so much so that even my wrist hurts a little from being held.

1104102042.content: Ha, looks like Ash has received the message.

1104102043.content: He's just saying that he's sorry. He hasn't promised not to do that again.

1104102044.content: I see a smile of resignation on Athena's face.

1104102046.content: He's six years old this year.

1104102047.content: The reply comes swiftly, without any hesitation whatsoever.

1104102048.content: So Ash is already almost 30 in human years. But he still acts like he's a foal.

1104102049.content: You've had Ash since he was young then, Athena?

1104102050.content: Yes. Ash was a tiny little one when he first came to us.

1104102051.content: At that time, Ash was a fully gray horse. He looked like he'd just taken a roll in a chimney ash pit.

1104102052.content: Is that so? I'd love to see a picture of him from then.

1104102054.content: Ash is now digging into the hay spread on the stable floor with his front hooves, as if he doesn't want me to look at pictures of him from his childhood.

1104102055.content: That's how it is with gray horses. And as they grow older, their coat slowly turns white.

1104102056.content: So they're rather like swans in this respect.

1104102057.content: If we're comparing them to swans, then Ash is still in the ugly duckling stage.

1104102059.content: Alright, alright, I was just joking. Ash is now a mature, handsome steed.

1104102060.content: And I did mention just now that Ash has also contributed to the peace of Omorfies.

1104102061.content: Look at him pricking his ears... Looks like he's pleased. I guess he wants you to say that again?

1104102062.content: He's going to get smug if I do that.

1104102063.content: Besides, the best form of praise would be my continued faith in him on missions... Isn't that so?

1104102064.content: Athena pats Ash on the neck, like she's with a comrade with whom she's been fighting shoulder to shoulder for years.

1104102065.content: It seems that peaceful days always come to an end faster than people expect—

1104102067.content: Calm down and tell me slowly. Don't forget that you're a Knight of Convallaria.

1104102069.content: Send the location to my terminal, and make sure you have the place under control. I'll be there as soon as I can.

1104102071.content: After receiving a call from I'm not sure who, Athena, who was riding with a relaxed smile, instantly turns back into the assertive knight.

1104102073.content: Athena calls out to me hesitantly, probably because she's noticed that I'm looking at her.

1104102074.content: Um, nothing... It's just that you seem to have gone into commander mode all of a sudden again.

1104102075.content: I'm really sorry, #{nickname}#. I'd love to spend more time with you, but something's come up...

1104102076.content: Don't worry about it. Your duties take priority, naturally. Security comes first.

1104102077.content: But I've heard that there's a rule among the Knights of Convallaria that it's mandatory for members to take a day off on their birthdays. So what's so important that our Commander Athena is making an exception to the rule?

1104102078.content: ... It's exam season now at Stellaris Academy, and the Knights of Convallaria are responsible for security at the exam venues during this time. So we can be short on manpower from time to time.

1104102079.content: And when something unexpected happens, it's all hands on deck.

1104102081.content: I'm sorry, #{nickname}#, but I have to get going.

1104102082.content: Thank you for the birthday gift. I'd love to give you something in return once I'm done with this. Is there anything in particular you'd like to do, or any place you'd like to visit, on this trip?

1104102083.content: I don't need anything in return... Oh, but wait.

1104102084.content: I suddenly recall what Hera said to me before I set off for Omorfies.

1104102085.content: It'd be great if I could attend a classical music concert here in Omorfies. That way, I'd be able to compare the music scene in Ain Soph to the one you have here.

1104102086.content: A concert...? Got it. I should be done by the afternoon. If you don't have any plans tonight, #{nickname}#, I'll buy us tickets for a concert then.

1104102087.content: Yeah, I'm free tonight... Is there a concert on today?

1104102088.content: Athena can't help but chuckle at my question.

1104102089.content: If we're talking about classical music concerts, there are tons of those in Omorfies every day.

1104102090.content: The problem we have here is choosing which one to attend.

1104102091.content: I suppose that's Omorfies one, Ain Soph zero right there...

1104102093.content: Athena and I agree to meet at Democritus Boulevard in the early evening, and then she quickly turns to leave. Even the fleeting glimpse I catch of her side profile is conveying a sense of complete focus to me.

1104102094.content: (I've an appointment at the Society of Muses tomorrow morning. Should I go shopping for souvenirs this afternoon, then...?)

1104102095.content: Ash, I have to go. Bye now.

1104102096.content: I also bid goodbye to Ash. Just as I'm about to add that I'll come and play with him again, he turns his back to me and lays down leisurely on his side. From this position, he gives me a cursory flick of his tail as if to say goodbye.

1104102097.content: (Is that some kind of message or what...)

1104102098.content: The Commander didn't have to go there herself.

1104102099.content: You know how she is. It's impossible to get her to actually take a day off.

1104102100.content: But then again, maybe it's best that she's the one handling this matter after all.

1104102101.content: You fool, what are you saying about the Commander?!

1104102104.content: I overhear this conversation before I take leave of the Knights of Convallaria. I suppose one part of it wasn't totally unexpected...

1104102105.content: As I walk out of the main entrance, the two knights standing guard there stop chatting, then politely bow to me.

1104102106.content: Um... May I ask a question?

1104102107.content: I turn towards them after a moment of hesitation.

1104102108.content: So what's the emergency that just cropped up? Are you able to tell me?

1104102109.content: I'm sorry, but that's confidential... Actually, I'm not quite that it is. What do you think?

1104102110.content: Don't look at me... But since we're looking at a guest of the Commander's, I suppose telling them is alright...

1104102111.content: The two discuss the matter between them for a while.

1104102115.content: I see. I can understand why you say that it was better for Athena to handle the matter herself now...

1104102116.content: You idiot! You were overheard by an outsider!

1104102117.content: I-I-I... I didn't mean to do that!!!

1104102118.content: ... Relax, I won't tell another soul about this. And I should be thanking you for this piece of intel.

1104102119.content: No need to thank me!!! I'm just grateful that you promised not to tell anyone about this...

1104102121.content: Do either of you know where Athena is right now?

1104102122.content: The duo shake their heads in unison.

1104102123.content: But... Maybe you think that I'm making excuses for myself right now, but I don't think you have anything to worry about with the Commander.

1104102124.content: You fool! When will you ever learn to shut up?!

1104102126.content: But I'd still prefer to be with her right now.

1104102127.content: I blurt that last line out without thinking. Um, what was I supposed to be doing this afternoon again...?

1104102130.content: I hear my savior calling in the near distance.

1104103001.content: Ash, do you want to come with me?

1104103003.content: I turn back to look at the stables when I hear Ash's neighs. He's already stood up from that cozy lie-down in the hay that I last saw him in.

1104103004.content: He shakes his body vigorously, and the hay that's still on him falls off. Looks like he's raring to go.

1104103005.content: Ash, you want to go to Athena too, am I right?

1104103006.content: But the problem is, I've no idea where she is now...

1104103008.content: Ash is throwing his head about, as if he really wants to tell me something.

1104103009.content: Um, I'm so sorry Ash, but unlike Athena, I don't quite fully understand you yet...

1104103010.content: Hmm? Are you saying that I should let you out of there...?

1104103011.content: I look again. Ash isn't simply shaking his head, he's pointing his muzzle at the door latch, then away from it, again and again.

1104103014.content: (This fellow would have escaped from here countless times already if not for the fact that the stable door is latched from the outside...)

1104103015.content: But what do we do after I let you out? Can you able to find Athena then?

1104103016.content: The clever boy doesn't respond to my question. Instead, he simply raises his head and shakes his freshly groomed mane, all smooth and shiny.

1104103017.content: Well, if you think so, I'll be counting on you... partner!

1104103018.content: At the same time, on the other side...

1104103020.content: A stern voice rings out. Like a sword thrown on the ground, it silences the raucous crowd instantly.

1104103021.content: This is an illegal assembly, and you are all to disperse from this place immediately.

1104103022.content: If violence breaks out, the Knights of Convallaria will have no choice but to place all of you under arrest.

1104103023.content: Come on, you've got to be kidding! You want us to pack up and go home just like that? When everyone's all fired up already? That's not very rock and roll!

1104103025.content: What do you people know about rock and roll? Don't tell me you think brightly colored hair plus a leather outfit is all it takes!

1104103026.content: Huh? We have the hardcore tunes to back it up! We don't just perform the singalong tunes to please the fans like you people do!

1104103028.content: What? Our songs are catchy because we actually understand how melody works! All you people know is how to use the same few chords again and again. Probably because you don't actually know how to write music!

1104103030.content: Athena's looking on as the two groups edge closer and closer to an outright fight. They're both from the underground rock bands that have sprung up following the recent relaxation of artistic regulations in Omorfies.

1104103031.content: The two bands with completely different musical styles have run into each other as they're both performing at live music venues in the area. But the conflict between them started much earlier in the form of online spats, and has now developed into a real-life confrontation.

1104103032.content: Fortunately, the Knights of Convallaria were informed of this altercation just in time, so the situation can be brought under control before it can escalate further.

1104103034.content: Athena frowns slightly, her expression serious. But she doesn't immediately draw her sword, something that surprises even the other Knights on the scene.

1104103035.content: Back off! This is your final warning! Back! Off!

1104103036.content: We're ready for your orders, Commander!

1104103037.content: Just say the word, and we'll have these men in cuffs in seconds, the other knights think.

1104103038.content: Since you wish to express yourself through music, then prove it with your actions! How about that?

1104103039.content: Athena steps in between the two sides. No one dares to touch her, even those who have already started shoving and provocatively bumping into their opposites.

1104103040.content: Athena has managed to separate the two groups with nothing but her aura alone.

1104103043.content: Sometimes, when artists go up against each other, things can get a little testy.

1104103044.content: In Omorfies, we now encourage this sort of toe-to-toe conflict. I believe it will push our artists to be better and make greater art.

1104103045.content: But that doesn't mean individuals are allowed to engage in personal attacks or violence. I say this not just as a member of the Knights of Convallaria. Don't you think acts of violence tarnish the art you believe in?

1104103046.content: It is deathly silent on both sides. Athena glances at everyone, who seem sort of persuaded but at the same time strongly reluctant to compromise, and speaks again.

1104103047.content: Therefore, the path to choose here is clear...

1104103048.content: I hereby announce that I will host a musical showdown between the two bands. This will take place in the form of an open-air concert. You'll take turns to sing one song at a time, and the winner will be decided solely by votes cast by the audience.

1104103049.content: I assure you in the name of the Knights of Convallaria that this showdown will be a fair one.

1104103050.content: Then, as if she's presiding over the Knights of Convallaria's entrance exam, Athena raises the sword symbolizing justice high above her head.

1104103052.content: Even the knights who've been working with Athena for years are befuddled by this latest development, for their Commander has never condoned any behavior disruptive to public order before...

1104103053.content: What are you still doing standing there? There's going to be an even bigger crowd here once the performance gets underway, so do what you have to do to ensure the smooth passage of traffic around here.

1104103055.content: Although almost all the Knights are stunned for a brief moment, they're also experienced enough to quickly turn around and form a protective human wall in front of the belligerent parties.

1104103057.content: Equally stunned are the rock-and-roll kids on the scene, who are all staring at Athena. It looks like they've totally forgotten why they were here in the first place.

1104103058.content: You're the stars, so please get ready for the show now. If you need extra hands to move stuff, the Knights of Convallaria can help. You have 30 minutes, and if you aren't ready by then, we'll interpret that to mean you've conceded the contest.

1104103059.content: ... Don't tell me that in spite of your extreme willingness to engage in violence, you actually have zero faith in your musical abilities and fear that you might fail?

1104103060.content: N-nonsense! Don't you dare look down on us! We fear nothing!

1104103063.content: Aren't you carrying it right now, though...?

1104103065.content: Slow down please, Ash. I don't ride very often...

1104103067.content: The galloping horse beneath me neighs in dissatisfaction. Clearly, he has no intention of slowing down.

1104103068.content: Of course I want to get to Athena as soon as I can, too. But look, speeding is an offense. Besides...

1104103069.content: I'm wondering if I actually don't have to worry about her after all...?

1104103070.content: Although Athena used to be rather inflexible, even outright overbearing, when dealing with such matters before, she had her own reasons for acting like that. Had she not acted like that— Um, we're going too fast. Ash!!! I'm going to fall off!!!

1104103071.content: But this appeal to empathy only makes Ash go even faster. The resulting inertia pulls me backwards towards his tail and into an almost-horizontal position.

1104103072.content: (Was Ash sired by a champion racehorse or something...? No, I guess he just wants to get to Athena as soon as possible.)

1104103073.content: But when I arrive at my destination on the back of my "self-driving" steed, I find the scene in front of me to be a little different from what I imagined.

1104103074.content: Huh? Didn't the two fellows standing guard say that...

1104103075.content: I was half expecting to see a fierce group fight or scores of dejected young troublemakers being taken away by the Knights of Convallaria.

1104103076.content: Ash, are you sure we're at the right place? This looks like the venue of an open-air concert or something...

1104103078.content: Ash coolly flashes me a "follow me" look, then keeps on trotting.

1104103079.content: Incredibly, Ash has indeed located Athena.

1104103080.content: Everyone! Make sure that you keep the audience at a safe distance from the stage!

1104103081.content: And make sure that the holographic voting codes are available at various spots to keep the audience from overcrowding at any one location!

1104103082.content: Um... Did I miss something here?

1104103085.content: I see a look of extreme surprise on Athena's face. Then she looks over at Ash, all puffed up, and immediately realizes what's going on.

1104103086.content: #{nickname}#, I'll deal with the fact that you've brought out a horse from the Knights of Convallaria stable without prior authorization later... You didn't miss anything too important. The real show is yet to start.

1104103087.content: And this is the Paperclips with "Bass, Solitude, & the Blue Sephirah Zone"! Thank you! Thank you! Remember to vote for us!

1104103089.content: And next, we have the Tonics with their cover of the Ain Soph song "Promise."

1104103091.content: Wow, I wasn't expecting an Omorfies band to cover a song from Ain Soph. I didn't think music from Ain Soph would be popular here.

1104103092.content: Ain Soph pop music is pretty influential in Omorfies. I myself buy a record from time to time.

1104103094.content: Athena is standing next to me as we both look at the performance on the makeshift stage. However, at the same time, she keeps her hand on her sword, and she's also looking out for trouble from the corner of her eye.

1104103095.content: I'm guessing she'll be able to handle whatever emergencies she encounters immediately. In fact, she might even be able to do so without causing the slightest ripple in the air around us.

1104103096.content: Just standing here next to Athena makes me feel so safe.

1104103097.content: Omorfies does indeed have a certain pride and persistence bordering on stubborn.

1104103098.content: But this doesn't mean that the city will exclude the art of the other Sephirah Zones by default. On the contrary, Omorfies has always been open and inclusive, which is why the art here is evergreen and never goes out of style.

1104103099.content: And this is the Omorfies that I wish to safeguard...

1104103101.content: I can't quite hear Athena over the singing and excited cries of the crowd. Was she talking to herself?

1104103102.content: Looks like I really was worried for nothing.

1104103104.content: It's nothing... It's just that I heard that you were here to handle some kind of clash between two bands, and then somehow I allowed Ash to bring me here.

1104103105.content: ... I'm sorry, #{nickname}#. You must've been so worried because of my domineering behavior before.

1104103106.content: I know I caused you and Verthandi quite a bit of trouble back then. I'm so sorry.

1104103107.content: Please don't say that... At the end of the day, we were outsiders who had no idea what Omorfies had gone through before. We had no right to judge the way things were done here. But I must say...

1104103108.content: I do prefer the way you handle things now, Athena.

1104103109.content: Athena turns to me with a look of surprise at hearing my honest opinion on her face.

1104103111.content: No need to thank me... I was just saying how I feel.

1104103112.content: I'm actually little lost for words when I see the serious expression on Athena's face. Am I one of those people whose words, no matter how uncontrived, always end up having a more powerful effect than the speaker intended?

1104103113.content: And that was the Tonics with their rendition of "Promise." Thanks, everyone!!!

1104103114.content: Athena opens her mouth to say something to me. But again, I can't hear her over the roaring applause and voices around us. And I can't read lips, either.

1104103115.content: All I can do is to ask Athena to repeat herself, but she just lets out a little laugh and shakes her head.

1104103116.content: I was saying... the opinions of visitors from other Sephirah Zones are also very important to the Knights of Convallaria.

1104103119.content: It sounds like Ash is heckling his owner for some kind of dishonesty in her statement.

1104103121.content: Even though it's so noisy all around us...?

1104103123.content: Interestingly, this gentle ribbing seems to bring out Athena's cheeky side.

1104103124.content: Ash, it's time for you to go back. I'll come see you again regarding the matter of your unauthorized excursion from the stables.

1104103125.content: You were his fellow conspirator, weren't you, #{nickname}#? Why don't you come with Ash and me? That way, you can expect some leniency from me.

1104104001.content: The battle of the bands goes on for several hours, until the beautiful streets of Omorfies are bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun.

1104104002.content: The crowd on this already bustling thoroughfare continues to grow. However, thanks to the extremely efficient management of the Knights of Convallaria, there is neither chaos nor a crowd crush in sight.

1104104003.content: I feel like it doesn't matter now who wins or loses.

1104104004.content: Yeah. I mean, we're having the time of our lives, and so's the audience. I don't even remember why we started fighting in the first place...

1104104005.content: Ahahahahahaha! I guess this is what they call rock and roll!!! (Headbanging)

1104104007.content: Awesome. Looks like not only has the conflict been resolved, you also have yourselves a grand concert... You've created a world where no one is hurt, Athena.

1104104008.content: ... Why does it feel like you're being a little sarcastic here, #{nickname}#?

1104104009.content: I wasn't. You must have imagined it. I'm not Ash.

1104104011.content: Sorry I pulled you into this, Ash.

1104104012.content: Athena turns back to look at Ash and gives me a smile of resignation.

1104104013.content: I didn't think that the two of you would be so close now. To be honest, that makes me a little envious.

1104104015.content: You have no idea how long it took for Ash and me to get to know and build up trust with each other.

1104104016.content: For example, Ash really likes to bump me with his muzzle, regardless of if he's in a good mood or in a bad mood. It took me quite a while to know which bump meant what.

1104104017.content: Sometimes, when I'm slightly late to taking him out to graze, he throws a real tantrum. At other times, he simply sits in the hay and refuses to move.

1104104018.content: And when he's in a hurry, does he gesture at you to move the door latch?

1104104019.content: Looks like you've already seen that for yourself, #{nickname}#.

1104104020.content: Athena and I share a look and chuckle.

1104104021.content: Do Ash and I look close...? While I am quite fond of him, I'm not sure how he feels about me. After all, he's got quite the poker face...

1104104022.content: If he doesn't trust you, #{nickname}#, he wouldn't have taken you along to find me. Am I right, Ash?

1104104023.content: As if to confirm what Athena just said, Ash nuzzles my arm with his cute little pink nose. But it feels like he's trying to scratch an itch or something...

1104104024.content: However, having said that, I do still have to deal with the fact that you brought out a horse from the Knights of Convallaria stable without prior authorization.

1104104025.content: Athena's voice takes on a serious tone. But looking at her face, she doesn't really seem angry. She probably doesn't really plan on punishing either one of us too harshly...

1104104026.content: Ash, you will not be allowed to head out to graze for the next three days. You can reflect on your mistakes in your stall. As for you, #{nickname}#...

1104104027.content: It was Ash who wanted to come out here! I just did him a tiny favor, that's all!

1104104029.content: Ash's eyes widen to the size of dinner plates. How dare you stab me in the back like that, I can imagine him saying.

1104104031.content: Athena looks at the two of us, trying hard not to laugh out loud.

1104104032.content:
As for you, #{nickname}#, your punishment is to return with Ash and me to the Knights of Convallaria camp.
Any objections?

1104104034.content: Yes. Was I not clear just now?

1104104035.content: Well... Alright, then. I accept my punishment.

1104104036.content: Excellent. In consideration of your expression of contrition, #{nickname}#, on behalf of the Knights of Convallaria I hereby re-affirm your status as an outstanding honorary citizen of Omorfies.

1104104037.content: The dam finally bursts, and Athena is finally laughing out loud.

1104104038.content: Okay, but how are we going to bring Ash back?

1104104039.content: I got here in a flash thanks to Ash's amazing speed and stamina. But walking him back the way we came will take much, much longer.

1104104040.content: Naturally, we'll have to ride him back.

1104104041.content: And would it be you or me, Athena? Either way, we won't be able to do it together...

1104104042.content: Of course we'll ride on him together.

1104104043.content: Athena turns around, and with a single graceful leap she is on the horse's back. Then she reaches out her hand to me, while I stand down here dumbfounded.

1104104046.content: There's no reason for me not to grab on, and with Athena's hand firmly in mine, I manage to get onto Ash's back. Athena's back is now just centimeters away from me.

1104104049.content: If you're still feeling unsure, you may hold on to my waist.

1104104050.content: Oh, no, no, I was just worried that the two of us together might be a little too much weight for Ash to take...

1104104051.content: Don't worry, the horses of the Knights of Convallaria are all well trained. This is nothing to them.

1104104053.content: The rather impatient Ash has already started trotting.

1104104054.content: Ash doesn't seem very pleased, though.

1104104055.content: He just dislikes being compared to other horses. And that's been the case with this boy since the very beginning.

1104104056.content: He's a horse with a big personality indeed.

1104104057.content: Athena leans forward, her back slightly bent, and pets Ash on the neck.

1104104058.content: Ashen Glory is the best horse among those of the Knights of Convallaria. That's a fact, plain and simple.

1104104059.content: Ash's gallop takes on a lighter, merrier feel, as if Athena's words have cheered him up.

1104104060.content: Hold on, I don't think this is the way we came...

1104104061.content: That's all right. We can take the longer way back, given the occasion. Just treat it as a tour, #{nickname}#.

1104104063.content: It's one unexpected development after another. I'd never have imagined that I'd be taking a tour of Omorfies on horseback, let alone being led by the leader of the Knights of Convallaria.

1104104064.content: It's quite an honor to go on a horseback tour of Omorfies with the commander of the Knights of Convallaria...

1104104065.content: It's my day off today, and my emergency duty is also over. So it's not the Commander of the Knights of Convallaria who's taking you on the tour right now, #{nickname}#. It's just an ordinary citizen by the name of Athena.

1104104066.content: I just wanted to take you around a little more.

1104104067.content: Aren't you supposed to be punishing me for taking Ash out on an unauthorized excursion right now?

1104104068.content: ... Yes. So you don't have the right to refuse.

1104104070.content: The breeze in our hair brought on by Ash's gallop has also made the red hair in front of my eyes dance. Oh, how it looks like blazing fire in the light of the setting sun!

1104104071.content: Maybe it's because this is the first time I'm so close to Athena, or maybe it's because of what she said just now, but I've just noticed how slender she is compared to what I imagined a knight commander would look like.

1104104072.content: She may be a knight who's stoutly safeguarding the peace of Omorfies, but right now, I only see her as a girl.

1104104073.content: #{nickname}#, we're now on the coastal road. We'll see the Stellaris Sea soon.

1104104074.content: The Stellaris Sea of legend...? Hmm, I think I can smell it in the air already.

1104104075.content: Then, right at this moment, the gap between the buildings on both sides of the road suddenly fall to the sides, and the vista of the coast opens up.

1104104076.content: The golden coastline is as long as the eye can see, and the orange-red sun is about to fall into the deep blue of the Stellaris Sea.

1104104077.content: I seem to remember that there's a folk song here in Omorfies about the Stellaris Sea.

1104104078.content: Yes, and it's called "Sea of Stars." It's a really popular tune here.

1104104079.content: Do you think you could sing it for me?

1104104081.content: The "Sea of Stars" was originally not a folk song, but a very ancient melody. The lyrics that were added later on made the song a singalong tune for everyone here in Omorfies.

1104104082.content: Are you trying to change the subject, Athena?

1104104083.content: ... Not at all. But we're riding on the road right now, and I don't want to be distracted and become a safety hazard.

1104104085.content: As I'm sitting behind Athena, I can't see her expression. All I can see is her squeezing Ash's torso with her legs, causing Ash to speed up again.

1104104086.content: Hey, hey, hey! How are you not a safety hazard already when you're going so fast?!

1104104087.content: We're still under the speed limit, #{nickname}#. You may hold on to my waist if you like.

1104104088.content: There seems to be a tinge of mockery in Athena's voice. It's like she's saying, You're afraid already? At this speed?

1104104089.content: ... I'm taking you up your offer!

1104104090.content: I reach out petulantly and wrap my arms around her waist. Her body jumps for a moment when I touch it, but soon things are back to normal. Except now, her back is straight instead of bent.

1104104093.content: For some reason, the two fall into a silence. Night has slowly descended around us.

1104104095.content: The silence is broken by Athena.

1104104096.content: Huh? Why are you thanking me all of a sudden...?

1104104097.content: It's a rule in the Knights of Convallaria that everyone must take a day off on their birthday. Although it's a rule that was first instituted by my Grandmother Colleen, I've never really been able to let my hair down on this day. In fact, all these years, I've always found one reason or another to go back on duty.

1104104098.content: That's what I was planning today, #{nickname}#. But you and Ash found me in the end...

1104104099.content: While it was necessary to mete out a punishment to you for taking out one of our horses without permission, this has also given me quite the excuse to finally unwind.

1104104100.content: And I find that peaceful days like this are even better than I thought.

1104104101.content: I think I finally understand now why my grandmother came up with this rule in the first place.

1104104102.content: I still cannot catch a glimpse of Athena's face. I can only feel her fiery red hair brush my cheeks in the night breeze.

1104104103.content: ... To put it bluntly, you're the kind of person who isn't honest with yourself.

1104104105.content: There's nothing strange or bad about that. But if you need a reason to be honest with yourself, I am happy to be that for you.

1104104106.content: And now Athena's back to saying nothing. But my back, which has been feeling a little stiff since she lifted me up onto the horse, is now finally relaxing.

1104104107.content: I mean, I'm also profiting from all this, no? Not only do I get to ride a horse, I also get to attend a classical music concert this evening... Wait, is that still on?

1104104108.content: Of course. The Knights of Convallaria never go back on their word. Besides... you're the one I promised, #{nickname}#.

1104104109.content: But isn't it a little too late to get tickets now?

1104104110.content: Athena looks up at the sky, which has already turned dark as ink.

1104104111.content: It might be... But I'll think of a way.

1104104112.content: You're not going to do something in your capacity as Commander, are you? That's not—

1104104113.content: I wouldn't do that even if you were to beg me to, #{nickname}#.

1104104114.content: Athena immediately cuts into my absurd speculation mid-sentence.

1104104115.content: True. This is you we're talking about, after all.

1104104117.content: Let's bring Ash back first. We're almost there.

1104104118.content: We might be going to a concert that's a little smaller in scale than you expect, #{nickname}#. But I think you'll enjoy it.

1104104120.content: Actually, the day has already been a pretty fun and exciting one for me, thanks to Athena. But what she just said seems to be a rather intriguing hint.

1104104121.content: Okay. I'm looking forward to it!

1104105002.content: Ha ha, that was tough on you too, Athena... Or are you already used to Ash throwing tantrums when you send him back to the stables?

1104105003.content:
Actually, it looks like Ash is more excited than usual today too.
I suppose that's because you're here, #{nickname}#.

1104105005.content: That's right. Although Ash goes out to graze every day, getting a trip out to the seaside like he did today is a novelty for him.

1104105006.content: He only got to do that because you're here. Besides, the two of you are getting along famously, given that you only met for the first time earlier today.

1104105007.content: I think that's why Ash was so reluctant for you to leave just now.

1104105008.content: Heh, so that's how he expresses his affection...

1104105011.content: Quiet, boy. The other horses have gone back to their stalls to sleep.

1104105013.content: Although he quietens down a little, Ash is still stubbornly pulling in the opposite direction of the stables despite our best efforts to get him inside.

1104105014.content: You're not getting your carrot and apple tonight if you continue to do this.

1104105016.content: Of course Athena found the most immediate way to get Ash to acquiesce. The horse looks down on the ground for a while, as if he's pondering something, and then suddenly turns to me.

1104105017.content: Ash stretches his head and muzzle out to me, then rubs his little pink nose all over my shirt.

1104105018.content: ... Are you saying goodbye to me now? Bye, Ash... Huh?!

1104105019.content: As if he's finally found the right spot, Ash suddenly bites down on my sleeve.

1104105020.content:
To be precise, he didn't really bite down on it, but he's using his lips to hold on to the sleeve's fabric.
So while he hasn't hurt me, I'm confounded by Ash's move for a moment.

1104105021.content: Hmm? Are you trying to take me back to your stall, Ash?

1104105022.content: Huh? I know you have a nice big stall, Ash, and all that hay is rather comfy, but...

1104105024.content: Athena's voice is quiet but assertive. Ash reluctantly lets go of me.

1104105025.content: Alright, let's not keep #{nickname}# any longer.

1104105026.content: Athena is petting Ash on the neck as she speaks to him soothingly.

1104105027.content: Aren't you feeding Ash a midnight snack later, Athena? May I join you?

1104105028.content: I was going to feed Ash myself, as the stable hands would have gone home by then. I'd be very grateful if you do it with me, #{nickname}#. Besides, I think that would make Ash really happy too.

1104105029.content: I'm just worried that Ash will get carried away... I mean, he was rather rude to you just now.

1104105030.content: Heh, but I didn't mind that at all.

1104105031.content: Athena and I come to Ash's stall bearing a basket of carrots and apples. Ash has seen us coming and is pacing his stall in anticipation.

1104105032.content: Although Ash is still keeping relatively quiet because of Athena's warning earlier, he's using every other method available to express his excitement.

1104105033.content: As soon as we open the stall's window, Ash sticks his head out like he's a gopher emerging from a hole.

1104105034.content: Ash, it may be your snack time now, but remember not to make too much noise. The other horses are resting.

1104105035.content: Ash nods exaggeratedly. It's like he's saying, "Just bring it over already," rather than agreeing to what Athena is saying.

1104105036.content: So, are all horses fond of carrots and apples?

1104105037.content: Yes. That's because not only carrots and apples are crunchy and juicy, they have a lot of sugar in them, which is unlike their usual diet.

1104105038.content: Looks like horses have a sweet tooth.

1104105039.content: I guess you could say that. What about you, #{nickname}#?

1104105040.content: I have a sweet tooth too! Desserts make life so much better!

1104105041.content: Hold on... It feels a little weird that you're asking me this right after we talked about the dietary preferences of horses...

1104105043.content: Ash is enjoying his night snack very much. He doesn't seem to care what we are talking about.

1104105044.content: I'm a little hungry myself now too, heh.

1104105046.content: Ash looks up at me with half a carrot left. He hesitates for a second, then gobbles it down.

1104105047.content: It looks like, while Ash may like you, he doesn't like you enough to share that carrot with you.

1104105048.content: Ha! Or maybe we should say that Ash likes his food more than he likes me... Hmm?

1104105049.content: Although I didn't get that remaining half of a carrot, Ash retrieves a handful of grass from the bucket hanging on the wall of his stall and extends it to me. He even raises his chin, as if he's trying to signal something.

1104105050.content: #{nickname}#, I think Ash wants you to have that grass instead.

1104105051.content: Hmm... While that's a really sweet gesture on Ash's part and I'm grateful for it, I don't know if I'd like the taste of grass. And it'd be really rude of me to spit it out in front of him.

1104105052.content: Actually, to the human palate, grass doesn't taste like much. It would just taste like a bit of dirt, that's all.

1104105053.content: Oh? Have you eaten grass before, Athena?

1104105054.content: Yes, it's part of the outdoor survival training we have to undergo as Knights of Convallaria.

1104105055.content: Athena shares this shocking fact with me in the most blasé way one can imagine.

1104105057.content: You mean eating grass? That's nowhere near the toughest thing about survival training.

1104105059.content: Yes. They also make us do things like climb cliff faces while carrying heavy loads, traverse the desert, and escape from submarines.

1104105060.content: Wow... Does it have to be that way, though...?

1104105061.content: Although the dark times of Omorfies are over now, it doesn't mean that we can take our current peace for granted.

1104105062.content: The Knights of Convallaria can only ensure this peace will continue if we're prepared for all sorts of contingencies.

1104105063.content: Look at Ash bobbing his head. I think he agrees with you.

1104105064.content: He's just saying, "Stop talking and give me my carrot." See...?

1104105065.content: And indeed, Ash's head stops bobbing the moment we hand him another carrot.

1104105066.content: But #{nickname}#, is it really alright for you to take another day off so you can stay longer in Omorfies?

1104105067.content: Well, I do have several days of annual leave left. So, you know, I'm entitled to this! It's my right to take a break from work!

1104105068.content: In all seriousness, though, I received a message from Miss Shu a little while ago telling me that my duties here in Omorfies have concluded earlier than expected. She's even arranged for the hotel to pack up my things and send them to the Photon Rail station by drone.

1104105069.content:
I did check with Miss Shu several times to make sure there's no urgent work waiting for me back at HQ before I asked for a day of leave.
But that does mean I have to find a place to stay now...

1104105070.content: Although I should be able to find myself a hotel room even on such short notice... would it be okay if I stayed at your place, Athena?

1104105071.content: Of course, #{nickname}#. You are our honored guest, and besides...

1104105072.content: Athena pauses and looks away. I think I see a little bit of a blush on her face.

1104105073.content: ... Isn't that friends what friends are for?

1104105075.content: Having said that, I very rarely have friends stay with me...

1104105076.content: So please forgive me if you find your accommodations lacking.

1104105077.content: Having initially welcomed me with open arms, Athena now seems to have become rather anxious.

1104105078.content: You very rarely have friends stay with you...? I must be pretty special, then.

1104105079.content: Would you like something to drink, #{nickname}#?

1104105080.content: Don't worry about me... I'm already putting you to so much trouble by staying at your place.

1104105081.content: What are you talking about, #{nickname}#? I was the one who invited you here, so please don't stand on ceremony with me.

1104105083.content: Yeah... That'd be nice. Thank you.

1104105084.content: Why don't you take a seat in the living room, #{nickname}#... Oh, you're free to take a look around if you like.

1104105085.content: Athena probably tacked on that last line after noticing I've been looking around nonstop since I entered her home.

1104105087.content:
But I am very curious. The house is not ornately decorated, but there is a strong artistic feel to it nonetheless.
It feels like, even though most of the things aren't formally on display, many of them are of great artistic value.

1104105088.content:
Just as I'm being fully immersed in the art of Omorfies, Athena returns to the living room with tea.
And look, there's also...

1104105089.content: Is this an omelet? Smells good...

1104105090.content: Sorry, I'm not much of a cook. This is the best I can whip up, really.

1104105091.content: Don't undersell yourself, Athena. The omelet looks delicious.

1104105092.content: That's probably because you're famished, #{nickname}#. I mean, you were already saying that you were hungry while we were feeding Ash.

1104105093.content: And then you had to feed me after you were done with Ash. You're working so hard, Athena.

1104105094.content: It's all right. Omelets are a simple everyday dish here in Omorfies.

1104105095.content: Okay, I'll dig in, then. Ahhhhhh...

1104105097.content: Athena, who's sitting next to me, is asking for my opinion in a seemingly casual tone of voice. However, I can see her hands in her lap, and they're clasped together tight. She's like an apprentice chef who's nervously waiting for the judgment on her cooking.

1104105099.content: And I wasn't exaggerating at all. The egg is melt-in-your-mouth tender, and the pleasing aroma fills my mouth and nostrils immediately.

1104105101.content: Looks like Athena has heaved a sigh of relief.

1104105102.content: With your cooking skills... you have nothing to worry about, Athena.

1104105103.content: I haven't had the experience of cooking for someone else... ever since my grandmother Colleen passed away.

1104105105.content: Just as I think I've accidentally stepped on a landmine, I see a look of reminiscence on Athena's face.

1104105106.content: You know, I'd take my cooking to her with such great excitement every time. And every single time, all I got from her were these scathing comments.

1104105107.content: Oh...? So I assume the legendary Commander Pallas had high standards not just for her men, but for food, too.

1104105108.content: That was just how my grandmother was. She was all about attention to detail.

1104105109.content: But, even though she'd always give me scathing, but well-founded, criticism about every aspect of a dish, she'd end by petting me on the head and saying, "It's delicious, Athena."

1104105110.content: So, every time after one of these sessions with my grandmother, I'd go back thinking that I had to make one great dish that would be impossible for her to critique in any way.

1104105111.content: Now that I think back on it, I think my grandmother was trying to teach me with tough love.

1104105113.content: I can't help saying this out loud, as I continue to savor the flavors of the omelet.

1104105115.content: No, no, I swear, no! It's exactly what I'm thinking, heh heh...

1104105116.content: You know, I've heard it said that the great Commander Pallas was absolutely impartial, even pitiless. But it sounds like she had a soft spot for you, Athena.

1104105117.content: It wasn't just me. My grandmother always bore the purest of goodwill towards everyone... That was why she could make protecting Omorfies her lifelong vocation.

1104105118.content: However, because she had experienced the dark days of Omorfies, she had to use her sword decisively from time to time, even cruelly so.

1104105119.content: That's why many people couldn't see her good intentions, even at the very end... Of course, my grandmother never wavered nor complained. It's just that as her descendant, I feel bad for her sometimes.

1104105120.content: It's like they say: Heroes are always lonely. Isn't that right?

1104105121.content: But Athena simply smiles and shakes her head at my comment.

1104105122.content: My grandmother wasn't lonely at all. She had comrades who fought with her shoulder-to-shoulder and companions who shared her values and visions. She had friends, some as serious as a funeral, and others, serious clowns.

1104105123.content: "Serious clowns"? Her friends? I'm having difficulty imagining how the famously stern and exacting Commander Pallas would look standing next to a bunch of jokesters.

1104105124.content: Maybe "serious clowns" is a bit of an exaggeration. Better to say that they had a keen sense of humor, I guess...

1104105125.content: Although Athena is obviously talking about her grandmother, there's an expression on her face that suggests she herself is lost in some memories right now.

1104105126.content: Grandmother had a friend... named Lucian.

1104105127.content: Although he seemed like a flippant and unserious man, friendship was something that was extremely important to him. Even when he was dying, he poured himself into the making of a sculpture just because it was a gift he'd promised my grandmother.

1104105128.content: Sculpture... Was this Mr. Lucian a sculptor? Like Mr. Oceanus?

1104105129.content: He wasn't just a sculptor. He was accomplished in many forms of art. Unfortunately, he was struck down by illness at a rather young age...

1104105130.content: Take this doll for example—it's a work of his.

1104105131.content: Athena takes out an old, but very well kept, doll from a cabinet behind the couch.

1104105132.content: While it is indeed exquisitely made, the first thing that catches my eye is...

1104105133.content: A lady knight with flaming red hair? Did he base it on—

1104105137.content: Athena's demeanor changes from one of surprise to speechlessness in a split second.

1104105138.content: #{nickname}#. This doll was made by a friend of my grandmother's. So how could it have been based on me? That doesn't make any sense.

1104105139.content: Ah, you're right. And since Mr. Lucian died at a rather young age, he couldn't have met you, Athena... Looks like the only person he could have based this on was Commander Colleen Pallas.

1104105141.content: This natural conclusion doesn't seem to sit right with Athena, either, judging by the mixed emotions on her face.

1104105142.content: Actually... Mr. Lucian did meet me once... when I was nine.

1104105144.content: Athena closes her eyes and inhales deeply, as if she's steeling herself to do something.

1104105145.content: #{nickname}#, are you willing to hear what might be a totally absurd story from me?

1104105147.content: Then we have to go back to the time when I was taking the entrance examination for the Knights of Convallaria...

1104105149.content: Huh. I didn't know something like that happened...

1104105150.content: Doesn't it sound like the kind of confused memories children sometimes have when they get lost, #{nickname}#? You know—because as a child, I'd read so many fairy tales where the protagonist strays into one otherworldly wonderland or another...

1104105152.content: Even if it were a story made up by a child, it is a wonderful and very touching story. Thank you—I enjoyed it.

1104105153.content: ... I should be the one thanking you, #{nickname}#, for being willing to listen to my story. This is the first time I've told anybody this.

1104105154.content: Oh? So I'm the first to hear it? What a great honor!

1104105156.content: As though my reaction was indeed way too enthusiastic and made things a little awkward, Athena picks up her cup of tea and takes a sip from it.

1104105157.content: Without thinking, I also pick up my tea. That's when I suddenly notice that the relaxing aroma of the tea has filled the entire room.

1104105158.content: This tea smells really good... Did Commander Pallas teach you how to make this, too?

1104105159.content: It smells good because of the high-quality tea leaves I used. But if you like this flavor, #{nickname}#, you might want to take some tea leaves with you. I suppose you can call that a souvenir from Omorfies too.

1104105160.content: Yeah, I think I'll do that. Although... is there something else in this tea? I feel like I can smell it...

1104105161.content: You're right, #{nickname}#. Want to take a guess at what else is in this?

1104105162.content: Hmm.... It tastes a like a bit of apple, and a bit of lemon too...

1104105163.content: I pick up the tea again and swallow a big mouthful. However, I still can't tell what the components of this richly layered liquid tapestry are.

1104105165.content: This is a flavored tea with a dash of apple, lemon, and honey in it. Here in Omorfies, we call this "Friendship Tea."

1104105166.content: "Friendship Tea"? That's a rather interesting name.

1104105167.content: It's said that this tea was first made at a small gathering of close friends from the nobles of Omorfies. When it first spread among the rest of the populace, it was widely believed that drinking this tea with your friends would make your friendship stronger...

1104105168.content: I think that's probably because the person who invented and promoted it was the incredibly popular Hera.

1104105169.content: Oh, so Miss Hera was the one who created this? I did hear that she's really fond of hosting tea parties.

1104105170.content: So this is a tea that you drink with your friends to make your friendship stronger, huh...

1104105171.content: I can't stop myself from looking through the wisps of steam that are rising from my tea and into Athena's eyes.

1104105173.content: I don't know much about it. Like I said, I rarely invite friends over, nor have I ever held a tea party, so I don't know whether this story is true or false. I mean, it really is an urban legend, isn't it...

1104105174.content: Athena is talking really quickly now, and I smile a little at this sudden turn.

1104105177.content: Well, I at least feel closer to you now, Athena. Is it just me?

1104105179.content: I feel the same way. I guess the story is true, then.

1104105180.content: But #{nickname}#, I must say, that counter question of yours was a little over the line.

1104105181.content: Athena is staring at me with a deep frown. It looks like she's really angry.

1104105183.content: Athena's expression quickly relaxes after I bow my head and make a sincere apology.

1104105184.content: It's getting late... Time sure passed quickly. I think I understand now why Hera likes to have tea parties with her friends so much.

1104106003.content: A little girl is sweating profusely while she holds a wooden sword that is way too big for her. And standing in front of her, observing her every move with sharp eyes, is the figure that the girl is chasing.

1104106004.content: Grandmother, do you think I can become a Knight of Convallaria?

1104106007.content: This is a difficult and lonely road, Athena. Are you sure you're ready to do this?

1104106010.content: I am fortunate to have friends who continue to watch me, even after they've turn into stars. So I'm never alone.

1104106011.content: Will I meet someone like that in the future?

1104106012.content: ... Heh. Yes, you will. But maybe you won't want to meet someone who'd leave you behind so early in life.

1104106013.content: Are you... putting away the cello for good?

1104106015.content: But why? You're already winning competitions at such a young age, Athena. Surely that means you'll be an accomplished musician in the future...

1104106016.content: I passed the Knights of Convallaria's entrance exams. Now I'm officially a knight.

1104106017.content: The girl carefully locks her cherished cello into a large box, and then locks the box in the back of a cabinet. She feels like she's putting away a picture book she read in childhood for what might be the last time.

1104106018.content: I know that. But that doesn't mean you have to give up the cello, right? Can't you continue playing it as a hobby?

1104106019.content: Now that I'm a member of the Knights of Convallaria, I must be focused. Plus, Grandmother also said that this will be a difficult and lonely road. So... I know what I have to do.

1104106021.content: Grandmother also said that as long as I have close friends, I'm never really alone.

1104106022.content: I've met Grandmother's friends... I think she earned these friends because she was so dedicated and hardworking.

1104106024.content: Oh, Athena—you are so much like your grandmother.

1104106026.content: Maybe it happened because I was sleeping in the house where Athena grew up. Or maybe it was because I'd listened to Athena's stories about her childhood before I went to bed.

1104106027.content: Are these... Athena's memories? Or are those just fabrications of my brain?

1104106028.content: I try to piece together and interpret the images from my dream, but I feel like I'm walking in a forest shrouded in thick fog, and now the images themselves are fading into a vast expanse of white.

1104106029.content: I open my eyes to find that it's still dark outside. The guest room that I'm in has a faint scent of white sandalwood, which is supposed to aid sleep. However, I'm wide awake in this moment.

1104106030.content: (I'll go get some fresh air, then...)

1104106031.content: The room is on the second floor and has its own little balcony. I walk out onto it, and there I can smell the distinct scent of the Stellaris Sea on the night breeze.

1104106032.content: As I look around, I see nothing but stars twinkling in the sky... Hold on... Is that another light?

1104106034.content: I spot a light in the corner of my eye. I try to determine its position, then decide to visit the other person in the house who can't sleep.

1104106036.content: I quietly knock on the door of Athena's bedroom, and she opens the door with a look of surprise on her face.

1104106038.content: Um, I woke up and couldn't get back to sleep. Then I saw that the light was still on in your room... Did I wake you, Athena?

1104106039.content: No, I don't tend to keep the light on while I sleep.

1104106040.content: Athena smiles at me, though she looks slightly tired.

1104106041.content: Is the mattress in your room too hard for you, #{nickname}#? Or are you not used to the sandalwood scent? I'm so sorry...

1104106042.content: No, no, no. The mattress is really comfy, and the incense is also very soothing. It's just that I had a very strange dream... and when I woke up, I was still thinking about it so I couldn't get back to sleep...

1104106043.content: Is this so? Having strange dreams is also an indication of poor sleep. It looks like I could have done a better job with the guest room...

1104106044.content: Please don't say that. It might just be that I need some time to get used to a new bed, that's all.

1104106045.content: I hurriedly wave my hands at Athena, trying to stop her from dwelling on something that definitely isn't worth it.

1104106046.content: But why are you still up at this hour, Athena?

1104106047.content: Unlike me, Athena doesn't look like she's slept a wink yet.

1104106048.content: I was just writing in my journal.

1104106050.content: That's where I note down everything that's happened in the day to see if I can do anything better.

1104106051.content: You're really hard on yourself, Athena...

1104106052.content: Really? I don't think it's dissimilar to how many people keep personal diaries.

1104106053.content: ... But do you work until this time every night?

1104106054.content: Of course not. It's just that today... I had a little to write down more than usual.

1104106055.content: Athena's voice suddenly sounds a bit odd. Instinctively, I ask,

1104106057.content: I feel a little mean as soon as the words leave my mouth. Athena purses her lips and looks at me, but responds nevertheless.

1104106058.content: Like... how I received a birthday gift from you, #{nickname}#. And how I introduced you and Ash to each other, and how the two of you became such good friends so quickly.

1104106059.content: I also wrote about how it was possible to resolve that conflict between the two bands in a more flexible manner. And how you and I rode on Ash to the beach.

1104106060.content: And I wrote about how I invited you to stay over tonight, #{nickname}#, and that we had tea and supper, just like it was a tea party.

1104106061.content: There's also how, for the first time, I told someone a story that I was afraid would be only seen as something I made up...

1104106062.content: Athena's back is ramrod-straight, and all of this has tumbled out in a single breath as though she's giving a battle report. Then a flush appears in her cheeks and her chest heaves slightly, but the entire time, she continues to look directly and unflinchingly at me.

1104106063.content: That sounds like quite an eventful day, when you put it like that... I guess I'll remember it, too.

1104106065.content: A silence falls upon the still night. But like a sugar cube that has fallen into a cup of black coffee, it disappears in an unremarkable fashion.

1104106066.content: So, #{nickname}#. You were saying you had a strange dream? Was it a nightmare?

1104106067.content: If it's causing you to lose sleep, it may be a good idea for you to talk about it and get it off your chest.

1104106068.content: But what if it causes both of us to lose sleep?

1104106069.content: Then we can talk until dawn. It may not be a bad idea to have... a pajama party—is that what they call it?—once in a while...

1104106070.content: We both break into a chuckle, and our eyes meet.

1104106071.content: Don't keep standing at the door. Come in and sit down.

1104106073.content: Athena steps to one side to let me into her room.

1104106074.content: I see an open notebook on the table, resting in the warm glow of lamp light. That's probably Athena's journal.

1104106075.content: As my curiosity leads me to look that way, Athena quickly closes the notebook. But I manage to catch the words on the cover of this diary-like booklet, which read, "Notes of a Knight of Convallaria."

1104106076.content: I'm sorry, I didn't mean to be a busybody...

1104106077.content: It's okay. I already told you what I wrote in it, anyway.

1104106078.content: But Athena still carefully sets the notebook aside.

1104106079.content: I can't help stop myself frmo thinking, Isn't she acting like a teenage girl with a secret diary...?

1104106081.content: The doll on Athena's otherwise bare desk catches my attention. That's because it's the very same doll I saw earlier, the one said to be made by Commander Pallas's friend in her likeness.

1104106082.content: Didn't I see it in the glass cabinet in the hall earlier?

1104106083.content: There were many other dolls in that cabinet that looked just as interesting. The red-haired knight appears to be just one piece of a large collection.

1104106084.content: Ah... I was just thinking about your comments on it, #{nickname}#, so I brought it with me for a closer look.

1104106086.content: Well, didn't you say the moment you saw it that it looked like me?

1104106088.content: The only thing I can do right now is give her a goofy smile while I scratch my head a little.

1104106089.content: But it made me think: Maybe I did catch up with Grandmother to some extent...?

1104106091.content: Athena looks at the doll thoughtfully, and I look over at it too. The battered knight is still clutching her sword, unwilling to give up.

1104106092.content: She's right. Even if I hadn't had that strange dream, I would still know this was the figure you were chasing all along. But...

1104106093.content: I'm sorry. I suppose it's a little odd to be seeking the answer from you, #{nickname}#. The fact that I'm looking for the answer from a doll shows I'm still a long way from my goal.

1104106094.content: That's not what I meant, Athena...

1104106095.content: So, will you tell me about your dream?

1104106097.content: I dreamed of y— I dreamed of a young girl holding onto a sword as she pursued a brilliant goal.

1104106098.content: I dreamed that the girl gave up a lot for this goal, and even shut away the thing she loved most for it.

1104106100.content: Athena is looking at me, her eyes wide with surprise. But I continue on.

1104106101.content: I dreamed that she told someone that it was something she had to do, because the road to her goal was a lonely one. She also firmly believed that only with such focus would she be worthy of the friends who could make this road less lonely.

1104106103.content: My eyes are firmly fixed on Athena's as I articulate each and every word deliberately. But Athena slowly lowers her gaze.

1104106104.content: It's my fault for telling you those strange stories, #{nickname}#. It's all my fault... Please forget about them...

1104106106.content: Athena raises her eyes to me again, looking a little lost.

1104106107.content: Mr. Lucian, Commander Pallas's best friend, made her this doll in her image. Maybe I did see a little of you in it, but...

1104106108.content: When I took a closer look, I realized that it's nothing like you at all.

1104106110.content: If I, as your friend, were asked to make a doll for you, Athena, and if I were ever good enough to do that...

1104106111.content: I think I'd make a doll of you playing the cello.

1104106113.content: You've long since stopped playing it? Are you sure?

1104106114.content: Aren't you still using the bow, Athena? Even during battle?

1104106117.content: Of course. I'm your friend, Athena, and I always have my eyes on you. And...

1104106118.content: I'll continue to do so. Would you play me something, please?

1104106119.content: ... It's so late right now. I don't want to wake up the neighbors.

1104106120.content: What neighbors? Your house is the only one here, Athena.

1104106121.content: Besides... Oh, that's right. Didn't you promise to take me to a concert tonight, Athena?

1104106122.content: What do we do now.. The sun is almost up...

1104106124.content: Athena rolls her eyes at me and sighs in resignation.

1104106126.content: We Knights of Convallaria must keep our word, after all.

1104106127.content: Then, oddly, Athena smiles in relief.

1104106129.content: I follow Athena to the attic, where she takes out her cello from the locked cabinet.

1104106130.content: (Oh, so it wasn't in a giant box... I guess the images in my dream weren't real after all...)

1104106131.content: What box? And what do you mean by, "weren't real after all"?

1104106133.content: We head back to the living room and sit down. Athena begins to carefully check her cello, and it appears she finds nothing wrong with it.

1104106134.content: Is there something you want to hear me play, #{nickname}#?

1104106136.content: Are you sure you don't want something more special?

1104106137.content: Well, it's the only song I know.

1104106138.content: ... Alright, then. Maybe it is the right choice for the occasion.

1104106140.content: You may not know this, #{nickname}#, but the "Sea of Stars" wasn't originally a song about longing for home. When it was first written, it was...

1104106141.content: ... a song that was written for the composer's best friend.

1105001001.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001001.content: Dango rice balls from Kyousaidou, melon and grapes from Tsuyunoya, yosegi handicrafts from Kyozanan...

1105001002.speaker: 我
1105001002.content: Buzenbo, are these all for me? That's enough!!!

1105001003.speaker: 我
1105001003.content: Besides, you know the baggage allowance on the Photon Rail... How am I supposed to take all these back with me?

1105001004.content: Buzenbo's hands are full with shopping bags containing specialties she's bought from all over Shimogyou.

1105001005.content: It's only after I remind her that she remembers that there's a limit for how much baggage Photon Rail passengers may carry.

1105001006.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001006.content: I've wanted to have dango rice balls with you anyway, Admin. You know, I even learned to perform the traditional tea ceremony just for this.

1105001007.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001007.content: How about we eat the fruits I bought from Tsuyunoya while moongazing? The melon and grapes from Sasanami are really sweet, and I've been wanting to share them with you.

1105001008.speaker: 我
1105001008.content: Fine, I suppose we can finish all that... Let's head back then?

1105001009.content: Buzenbo thinks it over, and then shakes her head.

1105001010.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001010.content: Then you won't have enough to bring back with you. I'll get you some traditional wagashi confectionery too then, Admin.

1105001011.speaker: 我
1105001011.content: No! Seriously, I won't be able to finish everything if you do that.

1105001012.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001012.content: It'll be the full moon two nights from now. Here in Sasanami, everyone will be admiring the moon with their friends and loved ones.

1105001013.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001013.content: So I was thinking... It'd be lovely to watch the moon with you before you go back to Ain Soph, Admin. We can have the confectionery while doing that.

1105001014.content: Despite her efforts to keep her tone of voice neutral, I can still hear the hopefulness in it.

1105001015.content: It seems she's really looking forward to what she just suggested. I look into her eyes, and I really want to stop her, but I can't bear to utter the words. So in the end, I end up walking with her to the confectionery store, where there is a long line of customers waiting outside.

1105001016.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001016.content: If you don't wish to stand in line, Admin, you can go back to the Pheasant Squad room and wait for me there. I'll be back once I'm done shopping.

1105001017.speaker: 我
1105001017.content: It'd be so boring for you to stand in line alone. I don't have anything else on right now anyway, so let's do it together.

1105001018.content: I stand in line behind her. I eye the shopping bags in her hand and decided to help her with a few.

1105001019.speaker: 我
1105001019.content: (Ow, this is heavy! Just how much did she buy?!)

1105001020.content: There's a real weight to the bags. It's clear to anyone who's paying attention that she's bought far too much "souvenirs."

1105001021.content: The streets of Shimogyou are bustling to begin with, and the closer we get to the confectionery store, the bigger the crowd.

1105001022.content: This store is so well-known, a number of people standing in line have actually come all the way from Kamigyou. But their patience has obviously been exhausted seeing how the line has not moved for some time.

1105001023.content: As a result, even the small talk they make while in line has taken on a somewhat dark and menacing complexion.

1105001024.speaker: 下京区居民A
1105001024.content: Have you heard about what's happening at Hayashizaki Hall...? I wonder if the news has spread to Kamigyou already...

1105001025.speaker: 下京区居民B
1105001025.content: Heh, anyone who doesn't know about it by now must be deaf and blind. What a scandal it is! I'd have never imagined that the master of Hayashizaki Hall would sneak a murderer to Ain Soph.

1105001026.content: For some reason, it looks like Buzenbo really wants to turn around after overhearing this conversation. But she hesitates for a while, then finally takes a quick glance behind her before looking back at the line in front of her again, as if nothing has happened.

1105001027.content: I notice this little peek of hers, and suddenly recall that she grew up in a dojo or something. Which means that she must know of this "Hayashizaki Hall" that these people are talking about.

1105001028.speaker: 我
1105001028.content: This "Hayashizaki Hall," Buzenbo... Is it a famous dojo here in Sasanami?

1105001029.content: There is a long silence. I reach how to pat her on the shoulder, but her body is stiff and unresponsive.

1105001031.content: The conversation behind her has taken on a gloating, even malicious tone.

1105001032.speaker: 下京区居民B
1105001032.content: Had the dojo master's students not told on him, who knows how long more he'd have hidden the truth...

1105001033.speaker: 下京区居民A
1105001033.content: Heh. Maybe there's more to the story that we don't know about.

1105001034.speaker: 下京区居民B
1105001034.content: Anyway, let's just enjoy the show for now! By the way, that sword duel in three days' time is going to be intense, and probably only one person will be left standing. Who do you think will win?

1105001035.speaker: 下京区居民B
1105001035.content: They say that fearsome is the vigor of the young man. Given his age, I don't think the dojo master can win this time...

1105001036.content: Buzenbo starts to shake slightly. I look steadily at her.. Although I do not know what's happening, I instinctively reach for her hand.

1105001037.content: Her hand is covered in cold sweat, and I'm taken aback by the chill I feel at first touch.

1105001038.content: Buzenbo is still in a daze by the time it's our turn to order.

1105001039.speaker: 团子铺店员
1105001039.content: Hi, how can I help you?

1105001040.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001040.content: ... I'm sorry. Give me one of everything, please.

1105001041.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001041.content: And then an additional two portions of the matcha and azuki bean flavor, too. And please pack that separately.

1105001042.content: The store clerk casually chats with Buzenbo while packing her order.

1105001043.speaker: 团子铺店员
1105001043.content: You must be so tired from buying all that stuff! And I know for a fact that the dango rice balls from Kyousaidou sell out almost as soon as they hit the display case.

1105001044.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001044.content: Yeah, sometimes they're already sold out by the time I call ahead to reserve. Thankfully, I managed to get everything before #{nickname}# leaves Sasanami.

1105001045.speaker: 团子铺店员
1105001045.content: Your guest must be very important to you. Oh young lady, or are they...

1105001047.content: The clerk casts a meaningful glance at me. Just as I cock my head to look at her in puzzlement, she smiles conspiratorially, then leans over to Buzenbo to speak in her ear.

1105001048.speaker: 团子铺店员
1105001048.content: How sweet of you! You must have a really good relationship with your treasured guest, heh...

1105001049.content: Buzenbo is standing there with her mouth slightly agape when the clerk hands her the beautiful bag containing her purchases, makes a "you can do it" gesture, then chuckles while covering her lips with one hand.

1105001051.content: But the clerk has already moved on to the next customer in line, and is no longer available to hear Buzenbo explain.

1105001052.speaker: 我
1105001052.content: What were you two talking about? Why does she look so tickled?

1105001053.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001053.content: It's nothing. Just idle chatter, that's all?

1105001055.content: I turn back to look at the store clerk, and wonder if I should approach the question from another angle.

1105001056.content: Buzenbo has clearly guessed my intention. She grabs me by the arm and stares at me a little nervously.

1105001057.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001057.content: (What if this causes a misunderstanding with #{nickname}#? Or even worse...)

1105001058.content: The more she thinks back to the conversation she just had, the more uneasy she becomes.

1105001059.speaker: 我
1105001059.content: Oh by the way, do you know what's going on at Hayashizaki Hall?

1105001061.content: Buzenbo looks away from my questioning gaze.

1105001062.content: Something's not quite right with Buzenbo. I want to probe a little further, but I'm interrupted by the sound of a female yelling with much vigor and gusto.

1105001063.speaker: 「咕桑家」店员
1105001063.content: Opening special from Torisuke! Come use our photo booth and get a free menu item! So come in with your friend or loved one and take a picture right now!

1105001064.content: It's probably human nature to be attracted by free stuff, and I'm no exception. Even Buzenbo, who's been quietly frowning away, looks up at where the voice is coming from.

1105001065.speaker: 「咕桑家」店员
1105001065.content: Oh, you two are adorable! Want to try our photo booth? If it's the two of you, the photo is gonna turn out great! You'll look so awesome in our album of sample pictures!

1105001066.content: The clerk eagerly steps towards us, their eyes shining with enthusiasm. Buzenbo is a little at a loss for what to do. She takes a few awkward steps back, and looks over to me for help.

1105001069.speaker: 我
1105001069.content: We're talking photo booth pictures here! The kind where you press your faces really close together, right? Um... I feel like this is something only couples or really close friends do.

1105001070.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001070.content: Yeah, you have to press your faces together...

1105001071.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001071.content: Is that a problem for you, Admin?

1105001072.content: She raises her head to take a quick glance at me, her voice hesitant and slowly becoming inaudible.

1105001073.speaker: 「咕桑家」店员
1105001073.content: And our oyakodon is famous throughout Sasanami! If you don't try it, you'll regret it!

1105001074.speaker: 「咕桑家」店员
1105001074.content: Come on, just share the photo you take to get your coupon! What do you have to lose?

1105001075.content: Seeing Buzenbo showing the first signs of interest in the service, the Kuwaya clerk continues to talk to her.

1105001076.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001076.content: Torisuke is indeed a famous shop here in Sasanami and I've been wanting to bring you there for their oyakodon, Admin. I didn't know that they had an outlet here in Shimogyou.

1105001077.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001077.content: So if you don't mind, Admin, let's— Of course! Of course it's my treat, Admin, even if we don't use the photo booth!

1105001078.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001078.content: But if we do... that'd be great...

1105001079.speaker: 我
1105001079.content: You don't have to be so serious... It's not every day that I come to Sasanami on vacation anyway, so I'd love to take a photo. Hey, miss? Would you show us your sample pictures please?

1105001080.speaker: 「咕桑家」店员
1105001080.content: Great! The photo is going to look awesome, I promise you!
