1105001081.content: ... Couples in love or close friends smiling at the camera, their bodies pressed against each other. They look relaxed and happy, like they have absolutely no cares in the world at that moment.

1105001082.content: I look at these photos for a really long time without saying anything. Then, I glance over at Buzenbo.

1105001083.content: I think I see a fleeting expression of shyness on her face for a moment. But soon after, it changes to one of excitement.

1105001084.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001084.content: If possible, I'd love to have a snapshot with you as a memento, Admin.

1105001085.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001085.content: But we don't have to leave it here for your other customers to look at, right?

1105001086.speaker: 「咕桑家」店员
1105001086.content: Heh heh, of course not! It's so wonderful that the two of you have decided to do this!

1105001087.speaker: 「咕桑家」店员
1105001087.content: Look over here! And say... cheese!

1105001088.content: Buzenbo is leaning very close to me, and I can smell the refreshing fragrance of cherry blossoms in her hair. As the camera flash goes off, I can't help but touch her short crop of violet hair.

1105001089.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001089.content: Um... why are you doing that, Admin?

1105001090.content: Her shoulders tremble slightly when she feels the touch of my fingertips, but she doesn't push me away.

1105001091.speaker: 我
1105001091.content: I want to thank you, Buzenbo, for inviting me here for my vacation. I also want to thank you for buying me so many gifts and for these photos.

1105001092.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001092.content: Oh, no, no, it's nothing at all! I've been wanting to do all these things with you anyway, Admin. And this is just a small part of it!

1105001093.speaker: 「咕桑家」店员
1105001093.content: The photos look fantastic! If only I could frame them up and display them at the front of our shop, haha! Here, your pictures.

1105001094.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001094.content: Oh no... No, no, please don't do that.

1105001095.content: Buzenbo takes the photo, traces the heart-shaped border carefully with her finger, then carefully puts it into her pocket.

1105001096.content: The clerk smiles back at her, saying "Got it, got it," while shoving our freebie coupons into our hands.

1105001097.speaker: 我
1105001097.content: Let me see... The house specialties here are the oyakodon, gyudon, grilled unagi... and they even have tempura on the menu! What do you want to have, Buzenbo?

1105001098.content: Buzenbo takes a look around the shop, then looks back at where we came from. After a while, she gently shakes his head at me.

1105001099.speaker: 我
1105001099.content: Huh? Aren't we doing this together? What's going on, Buzenbo?

1105001100.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001100.content: I know that I don't always have the opportunity to sit down for a meal with you, Admin. But this time... there's something I need to do.

1105001102.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001102.content: No, no, it's just a personal matter I have to tend to! I'll tell you everything, Admin, once it's all settled... But for now, no questions please, okay?

1105001103.content: Buzenbo hesitates for a moment, and our eyes meet for a second. Then, she bites down on her lower lip, then quickly turns away to leave.

1105001104.content: I look at the store's recommended menu items, then wave the server over to my table.

1105001105.speaker: 我
1105001105.content: I'll have two portions of the oyakodon to go. More seven-spice powder on one of them, please.

1105001107.content: It's already dusk by the time Buzenbo opens the door. She's a little surprised to see the packed oyakodon I've placed in front of me.

1105001108.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001108.content: Look at the time, Admin. Were you... waiting for me with the oyakodon?

1105001109.speaker: 我
1105001109.content: I'm guessing you haven't eaten yet, Buzenbo. I didn't want you to be hungry on your own. Besides... didn't we get two coupons? Let's eat together!

1105001110.content: Buzenbo is on the verge of saying something when the grumbling noises from her stomach get ahead of her.

1105001111.content: After a while, she finally sits down opposite me, albeit with some reluctance still. I pick up the chopsticks and she starts to open the packaging.

1105001112.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001112.content: Thank you, Admin. I really like oyakodon, and even tried making it when I was in Ain Soph. But my attempts weren't very successful one way or another...

1105001113.content: Although she's trying her best to pretend that nothing is wrong, she seems distracted even as she's talking to me. She's pausing from time to time as she picks up her food with her chopsticks, and she doesn't seem to be enjoying the meal very much at all.

1105001114.content: I am pondering how to broach the topic when she knocks over her teacup.

1105001115.content: Although she manages to catch it immediately, the hot tea has spilled nevertheless, and the back of her hand is scalded red.

1105001118.content: I grab hold of her hand and pull her over to the pond. As the cool water runs over the back of her hand, the red mark gradually subsides, though it is still rather disarming to look at.

1105001119.speaker: 我
1105001119.content: Buzenbo! What is going on??? This isn't how you usually——

1105001120.content: Buzenbo gently squeezes on my hand in the water, her eyes lowered. She purses her lips several times.

1105001121.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001121.content: Are you wondering where I just went, Admin?

1105001122.speaker: 我
1105001122.content: Yeah, of course! Something seemed a little off with you at the confectionery store... Has this to do with what we heard about Hayashizaki Hall? That dojo?

1105001123.content: She doesn't immediately answer. Seeing that the back of her hand is still a little red, I hesitate for a moment, then touch it, slowly and carefully.

1105001124.content: Her brows knit together at the sight of this action. I quickly pull out the pain relief spray and spray it on liberally despite her protests.

1105001125.speaker: 我
1105001125.content: Does it hurt? Fine. Let's say that you really can't tell me anything. But surely you didn't have to...

1105001126.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001126.content: Do you really want to know, Admin?

1105001127.content: I hear a forced chuckle. I nod at her, and she reluctantly smiles at me.

1105001128.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001128.content: You must already know that before I awakened as a Modifier, I was living at a dojo as the adopted child of the dojo master.

1105001129.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001129.content: That dojo was Hayashizaki Hall. I caused my adoptive father quite a bit of trouble when I awakened, and he secretly sent me away to Ain Soph as a result.

1105001130.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001130.content: But we should have been the only two people who knew about this. And it's been so long since it happened, too. I had the feeling that someone is scheming against my adoptive father, and so I... followed the students of Hayashizaki Hall.

1105001132.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001132.content: But I couldn't quite make head or tail of what they were saying. Although I followed them for quite a while, all I could make out was that someone was plotting something.

1105001133.speaker: 我
1105001133.content: What if we report this to Aether Gazer...?

1105001135.content: Buzenbo suddenly raises her voice. Then, seeing how I'm taken aback, she lowers her head and speaks in her regular tone again.

1105001136.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001136.content: I know I'm being stubborn here. But I can't keep causing trouble for other people.

1105001137.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001137.content: Please, Admin. I must ask you not to tell anyone else about this.

1105001138.speaker: 我
1105001138.content: But whoever's scheming against your father——

1105001139.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001139.content: I hope to resolve this matter with your help, Admin. I mean, you must be better at analyzing the intel from them than I am!

1105001140.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001140.content: You're better at making plans than I am, too...

1105001141.content: There's a look of desperation hidden in her red pupils. It's like she's a drowning person who's finally managed catch a piece of driftwood. How am I supposed to say no to that?

1105001142.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105001142.content: So, please, Admin... Can I count on you in this matter?

1105002001.content: Night has fallen, and right now, out here in the courtyard, I can hear the cicadas chirping very clearly.

1105002002.content: Buzenbo looks at me pleadingly as she waits for my answer.

1105002003.content: She of all people should know that when someone stares at you like this, no normal person would say no.

1105002004.speaker: 我
1105002004.content: Buzenbo, I'm happy to help you. But first... how about you tell me everything, from the very top?

1105002005.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002005.content: So, I followed the students of Hayashizaki Hall just now. From what I can tell eavesdropping on them, the mastermind behind all this must be one of the dojo's students.

1105002006.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002006.content: And I'm guessing that the mastermind may discuss this matter with them where the Hayashizaki Hall's waterfall practice takes place.

1105002007.speaker: 我
1105002007.content: Where the dojo's waterfall practice takes place? Aren't they afraid that they'd be caught red-handed by the dojo master there?

1105002008.content: She shakes her head slightly and speaks again with a little difficulty.

1105002009.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002009.content: Those students said that tomorrow... they would go there at a time when my father would be practicing in seclusion. And my father is a real stickler for things like rules and schedules.

1105002010.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002010.content: Although nothing his students do escapes his attention usually, they can do whatever they want at a time like this.

1105002011.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002011.content: Even if the sword duel is happening real soon, he won't allow anything to disrupt his practice. This was the case with him back then, and I suppose it's still the same with him now.

1105002012.content: I can now see where Buzenbo gets her personality and habits from.

1105002013.speaker: 我
1105002013.content: So what do you plan to do, Buzenbo?

1105002014.content: She thinks for a moment, then speaks again with a hint of hesitation in her voice.

1105002015.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002015.content: #{nickname}#, I think I should duel on behalf on my father. The chances of winning are better that way.

1105002016.speaker: 我
1105002016.content: But that's going to set tongues wagging. And you won't be able to find out who the mastermind is that way.

1105002017.speaker: 我
1105002017.content: If someone really wants to smear the reputation of Hayashizaki Hall, they won't stop there anyhow. They'll continue to make trouble for the dojo master after you leave Sasanami.

1105002018.content: Buzenbo looks like she wants to say something. She bites down on her lower lip for a while and comes up with another suggestion.

1105002019.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002019.content: If we can find out who else is participating in the duel, maybe we'll be able to do something.

1105002020.speaker: 我
1105002020.content: Buzenbo, just to be clear, I have to ask you this: you aren't thinking of causing your father to miss the duel, are you?

1105002023.speaker: 我
1105002023.content: Besides, this won't solve anything, and may lead to even greater trouble for Hayashizaki Hall down the road.

1105002024.content: Buzenbo falls silent, her lips pursed together tightly. She looks at me helplessly for quite some time.

1105002025.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002025.content: If you were in my shoes, #{nickname}#, what would you do?

1105002026.content: Naturally, I'd prefer to get in touch with Aether Gazer and talk to Miss Shu to see if she can help. But I know how you don't want to bother others, Buzenbo.

1105002027.content: I remember how troubled she looked at the time, shake my head, and start thinking about other solutions.

1105002028.speaker: 我
1105002028.content: There must be a reason the mastermind spread that story about you and your father. So if I were you, I'd first find out why.

1105002029.speaker: 我
1105002029.content: If this is about exposing illegal activity, they could have just gone to the Sasanami police. But if this is about seeking justice one way or another...

1105002030.speaker: 我
1105002030.content: No, that can't be. Think about it: This is something that happened many years ago. Anyone wanting justice would have done so much earlier.

1105002031.content: The look in Buzenbo's eyes is one of serious focus, and it looks like she's running through in her mind all the scenarios I just mentioned.

1105002032.speaker: 我
1105002032.content: Looks like you're feeling much calmer now, Buzenbo?

1105002033.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002033.content: I'm sorry about just now, Admin.

1105002034.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002034.content: Well, if we don't figure out what the mastermind is after, we won't know where to start our investigation.

1105002035.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002035.content: Tomorrow, I'll hide myself at the waterfall. Hopefully I'll be able to find out what they're planning.

1105002036.speaker: 我
1105002036.content: Sounds like... you don't intend to bring me with you?

1105002037.content: The young lady hesitates momentarily, then silently clenches her fists.

1105002038.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002038.content: Are you sure that's not too much trouble, #{nickname}#?

1105002039.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002039.content: This is clearly my personal matter. Please don't feel obliged to come with me... Plus, you don't go on vacation very often, #{nickname}#. You should enjoy Sasanami as much as you can.

1105002040.speaker: 我
1105002040.content: No, I'm afraid I can't agree with that...

1105002041.content: She wants to say something else, but I interrupt her.

1105002042.speaker: 我
1105002042.content: If there's any nefarious plot going on here, two heads are better than one if you need to think of countermeasures.

1105002043.speaker: 我
1105002043.content: To be safe, let's just go together!

1105002044.content: She watches me steadily. Looks like I'm succeeding.

1105002045.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002045.content: I'm so sorry for implicating you in this, #{nickname}#.

1105002046.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002046.content: I'll understand if you're mad at me, #{nickname}#. But so long as——

1105002047.speaker: 我
1105002047.content: Buzenbo. You know we're friends, right?

1105002048.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002048.content: Yes! And I know that you always have my back, #{nickname}#!

1105002049.content: She speaks urgently while leaning forward slightly, the sincerity apparent in her red pupils.

1105002050.speaker: 我
1105002050.content: So. Isn't it natural and understandable to seek help from your friends?

1105002051.content: But for someone like Buzenbo, seeking help from others is undoubtedly a massive challenge.

1105002052.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002052.content: But that's not right. I should be able to——

1105002053.speaker: 我
1105002053.content: It's okay to need help once in a while, Buzenbo. Let me help you out and share your burden here.

1105002054.speaker: 我
1105002054.content: I'll come with you to that waterfall tomorrow, then.

1105002055.content: The girl's eyelashes tremble slightly. Quite some time later, I hear her reply in a barely audible voice.

1105002056.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002056.content: Then... Thank you for taking the trouble, #{nickname}#... I'll thank you properly when all this is over.

1105002057.speaker: 我
1105002057.content: OW!... B-Buzenbo??? What are you doing here?!

1105002058.content: Early morning the next day. I'm walking groggily out of my room when I nearly stub my toe on something. The "thing" turns over sleepily, and as its eyes met mine, we both become too stunned for words.

1105002060.content: Buzenbo has clearly lost any sleepiness she might have had, and she bolts upright immediately. She looks up at me with those big, clear eyes of hers.

1105002061.speaker: 我
1105002061.content: What's going on? Did you actually plant yourself at my door all night long???

1105002062.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002062.content: I haven't had the responsibility of protecting you before, #{nickname}#. So I went to ask Kuninotokotachi earlier, and she said that...

1105002063.content: Buzenbo purses her lips slightly. For some reason, there's a little hesitation in her usually steady and decisive voice.

1105002064.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002064.content: She said that I had to stay by Admin at all times, and it's best that I...

1105002065.speaker: 国常立
1105002065.content: You're asking me what to look out for when protecting Admin...?

1105002066.speaker: 国常立
1105002066.content: Actually, there isn't any——No, actually, Buzenbo, you know what? Admin does tend to draw Visbanes for some reason.

1105002068.speaker: 国常立
1105002068.content: So you mustn't take things lightly.

1105002069.speaker: 国常立
1105002069.content: It's best that you stick by their side at all times. Even when they're asleep?

1105002071.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002071.content: In fact, while Admin is sleeping you should...

1105002072.content: Buzenbo's voice slowly goes inaudible, and she's no longer looking at me.

1105002073.content: Although she doesn't make it explicit, given her troubled expression, even a fool can understand what she means.

1105002074.speaker: 我
1105002074.content: Oh, don't believe what Kuninotokotachi says! She's the only one who'd do something like that!!!

1105002075.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002075.content: No, no, Kuninotokotachi may play the fool sometimes, but I don't believe that she'd joke about matters concerning your safety, Admin.

1105002076.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002076.content: Besides, my Master also told me to watch out for you and never let you be by yourself, Admin. So it's best that I kept vigil this way.

1105002077.content: While I'm sure I'd be safe if she were to stick to me like this all the time, even when I'm sleeping, but is that really necessary just to ensure that I won't be attacked by Visbanes???

1105002078.content: I want to say something, but looking into Buzenbo's eyes I realized it'd be useless to say more.

1105002079.content: Thankfully, she seems to find the moment a little awkward too, and she changes the subject of our conversation.

1105002080.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002080.content: It's a little early, Admin, but since we're both awake now it may not be a bad idea for us to head to the waterfall now.

1105002082.content: She leads me through Shimogyou, her footsteps light and swift.

1105002083.content: We come to a spot where the crisp morning breeze and dense water vapor hits us all at once. I can hear the sound of water rushing down the rock face. Although we aren't far from Shimogyou, there's no one else here.

1105002084.speaker: 我
1105002084.content: I imagine that whatever you do here, be it picnicking, fishing, or camping, would be very enjoyable. This is a great spot for practice indeed.

1105002085.content: Buzenbo is looking for a suitable place from which to eavesdrop on the on-goings at the waterfall. She seems to recall something when she hears my words, and chuckles softly to herself.

1105002086.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002086.content: This was my favorite place to practice before I awakened.

1105002087.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002087.content: Whenever I meditated under the waterfall, I could hear the sound of distracting thoughts being washed away from my mind. Even the birdsong here became especially clear to my eyes whenever I finished practicing here.

1105002088.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002088.content: At that time, I thought, oh, if only days like this could last forever—Found the spot.

1105002089.content: Buzenbo is standing at a spot covered in vegetation, and she beckons for me to go over.

1105002090.content: The lush greenery and the symphony of insect and bird song here do seem to be conducive to the concealment of one's presence.

1105002091.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002091.content: I think this spot should work. Although the students of the dojo are sharper than most people, the insect sounds here should be able to mask the sounds of your breathing, #{nickname}#.

1105002093.content: I find myself a good position and manage to completely conceal my figure behind a tree trunk. Then, Buzenbo comes closer to me.

1105002094.content: She's pressing against me, into the trunk of the tree, and her breath is softly falling on my ear... From this angle, while she can observe what's happening with her eyes, I can only hear the sounds.

1105002096.content: I'm about to say something when I can hear rustling sounds in the woods. It sounds like there's more than one person moving.

1105002097.content: As Buzenbo listens to their footsteps, her eyes narrow slightly. Before I can ask her something, she covers my mouth with her soft hand.

1105002098.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002098.content: Slow your breathing, #{nickname}#... Or they'll discover us.

1105002099.content: I try to breathe as lightly I can onto Buzenbo's palm. After a moment of silence, she raises her head to look at the persons coming from behind the tree.

1105002100.content: Their voices are also becoming increasingly audible to us.

1105002101.speaker: ？？？
1105002101.content: That bloody old fool, going on and on about Kendo all the damn time. And all he's doing is to make sure that we can't make any money!

1105002102.speaker: 武馆弟子A
1105002102.content: Right? If he insists on holding on to the meager property Hayashizaki Hall has, the best he can do is to keep himself from starving to death.

1105002103.speaker: 武馆弟子A
1105002103.content: Following the path of old will never bring us success.

1105002104.speaker: 武馆弟子B
1105002104.content: The Kiyamagumi has made so many visits to the dojo just to borrow a few warm bodies.

1105002105.speaker: 武馆弟子B
1105002105.content: And imagine, they're willing to pay so much for just a few warm bodies! Kotarou, this is real money we're talking about here.

1105002106.speaker: 武馆弟子C
1105002106.content: Too bad that old fool is so stubborn and can't see what's really important.

1105002107.speaker: 武馆弟子C
1105002107.content: I don't care that he doesn't want to work with the mob. But who is he to tell us what to do? Nagasawa-senpai, don't you agree?

1105002108.speaker: 长泽津
1105002108.content: And to think the Kiyamagumi was so sincere this time. As you know, we aren't the only dojo here in Shimogyou. We can't afford to miss this opportunity.

1105002109.speaker: 长泽津
1105002109.content: Fortunately, the Kiyamagumi has the goods on the old man—you've all heard about his adopted daughter going psycho and murdering people, haven't you?

1105002110.speaker: 武馆弟子B
1105002110.content: The one who was made Menkyo Kaiden at the age of 14? Heh, with your abilities you might just beat her in an one-on-one duel, senpai. Besides, hasn't she gone missing?

1105002111.speaker: 长泽津
1105002111.content: The Kiyamagumi has spread the rumor saying that it was the old man who sent her to Ain Soph... This piece of knowledge has come in useful after all.

1105002112.speaker: 武馆弟子A
1105002112.content: But I say, senpai, shouldn't you just break away and set up your own dojo since you're already a Menkyo Kaiden? Why stay under the old man's wing when you can do whatever you want...?

1105002113.speaker: 武馆弟子C
1105002113.content: But you know as well as I do that Senpai is determined to be dojo master one day himself. I mean, he had to wait so long for that psycho murderer to leave the dojo.

1105002114.speaker: 长泽津
1105002114.content: Hmph, not like the position of dojo master is worth anything these days... it's just a fancy title.

1105002115.speaker: 长泽津
1105002115.content: It's a title one can use to make more money. It's the only reason one would spend twenty years of their life in a place like that.

1105002116.speaker: 武馆弟子B
1105002116.content: I feel that Senpai would make a better dojo master than the old man. Say, if the old man were to "die of an accident" during the duel...

1105002117.content: The members of the group look at each other, and start to laugh conspiratorially.

1105002118.content: The look in Buzenbo's eyes go from one of shock to emptiness, then finally suppressed anger.

1105002119.content: Because I'm so physically close to her, the changes in her mood are instantly palpable. And right now, it feels like a sharp blade is being unsheathed.

1105002120.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002120.content: They want to make it look like my father died of an accident...

1105002121.content: She murmurs inaudibly, and the hand covering my mouth presses into my face a little harder.

1105002122.content: The group then chats for a brief time longer after this, then leaves one by one.

1105002124.speaker: 我
1105002124.content: (I'm... about to suffocate! Be careful, Buzenbo!)

1105002125.content: But she's still staring at the retreating figures, sweat dripping from her palm. The pressure on my mouth has not diminished one bit.

1105002128.content: Buzenbo pulls back suddenly, as if she's just been burned by fire.

1105002130.content: There's a slightest, almost imperceptible, tremor in her voice. She bites down her lower lip again for a moment and looks away to the side with her eye lowered.

1105002131.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002131.content: S-sorry, I wasn't paying attention... Are you alright, #{nickname}#?

1105002132.content: I realize that I also took my prank a little too far and clear my throat. I also wave at her to tell her that I'm okay.

1105002133.content: Buzenbo's breathing, which suddenly became rapid due to my little action, gradually relaxes. But she continues to look away from me for quite a while.

1105002134.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002134.content: What... happened to Senpai? What made him like this?

1105002135.speaker: 我
1105002135.content: Is he someone you know, Buzenbo? The one you just called "Senpai"?

1105002136.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002136.content: Yes, he was my fellow student at Hayashizaki Hall. He joined the dojo before me, and we both made Menkyo Kaiden in the same year.

1105002137.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002137.content: He was the best student among the ones my father taught.

1105002138.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002138.content: A truly gifted swordsman who is almost peerless.

1105002139.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105002139.content: But why... did he... become like this...

1105003001.content: Although we're now in the dog days of summer, Buzenbo's hand, which is hanging by her side, is clenched and trembling slightly, probably from shock, anger, or both.

1105003002.content: And in this moment, I am lost for words. After all, any word of consolation said now wouldn't really do anything to help. Resignedly, I hold her gently on her shoulder and pat her on the back.

1105003003.speaker: 我
1105003003.content: This isn't anyone's fault, Buzenbo. You can't always tell what's on someone's mind.

1105003004.speaker: 我
1105003004.content: It's just that... humans get tempted so, so easily.

1105003005.content: The girl lowers her eyes and says nothing. A long while later, she speaks again, sounding rather dejected.

1105003006.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003006.content: Senpai... He too, was an orphan whom my father adopted. I thought he'd never, ever betray my father.

1105003007.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003007.content: My father, he's a simple and resolute man dedicated to the way of the sword. Back in the day, he had many students, and as long as they had some talent in them they would eventually become somewhat successful.

1105003008.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003008.content: And Senpai was undoubtedly in a league of his own. He made the rank of Menkyo Kaiden when he was 19.

1105003009.speaker: 我
1105003009.content: (Sounds like this fellow is going to be a pain to deal with...)

1105003010.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003010.content: I've never imagined that he'd try to harm my father because of money.

1105003011.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003011.content: And what is even more shocking to me is that he's willing to stoop to such lows by seeking his living from the mob.

1105003012.speaker: 我
1105003012.content: Maybe the Kiyamagumi made him an offer he couldn't refuse? Not that it justifies his choice, of course...

1105003013.content: Buzenbo holds her breath a little when she hears me say that. With her pursed lips, she looks like she wants to rebut me, but she can't seem to find the words to do so.

1105003014.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003014.content: So tell me, #{nickname}#, what would you do if you were in his shoes?

1105003015.content: She stares at me with a pleading look, a look that said please, show me there's some hope in this after all.

1105003016.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003016.content: What would you do if you were offered a bucket-load of money to betray someone with whom you've gone through thick and thin? Would you say yes?

1105003017.speaker: 我
1105003017.content: No, I won't. I get a pretty fat paycheck from Aether Gazer as it is.

1105003018.content: She gives me a rather miserable smile, clearly telling me that she isn't going to be taken by my facetious answer, then presses the issue again.

1105003019.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003019.content: Would you do that? Take the money and betray someone close to you like that?

1105003020.speaker: 我
1105003020.content: No, because my friends are irreplaceable to me.

1105003021.speaker: 我
1105003021.content: But this senpai of yours... seems to think money is more important, and that everyone around him can be used as a stake or bargaining chip.

1105003022.content: I'm not sure if I'm imagining it, but I think Buzenbo heaves a sigh of relief at this point.

1105003023.content: She was like a cat on edge when she asked the question. But the tension around her gradually melts away after she hears my answer.

1105003024.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003024.content: Your friends are more important to you, #{nickname}#, isn't that right?

1105003025.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003025.content: Even if one of them is an infamous psycho murderer...?

1105003026.content: I think back to the chattering Shimogyou residents, and also the obviously malice-filled conversation of the dojo students. For some reason, I feel a little sad.

1105003027.content: Even though Tsukuyomi has been working hard to resolve some of the issues in Buzenbo's past that continue to bug her, all these must have raked up some unpleasant memories for her.

1105003028.content: She seems to be expecting some kind of answer from me, though at the same time it also looks like she's afraid of the answer. But nevertheless, she stares at me and refuses to look away.

1105003029.speaker: 我
1105003029.content: Buzenbo, I believe in what I see.

1105003030.speaker: 我
1105003030.content: I see you as my super reliable companion, as the sharp blade that paves the way through a swarm of enemies, and as someone who has protected me every step of the way. I don't care what they say, but you're not a "psycho murderer" in my eyes.

1105003031.speaker: 我
1105003031.content: That is slander, pure and simple, from the mouth of an inferior. You are my friend and you're totally irreplaceable. So, Buzenbo...

1105003034.content: She wasn't expecting me to say something like that, and she looks at me with her red eyes, unsure, for a moment.

1105003035.content: But this lasts for only a second or two. Then, she lowers her gaze again and looks to the side while letting out a soft cough.

1105003037.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003037.content: To me, #{nickname}#, you're simply irreplaceable too. And I'll never betray you.

1105003038.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003038.content: Hmm... ANYWAY! Let's solve the dojo problem first! I——

1105003039.content: She tries to get to her feet while pretending nothing is happening.

1105003040.content: But maybe because she's been squatting for so long, her legs have gone numb, and she staggers as she tries to stand up. Before she even reaches out to the tree trunk for support, I've already reached out to hold her steady.

1105003042.content: She's fallen into my arms, and her back suddenly stiffens as our bodies touch.

1105003044.content: There's a slight tremble in her voice, and also something else. As she looks up at me, I see that the outer corners of her eyes are flushed, as if she's drunk.

1105003045.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003045.content: I-I'm fine. I can stand up on my own now. Sorry about...

1105003046.content: The girl stands up straight, her eyes still looking away.

1105003047.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003047.content: Let's continue with your plan then, shall we #{nickname}#? And our next step... would be to collect intel about the deal with Senpai and the Kiyamagumi, am I right?

1105003048.speaker: 暗御津羽
1105003048.content: Heh heh, such generosity from you, Administrator of Aether Gazer! What is it that you wish to know?

1105003049.speaker: 我
1105003049.content: I'm guessing you've already heard about what's happening with Hayashizaki Hall by now?

1105003050.speaker: 暗御津羽
1105003050.content: Are you talking about the sword duel? That's odd. I know you aren't from Sasanami, so what's your interest in this?

1105003052.content: Kuramitsuha looks me up and down. I clear my throat ostentatiously, and stand in front of Buzenbo to block her from those inquisitive eyes.

1105003053.speaker: 我
1105003053.content: I'm not sure what you're asking about, but let's just say you're right.

1105003054.content: Kuramitsuha shrugs and checks the transfer, as if she wants to be sure of the number of Ain Soph Coins she's received.

1105003055.speaker: 我
1105003055.content: Stop doing that in front of me! Makes me feel like I just got ripped off.

1105003056.speaker: 暗御津羽
1105003056.content: Don't say that! This money is for the Ninja Irregulars. Besides, this is a small price to pay for the intel you want!

1105003058.content: Kuramitsuha laughs slyly and puts her hand on my shoulder.

1105003059.speaker: 暗御津羽
1105003059.content: I assure you you're getting a good deal here, Administrator.

1105003060.speaker: 我
1105003060.content: Are you... really able to get more information about the deal between the Kiyamagumi and Nagayama Kotarou? Before they act?

1105003061.speaker: 我
1105003061.content: This concerns a human life, so please be serious here!

1105003062.speaker: 暗御津羽
1105003062.content: You have my word. If I can't get you the info you want, I'll handle your problem myself.

1105003063.content: It's only when Buzenbo sees Kuramitsuha's figure disappear in the distance that she finally turns to me.

1105003064.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003064.content: This is my problem, and it's not right that you're spending money on it, #{nickname}#. I think... it'd be better that this money be deducted from my expenses?

1105003065.content: It was quite a bit of money I just handed to Kuramitsuha, I won't lie.

1105003066.content: But as I look into Buzenbo's eyes, I cannot bring myself to ask her for the money back.

1105003067.speaker: 我
1105003067.content: We can talk about the money again later. Let's just solve the problem at hand first.

1105003068.speaker: 我
1105003068.content: You told me before that you can't show yourself to the others. But it's been so long, and surely they don't remember how you look like by now...

1105003069.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003069.content: We have to play it safe, #{nickname}#. I can't cause you or the others more trouble.

1105003070.content: I nod, and catch a glimpse of a stall selling masks at the corner of the street. I've been seeing more of these businesses lately, probably because of the coming festival.

1105003071.speaker: 我
1105003071.content: So, all we have to do is to make sure that they don't see your face, right?

1105003072.content: Buzenbo follows my gaze, and immediately understands what I'm thinking.

1105003074.content: Just as Buzenbo finally settles on the mask she'll be using, I get a call from Kuramitsuha.

1105003075.speaker: 我
1105003075.content: I wasn't expecting to hear from you so soon. Are you... done already???

1105003076.speaker: 暗御津羽
1105003076.content: Oh, don't underestimate the Irregulars now, Administrator of Aether Gazer!

1105003077.speaker: 我
1105003077.content: So? Did you manage to find out the details of the deal between the Kiyamagumi and Nagayama Kotarou?

1105003078.speaker: 暗御津羽
1105003078.content: Well, if you ask me, they're all a bunch of cowards. All I had to do was to... apply a little pressure on a few of the Kiyama boys to find out what's going on.

1105003079.speaker: 暗御津羽
1105003079.content: So. The Kiyamagumi wants to make Hayashizaki Hall its own, and the dojo students, its fighters. But the dojo master has been staunchly refusing all moves to this end.

1105003080.speaker: 暗御津羽
1105003080.content: And so, the Kiyamagumi has decided to stage an "accident" at the sword duel to allow Nagayama Kotarou to take the dojo master's place.

1105003081.speaker: 我
1105003081.content: They aren't very good at scheming, are they... I mean, you found out their plan so quickly...

1105003082.speaker: 暗御津羽
1105003082.content: How can you say that? It was my interrogation techniques that did the trick!

1105003083.speaker: 我
1105003083.content: Then how about the Irregulars? Did they find out anything?

1105003084.speaker: 暗御津羽
1105003084.content: Heh, this is where the intel gets really juicy. Two evenings from now, the boss of the Kiyamagumi will secretly meet with Nagayama during the Shimogyou festival.

1105003085.speaker: 暗御津羽
1105003085.content: The purpose of this meeting is for the two to settle on the plan timeline. The boss of the Kiyamagumi also wants to use this meeting to show that he's serious and committed to the plan.

1105003086.speaker: 暗御津羽
1105003086.content: And also... The both of them will be going to the meeting alone. If you plan on doing something, this will be the best time to act.

1105003088.content: Buzenbo falls silent as I hang up the call. A moment later, her slightly knit-together eyebrows suddenly relax, and the corners of her lips curl up slightly.

1105003089.content: I've seen this expression countless times while commanding Pheasant Squad in battle. The reserved Buzenbo only smiles when victory is at hand.

1105003091.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003091.content: Now that I've had some time to think about things, there are many ways to tackle the situation. Both Senpai or the mob are driven by profit, which means we will find their weaknesses sooner or later.

1105003092.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003092.content: After all... my father always taught us that "he who is shrewd with money takes few risks."

1105003093.speaker: 我
1105003093.content: So have you thought of a way yet?

1105003094.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003094.content: Yeah. If it's just the two of them at the meeting, the situation should be easy to handle.

1105003095.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003095.content: If you would help keep the boss of the Kiyamagumi busy, #{nickname}#, I should be able to get Senpai in the meantime. We can hand over the matter to the Sasanami police after that.

1105003096.speaker: 我
1105003096.content: While I'm happy to help, Buzenbo... Are you sure you aren't thinking a little too highly of me?

1105003097.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003097.content: Of course I'm not asking you to wrestle the boss, #{nickname}#! Did you bring your gun with you?

1105003099.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003099.content: For people like him, death is a loss that must absolutely be avoided. Just point your gun at him and threaten him a little, and he should surrender quickly.

1105003100.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003100.content: I'll work on subduing Senpai with my wooden sword at the same time.

1105003101.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003101.content: But before that, we must record their conversation as evidence. Otherwise, even if they are arrested they can't be prosecuted.

1105003102.content: The girl explains the plan carefully, and I begin to feel relief.

1105003103.content: Buzenbo is a little taken aback when she sees me smiling.

1105003105.speaker: 我
1105003105.content: No, no... It's just that I feel that I can really rely on you when you're all calm and collected, Buzenbo.

1105003106.content: As expected, an expression of awkwardness appears on the face of the girl who's still not used to receiving praise.

1105003107.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003107.content: Without your help, #{nickname}#, I'd still be bothered by what I heard at the confectioner's.

1105003108.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003108.content: And if you haven't been here to make plans with me, #{nickname}#, I might have done something stupid already.

1105003110.content: The girl looks up at me. For a moment, it seems that she wants to hold my hand, but she stops herself anyway.

1105003111.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105003111.content: Stay with me a little while more.

1105004001.content: The streets of Shimogyou are crowded with festival-goers, and fireworks can be seen in the sky overhead every now and then. There's a constant flow of people trying their luck at the game stalls. The atmosphere was so relaxed here, it's hard to associate the situation with a clumsy conspiracy.

1105004002.content: Thanks to tip-offs from the Ninja Irregulars, we manage to follow Nagayama and the boss of the Kiyamagumi to their secret meeting place.

1105004003.content: Even though the two of them are standing on a viewing deck all by themselves, we can hear their conversation thanks to the eavesdropping device the Irregulars have set up in advance for us.

1105004004.speaker: 奇山苍
1105004004.content: Shimogyou always has such great sights to offer, don't you think?

1105004005.speaker: 长泽津
1105004005.content: Let's skip the niceties. I've lived in this hellish place for so many years now, and I'm sick to death of whatever "sights" you're talking about.

1105004007.speaker: 奇山苍
1105004007.content: So, how are things going with the "accident" we're planning for the dojo master?

1105004008.speaker: 长泽津
1105004008.content: All we need is a "slip" of my hand at the sword duel two days from now.

1105004009.speaker: 奇山苍
1105004009.content: You seem pretty confident. How many of your fellow students at Hayashizaki Hall are you able to get on your side?

1105004010.speaker: 长泽津
1105004010.content: Hmph! Who's going to be on the old man's side, especially when he's in the way of them making money? Most of them in Hayashizaki Hall are already my people.

1105004011.speaker: 奇山苍
1105004011.content: Ha ha, such ambition and drive! So, tell me, Nagasawa: what do you intend to do with the money you'll get from us?

1105004012.speaker: 长泽津
1105004012.content: I'll leave this blasted place once I make enough money and go to Kamigyou! I don't care who takes my place as dojo master then.

1105004013.content: Kiyama Soube is about to shake his head and say something when he feels the cold of metal pressing into his lower back all of a sudden.

1105004014.content: By the time Nagayama notices the aura of hostility aura behind him, he can only grip the handle of his sword tightly and brace himself for action as he turns around.

1105004015.content: The girl wearing the Noh mask is looking at him silently.

1105004017.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004017.content: It doesn't matter... You may think of me as a faithful follower of the way of the swordsman who was once part of Hayashizaki Hall.

1105004018.content: Nagayama stares at the interloper dumbly for a moment, then laughs out loud like he's just heard a joke.

1105004019.speaker: 长泽津
1105004019.content: "Faithful follower"? "Way of the swordsman"? Hah! And what good is that nonsense the old man is always talking about?!

1105004020.speaker: 长泽津
1105004020.content: People like him are always spouting high-falutin' morals and principles, but in the end, all they do is get in their students' way!

1105004021.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004021.content: Since you're a Menkyo Kaiden, you can easily leave Hayashizaki Hall and set up shop somewhere. You can make money that way.

1105004022.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004022.content: But right now, you look even more pathetic than you are abominable.

1105004023.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004023.content: Didn't the master of Hayashizaki Hall teach us that once we stop resisting temptation and accept money from someone, we lose our worth? And that will become a real obstacle in the future?

1105004024.content: Nagayama's facial expression changes for a moment when he hears this.

1105004025.content: Nagayama is unable to find a weak point in Buzenbo's stance to attack. Even so, he's still all fired up. There is a glare as he unsheathes his blade, and he charges straight at Buzenbo.

1105004026.speaker: 长泽津
1105004026.content: What do you know, huh? What do you know??? The old man's ideals will only cause his students to starve. You——

1105004027.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004027.content: Stop using your fellow students at the dojo as an excuse. You aren't interested in providing for them.

1105004028.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004028.content: Since the very beginning, you've been the only one who hasn't been able to resist temptation and have betrayed him.

1105004029.content: Even though Buzenbo was holding but a wooden sword, Nagayama misses her by a hair's breadth when he lunges at her. This is odd: even if Modifiers are allowed to attack humans, the gap in their abilities now is just too great.

1105004030.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004030.content: You should be stronger than this.

1105004032.content: The enraged Nagayama is stunned for a moment when he sees that I have Kiyama detained. Buzenbo suddenly realizes what he's going to do, and rushes towards me.

1105004033.content: The flash from Nagayama's sword is coming at me at warp speed.

1105004035.content: But the searing pain I have braced myself for does not come.

1105004037.content: Flashing past me with the sword glare is the fleeting sight of a figure in red and white.

1105004038.content: Then, just in the nick of time, I am forcefully pushed backwards. By the time I get myself back together, I see that Buzenbo is standing in front of me. Her wooden sword and Nagasawa's real sword are locked together, with the friction creating grating sounds.

1105004039.content: But I'm not injured at all, although blood is clearly dripping down Buzenbo's right arm.

1105004040.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004040.content: Just stop right here. I have a recording of your conversation. Once I hand it to the police, jail time is all but guaranteed for you.

1105004041.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004041.content: And even if I were to hand this to the dojo master instead of the police, you and the Kiyamagumi will no longer be able to go ahead with that scheme of yours.

1105004042.speaker: 长泽津
1105004042.content: Stop gloating. Don't think that you——

1105004043.content: Buzenbo doesn't allow him to continue. Just as I pull out my communicator to contact the police station, she pushes Nagayama away from her, then unleashes a massive kick to send him flying.

1105004045.content: As he tries to make his way back onto his feet, the wooden sword comes buzzing through the air, and stops just short of his throat.

1105004046.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004046.content: It's over for you now, so just give it up. You're not going anywhere.

1105004047.content: Although the sword is only a wooden one, it is clear that Nagayama has no real chance of winning. He grits his teeth and squeezes the handle of his blade a few times before he finally falls to his knees.

1105004048.speaker: 我
1105004048.content: Oof! You're done! But should we take care of that cut on your arm first, Buzenbo?

1105004049.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004049.content: Don't worry about it, #{nickname}# it's just a scrape.

1105004050.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004050.content: But I must apologize to you for putting you in danger.

1105004052.speaker: 我
1105004052.content: Yeah, I'm fine. But... where are we going now?

1105004053.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004053.content: To Hayashizaki Hall. I thought about it, and I think we have to warn my father. We may have stopped Nagayama today, but who knows how many others like him there still are.

1105004054.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004054.content: But I must not meet with my father no matter what. Now that I'm a Modifier, I have to sever my past human relationships. Besides, I caused him so much trouble when I awakened...

1105004055.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004055.content: So, could I bother you to convey the message for me, #{nickname}#?

1105004056.content: Hayashizaki Hall is looking rather desolate. I knock on the door, and it's quite some time before a grizzled old man with an equally gray beard answers the door.

1105004057.content: I try to tell him the entire affair as succinctly as I can. The old man nods and rubs his chin in deep thought.

1105004058.speaker: 丰前坊养父
1105004058.content: I knew this day would happen.

1105004059.speaker: 我
1105004059.content: Sir, there are people with evil intentions everywhere. This matter... is not your fault.

1105004060.speaker: 丰前坊养父
1105004060.content: You don't have to console me. Perhaps for most people, there's nothing more important in this world than money.

1105004061.speaker: 丰前坊养父
1105004061.content: Could you tell me more about how he came to be arrested?

1105004062.content: I tell him the version of the story I've already agreed on with Buzenbo: that the Sasanami police already had their eyes on Kiyama Soube, which led to Nagayama being swept up in him.

1105004063.content: But I hear the old man chuckle when I finish speaking.

1105004065.speaker: 我
1105004065.content: Huh? Um... I don't understand what you're saying, sir...

1105004066.speaker: 丰前坊养父
1105004066.content: Nagayama is a strong and proud lad. It's not easy for someone to get the better of him, and it'll have to be someone more skilled than he is.

1105004067.speaker: 丰前坊养父
1105004067.content: And from what I know, there's only one person who's a better swordsman than him, and who can be bothered to do something like this.

1105004068.speaker: 丰前坊养父
1105004068.content: It's been too long since I last saw her, and I know that maybe it's not possible for us to meet now. But, tell me at least, young man, how is she?

1105004069.content: I try to continue to play dumb but the old man suddenly grabs me by the shoulders.

1105004070.speaker: 丰前坊养父
1105004070.content: Look, I am her father. Surely you can understand why I have to ask about her?

1105004071.speaker: 丰前坊养父
1105004071.content: If you can't say anything, all you have to do is nod. Just nod if all is well with her.

1105004072.content: I nod reluctantly, and once he lets go of me I make a quick exit from the scene.

1105004073.content: The old man watches me as I go, his eyes filled with inexplicable emotion.

1105004074.content: Buzenbo cracks a smile and shakes her head when she hears my account of what happened.

1105004075.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004075.content: My father is as sharp as ever.

1105004076.speaker: 我
1105004076.content: You know, he really scared me there when he grabbed me by the shoulders...

1105004077.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004077.content: You had nothing to worry about, #{nickname}#. My father wouldn't have done anything bad to you.

1105004078.content: Buzenbo then stops talking entirely. After a long silence, she opens her mouth as if to speak, then shakes her head and says nothing.

1105004079.content: Typically, Buzenbo acts decisively and forcefully on the field, so the sight of this is new to me.

1105004080.content: She's like a student who's been burning the midnight oil for days, and who doesn't dare to look at their result slip the date results are released despite their anticipation on the other hand.

1105004083.speaker: 我
1105004083.content: I guess I can call him "sprightly"?

1105004084.content: I use my words carefully here, and I see that Buzenbo feels rather relieved.

1105004085.content: I think back to the old man—although he's still standing tall and looking energetic, I can see why Buzenbo was worried that he wouldn't be able to deal with a challenge from Nagayama.

1105004086.speaker: 我
1105004086.content: However, in my opinion, had you not taken any action, even if he had won the duel he'd still have to contend with trouble from the Kiyamagumi later on.

1105004087.speaker: 我
1105004087.content: So you should be even prouder of yourself, Buzenbo. If you don't take action, you can't eliminate the problem.

1105004088.content: For some reason, it suddenly starts to rain in the woods even though it's the height of summer. And unexpectedly, the rain is now coming down even more heavily as we speak.

1105004089.content: Worried that Buzenbo's wound would get wet, I hurriedly pluck two larger leaves from a plant and hand one of them to Buzenbo. Hopefully it'll help to shield her a little at the very least.

1105004090.content: Buzenbo takes the leaf from, and is dumbfounded for a moment. Then, she starts laughing.

1105004091.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004091.content: Ha. We're acting just like kids here.

1105004092.speaker: 我
1105004092.content: Ha ha, was I trying too hard there? But it's not like we can just slip into a corner shop and buy us umbrellas in this place, heh...

1105004093.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004093.content: No, I don't mind at all. Now that I look back, I was always practicing when I was a kid. My father taught his students to be brave and resolute, and so everyone felt that keeping ourselves dry from the rain would be contrary to his teaching.

1105004094.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004094.content: So in the end, none of us ever did something like this.

1105004095.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004095.content: I was hoping to engage in some moongazing with you tonight, #{nickname}#. But it looks like we won't be seeing the moon at all...

1105004096.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004096.content: But that's alright. Using a leaf to protect myself from the rain here with you, it's like... (giggles) I'm making up for what I didn't do when I was a kid. Did you do something like this when you were a child, #{nickname}#?

1105004099.speaker: 我
1105004099.content: But from what you just said, it seems that there are a lot more things besides sword practice we can do together.

1105004100.speaker: 我
1105004100.content: So, would you like to play a game of karuta with me next time, Buzenbo? I've seen people playing it in Shimogyou before... It looks really interesting!

1105004101.content: For a split second, Buzenbo is taken aback by my request. Then, she smiles at me.

1105004102.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004102.content: But I'm not really good at stuff like this... I really hope I can make it fun for you.

1105004103.speaker: 我
1105004103.content: Heh, I'm just grateful you're willing to play with a newbie like me. I take it that we have a deal?

1105004104.content: I reach out to Buzenbo, and she looks at my outstretched hand with a look of shyness on her face.

1105004105.content: But that moment soon passes and she picks up my pinkie with hers with a smile on her face.

1105004106.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004106.content: It's a deal, #{nickname}#. I'll be ready for you the next time you visit Sasanami.

1105004107.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004107.content: No, or how about I come to you at your office? We can play karuta if you aren't busy then.

1105004108.content: The rain is slowly coming to a stop, and Buzenbo's excitement is also slowly showing itself.

1105004109.content: So, would it be during my next visit to Sasanami, or the next time she visits my office?

1105004110.speaker: 我
1105004110.content: Ha, looks like I've to start practicing soon then. I can't always look bad in front of you, can I?

1105004111.content: The usually calm and resolute-looking girl's eyes widen, and she purses her lips again, this time in a helpless manner.

1105004113.speaker: 我
1105004113.content: We'll have a proper duel of cards next time.

1105004114.content: She tugs a little on my pinkie as she hears that.

1105004116.content: This was something I said at the top of my head. But now, she's deep in thought, as if she was contemplating or seriously considering something.

1105004117.content: For a fleeting moment, I see the look of determination back on her face. Her tone is almost solemn when she speaks again.

1105004118.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004118.content: You are right. And I'm not going to give you any chances.

1105004119.content: Huh? Hold on, are we still talking about card games here?

1105004120.content: Why does she have that serious look on her face? Are games also such serious business to her?

1105004122.content: As the rain becomes more of a drizzle, her voice also becomes clearer. Her pinkie also curls a little tighter around mine.

1105004123.content: I can see the rain drops, as well as myself, reflected in those red pupils of hers. I hear her voice, laughing, amidst the growing cacophony of cicada song.

1105004124.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
1105004124.content: I look forward to the next time I see you.

1102805001.speaker: 托尔
1102805001.content: Pfft. I thought this was going to be a challenge.

1102805002.content: The girl smashes the last remaining Visbane with her hammer, and smiles confidently at me.

1102805003.speaker: 我
1102805003.content: No, no, no... I think our tactical orders this time are to stay covert and undiscovered, no?

1102805004.speaker: 托尔
1102805004.content: Well, if we get rid of all the enemies that see us, wouldn't we stay undiscovered then?

1102805006.speaker: 托尔
1102805006.content: (Sighs) Don't you find it a bother to have to hide yourself and sneak around all the time?

1102805007.speaker: 托尔
1102805007.content: #{nickname}#, you're really coming along quite nicely, I must say.

1102805008.content: As I look at Thor, who's still smiling, I can't help but start recalling some things.

1102805009.speaker: 托尔
1102805009.content: Huh? If you want to test the training system, defeating the enemy is enough. Why do we have to abide by tactical orders too?

1102805010.speaker: 大国主
1102805010.content: Because this is a new system and I hope to run more complex simulations on it. Plus, just measuring the maximum load isn't enough.

1102805012.speaker: 大国主
1102805012.content: Don't worry, I found someone else to do the test with you.

1102805013.speaker: 托尔
1102805013.content: Hmm? Isn't this #{nickname}#? You should have told me that earlier!

1102805014.content: I've gone on a number of missions with Thunder Squad ever since the Silver Dragonfish incident, and whenever I'm with them, the squad's tactical compliance rate is always significantly higher. And as time went on, Thor and I also became increasingly comfortable with each other.

1102805015.content: Thor's face lights up when she spots me. Her hair is swaying gently like a tail due to the mild current.

1102805016.speaker: 我
1102805016.content: So this is why you called me here.

1102805017.speaker: 托尔
1102805017.content: The test will be a walk in the park with me around anyway. Just take this as a game.

1102805018.content: Ookuninushi then walks us through the test process, which requires us to follow the tactical orders given and clear four test stages.

1102805019.speaker: 大国主
1102805019.content: You can choose the test difficulty on a scale of zero to 100. I'll leave it up to you since I'm not sure which level works best for you.

1102805020.speaker: 大国主
1102805020.content: Our tests show that the system is stable. So as long as you don't mess around, theoretically you won't have any major problems.

1102805021.speaker: 大国主
1102805021.content: Don't go overboard with the difficulty level, though. While this is a simulation, any hits you take will still stress your neural networks. Which means while you won't go into a coma, you may still have to spend some time in the medical center.

1102805022.speaker: 大国主
1102805022.content: I'm going to check on the other equipment. I'll be back to look in on you in half an hour.

1102805023.content: Then, Ookuninushi leaves the lab with BunBun-0 in tow.

1102805024.speaker: 我
1102805024.content: For safety's sake... how about we start with 25 on the difficulty scale?

1102805025.speaker: 托尔
1102805025.content: But it's so boring when it's too easy. I did a test run at 10 just now, and the simulated Visbanes were no challenge at all.

1102805026.speaker: 托尔
1102805026.content: We should start with 40 at the very least.

1102805027.speaker: 弥弥尔
1102805027.content: Hey, hey, hey. What's this talk about numbers? I hear something about 25 and 40?

1102805029.speaker: 弥弥尔
1102805029.content: I'm here for my coolant... Wait a minute, what happened to the box of cola-flavored coolant I stashed here???

1102805030.speaker: 我
1102805030.content: Oh, that box of stuff Ookuninushi turned in to Lost and Found earlier? That's yours?

1102805031.speaker: 弥弥尔
1102805031.content: !!! That's mine! Give me back my coolant before I get mad!!!

1102805032.speaker: 托尔
1102805032.content: Oh come on. Don't take it out on other people.

1102805033.content: Thor turns away from Mimir, who's all wound up at this point, and continues to make some final adjustments at the control console. She then looks up at me.

1102805034.speaker: 托尔
1102805034.content: So, Admin, how about we start with 40 on the difficulty scale? Don't worry, I'll be able to handle any Visbanes that come our way.

1102805035.speaker: 弥弥尔
1102805035.content: Just 40? I hear that this system will be used to train newbie Modifiers in the future.

1102805036.speaker: 托尔
1102805036.content: Huh? What do you mean by that?

1102805037.speaker: 弥弥尔
1102805037.content: Heh, are you just making it easier for the Administrator because #{nickname}# is human? But from what I know, the Administrator is actually quite on par with ordinary Modifiers now.

1102805038.speaker: 托尔
1102805038.content: I'm just being cautious for the sake of the test. Do you really believe that I think so little of our Admin?

1102805039.speaker: 弥弥尔
1102805039.content: What? Me? I didn't say that! What do you think, Admin?

1102805040.speaker: 我
1102805040.content: I know what you're trying to do here. I'm not gonna fall for it.

1102805041.content: But if we're gonna do well anyway, we might as look good doing it. Let's try 80!

1102805043.speaker: 托尔
1102805043.content: Are you sure about that, Admin? I don't mind personally, but like Ookuninushi said, this could lead to neural damage or something.

1102805044.speaker: 终端提示音
1102805044.content: Please note: Testers are not allowed to exit the test before they clear the current stage.

1102805045.speaker: 我
1102805045.content: There's absolutely nothing to be worried about. Let's go!

1102805046.content: Once we're done setting the difficulty level, Thor and I climb into the Dream Pods to begin the test.

1102805048.speaker: 我
1102805048.content: I'm okay. I was just thinking about something.

1102805049.speaker: 托尔
1102805049.content: Good, good. I thought you were hurt or something.

1102805050.speaker: 我
1102805050.content: How could I possibly have gotten hurt when you fought the way you did back there?

1102805051.content: Thor kept putting herself between me and the enemy, and would rush the enemy line without warning. It was as if she was trying to keep me out of combat altogether.

1102805052.content: It was the same this time round. To give me time to retreat, Thor charged into the enemy's position, changing the battle from one of stealth to a head-on fight.

1102805053.speaker: 托尔
1102805053.content: Well, I did what I had to do. I can't possibly let the Visbanes hurt you, can I?

1102805054.speaker: 我
1102805054.content: Gee, thanks. I do wonder, though: isn't the difficulty level supposed to be the same? But why do I feel that it's getting harder and harder to defeat the enemy?

1102805055.speaker: 托尔
1102805055.content: I'm not sure why myself... But since I'm here, we should be able to win handily anyhow. Let's find that data key first. It should be somewhere around here.

1102805056.content: Although the exact tactical orders vary from stage to stage, the completion condition is the same: perform and complete an analysis on the data key.

1102805057.speaker: 托尔
1102805057.content: That thing should be easy to find, since it's always glowing.

1102805058.speaker: 我
1102805058.content: Let's take a look at the stage map.

1102805059.content: With a gentle wave of my arm, a shimmering map appears in front of me. For each stage, the location of our tactical orders and data key are shown at the top of the map.

1102805061.content: It turns out the data key was hidden in a concealed corner. I connect it with the in-world terminal in my hand and begin the analysis.

1102805062.speaker: 托尔
1102805062.content: One last stage left. Hopefully it's more fun than the previous three.

1102805064.content: A silvery-white vortex appears in front of me, and before I realize what is happening I am being pulled into it.

1102805067.content: We take a good look around us. All we see are shards of sky and time out of order...

1102805068.speaker: 我
1102805068.content: This place... looks like the Source Layer to me?

1102805069.speaker: 托尔
1102805069.content: ... What in the world is going on?!

1102805070.speaker: 我
1102805070.content: Let me see if I can contact the folks out there.

1102805071.content: I pull up my terminal and try to send a message to Mimir, who's watching the live stream of the test out there. However, Mimir seems to be moving very, very slowly, like a video slowed by a thousand times.

1102805072.speaker: 我
1102805072.content: I remember something now... Ookuninushi mentioned before that time flows at different rates inside and outside this thing. This way, Modifiers can complete a large amount of training in what is a very short period of time in the real world.

1102805073.speaker: 我
1102805073.content: Which also means that we can't count on anyone out there to save us.

1102805074.speaker: 托尔
1102805074.content: Tsk... And I can't seem to summon my Mjölnir now for some reason.

1102805075.content: As I look up at the sky above me that is full of space rifts, I can't help but reach for the gun in my holster. But like Mjölnir, my gun is not there.

1102805076.speaker: 我
1102805076.content: Don't tell me we set the difficulty too high...

1102805078.speaker: 我
1102805078.content: Heh... It's just that I feel like I'm missing something when I don't have my gun with me here in the Source Layer.

1102805080.content: Thor reaches for my hand, and the feeling of the warmth from her palm helps me to loosen up somewhat.

1102805081.speaker: 托尔
1102805081.content: Maybe we should think about what to do first. After all, you're really good at using your brains to get things done.

1102805082.speaker: 我
1102805082.content: I guess... The only way out for us down is to beat the stage.

1102805083.content: I'm barely done speaking when several Visbanes crawl out from behind a boulder behind me.

1102805085.content: Thor unleashes a punch which hits a Visbane right in the face, knocking it to the ground. But a look of surprise then appears on Thor's face.

1102805088.content: Thor waves her arm, then braces herself for several more Visbanes that've crawled out from behind the boulder.

1102805089.content: Even if Thor doesn't have her Access Key on her, theoretically she should be able to dispose of them within a few seconds... But what is happening now is something I totally wasn't expecting.

1102805092.speaker: 托尔
1102805092.content: Just a couple of scrapes. Nothing to worry about.

1102805093.speaker: 我
1102805093.content: But I remember Ookuninushi saying that we can't get hurt in here.

1102805094.speaker: 托尔
1102805094.content: It's probably because the difficulty factor got dialed up. Never mind, we'll just deal with things like we would outside.

1102805095.speaker: 托尔
1102805095.content: But.. I can't quite gather my power here.

1102805096.content: Thor moved her arms around slightly with an unhappy look on her face, as if she wanted to shake off whatever burden that's on her.

1102805097.speaker: 托尔
1102805097.content: We'll have to avoid getting into fights from now on.

1102805099.speaker: 托尔
1102805099.content: What? Or do you have another idea?

1102805100.speaker: 我
1102805100.content: No, I was just surprised that you'd suggest we avoid fights.

1102805101.speaker: 托尔
1102805101.content: I swore a long time ago to never ever put someone else in danger again because I acted rashly.

1102805102.content: Then, as if she's suddenly remembered some horrible moment in her past, Thor clenches her fists.

1102805103.speaker: 托尔
1102805103.content: ANYWAY! We're not done talking yet. So how do we beat the stage?

1102805104.speaker: 我
1102805104.content: Let me look at the map.

1102805105.content: I wave my right arm gently to summon the stage map again. Fortunately, it's still working.

1102805106.speaker: 我
1102805106.content: Although the data key is a little far away from us right now, we've locked on to its location. We'll be able to get out of here once we get our hands on it.

1102805107.speaker: 我
1102805107.content: But... traversing long distances in the Source Layer comes with the risk of getting disoriented and losing our way.

1102805108.speaker: 托尔
1102805108.content: Don't worry about that. This is a piece of cake for me.

1102805109.speaker: 托尔
1102805109.content: But since I don't know anything about battle tactics, I'll have to leave that to you.

1102805110.speaker: 我
1102805110.content: But this time round... we don't seem to have received any tactical orders? I guess that means we're to adapt based on the situation at hand, then.

1102805111.speaker: 我
1102805111.content: Then let's find us some high ground for a look-around before we go.

1102805112.content: Then, having had a good look, Thor and I move forward cautiously. However, we keep running into Visbanes along the way.

1102805114.speaker: 我
1102805114.content: (Should Thor and I try to fight our way through now? Or should we wait for an opportunity first...?)

1102805115.speaker: 托尔
1102805115.content: And that one over there is...

1102805116.content: Thor and I look at each other when we see the Visbane in front of us, and nod at each other at the same time.

1102805118.content: Thor and I quickly skirt around the left side of the Visbane. Strangely though, it remains motionless the whole time, as if it doesn't see us.

1102805119.speaker: 我
1102805119.content: The intel's right. This type of Visbane's senses are weaker on the left side.

1102805120.speaker: 托尔
1102805120.content: That's right. I usually barely get a reaction when I swing my hammer to the left side of these things.

1102805121.speaker: 托尔
1102805121.content: But we should keep moving, in case that Visbane turns around and comes after us.

1102805122.content: I nod, and the two of us continue on our journey towards the data key.

1102805123.content: The Source Layer is always unpredictable, even chaotic. Sometimes, it feels like we're walking in a sweltering desert, sometimes, it feels like we're trudging high up on some snow-capped mountain.

1102805124.content: The further we walk, the more difficult it is to keep moving forward. It's as if I've gone all rusty inside.

1102805125.speaker: 我
1102805125.content: Judging from the number of Visbanes around here, we must be getting closer.

1102805126.content: What should we do next...? Which way should we go to avoid the Visbane swarm?

1102805128.content: All of a sudden, I feel the ground beneath me simply give way, and I start falling... But thankfully, there is a firm grasp on my arm.

1102805129.speaker: 托尔
1102805129.content: Got you! Come on up now!

1102805130.content: I look back on that deep, deep hole I just escaped and cannot help but shudder.

1102805131.speaker: 我
1102805131.content: We have to be careful of these unstable data zones in the Source Layer...

1102805132.content: Then, we're struck by the ear-piercing howls and pitch-black claws at the same time. I can feel Thor's grip on my arm tighten instantly, and my body is pulled back to the ground again.

1102805134.content: There is no maneuvering room to speak of for Thor, and the claws make a gash in her shoulder.

1102805135.content: As I get back on my feet, Thor responds to the attack with a side kick, sending her attacker into the hole.

1102805136.speaker: 托尔
1102805136.content: Tsk... Was it the commotion just now that drew the Visbane's attention, I wonder...?

1102805137.content: Thor, her eyebrows tightly knit together, is bleeding profusely from her left shoulder. A small pool of blood is forming on the ground.

1102805139.speaker: 托尔
1102805139.content: I'm okay... The Visbanes are almost here, though. Let's go now. I'll cover you.

1102805140.content: But the locations of the Visbanes we saw earlier from our viewing point have been at the back of my mind, and I immediately stop Thor before she can proceed any further.

1102805141.speaker: 我
1102805141.content: No, we'll be surrounded by the Visbanes if we go that way. We have to go around them by heading west.

1102805143.content: With Thor moving at the fore, we slowly make our way west.

1102805144.content: We still have nearly halfway to go, and at our current pace, we'll probably be exhausted before we get to our destination.

1102805145.speaker: 托尔
1102805145.content: What is it? Why are you frowning again?

1102805146.speaker: 我
1102805146.content: I'm just annoyed that I haven't come up with a good plan yet.

1102805147.speaker: 我
1102805147.content: We're only about halfway there. At this rate, we won't get to the data key in time.

1102805148.speaker: 我
1102805148.content: The only way we might get to where the data key is to take a shortcut. But...

1102805150.speaker: 我
1102805150.content: We'll be surrounded by the Visbanes in that case.

1102805151.speaker: 托尔
1102805151.content: Hmm... But that's our only option now, you're saying?

1102805152.speaker: 我
1102805152.content: That's right. I don't see any other way.

1102805153.speaker: 托尔
1102805153.content:
Alright. I'll take care of things then.
Those Visbanes will have to step over my dead body if they want to get to you.

1102805154.content: Thor speaks firmly and unwaveringly, as if she's a lighthouse standing firm in a storm.

1102805155.speaker: 托尔
1102805155.content: I'll make sure you get out of here safe and sound.

1102805156.speaker: 我
1102805156.content: Stop this nonsense about dead bodies. If I'm getting out of here, so are you.

1102805157.speaker: 托尔
1102805157.content: That's right. There's no need for me to be so gloomy.

1102805158.content: Thor chuckles wryly and smacks herself in the face.

1102805159.content: Now that we have our new plan, we begin traveling along the shortest route to the data key. Although I already knew that we'd thus be surrounded by Visbanes, I still cannot help but become a little more somber as the reality appears before my eyes.

1102805160.content: As we look down at the Visbanes moving around in streams below, my mind quickly begins to look for even the smallest opening we might be able to use to break through this quandary.

1102805162.speaker: 我
1102805162.content: These aren't randomly generated Visbanes. Every group has a specific and routine area of action.

1102805163.speaker: 托尔
1102805163.content: Why are you talking as if this is a game?

1102805164.speaker: 我
1102805164.content: Because this is designed by man too, with similar operating principles... Look over there, Thor.

1102805165.speaker: 托尔
1102805165.content: Huh...? They seem to be turning back after they reach that rock over there...?

1102805166.speaker: 我
1102805166.content: Yes, they travel on fixed routes. We just have to duck behind that rock before they discover us.

1102805167.speaker: 托尔
1102805167.content: All right! That shouldn't be too difficult to do.

1102805168.content: Although we eventually make it through this hazard zone without experiencing any danger, the new scene that greets us almost makes me question my judgment again.

1102805170.content: It all begins as a gentle flow of data, like a pleasing breeze. However, as multiple data flows collide, the result is a data storm so powerful, it can even tear open the surface of the earth.

1102805171.content: We can hear the wind whipping and whistling all around us, and there is gravel flying in the air.

1102805173.content: I look back and see that we've been discovered by the group of Visbanes that we just managed to avoid, and their numbers are growing behind us. While they can't reach us as they're limited by their programmed scope of movement, this also means that there's no way we can retrace our steps, either.

1102805174.speaker: 我
1102805174.content: Thor, can you take us through the storm?

1102805176.speaker: 托尔
1102805176.content: You must promise me one thing: no matter what happens, keep close to me.

1102805178.content: Thor pulls up a shield with her remaining Divine Power to cover me as we travel through the data storm. However, the winds became stronger and stronger.

1102805180.speaker: 托尔
1102805180.content: Don't worry about me. I've been in storms far fiercer than this.

1102805181.content: The look of determination is still there in her eyes. But her back is visibly soaked in sweat, and her steps are unsteady.

1102805182.content: It's at this time that a flying data fragment penetrates the already-riddled shield.

1102805184.content: I can see flesh being torn right in front of my very own eyes. Thor has blocked the data fragment with her right arm right before it would've hit me.

1102805185.content: A stream of countless data fragments, as small as gravel, is also pouring in from the newly created breach in the shield.

1102805187.speaker: 托尔
1102805187.content: Don't worry about me... just make sure you stay close to me.

1102805188.content: Thor holds me tightly, allowing the shrapnel-like fragments to dig into her back instead.

1102805189.content: More data fragments collide with the already-fragile shield, and it seems that it would shatter any time now...

1102805190.content: Then, out of the corner of my eye, I spot something that doesn't belong in the Source Layer: an abandoned factory.

1102805192.content: And before I can even reply, Thor gathers the last of her Divine Power to repair the shield, then takes off for the factory with me in tow.

1102805193.speaker: 托尔
1102805193.content: A passcode-secured door?! In a place like this???

1102805194.content: Blocking our way in is a tall and sturdy-looking door which looks out of place in this abandoned factory. It was obviously placed there by someone.

1102805195.speaker: 托尔
1102805195.content: "Enter passcode"?! Like anyone would have the time now?!?

1102805196.content: Thor gives a mighty kick to the door, but it doesn't budge at all.

1102805198.content: The wind is whipping us harder and harder. My mind starts racing... Since Ookuninushi was the one who designed this stage, there must be a certain pattern going on here.

1102805201.speaker: 我
1102805201.content: Then try 4-0-1-1-4. Ookuninushi must have set the passcode based on the stage numbers!

1102806001.content: By this time, Thor is injured all over, and she's breathing hard and fast. There's blood coming out from the cuts in her skin, and the arm she used to block the data fragments from me is hanging limp.

1102806003.content: I run towards her to hold her up.

1102806004.speaker: 托尔
1102806004.content: I'm okay, I can still walk...

1102806005.speaker: 我
1102806005.content: Just let me help you now, jeez. Your injuries are serious.

1102806006.speaker: 托尔
1102806006.content: But I'm a Modifier. I'll get better in a heartbeat...

1102806007.speaker: 我
1102806007.content: We should at least find you somewhere to rest.
