1102806008.content: I make a careful survey of the outer perimeter of the factory. Unlike the world outside, the space here is relatively stable, and more importantly, I see no signs of Visbane activity.

1102806009.speaker: 我
1102806009.content: It looks quite safe around here...

1102806010.speaker: 我
1102806010.content: Thor, you should take a break.

1102806013.speaker: 托尔
1102806013.content: Nah, not at all. Besides, I'm feeling much better now that we're inside here.

1102806014.speaker: 托尔
1102806014.content: Besides, somebody has to stand guard.

1102806015.speaker: 我
1102806015.content: Didn't we just take a look around? I don't think we'll encounter the enemy anytime soon.

1102806016.speaker: 托尔
1102806016.content: Yeah we may think that, but...

1102806017.speaker: 我
1102806017.content: Hah... the Captain Thor whom I know isn't so wishy-washy.

1102806018.speaker: 托尔
1102806018.content: Tsk. Why are you being so stubborn?

1102806019.content: Heh. Sorry, I am who I am.

1102806021.speaker: 托尔
1102806021.content: I never taught you to be that stubborn.

1102806022.content: Thor seats herself down next to me, but his eyes are fixed on the entrance. How is this rest?

1102806023.speaker: 我
1102806023.content: (Coughs) Say, Thor, you were saying that you've encountered data storms even fiercer than this one before?

1102806024.speaker: 托尔
1102806024.content: Of course. This one's nowhere near a doozy, actually.

1102806025.speaker: 托尔
1102806025.content: I don't think you know this, but I became a Modifier in the Source Layer.

1102806026.speaker: 我
1102806026.content: No, no, of course I know that.

1102806028.speaker: 我
1102806028.content: Well, I have more than one way of finding out, don't I, Captain Thor?

1102806030.speaker: 我
1102806030.content: So, data storms are a common occurrence in the Source Layer then?

1102806031.speaker: 托尔
1102806031.content: They happen so often, I'm sick of them.

1102806032.speaker: 我
1102806032.content: I can't quite imagine... how one can live in the Source Layer for a long time like you did.

1102806033.speaker: 托尔
1102806033.content: I got used to it. All I knew at that time was that I had to smash every single Visbane I came across to bits. I didn't even know that the Surface Layer was a thing.

1102806035.speaker: 托尔
1102806035.content: Nah. It's nothing to brag about.

1102806036.content: The young lady's plaits start swaying a little from the electric current, however.

1102806037.speaker: 我
1102806037.content: (I have to think carefully about we can clear this stage now... Thor is probably close to her limit.)

1102806038.speaker: 托尔
1102806038.content: What is it? Why the gloomy look?

1102806039.speaker: 我
1102806039.content: Huh? Do I... really look that way?

1102806040.speaker: 托尔
1102806040.content: I'm telling you, you think too much. All these things like intel, tactics... just mentioning these gives me a headache.

1102806041.speaker: 我
1102806041.content: Well, you did say that I'm in charge of the brain work. I've to pull my weight too, you know. I can't just rely on you.

1102806042.speaker: 托尔
1102806042.content: Hey, hey, hey, what did I just say about thinking too much?

1102806043.content: Thor gently pinches my cheek with a look of mild pique on her face.

1102806044.speaker: 托尔
1102806044.content: It's my job to protect my squad members to begin with.

1102806046.speaker: 托尔
1102806046.content: Why, do you not trust me?

1102806048.speaker: 托尔
1102806048.content: That settles it, then. You'll do all the brain work and I'll take care of the rest.

1102806049.speaker: 托尔
1102806049.content: Just trust me. I'll keep everyone with me safe.

1102806050.content: Thor stretches out her hand towards me, like she usually does with her squad mates when she wants to ruffle their hair.

1102806051.content: I just stay put and let her do what she wants.

1102806054.content: Thor forcibly presses my head down.

1102806055.speaker: 托尔
1102806055.content: Fine. I'll take a break if you take it with me.

1102806057.content: As I sit with my back against the wall, I can feel its coolness on my back. I'm finally able to relax and clear my mind.

1102806058.content: Some time later—I'm not sure how long—I return to my senses. I blink for a few moments.

1102806061.content: I turn to one side to see Thor's sleeping face very close to mine.

1102806062.content: As mighty as our Captain Thor is, she's also just an ordinary girl when she's sleeping.

1102806063.speaker: 我
1102806063.content: (If I recall correctly... we'll be encountering the trap stage next. Still beats head-on battle, though.)

1102806064.content: I start to go through what Ookuninushi said about the stage in my mind to see if I can glean any new clues.

1102806065.speaker: 我
1102806065.content: No, no, I have to see it for myself... I should get up first.

1102806066.content: I gingerly move away from Thor and quietly stand up.

1102806070.speaker: 我
1102806070.content: How long was I out for?

1102806072.speaker: 托尔
1102806072.content: Don't worry, there aren't any signs of the enemy for now.

1102806074.speaker: 托尔
1102806074.content: (Exhales deeply) Now that we've got our rest, it's time to get moving again?

1102806075.speaker: 托尔
1102806075.content: What are you still doing back there?

1102806076.speaker: 我
1102806076.content: I can't see a thing in this darkness...

1102806077.content: I try to feel my way forward in the dark with one hand on the wall.

1102806078.speaker: 托尔
1102806078.content: Come on, hold on to me.

1102806080.speaker: 托尔
1102806080.content: We won't be separated from each other, then.

1102806082.content: And so, Thor and I continue exploring the factory hand in hand. Along the way, we run into an endless stream of traps that'd take all of our strength just to avoid them.

1102806084.content: I pull down on the lever to turn around the iron ball that's just about to hit us.

1102806085.speaker: 托尔
1102806085.content: Is it just me, or are there more traps here...?

1102806086.speaker: 我
1102806086.content: Just like the previous few stages, the further we go, the more traps we encounter.

1102806087.speaker: 托尔
1102806087.content: So you mean to say that we're almost at the end of the stage then?

1102806088.content: By this time, my eyes have completely accustomed to the dark, and I think I see a ray of light coming from a crack in a door to our front, on the right.

1102806089.speaker: 我
1102806089.content: Look, Thor. There's some light coming from over there.

1102806092.speaker: 我
1102806092.content: Let's go check it out. Although it may or may not be a trap too.

1102806093.speaker: 托尔
1102806093.content: You'll follow behind me in that case.

1102806094.content: I peer inside the crack in the door and see a huge prep room. The data key, projecting light in all directions, can be clearly seen. Countless floating bits are swimming in this light.

1102806095.content: But this isn't the sight I wanted to see at all.

1102806096.speaker: 我
1102806096.content: Why are there so many of them here...?

1102806097.content: The number of Visbanes here is simply staggering. They're in just about every corner of the room.

1102806098.speaker: 托尔
1102806098.content: Of course it isn't going to be so easy to clear the stage.

1102806099.speaker: 我
1102806099.content: There's no way we can discern any sort of pattern here... There's so many of them, there's no real empty space to speak of.

1102806100.speaker: 我
1102806100.content: How about we try to draw them out here?

1102806101.content: I try to crack open the door a little more, and the rusty door starts to creak. Usually, this level of noise would suffice if one's aim is the draw the Visbanes' attention, but this time round, they show no reaction.

1102806102.content: I knock on the door again to make more sounds, but they remain unmoved.

1102806105.speaker: 我
1102806105.content: No, no, no, with so many of them...

1102806106.speaker: 托尔
1102806106.content: I wouldn't have suggested that if I wasn't sure.

1102806107.content: And just like always, Thor flashes a smile full of confidence, with zero trace of wavering in her limpid eyes.

1102806108.speaker: 托尔
1102806108.content: Back then... I once acted rashly and caused a squad mate of mine to become seriously hurt, and they no longer trusted me after that.

1102806109.speaker: 托尔
1102806109.content: While I did try to make up for my mistake, it was too late. Quite simply, I had failed... They left Thunder Squad and also Aether Gazer after that.

1102806111.content: For the first time, Thor understood what "regret" meant as she gazed at her squad mate lying on the hospital bed.

1102806113.speaker: 临时行动队队员
1102806113.content: I've decided to leave Aether Gazer.

1102806114.speaker: 托尔
1102806114.content: What? It was wrong of me. I acted on impulse. But I promise you the next time——

1102806115.speaker: 临时行动队队员
1102806115.content: You're just too strong for the rest of us, Captain. There's no way we can keep up with you. We'll just be slowing you down during missions.

1102806116.speaker: 临时行动队队员
1102806116.content: Or maybe I'm just not cut out for this sort of combat to begin with...

1102806117.speaker: 托尔
1102806117.content: And that was how I became a lone ranger... Because no one else wanted to work with me.

1102806118.speaker: 托尔
1102806118.content: While in some ways it was easier to fight on my own... I did get lonely sometimes.

1102806119.speaker: 托尔
1102806119.content: So, when I finally got new squad mates after a long time, I told myself that I must no longer act rashly during missions again. This time, I must keep my people safe and sound.

1102806120.speaker: 托尔
1102806120.content: But having said that, combat is what I'm good at. You have no idea how pent up I feel right now.

1102806121.speaker: 我
1102806121.content: But you know, Thor, I've been depending on you so much——

1102806122.speaker: 托尔
1102806122.content: Alright, alright, save the praises for when we get back.

1102806123.speaker: 托尔
1102806123.content: Now.. It's time to teach them a good lesson.

1102806124.content: Thor releases all the remaining Divine Power in her, and she is enveloped in lightning once again. Even though the light isn't as bright as usual, the sight of this ignites hope in my heart nevertheless.

1102806126.content: The words "sure-win" comes to my mind as I look at the lightning-clad Thor.

1102806127.speaker: 托尔
1102806127.content: Not fully. However... I should have enough to beat them anyhow.

1102806128.speaker: 托尔
1102806128.content: I'm about to start. Get ready!

1102806129.content: Thor brandishes her fists to clear a path for me through the swarm of Visbanes, like lightning splitting the tides open.

1102806131.content: The lightning reduces the sharp claws and fangs around us to ashes before they can reach me. However, Thor doesn't reserve any of this power to protect herself.

1102806132.speaker: 托尔
1102806132.content: These things are such a royal pain!

1102806133.content: The lightning on Thor's body flickers for a nanosecond whenever she punches at them, and the Visbanes would take advantage of this momentary fade to tear at her flesh with their fangs and claws.

1102806135.content: Thor takes a deep breath, and the lightning flashes again, blasting away the last Visbanes that are in our way.

1102806137.content: It's all clear in front of us now. Thor and I start sprinting with everything we've got left.

1102806141.speaker: 托尔
1102806141.content: Pfft. So that's it? That wasn't that big of a challenge after all, wasn't it...

1102806142.content: I turn back to look at Thor. Although she's covered in injuries from top to toe, she's managed to flash me another smile. And there aren't any Visbanes left.

1102806144.speaker: 托尔
1102806144.content: Wait, there's one more?! Quick, get out of the way!

1102806145.content: Thor shoves me aside before I can get a look at what's happening.

1102806146.content: The last thing I see... is that of Thor impaled on sharp claws.

1102806147.speaker: 终端提示音
1102806147.content: Analysis complete. Congratulations, you have cleared all test stages.

1102806148.content: A field of white gradually occupies my entire vision, and then I find myself rising, rising, rising, in an sea of data flows. I start to hear the sound of machine whirring, and my consciousness gradually returns to reality.

1102806150.content: As if she's sinking into the ocean, she can feel her consciousness falling... only the memories of the past are unfolding in front of her now.

1102806151.content: Memories of the demands of her responsibilities, her regrets from the past, and the resultant loneliness...

1102806152.content: The last image she sees is the face of the person she so wanted to protect to the very end.

1102806155.content: I sit up in a start from the Dream Pod. There's no one else in the lab.

1102806156.content:
The picture of Thor being pierced by sharp claws and blood everywhere is still deeply etched in my mind.
If neural damage is possible from injuries sustained in there... what would happen if she died in there???

1102806157.content: I immediately rush to Thor's pod without further thought.

1102806159.content: I keep mashing at the hatch open button on the Dream Pod, but the hatch stubbornly refuses to open. All I see is a series of system prompts scrolling on the display.

1102806160.speaker: 我
1102806160.content: Who cares about these messages! Open, damn it... OPEN!!!

1102806161.content: I force open the Dream Pod with all the strength I have.

1102806163.content: Thor is lying inside the Dream Pod like a sleeping baby.

1102806164.speaker: 我
1102806164.content: No, no, no... That can't be...!

1102806165.content: Countless worst-case scenarios are unfolding in my mind, and my forehead becomes covered in cold sweat.

1102806166.speaker: 我
1102806166.content: No, no... Didn't Ookuninushi say that we wouldn't fall into a coma...?

1102806167.content: I hold Thor by her shoulders and gently shake her to rouse her. But she's as unresponsive as before.

1102806168.content: This is when I remember that, unlike me, Thor hasn't completed the stage... and might even be trapped in there.

1102806171.content: As if she's finally heard me calling her, Thor slowly opens her eyes and looks around, confused.

1102806174.speaker: 我
1102806174.content: We're in the Cryptics lab. We're back!

1102806175.content: Thor has finally noticed my presence, and turns her attention to me.

1102806177.content: The girl's body trembled slightly, revealing a weakness I've never seen before.

1102806178.content: I'm about to say something to comfort her when I'm cut off by what she says next.

1102806180.speaker: 托尔
1102806180.content: I did it... I did it this time...

1102806181.speaker: 我
1102806181.content: You did. That was a job well done, Captain Thor.

1102806182.content: I gently put my hand on her back without another word.

1102806183.content: Usually, she's the indomitable leader of Thunder Squad. But right now, she's just an ordinary girl who has tried her best to protect her companion.

1102806184.speaker: 托尔
1102806184.content: I thought we wouldn't make it...

1102806185.content: As if she's trying to confirm that I'm really here, she begins to hold me even harder.

1102806186.speaker: 托尔
1102806186.content: I couldn't help but worry about you until the very end...

1102806187.content: Thor rests her head on my shoulder and starts to snuggle.

1102806191.content: I turn around to see Ookuninushi and Mimir rushing in here.

1102806193.content: I can see the picture reflected in their eyes: Thor hugging me tightly and leaning her head on my shoulder.

1102806194.speaker: 大国主
1102806194.content: (Clears throat) Should we get you two a room?

1102806195.speaker: 托尔
1102806195.content: W-What are you two doing here?!

1102806196.speaker: 我
1102806196.content: (I have to nip this topic in the bud ASAP!!!)

1102806197.content: I sense some danger coming, and immediately try to wiggle out of it.

1102806199.content: Thor's sudden roar is accompanied by the flashing of lightning inside the lab.

1102806201.content: Thor eventually calms down after some extended persuasion by yours truly.

1102806202.speaker: 弥弥尔
1102806202.content: (Moans) Why am I the only one who got the hammer?

1102806204.speaker: 我
1102806204.content: Forgive that silly kitty, Thor. I should have thought things out more fully myself too.

1102806208.content: Mimir's ears are droop, and his usual swagger is nowhere to be seen.

1102806209.speaker: 大国主
1102806209.content: ... I didn't expect something like this to happen.

1102806210.speaker: 我
1102806210.content: It's been only 20 minutes out here. But we were in there for at least half a day...

1102806211.content: The time displayed on the console told me that only 20 minutes have passed since we entered the Dream Pods.

1102806212.speaker: 托尔
1102806212.content: Since you're done with your checks, I'm off.

1102806213.content: Thor waves at us, gets up, and leaves.

1102806214.speaker: 大国主
1102806214.content: #{nickname}#, although I didn't find anything abnormal during the checks, could you look in on her again?

1102806217.speaker: 我
1102806217.content: Ookuninushi wanted me to check on you.

1102806218.speaker: 托尔
1102806218.content: But I already said I'm okay! You people are making a mountain out of a molehill.

1102806219.speaker: 我
1102806219.content: It's not just about that. I have something I wanted to say to you just now...

1102806220.speaker: 托尔
1102806220.content: Hold up. Just to be clear: Nothing. Happened. At. The. Lab. Right???

1102806221.content: I nod without hesitation in the face of the mighty Thor's forceful questioning.

1102806222.speaker: 托尔
1102806222.content: So, what did you come here to say?

1102806223.content: I take a deep breath to compose myself.

1102806225.speaker: 托尔
1102806225.content: What? Is that it... I was just performing my duty. Don't worry about it.

1102806227.speaker: 托尔
1102806227.content: Fine. Since you want so badly to thank me...

1102806228.content: Thor stands up and walks towards me.

1102806229.content: She gets on a little tiptoe and whispers something in my ear...

1102806231.speaker: 托尔
1102806231.content: (Clears throat) Now, don't go around telling me what I just told you now.

1102806233.speaker: 托尔
1102806233.content: Alright now, don't just stand there like a dummy. Since you're here, let's play a game together.

1102806234.content: Thor flashes me a dazzling smile. I'm not sure whether I'm seeing things or what, but I think there's a slight tinge of crimson in her cheeks.

1102806235.speaker: 我
1102806235.content: Shouldn't you be taking this time to rest and recuperate?

318011002.content: The midday sun breaks through the clouds and illuminates every corner of the courtyard, regardless of the dark deeds which took place here.

318011003.content: A young girl lingers in the shade of the eaves. She hesitates a moment before reaching out to stop a sunbeam in its tracks.

318011005.content: She steps from the shadows, gazing at every tree, every blade of grass, every stone. The sun blazes down on her back and she's overcome by an urge to sleep. Could she just lie down here?

318011006.content: But at the end of her gaze, where the sunlight falls, a figure stands.

318011007.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011007.content: Questioner... Can I still call you that?

318011008.speaker: 我
318011008.content: You've called me it often enough already. I like it if you do.

318011009.content: Senba looks at me, a faint smile coming to her lips. It soon fades though, leaving her solemn once more.

318011010.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011010.content: The alter-dimension is closed for now. The Karasugo servants left outside are helping take care of the corpses of the fallen.

318011011.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011011.content: My brother says there's a lovely spot up in the hills where we all go, in the end.

318011012.speaker: 我
318011012.content: Yes. Sekhmet said the CORG dead will be returned to their families. Your people...

318011013.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011013.content: I went to see them, Questioner. Every one of them.

318011014.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011014.content: I remember every one of their faces. But I don't know their names. I don't know their stories. I wouldn't know where their families are.

318011015.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011015.content: My mother saved me. Our soldiers saved me, even those who didn't know me.

318011016.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011016.content: Yet there's nothing I can do for them.

318011017.content: We can make sure they didn't die in vain.

318011018.speaker: 我
318011018.content: We can keep going and wipe out the Visbanes, protect humanity.

318011019.speaker: 我
318011019.content: This isn't over. Nor should it be.

318011020.speaker: 我
318011020.content: According to Sekhmet there's another power at work, someone pulling the Crow God's strings. Is that right?

318011021.content: Senba's eyes suddenly widen and there's a flash of flame in her pupils.

318011022.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011022.content: She's still alive. She shouldn't be.

318011023.speaker: 我
318011023.content: We need you to pull yourself together, Senba. We have things to do. People to make pay.

318011024.content: I hear footsteps approaching. I nod to Senba and raise a hand in greeting to the new arrival.

318011026.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318011026.content: I've tallied all available resources and personnel. I hadn't seen you two, so... here I am.

318011027.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318011027.content: Have you been able to rest, #{nickname}#?

318011028.speaker: 我
318011028.content: Yes, thanks. Yesterday was a busy day so I went out like a light. Shame there's still work to do or I'd have stayed in bed.

318011029.speaker: 我
318011029.content: Anyway, I should go. You should both come by later. We need to talk about what to do next.

318011031.content: The young girl watches as Admin leaves, then turns to look at her older brother. He looks conflicted and guilty. There's a long pause before Karasugo Sendou plucks up the courage to look his little sister in the eye.

318011032.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318011032.content: Senba, I want to apologize. I...

318011035.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011035.content: We all have apologies to make. But now is not the time.

318011036.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011036.content: We still need to deal with the source of all this awfulness. In the Imperial City.

318011037.content: It's the most awkward war council I've ever attended.

318011038.content: A day earlier, we were at war with each other. We've made peace, but it still feels too early to make friends.

318011041.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318011041.content: So, if we're not feeling the vibe, why don't we first decide what problems we need to solve. Surely we don't imagine we can just kill the Crow God and declare victory.

318011042.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318011042.content: Do our two Karasugo representatives have anything they'd like to share.

318011043.content: The room falls silent again. Sekhmet and the rest of us look towards the heads of the family.

318011044.content: Karasugo Sendou's jaw hangs open as he glances sideways at his sister. She, in turn, is looking at the family crest above the door. Then she looks at us, calmly.

318011045.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011045.content: The Child of Heaven is a Visbane.

318011047.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011047.content: I see none of you are surprised.

318011050.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011050.content: The Child of Heaven is our enemy, just like the Crow God. I have to do this.

318011051.speaker: 我
318011051.content: If it involves killing Visbanes, we have to do it too... Are you sure of this, Senba?

318011052.content: She nods, then lowers her head to collect her thoughts.

318011053.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011053.content: I imagine you're all aware of how the rotating leadership of the five families stems from the legend of the Five Mountain Gods.

318011054.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011054.content: That legend says the Child of Heaven helped humanity contain the mountain gods, then proclaimed themself to be the "Human God". Generations of Children of Heaven have lived in the Reiten palace, accepting tribute.

318011055.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011055.content: The five families too benefited from their success in defeating the mountain gods, rising to great power. They came to control Sasanami, taking it in turns to rule.

318011056.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011056.content: The five families balanced each other and the Child of Heaven remained in the palace. Most people saw the Child of Heaven as a symbol, not something to worry about.

318011057.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318011057.content: If I hadn't seen with my own eyes how terrifying a power the Crow God is, I don't think I'd worry about the Child of Heaven either.

318011058.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318011058.content: It's a shame the mountain gods don't just stay on their mountains. Every one of them is a pain.

318011059.speaker: 月读
318011059.content: True. The Monkey God and Snake God were tough opponents.

318011060.speaker: 我
318011060.content: The Deer God too... It took over the strength of an entire forest. We'd never have defeated it without an effective counter.

318011061.speaker: 我
318011061.content: If the gods are all Cognizant Visbanes, then the Child of Heaven can't be an ordinary human. But...

318011062.speaker: 我
318011062.content: We've never seen internal fighting amongst Cognizant Visbanes before. But if they're enemies, why did the Child of Heaven simply contain them, rather than killing them? And why has she failed to act for so long?

318011063.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318011063.content: You think she might be like the Crow God? Naturally weak?

318011064.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011064.content: Unfortunately, that isn't the case, Admin. I met her once. She was the first... the first Visbane I encountered.

318011065.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011065.content: The Crow God's plan was to send mother and I to see Haruka. But when I got there, I knew that the Child of Heaven was no longer my sister...

318011066.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011066.content: It was that realization that awakened my Mod powers and, instinctively, I attacked.

318011067.content: She draws the Curse of Yomi and seems to be recalling the events of that day. Then, with a bitter grin, she shakes her head.

318011068.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011068.content: I managed to take her by surprise and wound her. But once she was on her guard I couldn't even get close.

318011069.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011069.content: The only reason she let me live was to use me against the Crow God.

318011070.content: We knew a little about Izanami's strength. She wasn't a match for those with both talent and experience, such as Sekhmet and Tsukuyomi, but that didn't make her a weakling.

318011071.content: We all knew any Visbane able to keep her at bay would have to be taken seriously.

318011072.speaker: 我
318011072.content: Even if we'd known her plans, we couldn't have joined with the Crow God...

318011073.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318011073.content: Today, the Sanzaru have fled, the Miyahebi are wiped out, the Akishika are leaderless. We Karasugo have suffered grave losses. Only Izuru Masayoshi remains, but he is an accomplice to evil.

318011074.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318011074.content: The five gods are almost gone and the families are shadows of what they once were. I don't know what the Child of Heaven hopes to achieve, but I fear she is close to her goal.

318011075.speaker: 月读
318011075.content: Would Izuru Masayoshi work with Visbanes?

318011076.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318011076.content: Why do you ask, Miss Tsukuyomi?

318011077.speaker: 月读
318011077.content: Pheasant Squad has worked as a protection detail for him. We didn't notice anything unusual and he didn't seem to be under Visbane influence.

318011078.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318011078.content: I've read through our file on him. He's very ambitious. The Child of Heaven, if human, could easily fall under his sway.

318011079.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318011079.content: People like Izuru Masayoshi are used to absolute power. He wouldn't submit to control, even if he couldn't defeat the Child of Heaven outright.

318011080.speaker: 国常立
318011080.content: Should we work with him? We could sure use any intel about the Child of Heaven he can provide. We're working in the dark right now.

318011081.speaker: 国常立
318011081.content: The Izuru residence is in Reiten, just a few streets from the Child of Heaven's palace. How do we contact him when she's so close?

318011082.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318011082.content: Well, I certainly wouldn't wait for an invite...

318011084.content: Karasugo Sendou suddenly speaks out, raising a hand to get our attention. Tension leaves his body, as if he's been waiting to speak for some time.

318011085.content: We look at him in surprise. We all know he's smart enough to know what his plan could mean.

318011086.speaker: 国常立
318011086.content: If there are Visbanes in the Izuru family, this would be a suicide mission.

318011087.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318011087.content:
It's better than you kicking the door in...
I'm the Karasugo Lord, in name at least. I have the right to request an audience with the Prime Lord.

318011088.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318011088.content: The five families have a duty towards Sasanami. I will not fail in that.

318011090.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011090.content: As my brother says, this is a family duty. But I can't let him go alone. Things could go wrong.

318011091.speaker: 国常立
318011091.content: Fine. One of you, two of you, it's all the same.

318011092.speaker: 国常立
318011092.content: But don't go getting hopeful. The Visbanes aren't going to sit down and negotiate. At the end of the day, this is getting solved with sharp objects and violence.

318011093.speaker: 国常立
318011093.content: Even if Grandpops Izuru wants to help out, the Child of Heaven could be waiting for us. Planning to grab us all at once.

318011094.speaker: 我
318011094.content: We do need to be cautious. The Child of Heaven commands the Imperial Army, which is a powerful and well-equipped fighting force in control of the entire city.

318011095.speaker: 我
318011095.content: Add in the authority of the Child of Heaven... If she mobilizes Sasanami against us, there won't be much we can do. We need to let humans solve human problems, after all.

318011096.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011096.content: Admin is right. But us Karasugo have neither the authority or the status to get anything done in the Imperial City.

318011097.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011097.content: However, the power base of the five families remains. If we need to fight the Child of Heaven... it's not impossible. We aren't the only ones free of her influence. For example...

318011099.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318011099.content: The Akishika have always had internal power struggles during their long reign in Shimogyou. Now they're leaderless. CORG is scratching its head over what to do with the remaining forces.

318011100.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318011100.content: Signing them up to bolster our strength sounds like a good solution.

318011101.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318011101.content: I don't know. The families have always remained independent. We could perhaps reach an agreement if Lady Akishika lived, but... this feels like taking advantage of their misfortune.

318011102.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011102.content: The five families are in turmoil because of the Child of Heaven's plot. We aren't the ones taking advantage. We need the Akishika forces if this is going to work.

318011103.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011103.content: The Akishika forces recently worked with us against the Deer God, so we can be sure of their stance. Seems like we need to make friends with our enemy's enemies.

318011104.speaker: 月读
318011104.content: Miss Senba, you are familiar with the Akishika's recent history?

318011105.content: The question pulls her from her thoughts but she doesn't meet Tsukuyomi's gaze. She just pauses then sighs.

318011106.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011106.content: I've spent years thinking about how to deal with the Child of Heaven. One of my best early plans was to unite the families. That is no longer an option.

318011107.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011107.content: I've been gathering intel from all over. Kagutsuchi knows the details better than I do, though.

318011108.speaker: 迦具土
318011108.content: I didn't get a chance to see my Aether Gazer friends at the Miyahebi. I wasn't expecting to see you all again so soon.

318011109.speaker: 我
318011109.content: Yeah, one of the blessings of a constant stream of crises, I guess.

318011110.speaker: 月读
318011110.content: Honorable Kagutsuchi, does that mean it was you who sneaked in to see Lady Akishika?

318011111.speaker: 迦具土
318011111.content: Yes. I gave her the Madoibi.

318011112.speaker: 国常立
318011112.content: What Madoibi? The Karasugo were involved in what happened there?

318011113.speaker: 迦具土
318011113.content: The Madoibi are a weapon the Crow God developed to kill the other gods. Originally, Izanami wanted to use them against the Child of Heaven.

318011114.speaker: 迦具土
318011114.content: While you were fighting the Snake God at the Miyahebi manor, I had a skirmish with the Child of Heaven. Unfortunately, the Madoibi had only a limited effect. I lost badly and Izanami had to save me.

318011115.speaker: 迦具土
318011115.content: Nevertheless, the Madoibi were still effective against the other gods, so we made sure they got to where they were needed.

318011117.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011117.content: Sorry, Admin. It was my idea.

318011118.speaker: 我
318011118.content: No need to apologize. Himiko chose her own path.

318011119.speaker: 我
318011119.content: It was.. the blaze of glory she wanted.

318011120.content: Lost in thought, I shake my head and sigh, before pushing down the emotions that threaten to overwhelm me.

318011121.speaker: 我
318011121.content: Back to the plan. Izuru Masayoshi—

318011123.content: Someone rushes through the door in a panic, cutting our discussion short.

318011126.content: We stand and walk out into the courtyard. The sky is as quiet as ever, but looks odd. As if... pixelated?

318011127.content: The effect comes and goes, but covers the entire sky. It's accompanied by a layer of cloud which rolls in low over our heads, only adding to the atmosphere of doom.

318011129.speaker: 国常立
318011129.content: Even you don't know? Must be bad...

318011130.speaker: 月读
318011130.content: Admin, I've lost my comms link with Buzenbo.

318011132.speaker: 月读
318011132.content: It seems like the Imperial City... no, all of Reiten has been cut off.

318011133.speaker: 我
318011133.content: It wouldn't be possible to cut off such a big area with a single jamming station. Plus, that sky isn't normal.

318011134.speaker: 我
318011134.content: Mimir, can you analyze local data flows and... Mimir?

318011135.speaker: 弥弥尔
318011135.content: Sasanami seems to... The data is not wrong, but I've never seen anything like this before.

318011136.speaker: 弥弥尔
318011136.content: Sasanami's connection to the Photon Rail network has been severed. That is to say, other Sephirah Zones won't be able to see us on the network.

318011137.speaker: 我
318011137.content: What do you mean? Is something wrong with the Photon Rail? Or with Sasanami?

318011138.speaker: 弥弥尔
318011138.content: I can't say yet. Losing the Photon Rail network has removed almost all of my means of communication with the outside world and my access to data is limited. It hurts.

318011139.speaker: 弥弥尔
318011139.content: The Photon Rail carries all the information that travels between Sephirah Zones, not just people and goods. CORG spends a fortune keeping it maintained and nothing like this has ever happened before.

318011140.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318011140.content: Don't look at me. I can't reach HQ either.

318011141.speaker: 我
318011141.content: Mimir, use my permissions to force an overload state and activate your deep comms module.

318011142.speaker: 弥弥尔
318011142.content: Durr durr durr... Let me try.

318011143.content: Mimir stops talking and dedicates all available computing power to starting up the dark tech. There's a worrying burst of static and then an image gradually takes shape.

318011144.content: I turn the volume up and everyone gathers around. This is no time to be worrying about confidentiality.

318011145.speaker: 休
318011145.content: Admin, I've finally reached you. I'm aware that Sasanami has fallen off the Photon Rail network. What's happening there?

318011146.speaker: 我
318011146.content: The sky's a bit weird and conventional comms are down. Other than that, I don't know. We're regrouping at the Karasugo place right now. Shu, any idea when links will be restored?

318011147.speaker: 休
318011147.content: CORG's got no idea. Unfortunately, I don't think it's a simple tech failure.

318011148.speaker: 休
318011148.content: As I think you know, all Sephirah Zones are connected by the Source Layer and even without the Photon Rail a powerful Mod can travel between zones that way.

318011149.speaker: 休
318011149.content: But I just sent Thor into the Source Layer. She couldn't find Sasanami.

318011150.speaker: 我
318011150.content: We're still in the Gaea dataspace. How come she couldn't find us?

318011151.speaker: 休
318011151.content: Neither Aether Gazer or CORG have ever seen anything like this. The Cryptics are looking at it and their initial thinking is that something is interfering with Sasanami.

318011154.content: The words spring unbidden from my lips. I rub my forehead and bring Shu up-to-date on what's happened with the Karasugo and what we've been discussing.

318011155.speaker: 我
318011155.content:
We're seriously short on intel, so that's all we know.
Hopefully this is the Child of Heaven. I'd rather not be facing a whole different enemy right now.

318011156.speaker: 休
318011156.content: Got it. We're going to upgrade the incident's classification and figure out a way to get you some backup. Won't be easy, though. Until then, you're making the calls, Admin.

318011157.speaker: 休
318011157.content: Oh, has Ningishzida been in touch with you? She took Sakuragiri there and went on to Reiten to help CORG, but we've lost contact.

318011158.speaker: 国常立
318011158.content: Reiten? Isn't that where Buzenbo is?

318011160.speaker: 我
318011160.content: Ningishzida? She's a Mod assigned to Aether Gazer's Medical Center. Usually she works as a medic or provides logistical support.

318011161.content: Division Nine isn't like the other Aether Gazer departments, where there are hordes of people pouring out of the building at the end of the day. It's much smaller. After all, there aren't that many Mods, compared to humans.

318011162.content: After six months of working in the General Office I recognize everyone, more or less, even if I don't have much to do with them.

318011163.speaker: 我
318011163.content: Buzenbo should be at Reiten too, but we can't reach either of them. If they can manage to meet up and look out for each other, I guess they'll be okay.

318011164.speaker: 休
318011164.content: I'm not worried about Buzenbo. But Ningishzida on her own could be... Wait, you mean comms within Sasanami are down too?

318011165.speaker: 我
318011165.content: Yeah... What's up? Are we losing the signal?

318011166.content: Shu's image starts to flicker and I hold my breath until it eventually returns.

318011167.speaker: 休
318011167.content: The comms module is power-hungry. Mimir can't maintain the connection for long.

318011168.speaker: 休
318011168.content: I'll be in touch if they discover anything at Ain Soph.

318011170.speaker: 休
318011170.content: Take care, all of you. Sasanami is in your hands now.

318011171.content: Like any teacher and pupil, Shu and I have learned to communicate quickly and easily. We nod to each other and cut the link. I look around me and see a circle of grim expressions.

318011172.content: The sky is still weirdly blocky and the clouds make it hard to see what's happening clearly. I look upwards and give a long sigh. It feels like things have taken a turn for the worse.

318011173.speaker: 我
318011173.content: Maybe it's like Turing again? A threat that's buried deep but acts decisively when it reveals itself? I don't even know how much time we have...

318011174.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
318011174.content: "Don't make that face, Admin. Get to work. There's always a way."

318011175.speaker: 我
318011175.content: You could show a little bit of concern, you know... But you're right.

318011176.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011176.content: Admin? Who are you talking to?

318011177.content: Izanami's question brings me blinking back to reality. I look at her, grimacing as I shake my head.

318011178.speaker: 我
318011178.content: Nobody. I was just thinking that sometimes you need an idiot on hand to lighten the atmosphere.

318011179.speaker: 我
318011179.content: The Child of Heaven is making her move. We can't just sit here. Karasugo-sama—

318011181.content: Again, our discussion is interrupted by a sudden cry. This time, all the Mods stand ready for action, as if they've sensed something.

318011183.speaker: 鸦伏众
318011183.content: W-We're surrounded by the Imperial Army!

318011184.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318011184.content: The Imperial Army? In Shimogyou? Are you sure?

318011185.speaker: 鸦伏众
318011185.content: Absolutely. Ranks and ranks of them, moving towards us.

318011186.content: Before the Karasugo servant can explain any further, we hear voices coming from outside the manor.

318011187.speaker: 皇城禁军
318011187.content: Karasugo traitors are plotting against the Child of Heaven! Arrest them and kill resisters.

318011188.speaker: 皇城禁军
318011188.content: Karasugo traitors are plotting against the Child of Heaven! Arrest them and kill resisters.

318011189.speaker: 皇城禁军
318011189.content: Karasugo traitors are plotting against the Child of Heaven! Arrest them and kill resisters.

318011190.content: The overlapping loudspeaker messages disturb the peace of the courtyard and echo back and forth into every corner.

318011191.content: Yet another blow. We don't even need to look outside to know what is happening.

318011192.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318011192.content: She chose her moment well. With all those announcements saying we're traitors, nobody will listen to what we have to say.

318011193.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318011193.content: But how could she react so quickly? Is she watching us?

318011194.speaker: 伊邪那美
318011194.content: My brother and I will go and meet with the Imperial Army. Maybe there's some way we can change their minds. Don't do anything rash, please. If they're moving against the Karasugo there's no need for you to get involved.

318011196.content: I watch and sigh as Kagutsuchi and the Karasugo pair walk off.

318011197.content: The Mods are all adjusting their Access Keys, quietly getting ready for a fight. I keep thinking about the situation we're in and how to get out of it.

318011198.speaker: 我
318011198.content: Maybe the Imperial Army is our way out? If we tell them the Child of Heaven isn't human... they wouldn't protect a monster, would they?

318011199.speaker: 我
318011199.content: The problem is proving it, though. If only we had a chance to challenge her, face to face. But forcing her to reveal her identity would mean a fight, and it's not one we could be sure of winning.

318011200.speaker: 我
318011200.content: There aren't many Mods in Sasanami and she could have backup. Given what happened in Xu Heng, I'm not sure we have the numbers to handle her.

318011201.speaker: 我
318011201.content: I didn't say you definitely couldn't beat her, Sekhmet. Why are you looking at me like that?

318011202.content: Sekhmet doesn't respond and I soon realize she isn't even looking at me, but at the sky far off behind me.

318011203.content: I'm just starting to get a bad feeling when Sekhmet knocks me to the ground and points her Access Key at the heavens.

318011204.content: A huge roar blasts away any sense of calm I'd manage to achieve. Then there are flashes of light, cries of terror, and waves of flying mud.

318011205.content: The courtyard, carved many years ago from the mountainside, is hit by artillery fire which shakes the very ground. Walls collapse around us.

318021001.content: Izanami and her brother look through the manor gate at the soldiers massed outside. The Imperial Army are lined up in ranks, clad in their dark-red armor and marching silently forwards.

318021002.speaker: 伊邪那美
318021002.content: This doesn't look good, brother. They aren't here to negotiate.

318021003.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318021003.content: The Imperial Army will follow protocol. If we can talk to them we might be able to avoid bloodshed.

318021004.content: Karasugo Sendou shakes his head and walks up to the gate, where he looks out at the huge army.

318021005.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318021005.content: You are here on the orders of the Child of Heaven? The Karasugo have always been loyal. We are no traitors.

318021007.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318021007.content: I wish to travel to the Imperial City and see the Child of Heaven. I offer the Karasugo wealth as a guarantee of my good conduct.

318021009.content: The marching soldiers stop about twenty meters from the gate, the final stomp of their feet echoing back and forth endlessly in the mountains.

318021010.speaker: 伊邪那美
318021010.content: We know the Child of Heaven's secret, and she knows we know. She needs to kill us to keep us quiet...

318021011.speaker: 伊邪那美
318021011.content: With the Crow God dead, the Karasugo are of no use to her. If we live we are only a threat.

318021013.content: The young girl is so deep in thought she doesn't notice the destructive energy approaching, until a slender figure is standing right in front of her.

318021015.content: I cough up the lungful of dust I inhaled during the blast. I'm still reeling when Sekhmet grabs me by the shoulders and pulls me into a loose circle of Mods, where they can better protect me.

318021016.content: Several Karasugo servants have been rescued too. Thanks to Tsukuyomi, they are unharmed.

318021017.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318021017.content: Don't move. One hit will kill you.

318021018.speaker: 国常立
318021018.content: Don't just stand there. Lend a hand.

318021019.content: I look up. We're surrounded by a swirling wall of wind which is blocking a constant energy barrage, sparks flying with every hit.

318021020.content: Our highly trained ninja sprang into action immediately the bombardment started, creating the shield of wind to protect us. But now she is pale and drained, barely able to string two words together.

318021021.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318021021.content: We need to get to cover! You can't hold out!

318021022.speaker: 我
318021022.content:
Tsukuyomi, get her!
Sekhmet, we're heading for the wall!

318021023.content: Kuninotokotachi coughs several times and collapses into Tsukuyomi's arms. Sekhmet knocks back the energy blasts, covering us as we scurry about the courtyard.

318021026.speaker: 国常立
318021026.content: But there's something weird about those blasts. It's like they're designed to fight Divine Grace. You can't hold them off for long... Hey, I'm talking to you, crazy lady.

318021027.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318021027.content: If you've got time to worry, worry about what we do next. Hey, where's #{nickname}#?

318021028.speaker: 我
318021028.content: Gone to meet with Senba and the others... I'd guess they're planning an escape, given negotiations seem to have failed.

318021031.content: An old burning sensation returns, spreading from his back to envelop his entire body. The taste of blood rises from his chest to the back of his throat. His ears ring, his weak human form staggers, and yet Karasugo Sendou still tries to protect that which he knows he must protect.

318021033.content: The blade of a katana blocks a shell, which explodes in a sheet of flames over Karasugo Sendou's head. The young Karasugo Lord struggles to open his eyes and sees, through a bloody haze, that his sister is still safe. At last, he allows himself a smile.

318021035.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318021035.content: What do you mean, why? Big brothers protect little sisters. It's what we do. Even if I'm not a Mod, I can still... (Cough! Cough!)

318021036.speaker: 伊邪那美
318021036.content: Don't try to talk... And don't do that again, Sendou.

318021037.speaker: 伊邪那美
318021037.content: The best way to look after me is to look after yourself. I don't want to... I can't lose my only family.

318021039.content:
Supporting Karasugo Sendou between them, Izanami and Kagutsuchi use their Divine Grace to form a shield.
Outside the manor, the Imperial Army are blocking all routes of egress, seemingly unconcerned about the nearby artillery fire.

318021040.content: The never-ending bombardment arcs in from some far-off firing position to pound every inch of the manor. Even the Mods are unable to protect the whole complex and some humans are caught out of cover and wounded.

318021042.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318021042.content: There's a secret safe room under the manor. We can shelter there.

318021043.speaker: 伊邪那美
318021043.content: The way things are going, that'll just delay our deaths... Let's fall back and regroup with Admin and the others.

318021045.content: Izanami turns at the sound of hurried footsteps and sees a group rushing from the inside of the manor.

318021047.speaker: 我
318021047.content: I'm so glad you're safe. What happened to Karasugo-sama?

318021048.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318021048.content: Flesh wound. I'm good. What's the plan?

318021049.content: I can see the massed ranks of the Imperial Army through the gate. I pause at the sight, but I have no other choice. This is no time to stop.

318021050.speaker: 我
318021050.content: Gather everyone together. We're breaking out!

318022001.content: I'm not sure exactly when we broke free of the encirclement. We never stopped to check. But it's been ten minutes since our last enemy encounter, so we stop.

318022002.content: The Mods are still in good shape, but nobody else can cope with the intense running battle for long. Some rest and recovery is needed. Sekhmet heads off solo to check our rear, but she's back soon.

318022004.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318022004.content: Arty fire's stopped and the Imperial Army have the manor. Don't know what they plan to do with it, it's in ruins. No sign of them chasing us.

318022005.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318022005.content: They wouldn't be much of a threat anyway, without the artillery cover. Whoever is in charge in Imperial City knows there's no point in sending them after us.

318022007.speaker: 我
318022007.content: We scouted the perimeter, no ambushes. But everyone's exhausted or wounded or both. We're going to need to rest up before moving on.

318022008.speaker: 我
318022008.content: Karasugo-sama and Kuninotokotachi are both badly hurt. Luckily we have medkits so they should be back on their feet soon.

318022010.content: Karasugo Sendou has guided us towards a patch of old forest tucked away in the hills. It makes a good temporary refuge.

318022011.content: Izanami is standing watch by her brother, who is dozing as he recovers from his wounds. Tsukuyomi is tending to Kuninotokotachi, while the members of the Karasugo household are looking after each other.

318022012.content: The Mods approach when they see Sekhmet and me.

318022013.speaker: 我
318022013.content: Seems we've lost 'em. We can't stop here long, though. The Child of Heaven is moving faster than we expected and we're already behind.

318022014.speaker: 我
318022014.content: So, the Imperial Army... Any thoughts?

318022015.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318022015.content: You noticed it too? Something wasn't right. A Bane Energy signal, weak but definitely there. They weren't moving normally either.

318022016.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318022016.content: Those energy blasts were weird too. It's not a weapon I've seen at CORG. Does Aether Gazer have anything like that?

318022017.speaker: 我
318022017.content: What do you think we are? Arms manufacturers?

318022018.speaker: 我
318022018.content: The Visbanes having a weapon like that is bad news. If it comes to all-out war they can keep us pinned down with artillery fire alone.

318022019.speaker: 我
318022019.content: It looked like the fire was coming from Kamigyou. But I don't know of any army positions in that direction.

318022020.speaker: 弥弥尔
318022020.content: There is if you go far enough. The Imperial City.

318022021.speaker: 弥弥尔
318022021.content: According to the trajectory and velocity, the shots were coming from the Imperial City in Reiten.

318022022.speaker: 伊邪那美
318022022.content: That's hundreds of kilometers away. Is that... is that even possible?

318022023.speaker: 弥弥尔
318022023.content: Never underestimate the power of technology, young Miss Karasugo. I could draw you the blueprints for such a gun right now, if you wanted.

318022024.speaker: 弥弥尔
318022024.content: But the shells are what was special. The reason you found it difficult to counter them with Divine Grace was because the energy used is closer to Gaea's basic computing power.

318022025.speaker: 弥弥尔
318022025.content: Sekhmet, you might not know this as I know it's not your department, but it's similar to the type of energy CORG uses to keep the Photon Rail network running.

318022026.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318022026.content: Ah. Mystery solved. They've stolen the energy from the Photon Rail.

318022027.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318022027.content: So the Child of Heaven has cut the data connection at the Photon Rail station and hooked herself up to it?

318022028.speaker: 弥弥尔
318022028.content: Something like that. Maybe you should visit the station and see. However, the attack would only have used a tiny fraction of the total energy Sasanami needs.

318022029.speaker: 弥弥尔
318022029.content: If Sasanami was removed from the Photon Rail network to tap into the energy supply... you've got to wonder what the rest of it is being used for.

318022030.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318022030.content: It's the first time I've heard of a Visbane doing something like this.

318022031.speaker: 伊邪那美
318022031.content: The Child of Heaven has been at work in the Imperial City for a century or so. She's had time to come up with a lot of evil schemes.

318022032.speaker: 伊邪那美
318022032.content: I wonder what kind of enemy we face in her.

318022033.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318022033.content: I don't think we should overestimate the threat. The fact she sent so many soldiers after us indicates she is still concerned about what we might do.

318022034.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318022034.content: We're still free to act. That means there's hope.

318022035.speaker: 我
318022035.content: That's right. It's too soon to talk about giving up.

318022036.content: I exhale slowly as I look at the Mods standing near me and, further off, the Karasugo people. I try to gather my thoughts.

318022037.speaker: 我
318022037.content: The people in Kamigyou think we're rebels. They're not going to believe anything we say. That means we can't go and speak to Izuru Masayoshi.

318022038.speaker: 我
318022038.content: But the attack proves we're right about there being secrets hidden in the Imperial City.

318022039.speaker: 我
318022039.content: Whatever is going on at the Reiten Palace, we're going to find out what it is.

318022040.content: We can't help but look towards the Imperial City. There's nothing to see, just the trees which block our view.

318022041.speaker: 鸦伏众
318022041.content: Oh! Miss Senba! The Lord is awake.

318022042.content: We glance at each other before hurrying to follow Izanami and check on her brother. Even the smallest bit of good news feels precious right now.

318031001.content: The first sensation to return is pain. Then feeling returns to his hands and feet. Each breath comes with the agony of wounds being pulled open.

318031002.content: Slowly, Karasugo Sendou opens his eyes. The bright sunlight coming from the trees seems to mislead him into thinking this is the end.

318031006.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031006.content: They're being looked after. We didn't lose anyone and morale is good.

318031007.content: Seeing all is well in our temporary camp, Karasugo Sendou finally relaxes. He nods at us and then smiles at his sister.

318031008.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318031008.content: Seems you got us away safely.

318031009.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031009.content: They didn't chase us, that's all. How are you feeling?

318031010.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318031010.content: I'm good. Those Aether Gazer medkits are something else. Look—

318031011.content: Karasugo Sendou tries to demonstrate by moving his arms, but his smile soon turns to a grimace. Sweat breaks out on his brow, but he shrugs and does his best to pretend all is well.

318031012.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031012.content: Be brave, brother, not stupid. We're brother and sister, but remember only one of us is a Mod.

318031013.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031013.content: That means it makes more sense for me to look after you. So if anything like that happens again, try and stay calm.

318031014.content: Her brother keeps smiling, but his gaze drops and he seems to be wavering between the determination to help and the knowledge he can't. A moment later, he nods.

318031015.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318031015.content: Actually... I just wanted to do something for the family.

318031016.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318031016.content: I'm the Lord of the Karasugo and your older brother. Fighting the Crow God, avenging our mother... these are my responsibilities.

318031017.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318031017.content: Actually, I was jealous of how you were able to run the family, despite having no public role.

318031019.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031019.content: But I want to do all this. And like I said, you don't need to blame yourself.

318031020.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318031020.content: I know, but even so... I'm still your brother.

318031021.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318031021.content: I had to do something. Next time... Sekhmet's already given me a dressing down. But to see you here, safe and well, makes me feel like maybe I'm not completely useless.

318031022.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318031022.content: Maybe that's all I can do for you. Be rash and impulsive.

318031026.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031026.content: Don't be afraid. I'm still Karasugo Senba.

318031027.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031027.content: You aren't going to lose your sister again.

318031028.speaker: 国常立
318031028.content: Hey, you. What are you staring at them for? Wishing you had a big strong brother to protect you?

318031029.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031029.content: Don't you find humans fascinating? They're so changeable.

318031030.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031030.content: Doesn't matter if they're humble and weak, or think they're kings of the world.

318031031.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031031.content: They always manage to do something you don't expect and find strengths you never knew they had.

318031032.speaker: 国常立
318031032.content: I never knew... (Cough) you were such a voyeur.

318031033.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031033.content: You learn to look after yourself first, then worry about my psychological health.

318031034.speaker: 国常立
318031034.content: Oh, Captain. How could you be so mean to someone wounded while protecting you...

318031035.speaker: 月读
318031035.content: Things were hairy. We were lucky you thought on your feet.

318031036.speaker: 国常立
318031036.content: No worries. Never missed a Pheasant Squad training session, me.

318031037.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031037.content: Okay, if you're all awake we should speak to Admin about what we do next.

318031039.content: I watch as the Mods gather around and I know our brief period of rest is drawing to a close.

318031040.content: With both their leaders there, the Karasugo troops are regaining their morale. To maintain that, they need a simple mission with a clear target, not a complex plan.

318031041.speaker: 我
318031041.content: We've suffered some setbacks, but our course of action remains correct.

318031042.speaker: 我
318031042.content: We need to figure out what's going on and gather more forces. Where do we do this? In the Imperial City, where we'll find both the Child of Heaven and Izuru Masayoshi, and in Shimogyou, amongst the remaining Akishika forces and the public.

318031043.speaker: 我
318031043.content: Moreover, the removal of Sasanami from the Photon Rail also requires our attention, as Mimir said. So we need to head to the Photon Rail Nexus.

318031044.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031044.content: Sounds like you're talking about splitting our current forces in three?

318031045.speaker: 我
318031045.content: Correct. We can't neglect any of the three locations.

318031046.speaker: 月读
318031046.content: The Photon Rail Nexus is to the north of Shimogyou. There, the Imperial City, and Kamigyou. We'd need to move in three different directions.

318031047.speaker: 月读
318031047.content: We're already shorthanded. I worry that splitting up is too risky. If anything goes wrong there's no chance of coordinating any backup.

318031048.speaker: 我
318031048.content: It is risky. The safest thing to do would be to find some defensible location and sit it out there, waiting for aid...

318031049.speaker: 我
318031049.content: But we don't have the time to play it safe. We can't just hope our enemy makes some kind of mistake.

318031050.speaker: 我
318031050.content: If the Child of Heaven is bold enough to seal off all of Sasanami, we can't be sure she'll wait long enough for our backup to arrive. It would be better to go on the attack. Disrupt her plans and buy ourselves more time.

318031051.speaker: 我
318031051.content: And the key to doing that could be found at any one of those three locations. The Child of Heaven has us at an advantage. The risks of splitting up is necessary if we're going to turn that around.

318031052.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031052.content: Is it... You're quite the optimist, assuming everything will go well.

318031053.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031053.content: You're right about the three targets. But we're bound to run into the Child of Heaven somewhere. If we're split up...

318031054.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031054.content: It could be the key to winning the advantage. Or it could be the beginning of the end. You can't be sure which. Aren't you scared?

318031055.content: There's nothing to be scared of.

318031056.speaker: 我
318031056.content: If we take the risk, everyone has a better chance of living through this. We can save ourselves.

318031057.speaker: 我
318031057.content: But if it's the right thing to do, we have to do it. Scared or not.

318031059.speaker: 我
318031059.content: Look, maybe I'm being selfish. But everyone who died to get us to this point wasn't doing it so we could take the easy way out.

318031060.speaker: 我
318031060.content: The more we achieve, the more meaning their sacrifices have.

318031061.speaker: 我
318031061.content: We're still alive. We have a duty to work for the best possible outcome.

318031062.content: I take a long look at Sekhmet. I think this is the first time I've ever seen her unsure of herself.

318031063.content: I know who she's thinking of. The same people I'm thinking of. The same people we're all thinking of. None of us will forget those who still lie on the battlefield and the gift they gave us.

318031064.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031064.content: I can see you're confident of your plan, which speaks in your favor. It is, I suppose, an option.

318031065.speaker: 月读
318031065.content: Pheasant Squad is with Admin, as always.

318031066.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031066.content:
Yeah, me too.
How are we splitting up?

318031068.speaker: 我
318031068.content: Buzenbo and Ningishzida are already in the Imperial City. Tsukuyomi and Kuninotokotachi, Pheasant Squad specializes in urban infiltration and you'll all work well together. That's yours.

318031069.speaker: 月读
318031069.content: Just what I was thinking. Consider it done.

318031071.speaker: 我
318031071.content: Next, Shimogyou. We can get help from Kuramitsuha and the remaining Akishika forces. Karasugo-sama, as the Karasugo Lord, it's your job to get them on our side.

318031072.speaker: 我
318031072.content: Senba and Kagutsuchi, you go with him. Take the other Karasugo forces as well. Get us a foothold there as soon as you can.

318031073.speaker: 我
318031073.content: Finally, the Photon Rail Nexus. That's a CORG facility. You should have the necessary access, Sekhmet?

318031074.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031074.content: If they've lost touch with Ain Soph, any CORG operations in Sasanami will fall under my command.

318031075.speaker: 我
318031075.content: Excellent. We'll come with you. If Mimir can get the Photon Rail running again all we need to do is wait for reinforcements and all will be solved.

318031077.content: I blink in surprise and find myself glancing over my shoulder. I know what the answer is, but I don't want to say. I turn back to Sekhmet.

318031078.speaker: 我
318031078.content: Forget it. I thought my partner was still here. A slip of the tongue.

318031079.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031079.content: Your partner. You must have relied on her a lot.

318031081.content: I'm not in the mood to deny it. I take a deep breath and look around.

318031082.speaker: 我
318031082.content: The Imperial City and Photon Rail Nexus teams can travel into Kamigyou together, then split up once safely over the border.

318031083.speaker: 我
318031083.content: Keep comms open. The same goes for the Imperial City team. If you can't get a signal or are being blocked, make contact as soon as you regain comms.

318031084.speaker: 我
318031084.content: Any questions? If not, hit the road.

318031085.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031085.content: One thing. I'm coming to the Photon Rail Nexus.

318031086.content: I wasn't expecting any comments or complaints at this stage. I look at Izanami in surprise. She's clearly serious.

318031087.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031087.content: Your team is too small. It worries me.

318031088.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031088.content: Oh, don't worry. I'm not going to eat #{nickname}#, I promise.

318031089.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031089.content: I'm serious. The Child of Heaven isn't as straightforward an enemy as you think.

318031090.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031090.content: Got some intel you haven't shared with us yet?

318031091.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031091.content: Well, the planning meeting was interrupted, remember?

318031092.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031092.content: I learned quite a lot about the Child of Heaven from the Crow God, during all those years we were fighting. It hoped to turn me into an assassin specifically trained to kill her...

318031093.content: As we watch, Izanami shakes her head, as if ridding herself of unhappy memories. Then she looks calmly back at us.

318031094.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031094.content: You all need to hear this before we split up. There are things you need to know if you run into the Child of Heaven.

318031095.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031095.content: I know what the source of her power is.

318031097.content: We've traveled at full speed across the wasteland between the cities, but things are starting to look urban again. We've finally reached Kamigyou.

318031098.content: We're not far into the city when something in the sky off in the distance grabs our attention.

318031100.speaker: 国常立
318031100.content: Look over there. Where the sky's not... sky-colored.

318031101.speaker: 月读
318031101.content: The Imperial City is in that direction.

318031102.content: A black and red cloud writhes in the air above the splendid Reiten Palace, seeming to cancel out all the beauty of the building.

318031103.content: Whatever it is, it looks as if it stinks of corruption, despite still being far off in the distance. Next, we feel a tension spread through our bodies, starting at the eyes, and then a prickling sensation all over our skin.

318031104.speaker: 我
318031104.content: That's... Is that all Bane Energy?

318031105.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031105.content: Only the Child of Heaven could produce so much of it.

318031106.speaker: 伊邪那美
318031106.content: It seems to be spreading outwards. What is she trying to do?

318031107.speaker: 月读
318031107.content: The closer we get to Kamigyou the more Imperial Army and guard patrols there are.

318031108.speaker: 月读
318031108.content: You think they're looking for us? Or maybe Buzenbo? We need to make contact with her and Nishida as soon as we can.

318031109.speaker: 我
318031109.content: We won't forget them. But don't get too worried. It could be helpful to have them in the Imperial City.

318031110.speaker: 我
318031110.content: If Buzenbo's been able to find Ningishzida and they're working together, they might already have made some progress.

318031111.speaker: 月读
318031111.content: I'm just worried they've run into trouble...

318031112.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031112.content: Then I'll accompany you a little further.

318031113.content: Sekhmet suddenly stops, her Access Key slipping from her shoulder to plant itself in the ground.

318031115.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318031115.content: I don't know who's in command of them. But anyone who can get us surrounded without us knowing is going to be a tricky customer to deal with.

318041002.content: In a room in a CORG safe house masquerading as a hotel, a young girl sits quietly, deep in meditation.

318041003.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041003.content: Still heart and breath. Soul and will as one...

318041005.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041005.content: Calm. Centered. No ego. No me...

318041006.content: The door to the adjacent room opens.

318041010.content: The young girl's eyes open slowly and she looks at the sword in its scabbard on her lap.

318041011.content: Even through the scabbard she can see the flickering light on its edge. The light that once caused it to be thought a bad omen and locked away.

318041013.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041013.content: My father thought it would bring bad luck, yet still kept it and passed it on to my master.

318041014.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041014.content: Is there a lesson in there?

318041023.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318041023.content: Not just your arms! Put your back into it—

318041025.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318041025.content: Okay. Take a rest. How are you? Tired?

318041027.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318041027.content: Your hands are shaking, girl. You need to learn to be honest with yourself.

318041028.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041028.content: Oh... I am a bit tired, but I can keep going.

318041030.content: She takes the water proffered by her adoptive father and, in the same movement, hands the wooden practice sword to him. She throws her head back to drink and then, as she's preparing to continue her training, notices her father staring at the sword.

318041032.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318041032.content: Oh, just remembering when you were a little girl.

318041033.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318041033.content: I never planned to teach you to fight, but you hung around and picked a few things up. I could see you had talent. Potential. So I started to take your training more seriously.

318041034.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318041034.content: But now I think about it, I don't think I ever once asked you the question. Do you actually want to learn how to do this?

318041037.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041037.content: Because of what it teaches me. Decisiveness. Discipline. Restraint. Frugality. Faith. Kindness. To hone body and will, to let go of my impatience...

318041038.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318041038.content: No, no. That's not what I mean.

318041039.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318041039.content: Say you practice something a thousand times. Ten thousand times. To the point every move is as natural as breathing. Have you ever asked yourself.. what then?

318041040.content: Buzenbo pauses in surprise, wrinkles her brow, then shakes her head gravely.

318041041.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041041.content: Kendo is like being a good person. There's no end point. The more you learn, the more you realize how little you know.

318041042.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041042.content: Don't worry, father. I won't become complacent.

318041044.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318041044.content: Okay, that's enough for today. Let's eat.

318041045.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041045.content: Eat... No, it was "kendo is limitless".

318041046.content: The sound of ingredients being dropped into a pot comes from the adjacent room. Then, the sound of water bubbling and oil sizzling. The scent of delicious food sneaks into Buzenbo's room through some unseen crack.

318041048.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041048.content: We agreed to meet here. How come she's so late?

318041049.content: Buzenbo checks her comms terminal. She sent a message to Ningishzida twenty minutes ago. Still no reply.

318041050.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041050.content: Even if she couldn't make it, she'd have let me know... Has something happened?

318041051.content: She replaces Sakuragiri and goes into the hallway, checking as she goes that she's in the right room. Just then, the door to the next room opens and another young girl rushes out, spatula in hand.

318041052.speaker: ？？？
318041052.content: Soy sauce! How could I run out of soy sauce!

318041054.speaker: 宁希达
318041054.content: Hey, Buzenbo. I thought you'd stood me up!

318041055.speaker: 宁希达
318041055.content: It's okay though, you're just in time for lunch. We can catch up as we eat.

318041056.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041056.content: Lunch? Why are you making lunch in there? We agreed to meet in this room.

318041057.speaker: 宁希达
318041057.content: Oh, wasn't it my room? The receptionist downstairs told me third floor, left side, fifth room.

318041058.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041058.content: That's right, third floor, left side, fifth room. Do you want to count the rooms?

318041059.speaker: 宁希达
318041059.content: But I'm right! It is the fifth room. Hehe, you must have counted wrong. Look, there's another room over there.

318041060.content: Pleased with herself, Ningishzida points down the hallway. With the acute eyesight of a Mod, it's possible to make out the outline of a concealed door.

318041061.speaker: 宁希达
318041061.content: CORG assumes only trained agents will use places like this. You've got to keep your wits about you.

318041062.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041062.content: That's the storage room. They only hid it to avoid confusion.

318041064.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041064.content: Of course storage rooms don't count...

318041065.speaker: 宁希达
318041065.content: Oh... Well, it's my first time here.

318041066.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041066.content: Never mind. It's not as if we're in a rush. What's that smell?

318041067.speaker: 宁希达
318041067.content: Hmm. Is someone cooking? Smells like it's burning...

318041069.speaker: 宁希达
318041069.content: Oh! I was so enjoying our chat I forgot. Soy sauce!

318041071.content: There's a patter of light footsteps as Ningishzida, armed with her spatula, scampers off down the stairs.

318041072.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041072.content: So, do I go left or right?

318041073.content: The two doors are identical. Buzenbo gives her forehead a resigned rub, then moves Sakuragiri into the room Ningishzida is using.

318041076.content: Buzenbo hesitantly places her tableware down. Ningishzida is staring intently at her from the other side of the table, eyes shining with expectation. Buzenbo isn't sure what to say.

318041078.speaker: 宁希达
318041078.content: Hehe. I did it! I did it!

318041079.speaker: 宁希达
318041079.content: If you like it, Buzenbo, that means I didn't waste my time.

318041080.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041080.content: Thanks. But, um, why did you want to cook for me?

318041081.speaker: 宁希达
318041081.content: You need a good meal in your belly if you're going to fight well. Fighting Visbanes is tough work, so I like to make sure everyone is well-fed and ready for their missions.

318041082.speaker: 宁希达
318041082.content: You're from Sasanami, right? Are there any good restaurants nearby you could recommend?

318041083.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041083.content: Sorry, I don't know any. I've been busy training. I haven't had time to get out and about.

318041084.speaker: 宁希达
318041084.content: Oh... Sounds like you're a hard worker. That's great. I couldn't keep that up, I'm sure.

318041085.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041085.content: Once it's a habit it kind of keeps itself up. But we should discuss the mission.

318041086.speaker: 宁希达
318041086.content: Hehe. Oh yeah, what's the story with that red sword of yours?

318041087.speaker: 宁希达
318041087.content: It really gave me a fright. It was emitting Divine Grace even when nobody was using it. How does it do that?

318041088.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041088.content: I don't know either. I already had it when my father took me in.

318041089.speaker: 宁希达
318041089.content: Oh. So the Access Key has been with you since birth?

318041090.content: Buzenbo blinks. Ningishzida has moved to her side of the table and is now warmly clutching her hand.

318041091.speaker: 宁希达
318041091.content: Buzenbo, could you show me what you can do. It's so cool...

318041093.speaker: 宁希达
318041093.content: Oh, you don't want to? Never mind. Forget I spoke.

318041094.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041094.content: It's not that. The truth is, I've never taken Sakuragiri from its scabbard.

318041095.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041095.content: I sense the Divine Grace it contains every time I hold it and have a premonition. That drawing the sword would result not in victory, but in a valiant death.

318041096.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041096.content: Ningishzida, did my master or The Cryptics explain anything when they gave you the sword?

318041097.speaker: 宁希达
318041097.content: Explain anything? Did they? Uh... don't think so.

318041098.speaker: 宁希达
318041098.content: During the mission briefing, Shu just told me it's your Access Key.

318041099.speaker: 宁希达
318041099.content: Maybe you should try it out? I mean, the way things are here in Sasanami you could need it at any moment.

318041100.speaker: 宁希达
318041100.content: It has to be safer to do that here than in the middle of a battle, right? And if anything goes wrong, I'm right here to help!

318041101.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041101.content: That does make sense... Okay, I'll see what happens.

318041102.content: Once more, Buzenbo sits down quietly to run her hand along Sakuragiri's scabbard.

318041103.content: The cherry-red Divine Grace stabs at her hand. Is it burning or freezing? She's not sure. She just lets it happen.

318041104.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041104.content: Kendo is in the mind. Do I know my own mind?

318041105.content: Her hand tightens on the hilt of the sword, the fine lines there matching those of her palm. With a little force, the blade and a more powerful wave of Divine Grace emerge.

318041107.content: The sword is giving off a murderous aura. The world goes hazy as a cherry-red light spreads from the blade to cover her entire field of vision.

318041110.content: Under a heavy sky, countless Visbanes stretch their deadly limbs. Each gives off a stench of corruption and death as they storm onto the battlefield from every angle.

318041112.speaker: 「丰前坊天狗」
318041112.content: Even the keenest of blades will one day have its final fight. There is no reason to hesitate.

318041113.speaker: ？？？
318041113.content: You should remember that no matter what you do, you cannot change the way this era will end.

318041114.speaker: 「丰前坊天狗」
318041114.content: But we don't fight solely for a certain outcome, do we? I don't want to regret things already determined.

318041115.speaker: 「丰前坊天狗」
318041115.content: So this time, listen to me.

318041116.content: The people behind her walk off and she raises her blade a little. The Divine Power within her starts to shine, a lighthouse in the fog.

318041117.content: When the first Visbane spots her standing proud at the center of the battlefield it howls and summons its comrades. They stream inwards, flooding towards that slender figure.

318041118.content: Her gaze is calm. She watches the Visbane horde as she might watch a cherry blossom about to fall. Only when the first attack nears does she draw her sword.

318041119.speaker: 「丰前坊天狗」
318041119.content:
You have the same idea I do.
To fight for your beliefs—
