318041120.content: Her every movement is brief and simple and ruthless and lethal. Cherry-red light weaves itself into a shining curtain, a barrier the Visbanes cannot penetrate.

318041122.content: Wounds open in her flesh, slashes and slices through which her strength and vitality flow. But her sword hand never wavers.

318041123.content: She holds, a dam that stands eternal against a vast flood. No Visbane can pass her blade.

318041124.content: This is the end of the world. This is her battle, to fight alone.

318041127.content: Buzenbo widens her eyes, determined to see more clearly what is in front of her. But as she approaches a bone-piercing agony overwhelms her.

318041128.content: A whirling wind picks up the cherry blossom from the battlefield as the two consciousnesses join across time and space. In an instant, Buzenbo sees so much, remembers so much. But the pain is soon too much and all she is aware of is her own voice.

318041129.content: I don't know which me it is.

318041131.content: The taste of blood, the ache in her muscles, the pain of her wounds, the tiredness of her soul... The figure seems to know nothing of all that Buzenbo feels. She just stands there, her swordplay quick and accurate.

318041132.content: Is it her? Buzenbo isn't sure and doesn't have the energy to worry about it. She's lost in a vortex of near-death exhaustion and endless rage. It swallows her will, her thoughts, everything.

318041134.content: It's more than she's ever experienced and ultimately it defeats her. Her hand opens, her vision fades. She is a leaf cast adrift on the storm.

318041135.content: In the distance she can see how the warrior wielding Sakuragiri lets her hands fall and stands calmly. There is no life left in her.

318041136.content:
The pain finally recedes, leaving a clarity as pure as death.
Something, she knows, has died. Something that belongs to her. Something that has gone on to become something new, something greater.

318041139.content: When Buzenbo opens her eyes, her awareness of Sakuragiri has already faded. But there's still a sense of pain and fear in her chest.

318041141.content: The girl cries out and embraces her.

318041142.speaker: 宁希达
318041142.content: You scared me to death! Wah...

318041143.speaker: 宁希达
318041143.content: You fainted right after drawing your sword and your Divine Power was all wibbly-wobbly. I couldn't stop it, even with my Access Key.

318041144.speaker: 宁希达
318041144.content: Things calmed down when I pushed your sword back into its scabbard.

318041145.speaker: 宁希达
318041145.content: How are you? Any dizziness? Show me where it hurts.

318041146.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041146.content: I'm weak. Chest feels tight. I'll be okay...

318041147.content: Buzenbo looks down at the girl in her arms and gives her a reassuring pat on the head.

318041148.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041148.content: Did you see anything when you touched Sakuragiri?

318041151.speaker: 宁希达
318041151.content: Its Divine Grace was a bit prickly. But that was all.

318041153.speaker: 宁希达
318041153.content: You hit the floor before it was even out of its scabbard. Are you going to be able to use it?

318041154.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041154.content: It was so painful. I thought I was going to suffocate. I don't know if I'd survive another attempt.

318041155.speaker: 宁希达
318041155.content: So what are you going to do? Could we ask The Cryptics? They know everything.

318041157.content: Ningishzida is making the call before Buzenbo can even reach for her communicator. But no matter how long they wait, it doesn't connect.

318041159.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041159.content: Weird. I can't get through either.

318041160.speaker: 宁希达
318041160.content: Oh, signal, signal. Shoot, I feel like the enemy is tracking us down.

318041161.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041161.content: Maybe the signal is bad up here. Let's go downstairs and try.

318041162.content: Aware that things may be about to turn bad, the two leave the room and take the stairs down to the first floor.

318041163.content: Normally, they'd be able to hear noises from the lobby and the street as they descended. Now, all is worryingly quiet. It only makes their footsteps seem louder. Ningishzida starts to hesitate.

318041164.speaker: 宁希达
318041164.content: What if something really is wrong?

318041166.content: As they pass a window, they both stop and turn to see what they can see outside.

318041167.speaker: 宁希达
318041167.content: That... It's not some kind of show, is it?

318041168.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318041168.content: Something's... happened. That's the Imperial City.

318051001.speaker: 上京区居民A
318051001.content: Hey, did you see what happened this morning?

318051002.speaker: 上京区居民B
318051002.content: No, I was at home. What happened?

318051003.speaker: 上京区居民A
318051003.content: Oh, you missed the fun. The Imperial Army marched out of the Imperial City, heading for Shimogyou.

318051004.speaker: 上京区居民B
318051004.content: You must be seeing things. When does the Imperial Army ever leave the Imperial City?

318051005.speaker: 上京区居民A
318051005.content: Hah. You've missed out on the big news. Things are getting real.

318051006.speaker: 上京区居民A
318051006.content: The Imperial Army have been out in Shimogyou, saying the Karasugo have moved against the Child of Heaven. They're traitors!

318051007.speaker: 上京区居民B
318051007.content: Surely you don't believe that? How could the Karasugo do anything to the Child of Heaven? They just hide out there in the mountains.

318051008.speaker: 上京区居民A
318051008.content: Who knows. That's what the Child of Heaven is saying, anyway.

318051009.speaker: 上京区居民A
318051009.content: The Sanzaru left years ago. Then the Miyahebi were lost early this year. Then there was the Beast Tide and apparently Lady Akishika died. Guess it's the Karasugo's turn now.

318051010.speaker: 上京区居民A
318051010.content: I don't know who the five families offended, but they're all suffering. Big changes.

318051011.speaker: 上京区居民B
318051011.content: Well, it has to be the Child of Heaven or Izuru Masayoshi, right? My uncle said he sees the Prime Lord visiting the palace late at night, so maybe it's both—

318051012.speaker: 上京区居民A
318051012.content: Hush! You can't talk like that! What if... Oh...

318051013.content: The two passersby suddenly stop and fall silent. They lower their heads, as if waiting for the Imperial Army to arrive.

318051014.content: Sure enough, a detachment of soldiers march past, heading away from the palace.

318051015.content: Everyone on the street, whether running about, chatting, or shouting, falls silent and lowers their head in unison. They all stand motionless by the side of the street.

318051016.content: Even when the army has passed, they remain still, statues devoid of life. Only their steady breathing indicates they are alive.

318051017.content: But their breathing is synchronized, as if they are machines working to the same rhythm. They wait there by the street.

318051018.content: A CORG agent from the safe house walks towards the Imperial Army, a hand hovering near their sidearm.

318051019.speaker: 科尔盖特工
318051019.content: What's going on? Has something happened?

318051021.speaker: 科尔盖特工
318051021.content: I'm an investigator with CORG's Egregious Crimes Department. I need you to—Urgh...

318051022.content: No mercy is shown. Before the agent has time to draw their gun they are pierced through by a sharp weapon.

318051023.content: The soldier responsible doesn't make a sound during the entire process. Draw, stab, remove. All in silence.

318051024.content: Weapon sheathed, the soldier returns to their position and rejoins the march in perfect time. The blood blends perfectly with the red armor.

318051025.content: That is what Buzenbo and Ningishzida saw as they left the safe house.

318051026.content: Ningishzida instinctively moves to help, but is pulled back by Buzenbo who drags her, hand clamped over her mouth, into a quiet alley. She only releases her grip when the Imperial Army is safely away.

318051028.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318051028.content: Did you see their eyes? That wasn't a human look. There's no point talking to them.

318051029.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318051029.content: That's Bane Energy in the sky. Something's happened in the Imperial City. So ask yourself, why are the Imperial Army out here and not back there, protecting the Child of Heaven?

318051030.speaker: 宁希达
318051030.content: Now you mention it... You think the Imperial Army is being controlled by the Visbanes?

318051032.speaker: 宁希达
318051032.content: There was something weird about them. I mean, they look normal, but... I don't know. Maybe it's my medical intuition. I can spot a sickness.

318051033.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318051033.content: There have been cases where Visbanes take control of humans... But the Imperial Army is usually stationed in the Imperial City barracks. How could the Visbanes take control of so many people without anyone noticing?

318051034.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318051034.content: If the Visbane lived in the Imperial City... and was someone important.

318051035.speaker: 宁希达
318051035.content: You mean the Child of Heaven?

318051036.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318051036.content: That's impossible. The Child of Heaven is... Oh, hang on. Maybe you're right. Have you ever seen the Child of Heaven?

318051037.speaker: 宁希达
318051037.content: Of course not. I'm not even from Sasanami.

318051038.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318051038.content: Not many locals have seen her either. Forget it. We don't have any evidence to go on, so there's no use speculating. Let's just be wary of anyone from the Imperial City.

318051039.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318051039.content: What's going on with the locals, though. Any ideas?

318051040.speaker: 宁希达
318051040.content: They look healthy, but their expressions are weird. I might need a closer look to be sure.

318051041.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318051041.content: Okay, let's do that. I don't think the Imperial Army will spot us.

318051042.content: Buzenbo automatically checks her shoulder and pales at what she sees. She pushes Ningishzida aside just as a spear flies between them and embeds itself in the wall.

318051044.content: Seeing the Imperial Army are sealing both ends of the alley, Buzenbo pulls Ningishzida back to her side and the two charge towards the not-yet complete blockade.

318051045.content: Kogarasu Maru leaves its scabbard and the light blade's Divine Grace slices through the armor of several Imperial Army soldiers, leaving deep wounds. The soldiers don't even seem to notice and just keep coming.

318051046.speaker: 宁希达
318051046.content: Y-y-you're not going to kill them, are you!?

318051047.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318051047.content: Merely flesh wound 'em. But I don't think we can stop them.

318051048.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318051048.content: I don't know how many more there are out on the street. I might not be able to cover you all the time, so stay alert.

318051049.speaker: 宁希达
318051049.content: I'm a medic, not a fighter...

318051050.content: Talking seems to distract Ningishzida and she slows down. A soldier behind her gets close enough to jab her in the back with a spear.

318051051.content: She startles at the pain and hurries to form a Divine Power shield behind her and use the impact of the spear to stumble forward and catch up with Buzenbo.

318051052.speaker: 宁希达
318051052.content: Although I could manage a little self-defense...

318051053.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318051053.content: Nice trick. I feel better now.

318051054.speaker: 宁希达
318051054.content: Buzenbo, I think we guessed it. They all have traces of Bane Energy. They must be under Visbane control.

318051055.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318051055.content: Do you think you can remove it.

318051056.speaker: 宁希达
318051056.content: I... I'll give it a shot. Three secs.

318051057.content: Ningishzida takes cover a few paces behind Buzenbo, who slashes out a safe space in which the medic can take the few seconds she needs.

318051058.content: Ningishzida calms herself and summons up Divine Power between her two hands. Then she sets it free and it ripples outwards, into the Imperial Army soldiers—and seems to hit a solid wall.

318051059.content: The front rank of soldiers halt for a moment, but soon recover and continue onwards.

318051060.speaker: 宁希达
318051060.content: How come it didn't work!? Oh, I shouldn't have bothered.

318052001.content: The two manage to throw off the pursuing soldiers, but there's no reason for optimism.

318052002.content: Artillery fire constantly screeches across the sky and is clearly going to be bad news for anyone standing in the target area.

318052003.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318052003.content: Things just keep getting worse. We still don't have comms, so we can't speak to Admin or Aether Gazer...

318052004.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318052004.content: Ningishzida, you need to get out of Reiten and head to Shimogyou. Rendezvous with Admin and the others and bring them up to date.

318052005.speaker: 宁希达
318052005.content: Sure... Oh, no no no. What are you going to do?

318052006.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318052006.content: My mission is to watch the Imperial City. And until I figure out what the blazes is going on in there, I can't leave.

318052007.speaker: 宁希达
318052007.content: Oh, and how are you going to do that when the place is crawling with Imperial Army soldiers. Just walk in?

318052010.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318052010.content: Someone has to find out what's happening. My master didn't give me Sakuragiri so I could run away with it, did she?

318052011.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318052011.content: Infiltration is the Pheasant Squad specialty, and no matter how many Imperial Army soldiers there are, they're only human. I can handle them.

318052012.content: Ningishzida tugs gently on Buzenbo's clothes. All Buzenbo gives her in return is silence.

318052014.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318052014.content: I've been keeping an eye on the Izuru while I've been here. Izuru Masayoshi and his guards are frequent visitors to the Imperial City.

318052015.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318052015.content: Now there's no sign of the Izuru. I'd guess Izuru Masayoshi is either in danger or part of the plot.

318052016.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318052016.content: So if you run into the Izuru, be wary of them.

318052018.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318052018.content: Head west from here to get out of the city. Find yourself a ride and... be careful.

318052020.content: Ningishzida pulls some medical supplies from her bag and presses them into Buzenbo's hands.

318052021.speaker: 宁希达
318052021.content: Don't be scared. I'll bring backup, promise.

318052022.content: With a final smile, Ningishzida leaves, heading out of the city. Buzenbo is left alone, standing under the oppressive cloud of Bane Energy.

318052023.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318052023.content: Just me, huh... Piece of cake. I got this.

318052024.content: Her fingers brush lightly across the two swords she carries. Kogarasu Maru feels warm to the touch. It was the pride of her kendo hall and has been by her side for years.

318052025.content: From Sakuragiri she gets nothing but a prickly pain, a reminder of the dangers that still lie ahead.

318052026.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318052026.content: Father. Master. Kuninotokotachi. Admin... Here I go.

318061001.content: The gate to the Imperial City is closed. Buzenbo leaps up onto the city wall and surveys the territory beyond.

318061002.content: The cloud of Bane Energy hangs heavy and persistent in the sky, with black and red crystals hanging oddly in the air, shining down on a deserted Reiten.

318061003.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318061003.content: The Bane Energy is even stronger here than I'd expected...

318061004.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318061004.content: No Imperial Army soldiers though. Are they all on the march?

318061005.content: She leaps nimbly from the wall and into the city proper, moving rapidly from cover to cover.

318061007.content: She's about to continue moving when she gets a sense of danger approaching. She spins as she draws Kogarasu Maru and defends herself, her Divine Power easily overcoming the attack.

318061010.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318061010.content: And not just one of them, and not just there... Wait, who's that!?

318061011.content: In amongst the Visbane horde she can make out a human figure approaching.

318061013.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318061013.content: That uniform... A Snake God guard? I thought we killed them all.

318061014.content: She takes a closer look and sees a number of Visbanes in human form approaching. As if they are ghosts who have wandered from the lifeless Miyahebi manor.

318061015.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318061015.content: Puff... I am one with my sword...

318061016.content: With a tight grasp on Kogarasu Maru, Buzenbo checks again the origin of the artillery fire and, just as she has so many times in practice, charges forward with blade whirling.

318061019.content: The artillery is lined up on a patch of empty ground, still firing bolts of energy high into the sky to rain death on some distant target.

318061020.content: The guns are being operated by Imperial Army soldiers, perhaps the only ones left in the palace. They work silently and in unison.

318061021.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318061021.content: Visbanes should instinctively attack humans. But they're leaving those soldiers alone.

318061022.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318061022.content: There's definitely something weird about the soldiers. Better be careful.

318061023.content: She takes a moment to calm herself then moves to the next bit of cover.

318061024.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318061024.content: I still haven't seen them loading the guns and I can't see any energy storage gear nearby. Where's the energy coming from?

318061025.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318061025.content: Oh... There's some kind of data link running up to the guns. I wonder where it's connected to.

318061026.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318061026.content: And that energy... there's something unusual about it. I can sense its power even at this distance. If they are firing at the Karasugo manor, Admin and the others are in real trouble.

318061027.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318061027.content: So, do I go straight in or attack from the side? No, won't work. They'll spot me destroying the first gun and surround me. No good.

318061028.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318061028.content: I need to deal with all the guns at once. But how...

318061029.content: She looks at the energy clustered at the muzzles of the guns and suddenly has an idea. A few moments of consideration and she works out how the guns are being operated.

318061030.content: She pokes her head up for a look around and soon spots her target—a nearby sentry tower.

318061032.content: Avoiding being seen by either the soldiers or the Visbanes, Buzenbo clambers up the tower. She checks her landing spot and route, takes a deep breath, and once more tightens her grip on Kogarasu Maru.

318061033.content: She summons up Divine Power, swings her sword back, throws herself forward—

318061034.content: She flies through the air, as silent as a wind-tossed cherry blossom yet as deadly as a thrown knife, towards her target.

318061035.content: Divine Power streams back from Kogarasu Maru and she uses that force to control her direction and speed.

318061036.content: All the time, her gaze is fixed on that one gun.

318061037.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318061037.content: Okay, soldiers, gotta deal with you first—

318062001.content: The blast is huge, but Buzenbo is already gone, escaping under cover of the flames.

318062003.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318062003.content: No sign of anyone in the entire Imperial City, apart from those soldiers. Where are they all? The Child of Heaven, Izuru Masayoshi, his guard...

318062004.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318062004.content: And what do I do now? Get out of here and wait for the others? Or keep on exploring...

318062005.content: She notices a nearby tower, its doors tightly shut, and has a sudden dark thought.

318062006.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318062006.content: This... this is reminding me of the time I infiltrated the Miyahebi.

318062007.content: First she had to face her inner demons in The Monk's hallucinations, then she was infected by Orochi.

318062008.content: And while everything worked out well in the end, it was thanks to others, not her own strengths.

318062009.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318062009.content: I can't keep relying on others...

318062010.content: Her grip on the hilt of her sword is getting even tighter. The cherry-red Divine Grace flashes and she feels a sudden stab of pain in her palm.

318062011.content: But she doesn't let go. It's not a pain that signals danger. It's some kind of message, a communication.

318062012.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318062012.content: I shouldn't waver? I guess I'm overthinking things.

318062013.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318062013.content:
Mods can't be scared of Visbanes.
And warriors can't be scared of their enemies.

318062014.content: She takes a deep breath and gradually relaxes. She's deep in enemy territory, alone. She has nobody to rely on but herself. And that's enough.

318062016.content: She glances over the nearby buildings, intending to choose one to sneak into. Then she spots a figure suddenly emerging.

318062018.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318062018.content: A Visbanic Miyahebi? No, I don't think so.

318062019.content: The girl is dressed in exquisite and spotless clothing, with her hair arranged in an intricate and adorable style.

318062020.content: She steps lightly through the gloomy corridors of this odd palace. Under that unique hairstyle, she smiles a sweet and tender smile.

318062022.speaker: ？？？
318062022.content: I've been waiting forever. Where's everyone else?

318071001.content: The sudden appearance of a young girl does not cause Buzenbo to let down her guard. She keeps her hand tight on Kogarasu Maru.

318071002.content:
No normal child could possibly be wandering around the palace with so many Visbanes on the prowl.
And, much more importantly, Buzenbo senses a threat.

318071004.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318071004.content: Who are you? And why are you here all alone?

318071005.speaker: 朗香
318071005.content: You can call me Akika. I'm here because I live here. As for you...

318071006.content: The girl skips over towards Buzenbo, stopping just where Kogarasu Maru would not be able to reach her. She looks up at Buzenbo, cheerful and curious.

318071007.speaker: 朗香
318071007.content: I haven't seen you here before. Are you a trespasser?

318071008.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318071008.content: I don't have time for guessing games. Tell me who you are.

318071010.speaker: 朗香
318071010.content: You are from Sasanami, Buzenbo Tengu. So I will forgive you for not bowing when you meet the Child of Heaven.

318071011.speaker: 朗香
318071011.content: But to break my lovely toys and fail to apologize is going a little too far. Naughty children get punished, you know...

318071012.content: The Child of Heaven. "I live here". Artillery. Toys. Visbanes. The Imperial Army... It all becomes clear.

318071013.content: Buzenbo shudders as she realizes who she faces. Her immediate reaction is to step back and prepare for a fight, but as she does so the figure in front of her disappears.

318071014.speaker: 朗香
318071014.content: You're quick. Quicker than you were at the Miyahebi manor, at least...

318071015.content: The girl's gentle voice is now at her side. Akika rests a delicate hand on the hilt of Buzenbo's sword and it may as well be a mountain sitting there. It will not move.

318071016.speaker: 朗香
318071016.content: I should warn you, drawing a weapon on the Child of Heaven is a capital crime.

318071017.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318071017.content: Nobody will accept a Visbane as Child of Heaven. Just what do you want?

318071018.speaker: 朗香
318071018.content: Hmm. That's not a very polite way to ask questions. I told you my name, you should be nice and use it.

318071019.content: The pressure on her sword disappears and Buzenbo moves immediately, twisting as she draws and attacks. But as the blade leaves the scabbard she is blinded by a tornado of crimson Bane Energy.

318071021.content: Suddenly, Buzenbo can think of nothing but her fear of dying.

318071022.content: Kogarasu Maru, now drawn from its scabbard, touches the Bane Energy and breaks in two, falling from Buzenbo's grasp. She freezes and can do nothing but watch as the Bane Energy approaches.

318071024.content: Suddenly, a blast of cherry-red Divine Grace shoots from her side and blocks the Bane Energy. The impact, though, is enough to send Buzenbo flying.

318071025.content: There's a suffocating pressure on her chest and cracks appear in the stone at her back.

318071026.content: She plummets from the high wall and lands with only a dull splash.

318071027.speaker: 朗香
318071027.content: I'm not quite getting the hang of this yet... She managed to stop me.

318071029.speaker: 朗香
318071029.content: Let's just say she isn't having much luck. If she isn't dead she's badly wounded and there are more than enough of my creatures down there to deal with her.

318071030.speaker: 朗香
318071030.content: You go check for me. Don't let me see her again.

318071031.content: A figure wearing a cape emerges from the nearby shadows, someone Buzenbo had not noticed.

318071033.content: Buzenbo coughs as she finally regains consciousness and sits up, surrounded by patches of water. Before she can focus on her surroundings there's a sharp pain in her chest and she brings up a mouthful of congealed blood.

318071035.content: The sound of her coughs echoes eerily back and forth in the cavernous underground space. She reaches for Kogarasu Maru, but then remembers it is still on top of the city wall, broken.

318071036.content: She tries to recall it, but there's no response. She summons up a Divine Grace sword to keep by her side instead. There's no attack coming though. Just the sound of dripping water.

318071037.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318071037.content: Doesn't seem to be chasing me. Now, where am I...

318071038.content: She looks around the huge structure. All the equipment and the Bane Energy pulsing within startle her.

318071039.content: There's an exit not far away, but... on the other side is water. A pool of water, held back by a forcefield.

318071040.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318071040.content: Didn't expect anything like this in the Imperial City. But I guess if the Child of Heaven is a Visbane, then anything is possible.

318071041.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318071041.content: I wonder if she's taken over as Child of Heaven recently, or if Sasanami has been fooled like this since the beginning...

318071042.content: She gives a long deep sigh. She's surprised by what she's found, but is also feeling a little helpless. She doesn't know how much of Akika's power went into that attack, but she doesn't like her chances of beating the girl.

318071043.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318071043.content: If I head outside I might run into her again. I was lucky to get away once. Next time I might not be...

318071045.content: She can sense Bane Energy fluctuations from deeper within the building, as if from a bottomless abyss. But she doesn't let that scare her off. She takes a deep breath and runs further into the depths of the building.

318072001.content: The Visbane attacks are never-ending. No matter where she goes, no matter how she fights, there are always more of them, howling as they charge at her.

318072002.content: Light shining through the lake above ripples across her face and illuminates the fact that she has absolutely no way out.

318072003.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318072003.content: (Cough! Cough!) I can't believe there were so many Visbanes down here and we never knew about it.

318072004.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318072004.content: I can't do this alone. There's no point wasting my energy.

318072005.content: She manages to dodge a blast of Bane Energy with a quick and scrappy roll. As she does so, her elbow brushes against the other sword at her waist and the cherry-red Divine Grace makes its presence known.

318072006.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318072006.content: Is it time to use Sakuragiri?

318072007.content: As she sprints forward, she moves her sword hand towards Sakuragiri's hilt, but pauses before drawing it.

318072008.content: Will Sakuragiri accept me this time?

318072009.content: The sword can't answer. The question is purely for herself.

318072010.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318072010.content: No... It's too risky. If I faint here I'm as good as dead.

318072011.content: The Visbanes to her rear take advantage of her momentary distraction and leap forward again. She dodges them in a panic.

318072012.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318072012.content: I need to keep running until I find a way out. Then, I get out of the Imperial City and find Admin.

318072014.content: Her energy wanes, her wounds accumulate. All she can hear is the roars of the Visbanes and her own increasingly labored breathing.

318072015.content: Suddenly, she steps on something that causes her foot to slide out from beneath her. She hits the floor hard.

318072016.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318072016.content: No, no. I can get up.

318072018.content: One slash of her sword misses and slams into the nearby equipment.

318072019.content: Buzenbo stares in shock as she notices the Visbanes move aside to make room for a caped figure.

318072020.content: A figure that looks somewhat familiar.

318081002.speaker: 国常立
318081002.content: Does the Imperial Army only recruit mutes? Not one of them seem able to talk.

318081003.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318081003.content: Someone doesn't want them to talk. The question is, who?

318081005.content: Sekhmet suddenly splits off from the squad, ignoring Kuninotokotachi's questions. Her chainsaw's flames send a bunch of Imperial Army soldiers to the floor. She grabs one and hauls them back.

318081006.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318081006.content: Who sent you? Who's your commanding officer? Izuru Masayoshi? The Child of Heaven?

318081008.content: Despite Sekhmet's intense glare, neither of the names get any reaction from the soldier. There's nothing in those eyes but emptiness and anger. All other emotions have been removed.

318081009.content: Sekhmet pushes her huge Access Key up against the soldier's chest and cuts easily through the armor there.

318081010.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318081010.content: You've got three seconds to answer, or you die. Right here, right now.

318081012.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318081012.content: Hmm... They can walk and talk normally, but there's no intelligence or survival instinct. They aren't in control of their own actions.

318081013.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318081013.content: They aren't following orders. They're being controlled.

318081014.speaker: 我
318081014.content: And that means it has to be the Child of Heaven. Senba said the Child of Heaven is using some mountain god power to... Hey!

318081015.content: The Imperial Army soldiers Sekhmet thought she had defeated are standing up, seemingly oblivious to any pain.

318081016.content: She flings the soldier she was interrogating back at their pursuing companions then grabs me just in time. Everyone else gathers round.

318081018.content: At the same moment, Senba lifts Yata no Shinkyou and directs a ray of light at the soldiers. It has a strange effect on them, not just knocking them over but causing an odd pause in their movements.

318081021.content: Tsukuyomi is too busy fighting to think about it. She simply takes the chance to dispose of the Imperial Army soldiers now unable to resist.

318081022.content: I look at Senba's Yata no Shinkyou. Senba looks at me. We both know we're thinking the same thing.

318081023.speaker: 国常立
318081023.content: Look at the people over there. Something not right there too.

318081024.content: The streets of Kamigyou aren't bustling, but they're not empty either.

318081025.content: The locals should be working, shopping, smiling, yawning. But they're all simply standing quietly by the roadside, no more active than dead trees.

318081026.content: The Imperial Army is passing by, giving off clouds of black and red dust. The silent soldiers march past silent watchers, the only noise that of footsteps falling in perfect unison.

318081027.speaker: 国常立
318081027.content: How? All of them, they're all...

318081028.speaker: 国常立
318081028.content: How can so many people in Kamigyou have Bane Energy signals?

318081029.content: Kuninotokotachi averts her eyes, unable to bear the sight. Sekhmet, meanwhile, is staring wide-eyed, as if she's determined to burn the image of humans harmed into her brain.

318081031.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318081031.content: For all those years she sat there, seemingly happy with her station. And now she's moved against her own people.

318081032.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318081032.content: She knew she could never persuade them to take her side in this.

318081033.speaker: 我
318081033.content: We can't just leave them to be taken over!

318081034.speaker: 我
318081034.content: Okay, I need to calm down. I can't help if I'm not calm.

318081035.speaker: 我
318081035.content: If half of the humans in the Sephirah Zone had been taken over by Visbanes the deviation rate would be going crazy.

318081036.speaker: 我
318081036.content: They don't seem the same as the Visbanic humans from the Miyahebi case, right?

318081037.speaker: 月读
318081037.content: Yeah. There's no visible sign of corruption. They seem to be under the same influence as the Imperial Army.

318081038.speaker: 我
318081038.content: Which means we've got no way to help them recover.

318081039.speaker: 我
318081039.content: Does that mean we need to take care of the Child of Heaven if we want to...

318081041.content: The sudden good news gives us a little encouragement.

318081042.speaker: 我
318081042.content: Another Mod? Buzenbo and Ningishzida, maybe?

318081044.speaker: 弥弥尔
318081044.content: Durr durr durr. It's an Aether Gazer Mod. Ningishzida.

318081046.speaker: 弥弥尔
318081046.content: Unfortunately, I have not detected Buzenbo's Divine Power signal.

318081047.speaker: 我
318081047.content: Didn't they meet up? Never mind, we can ask Nishida.

318081048.speaker: 我
318081048.content: Mimir, point us in the right direction and we'll rendezvous.

318082001.content: We deal with the pursuers, then take a break from our mission to help Ningishzida and her charges set up a temporary shelter. This also gives Ningishzida a chance to meet our non-Aether Gazer buddies.

318082002.content: Ningishzida and the locals, meanwhile, bring us up to date with events in Kamigyou. The soldiers on the street. The oddly quiet locals.

318082003.speaker: 宁希达
318082003.content: Phew. That was terrifying. I've never been chased by so many people before.

318082005.speaker: 宁希达
318082005.content: Huh? It hasn't been that long, Admin. You're always turning up in a Medical Center bed. In fact, I see you more often than almost anyone else.

318082006.speaker: 我
318082006.content: Hmm. Not sure I like being such a familiar face for a doctor.

318082007.speaker: 我
318082007.content: Tsukuyomi, Sekhmet, how are our charges?

318082008.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318082008.content: Not bad at all. The building's big enough and solid enough. They'll be safe from anything bar a direct artillery hit.

318082009.speaker: 月读
318082009.content: Kuninotokotachi and Izanami are checking out the basement. We can get moving when they come back.

318082010.speaker: 月读
318082010.content: That gives me time to debrief Ningishzida.

318082011.content: We meet up outside the building, to avoid terrifying the already unsettled locals.

318082012.speaker: 宁希达
318082012.content: Wait, artillery fire? You mean from the Imperial City?

318082013.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318082013.content: Exactly. That's where it's coming from.

318082014.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318082014.content: The Karasugo manor has been flattened and we only just got out alive. Any idea who's doing the firing?

318082016.content: Ningishzida shakes her head, embarrassed. Then she suddenly claps her hand to her forehead and turns to look at Tsukuyomi.

318082017.speaker: 宁希达
318082017.content: I almost forgot! Buzenbo! She saw the artillery fire and that big sky-whirlpool thing and ran off into the Imperial City.

318082020.content: Ningishzida quickly recounts what happened before she and Buzenbo split up.

318082021.speaker: 宁希达
318082021.content: I was going to go with her, but she insisted I come to find you guys. And that seemed to make sense, so here I am.

318082022.speaker: 宁希达
318082022.content: But on my way I ran into some humans and I had to help them. If I didn't, the Imperial Army would mark them and turn them into those blockhead-types. It took ages to convince them to come with me.

318082023.speaker: 宁希达
318082023.content: But once I had a couple with me, others started coming out of hiding and asking to join us. And they just got more and more and more and more and more.

318082024.speaker: 宁希达
318082024.content: It's a shame pachinko balls don't fall into my lap like that...

318082025.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318082025.content: What did you mean when you said the Imperial Army would "mark" the humans?

318082026.speaker: 宁希达
318082026.content: It's... some kind of weirdy Bane Energy mark implanted in them. They've all got it, the soldiers and the blockheaded humans.

318082027.speaker: 宁希达
318082027.content: I was able to watch it happen. That dust stuff that comes off the soldiers spreads the mark.

318082028.speaker: 宁希达
318082028.content: Any humans near the soldiers have to hold their breath to avoid breathing it in. Otherwise, they get blockheaded.

318082029.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318082029.content: That dust... Will it grow inside them or something?

318082030.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318082030.content: I'm not sure you're right, though. We ran into the Imperial Army at the Karasugo manor and the humans with us weren't affected.

318082031.speaker: 宁希达
318082031.content: But you had lots of Mods, right. Keeping the humans safe in a protective cordon?

318082032.speaker: 宁希达
318082032.content: Divine Power seems to repel the dust. That's why I think it's made of Bane Energy. What I don't know is how the soldiers are able to emit it like that.

318082033.speaker: 我
318082033.content: This is valuable info. I'll need to update the Shimogyou team.

318082034.speaker: 我
318082034.content: Ningishzida, as a doctor, can you tell us if the.. marked, I guess... marked humans could be cured?

318082035.speaker: 宁希达
318082035.content: Dunno. I know I can't do it. I tried using my Access Key to remove the mark but it was a complete failure.

318082036.speaker: 宁希达
318082036.content: Oh, I should just give up. I'm no good at fighting people and I'm no better at saving them.

318082037.speaker: 我
318082037.content: Don't be like that, Nishida. Look how many people you helped. You're doing great!

318082038.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318082038.content:
So, these marks...
Mods don't seem to be affected. Sounds like they're being used to control humans.

318082039.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318082039.content: I don't remember the Karasugo girl mentioning any ability like that.

318082040.speaker: 月读
318082040.content: We can be sure the Snake God, the Deer God, the Monkey God, and the Crow God are all out of the game.

318082041.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318082041.content: That just leaves the Crane God and the Child of Heaven.

318082042.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318082042.content: The Crane God is long dead. If the Child of Heaven was targeting the five families from the start, maybe that's who killed the Crane God, rather than the other mountain gods.

318082043.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318082043.content: And that would explain why there hasn't been any sign of Izuru Masayoshi and why his family is the only one to have escaped disaster.

318082044.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318082044.content: Izuru Masayoshi could be having his strings pulled by a Cognizant Visbane.

318082045.speaker: 宁希达
318082045.content: The Child of Heaven? Crane God?

318082046.speaker: 宁希达
318082046.content: What are they talking about, Admin?

318082047.content: It's only when Nishida looks at me in utter confusion that I realize the whole Child of Heaven situation, everything Izanami told us about, is incredibly complicated.

318082048.speaker: 我
318082048.content: You know the Sasanami legend about the mountain gods, don't you? Well, let me tell you another story.

318082049.speaker: 伊邪那美
318082049.content: I know what the source of her power is.

318082050.speaker: 伊邪那美
318082050.content: The so-called five mountain gods, sent by the God of Heaven to watch over the world, were actually five Visbanes.

318082051.speaker: 伊邪那美
318082051.content: The Child of Heaven, the "Human God" too was a Visbane.

318082052.speaker: 伊邪那美
318082052.content: Whether it's the story of the gods becoming angry at the humans and destroying the Crane God for taking the human's side...

318082053.speaker: 伊邪那美
318082053.content: Or the tale of the Child of Heaven leading the humans to complete the ritual to appease the remaining gods...

318082054.speaker: 伊邪那美
318082054.content: None of it has been for the benefit of the humans.

318082055.speaker: 伊邪那美
318082055.content: It has all been about the Child of Heaven trying to obtain the Cinders of the other Visbanes by misleading the humans.

318082056.speaker: 我
318082056.content: Cinders? You mean what Gengchen and Odin were looking for? The things that power the Heterocore?

318082057.speaker: 伊邪那美
318082057.content: Are there Cinders in other Sephirah Zones?

318082058.speaker: 我
318082058.content: I don't know for sure. But I think the Cinders are some kind of unique material.

318082059.speaker: 伊邪那美
318082059.content: I don't know if we're talking about the same thing. All I know is that the Child of Heaven is desperately searching for something of that name. If she kills a god and takes their Cinders, she gains their powers.

318082060.speaker: 伊邪那美
318082060.content: The Crane God wasn't killed for taking the side of humanity. It was just that the Child of Heaven chose to move against it first.

318082061.speaker: 伊邪那美
318082061.content: The Child of Heaven was victorious in the legend, but emerged badly wounded nevertheless. She was able to contain the other four gods, but not kill them.

318082062.speaker: 伊邪那美
318082062.content: And for over a century since, the corruption has been passed on to the girls chosen to take on the role of Child of Heaven, as it waits and gathers its strength. And the current Child of Heaven is my sister, Karasugo Haruka.

318082063.speaker: 伊邪那美
318082063.content: The Child of Heaven has only recently recovered its strength, but she has driven the Sanzaru away and likely has the Monkey God's Cinders. Then it caused the Miyahebi incident. Kagutsuchi and I tried to intervene but we couldn't stop her getting the Snake God's Cinders.

318082064.speaker: 伊邪那美
318082064.content: Thankfully, the Deer God and Crow God Cinders were consumed by the Madoibi.

318082065.speaker: 我
318082065.content: So, what we're facing could be a super-Visbane with the powers of the Child of Heaven and three mountain gods?

318082066.speaker: 我
318082066.content: The fact she hasn't shown her face indicates she's still worried. But if she's waiting for something, something we're unaware of... Honestly, things are looking bleak.

318082067.speaker: 宁希达
318082067.content: The Child of Heaven is a Cognizant Visbane!?

318082068.speaker: 宁希达
318082068.content: But I've eaten all those Child of Heaven-themed snacks! And bought souvenirs!

318082069.content: I watch as Ningishzida, clearly mind-blown, counts something off on her fingers. I'm just about to try to comfort her when she suddenly snaps her head up to look at me and grabs my finger.

318082070.speaker: 宁希达
318082070.content: Oh no! The Child of Heaven lives in the palace. And Buzenbo went to the palace. What if they meet!?

318082071.speaker: 宁希达
318082071.content: Buzenbo can't beat the Child of Heaven and three gods. Admin, we need to go save her. Now!

318082072.speaker: 我
318082072.content: Not save her. Meet her. You can trust Buzenbo to look after herself and rendezvous with us safe and well.

318082073.speaker: 我
318082073.content: Tsukuyomi, get Kuninotokotachi and Izanami. Time to go.

318082074.speaker: 国常立
318082074.content: That's our Admin over there. Very commandery, aren't they?

318082075.content: I hear Kuninotokotachi's voice come from the entrance to the building and turn to see three figures approaching.

318082078.speaker: 国常立
318082078.content: Turns out we weren't the first to get here.

318082079.speaker: 国常立
318082079.content: This is a Mod who lives in the Imperial City. When the Imperial Army hit the streets she grabbed her neighbors and took refuge in the basement here.

318082080.speaker: 国常立
318082080.content: She thought we were soldiers come looking for them and things almost got a bit violent.

318082081.speaker: 笹波修正者A
318082081.content: Look, if you're going to go around kicking locked doors open...

318082082.speaker: 笹波修正者A
318082082.content: Anyway, turns out you Aether Gazer guys are the best. Three moves and I was down.

318082083.speaker: 笹波修正者A
318082083.content: And it turns out Miss Karasugo is a Mod too. That'll be headline news...

318082084.speaker: 伊邪那美
318082084.content: Oh, I don't think anyone will be printing that headline. Unless they want a certain CORG investigator to come visit...

318082086.speaker: 我
318082086.content: So, new friend, what line of work are you in?

318082087.speaker: 笹波修正者A
318082087.content:
I'm a journalist.
And a Mod.

318082088.content: The Mod, who is dressed as an ordinary local, seems to sense our confusion. She taps her hand on her chest as if trying to reassure us.

318082089.speaker: 笹波修正者A
318082089.content: I might not be as good a fighter as you guys and I sure don't know what the blazes is going on today. But you can leave these people in my hands.

318082090.speaker: 笹波修正者A
318082090.content: I'll protect everyone in the building.

318091001.speaker: 我
318091001.content: Is this kind of thing normal?

318091002.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318091002.content: I know you mean the local Mod, but perhaps you could be a little more specific?

318091003.content: The six of us continue our journey into Kamigyou. We find ourselves traveling as three pairs—Sekhmet and I take point and we can hear Kuninotokotachi teasing Ningishzida just behind us.

318091004.content: Izanami and Tsukuyomi take up the rear. They seem to be quietly discussing something.

318091005.speaker: 我
318091005.content: You know I woke up in Division Nine after losing my memories, right? All the Mods I've met have been combat-trained.

318091006.speaker: 我
318091006.content: Now and then I meet Mods who aren't with Aether Gazer. Agents with CORG, like you, or maybe some other group similar to Aether Gazer.

318091007.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318091007.content: As a human, I can see the similarities between us and you Mods. But I've never quite understood what the differences are.

318091008.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318091008.content: "Can Mods live like humans do?" Well, now you've found a case study.

318091009.speaker: 我
318091009.content: Would you have been able to tell she was a Mod, if she didn't reveal herself?

318091012.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318091012.content: Why do you think she saved those humans? A sense of righteousness? Compassion? A Mod's instincts?

318091013.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318091013.content: And what would the reason be if a human did the same thing?

318091014.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318091014.content: What she's doing, what we're doing... at the end of the day, it's all things that humans would want to do, if they could. Fighting, living, all of it.

318091015.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318091015.content: A soldier defends their nation. A cop fights crime. People with weapons protect those without weapons. It's all just part of "life".

318091016.speaker: 我
318091016.content: I feel a lot better now you've said that.

318091017.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318091017.content: Odin trusts you. That's good enough for me.

318091018.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318091018.content: There aren't many Mods who lay down their Access Key, just like there aren't many humans who pick up a gun. You can't say they're normal, as such. But...

318091019.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318091019.content: I can't see they're doing anything wrong.

318091020.content: Sekhmet shrugs her shoulders at me and, considering the topic closed, stops talking. She looks back and slows her pace.

318091021.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318091021.content: Those two are getting too far behind. Should we wait for them to catch up?

318091022.speaker: 我
318091022.content: Yeah. I can check in with Shimogyou, see how they're doing.

318091024.content: Tsukuyomi is slowing the pace so she and Izanami fall behind. Izanami glances at her and follows suit and, once she's sure they can't be heard, whispers the question.

318091025.speaker: 月读
318091025.content: It's a little rude of me. I want to ask you some personal questions.

318091026.speaker: 伊邪那美
318091026.content:
Oh, I'm tired of keeping so many stupid secrets anyway.
And I can tell I can trust you, just like I can trust Admin.

318091027.speaker: 月读
318091027.content: Thanks... It seems you have two Access Keys. A sword and a mirror.

318091028.speaker: 伊邪那美
318091028.content: Yata no Shinkyou? That's not my Access Key.

318091029.speaker: 月读
318091029.content: You call it Yata no Shinkyou?

318091031.content: Izanami takes out her mirror. There's no sense of Divine Power and it looks like an ordinary mirror as it reflects Tsukuyomi's image.

318091032.speaker: 伊邪那美
318091032.content: My mother gave it to me when she adopted me, but it's an old family heirloom. I could sense when I first touched it that it was important somehow. I just don't know why.

318091033.speaker: 伊邪那美
318091033.content: After awakening, I realized it is an Access Key. But it's not mine. I'm just borrowing it.

318091036.content: Tsukuyomi takes the mirror from Izanami and lets her fingers linger on the carvings around its edge. Then, after a long pause, she tries to reach out to it with her Divine Power.

318091037.content: Her tiny sparkle of Divine Power lands in the mirror as if falling into an abyss. Just as she's about to give up all hope of a response, one comes. One she recognizes.

318091039.content: She caresses the glass of the mirror before taking a deep breath. Then, only when she is calm again, does she hand it back to Izanami.

318091040.speaker: 伊邪那美
318091040.content: I see you know its owner. I thought you might want to hold on to it.

318091041.speaker: 月读
318091041.content: That's not what I wanted at all. It belongs to you now.

318091042.speaker: 月读
318091042.content: She will have had her reasons for leaving you her Access Key. Just use it well.

318091044.content: I watch as Senba and Tsukuyomi catch up, but don't ask what they've been discussing. I open up the map so we can decide what route to take.

318091045.speaker: 我
318091045.content: I called Karasugo Sendou. Everything seems to be going smoothly in Shimogyou and they haven't hit any obstacles.

318091046.speaker: 我
318091046.content: We'll need to split up soon. Ningishzida, where would you like to go?

318091047.speaker: 宁希达
318091047.content: To help Buzenbo, obviously. But... Uh...

318091048.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318091048.content: You know it's going to be dangerous and you're worried you'll hold us back?

318091049.content: Ningishzida lowers her head, embarrassed, then nods.

318091050.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318091050.content: If you hadn't come to tell us she's in the Imperial City we wouldn't even know where to start looking for her. You've been a huge help already.

318091051.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318091051.content: Plus, and I mean no offense, somebody needs to get into the Imperial City and see what is going on there. It's the center of power for all Sasanami.

318091052.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318091052.content: I suspect that the Child of Heaven has been so focused on the five families that an unknown quantity like Buzenbo might just turn things around for us.

318091053.speaker: 我
318091053.content: Tsukuyomi, Kuninotokotachi, find Buzenbo and get out of there. Don't get into a fight with the Child of Heaven unless you have no other choice.

318091054.speaker: 我
318091054.content: Comms with Reiten have been cut off, so don't hang around there any longer than you need to. Get in, get Buzenbo, get out, get in touch. Sekhmet's right, if Buzenbo was able to get into the Imperial City I'm sure she'll have found valuable intel.

318091055.speaker: 宁希达
318091055.content: What about me? It's all so complicated I can't make my mind up. You tell me what to do, Admin.

318091056.speaker: 我
318091056.content: We might need your skills at the Photon Rail Nexus. Stick with Sekhmet and me.

318091057.speaker: 宁希达
318091057.content: Okey-dokey. Tsukuyomi and Kuninotokotachi, I want you to be careful. The Imperial City is super-scary place right now.

318091058.speaker: 月读
318091058.content: We will. And we'll bring Buzenbo back safe and sound.

318091059.speaker: 国常立
318091059.content: Hey, what's the deal with the comms being down anyway? Is it anything to do with that Bane Energy vortex thing?

318091060.speaker: 国常立
318091060.content: If we had comms we wouldn't need to be playing the search and rescue game.

318091062.speaker: 国常立
318091062.content: Hmm... Well, I guess we go where things are weird and see what we can find. And it just so happens I'm an expert at that.

318091063.speaker: 国常立
318091063.content: Time for me to use one of my little tricks. Couldn't use it earlier, too many people. Hold tight, Captain.

318091064.content: Kuninotokotachi grabs hold of Tsukuyomi with one hand and makes an odd gesture with the other. The two suddenly fade into the roadside shadows.

318091065.content: I nod at the three who remain and we set off north, towards the Photon Rail Nexus.

318091066.content: A breeze blows silently through the city, past silent locals standing by the side of the road, past silent soldiers patrolling the streets.

318091067.content: Tsukuyomi and Kuninotokotachi are sneaking through the city when a familiar voice comes from the public address system.

318091068.speaker: 广播声
318091068.content: The Karasugo are traitors working against the Child of Heaven and attacking Shimogyou. On orders of the Child of Heaven, a curfew is in place. Please be aware of enemy infiltrators and do not go out at night. The Imperial Army will guard the people of Shimogyou and ensure you are safe.

318091070.speaker: 国常立
318091070.content: Are there even enough people in the Imperial Army to watch all of Shimogyou?

318091071.speaker: 月读
318091071.content: I guess it's just an excuse to have the army move in to Shimogyou. It'll mean trouble for the Karasugos and Kagutsuchi.

318091072.speaker: 月读
318091072.content: Let's worry about our own mission first. It's time to get into the palace.

318091073.speaker: 国常立
318091073.content: Sure thing. Sooner we find Buzenbo, the sooner we can go help the others.

318092001.content: The cute little girl skips over. She looks very out of place under the Bane Energy sky.

318092002.content: Looking up at Tsukuyomi and Kuninotokotachi, both wielding their weapons, the girl just smiles even more.

318092003.speaker: 朗香
318092003.content: I waited and waited and finally you came.

318092005.speaker: 国常立
318092005.content: Shouldn't you be safe inside your palace, little girlie? What are you doing out here?

318092006.speaker: 朗香
318092006.content: You've come to visit me, miss. So obviously I want to play with you.

318092007.content: The Child of Heaven jumps about, her gaze shifting between the two Mods.

318092008.content: Tsukuyomi and Kuninotokotachi don't move. They can sense the power coming from the little girl and they both know that even together they might not be able to beat her.

318092009.speaker: 朗香
318092009.content: That's a lovely toy you've got, miss. An eye from the Three Wise Monkeys... Do you like it?

318092010.speaker: 国常立
318092010.content: Why's everyone always asking that? It isn't for sale.

318092011.speaker: 朗香
318092011.content: Even so, it belongs to the Sanzaru. And as Child of Heaven, I wouldn't like it if an outsider stole something from my officials, would I?

318092012.speaker: 国常立
318092012.content: Have you been in touch with them? I thought they hadn't been heard of since going north.

318092013.speaker: 朗香
318092013.content: Oh, the Sanzaru sneaks sneaked off. I can't see them, can't hear them. Don't like it.

318092014.content: The young girl waved her arm, her eyes sparkling as she smiles.

318092015.speaker: 朗香
318092015.content: I hear you know the Sanzaru girl. Do you want to try the same thing she did?

318092016.speaker: 国常立
318092016.content: What did you do to her!?

318092018.content: But Kuninotokotachi's blade doesn't land and even her step seems to miss the ground.

318092019.content: The two are enveloped in darkness and silence.

318101003.speaker: 月读
318101003.content: I haven't seen you since the operation. Did you change your hair?

318101005.speaker: 月读
318101005.content: Do you like it like that?

318101006.speaker: 国常立
318101006.content: Uh... Haha. Why, do you? I think it looks weird, having to use my hair to cover half my face.

318101007.speaker: 月读
318101007.content: I used to know someone who liked things that didn't seem to make sense to me.

318101008.speaker: 月读
318101008.content: But when I think back, those things... and your hairstyle too... all seem beautiful.

318101009.speaker: 国常立
318101009.content: Okay, let's say I changed my hair because this looks better. Nothing to do with any Visbanes!

318101010.speaker: 国常立
318101010.content: Odin says you want to transfer me to your squad. Is that true?

318101011.speaker: 月读
318101011.content: If you don't have any objections, sure.

318101012.speaker: 国常立
318101012.content: Of course I don't. You're the most competent person I know, Tsukuyomi.

318101013.speaker: 国常立
318101013.content: Wait, no. Now I should say...

318101016.content: Tsukuyomi grasps the hilt of her sword. All she can hear is her own heartbeat and her own breathing.

318101017.content: She can't see anything, so she doesn't know where the enemy is.

318101018.content: She can't hear anything, so she can't tell if an attack is coming.

318101020.content: It reminds her of returning to that room. There was never anyone there. No light. No laughter. Only a room full of empty.

318101021.content: Until eventually, she stopped going there.

318101023.content: She can still sense something. The tip of a blade slashing past. Bane Energy approaching. Figures moving.

318101025.content: She can't stop. Even if she's the only one here, she can't stop.

318101027.content: The light returns all at once. A squad member stands to her side, blocking an attack from an Imperial Army soldier.

318101030.speaker: 国常立
318101030.content: I couldn't see anything for a while. But then I tried using my left eye and it somehow broke the Child of Heaven's hold. But I didn't have time to help you...

318101031.speaker: 国常立
318101031.content: The first thing I saw was all these soldiers.

318101032.content: Hordes of Imperial Army soldiers have turned up from somewhere to surround the two Mods.

318101033.content: And beyond the soldiers stands the Child of Heaven, staring at them with... disdain? Anger?

318101035.speaker: 月读
318101035.content: Let's fight. Watch out for any sneak attacks from cutie-pie there.

318102001.content: They're surrounded by an endless stream of foes.

318102002.speaker: 月读
318102002.content: This is no use to me.

318102003.content: Even the most agile of Visbanes can't dodge Shinri. Tsukuyomi focuses on her swordplay and sends wave after wave of Visbanes to their death, all while keeping one eye on her real enemy.

318102004.content: And so, she notices when the Child of Heaven suddenly disappears.

318102005.content: The sound of the wind, of the blade, of footsteps... it all disappears. Kuninotokotachi stops and automatically tests her left eye.

318102006.content: But she hasn't lost her sight. There's a change, the Child of Heaven suddenly appearing, along with a blast of Bane Energy from an unusual angle.

318102008.content: Tsukuyomi throws herself backwards and with a flash of Shinri's light blade, the Visbane blockade melts away like snow in the sun.

318102009.content: And then, in a move that looks impossible, she twists her sword hand to her side, blocking most of the Bane Energy attacking Kuninotokotachi. The remainder dissipates on the blade. Kuninotokotachi steps back, the taste of blood in her throat.

318102011.content: Bane Energy continues to stream at them at incomprehensible speeds and from every angle. Tsukuyomi takes a fighting stance and fires back with Divine Grace, blocking each potentially fatal attack.

318102013.content: With a flap of the sleeves, the little girl floats over the scene of devastation and lands in front of them.

318102014.speaker: 朗香
318102014.content: You sure are quick at taking out the trash.

318102017.content: Kuninotokotachi fights to steady her breath and manages to force a smile.

318102018.speaker: 国常立
318102018.content: Sorry, Captain. Holding you back again.

318102019.speaker: 朗香
318102019.content: I see you pathetic cowards do have a little self-awareness.

318102020.speaker: 朗香
318102020.content: Mods... Humans... all such fun to play with.

318102021.speaker: 月读
318102021.content: I don't need Visbanes critiquing my team!

318102022.content: A blast of Divine Power whips up a wind blade and the Child of Heaven waves it off with a hand. She ignores the small piece of fabric it cuts from her sleeve and, with that same smile, turns her gaze to Tsukuyomi.

318102023.speaker: 朗香
318102023.content: Sometimes, a tree must sacrifice leaves or branches which have been nibbled by bugs. They are cut adrift to fall to the ground, unwanted. I will not mourn those minions you disposed of.

318102024.speaker: 朗香
318102024.content: But you are clearly the strongest of the two of you. Why do you waste so much energy protecting the weak?

318102025.speaker: 月读
318102025.content: I wouldn't expect a Visbane to understand Mod or human emotions.

318102026.speaker: 朗香
318102026.content: Visbanes this, Visbanes that. Why are you so obsessed with us? If my human worshippers hear you they'll stone you, you know.

318102027.speaker: 朗香
318102027.content: After all, I'm the one who brought enlightenment to Sasanami.

318102028.speaker: 月读
318102028.content: When they know the truth they'll curse you for what you are. A monster!

318102029.speaker: 朗香
318102029.content: Why do you think the legend of the mountain gods has persisted for so long?

318102030.speaker: 朗香
318102030.content: It's because people need something to believe in to keep on living. And I couldn't be an ordinary human, could I? Otherwise, why worship me?

318102031.speaker: 朗香
318102031.content: I think perhaps I understand human weaknesses better than you—

318102032.content: Gazing directly into Tsukuyomi's ever-calm eyes, the Child of Heaven takes a half-step forward.

318102033.speaker: 朗香
318102033.content: You've been here in my palace a while now. Aren't you curious about what happened to your other team member?

318102034.speaker: 朗香
318102034.content: I'm afraid you got here too late. She's... gone.

318102035.content: With a flourish, Akika tosses a broken blade at Tsukuyomi's feet. Tsukuyomi looks at it, her eyes widening. She recognizes the remnants of Divine Power on the blade and finally shows a reaction.

318102037.content: She momentarily lets her guard down and the Bane Energy forms a scene in front of her.

318102038.content: Buzenbo is running through a horde of Visbanes, panting, bleeding, fighting.

318102041.content: But the help she's begging for never comes, and the young girl takes her last exhausted breath before collapsing in a pool of her own blood.

318102043.content: She's lost Buzenbo. This always happens. Loss after loss after loss.

318102046.content: In a confrontation, a moment of hesitation can be fatal.

318102047.speaker: 朗香
318102047.content: You said I can't understand emotion. I understand it is weak.

318102048.content: A huge ball of Bane Energy forms between the Child of Heaven's hands. The girl is grinning, delighted with her own success.

318102049.content: She's about to fire at the Mod before her, to turn her into one of the silent servants of her realm.

318102052.content: The Bane Energy evaporates into a fog which disperses into the air, searching out any threats which may be lurking in a hidden corner.

318102053.content: The Child of Heaven has, at long last, lost that brilliant smile.

318102054.content: Cherry blossom drifts to the ground.

318111002.content: Buzenbo checks and checks again. Her Mod's eyesight has already told her what she's seeing and she knew it was a possibility even before getting here, but she still can't accept it.

318111003.content: Someone she respected, someone she'd protected, someone the people of Sasanami admire—

318111006.speaker: ？？？
318111006.content: There's no need to explain. You will understand soon enough.

318111007.speaker: ？？？
318111007.content: But before that, I want to give you a chance.

318111008.content: With that, the figure turns and walks off. As he does so, the nearby Visbanes start to approach. Buzenbo pauses a moment, grimaces, then follows.

318111009.content: The figure ahead has a relaxed and easy gait, not what Buzenbo expects from a man of his status. He wanders easily down hallways and through rooms, as if entirely at home.

318111010.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318111010.content: He sure knows his way around.

318111011.content: Finally, the two find themselves in a far-off room.

318111012.content: It's neat and clean, decorated in the traditional Sasanami style. Buzenbo could almost forget she's trapped in an underground maze infested by hordes of Visbanes.

318111013.speaker: ？？？
318111013.content: You came alone? How many more operatives does Aether Gazer have in Sasanami?

318111015.speaker: ？？？
318111015.content: Oh, trust me. I'm the Prime Lord. What's good for me is good for Sasanami.

318111016.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318111016.content: Oh, so you remember who you are... Izuru Masayoshi.

318111017.content: The figure turns, his disguise now removed. His expression is, as ever, dignified and kindly.

318111018.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318111018.content: Ever since becoming the Prime Lord, I have known responsibility for the safety and happiness of all in Sasanami rests on my shoulders. I will never forget that and never fail in my duties.

318111019.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318111019.content: Buzenbo, you simply don't know the full story.

318111020.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318111020.content: Never mind. Tell me or don't, I already know enough.

318111021.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318111021.content: Aether Gazer dispatched Pheasant Squad. CORG sent a captain and three squads. In Shimogyou you teamed up with a local Mod, Kuramitsuha.

318111022.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318111022.content: When the Akishika incident ended you were sent back here, along with the Mod named Ningishzida, to stay in Reiten.

318111024.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318111024.content: You, the other Mods, your human friends. You're all either Sasanami locals or Sasanami guests. As Prime Lord, it's my job to take an interest.

318111025.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318111025.content: I have no choice but to work with the Visbanes right now, but I have no wish to submit to the Child of Heaven. Think of the risk I took to save you. Why do you still doubt me?

318111027.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318111027.content: First, I want you to tell me who the Child of Heaven is.

318111028.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318111028.content: A Visbane who claims to be a Human God.

318111029.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318111029.content: That Visbane has taken possession of all the children who have served as Child of Heaven. It's a Karasugo girl at the moment. Such a shame...

318111030.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318111030.content: It was my duty to protect her. I failed.

318111031.content: He seems to be sincere and genuinely mourning the loss of that five-year-old child. Buzenbo almost starts to doubt her own judgement.

318111032.content: But there's something odd about him, something that's easier to sense now they are away from the Visbanes.

318111033.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318111033.content: (No... It's not as simple as he claims...)

318111034.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318111034.content: With the Karasugo dealt with, the Child of Heaven will turn her attention to you and your colleagues. Your best chance is to join forces with me.

318111035.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318111035.content: So, what do you say? If you have any questions, now is the time to ask them.

318111037.content: Buzenbo doesn't respond immediately. First, she silently gathers Divine Grace.

318111038.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318111038.content: I can't trust any human with a Bane Energy trace.

318111040.content: His expression suddenly transforms. Buzenbo is about to draw her blade but holds back.

318111041.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318111041.content: Forget it. Work with me, work against me. The outcome won't change.

318111042.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318111042.content: Buzenbo, I truly hope you live long enough for us to meet again. Then you, all of you, will understand what I have done.

318111043.content: The door opens and closes as Izuru Masayoshi disappears from sight.

318111044.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318111044.content: He didn't seem to want to hurt me.

318111045.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318111045.content: Izuru Masayoshi and the Child of Heaven...

318111046.content: She thinks it over for a moment, but she doesn't have enough info to reach a conclusion. She decides to make use of her moment of respite and pulls out the medical supplies Ningishzida gave her, then sits down.

318111047.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318111047.content: If Izuru Masayoshi was telling the truth, my master and Admin are in danger... I can't just sit here.

318112001.content: The secret room is huge, but despite its size the ceiling seems to be pressing down.

318112002.content: The familiar decor brings back some unhappy memories for Buzenbo and she moves her hand to the hilt of her blade. She looks around, nervous, as she moves into the room.

318112005.content: It's no random change of mood. There's a black fog wrapping itself around her and purple lines are appearing on her skin. She starts to shake uncontrollably.

318112007.content: It's the same pain, the same breathlessness. As if from nowhere, Bane Energy starts to flow back and forth within her body.

318112008.content: But this time, there's nobody here to help.

318112009.content: Although... are there footsteps behind her? She struggles to turn and look. What she sees is exactly what she expected, but she still widens her eyes in shock.

318112011.content: It's Orochi the Snake God. The Snake God Tsukuyomi killed, whole again.

318112012.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318112012.content: But it's not the Orochi she remembers. It reminds her more of the Visbanic humans. There is no intelligence in there.

318112014.content: The Snake God attacks. Buzenbo tries to raise her sword in defense, but a surge of Bane Energy within her stops her movements. She loses control of her limbs and all she can do is fall to the side as the Snake God's tail sends her tumbling.

318112016.content: Buzenbo staggers backwards, but her Divine Grace sword can only block so many Bane Energy attacks and it can't do anything to control the Bane Energy within her. The purple ripples are almost at her neck and her vision is starting to fade to black and red.

318112018.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318112018.content: What did my master do... with Shinri and Kogarasu Maru...

318112019.content: The oxygen remaining in her lungs is rapidly running out, her limbs are becoming heavy and weak. If this goes on there's only one... No!

318112020.content: There is one more thing she can try. For victory or a valiant death.

318112022.content: There's a prickling in her palm and the cherry-red Divine Grace burns brighter. She grits her teeth and pulls the length of the sword from its scabbard.

318112024.content: But Sakuragiri gives no reply to her desperate plea...

318112025.content: A terrible fury, howls of battle, penetrating pain... Just like the first time she drew Sakuragiri, Buzenbo's senses are overwhelmed.

318112027.content: She leans on her sword to avoid falling over completely. Her eyes are shut tight against the pain, but she forces them open. She doesn't know what she is looking at. Black and red Bane Energy, or a battlefield scattered with cherry blossom?

318112028.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318112028.content: At least... I didn't get anyone else killed...

318112029.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318112029.content: Master, Admin... I've let you down.

318112030.content: A wave of guilt and helplessness washes over her. She watches as the Snake God approaches and she gradually gives up on the idea of further resistance.

318112031.content: Her scabbard falls to the ground. Her eyes close once more.

318121001.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318121001.content: Buzenbo, why do you study kendo?

318121002.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121002.content: To carry on my father's tradition and develop the kendo hall.

318121003.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318121003.content: No, no. That's not what I mean.

318121004.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318121004.content: What I want to know is... How do you feel about that sword in your hand. Have you ever asked yourself what role it will play in your life?

318121005.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121005.content: Kendo should be a process of self-improvement. At its heart, it is not about fighting.

318121006.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121006.content: But now I'm a Mod. Part of Pheasant Squad, a combat task force. Fighting is my job. The sword is my weapon.

318121007.speaker: 月读
318121007.content: And is that what kendo is to you?

318121008.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121008.content: Master... I know I've never been good enough. And now I've let you down again.

318121009.speaker: 月读
318121009.content: You have never disappointed me, Buzenbo. You make me prouder than any other pupil.

318121011.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121011.content: I wish I could believe you. I wish I didn't always need protected.

318121012.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121012.content: But it never happens. I've never shown everyone what I can do... I lost to the Snake God, I lost to Akika, I failed in my mission to monitor the Imperial City...

318121013.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121013.content: I've memorized everything you ever told me. Every skill you ever taught me I've practiced a thousand times. Yet I never seem to improve.

318121014.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121014.content: Can you just tell me what I should do, master?

318121015.content: Buzenbo strains to reach out to her master but, just as her fingers are almost there, Tsukuyomi disappears like a burst bubble.

318121016.content: The kendo hall distorts as if being sucked into a vortex, taking her with it.

318121017.content: Then, all is black. It's just her. Nobody to watch, nobody to help.

318121018.content: The continual pain is leaving her dazed. Her thoughts turn in on themselves, circling, sinking.

318121020.content: She clenches a fist, as if trying to grasp her sword, as if defying her fate. Her fingers brush against something, something thin.

318121021.content: The rustling of the paper is loud in the dark silence. Her eyes snap open as if awakened from a dream and she looks down at her hand.

318121023.content: She thinks of what she saw before she lost consciousness. Her scabbard knocked open. The letter inside falling out.

318121024.content: Every word of the letter rings out in her mind in Tsukuyomi's voice, as if she's hearing her master sound the words out in her head as she writes. Then comes the final sentence.

318121027.content: She stares blankly at the words on the paper until a cherry blossom drifts past and lands on the ground.

318121028.content: She seems to remember something. The words on the paper ripple and dissolve, becoming waves of color that spread out into the darkness.

318121029.content: She remembers being a little girl watching cherry blossom blown on the wind and listening to her father talk of things she didn't understand.

318121030.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318121030.content: Say you practice something a thousand times. Ten thousand times. To the point every move is as natural as breathing. Have you ever asked yourself.. what then?

318121031.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318121031.content: At that point, your skills have been honed. The question is, what do you do with them?

318121032.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318121032.content: Do you accept them as they are? Seek even greater heights? Pass your talents on to others? Or perhaps protect the weak and fight the evil?

318121033.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318121033.content: It's never too early to consider these matters, Buzenbo. Because one day, you will have to answer the question.

318121034.speaker: 丰前坊养父
318121034.content: Kendo is a journey. We travel that path, going a little further every day. One day you will lose sight of where you started and have to choose your own direction.

318121035.content: These are the cherry blossoms she'd watch in the afternoons at Aether Gazer with her master, once they'd finished training. She'd see them grow, bloom, and fall.

318121036.speaker: 月读
318121036.content: What does it mean, for heart and sword to be one?

318121037.speaker: 月读
318121037.content: I used to think it was a state of wisdom. To train your mind to be as sharp as your sword. Always ready for action, no matter what the circumstances.

318121038.speaker: 月读
318121038.content: But is that enough? We're people, not swords, after all. So why should we try to be the same?

318121039.speaker: 月读
318121039.content: Then one day I started wondering about what the sword in my hand really was. What did I want to do with it?

318121040.speaker: 月读
318121040.content: That reminded me of the first time I ever picked up a sword. It acted as an extension of my arm. I wielded it as I saw fit and it responded.

318121041.speaker: 月读
318121041.content: It's as simple as that. I am me, and so is my sword. There's no difference between what I want to achieve and what I want to achieve with my sword. And that's enough.

318121042.content: She watched the cherry blossom fall so many times.

318121043.content: Until she was covered in blossom. Becoming blossom.

318121044.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121044.content: Is that so? Am I enough?

318121045.content: Buzenbo opens her eyes. She sees herself, white-haired, take her sword. It looks like Kogarasu Maru but has a cherry-red aura.

318121046.speaker: 「丰前坊天狗」
318121046.content: You are finally here, Buzenbo. Future me.

318121047.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121047.content: I must lack insight. It took me so long to understand.

318121048.content: There are no Visbanes nearby and Buzenbo is free of that pain that reaches her very soul. She holds a sword identical to the other her and it feels entirely natural in her hand.

318121049.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121049.content: It turns out my master's hopes for me were so simple.

318121050.speaker: 「丰前坊天狗」
318121050.content: And is that why you're doing this? To please her?

318121051.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121051.content: Yes. If this is the final time my master hoped for, then I will prove she is correct. I am enough.

318121052.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121052.content: For so many years I've hidden behind her. Stood in her shadow. Whenever I had a question I would turn to her for the answer.

318121053.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121053.content: But now she thinks I have studied with her for long enough. That's why she gave me Sakuragiri. And like my father said, it is time for me to choose my own path.

318121054.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121054.content: I don't need to follow something or seek something. I don't need anyone's approval or to show what I can do. The only thing I need to prove is that I can make my own choice.
