318121056.content: Buzenbo raises the swords she holds and the other her matches her movements. There's a flash of anger in the other woman's eyes and Buzenbo knows it mirrors her own expression.

318121057.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318121057.content: You have the same idea I do...

318121060.content: The cherry blossom falls, the two figures merge. She stands alone now, facing an oncoming flood of Visbanes. Her eyes flash, her hand grips the hilt of her sword.

318131002.content: Buzenbo opens her eyes. It seems nothing has changed. The Bane Energy still roils within her, dark and cold, cutting off her senses and her control over her body.

318131003.content: The figure of the Snake God looms over the room, each of its four tails wielding a deadly sword. Those blades and the purple corruption spreading across her skin all look set to end her life.

318131004.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318131004.content: You're not as powerful as last time.

318131005.content: She looks calmly at the Snake God and then lowers her head to focus on her sword. It seems nothing has changed... except her.

318131006.content: It seems as if the Snake God is moving in slow motion, while the Bane Energy within her recedes, no longer worthy of being called a threat. The invisible shackles that have held her snap like plastic toys.

318131007.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318131007.content: Is this the path I have chosen?

318131008.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318131008.content: I thought it was so far off. Yet it was only a step away.

318131009.content: "Think. Realize. Choose. Act... You have been practicing and learning for years. You can do this on your own."

318131010.content: "The sword is an extension of the heart. Sakuragiri is your Access Key, a part of you. When you stop hesitating it will stop resisting you."

318131011.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318131011.content: Thank you for your trust, master.

318131012.content: Time seems to return to its normal speed. The Snake God's four blades slash through the air, converging on Buzenbo's torso.

318131013.content: A flash comes from Sakuragiri's edge and, like a cherry blossom, floats towards the Snake God's rear, where it becomes Buzenbo.

318131014.content: The other her dissipates. Buzenbo doesn't turn to look at the Snake God. She lets her momentum carry her forward a few steps and then stops.

318131015.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318131015.content: There is so much I can do. So much I want to do.

318131016.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318131016.content: So, I will deal with you in my own way.

318131017.content: Light blades form in thin air, slashing back and forth, driving the Snake God back into a corner of the room.

318131018.content: Buzenbo takes a deep breath, as calm as any practice day in the kendo hall, her movements smooth and practiced. But this time, she slices her sword downwards and, pulling back, cuts open her arm.

318131019.content: The blade drags though her blood and the pure Divine Grace of her Access Key explodes to spread from the wound to her entire body. The Bane Energy within her is destroyed.

318131022.content: The Snake God manages to evade Buzenbo's onslaught, but senses the Bane Energy within its foe is gone. It roars, blades whirling, and launches a crazed charge.

318131023.content: Lightning crackles across Sakuragiri, while the letter in the scabbard sits silently at Buzenbo's side.

318131024.content: She turns slowly, aiming her sword at the Snake God. Everywhere it touches she finds a weakness.

318131025.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318131025.content: You're a fake. We already beat the real thing.

318132001.content: In a room full of cherry-red light, the Snake God's huge form collapses to the floor.

318132002.content: She sheathes her swords and doesn't spare even a glance for her fallen foe. She closes her eyes and focuses on Sakuragiri.

318132003.content: The countless memories of battles past stored in Sakuragiri no longer resist her. They flow into her and elevate her own practice-honed skills. This is the most precious knowledge a warrior can have. The essence which is left when all that is unneeded has fallen away.

318132005.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318132005.content: At the very least, I won't let my past me defeat me.

318132006.content: She checks for any other exits and, finding none, returns the way she came. There are still Visbanes roaming up above and she hastens her step, running to meet them.

318132009.content: The cherry-red blade of light skips past and the Visbanes to her rear turn to Bane Energy dust before they can even howl their pain.

318132010.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318132010.content: Heart and mind as one can shatter all obstacles...

318132011.content: Divine Grace surges around her and the tip of her blade slices across the space. The Visbanes grind to a halt and fall, like grass to the scythe.

318132012.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318132012.content: Heart and sword at rest. Power defeats power.

318132013.content: Her light blade cuts down and the entire space starts to vibrate. As Buzenbo walks past, the hulking Visbanes and the huge machines all start to fall apart.

318132014.content: She fights as she moves, seemingly unaware of her surroundings beyond any opportunities it might offer for more practice.

318132015.content: And as she makes her final move and puts her sword away, she looks around and sees not a single Visbane remains.

318132016.content: She gradually calms herself, then closes her eyes and reaches out to that presence in Sakuragiri.

318132017.content: Amongst the fallen cherry blossom, she lifts Sakuragiri and with a single cut dispatches her howling foes.

318132018.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318132018.content: Thank you for telling me this.

318132019.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318132019.content: You can leave things to me now.

318132020.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318132020.content: The Visbanes are all down, but there's still so much Bane Energy... Are there more of them nearby?

318132021.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318132021.content: I didn't have time to look carefully before, but... is this a factory for making Visbanes?

318132022.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318132022.content: I've been down here for ages but Akika hasn't come after me. I wonder what's happening up top.

318132023.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318132023.content: I wonder if Ningishzida has come looking for me. Or Admin or master.

318132024.content: Buzenbo raises her head. Divine Grace pulses within Sakuragiri, ready to go.

318132025.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318132025.content: I need to get out there. Now.

318141003.content: A fog of Bane Energy approaches and Tsukuyomi and Kuninotokotachi back away. Akika, meanwhile, ignores them. She reaches back and to the rear, converting her planned attack into a defense.

318141004.content: But before she's ready, a cherry-red light blade shines through the fog, cutting through the Bane Energy like a bolt of lightning through a night sky and crashing into Akika's raised arm.

318141005.content: The powerful blow sends the little girl staggering back. She looks at her scorched sleeve in shock.

318141009.speaker: 国常立
318141009.content: Oh, I picked up a couple of flesh wounds is all. Thanks for your concern, but I'm abso—(Cough!)—perfectly well, thank you.

318141010.speaker: 国常立
318141010.content: I like the new armor! Sakuragiri's a looker too. But there's something different about you, Buzenbo.

318141012.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318141012.content: Yes, master. Thank you for showing me how much further I had to go.

318141013.speaker: 国常立
318141013.content: Let's skip the graduation ceremony for now. Your final project isn't done yet.

318141014.content: The dust clears as Akika raises her gaze to her three opponents. A second later, her smile returns.

318141015.speaker: 朗香
318141015.content: Oh, so you're not dead, miss?

318141016.content: Several bolts of cherry-red lightning shoot towards the girl. She retreats again and again, glaring at Buzenbo, who stands in front of her teammates, guarding them.

318141018.speaker: 朗香
318141018.content: Ah. I should stop expecting anything from useless humans.

318141019.speaker: 朗香
318141019.content: I guess I'll just have to play with you myself.

318142001.speaker: 月读
318142001.content: What's going on with the Imperial Army soldiers and the locals? How come Sasanami has been cut off from the outside world?

318142003.content: The Pheasant Squad has the girl restrained. Her hair's a mess, her clothes are dirty, and... there's a sly smile on her lips.

318142004.speaker: 朗香
318142004.content: Why should I tell you know-nothings anything?

318142006.speaker: 朗香
318142006.content: But am I? What if you three are my prisoners?

318142007.speaker: 朗香
318142007.content: Poor Mods. You're really no smarter than humans. To try to save one, you risked two more.

318142008.speaker: 朗香
318142008.content: Next time we meet I won't be so forgiving.

318142009.content: Tsukuyomi's eyes narrow and an instant later she has her sword drawn and slashing towards Akika's head.

318142010.content: Before the strike lands, the girl starts to disappear. Her pale skin, her fine clothes, it all fades into nothing. A second later there's nothing there but a dissipating cloud of Bane Energy.

318142012.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318142012.content: Hmm. No matching Bane Energy signals nearby.

318142013.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318142013.content: How did she do that? I've never seen anything like it!

318142015.content: The three quickly swop info. Buzenbo is relieved to hear the other two teams have gone to Shimogyou and the Photon Rail Nexus. They won't run into Akika, at least.

318142016.speaker: 月读
318142016.content: Senba thinks Akika has consumed the Cinders of the Monkey God and Snake God, at least. Add in her own powers and she's going to be much tougher than any individual god.

318142017.speaker: 月读
318142017.content: But what did you think about that fight?

318142018.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318142018.content: She was a little more powerful than the Snake God, but... well, we beat her.

318142019.speaker: 国常立
318142019.content: And the Deer God and Snake God are about the same in terms of power. Buzenbo could take them out solo now.

318142020.speaker: 月读
318142020.content: Yeah... But remember, the Snake God we met at the Miyahebi place had only just woken up. Same with the Deer God, it wasn't conscious and was fighting purely on instinct.

318142021.speaker: 月读
318142021.content: The mountain gods we've encountered so far were already badly wounded by Akika. They weren't at full strength. That means Akika must have been more powerful than them.

318142022.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318142022.content: Maybe Akika was wounded in those fights too? And she isn't fully recovered?

318142023.speaker: 国常立
318142023.content: If she's hurt, why's she so keen to get into a ruckus?

318142024.speaker: 月读
318142024.content: We can speculate about her being weakened somehow. But we need to prepare for the worst.

318142025.speaker: 月读
318142025.content: However, the fact she didn't fight on indicates she's unsure of herself. We definitely hurt her just now, maybe that weakened her.

318142026.content: Tsukuyomi picks up Buzenbo's broken Kogarasu Maru and hands it to Buzenbo, who gently places it back in its scabbard.

318142027.speaker: 月读
318142027.content: We couldn't have done it without you, Buzenbo.

318142028.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318142028.content: I might have been here sooner if I'd understood what you told me, master.

318142029.speaker: 月读
318142029.content: Maybe we don't understand things until the time is right. You need to find your own way to make the most progress.

318142031.speaker: 月读
318142031.content:
Haha. I knew you'd keep calling me that.
Do you remember what I told you at the start?

318142033.speaker: 月读
318142033.content:
You're not my pupil any longer, Buzenbo.
Now, we teach each other.

318142034.content: Buzenbo stares at Tsukuyomi and, seeing that rare warm smile, feels a lump come to her throat.

318142035.content: Her memories of her studies with Tsukuyomi come back to mind. Meditating under the cherry blossom. Discussions in the kendo hall. The meals, the snacks, the games of Go, the novels shared. The scenes tick past, each marking a day of learning.

318142036.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318142036.content: It doesn't matter. You'll always be my master, master.

318142037.content: She quickly wipes away her tears and forces a more determined expression, one more fitting for the dignity of the moment.

318142038.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318142038.content: I've still got so much to learn from you. I hope you'll both keep teaching me, Kuninotokotachi and... Captain.

318142040.speaker: 国常立
318142040.content: No need to be so serious. You're a grown-up now, you can relax! I'll tell you some embarrassing stories about Tsukuyomi later if you like.

318142041.content: Kuninotokotachi grins as she walks up to Buzenbo and pinches her cheeks. Buzenbo is about to push her away, but remembers the other Mod is wounded and has to let her continue.

318142042.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318142042.content: Kuninotokotachi, shouldn't we tell Captain about Kuramitsuha?

318142043.speaker: 国常立
318142043.content: Oh yeah! Tsukuyomi, we recruited a new Pheasant. We'll introduce you when we get a chance.

318142044.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318142044.content: Yeah. Kuramitsuha's a bit... unconventional. But she's honest and loyal and you'll like her, I know.

318142046.speaker: 月读
318142046.content: Comms are still cut off here, and we promised Admin we wouldn't hang around any longer than necessary.

318142047.speaker: 月读
318142047.content: There's some intel we need to bring you up to speed on as well. Like I say, we can talk as we walk.

318142049.content: They're about to set off, but someone's ninja senses are tingling.

318142050.speaker: 国常立
318142050.content: Hey, do you get the feeling there's something odd about the Bane Energy up there?

318142051.content: They look up in surprise and all tense up.

318142052.content: The Bane Energy in the sky is writhing, a vortex at boiling point that looks ready to burst free.

318151001.content:
August 17th, 2315.
14:46. On the perimeter of the Photon Rail Nexus.

318151002.content: We follow the route upwards and eventually we're high up enough to see the entire Sasanami Photon Rail network laid out below us.

318151003.content: But there's no time to enjoy the view. Mimir's Bane Energy warning is sounding.

318151004.speaker: 我
318151004.content: It's coming from the Photon Rail Nexus. And it looks bad.

318151005.speaker: 我
318151005.content: Sekhmet, how many guards would CORG have stationed there?

318151006.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318151006.content: You want to go in? Could be dangerous.

318151007.speaker: 我
318151007.content: You're the covert operative. You go in and take a look. If it's bad come back out and we'll come up with a Plan B.

318151009.content: Sekhmet checks the surroundings before picking up the pace and sprinting off towards the Photon Rail Nexus.

318151010.speaker: 宁希达
318151010.content: Will she be okay on her own?

318151012.speaker: 我
318151012.content: You don't get to head up a Quake Damage Control Department squad by being any ordinary Mod.

318151013.speaker: 宁希达
318151013.content: Oh, I'm not a fast runner. I wouldn't be able to catch up with her. I'll stick with you.

318151014.speaker: 我
318151014.content: I have to admit, I don't usually see her looking that serious. I don't like the chances of any of those CORG guards.

318151015.speaker: 我
318151015.content: Looks like we've got our own problems to deal with. Stay alert.

318151016.speaker: 科尔盖士官
318151016.content: Captain, our right flank is about to collapse!

318151017.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318151017.content: What about the other positions? Can they send some backup?

318151018.speaker: 科尔盖士官
318151018.content: Those dammed Visbanes just keep coming! We don't have anyone to spare.

318151020.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318151020.content: The Photon Rail Nexus is too important. And if we fall back any further we're in the city!

318151021.speaker: 科尔盖士官
318151021.content: But we can't beat them from here!

318151022.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318151022.content: I'll go help out on the right flank. You hold the fort here.

318151024.content: There's no time for the captain to respond. He watches the nearby Visbanes nervously, takes two shots, and then rolls into cover off to the right.

318151025.speaker: 通讯声
318151025.content: Captain!? Can we get any backup? There's too many of them, we can't hold out.

318151027.content: Crawling, rolling, shooting. It's been a while since he was on the front line, but the muscle memory gradually comes back. Problem is, his gun's overheating and he has nobody to talk to about his anxiety.

318151029.content: The position on the right flank has been battered and is close to collapse. He watches as the youngest soldier prepares to make a melee charge. He can't let that happen.

318151032.content: The chainsaw and its Divine Grace blast push forward and Visbanes for meters around fall to the ground howling. The young soldier, now safe, collapses to the ground, gazing gratefully at the new arrival.

318151035.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318151035.content: Why the long face? I'm here, aren't I?

318151036.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318151036.content: You sure are. I'm so glad you arrived in time.

318151037.speaker: 科尔盖士官
318151037.content: Is that Sekhmet? Awesome. Captain Sekhmet's here to help!

318151038.content: The young officer grabs a terminal to pass the news on to the other positions. Cheers of relief come from the speaker.

318151039.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318151039.content: You can always trust a Mod to save the day.

318151040.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318151040.content: Captain Sekhmet, what's your ID code? I'll add you to the command channel.

318151041.content: Sekhmet recites a lengthy alphanumeric string as she lets rip with some cannon fire. The pressure on the flank is easing up and the medics are able to drop their weapons and get back to helping the wounded.

318151046.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318151046.content: Hey, the gang's all here. Okay, take-out-the-trash time!

318152001.content: Handover complete, Sekhmet goes forward to check on the forces guarding the Photon Rail station. Ningishzida is helping with the wounded, and I get a moment of peace.

318152002.speaker: 我
318152002.content: This is the first break I've had since leaving your place.

318152005.speaker: 我
318152005.content: (How come she sometimes calls me Admin and sometimes calls me Questioner?)

318152006.content: I take the water, but Senba keeps staring at me. I feel like she's weighing me up, evaluating me.

318152008.speaker: 伊邪那美
318152008.content: Nothing. It was all such a panic, I was worried you might have been wounded and I hadn't noticed.

318152009.speaker: 我
318152009.content: Relax, I'm all good. I'm kind of tough. Don't hurt easy.

318152011.content: Senba gives a brief nod, then sits close by my side. She looks off at something.

318152014.content: The sudden Visbane attack has left almost all of the CORG soldiers wounded to some extent. Even the ones who aren't hurt are exhausted and can do little more than find somewhere to rest.

318152015.speaker: 我
318152015.content: They might have CORG protective gear, but they're still just human. They'll be grateful you were able to save so many of them.

318152016.speaker: 伊邪那美
318152016.content: Were the people who saved me like them?

318152017.speaker: 我
318152017.content: Yeah. They were all in CORG uniforms too. They only look the same, though. As soon as you hear them talk you realize they're all different.

318152018.speaker: 我
318152018.content: Some are a safe pair of hands. Some are trigger happy. Some just want to get home safe to see their families.

318152019.content: She sits there, quietly listening. She won't have the time to talk to those soldiers, but it seems like she wants to know them nevertheless.

318152020.speaker: 伊邪那美
318152020.content: Is that what they were like?

318152021.speaker: 我
318152021.content: Unfortunately, I never really got the time to find out. Sekhmet was their commanding officer, after all, not me.

318152023.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318152023.content: CORG has over 300 staff members stationed at the Sasanami Photon Rail Nexus. Over 100 of those are non-combat personnel and have been evacuated to safety.

318152024.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318152024.content: About 40% of the remainder are no longer fit for combat. Ten or so will be ready to fight after some R&R. The rest need medical treatment. We lost 30.

318152025.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318152025.content: With Ningishzida helping our medics we were able to get some of the wounded back on their feet. We've got the numbers we need, just.

318152027.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318152027.content: We've got gear which can detect the Photon Rail interchange module within the Nexus. The core parts can stand the biggest of Quakes and seem undamaged. But we have no idea what's going on in there. The Visbanes came out of nowhere... We had to fall back, there was no time to mount a defense.

318152028.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318152028.content: It was too much for a guard force to handle, I know. Don't blame yourselves. Anything else?

318152030.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318152030.content: Maybe, but that's a face that has something left to say...

318152031.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318152031.content: You joined up at the same time as my team's Agents H and E, right?

318152032.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318152032.content: The regulations say I can't possibly know their code letters. But I do know two of my buddies were with you.

318152033.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318152033.content: I read the announcement about the Crow God being killed. So when you turned up alone I was... disappointed.

318152034.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318152034.content: They've been busy with work so I haven't seen them for ages. When I heard they were in Sasanami I got in touch and we all agreed to go get drunk when our missions ended.

318152035.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318152035.content: Hmm. I can't imagine those two getting drunk. One's too serious, the other too surly.

318152036.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318152036.content: I was always the weakest of the three of us and they had to keep watching my back. I still managed to get wounded and that's how I ended up in desk jobs. I was fortunate enough to get promoted a couple of times and... here I am.

318152037.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318152037.content: I had to use all the tricks they taught me fighting those Visbanes. Kept on thinking they'd turn up to save me. Guess I'm the only one left, though...

318152038.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318152038.content: I think what you want to ask is, how come their Mod captain survived and they didn't?

318152039.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318152039.content: Sorry, but... Look, I don't know you, but I know them. I know they would have been glad to sacrifice themselves for the cause. But...

318152041.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318152041.content: If you want to hate me, go ahead. I'm the one who assigned them to the mission.

318152042.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318152042.content: I wasn't able to bring them back alive. All I can do now is try to make sure their sacrifice wasn't in vain. To... to win more victories in their honor, I guess.

318152043.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318152043.content: And I promise I will remember them. I'll fight in their memory.

318152044.content: The officer in the CORG uniform stands silently for a while before quietly raising a hand and giving Sekhmet the CORG salute.

318152045.speaker: 光轨中枢负责人
318152045.content: Then... take me with you. Lead me like you led them.

318152046.content: All the work—the medics treating the wounded, the soldiers clearing the debris—is interrupted by a sudden announcement from the public address system.

318152047.speaker: 广播声
318152047.content: The Karasugo are traitors working against the Child of Heaven and attacking Shimogyou. On orders of the Child of Heaven, a curfew is in place. Please be aware of enemy infiltrators and do not go out at night. The Imperial Army will guard the people of Shimogyou and ensure you are safe.

318152048.speaker: 我
318152048.content: As expected, she's moving on Shimogyou.

318152050.content: We try to call him. There's a long wait, but finally we hear Kagutsuchi's voice.

318152051.speaker: 迦具土
318152051.content: Sorry Admin, things are a bit chaotic here. Had to leave you hanging.

318152053.speaker: 迦具土
318152053.content: Let's say we didn't get a warm welcome.

318152054.speaker: 迦具土
318152054.content: We've joined up with the Karasugo stationed here, but we haven't found any of the Akishika. And when the locals heard that broadcast they got... uncooperative.

318152056.speaker: 迦具土
318152056.content: Yeah. I've sent scouts to figure out where the Imperial Army is. We're more mobile than they are, so we still have some time to play with.

318152057.speaker: 迦具土
318152057.content: We won't let the army get near the civilians.

318152059.content: I end the call and notice Sekhmet is walking towards me. I guess she's finished giving the CORG forces her orders.

318152060.speaker: 我
318152060.content: There's still no news from the Imperial City, but it seems things are getting worse in Shimogyou.

318152061.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318152061.content: Let's just make sure we're ready at this end.

318152062.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318152062.content: Everyone's rested up. Time to retake the Photon Rail Nexus.

318152063.content:
August 17th, 2315.
15:59. On the perimeter of the Photon Rail Nexus.

318152065.speaker: 科尔盖士兵A
318152065.content: Better. When I lost consciousness I kinda thought I'd never wake up again.

318152066.speaker: 科尔盖士兵A
318152066.content: It's all thanks to you, Miss Ningishzida!

318152068.content: Ningishzida is organizing her medical gear as she talks.

318152069.speaker: 宁希达
318152069.content: Butterfingers! Dropped my scissors. Hope nobody noticed...

318152071.content: She lifts her head, her hands still full of gear.

318152072.content: The Bane Energy hanging over the Imperial City is no longer turning in regular spirals. It has become a raging fire.

318152073.content: Explosions and blasts ring out as if in a chain reaction. Clouds of dirt and dust are blown skywards and powerful tremors reach all the way from Reiten to the Photon Rail Nexus.

318152074.content: The palace, a marvel which has stood in Kamigyou for over a century, is being blown apart by Bane Energy.

318152075.content: It is hard to imagine that anyone caught in those explosions and fires has any chance of getting out alive.

1102705003.content: Leviathan is sitting across from me, though she looks unusually listless. She's pinching a corner of her shirt and looking slightly anxious, as if she's waiting for something to fall on her.

1102705004.speaker: 我
1102705004.content: And so the conclusion of our meeting is...

1102705006.speaker: 我
1102705006.content: (Sighs) Because you didn't pass your test at school, Leviathan, we've decided that Vidar will be going on the survey mission by herself.

1102705009.content: Leviathan is crestfallen, and I can hear the sadness in her voice.

1102705010.content: I'm sorry I couldn't help you more.

1102705011.speaker: 利维坦
1102705011.content: (Whimpers) It's my fault for not working hard enough.

1102705013.speaker: 我
1102705013.content: Personally, I don't believe that school performance should be the sole criterion for determining a Modifier's mission eligibility. After all, you're pretty impressive when it comes to polar missions., Leviathan.

1102705014.speaker: 利维坦
1102705014.content: Right??? I knew you'd understand, Admin!

1102705015.speaker: 利维坦
1102705015.content: I just want to go out on missions with my Master. Besides, what does the test have to do with polar missions, huh?

1102705016.content: Leviathan puffs out her cheeks in vexation.

1102705017.speaker: 我
1102705017.content: I'm sorry, but that's what we said earlier too, but the argument didn't stick.

1102705018.speaker: 利维坦
1102705018.content: T-t-then... tell me who objected to my going on the mission!! I'll remember each and every one of them and... I'll get penguins to bite them in their butts!

1102705019.speaker: 我
1102705019.content: But it feels like you're the one who's dastardly afraid of penguins...

1102705020.speaker: 利维坦
1102705020.content: Nope, who said that?! I'm much braver these days, okay?

1102705021.speaker: 我
1102705021.content: Fine, fine. But you'll have to think of another plan. Because Vidar is the one who had the veto here.

1102705022.content: I pinch Leviathan in the cheeks, which deflate quickly like balloons losing air.

1102705023.speaker: 利维坦
1102705023.content: So you mean it was Master who didn't want me to go along with her...?

1102705024.speaker: 我
1102705024.content: I think she wants you to focus on school.

1102705025.speaker: 我
1102705025.content: "I know that I'm not good at communication, so I can't be a teacher, but... knowledge is important." That's what she said just now.

1102705026.speaker: 利维坦
1102705026.content: You don't have to quote her word by word to me, Admin. So... where is Master now?

1102705027.speaker: 我
1102705027.content: This mission calls for quite a large amount of data to be collected, and the observation period will be long.

1102705028.speaker: 我
1102705028.content: I think Vidar has most probably left by now. She looked like she was in a rush. She probably wanted to get the job done quickly so that she can get back to you ASAP.

1102705029.speaker: 利维坦
1102705029.content: ... She didn't even say bye to me... My Master is such a meanie.

1102705030.speaker: 我
1102705030.content: Well, I'm here to tell you because she asked me to.

1102705031.speaker: 利维坦
1102705031.content: Then you're a big meanie too, Admin!!!

1102705032.speaker: 利维坦
1102705032.content: Ugh!!! But I was so close to passing this time!!!

1102705033.content: The balloon is about to explode again. Thankfully, this is cut short by the oblivious young lady who's just opened the office door and come flying in.

1102705034.speaker: 宁希达
1102705034.content: (Huffing) Leviathan... I-it's time to go to school!

1102705035.speaker: 我
1102705035.content: Is it time already? Do you want me to come with you, Leviathan?

1102705036.speaker: 利维坦
1102705036.content: No, no! I know the way!

1102705037.content: Leviathan grabs her backpack rather poutily, then storms out of my office.

1102705038.speaker: 我
1102705038.content: Mmm... I guess it's message delivered?

1102705040.content: Vidar's holographic image, accompanied by gusts of wind and snow, has appeared in the room. Although it's only a projection, for some inexplicable reason I can still feel the temperature here drop.

1102705041.speaker: 我
1102705041.content: Oh, you're already there. That's fast. Did you hear all of that?

1102705042.speaker: 维达尔
1102705042.content: Yeah. It pretty much happened like I thought it would.

1102705043.speaker: 我
1102705043.content: Please don't make me do that again. She's a kid deep down inside after all.

1102705044.speaker: 维达尔
1102705044.content: I'm sorry, Admin, I just thought that you were the best person to tell her. If I had to do it, I might... just give in.

1102705045.speaker: 我
1102705045.content: If that's the case, why didn't you just let me tell her that there's an even more important mission for her?

1102705046.speaker: 我
1102705046.content: Leviathan would be so pleased to know that her Master praised her for a good five minutes at the meeting.

1102705047.speaker: 维达尔
1102705047.content: I... was just being honest. Besides, she doesn't need me to mentor her on polar missions anymore.

1102705048.speaker: 维达尔
1102705048.content: But she's not like me, and she deserves to have a normal life. Furthermore, having knowledge from human society is more important.

1102705049.speaker: 我
1102705049.content: But that means you've become a "big meanie" to her.

1102705050.speaker: 维达尔
1102705050.content: I'll bring back some souvenirs for her. Besides, I'm not the only one who's a "meanie." Alright, I have to go. Work beckons.

1102705051.speaker: 我
1102705051.content: What kind of "souvenirs" could the polar region possibly have to offer...?

1102705052.content: I think back on what Vidar said after I get off the call.

1102705053.content: Perhaps out of guilt for keeping Leviathan in the dark, I decide to go shopping for something useful as a gift for her.

1102705054.speaker: 我
1102705054.content: I keep getting the sense that the mall is no longer a place for shopping these days.

1102705055.speaker: 店员
1102705055.content: OPENING SPECIAL! OPENING SPECIAL! Huge discounts at the video arcade, including 20% off game coins now!

1102705056.speaker: 店员
1102705056.content: We're also debuting a new VR shooting game here at the arcade, so don't miss it! You may refer to the e-guide that comes with the admission ticket for more details.

1102705057.speaker: ？？？
1102705057.content: May I have a copy of that e-guide too, please?

1102705058.speaker: 店员
1102705058.content: Kiddo, that e-guide comes only with the admission ticket.

1102705059.speaker: ？？？
1102705059.content: Then a ticket for me, please.

1102705060.speaker: 店员
1102705060.content: Well... Kids have to be accompanied by an adult before they can enter. Looks like you're still in school though?

1102705061.speaker: ？？？
1102705061.content: No, no, no, I'm not in school anymore!

1102705062.content: There's a sudden commotion. I walk over to the entrance of the video arcade to see a somewhat embarrassed arcade clerk and a familiar figure in a school uniform wearing a hat with animal ears on it.

1102705064.speaker: 利维坦
1102705064.content: Oh! A-Admin? What are you doing here?

1102705065.speaker: 我
1102705065.content: I should be asking you that.

1102705066.speaker: 利维坦
1102705066.content: Um... um... I'm here on a school tour...

1102705067.content: Leviathan's eyes start darting around and she's nervously tapping her fingertips on each other.

1102705068.speaker: 我
1102705068.content: Really...? Why don't I recall this tour...? What are you supposed to see on this tour?

1102705070.speaker: 我
1102705070.content: Hmm... Mimir, connect me to Vidar please.

1102705071.speaker: 利维坦
1102705071.content: Yikes I'm sorry Admin! I was lying about the school tour, and I was wrong to do that. Don't tell Master, please???

1102705073.content: Moments later, I'm sitting at a family restaurant nearby, watching Leviathan demolish her third serving of ice cream.

1102705074.speaker: 我
1102705074.content: So, are you ready to tell me now why you didn't go to school today?

1102705075.speaker: 利维坦
1102705075.content: I did go to school... And then I snuck out at lunch.

1102705076.speaker: 我
1102705076.content: Is that why you were bothering the clerk at the video arcade while in your school uniform?

1102705077.speaker: 利维坦
1102705077.content: No, I... Ugh... I know I was wrong to sneak out like that, Admin.

1102705078.speaker: 利维坦
1102705078.content: I'll tell you everything if you promise not to tell Master about this.

1102705079.content: Leviathan quickly drops the ice cream cup in her hand, then sits up and looks at me gravely. I have to keep myself from snickering out loud.

1102705080.speaker: 我
1102705080.content: (Coughs to cover up snicker) Okay, I won't tell her about this. But I'll take you right back to school if you don't give me a good reason.

1102705081.speaker: 我
1102705081.content: So tell me, why did you skip out on school, Leviathan?

1102705082.speaker: 利维坦
1102705082.content: Um... It's because... because... I don't know.

1102705084.speaker: 利维坦
1102705084.content: My teacher said today that those of us who didn't pass were a burden on the rest of the class. But I was so close to passing...

1102705085.speaker: 利维坦
1102705085.content: Then all these weird things started happening. The words in the books started dancing, and the clouds outside all looked like Fenrir. And they were telling me to come outside and play!

1102705086.speaker: 利维坦
1102705086.content: The words my teacher wrote were buzzing around my ears like insects...

1102705087.speaker: 利维坦
1102705087.content: I ran out of there because I didn't know what to do. And then I ran into you, Admin...

1102705088.content: It's not right to play hooky, you know.

1102705089.speaker: 利维坦
1102705089.content: I know I was wrong. But school is... so hard!!!

1102705090.speaker: 我
1102705090.content: But how would you know that when you haven't really tried?

1102705092.speaker: 我
1102705092.content: It's not good to be all wound up, so let's take some time off to unwind this afternoon anyway.

1102705093.speaker: 利维坦
1102705093.content: Aren't you gonna scold me, Admin?

1102705094.speaker: 我
1102705094.content: Of course not. To tell you the truth, I thought of running away too when I was learning with Miss Shu.

1102705095.speaker: 我
1102705095.content: So let's just have a good break this afternoon.

1102705096.speaker: 利维坦
1102705096.content: So I don't have to go back to school?

1102705097.speaker: 我
1102705097.content: Just this afternoon. Wait for me here, I'll let the school know now.

1102705098.content: It turns out that taking the rest of the day off is surprisingly easy. Then, at a spot some distance away from the restaurant, I put a call through to the Society of Muses.

1102705099.speaker: 我
1102705099.content: Hello? This is the Administrator. Who is this?

1102705100.speaker: 哈迪斯
1102705100.content: My dear little lamb. What business do you have for me today?

1102705101.content: I hear a familiar, and reassuring, voice on the line. I briefly describe what happened to Hades, and ask her for some advice.

1102705102.speaker: 哈迪斯
1102705102.content: I see. So you want to know how we usually handle Oneiroi.

1102705103.speaker: 我
1102705103.content: I wish it wasn't the case, but yes, that's what it is.

1102705104.speaker: 哈迪斯
1102705104.content: Heh, how thoughtful of you, my little lamb. But I'm sorry to say, I don't really have any experiences to share with you here.

1102705106.speaker: 哈迪斯
1102705106.content: What works on Oneiroi may not work on other kids. Your kid may be bothered by something else entirely.

1102705107.speaker: 哈迪斯
1102705107.content: I've even seen comedies of errors occur between parents and their children because the adults didn't know what the kids were thinking. I can tell you more if you like the next time you come to Omorfies.

1102705108.speaker: 哈迪斯
1102705108.content: But if you really want a suggestion from me, try taking her for a walk.

1102705110.speaker: 哈迪斯
1102705110.content: You're welcome. Anything for my little lamb.

1102705111.speaker: 哈迪斯
1102705111.content: And one more thing: remember to let go at the right time. All you have to do then is to stand right by her.

1102705112.content: Hades hangs up right after this parting shot. I look up just in time to see Leviathan nervously looking at me through the window.

1102705113.content: Once she sees that I'm off the call, she runs over to me and holds my hand, as if she desperately wants to hold on to the opportunity of a break from school.

1102705115.speaker: 我
1102705115.content: Mission accomplished, Officer Leviathan! We're free for the day!

1102705116.speaker: 利维坦
1102705116.content: Awesome! What are we going to do next then?

1102705117.speaker: 我
1102705117.content: Hmm... Since we're already here at the mall, why don't we have a look around?

1102705118.speaker: 利维坦
1102705118.content: Then I hereby appoint #{nickname}# as team leader of our mall expedition. Let's go!

1102705120.content: A few hours later. Leviathan and I finally come upon the rare resting spot tucked between the endless rows of shops in the mall.

1102705121.content: We start dashing at these seats at almost the same time.

1102705122.speaker: 我
1102705122.content: Oof... I take back what I said before. That's lots to look at and buy here, that's for sure.

1102705123.speaker: 利维坦
1102705123.content: This place might actually be bigger than the polar region. I'm... bushed.

1102705124.speaker: 我
1102705124.content: I should be the one saying that. I didn't think I was going to buy so many things here.

1102705125.content: I try my best to lift my arms to show her the weight I'm carrying.

1102705126.content: Leviathan turns over and scoots over to me, then puts her hands on both sides of my head to prop herself up. Now she's looking down at my tired self with a rather adorable expression.

1102705128.speaker: 我
1102705128.content: It's my pleasure to serve you, Officer! I'm just glad you found something you like...

1102705129.speaker: 我
1102705129.content: (Hopefully this puts her in a better mood...)

1102705130.speaker: 利维坦
1102705130.content: Hmm... There's one more thing I want to buy.

1102705131.speaker: 利维坦
1102705131.content: Could I trouble you one more time, Admin?

1102705132.speaker: 我
1102705132.content: Let me rest a little more first!

1102705133.content: In the end, my resistance is worn down by a determined and powerful attack. Leviathan takes me by the hand and we walk into a somewhat old-fashioned looking shop.

1102705134.content: Although it appears untended by humans, I see a store assistant mecha stationed at the casher's.

1102705135.content: Leviathan takes me to a certain cabinet where all the animal-ear hats are on displayed. They are so adorable, it's almost unbearable. And from the looks of it, she wants that limited-edition hat that's stocked at the very top.

1102705137.speaker: 我
1102705137.content: That was perfect, Leviathan! 10/10 for the smooth jump and steady landing!

1102705138.speaker: 利维坦
1102705138.content: Heh, of course. My sense of balance is... Hold on! You can't just stand there and watch, Admin!

1102705140.speaker: 利维坦
1102705140.content: Training? What sort of training is this?

1102705141.speaker: 我
1102705141.content: They say that jumping can help you grow taller.

1102705146.speaker: 我
1102705146.content: You can stop now. Usually, store assistant mechas can help... Excuse me, would you help us get that hat at the very top, please?

1102705148.speaker: 利维坦
1102705148.content: Hi, would you help us please? Thank you so much!!!

1102705151.content: It's only when I walk over to the mecha do I see a note stuck to its back saying "Under maintenance, accepts payment only."

1102705152.speaker: 我
1102705152.content: (Clears throat) That's alright, it's not that high up. I should be able to get it.... HURGH!

1102705153.content: Unsurprisingly, I fail in my attempt. Even my landing is wobbly.

1102705154.content: I'm not sure if it's because I've exhausted all my energy from the shopping, but there's just that little bit more distance to the hat I can't seem to cover.

1102705156.content: Leviathan quickly takes a step forward to grab hold of my hand. After confirming that I'm not hurt, she carefully helps me up.

1102705157.speaker: 利维坦
1102705157.content: Don't worry, I won't tell the others that you fell right on your bum back there!

1102705158.speaker: 我
1102705158.content: Was that meant to make me feel better?

1102705159.speaker: 利维坦
1102705159.content: Mmhmm! What a pity though, you were so close.

1102705160.speaker: 利维坦
1102705160.content: If only your arm were just that little bit longer, Admin!

1102705161.speaker: 我
1102705161.content: I wouldn't have become the Admin then... Wait, did you just say that I was just that little bit short?

1102705162.speaker: 利维坦
1102705162.content: That's right! I'm pretty sure about that. Just a little bit more, and you'd have touched it!

1102705163.speaker: 我
1102705163.content: Hmm... I do have a way to extend my reach.

1102705164.content: Two minutes later. I'm staggering with every step I take, and trying my best to maintain my balance.

1102705165.speaker: 利维坦
1102705165.content: Don't fall on your bum again now, Admin!

1102705167.content: Having heard my response, Leviathan slowly stands up on my shoulders to reach out to the top.

1102705168.speaker: 利维坦
1102705168.content: To the left, to the left... um... no, to the right...

1102705169.speaker: 我
1102705169.content: As I can't lift up my head to look, all I can do is to shuffle left and right according to Leviathan's directions.

1102705170.speaker: 利维坦
1102705170.content: It's not working. We're still a little short. Keep going at it, Admin!

1102705171.speaker: 我
1102705171.content: This is the tallest I can go...

1102705172.speaker: 利维坦
1102705172.content: But... we're just a little bit short!!!

1102705174.content: The weight on my shoulders sink for a moment, and then disappear completely. I look up to see Leviathan taking off beautifully in the air...

1102705175.content: Although I feel a moment of joy as I see her successfully make a grab for the hat, I soon discover that she's also lost her footing, and instinctively hold my hands out to her.

1102705176.speaker: 利维坦
1102705176.content: That was a swift and decisive action on your part, team leader. 10/10 for the perfect catch!

1102705177.speaker: 我
1102705177.content: Of course, I—— No, no, no! Why did you jump??? That was a very dangerous thing you did there!

1102705178.speaker: 利维坦
1102705178.content: But that's because... I was already almost there. Besides, I knew you'd catch me, Admin.

1102705179.speaker: 利维坦
1102705179.content: And look at this, Admin! I got it!!!

1102705180.content: Leviathan lays on my arm and swings her calves freely as she holds her trophy high with both hands. She is smiling broadly.

1102705181.speaker: 我
1102705181.content: It's just a hat. What if you got hurt because of it?

1102705184.speaker: 利维坦
1102705184.content: Lean in, Admin, and I'll tell you.

1102705185.content: Just as I think I'm going to hear some earth-shattering secret, Leviathan puts the animal-ear hat she just got onto my head.

1102705186.speaker: 利维坦
1102705186.content: Because this is the gift I wanted to get you, Admin! Now we have the same hat!

1102705187.speaker: 利维坦
1102705187.content: Mmm, it looks really good on you, Admin.

1102705188.speaker: 我
1102705188.content: Why the sudden gift for me?

1102705189.content: Leviathan blinks a little and then wraps her arms around my neck.

1102705190.speaker: 利维坦
1102705190.content: Because I wanted to thank you, Admin, for spending so much time with me today.

1102705191.speaker: 利维坦
1102705191.content: I know it was wrong of me to sneak out of school. I made you worry, too.

1102705192.speaker: 利维坦
1102705192.content: Now that I've given you this hat, would you forgive me? I don't want you to dislike me, Admin...

1102705193.content: After saying this, Leviathan jumps off me and stands there with her head lowered, waiting for my answer.

1102705195.content: I instinctively reach for her head. Perhaps it was her earnestness that did it, or perhaps her tone of voice was just too cute to resist.

1102705197.content: Despite her earnestness, the consequences of her sneaking out could have been very bad.

1102705200.speaker: 我
1102705200.content: But no matter what, thank you for the gift.

1102705201.content: Leviathan visibly relaxes and comes back to life when she hears my response. After we pay up at the shopping assistant mecha's, she drags me out of the mall with a look of great satisfaction on her face.

1102705202.speaker: 我
1102705202.content: So what are we doing next?

1102705203.speaker: 利维坦
1102705203.content: Mmm... Let's head back, Admin. I've had enough fun today.

1102705204.speaker: 我
1102705204.content: You'll have to start studying once we're back. There's a lot you have to catch up on today.

1102705206.speaker: 我
1102705206.content: Don't worry, I'll help you if there's something you don't understand.

1102705207.speaker: 我
1102705207.content: You were saying that you were very close to passing the test? Think back to when we were reaching for the hat.

1102705208.speaker: 我
1102705208.content: As long as we work together, nothing is too difficult!

1102705210.content: As I feel Leviathan's warmth in my arms and see her shining, starry eyes, I make a mental note to cancel my appointments for the evening.

1102705211.speaker: 利维坦
1102705211.content: I see. So for this equation, I have to use this formula instead. I have to do this, then this... Aha! I solved it!

1102705212.speaker: 利维坦
1102705212.content: I got it! It's like fishing for shrimp under the ice: it's super easy once you find the right way!

1102705213.speaker: 利维坦
1102705213.content: And now it's time to battle the giant penguin...

1102705216.content: All in all, despite her seemingly unreliable answers, we've done just enough to help Leviathan make up for the lost day of school. As for her, she's already slumped over the desk and fallen asleep after the tutoring session.

1102705217.content: I try my best to put her in a more comfortable sleeping position, then cover her with a quilt. Just as I'm about to leave, I feel a tug on my clothes.

1102705218.speaker: 利维坦
1102705218.content: Ad... min... would you come see me... tomorrow, too?

1102705219.content: Yes, I will. I'll come look in on you every day.

1102705220.content: I hear no further response from the sleeping child, though there is a smile on her face.

1102706002.speaker: 利维坦
1102706002.content: Just a second, Admin. I'll be with you soon as my bag is packed!

1102706003.content: Since that incident, for some reason Leviathan has become closer to me. Naturally, the job of picking her up from school has also fallen on me at some point.

1102706004.content: We walk back under the setting sun as usual. But today, Leviathan does not run ahead of me. Instead, she's trailing some distance behind me.

1102706006.speaker: 利维坦
1102706006.content: Wow, Admin, how did you know that I was thinking about something?

1102706007.speaker: 我
1102706007.content: It's written all over your face. Vidar won't be back so soon, you know.

1102706008.speaker: 利维坦
1102706008.content: I know that. Master has already told me!

1102706009.speaker: 利维坦
1102706009.content: So you're thinking about something else... Ah. You have a test at school tomorrow, Leviathan.

1102706011.speaker: 利维坦
1102706011.content: Aren't you worried at all, Admin?

1102706012.speaker: 我
1102706012.content: You're the one who's sitting for the test, Leviathan. Besides, I've been tutoring you every evening, and I have confidence in you.

1102706013.speaker: 利维坦
1102706013.content: But there are so many things I still don't quite understand.

1102706014.content: Her footsteps are heavy and deliberate, as if she's making an important decision with each step.

1102706015.speaker: 我
1102706015.content: It'll take time to master all that knowledge.

1102706016.speaker: 利维坦
1102706016.content: But I won't be able to pass the test then.

1102706017.speaker: 我
1102706017.content: Are you so unsure of yourself, Leviathan?

1102706018.speaker: 利维坦
1102706018.content: Mmm... If I don't pass this time, I can't go out on missions again.

1102706019.speaker: 利维坦
1102706019.content: Master told me that the data from this polar mission will have an impact on many things. Everyone seems to be very busy lately, and I just want to help.

1102706020.speaker: 利维坦
1102706020.content: At the very least, I don't want to fall behind...

1102706021.content: I lean over and pat Leviathan on the head, and she takes this opportunity to grab hold of my hand.

1102706022.speaker: 利维坦
1102706022.content: Do you think I will pass this time, Admin?

1102706024.speaker: 利维坦
1102706024.content: Okay... since you say that, Admin.

1102706025.speaker: 利维坦
1102706025.content: Race you back to the office!

1102706027.content: Leviathan turns back to look at me with this adorable and slightly apologetic smile. It's impossible to stay mad at that face.

1102706028.content: I arrive at my office huffing and puffing. Leviathan is already in her seat, carefully reading the exercises on the screen.

1102706030.speaker: 我
1102706030.content: That doesn't count! We'll have a redo tomorrow!

1102706031.speaker: 利维坦
1102706031.content: No problem! I'll ace both the test and the race tomorrow!

1102706032.content: Leviathan, who made such a bold declaration just the day before, is now sobbing loudly in front of me. She is soaked all over.

1102706035.speaker: 宁希达
1102706035.content: I saw lil' Leviathan standing at the door just now. But she just refused to come in no matter how many times I asked.

1102706036.speaker: 宁希达
1102706036.content: I had to bring her to you as it's raining real hard outside and she doesn't have an umbrella on her.

1102706037.speaker: 我
1102706037.content: Thanks a lot, Ningishzida. I was wondering why she wasn't back from school yet.

1102706038.speaker: 宁希达
1102706038.content: Get her to take a hot bath first. It's important that she doesn't get a chill. And bring her to me later if she doesn't feel well!

1102706040.speaker: 我
1102706040.content: You can tell me later. You heard Ningishzida. How about you go get a hot bath first?

1102706042.content: I must have paced the entrance to the bathroom for around 40 times when I finally hear Leviathan's timid voice from behind the door.

1102706043.speaker: 利维坦
1102706043.content: You can come in now, Admin.

1102706044.speaker: 我
1102706044.content: But you haven't blown dry your hair yet, have you?

1102706045.speaker: 利维坦
1102706045.content: I can't find the hair brush and hair dryer... my Master usually dries my hair for me.

1102706046.content: She's hiding behind the bathroom door, leaving only half of her hand resting on the door frame. It's as if she's afraid of wetting the floor with the water dripping from her hair.

1102706047.speaker: 我
1102706047.content: Just come over here and sit first. I don't know how Vidar does things, but I should be able to help with a basic brushing and blow dry.

1102706048.content: Leviathan nods obediently, then starts shuffling in that comically big T-shirt of hers that's almost touching the floor.

1102706049.speaker: 我
1102706049.content: Yeah, that shirt is a little too big for you.

1102706050.speaker: 利维坦
1102706050.content: That's okay. Now it fits just right.

1102706051.content: Leviathan tucks her body, covers it with the bottom of the shirt, hugs her knees, and curls up on the chair into a ball.

1102706052.speaker: 我
1102706052.content: Now you really look like a penguin, Leviathan.

1102706053.speaker: 利维坦
1102706053.content: A-a-a penguin?! You take that back!

1102706054.speaker: 我
1102706054.content: Okay, okay, you don't. I need you to just sit there and not move. I'm going to blow dry your hair now.

1102706055.speaker: 利维坦
1102706055.content: Mmm this feels so nice and warm...

1102706058.speaker: 我
1102706058.content: You know, if you keep speaking into the hair dryer like that you'll never grow tall.

1102706059.speaker: 利维坦
1102706059.content: That won't do! I want to be tall, really tall!

1102706060.speaker: 我
1102706060.content: But you look so adorable just the way you are now, Leviathan...

1102706061.speaker: 利维坦
1102706061.content: No! I want to be tall! I want to be tall like Master and like you, Admin!

1102706062.speaker: 利维坦
1102706062.content: How else am I supposed to fight alongside you, "shoulder to shoulder"...?

1102706063.speaker: 我
1102706063.content: Well, standing out there in the rain isn't exactly "shoulder to shoulder" either.

1102706064.speaker: 我
1102706064.content: Let me guess: is this about the test?

1102706066.content: Seeing that the dam is about to burst again, I quickly wipe away her brimming tears with the tissue in my hand.

1102706068.speaker: 利维坦
1102706068.content: No, no, not at all, Admin. It's just that when I see the test questions, I can't remember anything.

1102706069.content: I comb through the knots in Leviathan's hair with some effort, then hold her silver hair in my hands to begin the next step of brushing.

1102706071.speaker: 利维坦
1102706071.content: Hmm... I just keep thinking that I could have answered the questions better.

1102706072.speaker: 利维坦
1102706072.content: But you weren't around to tell me when I'd gone wrong.

1102706073.speaker: 利维坦
1102706073.content: And then I thought, what if... what if I fail the test again this time? Would Admin come to see me again...?

1102706074.speaker: 我
1102706074.content: Move a little to the left, would you?

1102706076.content: Even though we are on an emotionally charged topic, Leviathan is still like a submissive little animal, readily and obediently adjusting her sitting position as instructed.

1102706077.content: The last trace of annoyance in my heart disappears at this moment. I let go of Leviathan's hair, then come to a squat in front of Leviathan.

1102706078.speaker: 我
1102706078.content: But why would you think that way, Leviathan? I'm still here, aren't I?

1102706079.content: She jumps on me, her still-damp hair notwithstanding.

1102706080.speaker: 利维坦
1102706080.content: Because you'd gone through those questions with me, Admin.

1102706081.speaker: 利维坦
1102706081.content: But I just can't seem to answer them when you're not with me.

1102706082.content: Leviathan lowers his head and hugs me even tighter.

1102706083.speaker: 信纸字
1102706083.content: And one more thing: remember to let go at the right time. All you have to do then is to stand right by her.

1102706084.content: I recall Hades's parting shot that day, and her little chuckle, and suddenly realize what she meant.

1102706085.speaker: 我
1102706085.content: (Did I... cause her to be overly reliant on me?)

1102706086.speaker: 利维坦
1102706086.content: Why are you being so quiet, Admin?

1102706088.speaker: 我
1102706088.content: I admit that I'm feeling a little mad. But that's because you allowed yourself to be drenched in the rain, Leviathan.

1102706089.speaker: 我
1102706089.content: The problem of the test results aside, what am I going to do if you fall ill?

1102706090.content: Even as I lecture Leviathan with my chin held haughtily high, however, I take a secret glance at her. She's looking a little nervous, alright.

1102706091.speaker: 我
1102706091.content: However, if you promise to come somewhere with me now, I also promise you not to get mad. How about that?

1102706093.speaker: 我
1102706093.content: Excellent, Leviathan! But first, let's dry your hair.

1102706094.content: Half an hour later, Leviathan and I arrive at the new video arcade at the mall. This time round, because I'm with her, she's quickly allowed inside.

1102706096.speaker: 利维坦
1102706096.content: Admin, this is the video arcade...

1102706097.content: From the look of excitement in her eyes, it's clear that she's long forgotten the last commotion that was centered on her.

1102706098.speaker: 我
1102706098.content: That's right. Is this your first time here? You can play any of the games here.

1102706103.speaker: 利维坦
1102706103.content: Awesome!!! But I've only seen Zenki play before... Is it difficult?

1102706104.speaker: 我
1102706104.content: I'm sure you'll pick it up just fine, Leviathan. Come on, go!

1102706105.content: And indeed, after a couple of learning rounds she's starting to leave high scores on the machines.

1102706106.speaker: 我
1102706106.content: Okay, first all, imagine that it's the Big Meanie Penguin. Then, gather all your strength and——

1102706108.content: The message "Display Error" immediately appears on the tally screen.

1102706109.speaker: 利维坦
1102706109.content: Did I do it, Admin? Did I manage to beat that meanie penguin after all?

1102706110.speaker: 我
1102706110.content: (Coughs) Y-yes... you did it. I knew you could do it, Leviathan.

1102706111.speaker: 利维坦
1102706111.content: It's all thanks to you, Admin!

1102706112.speaker: 我
1102706112.content: Oh? But I think this is thanks to your hard work actually.

1102706114.content: Leviathan cocks her little head to one side, looking rather puzzled.

1102706115.speaker: 利维坦
1102706115.content: I think it's because you're a good tutor, Admin. After all, I couldn't have done anything had I been by myself.

1102706116.speaker: 利维坦
1102706116.content: It's just like how at the pole... Master drove away all the penguins...

1102706118.speaker: 利维坦
1102706118.content: I'm here, I'm here! You have to teach me how to play that, Admin!

1102706119.content: This is what will turn out to be a massive streak on Leviathan's part. Not only does she achieve a string of high scores, she even completely dominates the high score board on one machine.

1102706120.content: However, she keeps saying this is all thanks to me, which makes me a concerned about the purpose of this outing.

1102706121.speaker: 利维坦
1102706121.content: I think we're almost at the exit, Admin.

1102706122.speaker: 我
1102706122.content: Ooh... That means there's only one thing left to play.

1102706123.speaker: 店员
1102706123.content: Please put on the game glasses before you play Snow Wars. Is this your first time playing this?

1102706125.speaker: 店员
1102706125.content: Then allow me to give you a quick intro. You are two special agents who will help each other escape an experiment zone which is located at the pole.

1102706126.speaker: 店员
1102706126.content: Do note that you will play in separate areas. Do not leave your respective areas during the game.

1102706127.speaker: 店员
1102706127.content: As you try to escape, you will encounter monsters along the way. Enjoy this highly immersive experience! Now please come with me...

1102706128.speaker: 利维坦
1102706128.content: Huh? Where are you going, Admin?

1102706129.speaker: 我
1102706129.content: Didn't you hear the intro, Leviathan? We're playing in separate areas. Now I have to get ready on my side.

1102706130.speaker: 利维坦
1102706130.content: Can't you just play here with me, Admin?

1102706131.speaker: 我
1102706131.content: I'm afraid I can't. This is a two-player game, so I'll see you in the game!

1102706133.content: I put on my glasses as instructed by the arcade clerk. It is quite some time before I see Leviathan's avatar stumble into the game lobby with a massive sniper rifle in her arms.

1102706135.speaker: 我
1102706135.content: I see you got the sniper role, Leviathan. Looks really cool.

1102706136.speaker: 利维坦
1102706136.content: But I don't really know how to shoot...

1102706137.speaker: 我
1102706137.content: Don't worry about it. There are some target boards which I think you can use to practice over there.

1102706138.speaker: 我
1102706138.content: Try lifting up the rifle first. Push its stock into your shoulder.

1102706140.content: The sight of the rifle muzzle swinging here and there makes me a little nervous.

1102706141.speaker: 我
1102706141.content: Yes, that's right. Then, once you have your aim, you pull on the trigger an——

1102706142.content: BANG! I hear an explosively loud sound as the shot goes off right by my ear. So this is what that slogan on the poster meant about being "in the thick of the action." The force of the recoil also causes Leviathan to fall backwards to the ground.

1102706143.speaker: 利维坦
1102706143.content: OH MY GOODNESS... Admin!!! Why is there such a big hole in your hat???

1102706144.speaker: 我
1102706144.content: I should be asking you that!!!

1102706145.speaker: 利维坦
1102706145.content: I'm so sorry! I wasn't holding the rifle properly just now! Let me try again!

1102706146.content: Ten minutes later. Leviathan has used up all her ammo, but the target boards look as unmolested as when we began.

1102706148.content: I decide to forget about the game and take off my glasses. I then walk over to where Leviathan is.

1102706149.content: She's still holding up the game prop even though her arms are shaking, and she's trying her best to aim at the target on the screen.

1102706150.content: My body acts before my brain is done processing the scene. I step forward, lean over, and reach out to Leviathan until my hands completely wrap around hers.

1102706151.speaker: 利维坦
1102706151.content: Admin??? Why are you here? Didn't they say that we're not allowed to leave our respective areas...?

1102706152.speaker: 我
1102706152.content: Because I wanted to see if I can help you out here, Leviathan.

1102706153.speaker: 利维坦
1102706153.content: (Whimpers) I'm too stupid for this, aren't I... I mean, you can hit the target boards rather easily...

1102706154.speaker: 我
1102706154.content: I promise you that's not the reason, Leviathan. Didn't you set all those high scores just now?

1102706155.speaker: 利维坦
1102706155.content: But that's because you were next to me...

1102706156.speaker: 我
1102706156.content: So you mean to say that now that I'm here, you can do anything? Is that right, Leviathan?

1102706157.speaker: 利维坦
1102706157.content: Mmhmm! Now I can think straight!

1102706158.speaker: 我
1102706158.content: Are you telling me that you've forgotten all those tips I shared with you just now?

1102706159.speaker: 利维坦
1102706159.content: More or less I guess... But if you're here, Admin, it probably means that you can't play the game anymore...

1102706160.speaker: 我
1102706160.content: Well, since it's a two-player game, it should be fun for both of us, no?

1102706161.speaker: 我
1102706161.content: Besides, I prefer being here with you, Leviathan. I suppose that still makes this a "two-player game."

1102706162.speaker: 我
1102706162.content: Anyway, hand me a gun. I'll be with you when you have to shoot!

1102706165.speaker: 利维坦
1102706165.content: Your hand feels so nice and warm, Admin.

1102706167.speaker: 我
1102706167.content: Alright, here you'll have to jump to dodge! Take aim first before you fire!

1102706168.speaker: 我
1102706168.content: Huh. You're doing just as well as you usually do in training!

1102706169.speaker: 利维坦
1102706169.content: Do you think what we're doing now is cheating, Admin?

1102706171.speaker: 利维坦
1102706171.content: That's good, then! I'm gonna get you, Super Meanie Penguin!!!

1102706172.speaker: 利维坦
1102706172.content: (Ah, for an area attack, I have to roll here to dodge... My ammo! I've run out of ammo...)

1102706173.speaker: 利维坦
1102706173.content: (Hmm, actually this rifle weighs about the same as my Access Key...)

1102706174.content: There is a flash of white on the screen, and the colossal boss crashes into the dust after taking a massive hit from a heavy sniper rifle. Then, the message "Stage Complete" appears.

1102706177.content: I try to force down my chuckle as I look at Leviathan, who's a little stunned. She's finally realized that I've long let go of her hands.

1102706178.speaker: 利维坦
1102706178.content: When did you run away from me, Admin?

1102706179.speaker: 我
1102706179.content: When you were having so much fun in the game.

1102706180.speaker: 利维坦
1102706180.content: So I was the one who took down the boss...

1102706181.speaker: 我
1102706181.content: Yup, and what an awesome job, Leviathan! This win is entirely yours.

1102706182.speaker: 利维坦
1102706182.content: Ah! So that pitiful look of yours was just an act???

1102706184.speaker: 利维坦
1102706184.content: Which means... I beat the Super Meanie Penguin all by myself!

1102706185.speaker: 利维坦
1102706185.content: Were you just watching me play then, Admin?

1102706186.content: I nod, squat down, and reach out to pat the surprised Leviathan on the head.

1102706187.speaker: 我
1102706187.content: I always believed that you could do it, Leviathan. You've never been a child who needs the approval of others.

1102706188.speaker: 我
1102706188.content: Don't you realize that you've already become very good and powerful? In both games and tests alike.

1102706189.speaker: 利维坦
1102706189.content: So you brought me here today to...

1102706190.speaker: 我
1102706190.content: Yeah. I thought it'd be nice for you to see it for yourself.

1102706191.speaker: 我
1102706191.content: And you did do a really good job, didn't you?

1102706194.speaker: 利维坦
1102706194.content: Let's try one more time, Admin!

1102706195.speaker: 利维坦
1102706195.content: "In both games and tests alike"... let's try one more time together, Admin!

1102706199.content: A petite figure wearing an animal hat bursts in through the door. A second or so later I know what it means to be hit by a killer whale on land.

1102706200.speaker: 利维坦
1102706200.content: I have good news to tell you, Admin!

1102706201.speaker: 利维坦
1102706201.content: It's wonderful news... No, it's super awesome news!!!

1102706202.speaker: 我
1102706202.content: Oh? It so happens that I have good news to share with you too, Leviathan.

1102706203.speaker: 利维坦
1102706203.content: Oh, you have good news too? What is it???

1102706205.speaker: 利维坦
1102706205.content: The good news is, I passed my test!

1102706206.speaker: 利维坦
1102706206.content: Although... score-wise it was barely a pass. BUT!!! Your tutoring worked, Admin!

1102706207.speaker: 利维坦
1102706207.content: I could recall the questions this time even without you next to me!

1102706208.content: I'm still seeing stars from that last hit... and a baby killer whale skipping around the room in joy.

1102706209.speaker: 利维坦
1102706209.content: Okay, I'm done. Now it's your turn, Admin!

1102706212.speaker: 我
1102706212.content: In consideration of your outstanding performance, Leviathan, everyone has agreed to let you join the upcoming survey mission!

1102706214.speaker: 我
1102706214.content: Mmhmm. In fact, she fought strongly for you during the meeting and said that you should be given an important task.

1102706215.speaker: 我
1102706215.content: Besides, you have plenty of experience. So we finally decided that you'll be in charge of this survey mission, Leviathan!

1102706216.speaker: 利维坦
1102706216.content: Now I can give everyone a hand!

1102706217.speaker: 我
1102706217.content: Yes, you'll be such a help!

1102706218.speaker: 利维坦
1102706218.content: Does Master think I can do it too?

1102706219.speaker: 我
1102706219.content: Of course. She's always believed in you.

1102706220.speaker: 利维坦
1102706220.content: What about you, Admin... Do you think I'll do a good job this time, too?

1102706223.content: I find a killer whale, sticky and all wrapped around me like chewy candy, on me again.

1102706224.speaker: 我
1102706224.content: But there's one thing you should know. You may have to set off first to the mission location ahead of the rest of the team.

1102706225.speaker: 我
1102706225.content: Do you think... you'll be okay by yourself?

1102706226.speaker: 利维坦
1102706226.content: ... Will you be coming with me then, Admin?

1102706228.speaker: 利维坦
1102706228.content: Then I won't be afraid at all!

1102706229.content: But what if I can't come along for some reason?

1102706231.content: She blinks a little, and looks at me with those little creaturely eyes of hers. Then, she gives me another one of her great killer whale hugs again.

1102706232.speaker: 利维坦
1102706232.content: I know that you'll always be here for me, Admin!

318161002.content: The force of the knock at the door makes it clear who is there. Shu rubs a temple, puts down her documents, then sits up straight.

318161004.speaker: 托尔
318161004.content: What are you playing at, Shu? How long do you plan to keep me hanging around HQ?

318161005.content: The young girl walks up to Shu, pouting and on the attack. But her eyes are more gentle. She's annoyed, not angry.

318161006.speaker: 休
318161006.content: I suspect we've talked about this already... There's been a rash of Cognizant Visbane sightings. Odin's in Jokurr and Ain Soph needs a Mod on hand who could handle Turing.

318161007.speaker: 托尔
318161007.content: Turing, huh? Well, I don't know if I could beat him as such. I'd sure slow him down, though.

318161008.speaker: 托尔
318161008.content: But do we even know where Turing is? Odin sent him packing, remember. What if I'm more use in Sasanami? Admin and Pheasant Squad are there, and who knows what that Child of Heaven thing is, really?

318161009.speaker: 托尔
318161009.content: Anyway, couldn't Missy Mossy fly over and do the guard duty. Maybe you should get her to do some work?

318161010.speaker: 休
318161010.content: Ausar remains unstable. I can't leave such an important job to Osiris.

318161011.speaker: 托尔
318161011.content: Thing is, Lil' Osi came to see me. That's why I'm here.

318161012.speaker: 托尔
318161012.content: "Ausar's made up with me, so I can let her control my body." Her own words.

318161013.speaker: 托尔
318161013.content: I mean, we can't keep on treating her like an invalid, can we? It's not good for her. Verthandi made quick progress when she was new, remember? Why? Because of going on missions with Admin.

318161014.speaker: 托尔
318161014.content: You can't learn if you don't fight, right? It's how we train warriors.

318161015.speaker: 休
318161015.content: A rare speech from you on the value of experience.

318161016.speaker: 托尔
318161016.content: Hey, why so surprised? What do you think I am, some moron who only knows how to fight?

318161018.speaker: 托尔
318161018.content: Whaddya mean, "Hmm"? Are you trying to make me angry?

318161019.speaker: 休
318161019.content: No, no... You are making sense. It's about time we sent Osiris on a few missions.

318161020.speaker: 休
318161020.content: But not this one. Permission denied. Stay put.

318161021.content: Thor sticks out her lower lip, but doesn't argue any further. She didn't expect to get what she wanted anyway. She throws herself onto the nearby sofa and starts playing with the puzzle on the table.

318161022.speaker: 托尔
318161022.content: So what's the latest? Have CORG and The Cryptics come up with any ideas?

318161023.speaker: 休
318161023.content: It's not great. There's no way to monitor what's going on in Sasanami, so they don't even know where to start.

318161024.speaker: 休
318161024.content: The Photon Rail Administration has handed over some material on how the system works and The Cryptics are working with them on figuring out what might have happened. But it's not a quick job.

318161025.speaker: 休
318161025.content: At the end of the day, we simply don't have the intel we need. We've never encountered a situation like this before, we can't reach Odin...

318161026.content: Her right hand, which was about to adjust her spectacles, pauses in mid-air. Shu thinks for a moment, then looks at Thor, who has just completed one side of the puzzle and now has no idea what to do next.

318161027.speaker: 托尔
318161027.content: Why are you looking at me like that? I'll figure it out. I just need a moment.

318161028.speaker: 休
318161028.content: Do you know who's got access to the terminal in Odin's office? Apart from Odin, obviously.

318161029.speaker: 托尔
318161029.content: Huh? How would I know? She doesn't even let anyone else in there... Oh, you're not thinking of breaking in, are you?

318161030.speaker: 休
318161030.content: That terminal would have access to her private archives. That's where all the secret files are kept. And this is no time for keeping secrets.

318161031.speaker: 休
318161031.content: You're responsible for guarding her office, so I need to ask you for permission. Can I go in?

318161032.speaker: 托尔
318161032.content: Can you? Uh... Odin told me to follow your instructions, so I guess you can...

318161033.content: Thor rummages about in a pocket before finding a keycard, which she passes to Shu.

318161034.speaker: 托尔
318161034.content: This will get you in the door. If you set off any alarms or anything, I don't want to know about it.

318161035.speaker: 休
318161035.content: You know, if Odin gets an intruder alert and comes back... might not be a bad thing.

318161036.content: Thor watches as Shu prepares to leave then, scratching her head, puts down the puzzle and calls out to stop her.

318161037.speaker: 托尔
318161037.content: Listen... All I want to do is help people, right? Nobody will let me help and it's super-super-frustrating.

318161038.speaker: 托尔
318161038.content: And you can't keep on doing everything yourself, can you? So if there's anything you need help with, give me a call. And I don't mean just fighting. I have other skills, y'know?

318161039.content: Shu looks at Thor in surprise, her gaze gradually softening. She walks across and straightens Thor's cape for her.

318161040.speaker: 休
318161040.content: Don't you realize how important you are? With Odin away, you're the only person keeping Ain Soph safe.

318161042.content: Shu sits in Odin's chair and sighs.

318161043.content: Normally, she'd be sitting on the other side of this desk. Even she feels a bit anxious sitting where she shouldn't in this room.

318161044.speaker: 休
318161044.content: Okay, identity checks. How hard is this going to be? I wonder if I should call The Cryptics over?

318161045.content: The prompt requesting she verify her ID is flashing, but not with any sense of urgency. Shu hesitates a moment before lifting her palm up to the panel.

318161046.content: Just as she's trying to figure out how she'll get past these checks and what the consequences will be, the panel gives a quiet beep.

318161047.content: The screen lock disappears and, to Shu's amazement, a list of files appears.

318161049.content: She looks at her palm, then at the ID module. Then she smiles a little as she shakes her head.

318161050.speaker: 休
318161050.content: So you gave me access and never thought to mention it? Were you waiting for me to try and break in? How very Odin.

318161051.content: But there's no more time to decide how she feels about this. She starts searching for the info she needs.

318161052.content: Some indeterminate amount of time later...

318161054.content: She's about to stand and leave when Heimdall comes rushing in.

318161055.content: Heimdall's gaze flicks back and forth between Shu and the screen several times, but she doesn't say anything. She just hands Shu the tablet she's carrying.

318161056.speaker: 海姆达尔
318161056.content: Thor told me you might have some new material to work with...

318161057.speaker: 海姆达尔
318161057.content: I've got an idea I need to test out.

318161058.content:
August 17th, 2315.
15:11. On the perimeter of the Photon Rail Nexus.

318161059.content: While the CORG forces are putting their defenses back together, we make use of the extra mobility the Mods give us to push further forward and see what we're facing.

318161060.content: I gun down the Visbanes charging at me and move to Senba's side. It's hard to maintain proper spacing during an assault, so constant awareness and adjustments are essential.

318161061.speaker: 伊邪那美
318161061.content: Stay close, Questioner. The Visbanes seem to have it in for you.

318161063.speaker: 我
318161063.content: This isn't my first rodeo, you know.

318161064.speaker: 我
318161064.content: I'm not worried. I've got you and the others with me.

318161065.speaker: 伊邪那美
318161065.content: Okay. I'll keep an eye on you.

318161066.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318161066.content: I don't think #{nickname}#—is the one who needs to worry!

318161068.content: Sekhmet has grabbed Ningishzida and the smaller girl is trailing behind her like a kite.

318161069.content: Thankfully, Ningishzida can multitask—she's screaming in terror and also maintaining a powerful shield to block the Visbanes. That means Sekhmet can forget defense and wield her Access Key with her remaining hand. It's the only way to ensure Ningishzida doesn't get left behind.

318161070.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318161070.content: You wanted to come with us! Too late to retreat now.

318161071.speaker: 宁希达
318161071.content: Hey, I've been trying to do my best. And I've been some help, haven't I?

318161072.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318161072.content: You're a lot of help. But you do lack combat experience.

318161073.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318161073.content: I'm going to put you down. Stick close and do what I say. Maybe we'll even make a good team. Haha!

318162001.speaker: 宁希达
318162001.content: Do we have to keep going?

318162002.speaker: 我
318162002.content: Now the gear's all in place we can use it to decide.

318162003.speaker: 我
