318162003.content: Things on the outskirts look simple enough. A few Visbanes hanging around, but nothing we can't handle. If we head inside, though...

318162004.speaker: 伊邪那美
318162004.content: The inside... I've got a bad feeling about that.

318162005.speaker: 我
318162005.content: Let's head back and wait for CORG to get their defenses back up. That'll give us a chance to call Ain Soph and see what Shu thinks.

318162007.content: The Visbanes don't pursue as we fall back to the CORG lines. It's like they're focused on guarding something inside the Photon Rail Nexus.

318162008.content: I wake up Mimir, which has been hibernating to save power, and we make contact with Shu and brief her on our team's progress and the situation at the Nexus.

318162009.speaker: 休
318162009.content: You've had a tough time, Ningishzida.

318162010.speaker: 宁希达
318162010.content: Oh, I didn't do anything. I'm sure anyone else would have been a better choice, but I was here, so...

318162011.speaker: 休
318162011.content: Well, we're short of hands, so you'll have to help out on the front lines.

318162012.speaker: 宁希达
318162012.content: Yeah. Well, I won't abandon them if they don't abandon me!

318162013.speaker: 休
318162013.content: Okay, intel time. Have you got any way of telling what's happening inside the station?

318162014.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318162014.content: Unfortunately, all the monitoring gear in there has been destroyed. Not just the public stuff either, even our covert gear.

318162015.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318162015.content: Which makes sense if the Child of Heaven is behind this. She knows more about human security systems than most humans.

318162016.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318162016.content: If you want intel I can go in and find some for you.

318162017.speaker: 休
318162017.content: Let's not take any unnecessary risks. The fact they're being so secretive already confirms what I'd concluded here.

318162018.speaker: 休
318162018.content: CORG's R&D department has concluded that the Photon Rail network itself is in good condition and the computing port linking to Sasanami is working as it should.

318162019.speaker: 休
318162019.content: The network should be able to self-correct if a Sephirah Zone connection becomes unstable. Imagine magnets in a magnetic field—they'll automatically find a stable configuration.

318162020.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318162020.content: So the magnets are still there, but... they're not attracting each other?

318162021.speaker: 休
318162021.content: Yes. The computing port the Photon Rail uses is actually the same link Gaea uses between Sephirah Zones. The fact Thor was unable to find Sasanami in the Source Layer indicates the link has been completely severed.

318162022.speaker: 休
318162022.content: And according to... our records, the most likely cause of that is Bane Energy. The computing power normally delivered through that port must have been redirected elsewhere.

318162023.speaker: 休
318162023.content: If we could see what is going on in the station we might be able to figure out what that computing power is being used for.

318162025.speaker: 休
318162025.content: Bane Energy is a kind of loophole in the Gaea system. But Aether Gazer has no record of it being intelligent enough to come up with a plan like this, or be powerful enough to actually follow through.

318162026.speaker: 休
318162026.content: Currently, the situation is temporary. But if things stay like this then Sasanami will run out of control, becoming a new and independent realm outside of Gaea.

318162027.speaker: 休
318162027.content: And I'm worried the Child of Heaven plans to be the god of that new world.

318171001.speaker: 我
318171001.content: The god... of a new world...?

318171002.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171002.content: It started out as a made-up legend. But she's heard it enough times to believe it now.

318171003.speaker: 我
318171003.content: Do we have a solution right now?

318171004.speaker: 休
318171004.content: The Cryptics and CORG ran a few simulations together and they've found a fairly feasible method. Apparently, what it does is—

318171006.content: I find myself looking straight at Heimdall with her keen eyes.

318171007.speaker: 我
318171007.content: I'm not sure why, but just seeing Heimdall's face on comms makes me feel like I now know a lot.

318171008.speaker: 海姆达尔
318171008.content: What I'd really like is to directly download the information into Admin's head. We should get Ookuninushi to look into the feasibility of this.

318171010.speaker: 海姆达尔
318171010.content: Shu's already told you that Sasanami has disappeared due to a failure in the automatic calibration of the computing port.

318171011.speaker: 海姆达尔
318171011.content: If we can somehow remove this block, for example by killing the "Child of Heaven" you were talking about, we should then see Sasanami automatically return to the Photon Rail network.

318171012.speaker: 海姆达尔
318171012.content: But even if we can't address the root cause, there's still a way around it. As long as both sides can lock in on each other's positions, then... the technicians at the Photon Rail stations can perform manual interfacing.

318171013.speaker: 我
318171013.content: You mean to say that we'll still have to enter the Photon Rail station then?

318171014.speaker: 海姆达尔
318171014.content: To be precise, you'll have to locate the main control unit inside the Photon Rail station. Ideally, you do that and then complete the interfacing process without the Visbanes ever knowing you were there.

318171015.speaker: 海姆达尔
318171015.content: CORG HQ has sent over an elite team to help. Even OPRICS has sent over a number of their folks.

318171016.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171016.content: ... And now they're finally willing to help.

318171018.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171018.content: They're our most elite guard force. It's no surprise that you haven't heard of them. Their members include CORG's best Modifier and human soldiers.

318171019.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171019.content: While they're nominally commanded by President Red Fox, they actually report to the Council of Observators. They need the council's say-so before they can go on any mission.

318171020.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171020.content: Then, we can leave the Child of Heaven to those freaks... Of course, assuming that they actually make it here.

318171021.speaker: 海姆达尔
318171021.content: That's all the info I can give you. If you think the plan is doable, I will let the Photon Rail station folks know and have them get ready.

318171023.content: As the call is cut, I look over at Sekhmet. Having given Heimdall the affirmative on my behalf, she knows exactly what it means.

318171024.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171024.content: There is a technician in the camp who's responsible for the maintenance of the main control unit. Our task is to take him inside.

318171025.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171025.content: I couldn't think of a reason to say no. It's better to have a clear and simple goal instead of having to feel our way in the dark.

318171026.speaker: 我
318171026.content: If the Photon Rail Nexus is really as important as Shu and Heimdall say, the Child of Heaven will only value it even more than we do.

318171027.speaker: 我
318171027.content: But look at the data the Bane Energy detector is sending back... Senba has also said that it felt dangerous inside. The Bane Energy signal is so massive, I wouldn't be surprised if the Child of Heaven herself were inside.

318171028.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171028.content: That's a good thing, isn't it? Then we can also tackle the root cause of our problem.

318171029.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171029.content: Let's not even talk about whether we can win. If the Child of Heaven isn't inside, our best option is to go in and reconnect the Photon Rail.

318171030.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171030.content: If the Child of Heaven is inside and we choose not to go in because we're afraid, eventually we'll still have to face her, but by that time we'll be weak and without any help.

318171031.speaker: 我
318171031.content: So we never really had a choice, then.

318171032.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171032.content: Yeah. I believe you understand the situation we're in.

318171033.speaker: 我
318171033.content: (Maybe our true enemy is not the Child of Heaven? Maybe there's a better way out than reconnecting to the Photon Rail...?)

318171034.speaker: 我
318171034.content: I suppose to object without justification is a pretty churlish thing to do, isn't it...

318171035.content: I let out a sigh, and look at Izanami and Ningishzida, who are sitting next to me.

318171036.speaker: 宁希达
318171036.content: Anything goes for me. Just tell me what you need me to do.

318171037.speaker: 伊邪那美
318171037.content: Take me with you if you decide to go.

318171038.speaker: 伊邪那美
318171038.content: But my purpose is revenge, not sacrifice. If you aren't confident about taking on four mountain gods at the same time, I'd suggest that you retreat should you run into the Child of Heaven.

318171040.speaker: 伊邪那美
318171040.content: ... I'm sorry, Miss Investigator, what did you just say...?

318171041.content: We look at Sekhmet in confusion, as the meaning of her words isn't immediately apparent to us.

318171042.content: Sekhmet frowns, then looks away for a while. She then lets out a sigh, and points to the cuff on her left wrist with her other hand.

318171043.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171043.content: I don't think I've ever told you what this is.

318171045.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171045.content: Oh? Did you hear me talking to myself at the Karasugo mansion?

318171047.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171047.content: I decided to bring it along with me in case we run into something like Turing. It's said to have "four times the power of a mountain god," which means we might not lose.

318171048.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171048.content: I didn't get the chance to use it against the Deer God and the Crow God, as they couldn't be defeated by sheer force alone. It's been a real pity so far.

318171049.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171049.content: It feels... pretty lousy to do something only for it to go to waste.

318171050.content: Sekhmet goes to look in on the rest of the Photon Rail garrison and the reconstruction of the frontline. After that, a few of us gather again and fall into deep thought as we look at the map of Sasanami on the screen.

318171051.speaker: 宁希达
318171051.content: Since the Photon Rail Nexus is so important, maybe we should wait for Pheasant Squad to return first?

318171052.speaker: 我
318171052.content: We don't know when we'll hear from them. We can't plan this mission on the assumption that they can join us.

318171053.speaker: 我
318171053.content: Besides, things aren't simple over at the Imperial City, either. After all, it's where the Child of Heaven has been seated for hundreds of years. Who knows what scheme or backstop they'll run into.

318171054.speaker: 宁希达
318171054.content: Ugh... You're right, Admin. My heart is beating so fast. I just keep thinking that it's better for everyone to be together.

318171055.speaker: 宁希达
318171055.content: Then, our friend in Shimogyou won't be able to join us too, then?

318171056.speaker: 伊邪那美
318171056.content: Shimogyou is too far from here. Now that the Karasugo have officially been labelled as traitors, not even my brother will be able to convince the people.

318171057.speaker: 我
318171057.content: Not to worry, we still have someone in Shimogyou anyway. As long as the Child of Heaven doesn't abandon the Imperial City and the Photon Rail Nexus for Shimogyou, we should be alright.

318171058.speaker: 我
318171058.content: Not only are we looking at a complex situation here, there're also loads of civilians in Shimogyou to consider. We have to go slow no matter what.

318171060.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171060.content: Yes, we're being forced to split up into three groups because of the Child of Heaven. But doing so also allows us to observe her.

318171061.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171061.content: Given the great many unknowns in this situation, staying cautious and observing her is the best course of action. If we lose any one of our three sources of information, we'll only be even more disadvantaged.

318171062.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171062.content: But... once everything is made clear and the Child of Heaven comes out of hiding, we can gather everyone for the big battle.

318171063.speaker: 我
318171063.content: That the Child of Heaven remains in hiding does give us some time. But why would—

318171065.content: Ningishzida, who was still distressed by the situation just moments before, immediately turns her head when she hears the call.

318171067.speaker: 科尔盖士官
318171067.content: Someone's passed out. But they were alright just a while ago...

318171068.speaker: 宁希达
318171068.content: Oh, okay. Calm down. I'll go take a look now.

318171069.content: Sekhmet shakes her head as she watches Ningishzida leave.

318171070.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171070.content: Of course the Child of Heaven wouldn't want to give us more time... Everyone still has a chance. It just depends on who's faster.

318171071.content: We open up the Photon Rail Nexus map again and hammer out our plan. Try as we might, however, we simply cannot find a way to defeat more with less.

318171072.content: Then all of a sudden, there is a distant rumble.

318171074.content: Even in the daylight, one can clearly see the great ball of fire that has just exploded above Reiten. Streams of flame mixed with red Bane Energy are coming down onto the city.

318171075.speaker: 我
318171075.content: Is the Imperial City... under attack?!

318171076.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318171076.content: Looks like the Child of Heaven doesn't want to give us any more time.

318171078.content: Ningishzida is looking all pale. She's run all the way here to look for help.

318171080.speaker: 我
318171080.content: Take a deep breath, then tell me slowly.

318171081.speaker: 宁希达
318171081.content: The communications in Reiten have been restored, and the Modifier we met the other time says that the large vortex above the Imperial City has exploded, and the city has more or less been flattened.

318171083.content: I can feel my heart sink as I turn on my communicator. There are no pending requests from Pheasant Squad, and no one is answering my calls, either.

318171084.content: Ningishzida slowly stiffens as she watches me and realizes what is going on.

318171085.speaker: 宁希达
318171085.content: Um... should we give them more time? I know we said to contact us as soon as comms are back up, but it's only been a few minutes.

318171086.speaker: 宁希达
318171086.content: Maybe they've turned off their communicator to maintain operational silence... or maybe they've dropped it somewhere... (Sobs)

318171087.speaker: 我
318171087.content: ... Ningishzida, you've been at the medical center for quite a while now. What do you think of Pheasant Squad?

318171088.speaker: 宁希达
318171088.content: Why would you ask me... Well, I feel that they're really reliable. Like, you can totally count on them.

318171089.speaker: 我
318171089.content: That's right. We can count on them. They always complete their missions in the most professional manner and come back safe and sound each time.

318171090.content: I can see Tsukuyomi, Buzenbo, and Kuninotokotachi in my mind's eye. I reiterate my stance.

318171091.speaker: 我
318171091.content: I believe in them. If we aren't hearing from them, it's because they're unable to contact us for some reason. But together, the three of them... will always deliver.

318171093.speaker: 我
318171093.content: We have to stick to the plan and keep on moving. Otherwise their efforts in the Imperial City will only go to waste.

318171094.speaker: 我
318171094.content: I know we'll get good news from them.

318181002.content: After having made the preparations in front of the city wall, Kagutsuchi rushes all the way back to the agreed meeting point.

318181003.content: Though he has already tried to talk some folks around, now many are shunning Kagutsuchi, as if even perfunctory contact with him would give them the plague.

318181004.speaker: 迦具土
318181004.content: The label "Karasugo traitor" is even more powerful than the Night Parade of the Beasts.

318181005.speaker: 迦具土
318181005.content: Hey, um... Do you need any help over there, ma'am?

318181007.speaker: 迦具土
318181007.content: That looks really heavy, though. I can help you...

318181008.speaker: 婆婆
318181008.content: No, no, no... Don't you touch anything!!!

318181010.content: With the smile still on his face, Kagutsuchi quickly loads the two heaviest items into the car, then turns back to where he came from.

318181011.content: He sees a man in the distance, sitting slumped on the ground at the appointed location. It takes him a few seconds before he realizes that the man is Karasugo Sendou.

318181013.content: Though Karasugo Sendou was never his true Lord, in Kagutsuchi's mind he has always been the picture of quiet authority.

318181014.content: After a moment of hesitation, Kagutsuchi brushes a vegetable leaf off Karasugo Sendou's shoulder.

318181015.speaker: 迦具土
318181015.content: Things aren't going well for you too, I'm guessing?

318181016.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318181016.content: Well... As soon as the civilians hear that I'm from the Karasugo family they just turn around and leave. As for the Akishika, as you know, they just can't be found. Not when they're determined to hide in a place as big as this.

318181017.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318181017.content: Forget about getting the people to evacuate. I'm afraid not even one person will listen even if all you're asking them to do is to hide at home before the Imperial Army comes.

318181018.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318181018.content: I told our men to try and stop some civilians first, but the civilians started flashing their weapons and we weren't exactly going to fight them. Reasoning with them is even more...

318181019.speaker: 迦具土
318181019.content: The residents of Shimogyou... have a simple outlook on life indeed.

318181020.speaker: 迦具土
318181020.content: While the police commander here was unwilling to confront us, he had no intention of cooperating either. He turned tail as soon as he saw us. Though by doing so, he also gave us control of a crucial part of the city wall.

318181021.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318181021.content: Good. That buys us some time. Thank you for your hard work.

318181022.content: Karasugo Sendou smiles wanly, though he shows no inclination to get up. After a moment of silence, Kagutsuchi plucks a blade of grass from the roadside, puts one end in his mouth, and sits down next to Karasugo Sendou.

318181023.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318181023.content: The ground's all dusty. Are you sure you don't want to sweep it clean first?

318181024.speaker: 迦具土
318181024.content: I thought you wouldn't care about that since you're already sitting there anyway.

318181025.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318181025.content: ... You're right. I mean, I'm already down here, aren't I?

318181026.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318181026.content: And there's probably no way of getting back up now.

318181027.speaker: 迦具土
318181027.content: That's not what I mean. We all know that you've done a lot.

318181028.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318181028.content: A lot? And who did all those things? Me, Karasugo Sendou, or the Lord of the Karasugo family?

318181029.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318181029.content: ... I was born the heir of the Karasugo family, and became its Lord while I was still in my teens. One wave of my arm, and I'll have countless servants scrambling to meet my every whim.

318181030.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318181030.content: You know, when I trained you lot to kill the Crow God back then, I genuinely thought I'd pull off something that none of my ancestors could ever do...

318181031.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318181031.content: Tell me, Kagutsuchi: am I truly a nobody without the title of Lord Karasugo?

318181032.speaker: 迦具土
318181032.content: Karasugo-sama, we are all somebody in our own right.

318181033.content: Kagutsuchi looks at Karasugo Sendou seriously for a moment, tosses the blade of grass in his mouth to the ground, and looks up at the piece of sky visible between the streets.

318181034.speaker: 迦具土
318181034.content: Back then, I was ranked last among the Mihakashisyuu, and just trying to survive took all that I had. But even then, there were people who thought me as a precious friend.

318181035.speaker: 迦具土
318181035.content: Karasugo-sama, you still have your family, your knowledge, and your courage. Besides, the title of Lord Karasugo represents not just power but also responsibility.

318181036.speaker: 迦具土
318181036.content: Aren't you fulfilling your responsibility now, out of your own free will?

318181037.content: Karasugo Sendou makes no reply to Kagutsuchi. Instead, he also gazes at the sky above the streets, though he's not sure what he should be looking at.

318181038.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318181038.content: Kagutsuchi. That time... how did you make it out? Was it because you've awakened?

318181039.speaker: 迦具土
318181039.content: Ha ha... Modifier Awakenings aren't that magical. I've no way to leave my past behind or forget all my troubles.

318181040.speaker: 迦具土
318181040.content: Maybe like most people, we just keep moving forward from day to day.

318181041.content: Then, there is a sound from Kagutsuchi's communicator, and the expression on his face immediately changes. He cocks his ear to listen.

318181042.speaker: 迦具土
318181042.content: The advance force of the Imperial Army is almost at the city wall. I have to go there with Kyū Squad now.

318181043.speaker: 迦具土
318181043.content: You can stop the advance force, but not the ones behind them. We can't just give up on evacuating the civilians. I'll have to ask you to—

318181044.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318181044.content: I'm coming with you to the frontline as well.

318181045.content: Karasugo Sendou has already risen to his feet.

318181046.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318181046.content: Once we take care of the advance force, we'll have more time to evacuate the civilians.

318181047.speaker: 迦具土
318181047.content: Karasugo-sama, it's really dangerous over there. Plus, you haven't recovered, have you?

318181048.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318181048.content: I'm fine... I must keep moving forward.

318181049.speaker: 下京区居民A
318181049.content: Did you see that? Some of those Karasugo characters are heading towards the city wall again.

318181050.speaker: 下京区居民B
318181050.content: What are they doing? Do they want to take over control of Shimogyou's city wall? Or even the whole of Shimogyou???

318181051.speaker: 下京区居民B
318181051.content: The Karasugo are traitors indeed! What do we do now?

318181052.speaker: 下京区居民A
318181052.content: But they claim that there's some problem with the Child of Heaven and the Imperial Army... It doesn't seem like they're lying, either...

318181053.speaker: 下京区居民B
318181053.content: Do you actually believe the nonsense they're spouting? Has your brain become mush from all those visits to the pachinko parlors and praying to the mountain gods?

318181054.speaker: 下京区居民B
318181054.content: The Child of Heaven has ruled Sasanami for so many years. Things haven't been fabulous, but they haven't been too bad either. Who knows what will happen if these traitors take over Shimogyou?

318181055.speaker: 下京区居民B
318181055.content: No, we mustn't allow the Karasugo to get their way...

318181056.speaker: 下京区居民B
318181056.content: Let's follow them and see what they're up to.

318182001.content: As he slowly sheaths his blade, Kagutsuchi walks over to the body of a Karasugo fighter, and gently closes his eyes with one hand.

318182002.speaker: 迦具土
318182002.content: I'm sorry... I promise to take you back to the Karasugo mansion when this is over.

318182003.content: The battlefield has quietened down for now. Kagutsuchi looks around him and lets out a long, slow exhale.

318182004.speaker: 迦具土
318182004.content: The Imperial Army's advance force has been eliminated. We must return to the city now.

318182005.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318182005.content: We have to finish evacuating the civilians and build our defensive fortifications before the bulk of the enemy troops arrives... But at least we have a little more time now.

318182007.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318182007.content: Did something happen in the city?

318182008.speaker: 鸦伏众
318182008.content: The residents opened a side gate and let in a small group of the Imperial Army!

318182009.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318182009.content: What?! Didn't we have people standing by in the city?

318182010.speaker: 鸦伏众
318182010.content: There're just too few of us, and the residents rushed us with their weapons!

318182011.speaker: 迦具土
318182011.content: Those Imperial Army soldiers are clearly heavily armed and out of their minds... And they'd rather believe them instead???

318182012.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318182012.content: What's going on in the city now? Where are they? Take us there now!

318182013.speaker: 鸦伏众
318182013.content: Quite a few civilians have already come in contact with the Imperial Army. It's the side gate on the west side, around two kilometers from here.

318182014.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318182014.content: Men! Put on your gear and mind that you don't breathe in the dust. We're heading back into the city!

318182015.content: They arrive to a truly horrifying scene.

318182016.content: The Imperial Army soldiers: silent, holding ice-cold weapons, and looking on at the civilians who are approaching them expectantly. The civilians: looking at their "saviors" one moment, then standing motionlessly where they were with their heads lopped off the very next.

318182017.content: No matter how their loved ones scream and shout, they can get no response.

318182018.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318182018.content: Those Imperial Army soldiers... it's like they're infected by something...

318182019.content: Karasugo Sendou is still in a daze when he feels a gust blow past him.

318182020.speaker: 迦具土
318182020.content: Make sure you're well protected, everyone. I'll head over first.

318182021.content: Karasugo Sendou grits his teeth as he watches Kagutsuchi dash towards the Imperial Army. He is about to join him when he overhears the discussion behind him.

318182022.speaker: 下京区居民A
318182022.content: What in the world is wrong with these Imperial Army soldiers?! They look possessed...

318182023.speaker: 下京区居民B
318182023.content: What do you think? There's never been a problem all those times the Imperial Army came to Shimogyou.

318182024.speaker: 下京区居民B
318182024.content: It must be them! Those traitors must have done something to the Imperial Army to smear their good name!

318182025.content: Karasugo Sendou is taken aback by this absurd accusation. Then, as the fury rises in him, he pushes his subordinates aside.

318182026.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318182026.content: Open your eyes! Open them to see who's actually protecting you and bleeding for you!

318182027.content: The person who was just yelled at stares blankly to his front, where the other person who was just with her has just become a roadside statue himself, after they failed to run away quickly enough from the Imperial Army.

318182028.content: Then, there are those wearing the emblem of the Karasugo family who are busy fighting the Imperial Army or trying to drag the civilians away from danger.

318182029.speaker: 下京区居民A
318182029.content: Stop standing there like a dummy! Run!!!

318182030.speaker: 下京区居民B
318182030.content: This can't be... This can't be...

318182034.speaker: 鸦伏众
318182034.content: Sir, we have news! The Imperial Army are moving faster than we thought and are about to arrive!

318191001.content: With the group of Imperial Army soldiers that entered the city taken care of, the Karasugo fighters quickly shut the side gate again.

318191002.content: The unexpected street fight has left the Karasugo warriors tired and furious, and they are now a lot more strident about guarding the side gate in question.

318191003.speaker: 下京区居民C
318191003.content: Should we... actually listen to those Karasugo people?

318191004.speaker: 下京区居民D
318191004.content: But can we really believe them? I mean, they just came out of nowhere!

318191005.speaker: 下京区居民C
318191005.content: Things wouldn't be like this had we evacuated...

318191006.speaker: 下京区居民E
318191006.content: Evacuated? And how would you do that?! Everything I own, including my goods, is here! And my father is too sick to move! Who's gonna pay for everything???

318191007.speaker: 下京区居民E
318191007.content: If they are really here to protect us, why drive us away? They should go out and fight!

318191008.speaker: 鸦伏众
318191008.content: What is wrong with these people???

318191009.speaker: 鸦伏众
318191009.content: Aren't they the ones who let the Imperial Army in?

318191011.content: Karasugo Sendou is about to say something when he spots a teary-eyed girl who's been pushed out of the crowd.

318191014.speaker: 女孩
318191014.content: Will the Child of Heaven... bring back my mama to me?

318191015.content: Karasugo Sendou raises his head. Not only does he see the teary-eyed girl as he does so, he also becomes aware of the expressions of ambivalence, fear, and cynicism on the faces of those hiding behind this tiny figure.

318191016.content: He focuses on the girl again, and reaches out to wipe the tears away from her face.

318191017.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191017.content: Don't worry, now. Your mama has just gone to see the Child of Heaven in her dreams... she'll be back.

318191018.speaker: 鸦伏众
318191018.content: What do we do now, my Lord?

318191019.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191019.content: ... Get everyone out here. Everyone, including whoever's in the city.

318191020.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191020.content: Don't these people love a spectacle? Tell them that the Karasugo traitors are here. Tell them that useless Lord Karasugo has something to say to them.

318191022.content: Karasugo Sendou takes a slow exhale. Then, he tells a subordinate to take the little girl aside and looks around, his fingers wrapped tightly around the hilt of his blade.

318191023.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191023.content: Over the generations, the Lords of the Karasugo family have made it their duty to fight against the evil god...

318191025.content: The crowd begins to grow, twittering in disbelief at the statue-like civilians and Karasugo Sendou, who is standing right in their midst.

318191026.content: Kagutsuchi is standing on one side of the crowd, trying to maintain some kind of order, and watching Karasugo Sendou with the others.

318191027.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191027.content: … The Karasugo family isn't some big or famous clan, and I don't often appear in public the way, say, Izuru Masayoshi does. Some of you know me, and some of you don't—but that doesn't matter. For today, you see me.

318191028.speaker: 下京区居民E
318191028.content: You don't have to be so humble, Lord Karasugo! We all know who the traitor is!

318191029.speaker: 下京区居民C
318191029.content: Hey... you have a death wish or what?

318191030.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191030.content: So, you do know me. That's good.

318191031.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191031.content: I was just worried that some folks here might not know me or what the Sasanami Five stand for. I wouldn't make too much sense in that case then.

318191032.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191032.content: Since you know that I'm now a traitor, know this: now the Child of Heaven has no control over me, and I can do whatever I want!

318191033.content: Karasugo Sendou pulls out his expensive blade, and rams it deep into the ground. A sharp buzzing sound and the hint of threat in his voice stuns everyone into silence.

318191034.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191034.content: And now I ask you: do you know what is it that I wish to do now?

318191036.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191036.content: Whoever gets it right gets a thousand dollars!

318191037.speaker: 下京区居民A
318191037.content: Y-you... You want to get us to leave.

318191039.content: A Karasugo fighter promptly hands over the cash, drawing wide-eyed stares from those present.

318191040.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191040.content: I know what you're all thinking, and I also know why you refuse to leave.

318191041.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191041.content: What is disloyalty? What is treason? Do you really care? If it were not me but Izuru Masayoshi or even the Child of Heaven speaking to you today without their men present, would you listen to them?

318191042.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191042.content:
You over there: you've been running your smuggling business on this street for the past 20 years.
And you, you finally managed to become the big boss of your gang last month.
You, my friend, are just living off the property here that your parents left you...

318191044.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191044.content: I know everything! Because I, Karasugo Sendou, am just like you!

318191045.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191045.content: Like you, I am selfish, short-sighted, and stupid. Like you, I lie to myself. I tell myself that I can achieve something great with whatever little profit I see right in front of me...

318191046.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191046.content: But is this really the time to be fixated on all this? You can choose not to believe me, but go take a look at the Karasugo mansion for yourselves. What has become of it now? Look at these people, these people whom you know... what has become of them?

318191047.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191047.content: You may not know what has happened. Maybe you think I'm crazy, because you don't see how things have gone wrong. You have no idea why I say that the Child of Heaven sitting in the palace right now is a monster.

318191048.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191048.content: But that's not the important thing. What's important is, I used to be just like you. I just didn't know how bad things were.

318191049.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191049.content: I didn't know until my mother, then my sister, died because of this nefarious plot. I, like all of you, am an idiot who had to feel the pain before I would take action!

318191050.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191050.content: I'm here in Shimogyou today for a reason. And the reason is, I don't want any of you to repeat my mistake!

318191051.content: Karasugo Sendou has let out every bit of air along with his words. He takes a deep breath, pulls out his blade from the ground, and walks into the ranks of his men as the crowd stands dumbfounded.

318191052.content: They watch him as he goes and remain silent for a moment, as if to confirm that he wouldn't return. Then, the chatter gradually starts up again.

318191053.speaker: 下京区居民C
318191053.content: He does make a bit of sense, no?

318191054.speaker: 下京区居民D
318191054.content: But if we listen to him and leave now, wouldn't we be labelled as traitors too? What if the Child of Heaven decides to settle the score with us then???

318191055.speaker: 下京区居民E
318191055.content: Evacuate, evacuate! But what am I going to do with all my goods?! Who's going to pay for all my losses?

318191056.speaker: 下京区居民E
318191056.content: All that high-falutin' talk! And nothing about compensation! Hot air, hot air, and more hot air!

318191057.content: Karasugo Sendou does not speak even though the discussion can still be heard from where he is.

318191059.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191059.content: I'm fine... I can't give them what they want, but I can't force them to leave either.

318191062.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191062.content: I may not be able to force them to leave, but I'm not going to abandon them. Go make travel arrangements for anyone who's willing to go. As for those who aren't, just let them be.

318191063.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191063.content: The Imperial Army is almost here. Get ready.

318191064.content: The Modifier who's been standing by has already walked up to him.

318191065.speaker: 迦具土
318191065.content: Kyū Squad is already on standby outside the city. Shall we leave now?

318191067.content: The biting wind is carrying the rolling red-and-black dust towards the city gate. The ground is shaking with the footsteps of the approaching army, heavy and regular.

318191068.content: Step by step, Karasugo Sendou walks over to the city wall, past the bodies of his fallen men who are yet to be buried.

318191069.content: On this day, he would rather become one of these bodies himself...

318191070.content: ... than to take another step back.

318191071.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191071.content: The Karasugo have been fighting the evil god for generations, and the past Lords never backed down no matter how tough the going got. They never flinched or wavered.

318191072.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191072.content: My mother and sister have perished at the hands of the evil god. Many of you who have grown up with me have also lost their lives in our bid to exterminate it.

318191073.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318191073.content: I seek your help in the fight against the evil god. We must keep fighting for the people of Sasanami, even if we're down to the very last man!

318191074.content: The young Modifier standing beside him looks at him meaningfully for a moment, then becomes the first to raise his weapon.

318191075.speaker: 迦具土
318191075.content: For Sasanami! We kill the evil god!

318191076.speaker: 鸦伏众
318191076.content: We kill the evil god! For Sasanami!

318192001.content: As Karasugo Sendou dispatches an Imperial Army soldier with a mighty swing of his sword, the strength suddenly drains from his body. Fortunately, the young Modifier next to him breaks his would-be fall, and as he steadies him he once again wraps his fingers tightly around the hilt of his weapon.

318192002.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318192002.content: These soldiers... they just keep on coming.

318192003.speaker: 迦具土
318192003.content: Our line is shrinking, and there's no room to pull back. There's nothing behind us but a civilian area.

318192004.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318192004.content: I can only hope that my body will be in the Imperial Army's way enough to give more time for the civilians to escape...

318192005.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318192005.content: That little girl just now... I wonder if anyone has taken her with them...

318192006.content: His body, utterly drained, is shaking uncontrollably. Darkness is creeping in on the edges of his vision. A confusing swarm of thoughts and physical sensations floods his mind, and in the end only the target in front of him remains.

318192008.content: He can hear some noises coming from behind him, but he no longer has the wherewithal to figure out what they are. He swings his blade forward as he always does, but the moment the sword slashes down it suddenly feels like he is floating in mid-air.

318192009.content: Karasugo Sendou realizes that he is falling.

318192010.content: Will I finally see them again when I close my eyes this time...?

318192013.speaker: 迦具土
318192013.content: Back there! Behind us! The civilians are leaving!

318192015.content: It is as if whatever thick fog that was plaguing Karasugo Sendou has been lifted. The energy returns to his body, and he finds himself thinking more clearly.

318192017.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318192017.content: The civilians need more time to escape! We must stop the Imperial Army right here!

318192018.content: The young Modifier does not say much. All he does is to make a quick scan of the fallen Karasugo men that lay in front of him, some of whom he's had a passing conversation before, some of whom he never had the time to get to know.

318192020.content: Once upon a time, all he had was the will to survive. But now, he has emerged from the flames with a newfound determination.

318192021.content: An icy naginata flies across the battlefield.

318192022.speaker: ？？？
318192022.content: Hey, hey, hey! Are you all trying to be the heroes of Shimogyou here without me???

318192025.content: The young woman leaps into the air with her sword, above and over the enervated Karasugo fighters. Like a battle god, she thunders right into the center of battlefield, pushing aside countless Imperial Army soldiers along the way.

318192027.speaker: 暗御津羽
318192027.content: Watch out now, gentlemen. Mind that you don't get the chill!

318201001.content: Ice flowers bloomed everywhere on the battlefield. Despite their freezing temperature, their appearance breathed new life into every place they went.

318201003.speaker: 暗御津羽
318201003.content: Oh, do you know me? You... are the one Aether Gazer says knows how to use the Madoibi, aren't you?

318201005.speaker: 迦具土
318201005.content: I didn't think you'd come to help the Karasugo family.

318201006.speaker: 暗御津羽
318201006.content: I'm not here for the Karasugo. I'm here for Himiko, and for Shimogyou.

318201007.speaker: 暗御津羽
318201007.content: Also, I'm not the only one who's here!

318201008.content: A wave of cries rises from over the horizon. Kagutsuchi and Karasugo Sendou turn around for a look.

318201009.content: Their "reinforcements" are pouring in from the streets of Shimogyou, most of them not professional soldiers themselves. They have decided to enter the battlefield armed with their weapons and the most rudimentary of protection.

318201010.content: Among them are the Akishika's soldiers, children in mock ninja outfits, gangsters with menace written all over their faces... a few of them were in the crowd that castigated Karasugo Sendou just moments ago.

318201014.speaker: 忍者男孩
318201014.content: ... Um, what am I here for then...?

318201015.content: Karasugo Sendou is astounded at this sight. A man holding a katana rushes out of the crowd and stops at his side.

318201016.speaker: 下京区居民E
318201016.content: Don't you dare put this on me now! I wasn't the one who told you people to come out on this suicide mission!

318201017.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318201017.content: You...! Aren't you a trader? Didn't you want to stay behind to watch over your goods? Why are you here?

318201018.speaker: 下京区居民E
318201018.content: Anyone who does business in Shimogyou knows that you have to act before the other party harms you.

318201020.speaker: 下京区居民E
318201020.content: My father passed away years ago! If not for Lady Akishika... and if not for you people, I'd be done for, too.

318201021.content: Having decided that the time for small talk is over, the man then dashes headlong in battle.

318201022.content: And in a flash, the battle was over and there's not a single enemy left around Karasugo Sendou. He surveys the battlefield around him, each and every cry ringing in his ears like bells of victory.

318201024.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318201024.content: Distribute the protective gear now. Everyone, cover your nose and mouth, and make sure you don't breathe in the dust!

318201025.content: With help from the Karasugo fighters, everyone soon learned how to keep themselves safe from the red-and-black dust. Without fear or hesitation, they would attack the fully armed Imperial Army soldiers, even if the latter seemed completely impervious to pain.

318201026.content: Karasugo Sendou thinks back to the people he met at the Karasugo mansion, to how he was in front of Sekhmet at that time, and is taken aback by how awfully spineless he was in the past.

318201027.content: But now, he is just as brave as everyone else present.

318201028.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318201028.content: Looks like humans have never been weak...

318201029.speaker: 暗御津羽
318201029.content: I must say, all you Karasugo gentlemen may not speak very much, but you sure can take a beating! Not that I'd ever offer up myself like this, though.

318201030.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318201030.content: Are you saying... we should pull back into the city?

318201031.speaker: 暗御津羽
318201031.content: You're quick. Now, the part of the city that was destroyed has been evacuated. I know the streets of Shimogyou very well, unlike those brainless fools.

318201032.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318201032.content: So, we engage them in street battles? That's a good idea...

318201033.speaker: 暗御津羽
318201033.content: Hey, you over there. Did you hear that? Your Lord has agreed, so have your men pull back now.

318201034.speaker: 迦具土
318201034.content: Does it mean that you're working with us now?

318201035.content: Kuramitsuha flicks the tip of her naginata without looking at Kagutsuchi.

318202001.speaker: 混混头目
318202001.content: What are you looking at? Don't you look back! Just keep walking!

318202002.speaker: 下京区居民D
318202002.content: I-I.... I think I lost something.

318202003.speaker: 混混头目
318202003.content: What's so important that you have to stop right now? Did you lose your family jewels? Or your mom?

318202005.speaker: 混混头目
318202005.content: Keep going, then! Do you want to live, or do you want to listen to the Kiwamikawagumi?

318202008.speaker: 下京区居民D
318202008.content: Yes, yes, yes!!! I want both!!!

318202010.speaker: 极川藤
318202010.content: You're all guests of the Kiwamikawagumi, and we're conducting this evacuation for your safety, so please do not worry. Just listen to what we say, and we will take care of you.

318202011.content: Some of those who were originally afraid lower their heads at these words, while others breathe a sigh of relief and even appear grateful at their circumstances.

318202012.speaker: 混混头目
318202012.content: Boss, why are we suddenly the good guys now?

318202013.speaker: 极川藤
318202013.content: What are you talking about? The Kiwamikawagumi has always been working for the good of Shimogyou.

318202014.speaker: 极川藤
318202014.content: Relax. The Ninkyoumon has promised us... this much this time round.

318202015.content: Kiwamikawa Fujio signs a number with his hand. His men, who finally realize what is going on, leave under his watchful eye. Then, he turns back and glances behind him.

318202016.speaker: 极川藤
318202016.content: This is all for the good of Shimogyou...

318202017.content: The neighborhoods, now evacuated, are cold and empty. Knife-sharp ice flowers followed by scorching flames appear intermittently here and there. The Imperial Army soldiers, lost in Shimogyou's maze of streets and alleys, are taken out one by one before they even realize they are in danger.

318202018.speaker: 迦具土
318202018.content: What a pity. If only they weren't under the control of the Child of Heaven...

318202019.speaker: 迦具土
318202019.content: How are our squads doing? Do the numbers and intel tally this time?

318202020.speaker: 鸦伏众
318202020.content: Yes, they do. The fortifications in the buffer zone are up, too.

318202021.content: Then, a clanging sound is heard. Karasugo Sendou's shaking hand has finally let go of his weapon, and he himself is now also unceremoniously seated on the ground.

318202022.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318202022.content: It's finally over... I suppose I can answer to my ancestors after all...

318202023.speaker: 暗御津羽
318202023.content: The only person you have to answer to is yourself.

318202024.content: The young woman with the naginata is leaning against a wall. She looks at Karasugo Sendou with a mix of curiosity and approval.

318202025.speaker: 暗御津羽
318202025.content: Hey, you. Karasugo-something. You may not be as good at Himiko, but you've done well nevertheless.

318202026.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318202026.content: Do you mean Lady Akishika? Yes... She gave herself for the sake of Shimogyou and defeated the Deer God, and never once wavered in the process. I'm nothing compared to her.

318202027.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318202027.content: It's just that I no longer want to compare myself with anyone else. I don't care if I'm the worst Lord Karasugo in all our history. Like you said, it's good enough if I can answer to myself.

318202028.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318202028.content: Ninkyoumon, did the Administrator ask you to come?

318202029.speaker: 暗御津羽
318202029.content: Yeah, the Aether Gazer Administrator left me instructions quite early on. They weren't feeling too confident about you guys, and I was asked to stick around in Shimogyou and help just in case.

318202030.speaker: 迦具土
318202030.content: Please, you don't have to spare our feelings...

318202031.speaker: 迦具土
318202031.content: But your help was indeed much appreciated. Thank you.

318202032.content: The young woman looks away and takes a moment before she responds to Kagutsuchi's expression of gratitude.

318202033.speaker: 暗御津羽
318202033.content: You don't have to thank me. Like I said, I'm not doing this for you.

318202034.speaker: 迦具土
318202034.content: ... While the situation in Sasanami is still critical, I think it's best that we put everything on the table now.

318202035.speaker: 迦具土
318202035.content: I was the one who sent the Madoibi to Lady Akishika. My Lord and I had no choice but to do this as the Child of Heaven was already eyeing the Deer God's ashes.

318202036.speaker: 暗御津羽
318202036.content: ... You must know by now that the Aether Gazer Administrator has told me about this. So what exactly do you want from me now?

318202037.speaker: 暗御津羽
318202037.content: Do you want me to berate you, or say that I forgive you?

318202038.speaker: 迦具土
318202038.content: Neither. I just don't want us to bear any grudges when we fight side by side on the battlefield again. Or when we face Akika.

318202039.speaker: 暗御津羽
318202039.content: What do you mean by "grudge," we're talking about Himiko here...

318202041.speaker: 暗御津羽
318202041.content: Let me ask you this: had you known that Himiko would die, and that you'd be working with me after that, would you still have given her the Madoibi?

318202042.speaker: 迦具土
318202042.content: I'm sorry, but all these are all foreseeable. Given the choice, I'd do this all over again.

318202043.speaker: 暗御津羽
318202043.content: Then there's no "grudge" between us. Because I know that Himiko would feel the same way!

318202044.content: Kuramitsuha lifts her eyes to look in a certain direction, her eyes tinged with red.

318202045.speaker: 暗御津羽
318202045.content: That was the choice Himiko made, to protect Shimogyou no matter what. It wasn't because of you.

318202046.speaker: 暗御津羽
318202046.content: I've known Himiko for a long time, and I always known that's just how Himiko was.

318202047.speaker: 暗御津羽
318202047.content: I can't blame you, because I don't want to blame Himiko either...

318202048.speaker: 暗御津羽
318202048.content: I understand the situation very well. But that's not all that is to it. I'm just...

318202049.content: Kuramitsuha takes a long, deep breath, and she finally turns around again after the tremble in her voice is gone.

318202050.speaker: 暗御津羽
318202050.content: I just can't stand the sight of you. Surely I'm entitled to that?

318202051.speaker: 迦具土
318202051.content: Ha! Not a problem at all. You aren't the only one who feels that way, anyway.

318202052.speaker: 迦具土
318202052.content: We've gotten rid of the Imperial Army here in Shimogyou but the Child of Heaven is nowhere to be seen. I fear that things aren't going as well for the others.

318202053.content: Kagutsuchi tries to connect with the other two teams on the communicator as Kuramitsuha and Karasugo Sendou look on.

318202054.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318202054.content: I wonder how Senba is doing.

318202055.speaker: 暗御津羽
318202055.content: Is the Aether Gazer Administrator alright?

318202056.content: But the only answer Kagutsuchi has for them is the grave look on his face.

318211001.content: She is floating in the darkness. Her consciousness, soft and vague, is spreading into the distance, surrounded by a tender warmth.

318211002.content: It's as if she's seeing that person again. She is picked up by that pair of hands from between the dew and leaves. A warm smile fills her vision as she opens her eyes for the first time, melting into her bones and blood.

318211003.content: Back then, she never had to face an empty room, and she never knew what sadness and loneliness feel like.

318211004.content: We finally meet, my little sister...

318211005.content: Don't be afraid. I'll always be by your side.

318211010.content: Her ears are still ringing from the massive shock, even as her memories recede like tidewaters in the dark. No matter how much she tries to chase them down, all she can only touch are the bubbles of broken dreams.

318211011.content: Tsukuyomi opens her eyes to see Buzenbo and Kuninotokotachi, their faces full of concern.

318211012.speaker: 国常立
318211012.content: You're finally back. You gave me quite the scare there, captain.

318211014.speaker: 国常立
318211014.content: We saw that Bane Energy blow up over the Imperial City. Buzenbo took us down here.

318211015.speaker: 国常立
318211015.content: At first I thought Buzenbo was gonna kill us all with that jump! But then we came to this huge space down here. There's even a safehouse protected from Quakes here, too.

318211016.speaker: 月读
318211016.content: Oh, that's right... Are you two okay?

318211017.speaker: 国常立
318211017.content: I'm still a little dizzy from the blast. But it sure beats being blown into pieces.

318211018.speaker: 国常立
318211018.content: How did Buzenbo know to come here?

318211019.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318211019.content: I was trapped here before I found you two. I also ran into Izuru Masayoshi here.

318211020.content: Tsukuyomi sits up to listen to Buzenbo's account of her encounter with Izuru Masayoshi.

318211021.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318211021.content: ... I've no idea what he was going to do, or where he is right now. Did you see him on the way here?

318211022.speaker: 国常立
318211022.content: Apart from looking for you, the other reason we're here in the Imperial City is to find him. Unfortunately, we haven't.

318211023.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318211023.content: Is that so... Maybe we can have a chat with him.

318211024.speaker: 月读
318211024.content: Based on what you heard from him, do you think he intends to turn on Akika?

318211025.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318211025.content: You can tell a lie but your facial expressions will betray you. But I suppose a man of his stature has to be good at hiding his intentions, too... But I honestly can't think of a reason for him to save me.

318211027.speaker: 国常立
318211027.content: If he isn't plotting something, why would he have this bolthole underground?

318211028.speaker: 月读
318211028.content:
That's odd indeed.
We should let the others know about Izuru Masayoshi too, so they can keep their eyes open if they run into him.

318211030.speaker: 国常立
318211030.content: I caught a bit of signal after that giant vortex in the sky blew up. That thing must have been interfering with the comms.

318211031.speaker: 国常立
318211031.content: But the signal's too weak for me to send anything now. I'm guessing all that Bane Energy hasn't fully dissipated yet.

318211032.speaker: 国常立
318211032.content: The best way to get back our comms is to retreat from Reiten. But...

318211033.speaker: 月读
318211033.content: If we go now, we'll never get the intel on Akika.

318211034.content: Tsukuyomi gazes out of the room window with her hand on the Access Key on her waist.

318211035.speaker: 月读
318211035.content: Now that the Imperial City's blown up, Akika should have left by now. But no matter where she goes, or what she plans to do, we must start here.

318211036.speaker: 月读
318211036.content: Intel is of critical importance, since no one knows what plan she's hatching right now.

318211037.speaker: 月读
318211037.content: We should stay here to look for leads. Amongst the three groups, we might just be the closest to finding out the truth here.

318212001.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318212001.content: So many empty petri dishes here...

318212002.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318212002.content: Even if we add up the number of Visbanes in the Imperial City and here, the number doesn't tally with the production log.

318212003.speaker: 国常立
318212003.content: I wonder where Akika has dispatched all these Visbanes to.

318212004.speaker: 国常立
318212004.content: Cognizant Visbanes are such a pain to deal with...

318212006.speaker: 月读
318212006.content: Mmm... I'm trying to recall something.

318212007.speaker: 月读
318212007.content: I remember that when I battled Akika, she used the power of the Monkey God to block my ability to see and hear. Then, you used your left eye to break the effect...

318212009.speaker: 月读
318212009.content: What you said at that time was, my vision was actually restored before you got around to breaking the effect.

318212010.speaker: 国常立
318212010.content: That's right. Now that I think about it, even if I had the power to do I'd have needed some time to actually do it. But not only did Akika stop blocking you, she also never bothered us again.

318212011.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318212011.content: Did Akika do anything else that seems strange to you?

318212012.speaker: 国常立
318212012.content: Mmm... She started summoning Visbanes after we could see again.

318212013.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318212013.content: Summon Visbanes? That's the Snake God's power again... Could it be that the Snake God is unable to use its power for extended periods of time?

318212014.speaker: 月读
318212014.content: ... Tell me, when the Imperial Army attacked the Karasugo, did they set off in the morning? It should be another mountain god who's controlling the Imperial Army and the civilians.

318212015.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318212015.content: They did leave in the morning. Oh, that's right, the last entry in the production log from today was made in the morning, and it was only after production was halted that the army set off...

318212016.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318212016.content: —Akika can only use the power of a single mountain god at any one time!

318212017.content: This sudden conjecture leaves all three of them stunned for a second. Then, Buzenbo quickly tries to recall all and any facts that can be used to confirm or dismiss it.

318212018.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318212018.content: I remember Akika saying that "I'm not quite getting the hang of this yet" when she struck me off the city wall...

318212019.speaker: 月读
318212019.content: Akika has yet to fully master the power that's in her hands.

318212020.speaker: 月读
318212020.content: Although Izanami says that the five mountain gods and Akika come from the same place, it can't be easy for her to master any single power, even if it's a power that's been splintered off for eons.

318212021.speaker: 月读
318212021.content: This is why she hasn't shown herself yet. She is waiting for the best time.

318212022.speaker: 月读
318212022.content: However, the Orochi incident happened a few months ago. If all she needs to access all that power again is to wait for a day or two, why didn't she start earlier?

318212023.content: Kuninotokotachi and Buzenbo look at each other.

318212024.speaker: 国常立
318212024.content: Akika might have been waiting for the Deer God's ashes. Lady Akishika's body contained the sclerotium that in turn held the intelligence of the Deer God. But little did Akika expect that she would sacrifice herself and burn the Deer God with the Madoibi...

318212026.content: A memory suddenly comes to Tsukuyomi's mind: that of looking down on the whole of Sasanami from the top of a mountain a long time ago while on a trip.

318212027.content: All those green hills, the cities, and the people... That was what she was trying to protect...

318212028.content: And now, the humans she once protected are stepping up to defend this land.

318212029.speaker: 月读
318212029.content: Here in Sasanami, we're not the only ones who're fighting these "gods." The humans are, too.

318212030.speaker: 月读
318212030.content: If not for Lady Akishika, we would now be dealing with a much more powerful Akika, or even a Akika who has long mastered her power.

318212031.speaker: 月读
318212031.content: The humans are the ones who have given us the opportunity to save Sasanami.

318212033.speaker: 月读
318212033.content: Let's go back to the matter at hand.

318212034.speaker: 国常立
318212034.content: Let me think. We still don't know if Akika is using the Crane God's powers to control the Imperial Army and the civilians.

318212035.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318212035.content: We'll be at an disadvantage if Akika takes the civilians hostage.

318212036.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318212036.content: Hold on, if we're talking about the Crane God...

318212037.content: All three of them lift their heads to look around them at the same time.

318212038.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318212038.content: Then the person who's most likely to know about the Crane God's power... is Izuru Masayoshi.

318221001.content: The Pheasant Squad trio perform a search of the surrounding area but find nothing new. The only thing to do is to venture deeper.

318221004.content: Tsukuyomi, Buzenbo, and Kuninotokachi come together. A moment, they find themselves staring blankly at the data and technical language in front of them.

318221005.speaker: 国常立
318221005.content: If there's a "next time," I promise I'll pay more attention during my lessons with the Cryptics.

318221006.speaker: 国常立
318221006.content: Hmmm... I saw that the record for serial number 0174301 was destroyed...? Why is it here again?

318221007.speaker: 月读
318221007.content: That's right. And that's not the only one, too.

318221008.content: As Tsukuyomi and Kuninotokotachi start to discuss this latest finding, Buzenbo falls silent.

318221009.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318221009.content: Do either of you get the sense that... the subjects of these experiments are human?

318221010.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318221010.content: I've seen these numbers at the medical center before. These are all vital sign indicators.

318221011.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318221011.content: And these two sets of numbers here. Although the units aren't indicated, based on the ranges we should be looking at the heights and weights of the subjects. Plus...

318221012.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318221012.content: A group of Izuru guards has disappeared for some time. They may very well be the subjects of these experimental numbers.

318221013.speaker: 国常立
318221013.content: Humans? Like, humans who were brought back to life? That can't be true.

318221014.speaker: 国常立
318221014.content: But if we're to take a look at these numbers again in this vein...

318221015.speaker: 国常立
318221015.content: Let's try to organize the data for subject 0174301 first. Then, we go on to -302, -303, -304... There's dozens of them.

318221016.speaker: 国常立
318221016.content: Then there's something in the middle... Mmm, I'm not sure what this means. But when we get to this line, the records for No. 1 are labelled as "destroyed," though there aren't much changes for the others. That is, except for No. 17, whose numbers change dramatically here.

318221017.speaker: 国常立
318221017.content: In less than a minute, No. 17 becomes... just like No. 1 at the very beginning.

318221018.speaker: 国常立
318221018.content: Then, No. 17 is renumbered as No. 1. Does that mean that No. 17 vanishes and No. 1 is somehow revived?!

318221019.speaker: 月读
318221019.content: ... This reminds of me of something that's in the stories about the Crane God which I collected.

318221020.speaker: 月读
318221020.content: Although the stories of the mountain gods were indeed fabricated by Akika, the details in the different versions which were handed down may still yield some truths.

318221021.speaker: 国常立
318221021.content: I remember that in the legends, the Crane God was the only mountain god who stood on the humans' side.

318221022.speaker: 月读
318221022.content: Yes. In the version I heard, every human being blessed by the Crane God was an "anchor" of the Crane God in the human world.

318221023.speaker: 月读
318221023.content: Whenever the worship ritual happened, a person would find themselves again when the white crane called, as they were granted the wisdom and power by the Crane God.

318221024.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318221024.content: Visbanes would never bless humans, and humans would never have the power of the Visbanes out of nowhere... Unless they were corrupted by Bane Energy.

318221025.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318221025.content: Humans corrupted by the Crane God... or even a resurrected Crane God?

318221026.speaker: 月读
318221026.content: Leaving behind anchor points and creating copies of yourself before your death... I vaguely recall that certain Visbanes can do this, too.

318221027.speaker: 月读
318221027.content: In nature, the lizard can leave its tail behind and regrow a new one. Similarly, a leaf detached from a plant can also take root again.

318221028.speaker: 月读
318221028.content: Some Visbanes go one step further: they leave part of their Bane Energy somewhere or sneak it into other organisms. After their body dies, the data that remains is reborn.

318221029.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318221029.content: That explains the Bane Energy data that the Snake God left on me, and the hyphae of the Deer God...

318221030.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318221030.content: If the Crane God were more powerful than them in this regard, it wouldn't even need to hand over its data, or nor would it be limited to a single host.

318221031.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318221031.content: Instead, it would be able to leave "anchor points" on a large number of humans and even spread from person to person. Then, once resurrected, it would be able to immediately return to the state it was before death.

318221032.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318221032.content: ... This is possible in the world of Gaea, and also completely consistent with these experiment records.

318221033.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318221033.content: This sort of ability would explain how the Imperial Army is spreading the Bane Energy mark to the people and how Akika disappeared after she was defeated...

318221034.speaker: 月读
318221034.content: If the Crane God's ability is limited to the leaving of "anchor points," then it would be Akika who's controlling the Imperial Army. The use of anchor points to spread Bane Energy... is that some kind of thought implantation...?

318221035.speaker: 国常立
318221035.content: But what do we do about Akika then?

318221036.content: Kuninotokotachi thinks back to the silent civilians she saw in Kamigyou, and becomes worried.

318221037.content: She cannot help but start to imagine the empty streets and the silent buildings, the dusty pennant flags and stalls left from festivals past...

318221038.speaker: 国常立
318221038.content: Just one Akika alone has the abilities of several mountain gods. Once we take out one god, another will come to take its place.

318221039.speaker: 国常立
318221039.content: How about we find a way to sever the link between Akika and these anchor points? But right now at least half of Kamigyou are her anchor points... we can't possibly eliminate a whole chunk of Sasanami to do that.

318221040.speaker: 月读
318221040.content: We aren't the only ones considering this problem.

318221041.speaker: 国常立
318221041.content: Right... Based on these experiment records... Izuru Masayoshi was researching the Crane God's abilities. He's a human, after all.

318221042.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318221042.content: Izuru Masayoshi's body may show signs of Bane Energy, but he hasn't lost his mind yet.

318221043.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318221043.content: Perhaps. We now have a chance to use Izuru Masayoshi's work to get rid of Akika...

318221044.speaker: 月读
318221044.content: We must get out as soon as we can and tell Admin about this. The fact that Akika can fool others into thinking she's dead can put the others in great danger.

318221046.content: A powerful source of Bane Energy is pressing in on them.

318221047.content: Massive shadows are spreading from the corners, like rapidly growing hyphae.

318222001.content:
16:53, August 17th, 2315.
On the perimeter of the Photon Rail Nexus.

318222002.content: It's past the brightest time of the day, and the light is slowly fading. However, the looming patterns remain heavy overhead.

318222003.content: I gaze at the sky above rather distractedly while leaning against the wall of the border control building. As the Sephirah Zones are not connected on the Surface Layer, I can't even imagine myself looking at Ain Soph.

318222004.speaker: 我
318222004.content: Things are a mess here at Sasanami, and I've no idea what's going on over at Aether Gazer either. I wonder Ver has come to...

318222005.speaker: 我
318222005.content: I'm not ready to say goodbye yet.

318222006.content: "It's a deal. When you need me, I'll be there."

318222007.speaker: 我
318222007.content: ... I will go back, I will.

318222009.content: I am startled by her voice and the heat of her breath next to me. I realize that Sekhmet has taken a sniff of me, but before I can do more she's already taken two steps back with a smile on her face.

318222010.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222010.content: You don't smell too bad today. I quite like what I'm smelling, in fact. But dear commander, are you thinking about something that's non-battle related?

318222011.speaker: 我
318222011.content: You mean you can smell that too?

318222012.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222012.content: No. It's the fact that you looked away and the little actions you took to hide your guilty conscience that betrayed you. To be honest, it was all very obvious.

318222014.speaker: 我
318222014.content: As you know, the more nervous people get, the more likely they are to imagine things.

318222015.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222015.content: Like, at their dying moments, they might think about the things that they can't do after they die?

318222016.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222016.content: You might've heard that in organizations like CORG, before soldiers go out on dangerous missions they write down anything that may wish to say to a loved one. Doing this helps them manage their emotions better.

318222017.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222017.content: Want to give it a try? After all, I hope that my commander will always be able to make the right decision.

318222018.content: Sekhmet studies me for a moment, then suddenly smiles again.

318222020.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222020.content: But if you're really feeling nervous, tell me. I'm actually pretty good at this counselling thing.

318222022.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222022.content: Not too bad with the facial expression... I don't mean to doubt you. We all get a little tense. Just being able to control your emotions and not allow them to affect you is impressive enough.

318222023.speaker: 我
318222023.content: Nobody wants to make a wrong decision, me included.

318222024.speaker: 我
318222024.content: Honestly, I get nervous before every battle. After all, any one decision I make can have an impact on the lives of many people.

318222025.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222025.content: Such honesty from you. But empathy is something you've never lacked, I must say.

318222027.content: I do not bother to hide my thoughts on the current situation from Sekhmet, and flash a rueful smile.

318222028.speaker: 我
318222028.content: We have so little time, there're so many unknowns, and we don't have nearly enough resources. We don't know if Pheasant Squad is dead or alive... And if we fail, we won't even have a chance to retreat.

318222029.speaker: 我
318222029.content: It's the first time I'm encountering a situation like this.

318222031.speaker: 我
318222031.content: You don't look like someone who's encountered any great difficulties before, Sekhmet... Or rather, what ordinary people call "difficulties" are nothing to you.

318222032.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222032.content: Hey, I'm usually the one who tries to guess at what other people are thinking. But I see that it's now your turn, Admin.

318222033.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222033.content: Let's just say your guess is half-right. Keep guessing.

318222034.content: Sekhmet pauses for a moment, and her expression suddenly becomes serious, even grave. Something seems to be brewing in her bright red eyes.

318222035.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222035.content: Sometimes, I'll also put myself in other people's shoes to try to better understand their thoughts. For example, people from the Akishika and Karasugo families.

318222036.speaker: 我
318222036.content: You mean Himiko and Karasugo Sendou?

318222037.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222037.content: Not them specifically. For generations, the Akishika and the Karasugo have been fighting the mountain gods that they're supposed to serve.

318222038.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222038.content: At the very least, we know what Visbanes are, how the world of Gaea works, and how to deal with them.

318222039.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222039.content: But these people live in a tremendous shadow of fear and uncertainty. But generations and generations hence, these people have remained untamed by this fear, and have continued to stand up against their gods.

318222040.speaker: 我
318222040.content: Humans who continue to stand up against gods...

318222041.speaker: 我
318222041.content: So I guess you're actually trying to console me here?

318222042.speaker: 我
318222042.content: Although I'm just an ordinary human being... And since both Himiko and your subordinates all have the courage to stand up to these gods, so should I, naturally.

318222043.speaker: 我
318222043.content: Even humans can kill gods, right?

318222044.content: I am heaving a sigh of relief when I see the smile break out on Sekhmet's face again.

318222045.speaker: 我
318222045.content: Why are you smiling like that? Because I'm being too conceited by comparing myself to you oh-so-strong Modifiers?

318222046.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222046.content: Not at all. I must say, stereotypes do so much harm.

318222047.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222047.content: No Modifier, least of all me, will ever laugh at humans.

318222048.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222048.content: We Modifiers shouldn't be simply thought of by how powerful we are. We, who bear the names of gods, are actually the guardians and helpers of mankind... not the "gods" of men.

318222049.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222049.content: While the high-and-mighty "gods" up there are always arrogantly waiting for humans to make their supplications, human beings actually have no need for gods...

318222050.speaker: （塞赫麦特）
318222050.content: I'm sorry I'm late. Now, where do you need me?

318222052.speaker: （救援人员）
318222052.content: We got it, we got it!

318222053.speaker: （医疗人员）
318222053.content: Don't worry. They're off to emergency treatment now.

318222054.speaker: （医疗人员）
318222054.content: We've more casualties over there! Come with me, we'll send him to treatment!

318222056.speaker: （被困居民）
318222056.content: Okay, those of you who can walk, the exit's just up ahead!

318222057.speaker: （塞赫麦特）
318222057.content: I'm not really needed anywhere here...

318222059.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222059.content: Humans... are more than capable of saving themselves.

318222060.content: Sekhmet is spellbound by what she's seeing, and there is a tender glimmer in her eyes.

318222061.speaker: 我
318222061.content: ... Is this supposed to be praise?

318222062.speaker: 我
318222062.content: As the only human being present, I'm happy to accept this accolade on behalf of all of humanity for now, Modifier?

318222063.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318222063.content: Sure. Then you must do a good job, Administrator of Modifiers.

318222064.speaker: 伊邪那美
318222064.content: It's almost time to leave. Administrator, do you think you'll be done by then, or would you still need more time?

318222066.content: We're interrupted by a notification from the communicator. I immediately stop to check as there aren't many people who can contact me at the moment.

318222067.speaker: 我
318222067.content: ... It's Tsukuyomi! It's Tsukuyomi and the rest of Pheasant Squad!

318222069.speaker: 月读
318222069.content: Don't worry about us, we've already left the Imperial City. All three of us are fine apart from some minor injuries.

318222071.speaker: 月读
318222071.content: To sum things up, we've found out the Crane God's ability...

318222072.content: As Tsukuyomi recounts what she saw and what she thinks is going on, the people around me start to look increasingly sober.

318222073.content: The only one standing to one side, the young woman, lowers her eyes slightly and falls into deep thought.

318231002.speaker: 我
318231002.content: No problem. There's not much readying we can do, anyway. To take back the Photon Rail Nexus, we must enter it first. But I have no idea what "gift" Akika has in store for us.

318231003.speaker: 休
318231003.content: Will Pheasant Squad be able to meet up with you?

318231004.speaker: 我
318231004.content: The Imperial City took quite a bit of damage, and Tsukuyomi and the others are injured. It'd be quite some time before they arrive too.

318231005.speaker: 我
318231005.content: But now... I suppose we don't have that luxury?

318231006.speaker: 休
318231006.content: You're right. According to the Cryptics' assessment of the situation, permanent data errors with unpredictable consequences may occur if Sasanami is disconnected from the Photon Rail network for more than 12 hours.

318231007.speaker: 我
318231007.content: 12 hours... We still have time. Just not a lot.

318231008.speaker: 我
318231008.content: We'll have to take some risks since we're at a disadvantage already. Since Akika has made her move, we'll just have to keep going.

318231009.content: We have soldiers standing by at the Photon Rail station, and they'll attack the Photon Rail Nexus together with the Modifiers.

318231010.content: Ningishzida is holding up a med kit and giving instructions to an intense-looking line of faces. She seems even more nervous than she'd be in front of a whole swarm of Visbanes.

318231011.speaker: 宁希达
318231011.content: I'll go through the contents of the kit to you one last time. Please listen carefully.

318231012.speaker: 宁希达
318231012.content: This red vial over here is used to stop bleeding and for recovery. You can even use it to heal some internal wounds and prevent further Bane Energy corruption. You only get one each because of its high cost, but don't let that stop you from using it.

318231013.speaker: 宁希达
318231013.content: Why are you looking at me like that? Oh... Why am I holding the green one?

318231014.content: Laughter quickly ripples through the group, diluting the tension in the air.

318231015.speaker: 科尔盖士兵A
318231015.content: Miss Ningishzida! You're holding the wrong one again!

318231017.speaker: 科尔盖士兵B
318231017.content: Miss Ningishzida, you also came with the wrong bandage when you came to re-bandage my wound the other time!

318231018.speaker: 科尔盖士兵A
318231018.content: You even went the wrong way during my follow-up visit!

318231019.speaker: 宁希达
318231019.content: I... I'm just not used to working outside the medical center...

318231020.content: Amidst much laughter, Ningishzida puffs up her cheeks, then takes out the correct vial.

318231021.content: She looks at each and everyone in front of her, trying to distinguish their faces amidst the sea of uniforms. These are people she's laughed with and helped before, or even saved from the brink.

318231022.content: And now they're heading back to the battlefield again without any hesitation.

318231023.speaker: 宁希达
318231023.content: It'd be great if... everyone didn't need these stuff at all.

318231024.speaker: 宁希达
318231024.content: It'd be so great if everyone didn't have to go out to fight, didn't get hurt, and were all healthy and happy...

318231025.speaker: 科尔盖士官
318231025.content: We have our responsibilities to fulfill.

318231026.speaker: 科尔盖士官
318231026.content: Although we're only human, we've chosen to be part of CORG and remain part of CORG. Which means we're prepared for whatever is to come.

318231027.speaker: 宁希达
318231027.content: That's right... But it's also the job of Modifiers to watch over and protect you.

318231028.content: The girl smiles again, and raises both her arms high in the air.

318231030.content: Although the sounds of laughter are happening not too far away from me at all, they may as well be as far away as in the clouds to me.

318231031.content: I'm wrestling with all this information about both Akika and the Photon Rail Nexus in my mind as my brain calculates every possibility over and over again. I'm seeing reality with absolute clarity and am detached from it at the same time.

318231032.speaker: 我
