318231032.content: (Akika has most probably abandoned the Imperial City already, and all she can do in Shimogyou is to increase the number of anchor points present. So, that can't be her focus either.)

318231033.speaker: 我
318231033.content: (Unfortunately, Akika is most probably at the Photon Rail Nexus right now...)

318231034.content: I sigh a little as I hear Ningishzida's elated cries.

318231035.speaker: 我
318231035.content: (I should keep this to myself. No point tanking morale now after all.)

318231037.content: I turn around to see Sekhmet staring at me intently with her bright red eyes.

318231038.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318231038.content: I feel the same way as you. Let's not share that thought for now.

318231039.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318231039.content: Unnecessary panic will only affect our fighting morale. But when we're on the battlefield, what we're really hoping for is a wise commander who is able to adapt with the circumstances.

318231042.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318231042.content: Excellent. That's the version of you I like to hear.

318231043.content: The lioness of CORG smiles a little. Then, all of a sudden, she leans close to my ear, and my senses are overrun by both the heat of both her body and breath.

318231044.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318231044.content: I've already explained to you how that thing works. You're the commander, and this is the card that's in your hand. As to whether you should play it or not...

318231045.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318231045.content: I must ask you to be the one to decide.

318231046.content: ... Are you sure this is okay?

318231048.content: Sekhmet moves away from me as suddenly as she leaned in on me earlier, and walks over to the soldiers who are all ready to go.

318231050.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318231050.content: Take all your stuff. All of you except those who have been told to stay behind, let's go.

318241001.content: The Photon Rail Nexus used to be the heart of the movement of people and goods between the various Sephirah Zones. In the past, it was always bustling with activity.

318241002.content: But now, the ever-present sea of bodies has disappeared, replaced by Bane Energy everywhere. There is now only an abandoned building left in front of us, looming over us under a gray, gloomy sky.

318241003.speaker: 宁希达
318241003.content: Looks really creepy from here. Ugh, I'm getting the chills.

318241004.speaker: 宁希达
318241004.content: I don't think we're going to get a warm welcome here...

318241005.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318241005.content: A warm welcome is not what we're here for.

318241006.content: Sekhmet walks over to one side, and checks the last Bane Energy monitoring device deployed during the previous survey.

318241007.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318241007.content: The device is operating normally. We really shouldn't be looking at so few Visbanes with a Bane Energy level like this.

318241008.speaker: 伊邪那美
318241008.content: If there aren't any more here, they must be hiding inside.

318241009.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318241009.content: We're already at the entrance to the Photon Rail Nexus. Whatever's hiding inside won't stay hidden for too long.

318241010.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318241010.content: When everything's nice and calm, you can hide in a corner and pretend that nothing has happened. When the things that matter to you are in jeopardy, you'll naturally be the first to jump out of your hiding place.

318241011.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318241011.content: Of course, it'd be even better if she weren't here.

318241012.speaker: 我
318241012.content: At least our objective is just ahead of us. That remains the same.

318242001.content: The Imperial Army and the Izuru guards have formed a line on each side of the path, every single one of them has a glazed look in their eyes. Obviously, they're already under the control of the anchor point.

318242002.content: Standing on a high platform is a young woman dressed in sumptuous vestments. She's chuckling with a hand over her lips as she peers down on us, as if we are but tiny ants or unwanted guests who can be sent away with a wave of her hand at any time.

318242003.content: Izanami stares unblinkingly at that youthful mien. She can almost see her mother, her brother, and her younger sister in those facial features...

318242005.content: Seeing my worried look, Izanami slowly loosens her grip on my sleeve, and the calm returns to her face.

318242007.speaker: 朗香
318242007.content: Only certain individuals are allowed to have an audience. The humans behind you aren't allowed to step any further.

318242008.speaker: 伊邪那美
318242008.content: You have no right to tell us what we can or cannot do.

318242009.speaker: 朗香
318242009.content: But if I want to stop you... what in the world can you do?

318242010.speaker: 朗香
318242010.content: Kamonomakoto must've told you quite a few things about me. Little girl, you're brought so many Modifiers here with you today. Are you trading their lives for a future for the Karasugo?

318242011.speaker: 伊邪那美
318242011.content: I don't plot against my own like the Prime Lord does.

318242012.speaker: 朗香
318242012.content: Oh? I think she's calling you a traitor, Prime Lord Izuru.

318242013.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318242013.content: ... The Child of Heaven is right here, and can see who the traitors are with her very own eyes.

318242014.speaker: 朗香
318242014.content:
See? That's what he says.
But I haven't been waiting here for you today just to listen to you people quarrel.

318242015.speaker: 朗香
318242015.content: It was you who helped me deal with those five disobedient things. So how could you commit treason against me now?

318242016.speaker: 朗香
318242016.content: Why don't you come up here, sit down, and have a chat with me? After all, you're my loyal subject, and I can't possibly govern a place as big as Sasanami without you.

318242017.speaker: 朗香
318242017.content: Prime Lord Izuru, is the banquet ready?

318242019.content: With his usual respectful expression, Izuru Masayoshi takes two steps forward, then makes a gesture as if to invite us.

318242020.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318242020.content: The Child of Heaven has specially ordered a banquet for the Modifiers. Please do not refuse.

318242021.content: Everyone in the group looks at each other, but no one responds in the end. Neither Akika nor Izuru Masayoshi make any attempt to urge us either. Time is on their side, and we all know that already.

318242022.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318242022.content: Should we act now? Or do we go with what Buzenbo thinks?

318242023.speaker: 我
318242023.content: Have you forgotten our original plan? The only difference is that we're here instead of Karasugo-sama.

318242024.speaker: 我
318242024.content: I'm happy to leave the negotiation to you and Senba. With Ningishzida around, you should also be safe against any sneak attacks.

318242025.content: Izanami nods at me in agreement. Meanwhile, Ningishzida is pursuing her lips tightly, as if she's afraid that she'd say something wrong otherwise.

318242026.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318242026.content: You're to follow the Administrator's orders while I'm gone.

318242028.content: The three Modifiers step forward and away from the rest, and I follow the Imperial Army soldiers back. I glance up at them with some worry, but unexpectedly my eyes meet those of Akika's instead.

318242030.speaker: 朗香
318242030.content: You, "Administrator." I arranged a seat for you, too.

318242031.content: All three of them pause and look back at me at the same time. I shake my head slightly to tell them not to act rashly, take a deep breath, then follow them in.

318242032.content: We walk along the path towards the square in front of the Photon Rail Nexus. There, a number of tables have been set out, heavy with various Sasanami delicacies.

318242033.content: I can still see wisps of steam rising from the cups and plates. Though the smell of food is thick in the air, I don't seem to have my appetite at all.

318242034.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318242034.content: She's been watching us all this time.

318242035.speaker: 我
318242035.content: She's the Child of Heaven after all. Not surprising that she has people watching us everywhere...

318242036.content: Akika and Izuru Masayoshi have already taken their seats in the host seats, and we also sit down one after another. None of us make a move for the food and drinks, though Sekhmet has pushed away the wine glass set in front of her.

318242037.speaker: 朗香
318242037.content: Are you all waiting for me to start? How polite of you.

318242038.content: Akika picks up a piece of food nonchalantly despite the frosty atmosphere at the table, and tastes it leisurely for some time.

318242039.speaker: 朗香
318242039.content: The last time we had a banquet like this, it was when the Sasanami Five first came along... Funny how it was six of us at the table then, and six of us at the table now too. It was back at my Reiten Palace.

318242040.speaker: 朗香
318242040.content: I suppose with the blast like that my palace chefs must have all died? These cooks we found at short notice really aren't as good.

318242041.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318242041.content: To think you have the mood for food tasting now.

318242042.speaker: 朗香
318242042.content: Why not? This body of mine is that of a real human being's. Unfortunately, it's too skinny.

318242043.speaker: 伊邪那美
318242043.content: I'll kill you when this meal is over.

318242045.content: Akika's eyes dart over to Izanami, but the both of them are still working on their food without missing a beat. It's as if Izanami hasn't just said what she said.

318242046.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318242046.content: ... I'm sorry, madame Child of Heaven, but I'm afraid I'm not keen on the food here.

318242047.speaker: 朗香
318242047.content: What do you want to eat?

318242048.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318242048.content: I prefer the cafeteria grub back at HQ.

318242049.speaker: 朗香
318242049.content: Yeah... So you can forget about going back to Ain Soph. You can build your new headquarters here in Sasanami instead. You'll get used to this place.

318242050.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318242050.content: What would you need CORG here in Sasanami for? You're already in control.

318242051.speaker: 朗香
318242051.content: Be grateful for my benevolence, Modifiers. As long as you're willing to submit to my rule, I will allow you to live here.

318242052.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318242052.content: ... Do you really think of yourself as some kind of ruler?!

318242053.speaker: 朗香
318242053.content: Am I not one already? Unlike in Jokurr and Lamashka, it's been more than a hundred years since I became the Child of Heaven. Has there been any trouble in Sasanami since?

318242054.speaker: 朗香
318242054.content: Do you actually think that the people don't adore me, or do you just want power like mine?

318242055.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318242055.content: The price of a lie is always due when it is exposed.

318242056.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318242056.content: What mankind needs is not a ruler, but respect for life. Every person you kill adds to the cost of your lies.

318242057.speaker: 朗香
318242057.content: If you say so... But do the humans even respect themselves?

318242058.speaker: 朗香
318242058.content: When you speak of "respect," are you referring to those chasing fame and fortune in Kamigyou, or the stubborn and barbaric common people in Shimogyou?

318242059.speaker: 朗香
318242059.content: Every day, I look down upon the whole of Sasanami from Reiten Palace, and all I see is the chaos of mankind. And you. Pathetic weapons of Gaea.

318242060.speaker: 朗香
318242060.content: I don't care about the other places. Turing can do whatever crazy thing he wants, it's not my problem... But in Sasanami at least, I don't want all this trouble.

318242061.content: Akika puts down her chopsticks and stares at Sekhmet, as the frivolous and hypocritical smile on her face gradually fades. In its place is a look of cold arrogance.

318242062.speaker: 朗香
318242062.content: You're wrong, oh loyal servant of CORG. What mankind needs is a ruler, a single, unerring voice who can tell them what to do.

318242063.speaker: 朗香
318242063.content: What Sasanami needs is a god who can rule over everything.

318242065.content: Sekhmet squints her eyes at Akika, and her facial expression slowly cools down. She stares at Akika with her bright red eyes, which may or may not contain whirlpools that can easily drag in the unwitting.

318242066.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318242066.content: Why do I get the feeling that you're afraid of mankind?

318242067.speaker: 朗香
318242067.content: ... That's an interesting statement to make.

318242068.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318242068.content: You keep talking about how weak and small humans are, and yet you take refuge in a human being's body. You sit in a palace built by humans, and use human means to manipulate the fate of others.

318242069.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318242069.content: I generally think of this sort of behavior as approval-seeking. You try hard to imitate what you want to be, and cover up the parts of yourself that don't fit...

318242070.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318242070.content: You're really afraid, aren't you? That you might become public enemy number one instead if one day everyone decides to ignore your identity.

318242071.speaker: 伊邪那美
318242071.content: Looks like the cockroach has been corrected.

318242072.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318242072.content: Fine. It is whatever you say it is.

318242073.content: As I listen on to Sekhmet's and Izanami's merciless ridiculing of Akika, I smile and take a sip of tea. Then, I make a gesture to Ningishzida under the pretense of putting down my cup.

318242075.speaker: 朗香
318242075.content: ... Masayoshi, my child, looks like the banquet's at an end. Time to clear out the tables.

318242077.content: Divine Power gathers around Sekhmet and Izanami. The CORG soldiers standing not far away grip their weapons more tightly in response.

318242078.content: Izuru Masayoshi stands up calmly, seemingly unaffected by what is about to happen. He bows to Akika, then gestures to the Izuru guards.

318242079.content: Some Izuru guards take away the plates in front of us, while others take advantage of this time to quietly move in on us and surround us.

318242080.content: Izuru Masayoshi, still expressionless, takes a spear from a subordinate, and walks behind Akika. His manner is servile like a bodyguard, rather than the Prime Lord that he is.

318242081.speaker: 朗香
318242081.content: Masayoshi, my child, I don't need you here anymore. Go back to Reiten to work on the rebuilding of my palace.

318242082.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318242082.content: While rebuilding the palace is important, I believe that there are other matters I have to attend to here.

318242083.speaker: 朗香
318242083.content: ... Whatever. Just don't get in my way.

318242084.speaker: 朗香
318242084.content: These Modifiers are pretty powerful. Steer clear if you wish to live.

318242085.content: We watch Akika silently. With her eyes locked on to us, she takes one step forward.

318242088.content: Akika lowers his head to look at the spear tip that is piercing out through her chest. The tip is filled with Divine Grace. She's about to turn back when a swarm of Izuru guards swoop in with their spears from a dozen or more angles.

318242089.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318242089.content: Had we really colluded on this, you might've found out long ago.

318242090.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318242090.content:
Please believe that I, your loyal subject, do not speak a single lie.
Killing you is the one thing I must do.

318242091.content: The spears are twisted and pulled out of Akika's body at the same time, taking the life out of it with them.

318242092.content: Izuru Masayoshi leans over Akika's body and picks up the Child of Heaven jade plaque she's wearing. He looks around the square, and raises the plaque triumphantly.

318242093.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318242093.content:
The evil god has been exterminated.
THE EVIL GOD HAS BEEN EXTERMINATED!!!

318242094.content: The cheers of the Izuru guards resound throughout the square. The three Modifiers and I look at each other in surprise, but breathe a sigh of relief nevertheless.

318251003.content: It's a long time before Izuru Masayoshi's spear hand stops trembling and for him to calm down. Then, we see his usual gentle and decorous smile again.

318251004.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251004.content: The evil god had taken over the body of the Child of Heaven, and I'd been controlled by the evil god since I took up my appointment. But now, Sasanami is finally free from evil!

318251005.content: Three figures rush over in a flash.

318251006.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318251006.content: This is CORG's latest standard-issue weapon... How did you get your hands on this thing?

318251007.speaker: 宁希达
318251007.content: Her vital signs are gone... as are the Bane Energy fluctuations. Is she really dead?

318251008.content: Izanami looks down at the corpse on the ground, ambivalent. Although she's said that Akika and Karasugo Haruka were not the same person, the vain hope that her sister was still alive must have been there... until now.

318251009.content: Izuru Masayoshi hands his weapon to a subordinate, then walks over to where Akika's body lies. He straightens his clothes and sits down straight as a ramrod.

318251010.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251010.content:
Don't worry, she won't be able to revive using the anchor points ever again.
By "anchor points," I mean—

318251011.speaker: 我
318251011.content: You don't have to explain. Buzenbo has already told us... and thank you for what you've done for her.

318251012.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251012.content: Oh, that young lady... It's nothing. She was lucky that Akika didn't go after her. I wouldn't have been able to do anything then.

318251013.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251013.content: Men! Take this evil body away!

318251014.content: The Izuru guards follow his order without a word. There's no trace of blood on Akika's body, a body that's no longer human.

318251015.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318251015.content: How can you be sure that she won't come back to life again?

318251016.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251016.content: If you know about the anchor points, you must also know that power comes from the Crane God. And right now, nobody in Sasanami knows the Crane God better than I do.

318251017.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251017.content: You might have heard of the various legends of Sasanami. But what you may not know is that the Crane God is the most special among the five mountain gods.

318251018.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318251018.content: Because the Crane God was the only one that stood on the side of the humans...?

318251019.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251019.content: More precisely, because the Crane God was the mountain god that wanted to become human.

318251020.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251020.content: ... And it was because it trusted humans so much that Akika was able to use humans to double-cross it.

318251021.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318251021.content: A Visbane wanted to become human?

318251022.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251022.content: The Crane God had discovered that the world of Gaea was made to protect humans, which means that humans are the only ones who are free in Gaea and who have true eternal life through Cycles.

318251023.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251023.content: So, the Crane God conducted various experiments together with humans, and told my ancestors everything related to its abilities.

318251024.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251024.content: This information is now in my hands. My ancestors' research has not been in vain, since I've figured out a way to cut off these anchor points.

318251025.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251025.content: The Izuru family is finally free from Akika's control now.

318251026.content: The Izuru guards around us seem to have indeed returned to normal, quite unlike how they were just a while ago.

318251027.speaker: 我
318251027.content: ... Could you tell us why you did that?

318251028.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251028.content: Do you really need to ask? Didn't you people just point out that Sasanami was under the control of a monster?

318251029.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251029.content: Gods have no place in Sasanami. We may have had some inevitable sacrifices along the way, but now Sasanami belongs to the humans again.

318251031.speaker: 伊邪那美
318251031.content: You watched Akika do harm to the other families. No, you actively participated in it.

318251032.speaker: 伊邪那美
318251032.content: The Miyahebi, the Akishika, the Karasugo, my mother, your in-laws... Are all those who died just "inevitable sacrifices" to you?

318251033.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251033.content: Stop being naive, Karasugo lass. Would I have had the opportunity to kill Akika today had I not played along with her? Akika would've killed far more people had I not acted the way I did.

318251034.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251034.content: Just think about what the Sasanami Five have been doing. All they know is to fight and scheme against each other, making everyone in Sasanami fearful and miserable.

318251035.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251035.content: This talk of "rule rotated among the Sasanami Five" was just Akika's way of playing us off each other. It should've been done away with a long time ago.

318251036.speaker: 伊邪那美
318251036.content: ... You've waited until now to act in order to see the demise of the other four families, am I right? So that you can take Sasanami for your own?

318251037.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251037.content: Even without the Child of Heaven fanning the flames, any fight between the five families will still lead to countless deaths.

318251038.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251038.content: Same result, different process, except for that one chance to slay the evil god. I think the choice here is clear.

318251039.speaker: 伊邪那美
318251039.content: … So, we should pretend that nothing has happened?

318251040.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251040.content: What else do you want then? You may not have any idea of the things I've done for Sasanami the two times I've been Prime Lord, but the people of Sasanami do.

318251041.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251041.content: I believe that the truth is self-evident, and I don't need your understanding. History will show the future generations that I'm right.

318251042.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318251042.content: Then, for the good of Sasanami, would you let us into the Photon Rail Nexus now?

318251043.content: Sekhmet obviously doesn't care much for Sasanami's politics, and hasn't forgotten what we came to the Photon Rail station for.

318251044.content: However, our simple courtesy call on the new person in power isn't over yet.

318251045.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251045.content: There's no rush... It just so happens that the four of you each represent a certain party. Let's discuss the transfer of power first.

318251046.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318251046.content: Are you sure you want to talk to us about this?

318251047.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251047.content: Of course, I know that you're in a hurry to repair the Photon Rail network... How about this. I'll have my men bring your technician inside.

318251048.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251048.content: We need to talk about this, for it'll change the way Sasanami is governed. Sasanami will descend into chaos if a final decision hasn't been made by the time CORG intervenes or when this affair comes to light.

318251049.speaker: 伊鹤正芳
318251049.content: Let's just thrash things out to resolve the crisis in Sasanami as soon as possible. I believe that's the result we all want.

318251050.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318251050.content: Fine, fine. We'll talk to you. Just get the person in charge of the Photon Rail Nexus here, too.

318251052.content: Izuru Masayoshi is cut off mid-sentence, his mouth agape. He is making strange gargling noises.

318251053.content: The Modifiers quickly pull me back from what's happening, as they watch the changes in Izuru Masayoshi, vigilant as hawks.

318251054.content: In an instant, his movements have become stiff, and his facial muscles are now distorted. His eyes have turned a strange pale color.

318251055.content: The Izuru guards have become glassy-eyed, and their weapons drop to the ground one by one. Their hands, stripped of intention, fall and dangle to the sides.

318251058.content: The girl had walked out of nowhere, wearing a smile that is both dazzling and menacing at once. There's not a wound, not even a scratch, to be seen on her.

318251059.speaker: 朗香
318251059.content: Traitors will always be punished by the gods!

318261001.content: The sky is now tinged red and orange by the sunset. Streaks of light are pouring down on us through the clouds, and tension has once again filled the air at the square.

318261002.content: We jump to our feet to pick up our weapons and to put as much distance between us and Akika as possible. However, the latter's attention seems to be totally on Izuru Masayoshi.

318261004.speaker: 朗香
318261004.content: You moron. I possess the Cinders of that one. I can't believe you actually thought you could use that kind of poor imitation to deal with me.

318261006.speaker: 朗香
318261006.content: To think I wanted to keep you around to govern the humans... How disappointing of you.

318261007.speaker: 朗香
318261007.content: But for the loyalty and dedication you've shown all these years, I'll make sure that you leave with a good name at least.

318261008.speaker: 朗香
318261008.content: "Prime Lord Izuru dies at the hands of traitors in bid to protect the Child of Heaven." Doesn't that make you sound heroic?

318261010.content: Izuru Masayoshi is about to completely lose control over his body. He turns to look at us.

318261011.content: The gentle and dignified face we usually saw is now filled with a mix of anger, fear, unwillingness, and desire.

318261013.content: That the very last utterance he'd ever make.

318261014.content: The Bane Energy tears into his body every which way, dispersing scraps of fabric, liquid, and lumps of matter into the ether. The man known as "Izuru Masayoshi" disappears from this world in the blink of an eye.

318261015.speaker: 我
318261015.content: Pull back! Don't let her get near you!

318261016.speaker: 朗香
318261016.content: Are we done with our chat already?

318261017.content: Having incited zero response from us, Akika smiles faintly and turns to face us, like a child who has just lost the last bit of interest in a toy.

318261018.speaker: 朗香
318261018.content: None of you believe that I actually have good intentions.

318261019.speaker: 朗香
318261019.content: I don't need disobedient baddies in my Sasanami.

318261020.content: Akika casually waves her hand, and the Bane Energy detector alarm starts blaring. Countless Visbanes and Izuru guards are charging at us.

318262003.speaker: 伊邪那美
318262003.content: Either way, we have to try.

318262004.content: Senba and I share a look, just like we did when we were surrounded by the Imperial Army soldiers on the street when we first entered Kamigyou.

318262005.content: Izanami triggers the Yata no Shinkyou, and a brilliant beam of light shoots out of it. It hits an Imperial Army soldier who's approaching me. The soldier comes to a complete halt, and is then jolted far, far away through the force of Divine Power.

318262006.speaker: 伊邪那美
318262006.content: ... I was right. The mirror is indeed able to reveal the anchor points that are hidden in people.

318262007.speaker: 伊邪那美
318262007.content: They're all linked by these "strings" to Akika, so many of them...

318262008.content: Izanami looks around her and sees the CORG soldiers already in formation. Some of them are lying on the ground, injured, while others are continuing their charge.

318262009.content: She recalls the people she has instigated, the people who have helped her, and the innocent people on the streets...

318262010.content: A slightly cool touch falls on Izanami's cheek. She turns her head to see Hisame's soft fingers caressing her.

318262016.speaker: 伊邪那美
318262016.content: The alter-dimension is responding to me. Maybe we can kill Akika by following the anchor points.

318262017.content: ... What do we have to do?

318262018.speaker: 伊邪那美
318262018.content: It'll take... everyone's power to work.

318262019.content: Izanami closes her eyes and focuses her thoughts and Divine Power on the Yata no Shinkyou.

318262020.content: The mirror is like a vast ocean, but her Divine Power is like a small pebble. In the past, all she ever wanted was to create a slight ripple. But now, what she needs is a giant crashing wave.

318262021.content: It's like all the Divine Power is being drained from Izanami's body. But she neither flinches nor stops, choosing to let the process continue instead.

318262022.speaker: 伊邪那美
318262022.content: I don't know who you are, but please help me... and help Sasanami.

318262023.content: Her body seems to have become cold, and her consciousness, thrown into the infinite darkness. She struggles to find a glimmer of light. It's like she's in the back of a mirror.

318262025.content: She's standing at the top of a mountain and looking at a ray of sunlight come down. The light illuminates the entire mountain and down to the whole of Sasanami. The hills, the cities, and everyone in it.

318262027.content: "A blessing upon the soil, and a warmth over the vast fields."

318262028.content: "The sun of suns, the light of lights."

318262029.content: There seems to be some kind of music in the air, music that is penetrating all tangible things as well as shining a light on Izanami. This light may not be bright or dazzling, but it is enough to make all the Visbanes feel the glare.

318262030.content: Akika, who's been standing there controlling the Imperial Army soldiers, turns her head in astonishment and looks at the seeming ordinary and petite girl.

318262031.content: Izanami's consciousness is spreading throughout Sasanami along with the sunlight on that mountain... It spreads through the Photon Rail Nexus, to the city walls of Shimogyou, and to every street and alley in Kamigyou.

318262032.content: She is seeing everyone who's being controlled by Akika. Their heads are hanging down, and they're wailing helplessly in their motionless bodies.

318262033.content: Izanami reaches out to each and every one of them.

318262034.speaker: 伊邪那美
318262034.content: I understand. You're trapped here in the dark and under control. It's all so unfair...

318262035.speaker: 伊邪那美
318262035.content: Don't be afraid... Just leave it all to me.

318262037.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318262037.content: She... seems to be connecting to those controlled by the anchor points?

318262038.content: Izanami is unable to answer for the time being, for she's still using the Yata no Shinkyou to look for every person in Sasanami who's being anchored.

318262039.content: The mirror is showing countless faces. At the same time, a great many lights are also coming from the mirror, surrounding her slender body.

318262040.content: She squats down and hugs her knees, as if she's still the silent girl in the dark room.

318262041.content: But this time round, she puts all her Divine Power into this motion, and establishes a fragile, yet tough, link that envelops the whole of Sasanami.

318262042.speaker: 混混头目
318262042.content: Huh? Boss! Look, the Akishika lad has awakened!

318262043.speaker: 极川藤
318262043.content: Did those people from Kamigyou really pull it off?

318262044.speaker: 秋鹿卫兵
318262044.content: Um... What's going on? Where's the Imperial Army?

318262045.speaker: 混混头目
318262045.content:
Don't worry, they're gone now.
How do you feel?

318262046.speaker: 秋鹿卫兵
318262046.content: ... It's like I'm being tethered to something.

318262048.speaker: 秋鹿卫兵
318262048.content: No, I... I can sense... many other people too...

318262049.speaker: 秋鹿卫兵
318262049.content: There's a voice, and she wants me to help her...

318262051.speaker: 伊邪那美
318262051.content: Resist. Resist that which is controlling your life.

318262052.content: As Izanami cuts off the anchor points, the Imperial Army soldiers on the battlefield lose control and fall to the ground. All of a sudden, the tide is turned for the CORG fighters.

318262053.content: Izanami raises the Yata no Shinkyou up high, allowing the mirror to reflect the grand illusion. It's as if she can now see the waking faces of thousands at once. The massive will that's arisen from the collective is now pushing back at the other end of the anchor point connections.

318262054.speaker: 伊邪那美
318262054.content: Human beings... are not your tools.

318262055.content: As everyone watches on in amazement and hope, Izanami points the mirror at a glum-looking Akika. A brief pause later, a beam of light almost as tall as a human bursts out, whiting out Akika's body instantly.

318262056.content: The square falls silent. Everyone present is watching this massive attack with trepidation, hoping that it'd wipe Akika off the face of Gaea.

318262057.content: A thin layer of sweat has formed on Izanami's forehead, and she quickly turns pale.

318262059.speaker: 伊邪那美
318262059.content: Don't worry, Questioner... The anchor points are useless now...

318262060.speaker: 伊邪那美
318262060.content: I'll be fine... in a while...

318262061.speaker: 朗香
318262061.content: You'll be fine "in a while," you say...?

318262062.content: A cold, bloodcurdling laugh can be heard from the bright light. It rings clearly across the entire square, sending chills down everyone's spine.

318262063.content: A thin line of black Bane Energy emerges from the light, shooting straight towards the Yata no Shinkyou. Izanami tries to stop it with her Divine Power, but the defense she put up is immediately shattered.

318262064.content: The mirror shakes violently when it's hit by the Bane Energy. The light from the mirror has disappears, too. Izanami's face is almost fully drained of color by now, and as the mirror falls, so does she. I run over to help her up.

318262065.speaker: 我
318262065.content: Why is your Divine Grace so weak... You're seriously hurt.

318262066.speaker: 伊邪那美
318262066.content: This is not the time to worry about me...

318262068.content: Akika is still standing where we last saw her, and still with nary a scratch on her person.

318262069.speaker: 朗香
318262069.content: Fancy wanting to use my powers against me. How naive of you, little girl.

318262070.speaker: 伊邪那美
318262070.content: ... At least you'll never be able to revive yourself once you die again.

318262071.speaker: 朗香
318262071.content:
The anchor points are only a way for me to make sure that people are obedient.
As for coming back to life... ha ha, I don't have to go to such trouble just to deal with you people.

318262072.speaker: 朗香
318262072.content: I was just playing with you and that Masayoshi lad earlier. I can't believe that you all thought you could kill me.

318262073.content: The Bane Energy around us starts to violently fluctuate. Izanami's diminutive body floats into the air, stirring the surrounding Bane Energy and air like a vortex, and the sky turns dark.

318262074.content: The silent Izuru guards all around us are swept up by the fluctuating Bane Energy, and before they can even let out a scream, they are swallowed up in the Bane Energy vortex.

318262075.speaker: 宁希达
318262075.content: Akika... Oh dear me, what is that...?

318262076.content: A colossal monster with the wings of a crane, the tail of a snake, a body beyond distortion has appeared in the sky above the Photon Rail Nexus, and the surging Bane Energy threatens to knock us off our feet any moment.

318262077.speaker: 朗香
318262077.content: I... am... the true master of Sasanami!

318262078.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318262078.content: This is not good... the Bane Energy in her is still rising sharply!

318262079.content: Seeing that the Bane Energy surging around Akika has turned into projectiles that are now headed for Izanami, Sekhmet quickly pulls back to where Izanami is. After a brief charge, she fiercely answers Akika's attack with her chainsaw.

318262080.content: She brings her chainsaw up high, then bears it down. The projectiles are shattered by the Divine Grace's blazing light, and the Bane Energy subsequently sets off a huge atmospheric wave that flattens everything around for quite a distance.

318262081.content: But just as the Bane Energy storm dissipates, a ghostly hand wraps around the chainsaw and presses against Sekhmet's chest.

318262084.content: Like a shot from an EM gun, a highly condensed bolt of Bane Energy blasts Sekhmet's body away.

318262085.content: Sekhmet's ears and nose are tingling amid the sharp buzzing. She coughs up a large mouthful of blood, and her body rolls to a stop before Izanami.

318262087.content: After we manage to dodge the strongest wave, Ningishzida and I dash over to Sekhmet.

318262090.content: Ningishzida stares at the injured Sekhmet, her lips pursed. Without a word, she starts taking out medicines from her kit while concentrating healing Divine Power on Sekhmet's body.

318262091.content: It is only until Sekhmet is visibly breathing again that Ningishzida lets out a soft whimper.

318262092.speaker: 宁希达
318262092.content: I... I don't want anybody to leave me again...

318262093.speaker: 朗香
318262093.content: And now you know what despair feels like? You people should have listened to me when you had the chance.

318262094.speaker: 我
318262094.content: Senba, we'll take care of things from here.

318262095.content: Senba nods. The Yata no Shinkyou in her arms is still glowing. Judging from the expression on her face, she's still blocking the anchor point links, though for how much longer would be anyone's guess.

318262096.content: And above all this, the arrogant monster still hovering, stretching its huge body into every direction it can find.

318262097.speaker: 朗香
318262097.content: You people should feel honored that you get to see what a true god looks like before you die.

318262098.content: Several Source Layer rifts open up around Akika, out of which the Visbanes come pouring. This is a severe blow to the soldiers who are still picking themselves up after that last wave.

318262099.content: Akika looks around the battlefield, sneers, and then looks back at the Photon Rail Nexus.

318271001.content: Many people have all kinds of fantasies about death, because it's something that will happen to everyone eventually.

318271002.content: But for the CORG soldiers who are now on the battlefield, whatever fantasies they may have had will have to wait,

318271003.content: for their crosshairs are now all trained on either Imperial Army soldiers or Visbanes. We're like a tiny boat that's being tossed mercilessly on at a boundless sea of despair, a sea where even our hoarse screams are ruthlessly drowned.

318271005.speaker: 宁希达
318271005.content:
Sekhmet's injuries are more or less healed, but she hasn't come to yet.
Izanami's Divine Power is draining fast though...

318271006.content: Ningishzida appears to have become used to the battle atmosphere. Although her eyes are still red, her movements and tone are much more stable than before.

318271008.speaker: 我
318271008.content: It's not time to give up yet... Keep them safe.

318271009.content: Akika is about to return to the Photon Rail Nexus. It's now or never. I run to the front by myself and pick up a CORG standard-issue rifle from the ground. Then, I remove its magazine, take out a red tracer round from my pocket, and load it.

318271010.content: I take aim in the direction of the Photon Rail station building, and following a deep breath, I pull the trigger. A red trail flies past Akika, across the battlefield, and hits a bulletproof glass window on the outside of the building.

318271011.content: It is almost in the same instant that a shot of Bane Energy from Akika's hand finds me and pierces my body.

318271013.content: I look down at the holes in my shirt, and shrug at Akika.

318271014.speaker: 我
318271014.content: Where are you going? We're not done yet.

318271015.speaker: 朗香
318271015.content: Hmm. Interesting. Is it going to be just you? Or that toy in your hand?

318271016.speaker: 我
318271016.content: This "toy" has hit a number of Cognizant Visbanes already.

318271017.speaker: 朗香
318271017.content: You must've been really well protected if you can survive until now. I'll remind you that you don't have any Modifiers with you now.

318271019.speaker: 朗香
318271019.content: Hmm? Have I found your sore spot?

318271020.speaker: 朗香
318271020.content: This is just how human beings are. You think you can do a lot, but you're actually nothing without your protection.

318271021.speaker: 朗香
318271021.content: Do you not reflect on yourself when you see the people around you fall one by one? Tell me, how many people have you seen killed by your so-called justice?

318271022.speaker: 我
318271022.content: … That's why I say that Cognizant Visbanes are different from Modifiers. No matter how human-like Cognizants are, they cannot be regarded as human beings.

318271023.content: I shake my head, glance at the Photon Rail station building, and put down the gun in my hand.

318271025.speaker: 我
318271025.content: You are right. Humans are fragile, need protection, and rely on other people to survive.

318271026.speaker: 我
318271026.content: I myself am no exception. I'm so used to having people around me and trying to protect me... that I seem to have taken all of it for granted.

318271027.speaker: 我
318271027.content: But that's not a reason for me to take a step back. Because for humans, "protecting" and "being protected" are never exclusive of each other.

318271028.speaker: 我
318271028.content: We all have something we can do and a reason for living. The living continue the world on behalf of those who have passed so that their sacrifices wouldn't be in vain...

318271029.speaker: 我
318271029.content: This is just how what humans are. It's never just one person who's powerful, it's "us."

318271030.content: Just as I finish speaking, a striking red beam of light lifts straight into the sky from the Photon Rail station's transmission tower, as if the red tracer I fired has been magnified hundreds of times.

318271031.speaker: 朗香
318271031.content: There are still Visbanes inside the Photon Rail station... Did you people sneak your Modifiers inside?

318271032.content: I say nothing, and watch mutely as a CORG soldier walks out of the building.

318271033.content: He sits down right outside with some difficulty and takes off his helmet with his free hand. Then, he fishes out a cigarette and puts it in his mouth before raising his chin at me from a distance.

318271034.content: No one lights the cigarette for him. He smiles nevertheless, bites down on the cigarette with his last of his strength, and then his head slowly droops to his chest as he comes to his final rest.

318271035.speaker: 我
318271035.content: … We'll see many, many people die today. What we have to do is make their deaths worthwhile.

318271037.content: Akika turns back and stares at me. The Visbanes that'd been raring to go seem to have finally received her assent, and rush towards me.

318271040.content: Scorching flames have blasted into the battlefield like meteors as the ice-cold naginata carves out a safe zone around me. The roar of gun and cannon fire is drowning out the howling of the Visbanes, which are being forced back by the rounds and bullets being rained on them.

318271041.content: I turned around to see a massive convoy of vehicles of all kinds rushing into the battlefield in what looks like a frontline made of steel.

318271042.speaker: 暗御津羽
318271042.content: How are you? Are you all right?

318271045.speaker: 暗御津羽
318271045.content: That red light... does that mean that the Photon Rail is fixed?

318271046.speaker: 我
318271046.content: Not yet. That was just a signal flare. Looks like it worked well, though I'm not sure if it's fooled Akika...

318271047.speaker: 我
318271047.content: Our engineer's already inside trying to restore the Photon Rail network. But it'll take some time.

318271048.speaker: 我
318271048.content: Thanks for getting here so quickly... To be honest, you got here earlier than I thought you'd.

318271049.speaker: 暗御津羽
318271049.content: I'm glad I made it here in time...

318271051.content: Kuramitsuha picks up her naginata as she sees Ningishzida arrive to take care of me.

318271052.content: Dark fire gradually appears all over Kagutsuchi's body. He raises his head and stares at the Visbanes and the giant figure of Akika in front of him.

318271053.speaker: 迦具土
318271053.content: I've been waiting for this moment since the day I was selected...

318271054.speaker: 迦具土
318271054.content: I won't let you escape this time.

318272001.content: Perhaps because Izanami has cut off the anchor links, while we're fighting Akika the Imperial Army soldiers who've escaped Akika's control have slowly reopened their eyes.

318272002.content: It's as if they finally woke up from a long nightmare and the memories of being controlled are flooding back into their minds. Real thoughts and false beliefs have become intertwined. They look around blankly while still holding their weapons in their hands.

318272003.speaker: 皇城禁军
318272003.content: What's going on... How did things...

318272005.content: Who should they point their weapons at? Should they continue to carry out the original order they received, or turn around and stare directly at the god high above?

318272006.speaker: ？？？
318272006.content: ... My comrades of the Imperial Army, let us fight to take back Sasanami!!!

318272007.content: A deafening cry echoes across the battlefield. Karasugo Sendou is at the head of what's remained of the Karasugo men, holding a CORG standard-issue weapon in one hand. The Karasugo have positioned themselves right in front of the densest cluster of Visbanes on the field.

318272008.content: In a departure from his usual demeanor, Karasugo Sendou puts himself at the very front and bravely faces the onslaught of Bane Energy.

318272010.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318272010.content: What are you waiting for?! The Child of Heaven was harmed by this false god and is no longer here!

318272011.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318272011.content: Do you still remember why you joined the Imperial Army? And what you're supposed to defend with your spears???

318272012.speaker: 皇城禁军
318272012.content: ... We swore to protect Sasanami with our lives.

318272013.speaker: 皇城禁军
318272013.content: Protect Sasanami with our lives! Justice for the Child of Heaven!!!

318272014.content: The Imperial Army soldiers finally come to their senses. That the monstrous Visbanes are their targets is clear, and they all turn around and point their weapons at Akika too.

318272015.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318272015.content: Exterminate the evil god and take back Sasanami!

318272017.content: The soldiers are filled with anger, for they've been deceived into doing evil things themselves. They're also angry about the loss of Sasanami to a false god hiding behind a human identity.

318272018.content: Even though humans can do little damage to Visbanes on their own, like sea waves that keep coming and coming the crowd is able to hold the Visbanes back.

318272019.content: This is a critical moment for Sasanami. There are no weak people here, only weapons held high and the determination to never retreat.

318272020.speaker: 朗香
318272020.content: Hmph. No matter how many ants there are, they're still ants. Do they really think what they do matters?

318272021.content: Akika's gaze remains steady even as she sees the Visbanes disperse and the humans fall.

318272022.content: Her massive being lowers from midair, like a huge boulder falling into a lake. This motion stirs up a Bane Energy storm that does not distinguish between friend and foe.

318281001.content: The soldiers left in the rear are moving back and forth, looking nervously in the direction of the Photon Rail Nexus.

318281002.speaker: 科尔盖士兵A
318281002.content: Do we really want to continue standing guard here when there's a fight inside? Who knows how things are going inside, or if those reinforcements that just arrived have caught up...

318281003.speaker: 科尔盖士兵B
318281003.content: Ow! Look over there, the Bane Energy! Looks terrifying!

318281004.content: The Bane Energy, which is rolling in from several kilometers away, is clearly coming with some force. Several people scramble to prop up their defenses. The others who have fallen to the ground are looking at each other in shock.

318281005.content: The crane-like wings on the monster flap, sweeping a surge of Bane Energy towards the square.

318281006.content: The impact of the Bane Energy ravages the humans and Visbanes on the square alike, and silences the chaotic battlefield for a moment.

318281007.speaker: 宁希达
318281007.content: W-w-what is wrong with her?! She's attacking Visbanes too?!

318281008.speaker: 我
318281008.content: That's just how Cognizant Visbanes are. Ordinary Visbanes are expendable to them.

318281009.speaker: 我
318281009.content: ... I have to admit, she's really powerful. I'm afraid she thinks that she can take care of us handily just by herself.

318281010.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318281010.content: Conceit gets in the way of a long life. It's a good thing for us that she's acting so brazenly.

318281011.speaker: 宁希达
318281011.content: Ah, you're back. How are you feeling?

318281012.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318281012.content: I'm alright... I just didn't think that she'd be so powerful.

318281013.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318281013.content: I need a bit of time to get ready. Looks like Izanami can't hold on for much longer.

318281014.speaker: 我
318281014.content: ... You know what will happen if we use that.

318281015.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318281015.content: ... It's not such a bad thing though, is it?

318281016.content: Right behind us, Senba is still hovering in the air with her eyes tightly shut. But the Divine Power fluctuations on her have become very weak.

318281017.content: Akika seems to know this too, and takes just a cursory glance at us.

318281018.speaker: 朗香
318281018.content: Back off, humans. Obey me and you'll live.

318281019.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318281019.content: I'd have believed you in the past. But now, never.

318281020.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318281020.content: What we want is not survival, but a life without fear. What we want is a Sasanami that belongs to the people of Sasanami.

318281021.speaker: 朗香
318281021.content: You should count yourself lucky. The Karasugo are the only ones left among the Sasanami Five.

318281022.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318281022.content: The Sasanami Five... Ha! What Sasanami Five?! I refuse to take part in this swindle of yours any longer!

318281023.speaker: 朗香
318281023.content: Pfft. You're just like that Izuru Masayoshi.

318281024.content: Akika raises an arm to strike at Karasugo Sendou from afar, but no one can see the attack she launches. I only hear Ningishzida yelling "Oh no!!!" from behind me...

318281025.content: My heart sinks. I'm about to call out to Karasugo Sendou when there is a clap of thunder, and something between him and Akika is cut off.

318281027.content: A cherry-red light blade presses in on Akika from the void, forcing her to retreat. However, the ground beneath her collapses, as if she's stepped on something, and she is swallowed in a sudden fountain of Divine Grace from the ground.

318281028.content: Three figures gather at the front of the line, and all of them are able to clear out a large open space around them almost instantly with their swords.

318281030.speaker: 宁希达
318281030.content: Wow! Your Sakuragiri is amazing, Buzenbo!

318281031.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318281031.content: We were able to locate Admin thanks to you, Ningishzida.

318281033.speaker: 国常立
318281033.content: We're not that late. Not considering how we rushed here anyway.

318281034.speaker: 国常立
318281034.content: I was so worried that my dear Admin would get hurt...

318281037.speaker: 我
318281037.content: She's blocking Akika's connections to her anchor points. I'm not sure how, though. If we want to kill Akika, we have to do it now.

318281039.content: Tsukuyomi nods and looks around the battlefield. She smells the blood heavy in the air, and cannot help but feel the determination gird her sword arm.

318281041.speaker: 我
318281041.content: It was the best we could do considering the circumstances. We wouldn't be standing here now if not for them.

318281042.speaker: 月读
318281042.content: ... That blow from Kuninotokotachi would've hardly hurt Akika. I leave the commanding to you, Admin.

318281043.speaker: 我
318281043.content: Alright... I want you to just contain her for now. The Photon Rail Nexus is already being repaired, so all we have to do is to keep her from there. And safety first.

318281045.content: Without another word, Buzenbo rushes towards where the smoke and dust have dissipated. A wall of cherry-red Divine Grace repels several incoming bundles of Bane Energy.

318281047.content: Tsukuyomi and Kuninotokotachi start moving immediately. As reassuring having Pheasant Squad around is, the power of Buzenbo's new Access Key is also astonishing. It's so powerful, it even holds back Akika in an instant.

318281048.content: Nothing exhilarates more than visible battle results. Once again, everyone throws themselves into battle to keep Visbanes from attacking Pheasant Squad.

318281051.content: Kuramitsuha also nods at me. I point towards the Photon Rail station building.

318281052.speaker: 我
318281052.content: Our technician inside needs more time, and Akika may wise up to that soon. I need you to go protect the tech. But be ready to come back and help anytime.

318281053.speaker: 我
318281053.content: ... I keep having this feeling that we won't get rid of Akika anytime soon.

318282001.speaker: 朗香
318282001.content: Just fight me if you want to. Who cares about those humans?

318282003.content: Akika has taken advantage of Buzenbo's brief moment of distraction to move in and hit her on the shoulder. Then, she sees the calm in Buzenbo's eyes, and realizes that she's been fooled.

318282005.content: Tsukuyomi doesn't hesitate for even a split second. She unsheathes Shinri, and focuses all her Divine Power on Akika's neck.

318282006.content: Akika disappears in the glare of the lightning. However, there's a look of incredulity on Tsukuyomi's face.

318282009.content: While Tsukuyomi's aim with Shinri was true, it has stopped an inch or so from Akika's neck, and no matter how hard Tsukuyomi tries, she just can't get it to go closer.

318282010.content: There is not even trace of damage on Akika at all. Instead, all the impact and Divine Grace are being absorbed by a thin layer of pale blue light around her body.

318282011.speaker: 我
318282011.content: Is that... computing power?! She's connected to the Photon Rail network's computing power.

318282012.speaker: 朗香
318282012.content: Now the Gaea you so badly want to protect has become my weapon.

318282013.content: Akika waves away Shinri nonchalantly. She's managed to somehow convert all that computing power into a massive amount of kinetic energy that is simply impossible to overcome.

318282014.content: Buzenbo and Kuninotokotachi run up to help, but are also repelled by Akika. Both of them are looking pale. It looks like they're seriously injured.

318282015.content: Everyone is chilled by this sudden turn of events. While they didn't necessarily think that Pheasant Squad would be able eliminate Akika, they also didn't expect them to lose so quickly.

318282016.speaker: 朗香
318282016.content: Isn't this thing awesome? Seems a little unfair to use it on your people like this.

318282017.speaker: 朗香
318282017.content: But... Like I told the three of you before, I won't hold back if I see you again.

318282018.content: The three members of Pheasant Squad are hit by several vicious blows. Kuninotokotachi is about to get back to her feet when she suddenly sees several Imperial Army soldiers in front of her standing up and charging forward no matter what.

318282020.content: The wings on Akika's head flutter, as if they're pulling on the anchor point in the Imperial Army soldiers' bodies. But the Yata no Shinkyou also lights up at this very moment.

318282022.content: The thin lines of light are holding steady, no matter how Akika tries to "pluck" at them.

318282023.content: Meanwhile, the humans' cries keep on coming and keep getting louder each time. These are the cries of those who once worshiped her and respected her, and are now resisting her with the most strident of ways.

318282024.content: Although she's still not hurt at all, Akika is really mad now. She glares at Izanami, computing power gathered in her right hand, and points an accusing finger at her.

318282025.speaker: 朗香
318282025.content: You! It was you and that mirror!

318282026.content: Even Pheasant Squad didn't expect Akika to suddenly switch to another target, and can only watch dumbly as the light blue energy beam speeds towards Izanami and the Yata no Shinkyou.

318282027.content:
Ningishzida closes her eyes in fright, then gathers all her power to raise a protective shield.
The beam hits the shield, and the entire square shakes like we're in an earthquake.

318282029.content: Pheasant Squad launches another attack on Akika. But Akika just stands there, raises her other arm, and forms a giant blade more than five meters long with the computing power in her hand.

318282030.content: Akika has no need for any swordsmanship skills at all. The ensuing high-speed horizontal slash knocks all three Modifiers into the air. Cracks are also appearing all over Ningishzida's shield.

318282031.speaker: 宁希达
318282031.content: What do we do, Admin... We can't...

318282033.content: Just as Akika launches her attack, I pick up a CORG standard-issue shield from the ground and switch it to mirror reflect mode.

318282034.content: I push Ningishzida away when I hear her cry for help. I stand there, stare into that cataclysmic beam, take a step forward, and raise my shield.

318282036.speaker: 我
318282036.content: (Since we're talking computing power here, who knows...)

318282037.content: For the first time, I can truly feel Nishida's determination when she stood in front of me with a shield. Without the resolve to never retreat, there is no way to stand firm and face the attack.

318282038.speaker: 我
318282038.content: (Let's see if the shield skills you've taught me will come in handy, Ver...)

318282039.content: I stand in the best force-bearing posture I was taught, and raise the shield up high at an angle almost perpendicular to the beam.

318282040.content: The energy beam hits as expected, like a heavy hammer falling from the sky. It hits so hard it breaks my both arms. I grit my teeth and refuse to allow my body to sway or step back.

318282041.content: Finally, the energy beam stops, reflected into the sky before it crushes my ribs, as if it's a cannonball that's just hit armor. The deflected beam narrowly misses Senba.

318282042.speaker: 我
318282042.content: See? I can do it too.

318282043.speaker: 我
318282043.content: Ow, this really hurts... Ningishzida, could you help me—

318282044.content: My arms are dangling lifelessly. I turn to look at Ningishzida. She's trying her hardest to extend her hand towards me, but is knocked back by a burst of Bane Energy. I turn back and see Akika standing in front of me.

318282045.content: There's a chill in my chest, and the noise of the chaos around me starts to recede into the background. I look down at the Imperial Army spear sticking out of me... I think I hear many people calling out to me.

318282046.speaker: 朗香
318282046.content: You can die with pride now. You're totally exceeded expectations for a human being.

318282047.speaker: 我
318282047.content: ... "As a human being"...? Why do you keep harping on this...

318282048.content: The tearing sensation of the spear in my chest is now getting mixed up with the other pains in my body. I stretch out my arm to hold my spear firmly and steady myself. Then, I raise my head to refocus my somewhat blurred vision, and smile at Akika.

318282049.speaker: 我
318282049.content: You already lost the moment you decided to make me your target.

318282050.content: I switch to holding my spear in my right hand. It shakes for a moment from the pain, then stops. With my hand now steady, I aim my weapon at Akika and pull the trigger with my thumb.

318282052.content: The bullet hits Akika, who is just meters away, and explodes into a large cloud of smoke.

318282053.content: The sleeping lioness responds to my call, and her Divine Power comes to life behind me. I raise my brows in surprise and satisfaction, and close my eyes tiredly.

318282054.content: After confirming that she's indeed to put the Omega gear to use, Sekhmet closes his eyes and began to call on the Divine Power in her body in an almost mechanical way. Her consciousness has sank into the deepest part of her.

318282055.content: She can vaguely hear those calls from near and far, calls that touch every corner of her memories and which are echoing nonstop in the dark of her consciousness.

318282056.speaker: 秋鹿绯美子
318282056.content: Humanity can be great. Light a candle of courage and it will ignite a vast land of hope.

318282057.speaker: 特工H
318282057.content: As long as there are still people brave enough to make this decision, we'll still be "human" and our civilization will never die.

318282058.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318282058.content: Exterminate the evil god and take back Sasanami!

318282059.content: It is like she's seeing the war between humans and gods right in front of her. She can hear the cries of resistance to fate, and see the blood and sacrifices that are part of the very fabric of mankind.

318282061.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
318282061.content: ... Simply put, the Omega gear temporarily rewrites your Modifier permissions and provides additional Divine Grace for a very short time.

318282062.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
318282062.content: But that comes at the price of severe damage to your body and your Divine Power, and the damage may be permanent.

318282063.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318282063.content: It's a small price to pay, I understand. If you encounter someone you can't beat, it's better to have a trump card than not anyway.

318282065.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
318282065.content: What are you chuckling to yourself about?

318282066.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318282066.content:
Nothing. I feel honored that I've been given the one and only unit.
Send my thanks to the techs who developed this thing for me.

318282067.speaker: 卡玛乌
318282067.content: Are you taking this thing with you?

318282069.speaker: 卡玛乌
318282069.content: ... I hope you never get to use it.

318282070.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318282070.content: Nobody apart from me would want to use this thing. That's why it's been given to me.

318282071.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318282071.content: Those "scary" consequences aside, I really hope this will work when it's needed.

318282072.speaker: 我
318282072.content: ... You know what will happen if we use that.

318282073.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318282073.content: ... It's not such a bad thing though, is it?

318282074.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318282074.content: I've been carrying it all this while anyway. Why not use it?

318282075.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318282075.content: Besides, it's not such a bad thing to become human...

318282076.content: She can feel the sound and light gradually pour in from her senses, and her consciousness returns to the container that is her body.

318282077.content: Sekhmet has finally tuned her Divine Power to the level optimal for the Omega gear. She flashes a megawatt smile, her eyes burning with the desire to fight to the death.

318282079.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318282079.content: Two minutes. You're right on time, Admin...

318282081.content: The Divine Power is pouring from the unlocked key on her wrist to her Access Key next to her.

318282082.content: Her Access Key is now running at full power. It is resonating with the Divine Power, making for massive reverberations inside her body.

318282084.content: There's a slight sting on Sekhmet's skin as the reagent is injected from the key into her body. As the liquid flows throughout her body, the existence named "Sekhmet" is being rewritten on the data level.

318282085.content: She's well aware of what she'll become after this rewriting. But she doesn't want to think about it now. After all, she still has a lot to do.

318282086.content: As the data is being rewritten, the Divine Power around Sekhmet takes on a strange complexion, and the air trembles, creating minor bursts here and there.

318282087.content: Akika stares at Sekhmet, as if there's an extremely terrifying existence gestating there, and she's holding her breath before she knows it.

318282088.speaker: 朗香
318282088.content: Wh-where is all that power coming from?!

318282089.content: Akika is no longer interested in ending my life. The threat of imminent death has made her back away in an instant.

318282090.content: Sekhmet is standing behind me, holding me up. She hands me over to Ningishzida.

318282092.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318282092.content:
It's my turn to tell you to shush now.
Don't worry, this won't kill me.

318282094.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318282094.content: Take the Administrator to treatment now, Ningishzida.

318282096.content: Sekhmet is adjusting to the new strength in her body with every step she takes while dragging her chainsaw towards the surprised Akika. She exhales, preparing for that first strike Akika will never see coming.

318282097.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318282097.content: H, F, K. Thank you for finishing off the Crow God. The enemy we have left can only be eliminated with pure power.

318282098.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318282098.content: And that's... the most fortunate thing for me!

318291001.speaker: 朗香
318291001.content: ... So that power doesn't belong to you.

318291002.speaker: 朗香
318291002.content: There's always a price to pay for using power that's not yours. Just like that Karasugo lass, you won't last very long.

318291003.content: Despite the tough front she's putting up, Akika is moving extremely cautiously and showing no inclination to fight at all.

318291004.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291004.content: Shouldn't I be the one to say that? The computing power of the Photon Rail network doesn't belong to you either, so what's the price you'll pay?

318291005.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291005.content: Let me guess. I'm great at solving riddles.

318291007.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291007.content: You didn't use this power to kill Kagutsuchi when you were at the Miyahebi mansion, and neither did you use it against Pheasant Squad in Kamigyou.

318291008.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291008.content: You have what is obviously a strong power, but have chosen to hide it until now. Why...? Because we're at the Photon Rail station.

318291009.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291009.content: Logically, the best plan for you is to meet us at the Imperial City, which is guarded by the Imperial Army. But instead, you've chosen to lead your men to a place like this. Maybe you want to keep us from occupying the Photon Rail station...

318291010.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291010.content: But since you know that we're planning to take the station, why not just destroy the building? Or is it that... you need it as well???

318291011.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291011.content: That's to say, only here, near an intact Photon Rail system, do you have the ability to call on computing power.

318291012.speaker: 朗香
318291012.content: Nice reasoning. But so what if you know?

318291013.speaker: 朗香
318291013.content: Don't tell me you want to destroy the Photon Rail station? Then Sasanami will be cut off forever.

318291014.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291014.content: There's no need to do that. As you know, I'm from CORG, and I happen to know some principles related to the Photon Rail network.

318291015.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291015.content: No matter who the target is, the operating principle is the same... So, if you can use Bane Energy to block Sasanami from the network, I can also use Divine Grace to block you.

318291016.content: Akika becomes flustered as she sees the look of excitement on Sekhmet's face, and tries her best to distance herself from Sekhmet.

318291017.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291017.content: I'm not here to play hide-and-seek with you!

318291018.content: The sound of an explosion rocks the square. Sekhmet disappears from where she's standing, leaving behind a trail of afterimages in her wake. She finally ends up behind Akika, and then with a kick sends Akika tumbling to the ground.

318291019.content: Sekhmet does not give Akika a chance to get up. The Access Key hits the computing power shield around Akika's body with dozens of times more Divine Grace than before.

318291020.speaker: 朗香
318291020.content: You're counting on pure power? You must be dreaming...

318291021.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291021.content: My powers may not be fancy. But to deal with you...

318291022.content: The chainsaw is coming down on Akika again, and more cracks in the ground appear around Akika. The square is shaking so much, neither humans nor Visbanes are able to fight any longer.

318291023.content: Sekhmet hacks at Akika again and again with her incredible power. Akika tries to find a chance to escape, but is completely unable to move.

318291024.content: Even if Gaea can provide an endless supply of computing power, there is a limit to how fast the Photon Rail network can transmit data, and as the supply lags behind the consumption, cracks finally appear in the shield.

318291027.content: The Omega gear is still rewriting Sekhmet's permissions, and an endless stream of Divine Grace is flowing into her body, allowing her to keep up her attack.

318291028.content: The square is echoing with the terrifying sounds of energy colliding and violently converted into other forces. Even Sekhmet herself cannot remember how many times she's already raised her saw.

318291029.content: However, she can feel the vibrations in her weapon changing. Every slightest penetration into the shield was a slight tilt in the scale of victory.

318291030.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291030.content: Go on! Let's see where you can go!

318291031.content: Then, a final blow, and the shield completely breaks. The chainsaw keeps on going, however, and slashes Akika from her shoulder to her waist on the other side with the roar of Divine Grace. A large ball of black Bane Energy splashes out from the gaping cut.

318291032.content: With this pause in Sekhmet's attack, Akika is finally able to get out from under her. She desperately tries to repair the wound using Bane Energy while calling on her computing power but to no avail.

318291033.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291033.content: Now, do you still think that you can win...? Hmm...

318291034.content: Sekhmet is able to launch another attack but the Divine Power level in her body is falling, and fast. Soon, she's even weaker than Akika.

318291035.content: The frightened Akika stops for a moment, stunned, then starts to laugh out loud.

318291036.speaker: 朗香
318291036.content: So that's all it is to your crutch?

318291037.speaker: 朗香
318291037.content: That's enough from you, then. Now it's my turn!

318291038.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291038.content: ... Do you think that we still need the Prime power as we did before to deal with you now?

318291039.content: A signal flare goes off into the sky. Akika looks at me with my gun pointed at her, and is about to attack me when she is pushed back by several Divine Grace rounds flying at her from somewhere.

318291040.content: The Modifiers have already surrounded her by the time her Bane Energy shield is up.

318291041.content: Sekhmet is holding her chainsaw as she stands between Akika and I. Even though her Divine Power is still fading away, she shows no trace of fear at all.

318291042.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291042.content: The intelligence of humans, the courage of humans, the determination of humans... Akika, this is something you can never imitate.

318291043.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318291043.content: This is the end of the road for you and your lies.

318292001.content: With her Bane Energy wiped out by Sekhmet's Divine Power, there is nothing left to support Akika's colossal body, which collapses from above the Photon Rail Nexus and leaves only the body of a girl on the ground.

318292002.content: The Visbanes on the square are now without their creator and commander. Lost and confused, they let out piercing cries as they're killed one by one by the Modifiers.

318292004.speaker: 朗香
318292004.content: For those weak humans? This is beyond foolish! If not for...

318292005.content: Akika's pale fingers dig into the rough ground, to the point where her fingertips are almost bleeding. She's still trying to get up, but there's already a blade held to her neck.

318292006.speaker: 月读
318292006.content: Do you know... where she is?

318292008.content: The blade moves an inch closer to Akika's neck, drawing blood. Tsukuyomi stares at Akika.

318292009.speaker: 月读
318292009.content: You know full well what I'm talking about. Where's Amaterasu?

318292011.speaker: 朗香
318292011.content: So you're looking for that lousy Prime Modifier who can't even hold on to her home.

318292012.speaker: 朗香
318292012.content: Why, do you want her to come back and be your new Child of Heaven? Are you in a hurry to find a god you recognize?

318292013.speaker: 朗香
318292013.content: You keep talking about the power of human beings, but you're really just about all the privileges Gaea has given you.

318292015.speaker: 朗香
318292015.content: I don't? I know better than any of you.

318292016.speaker: 朗香
318292016.content: Amaterasu disappeared from Sasanami more than ten years ago. Had she not been out of action for so long, you... (coughs)... wouldn't have lost so many people...

318292017.speaker: 月读
318292017.content: She... disappeared more than ten years ago?

318292018.speaker: 朗香
318292018.content: Infuriating, isn't it? That she abandoned all of you without a word? And to think she hasn't resurfaced after all that's happened.

318292019.speaker: 朗香
318292019.content: You're all just running dogs of Gaea. You lie to mankind while labeling yourself the guardians of humanity. You're the most hypocritical of all!!!

318292020.speaker: 月读
318292020.content: To have power is to have responsibility and choice, and your choice has doomed you.

318292021.speaker: 朗香
318292021.content: Doomed me? Ha ha ha ha... Do you really think this is all over? Just you wait, you foolish humans. Gaea will be destroyed by you sooner or later...

318292022.speaker: 伊邪那美
318292022.content: Just how much longer do we have to listen to her rant?

318292023.content: Izanami, pale from the Divine Power drain from her body, pushes aside the crowd and walks up to Akika.

318292024.speaker: 月读
318292024.content: We're done... We'll leave her to you.

318292025.speaker: 我
318292025.content: Hang on. Akika, don't you want to share the clever method you used to block Sasanami? I have to say, you did win in this matter.

318292026.speaker: 朗香
318292026.content: Pfft... How naive are you? I'm not telling you just because you're buttering me up...

318292027.content: Akika has no intention of saying more to us, for she knows what's coming to her. She simply stares at Izanami with deep hatred. It's a familiar scene, albeit with the roles reversed.

318292028.speaker: 朗香
318292028.content: It's you... Karasugo Senba! It's all your fault...

318292029.speaker: 朗香
318292029.content: I wouldn't have lost to these humans had it not been for you!

318292030.speaker: 伊邪那美
318292030.content: Yes, you've lost to humans. It's so good to see that you've finally become self-aware.

318292031.speaker: 伊邪那美
318292031.content: Like I said, when I rip off your disguise, you'll be nothing more than a beast backed into a corner.

318292033.content: And with this last hateful utterance, Akika rams her body into Tsukuyomi's blade, and reaches towards Izanami with her arm outstretched.

318292036.content: Kagutsuchi, who's been waiting behind Izanami, takes a step forward and slashes once at Akika, sending down a turbid flame that tears her apart with the ferocity of famished wolves that'd just found their first meal in days.

318292038.content: The body in front of her finally dissipates after much stubborn whining. Izanami takes a deep breath before raising her head and looking around as if she's finally woken up from a nightmare.

318292039.speaker: 伊邪那美
318292039.content: I... I've taken care of her. For you.

318292040.content: The final gunshot of the battle has come from the edge of the square. The warm rays of dusk break through the dissipating Bane Energy, bringing back the warmth of the summer night.

318292041.content: A crowd is gathering towards us from all directions, staring at us with both excitement and trepidation like they're waiting for the final answer.

318292042.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318292042.content: Is Akika really dead this time?

318292044.content: Karasugo Sendou staggers backwards, as if all the strength has vanished from his body. Then, he stands upright again, rubs his brows, turns around, and runs towards the crowd.

318292047.content: Cheers ring out all over the square, from one end to the other. The sound of message notifications can be heard in every corner of Sasanami.

318292048.content: At the same time, our tech is still working inside the Photon Rail Nexus.

318292050.content: I turn off Mimir's comms. Then, together with the CORG personnel around me, I watch the attempt to reconnect to the Photon Rail network with much apprehension.

318292051.speaker: 科尔盖士官
318292051.content: And three, two, one... Handshake successful. Communication protocol is being updated...

318292052.content: A notification sound breaks the silence inside the Photon Rail Nexus. Then, everyone's communicators start sounding one by one too.

318292053.speaker: 科尔盖士官
318292053.content: We did it! We've connected back to the Photon Rail!

318292054.content: I leave quietly amidst the cheers. There's someone leaning against the gate, waiting for me.

318292055.content: In the soft light of dusk, I look carefully at the person who's just a few steps away.

318292056.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318292056.content: What are you doing standing there? Come over here.

318292057.content: I approach as told. Then suddenly, the woman suddenly goes limp and falls on top of me. Shocked, I hurriedly help Sekhmet sit down on the ground.

318292058.speaker: 我
318292058.content: What is it? Are you feeling unwell? Hold on, I'll go get some help.

318292059.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318292059.content: Don't move. Just let me lean on you for a minute.

318292060.content: As she says this, she adjusts his position a little, and puts her full weight on my arms.

318292061.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318292061.content: I don't need you to call for anyone. Ningishzida's busy right now anyway.

318292062.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318292062.content: Did you really think that I wouldn't make it?

318292064.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318292064.content: You don't trust me enough still, then. Should we do more trust-building activities then?

318292065.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318292065.content: Don't try to cover up your guilty conscience with actions. Doing so only makes your guilt more obvious.

318292067.content: I shake my head. I spot a wound on Sekhmet's hand, and so I take out a dressing from the med kit I have on me.

318292070.content: The Photon Rail Nexus is located on higher ground, and as I follow Sekhmet's gaze I see lights in the distance.

318292072.content: The sky is now almost fully dark with only a little bit of the setting sun left in the sky. But in every corner of Sasanami, the light of human civilization has begun to shine.

318292073.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318292073.content: There's no need for any gods to light up the sky...

318292077.content: I look up from the wound I'm dressing to see Sekhmet looking at me with a smile.

318292079.speaker: 我
318292079.content: If you're talking about self-reflection, then yes.
