318292080.content: Ny answer stuns Sekhmet for a moment, and then she breaks into laughter. She doesn't stop, however, and I have to hold her down to prevent her wound from coming apart.

318292082.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318292082.content: ... Ha ha. This is why I say that observing humans is a really interesting thing to do.

318292083.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318292083.content: When we talk about ourselves, we always think of what we've done and said, and about the mistakes that we made, and what we lost or didn't get.

318292084.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318292084.content: We spend our lives struggling with the past, and not just our own, even. We try to find ways to continue what is right and make up for the wrongs that have happened.

318292085.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318292085.content: We keep making mistakes, keep reflecting, keep coming to new realizations, keep making new choices... It's like watching ants walking through a maze.

318292086.speaker: 我
318292086.content: I accept your apology on behalf of all humans and ants in the world.

318292087.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318292087.content: But you always make it out, right? Even if you can't see the road takes you, you don't stop.

318292088.content: We fall silent for a brief moment, during which I'm sure we're both thinking of several people. Then, she suddenly pokes me hard in the chest.

318292090.speaker: 我
318292090.content: Fine. But I'm guessing the average person wouldn't think of themselves as an ant running in a maze.

318292091.speaker: 我
318292091.content: Then, what is your conclusion on the study of this subject called "human observation," Dr. Sekhmet?

318292092.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318292092.content: Personal interests are not on the same level of academic questions, Admin.

318292093.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318292093.content: ... But if there's anything to learn and know, it's that a Modifier named Sekhmet can finally conclude her attitude towards humans thusly:

318301001.content: Following the reconnection to the Photon Rail Nexus, Sasanami gradually returns to order under the governance of CORG and the Karasugo family.

318301003.speaker: 伊邪那美
318301003.content: I saw a mountain. It was all lit up by this ray of sunlight that also shone on the whole of Sasanami.

318301004.speaker: 月读
318301004.content: Just as I thought... Did you see anything else?

318301005.content: Izanami shakes her head, takes out the Yata no Shinkyou from behind, and hands it over.

318301006.speaker: 伊邪那美
318301006.content: You're looking for the owner of this mirror, aren't you?

318301008.content: Tsukuyomi takes the Yata no Shinkyou, and carefully touches the mirror once again. However, there is no response from the mirror. Izanami hesitates, then reaches out to the mirror.

318301009.content: The two sets of Divine Power intersect and fluctuate in the Yata no Shinkyou, and a hazy scene appears in both their minds.

318301012.content: Tsukuyomi is unable to continue speaking. She turns her head to try and push down the choking in her voice.

318301013.speaker: 伊邪那美
318301013.content: What do you intend to do now?

318301014.speaker: 月读
318301014.content: It's time I go look for her.

318301016.speaker: 月读
318301016.content: Yes. I'm different from her then.

318301017.content: Kuninotokotachi strolls casually along the street. She's trying all kinds of snacks from the stalls to her left while browsing the knick-knacks in the shops to her right.

318301018.content: As she approaches the rendezvous venue, she spots the person waiting for her, and her eyes light up

318301019.speaker: 国常立
318301019.content: Buzenbo, what is with all this secretiveness...

318301020.speaker: 国常立
318301020.content: Clearly you weren't willing to accompany me when I asked you out for drinks yesterday. Everyone is so busy now that it's impossible to find anyone else too..

318301021.speaker: 国常立
318301021.content: Are you finally going to paint the town red too, troublemaker?

318301023.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318301023.content: Master and Admin want to see us, Kuninotokotachi.

318301025.content: Kuninotokotachi stops joking when she sees our serious faces.

318301027.speaker: 我
318301027.content: Two things I need to talk to you about. First—

318301028.speaker: 月读
318301028.content: I should tell them about the first thing myself. I'm here to say goodbye to you.

318301029.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318301029.content: Oh? A new mission so soon, master?

318301030.speaker: 月读
318301030.content: No, this is personal... I'm taking a leave of absence from Pheasant Squad.

318301031.speaker: 国常立
318301031.content: Captain? Please tell me you are joking.

318301033.content: Seeing how stunned her team members are by the news, Tsukuyomi smiles gently.

318301035.speaker: 我
318301035.content: Yes. I'd like to inform you of a few personnel changes in Pheasant Squad.

318301036.speaker: 我
318301036.content: First of all, Tsukuyomi has requested to step down as captain of Pheasant Squad...

318301037.content: This piece of information leads to several different expressions on the faces of those in front of me. I pause for a moment, then go on to Aether Gazer's decision.

318301038.speaker: 我
318301038.content: ... and following discussions between Shu, Tsukuyomi and myself, the request has been approved. Buzenbo Tengu is hereby appointed the new captain of Pheasant Squad.

318301041.speaker: 国常立
318301041.content: I like this idea. Buzenbo is the right person to deal with all the mission paperwork. I'll be able to go to the festivals with peace of mind then!

318301043.speaker: 月读
318301043.content: You're all grown up now, Buzenbo, aren't you?

318301044.content: Tsukuyomi looks at her gently but steadily, and Buzenbo nods after a while.

318301046.speaker: 我
318301046.content: Further, we've also completed the paperwork to make Kuramitsuha a member of Pheasant Squad.

318301048.speaker: 国常立
318301048.content: Oh, that's right! That's one more person I can go to the festivals with!

318301049.content: Kuninotokotachi turns around with a smile, and reaches out to a slightly panicky-looking Kuramitsuha.

318301051.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318301051.content: Rest assured that I'll try my best as captain of the squad, Ninkyoumon.

318301052.speaker: 暗御津羽
318301052.content: Well... is there any reason I shouldn't feel assured?

318301053.speaker: 国常立
318301053.content: Don't worry, we're all good people here at Aether Gazer. Besides, I'll take care of you.

318301054.speaker: 暗御津羽
318301054.content: You? Take care of me? Forget about it. Hey, administrator, would you take her in hand now...

318301055.content: I cannot help but chuckle when I see Kuramitsuha turn to me for help.

318301056.speaker: 我
318301056.content: In short, I would like to wish Tsukuyomi all the best for her break, and welcome our Ninkyoumon to Aether Gazer.

318301057.speaker: 我
318301057.content: Pheasant Squad will remain Pheasant Squad, am I right?

318301059.speaker: 国常立
318301059.content: I think I can understand how Tsukuyomi feels.

318301060.speaker: 国常立
318301060.content: Maybe one day, I'll be off to look for someone, too... but tonight, we drink.

318301061.speaker: 丰前坊天狗
318301061.content: But you were just complaining that you couldn't find anyone to drink with you. Found someone new, huh?

318301063.content: Kuninotokotachi walks into the shop, and sees her date already at the table.

318301065.speaker: 国常立
318301065.content: I see that you got yourself a whole pot. That's pretty brave for a first-timer.

318301066.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318301066.content: When did I say that I'm a first-timer?

318301067.content: Kuninotokotachi stares at Sekhmet with her mouth wide open as the latter picks up the pot of shochu, throws her head back, and drinks it all in one big gulp.

318301068.content: It isn't until she's drank the last drop that Sekhmet starts to cough and drops the pot on the table.

318301070.speaker: 国常立
318301070.content: There's no need to prove anything here, oh my... Look, you even dropped the pot.

318301071.speaker: 国常立
318301071.content: Boss, sorry but would you help clean this up? And could we have one more pot, please?

318301073.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318301073.content: I'm going to pass on that second pot, though.

318301074.speaker: 国常立
318301074.content: So you got me here to drink by myself?

318301075.content: Kuninotokotachi pours herself a cup of the shochu and looks at the person seated opposite.

318301076.speaker: 国常立
318301076.content: What you say once you start drinking doesn't count. If you have something to say, remember to say it now.

318301077.speaker: 国常立
318301077.content: A smart person like you... still needs someone else to take care of you sometimes.

318301078.speaker: 国常立
318301078.content: Oh, by the way, are you going to the ceremony tomorrow?

318301079.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318301079.content: Yeah. I want to see how much a human being can grow.

318301080.speaker: 国常立
318301080.content: Then we don't have much time. Start talking, I'm listening.

318301081.content: Karasugo Sendou can hear the voices of the staff faintly outside the window. He stands in front of the mirror and checks his outfit again and again.

318301082.content: For some reason, he just can't seem to get his outfit to look the way he wants. He sighs, then hear two people chuckling behind him.

318301084.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318301084.content: This is the Prime Lord investiture ceremony after all...

318301085.speaker: 伊邪那美
318301085.content: Adjusting your outfit won't make you any more a Prime Lord.

318301086.content: Hearing his sister's comment, Karasugo Sendou feels, inevitably, a little frustrated. Everyone in the family knows that it's just a temporary arrangement. Once everything settles down in Sasanami, he will have to step down and take responsibility for what his family did.

318301087.speaker: 我
318301087.content: Don't be nervous, you're already familiar with Shimogyou and the Photon Rail Nexus. And everyone knows what you've been doing.

318301088.speaker: 我
318301088.content: You've already decided to work for a better Sasanami. This is just the very first step in a series of many.

318301089.speaker: 我
318301089.content: CORG and we at Aether Gazer will also give you the support you need, so just go for it.

318301090.speaker: 鸦越千堂
318301090.content: ... I understand. Thank you so much.

318301091.content: The staff outside the door have begun to hurry Karasugo Sendou. He takes one last look back, and sees Senba nodding at him.

318301092.speaker: 伊邪那美
318301092.content: You don't need me behind the scenes anymore. Go on, my brother.

318301093.speaker: 伊邪那美
318301093.content: Our mother, and those people... they'll be watching us.

318301094.content: Kagutsuchi is rambling through the mountains and forests with ease, a cup in his hand.

318301095.content: Very soon, he stops and sits down on the ground.

318301096.content: A gust of wind is sweeping through the forest. Kagutsuchi slowly opens up the cup while looking at two tombs, one new and one old.

318301098.speaker: 迦具土
318301098.content: And you. I've been busy. Miss me?

318301099.speaker: 迦具土
318301099.content: I have to tell you what's been going on lately...

318301100.content: Bubbles rise in the cup, then fizzle away rapidly. This sound of this blends into the sounds of wind and rustling leaves, and disappears into the forest without a trace.

318301101.content: As the bubbles subside, Kagutsuchi suddenly realizes that time is passing. He grabs the cup and drinks its content in several gulps.

318301103.content: He raises his head to look at the tombs of his other Karasugo compadres a short distance away.

318301105.content: A celebration is being held on the restored streets of Sasanami to mark the investiture of the new Prime Lord. There are people everywhere, and a few of us have found a place where we can watch the fireworks.

318301106.content: As the sound of fireworks starts to rise into the sky, Kuramitsuha, who's standing next to me, suddenly turns her head.

318301107.speaker: 暗御津羽
318301107.content: I... promise that I'm not thinking of anything funny...

318301108.speaker: 暗御津羽
318301108.content: B-but... I think the fireworks are really beautiful...

318301110.speaker: 伊邪那美
318301110.content: I believe that they're all looking at it now.

318301111.speaker: 伊邪那美
318301111.content: Questioner... in the future... you must come to Sasanami to see the fireworks. As often as you can.

318301113.content: The fireworks continue to bloom in the night sky, and all the tears, memories, words... melt into the silent falling sparks.

318301114.content: Right here, right now, the ephemeral is also the eternal.

318301115.speaker: 我
318301115.content: By the way, where's Sekhmet? Wasn't she here just now?

318301116.speaker: 暗御津羽
318301116.content: I think she's gone to take a call.

318301117.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318301117.content: What do you want from me? I'd have thought Kamau would be the one calling.

318301118.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
318301118.content: He's quite shaken by what happened, and he's now busy working on improving the Photon Rail network. He says hello to you.

318301119.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318301119.content: Thanks, but usually the business comes after the greetings, no?

318301120.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318301120.content: Normally, I'd listen to you first. But try to remember that I'm now a wounded person who can't go on missions.

318301121.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
318301121.content: Relax. I just need your help for a study.

318301122.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
318301122.content: Come back to CORG for treatment as soon as possible. If we do this right, you'll be able to use your Access Key again.

318301123.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318301123.content: Help for a study? I distinctly remember that the study has been terminated.

318301124.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
318301124.content: Your case was opened before it was terminated. I want to see it through all the way to the end.

318301125.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
318301125.content: How do you feel like, now that you've used the Omega gear?

318301127.content: Sekhmet flashes a big smile as she glances sidelong at the fireworks in the sky and the crowd at the festival.

318301128.speaker: 塞赫麦特
318301128.content: ... that it's not too bad being an ordinary person after all.

318301129.content: The fireworks show finally comes to an end, and the group say goodbye to each other. As we walk back to our hotel, I feel both exhausted and gratified knowing that everything is over.

318301130.speaker: 我
318301130.content: I'm going to have a really long nap.

318301131.content: It's at this time that I hear my communicator ring.

318301133.speaker: 休
318301133.content: Admin, I need you to come back to Ain Soph now.

318301135.content: My eyes slowly widen. The fatigue I felt just moments ago has been dispelled by emotions far more intense.

318301136.content: Forget the luggage at the hotel. I turn around immediately, without waiting for Shu to finish, and start running towards the Photon Rail station.

910601001.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601001.content: "I promise, Admin, everything here will be exactly the same when you get back!"

910601002.speaker: 我
910601002.content: "It doesn't have to be exactly the same. I wouldn't mind if you guys made some progress while I'm gone."

910601003.speaker: 奥西里斯
910601003.content: "We'll clean your office every week. I guarantee you won't find a speck of dust!"

910601004.speaker: 我
910601004.content: "That's okay Osiris, your daily training and missions are more important..."

910601005.speaker: 前鬼坊天狗
910601005.content: "Hehe, you better believe I'm gonna prepare the best prank ever to welcome you when you get back."

910601006.speaker: 我
910601006.content: "...Maybe I'm better off not coming back then."

910601007.speaker: 休
910601007.content: "Ahem... Admin, I've approved your request for extended leave. Please focus on your own matters during this time. Don't worry about how things are going here."

910601008.speaker: 我
910601008.content: "Thanks, Miss Shu. I feel better hearing you say that."

910601010.speaker: 我
910601010.content: This is what you call "exactly the same"?!

910601011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601011.content: A lot happened while you were gone, Admin. I don't even know where to start...

910601013.speaker: 我
910601013.content: Alright, well maybe one of you can answer this for me: How did my office get like... this?

910601014.content: I look around at my office, and what I see throws me for a loop. The walls are covered in posters, and my holographic projector's journal is filled with scribbles outlining some kind of idol event plan.

910601015.speaker: 阿波罗
910601015.content: I suppose we should start with my own impressive performance...

910601017.content:
Thor mimes brandishing her hammer, as if she finds my question annoying.
Her hands are empty, but the air still seems to sizzle with some kind of electric energy.

910601018.speaker: 托尔
910601018.content: While you were gone, we managed to completely wipe out the Visbanes!

910601020.speaker: 阿波罗
910601020.content: That's right. The captain did most of the heavy lifting. She shone like the sun during the fight—absolutely brilliant!

910601021.speaker: 我
910601021.content: Completely... wiped out? But... why didn't anyone tell me?

910601024.speaker: 阿波罗
910601024.content: At any rate, we won our final victory. There's no need to fight anymore.

910601026.speaker: 我
910601026.content: If the fighting is over... what is Division Nine doing now? Are we disbanding?

910601028.content: Thor shakes her head, then makes a massive show of putting on a pair of sunglasses she pulled from who-knows-where.

910601029.content: Just as I'm wondering at Thor's new style, Zenkibo and Apollo put on the exact same type of sunglasses and lean on either side of her.

910601030.speaker: 托尔
910601030.content: There's only one answer to that question!

910601032.speaker: 我
910601032.content: Sorry, I think maybe I came back at a bad time...

910601033.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601033.content: No, no, let me take it from here. It's like this, Admin—

910601034.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601034.content: After the last Visbane was confirmed to be destroyed, Division Nine held an all-hands meeting to decide what we would do next.

910601035.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601035.content: Miss Shu was hoping we could serve as the company's new spokespeople. In other words—we could become part of Aether Gazer's idol plan!

910601036.content: Ver makes a peace sign beside her face.

910601038.speaker: 奥西里斯
910601038.content: I might not be able to sing... but I'm gonna do my best to get everyone styled up for the stage!

910601039.speaker: 我
910601039.content: Just let me catch up here... This plan is real?!

910601040.speaker: 我
910601040.content: The Visbanes are completely gone? You guys don't have to go on dangerous missions anymore?

910601042.speaker: 我
910601042.content: Wh-what? Is there something on my face?

910601043.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601043.content: N-no haha... y-your right, for now!

910601045.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601045.content: (I can't help it. Look at how sincere they look...)

910601046.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601046.content: Anyway, it's good you're back now, Admin. We've got something important to talk over with you.

910601048.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601048.content: Well... As you've seen, Division Nine is about to change dramatically.

910601049.speaker: 奥西里斯
910601049.content: But we'd really like to stay by your side, like before.

910601050.speaker: 前鬼坊天狗
910601050.content: To tell the truth, things were a bit boring while you were gone...

910601051.content: The three of them look at me, and I can see a bit of loneliness in their eyes.

910601052.speaker: 我
910601052.content: That's true, actually. If there's no more need to fight, there's no more need for an Administrator. And there's really no need for me to stay here.

910601053.speaker: 托尔
910601053.content: Nobody agreed to let you just walk out of here.

910601054.speaker: 阿波罗
910601054.content: I can't imagine life without you, Admin...

910601055.speaker: 我
910601055.content: I bet you just don't have any cafeteria credits left...

910601056.speaker: 我
910601056.content: Let's just take a step back here, shall we? My job as an Administrator is to oversee and support your combat and training. But now...

910601057.speaker: 前鬼坊天狗
910601057.content: Don't you worry about that, Admin. I've long since had another job lined up for you!

910601058.content: Zenkibo suddenly pounds her chest confidently.

910601059.speaker: 我
910601059.content: And what would that be, exactly?

910601060.speaker: 前鬼坊天狗
910601060.content: Well, seeing as Division Nine is now the Division of Idol Events, it's pretty clear what your job is now. That's right—

910601061.content: Zenkibo points a pencil straight at me like some kind of famous detective pointing out a culprit.

910601065.content: I shake my head emphatically, apparently provoking the ire of one particular captain...

910601066.speaker: 托尔
910601066.content: You got a problem? Or are you saying you really... you really want to leave?

910601067.content: Thor starts off with a severe question, but seeming to realize something as she speaks, her tone softens dramatically. But when I raise my head, all I see below her fiery red hair is her absolutely fuming face.

910601069.speaker: 我
910601069.content: How could I ever leave you guys?

910601070.speaker: 前鬼坊天狗
910601070.content: Psh. Didn't you just leave us for quite a while?

910601071.speaker: 我
910601071.content: I didn't mean to! From here on out, I'm never leaving you guys again!

910601073.content: I see a future spreading out before me in this moment—one where my head gets caved in by a hammer of judgment. Preferring to remain in this world, I make a choice.

910601074.speaker: 我
910601074.content: But nothing... I mean what I said! I'm not leaving you guys again!

910601076.content: Finally, Thor loosens her furrowed brows and lets a smile slip through, as if she's finally satisfied.

910601077.speaker: 我
910601077.content: So, what does an agent do, anyway?

910601078.content: Hearing me ask this, the others trade a strange, knowing look.

910601080.speaker: 前鬼坊天狗
910601080.content: They order us delivery, bring us milk tea, give us massages, and... and... give us gifts, cheer us on...

910601081.speaker: 奥西里斯
910601081.content: Don't make Admin into some kind of servant! Also, aren't your fans supposed to be the ones giving us gifts and cheering for us...?

910601082.speaker: 阿波罗
910601082.content: I see. Even if no one ever follows us, we'll have Admin waiting on the sidelines to come to our rescue by becoming our number-one fan! It's brilliant!

910601083.speaker: 我
910601083.content: Could you be a bit more optimistic...?

910601084.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601084.content: Alright, alright, let's give the Admin a break. Actually, your first task as our new agent will be watching our rehearsal and giving us suggestions!

910601085.speaker: 我
910601085.content: You've even got your debut song written already? I really was gone way too long...

910601087.speaker: 我
910601087.content: I'll tell you one thing—idols shouldn't be dressing up and memeing!

910601088.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601088.content: I didn't think you'd get into character so quickly.

910601089.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601089.content: I guess we should call you Agent now, right? Agent... Feels a bit weird saying it.

910601090.speaker: 我
910601090.content: You can call me whatever. Try saying it a few more times, maybe you'll get used to it.

910601091.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601091.content: Agent... Agent, Agent... Why does it feel a little embarrassing...?

910601092.speaker: 我
910601092.content: Uh, don't push yourself. Just be your normal self, Ver.

910601093.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601093.content: Okay! Wait... are you making fun of me, Admin?

910601094.speaker: 我
910601094.content: Of course not... Oh yeah, weren't you all going to rehearse for me?

910601095.speaker: 奥西里斯
910601095.content: You really are a master of segues, Admin...

910601096.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601096.content: Ahem! I'm a little nervous, but I'll do my best!

910601098.content: After being shooed from my own office so the Modifiers could change into their costumes, I find myself at the place they're holding their rehearsal.

910601099.speaker: 我
910601099.content: (So I guess my office is a changing room now...)

910601100.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601100.content: Sorry to keep you waiting, Admin!

910601101.speaker: 我
910601101.content: That's okay, you're here sooner than I thought... Oh, Vidar and Leviathan are here too!

910601102.speaker: 利维坦
910601102.content: It wouldn't be a performance without me! I gotta show you what my master and I have been working on while you were gone for so long!

910601104.speaker: 阿波罗
910601104.content: Sound is all set up. We can start whenever you all are ready.

910601105.speaker: 我
910601105.content: You're not a part of the idol group, Apollo?

910601106.speaker: 阿波罗
910601106.content: Haha! While I do have the natural temperament of an idol, to put it plainly—this is one of those pretty girl idol groups.

910601107.speaker: 阿波罗
910601107.content: So, I've taken the role of sound technician. After all, the sun must bring light to all.

910601108.speaker: 前鬼坊天狗
910601108.content: Cut the chatter and get the music ready, Pineapple!

910601112.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601112.content: Who's gonna be there to share my barbecue wrap?

910601113.speaker: 奥西里斯
910601113.content: Someone's missing when we watch the training videos back.

910601114.speaker: 维达尔
910601114.content: These never-changing days seem colder than before.

910601115.speaker: 利维坦
910601115.content: It's good my master's always here.

910601116.speaker: 利维坦
910601116.content: But it feels like something's unaccounted for—oh yeah!

910601117.speaker: 利维坦
910601117.content: We're missing someone to help us walk Fenrir!

910601123.content: I can't help but to clap. It might just be a temporary set, but the ambiance is just right.

910601124.content: However, just as I'm getting ready to say "we'll be famous for sure", I realize something.

910601125.speaker: 我
910601125.content: Wait a second, why is your debut song all about me?!

910601126.speaker: 奥西里斯
910601126.content: You really are slow on the uptake, aren't you Admin...

910601127.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601127.content: You used to catch on a lot quicker...

910601128.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601128.content: Everything here has been prepared just for you.

910601129.content: Verthandi slowly gets out of her idol costume and sets the microphone down. Everyone follows her, before resting their eyes on me.

910601130.speaker: 我
910601130.content: So all of this, the idol business, the debut... All of it was just for me...?

910601131.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601131.content: Sorry, Admin. The Visbanes haven't actually been wiped out. And Division Nine hasn't been turned into some kind of "Idol Division", of course...

910601133.content: It seems like Ver can't bring herself to tell me it was all an act, so she just purses her lips instead.

910601134.speaker: 前鬼坊天狗
910601134.content: Didn't I tell you while you were gone I was gonna cook up the best prank? Forgot, did ya?

910601136.content: The cat's out of the bag.

910601137.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601137.content: Admin...? Are you okay? Sorry, maybe we took it a little too far—

910601138.speaker: 我
910601138.content: No, no. I should be thanking all of you.

910601139.speaker: 我
910601139.content: ...It's good to be able to keep being your Administrator.

910601140.speaker: 我
910601140.content: Can't wait to keep working together.

910601142.content: I'm a bit teary-eyed, but I can still see a blurry figure rushing toward me. I'm knocked back a few steps by a body slamming into me and pulling me into a ferocious hug.

910601143.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
910601143.content: We can't wait either, Admin. Welcome back!

910601146.content: Just as I'm regaining my balance, another somewhat smaller body jumps into my arms.

910601147.speaker: 奥西里斯
910601147.content: You know, actually, Admin, Ausar also asked a bunch of questions about you in the Imago Room. Where you were, when you'd be back, stuff like that. She'll never admit it, though, of course... Heehee!

910601149.content: This time, a strong arm has wrapped itself around my neck.

910601150.speaker: 托尔
910601150.content: I'm keeping my eye on you this time, Admin. Don't forget it!

910601151.speaker: 我
910601151.content: I said... I'm not leaving again... Please let me go...

910601152.speaker: 托尔
910601152.content: Hehe, if there's one thing I've learned as captain of the Thunder Squad—your partners don't leave if you keep hold of them!

910601153.speaker: 前鬼坊天狗
910601153.content: Heehee, Captain's got Admin in a chokehold... This seems like a perfect chance to get a few tickles in! Tickle tickle tickle—

910601154.speaker: 我
910601154.content: Hahaha! Stop! Hahaha! Please stop! Hahaha....

910601155.content: One person with their head buried in my chest, pouring their heart out in protest while wiping something warm and wet on my shirt...

910601156.content: One person, holding my arm like a child not wanting their parent to leave...

910601157.content: Another person with my neck in a vice, almost as if they're afraid if they don't watch me for a moment, I'll leave again...

910601158.content: And another taking advantage of the opportunity to assault my armpits...

910601159.content: They all give me that feeling once again, that everything in this life comes and goes with a familiar rhythm.

1103905001.content: I haven't had much fieldwork lately, but that doesn't mean I don't still have a lot to do. In the brief idle spell as I walk down the hall, I try to clear my thoughts—a task made none the easier by the room I'm heading to.

1103905002.content: I just wanna pour my heart out, vent all the frustrations and annoyances I've been dealing with...

1103905003.content: I stop and raise my hand to knock on the door, only for it to open before I'm able to.

1103905004.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905004.content: I heard your footsteps. And you're right on time.

1103905005.content: I follow Poseidon into her room, and am instantly hit with a wave of warm sea breeze. Tea has already been set out on the table. The smell of the room, the light, even the softness of the sofa fabric—it's all simply perfect.

1103905007.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905007.content: Last time you said you didn't sleep well, so I dialed down the fragrance a bit.

1103905008.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905008.content: Have some tea! It's new from Xu Heng. You told me last month you wanted to try it.

1103905009.content: As Poseidon requested, I sit at the table and take a sip of the aromatic tea. Even so, I feel like the thoughts running through my head only become all the more turbulent.

1103905011.content: This isn't the first time I've been here, but I still feel a bit uncomfortable sharing my own negative emotions.

1103905012.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905012.content: Got a lot on your mind again, Admin?

1103905013.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905013.content: I don't even need to ask, to be honest... You're here more often than Shu these days.

1103905014.content: Sitting across from me, I see Poseidon cup her face with her hands and smile warmly through the light steam coming off the tea.

1103905015.speaker: 我
1103905015.content: Has it really been that often? I didn't even notice... Sorry for the trouble.

1103905016.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905016.content: It's no trouble at all! I like listening to you talk, Admin.

1103905017.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905017.content: So if you've got anything you've been pushing down, let me hear it!

1103905018.content: Seeing me put down my cup, Poseidon stands, and guides me by the hand over to her bed.

1103905020.content: She sits on the bed and pats the spot beside her. There's no need for her to say any more—we understand each other.

1103905021.content: Just as before, I rest my head on her lap, feeling the warmth beneath me as I do. As I sink into the soft bed, soaking in the light fragrance around me, I hear her gentle voice from above.

1103905022.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905022.content: Okay, let's start from the first thing that's on your mind.

1103905023.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905023.content: I see the dark circles under your eyes have gotten even darker. What's been keeping you burning the midnight oil lately?

1103905025.content: Our conversation gradually fades into silence. As I lay in this serene place, I drift off to sleep.

1103905026.content: The darkness behind my eyes is accompanied by the sound of waves, or perhaps breathing. For the most part it's steady, although at some point the sound suddenly lengthens, becoming something like a sigh.

1103905027.content: Is my mind playing tricks on me? Sleeping me has no way of knowing.

1103905030.content: The soft call echoes into my dreams, and I feel the faint sensation of someone running their fingers through my hair. The feeling pulls me out of my slumber.

1103905031.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905031.content: Time to get up, Admin. Nap too long and you'll get a headache.

1103905032.speaker: 我
1103905032.content: Um... Huh? How long has it been?

1103905033.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905033.content: We talked for about half an hour, and then you slept for a bit after.

1103905035.content: I rub my eyes and sit up. I feel invigorated, as if all the troubles I'd had before coming here have been swept away.

1103905036.speaker: 我
1103905036.content: I feel like... I can get back to work.

1103905037.speaker: 我
1103905037.content: If it weren't for you, Poseidon, I don't think I'd have the energy to get back into the office.

1103905038.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905038.content: Heh, I know you can be a bit more direct than me. But I'll take that as a compliment.

1103905039.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905039.content: Are you leaving? Take some tea and snacks with you.

1103905040.content: Poseidon stands, gives me a small gift bag, and walks me to the door.

1103905041.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905041.content: I'm glad to see you looking more like yourself.

1103905042.speaker: 我
1103905042.content: That's a given. I always rest well here.

1103905043.content: Feeling a bit reluctant to leave, I hug Poseidon gently. She rests her head on my shoulder and whispers into my ear:

1103905044.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905044.content: Next time you're feeling stressed, Admin, take a walk by the sea. It's really relaxing.

1103905045.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905045.content: The beach and my room have one thing in common: you're always welcome in either.

1103905046.content: After saying goodbye to Poseidon, I head back into my office to find new red-dot notifications waiting for me both on my workstation system and in my email.

1103905047.content: It's all I can do to steep some of the tea Poseidon gave me before I'm completely swamped in work again. Amongst the pile of work is an urgent strategic issue from CORG. Eating and sleeping are now just things I squeeze between frantically combing through material.

1103905048.content: By the time Shu and I finally send a strategic plan back over, it's already been three days.

1103905049.speaker: 我
1103905049.content: I'm exhausted... Really, this time. Even if they tell me Gaea's about to explode, I'm not working anymore.

1103905050.speaker: 我
1103905050.content: Should I go see Posid... Hmm...

1103905051.content: While I know 100% for sure that the second I walked into Poseidon's room I'd be able to get some good rest, I'm still hesitant.

1103905052.speaker: 我
1103905052.content: I'll just do what Poseidon suggested and go take a walk at the beach... I should save visiting her for when I really need it.

1103905053.content: The sky is already dark by the time I get to the beach. There aren't any tourists around.

1103905054.content: The waves thrum against my eardrums as I meander down the coast. Between the sea and the shore, I find a bit of freedom under the night sky. As Poseidon predicted, I do begin to feel relaxed.

1103905055.speaker: 我
1103905055.content: Hmm? It looks like there's someone ahead. Is that...?

1103905057.content: I can't really hear what the person is saying clearly from this distance, but from the sound of the voice and the general figure I can tell it could very well be someone I know.

1103905058.speaker: 我
1103905058.content: Poseidon? What's she doing here at this time of night? And she's talking to the ocean... She's never mentioned this before.

1103905059.content: My curiosity keeps me from just shouting a hello to her. Instead, I cautiously get a bit closer. Poseidon seems to be leaning down and putting something into the water.

1103905061.content: I still can't hear from this distance, so I get a bit closer—and hear something crunch under my foot. A plastic bottle—some ne'er-do-well's litter.

1103905063.content: Startled, Poseidon's head whips over to look at me. In the dark of the night, we two indistinct figures stare at each other for a few seconds. Before I can signal to her, Poseidon turns and runs off.

1103905065.content: I know there's no way I'll catch up to her, so I just pick up the plastic bottle and throw it in the trash before walking over to where Poseidon was before.

1103905066.speaker: 我
1103905066.content: Should be here, right? Could that black shape there be the thing Poseidon set down? I can't reach it...

1103905067.content: As I consider whether to find something to help me get the mysterious object or to just give up, a wave suddenly brings the item a bit closer to the shore.

1103905068.content: With the help of another wave, it washes up right at my feet.

1103905069.speaker: 我
1103905069.content: ...I didn't steal it, it came to me.

1103905070.content: Unable to deny my curiosity any longer, I pick the object up. It's a bamboo leaf boat. I turn on my terminal's light to see words written on the leaf.

1103905071.content: "I've been feeling down lately. Should I close the confessional?"

1103905073.content: I'm still thinking of the bamboo leaf boat when I wake up the next day. I'd taken it back with me, cleaned it up, and put it in my drawer.

1103905074.speaker: 我
1103905074.content: Poseidon's always listening to other people's problems. I rarely hear her say anything about her own. I wonder if I've been putting too much pressure on her, going over there so often and talking about everything that's bothering me...

1103905075.content: I mull this over for a while, but I can't make heads or tails of it. When I raise my head, I catch sight of the dolphin pendant hanging off my desk. It was a gift Poseidon gave me the first time she helped me work through my problems.

1103905076.speaker: 我
1103905076.content: It's always Poseidon who gets people to say what's really on their minds...

1103905077.content: Go speak to her right now.

1103905078.content: As I round the corner of the hallway, I find myself unexpectedly face-to-face with Poseidon herself. For a moment, it seems almost as if she's going to turn and walk away, but my voice reaches her before she's able to.

1103905080.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905080.content: What a coincidence, Admin. Say, the weather's lovely today, eh?

1103905081.content: Wordlessly, I look out at the somewhat gloomy sky out the window, then look back at Poseidon, who's blinking as she does her best to keep a neutral expression.

1103905082.content: It seems that she also has some suspicions about our "meeting" the previous evening, but she doesn't want to admit it.

1103905083.speaker: 我
1103905083.content: That's true. The weather was also nice last night. Perfect for a... stroll down the beach.

1103905084.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905084.content: ...You took a walk down the beach yesterday? The sunset over the sea was gorgeous.

1103905085.speaker: 我
1103905085.content: Probably, but I went after nightfall. Also, I happened to come across a bamboo leaf boat.

1103905086.speaker: 我
1103905086.content: What was written on it made me a bit worried about its owner. I'd really like to find them... Say, Poseidon, you like to go to the beach. The boat wouldn't "happen" to be yours, would it?

1103905087.content: As I purposefully make my tone more serious, I observe Poseidon carefully. She blinks again, twiddling her fingers unconsciously.

1103905088.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905088.content: Bamboo leaf boat? I've never heard of one, but it sounds interesting.

1103905089.content: She's not willing to talk, it seems. How do I get her to open up?

1103905090.content: I decide to try and beat her at her own game.

1103905091.speaker: 我
1103905091.content: Well if it wasn't you, I must have mistaken who I saw last night. Who could it have been?

1103905092.speaker: 我
1103905092.content: You know, I just remembered, I came across another bamboo leaf boat once before. I had no idea what to do with it, so I just put it up in my room. Maybe it's from the same person. I'll check the handwriting against the one from last night after work.

1103905093.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905093.content: How... how long ago did you find it?

1103905094.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905094.content: Do... do you remember what was written on it?

1103905095.content:
Poseidon's eyes have widened. She moves half a step closer anxiously.
As I suspected, this wasn't the first time she's put out one of these boats. Just how much has she been burying deep inside?

1103905096.speaker: 我
1103905096.content: It's been a while. I can't really remember.

1103905097.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905097.content: Then it probably isn't... Or maybe it is...

1103905098.content: Poseidon's reaction is confusing me a bit. Just what did she write on these other bamboo leaf boats?

1103905100.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905100.content: N-nothing. If what was written on the boat worried you, I hope you find out who wrote it soon.

1103905101.speaker: 我
1103905101.content: Yep. Hopefully comparing the handwriting yields some new clues.

1103905102.content: Seeing Poseidon make to return to her room, I also pretend to head toward my office before doubling back down a back way to my room.

1103905103.content: I turn on the camera outside my door, clean up a bit, make some tea, and then settle in to wait.

1103905104.speaker: 我
1103905104.content: I usually finish work at noon, so if Poseidon wants to take the boat before I get back, she'll come before then.

1103905105.content: People come and go in front of the door, until finally, Poseidon's figure appears on the camera screen.

1103905107.content: Her shaking hand holds a card with Zenkibo's symbol on it—perhaps a copy of my room key the little rascal made for one of her pranks.

1103905108.content: I connect the camera to my terminal, place the bamboo leaf boat on the table, and quickly hide behind my bed.

1103905109.content: Poseidon holds the card up, only to drop it again. She repeats the motion, only this time seemingly because she was startled by a staff member walking down the hall. Finally, she presses the card against the door.

1103905111.content: She pushes the door open softly and walks in, her eyes locking onto the boat on the table. She quickly picks it up and looks it over.

1103905115.content: Startled, Poseidon seems to almost jump back a step, before realizing something and putting on an air of calmness.

1103905117.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905117.content: Y-yeah! I came to bring you a gift.

1103905118.content: As she says this, she pulls a box of treats out from behind her back. How didn't I see it on the camera?

1103905119.speaker: 我
1103905119.content: Uh... Thanks. But it seems like this bamboo leaf boat caught your interest, eh?

1103905121.speaker: 我
1103905121.content: Then give it back to me, please. I haven't had a chance to compare the handwriting yet.

1103905122.content: I take hold of one end of the boat.

1103905123.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905123.content: ...B-but I was thinking, maybe the person who made the boat goes to the beach often. It might be easier to find them if you give it to us at the Ocean Conservation Society.

1103905124.content: Poseidon holds on to the other end of the boat tightly.

1103905125.speaker: 我
1103905125.content: That's true... But maybe look at what's written on it first, see if there are any clues. Have you read it? Here, let me read it to you...

1103905126.content: I take advantage of Poseidon's momentary panic to snatch the boat back, open it, and read aloud:

1103905129.content: Poseidon grabs my sleeve with one hand, doing her best to cover the boat's contents with the other. I can't help but chuckle a bit at this. Poseidon seems to realize she's lost the battle, and drops her hands.

1103905130.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905130.content: (Sobs) I didn't know you could be so mean, Admin.

1103905131.speaker: 我
1103905131.content: Alright, I admit it. This was a setup. Here, sit down.

1103905132.content: Just as Poseidon had done for me before, I guide her over to the sofa, and set a cup of tea in front of her.

1103905133.speaker: 我
1103905133.content: Usually, I visit your confessional. But today, you're visiting mine.

1103905134.speaker: 我
1103905134.content: Have anything you want to get off your chest, Poseidon?

1103905135.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905135.content: Would you believe me if I said no?

1103905136.speaker: 我
1103905136.content: Of course not. I have evidence to the contrary.

1103905137.content: I place the bamboo leaf boat on the table, unopened. I don't offer it to Poseidon, instead opting to look at her expectantly.

1103905138.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905138.content: That's the only one you found?

1103905139.speaker: 我
1103905139.content: Yep. I made the other one up to trick you into coming here.

1103905141.content: Seeing Poseidon breathe a sigh of relief, I put on a stern expression.

1103905142.speaker: 我
1103905142.content: Why is that good? Poseidon, you're gonna make me feel guilty, acting like this.

1103905143.speaker: 我
1103905143.content: How many times have you listened to me whine about all the things bothering me? And now I'm only able to find out you've got things bothering you because of this bamboo leaf boat... It makes me anxious, you know. Makes me feel like I'm not doing enough.

1103905144.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905144.content: It's not like that at all, Admin! You've done so much for me, and for all of Aether Gazer! It makes me happy to listen to your problems.

1103905145.speaker: 我
1103905145.content: It's the same for me, Poseidon. I want to be there to listen to you, too.

1103905146.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905146.content: ...Well, if you put it that way, I guess I don't really have a choice.

1103905147.content: Poseidon closes her eyes and takes a deep breath as if she's coming to some kind of decision. She interlaces her fingers together before opening her eyes again.

1103905149.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905149.content: Actually, it was after I heard a story about a bamboo leaf boat in Xu Heng that I started writing my thoughts on them whenever I was feeling down and putting them out to sea. Usually, I would just be hung up on little troubles that I was having. When I saw the boats floating out there on the ocean waves, I felt like my troubles were floating away with them.

1103905150.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905150.content: But there have been things on my mind lately that I haven't been able to get rid of so easily.

1103905151.speaker: 我
1103905151.content: Do they have something to do with the confessional?

1103905152.content: Poseidon pauses for a moment, taking a little sip from her teacup before setting it slowly back down.

1103905153.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905153.content: Yes... I said helping everyone makes me happy, and that's the truth.

1103905154.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905154.content: But, most of the time, I'm unable to help them truly solve their problems.

1103905156.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905156.content: Not just Shu. It's the same with you, Admin.

1103905158.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905158.content: Every time you tell me about what's going on at work, you don't tell me everything clearly. And when you talk about your urgent missions, you make them sound less stressful than they actually are.

1103905159.speaker: 我
1103905159.content: No getting anything past you, I see.

1103905160.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905160.content: Because the whole time you're telling me those things, I'm looking at you carefully.

1103905161.speaker: 我
1103905161.content: But you never ask me anything...

1103905162.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905162.content: I know there's only so much I can do to help everyone.

1103905163.content: Poseidon raises her head, subconsciously clasping her interlaced hands together more tightly.

1103905164.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905164.content: I can't solve your problems or make your decisions for you. All I can do is help you relieve some stress, give you all a little more courage to face your problems yourselves.

1103905165.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905165.content: It doesn't matter how much you tell me. That's not what's important. What's important is that everyone leaves my room relaxed and smiling. That should be enough for me.

1103905166.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905166.content: But when I think of the fact that after you leave my room, you're going right back into all those difficult situations... that perhaps something will go wrong and make you unhappy, and there's nothing I can do but sit here waiting for you...

1103905168.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905168.content: All that sadness, building up little by little... I guess the weight of it was too much for my little bamboo leaf boats to carry out to sea.

1103905170.content: Poseidon looks a bit ashamed, perhaps sensing she's bringing my mood down along with hers. She covers her face with her hands for a moment, before opening them to peek out at me.

1103905171.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905171.content: I help everyone else when they're feeling down, but I can't help myself. A bit embarrassing, isn't it?

1103905173.speaker: 我
1103905173.content: It's always harder to see yourself clearly. That's just how it is.

1103905174.speaker: 我
1103905174.content: The only thing you have to feel embarrassed about is that you weren't willing to share all this with me.

1103905175.speaker: 我
1103905175.content: It must have taken a lot of courage to tell me just now.

1103905176.content: Seeing me looking at her seriously, Poseidon slowly lowers her hands.

1103905177.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905177.content: You must have passed your courage on to me.

1103905178.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905178.content: I've been thinking of ways to vent all this... I actually made plans to go out with Shu.

1103905179.content: Poseidon screws up her face and hits the couch with her fist, as if she's just remembered something.

1103905180.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905180.content: But that Shu... she's so busy, she's already stood me up quite a few times.

1103905183.speaker: 我
1103905183.content: I'm joking. But there is an easier option—we can go out together.

1103905184.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905184.content: But aren't you really busy too, Admin?

1103905187.content: I think back on the things Poseidon said to me in the past when she comforted me and scooch closer to her, doing my best to wear the same expression she always does.

1103905188.speaker: 我
1103905188.content: You said before, it's a brave thing, to be able to admit "I'm tired."

1103905189.speaker: 我
1103905189.content: So this time, let me reward you for being brave enough to face your worries.

1103905190.content: Poseidon sighs as a breeze from outside wafts into the room. She takes my hand.

1103905192.speaker: 我
1103905192.content: If I remember correctly, they've been holding some event in the suburbs lately... Do you have time this weekend?

1103905193.content: I open my terminal, search for the Ocean Carnival, and buy two tickets then and there for the following weekend. The salesman writes our names on the tickets.

1103905194.speaker: 我
1103905194.content: Let's go to the Carnival and enjoy ourselves. Get out all this funk that you've been carrying around.

1103905195.speaker: 我
1103905195.content: Once you're feeling better, I'll give the bamboo leaf boat back to you.

1103905197.content: She hops up and looks at me for a moment—it seems almost like she's planning something.

1103905198.speaker: 波塞冬
1103905198.content: If we're going out together... I'll have to make some preparations.

1103906001.content: Not long ago, Poseidon and I made plans to try and help her improve her mood by going to the Ocean Carnival together on the weekend.

1103906002.content: Work this week has been a bit easier to deal with, knowing I have that to look forward to.

1103906003.content: Before I know it, it's the morning of the day we planned to meet. I've just finished getting ready to leave when someone knocks on my door.

1103906005.content: It's Poseidon. In lieu of her normal combat attire, she's changed into a blue and white dress. At first glance, you might mistake her for a mermaid.

1103906007.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906007.content: It's the one you gave to me. What do you think?

1103906009.content: With a giggle, Poseidon turns to leave.

1103906011.content: This time, the Ocean Carnival is being held in Core City's suburbs. It stretches from the park all the way down to the beach. Poseidon and I arrive at the entrance to find the event has long been fully prepared.

1103906012.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906012.content: Left goes to the Wondrous Marvels attraction, right goes to the Interactive Science Experience. Which one do you want to see first, Admin?

1103906014.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906014.content: Perfect, I wanted to see that too!

1103906016.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906016.content: The games there are usually pretty fun. Some of them I've only read about.

1103906017.speaker: 我
1103906017.content: Then let's go give them a try!

1103906018.content: Our plans made, we head to our chosen area. The Carnival has plenty of options on offer, and Poseidon explains some of them to me from time to time as we walk along.

1103906019.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906019.content: See, you work this one like this...

1103906020.speaker: 我
1103906020.content: Wow, the fish are coming right up to us!

1103906021.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906021.content: Here, give me your hand, Admin. Press right here.

1103906023.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906023.content: They've got some new seafood snacks over here. Looks like they're offering samples.

1103906024.speaker: 我
1103906024.content: Smells good. Let's go check it out!

1103906025.content: Poseidon seems very familiar with the attractions here, and excitedly takes me to see several of them.

1103906026.content: Doing a loop of the Carnival has worn me out a bit. Seeing this, Poseidon takes me over to a bench on the edge of the park to rest.

1103906027.content: As I sit there, snack samples in one hand, stamp card and souvenirs in the other, I hear a sound coming from not far off in the park.

1103906028.speaker: 我
1103906028.content: That looks like a karaoke machine... but it sounds like there are dolphin noises coming out of it.

1103906030.content: I turn my head to see Poseidon looking curiously at the karaoke machine. She only glances at it for a moment before turning her gaze back to me.

1103906031.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906031.content: What are you looking at me like that for, Admin?

1103906032.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906032.content: I think we've rested enough. Any other attractions you want to see?

1103906033.content: We're here for you, Poseidon, aren't we...?

1103906034.speaker: 我
1103906034.content: Yeah, let's go check out those karaoke machines.

1103906035.content: Poseidon's blue eyes light up. It seems like we've finally hit on something she's interested in.

1103906037.content: As we head for the karaoke machines, I act like I'm organizing my things so I can hang back a few steps behind her.

1103906038.content: The people using the machine have just left. Poseidon walks up to it, then hesitates for a moment. Unable to hold back her curiosity, she starts pressing buttons.

1103906040.content: She scrunches up her eyebrows and starts fiddling with the machine. A rare look of panic spreads across her face.

1103906041.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906041.content: A-Admin, I think it's about to start playing. What do I do?!

1103906042.content: Having finally caught up to her, I take a look at the lyrics on the machine and do my best to hold back a laugh. I look at Poseidon, putting on an expression of hopelessness.

1103906043.speaker: 我
1103906043.content: ...I mean, there's nothing I can do.

1103906044.content: The music starts playing, and Poseidon only has time to raise her eyebrows at me before I thrust the mic into her hands.

1103906045.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906045.content: (Sobs) ...Let's learn about animals... Bzz bzz bzz, meow meow meow...

1103906048.content: Thankfully, the machine only plays this one line. Poseidon puts down the microphone and grabs me as I double over in laughter. As she does so, the karaoke machine starts playing dolphin noises.

1103906049.content: It's almost as if the sounds are coming from the depths of the ocean. Poseidon and I stop our rough-housing to listen quietly to the dolphin's call.

1103906050.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906050.content: That's right. This karaoke machine takes peoples' voices and translates them into dolphin language.

1103906051.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906051.content: These dolphin calls... they sound happy.

1103906052.speaker: 我
1103906052.content: Maybe because you really were happy just now.

1103906053.content: Seeing Poseidon looking at me, I decide to say what's been on my mind.

1103906054.speaker: 我
1103906054.content: You seem like you're pretty familiar with all of these attractions... I'm guessing you did your homework on them all before we came. I feel bad... I'm the one who invited you out.

1103906055.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906055.content: You're busy, Admin. Better to leave these things to me.

1103906056.speaker: 我
1103906056.content: But we were supposed to come out here to have fun. To give you a reward for getting everything off your chest.

1103906057.speaker: 我
1103906057.content: Since you read about all the attractions, I'm guessing there are a few you wanted to see, like this karaoke machine... But up till now you've just followed me to the things I wanted to see.

1103906058.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906058.content: Not at all, Admin! Whatever you're interested in, I'm interested in.

1103906060.speaker: 我
1103906060.content: We're not doing anything else today that you "just happen to also like". And we're also not just doing the things you want to do because we "just happen to be passing by".

1103906062.speaker: 我
1103906062.content: For just today, Poseidon, don't say "As long as everyone's happy, I'm happy."

1103906063.speaker: 我
1103906063.content: There needs to be give and take, you know. Today was a reward for you. If you're just pretending to be happy the whole time, I'm not gonna be happy either.

1103906064.speaker: 我
1103906064.content: So don't think about me. You decide where we go next, okay?

1103906065.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906065.content: ...How could I not think about you?

1103906066.content: Poseidon moves in a step closer, grabbing my clothes with her hand.

1103906068.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906068.content: What I mean is, seeing as you're here to hang out with me, wherever I go, you have to follow, okay?

1103906070.content: A smile plays across her face as Poseidon turns to go, taking me by the hand as she does.

1103906071.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906071.content: Then, today, let me let loose a bit.

1103906073.content: Poseidon leads us to quite a few great attractions along the way from the Carnival entrance to the beach.

1103906074.speaker: 我
1103906074.content: Let me look at my stamp card... We went to the drawing exhibition, made a buoy, took care of some fish fry, went to the gift shop... Oh yeah, and we also did sea creature dress-up.

1103906075.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906075.content: You were so cute in your crab costume, Admin. And you really nailed the crab walk.

1103906076.speaker: 我
1103906076.content: That's what you chose to remember, eh... I see you looking at the Carnival leaflet. What other attractions do you want to see? There's surfing, motorboating, high-dives...

1103906077.content: I look at the usually gentle and timid girl in front of me, and imagine her laughing as she battles the waves on the open sea... I nod my head vigorously.

1103906078.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906078.content: I've never done any of them. But in theory, the more active the sport, the better it is for letting off steam, right?

1103906081.content: I look at the promotional leaflet for directions, then grab Poseidon by the hand and lead her off.

1103906082.speaker: 我
1103906082.content: Seems like I was destined to be the one going out with you today... Let's go!

1103906083.content: When we get to where people are lining up for the attractions, we pick the one with the least people—surfing.

1103906084.content: It goes without saying Modifiers are pretty physically fit, and I've also been through Aether Gazer's training courses, so with the coach's help, Poseidon and I quickly learn all the basics of surfing. Before we know it, we're riding the surf.

1103906085.content: The jostling waves almost seem like they're going to send me flying. Battered by the ocean water, I feel like shouting. As I do, I hear a voice from nearby shout as well.

1103906087.content: Although she's obviously got a handle on how to surf, Poseidon still seems to be a bit nervous. Every time she rushes up to the crest of a wave, she can't help but cry out.

1103906088.content: An idea pops into my mind. As Poseidon floats in the shallows, I paddle over to her, then quickly dive into the water, flipping her surfboard as I do.

1103906090.content: She falls on top of me, and we both tumble in the water. I get turned upside down, fully immersed in the turbulent waves.

1103906091.content: The water isn't deep, however, and I know how to swim, so the two of us quickly make our way to the surface. As we look at each other, disheveled and soaking wet, we can't help but laugh.

1103906093.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906093.content: It's a bit cold... but nice.

1103906094.speaker: 我
1103906094.content: You see? There's no need to be scared of letting your hair down and having a good time.

1103906096.content: We practice a bit more, when I suddenly hear the coach calling us from the shore. It seems there are waves incoming that are too big for beginners like us.

1103906097.content: The coach continues to shout and wave at us from the beach. I turn to call for Poseidon to head back with me, when I suddenly see a blue and white figure racing toward the wave.

1103906099.content: My breath catches in my throat as I watch her fearlessly meet the wave, a speck of white swimming on the open sea.

1103906101.content: Poseidon seems to be shouting something at the wave, but her voice is swallowed by the roar of the surf coming in. I see her mount the crest of the towering water—then lose her balance as the wave breaks, and fall into the sea.

1103906103.content: I know full well that she's a Mod and she'll be fine, but I still paddle quickly over to her. As I approach, her fish-like blue and white form surfaces, and she opens her arms wide, enveloping me in a tight embrace.

1103906104.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906104.content: I really did it! I made it to the top!

1103906105.speaker: 我
1103906105.content:
Yep, I saw you.
You scared the crap out of me, though, you know. I've never seen you do something like that before.

1103906107.content: As if she's finally realized she's let herself get a bit overexcited, Poseidon quiets down, somewhat embarrassed.

1103906108.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906108.content: I never thought I'd do something like that either. Thanks for bringing me here, Admin.

1103906109.speaker: 我
1103906109.content: I did promise you a reward, after all.

1103906110.content: We've been practicing for a while. The sun is slowly making its way down toward the western horizon, spreading red and orange across the surface of the ocean water. Poseidon and I hold hands as we float there, enjoying the beauty in silence.

1103906111.speaker: 我
1103906111.content: Oh yeah, what did you yell at the wave just now?

1103906113.content: The sky darkens. After rinsing off and getting ourselves in order, Poseidon and I walk up the beach. A dance floor has been set up nearby. Poseidon has the staff scan our stamp cards.

1103906114.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906114.content:
Good thing we made it in time.
If you fill out the whole stamp card, they let you take part in a trivia competition. If you win, you get a chance at the grand prize draw.

1103906116.content: It doesn't seem like Poseidon has time to answer. She drags me over to where the trivia is being held, and to my great surprise, swiftly answers all the questions they ask.

1103906117.speaker: 我
1103906117.content: Full marks... It seems like you're the first one, too.

1103906118.speaker: 我
1103906118.content: Doesn't seem like there are too many people who made the cut. Guess you really want this gift, eh, Poseidon?

1103906119.content:
After filling out some paperwork, Poseidon finally lets out a sigh of relief, and joins me in watching the show.
The prize draw finally comes. We hold our breaths in anticipation as we listen to the host on the stage.

1103906120.speaker: 主持人
1103906120.content: Today's winners of the Carnival grand prize are... Poseidon and #{nickname}#! Congratulations to them both!

1103906123.content: As the audience cheers us on, Poseidon and I are guided by staff members up onto the stage.

1103906124.speaker: 主持人
1103906124.content: However, before we give you your prize, we have one little challenge left. Please give your best wishes to everyone—in dolphin!

1103906125.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906125.content: Huh? Since when has that been a part of it?

1103906126.speaker: 主持人
1103906126.content: We just added it to the show today!

1103906127.content: The host gives a sign, and staff members push one of the karaoke machines up in front of Poseidon. He pushes a button, and the machine fires up. Tons of colorful options crowd its tiny screen.

1103906128.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906128.content: Uh... Should I push this? Or push that first?

1103906130.content: After we get the machine configured, I go to pass a microphone to Poseidon—but she quickly gives it back to me.

1103906131.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906131.content: I want to hear what you have to say, Admin.

1103906132.speaker: 我
1103906132.content: Oh, uh... I hope the sea washes away all the little troubles it hears.

1103906133.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906133.content: Then... I hope it makes all the wishes it hears come true.

1103906134.content: The machine translates our good wishes into dolphin and blasts it out of the onstage speakers. The sounds echo through the entire Carnival. The host pulls out our prize—a lifetime pass to all ocean-related events in Core City.

1103906135.speaker: 我
1103906135.content: A pass? But... you almost definitely already have one of these, right? Why did you want to take part in this prize draw?

1103906136.speaker: 主持人
1103906136.content: Oh? So, the young lady is a frequent visitor of the Ocean Museum, eh? Now I'm curious as well—what made you want to join the draw?

1103906137.content: As the audience watches on, Poseidon looks at me and smiles gently.

1103906138.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906138.content: Because I wanted someone else to be able to go with me.

1103906139.content: It's late when we get back to Aether Gazer. The streets and halls are completely silent. Seeing as I promised to give the bamboo leaf boat back to Poseidon, we both head to my room.

1103906140.content: I turned off the smart curtains before I left, so when we open the door, a sky full of stars is waiting to greet us out the open window.

1103906141.content: The city lights have been mostly extinguished. The dark night sky is instead illuminated by the soft glow of the stars, whose light flows into the room, far off, yet seemingly close at hand.

1103906142.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906142.content: The night sky is kind of like an ocean, too.

1103906143.content: Poseidon walks to the window and looks out at the stars above. Her sea-blue earrings twinkle just like them through the strands of her hair.

1103906144.speaker: 我&波塞冬
1103906144.content: Want to look at the stars with me?

1103906145.content: We ask each other the question at the same time. It surprises us for a moment, how we're exactly on the same page. We both smile.

1103906146.speaker: 我
1103906146.content: Do you wanna... go outside and look?

1103906148.content: We open the window and hop over the windowsill, seeming much more like two kids than the two grown-ups we are.

1103906149.content: Moments later, it's as if we're floating in the night sky as we sit up in the cold air on the rooftop. It feels almost as if we could reach up and pluck the stars out of the dark expanse.

1103906151.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906151.content: It's dangerous. Don't come out here unless I'm here with you.

1103906152.content: She says this, but as she keeps me from falling, she allows me to stretch my hand out toward the sky.

1103906155.speaker: 我
1103906155.content: Nope. It's all of my worries.

1103906156.content: In an exaggerated motion, I throw my "troubles" out into the sky. Poseidon smiles and does the same, waving her hand out at the stars.

1103906157.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906157.content: Admin, do you remember what you thought about me the first time we met?

1103906158.speaker: 我
1103906158.content: Hmm... I think I thought you were a gentle and reliable senior.

1103906159.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906159.content: I remember thinking you were a bit of a special human... Never would have imagined I'd think of you like this.

1103906160.content: Under the light of the glittering stars, Poseidon scoots closer to me, her words washing over me like a comforting breeze.

1103906161.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906161.content: When that mission took us out to that island, I remember sitting with you looking at the stars and thinking...

1103906163.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906163.content: It would be great if it were just the two of us... like it is now.

1103906164.content: Her soft voice makes my breath catch in my throat. We listen to each other's heartbeats.

1103906165.content: Our words become one with the stars. It's not until the steadily dropping temperature makes me shiver that I realize how late it is.

1103906166.speaker: 我
1103906166.content: Did you have a good time today, Poseidon?

1103906167.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906167.content: Of course. I haven't been this relaxed in a while.

1103906168.speaker: 我
1103906168.content: Then I guess... we should call it a night, right?

1103906169.content: We head back inside and shut the window, then stare at each other for some time, neither of us willing to be the first to say goodbye.

1103906172.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906172.content: No, I've still got some things I want to tell you.

1103906173.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906173.content: Yeah, I was thinking the same.

1103906174.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906174.content: Don't be impatient, Admin. I've still got one last wish.

1103906175.content: Perhaps because of the cold breeze just now, Poseidon's face has turned a bit red.

1103906176.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906176.content: Admin, can you... Can you let me lie on your lap?

1103906177.speaker: 我
1103906177.content: Hmm... You know what, that's true. It's always me lying on your lap. I've never let you do the same.

1103906178.content: Just like Poseidon did before, I sit on the bed, and let Poseidon lay her head on my lap.

1103906179.content: I feel her warm weight against my thighs as her sea-blue hair cascades across them. Her unique fragrance, soft and gentle, wafts up to me. I feel a slight itch.

1103906183.content: I feel every little motion she makes as she talks. Her gentle eyes, her hair as it shifts slightly, the movements of her lips as she speaks—I see them all clearly. It's as if each word she says is being carved into my thumping heart.

1103906184.content: So this is the view Poseidon had of me every time I came to tell her my troubles or sleep on her lap. The whole time, she was always looking down at me, a soft smile on her face.

1103906185.speaker: 我
1103906185.content: Why do you like this position, Poseidon? Is it because...

1103906186.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906186.content: Because I can be close to you.

1103906187.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906187.content: I can feel you, the heat of your body, your emotions... It makes it easier to help you relax.

1103906188.speaker: 我
1103906188.content: So today... you wanted me to be able to feel you?

1103906189.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906189.content: Do you think I'm being too crazy, Admin?

1103906191.speaker: 我
1103906191.content: I was always really relaxed when I laid on your lap before, but you seem really nervous... Am I doing something wrong?

1103906192.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906192.content: No. Actually, with you here, I should be a lot more relaxed. It's only...

1103906193.content: Poseidon takes a slight breath, as if she's just thought of something.

1103906194.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906194.content: It's the first time I've seen you from this angle. It's like I'm seeing a whole new part of you.

1103906195.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906195.content: To be honest, #{nickname}#, laying in someone's lap is pretty meaningful for me...

1103906197.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906197.content: First, promise to keep this a secret... #{nickname}#.

1103906198.content: She says my name again in an almost bittersweet tone. Her hands caress my cheeks as she looks me full in the face, smiling.

1103906199.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906199.content: Seems like all my wishes are coming true. I'm so happy...

1103906200.content: At some point, someone turns out the bedside light, and her words fade into the boundless darkness.

1103906202.content: As time is borne away on the rushing currents of my dreams, the darkness behind my eyelids is gradually replaced with a faint glimmer of light. I feel a warmth from beside me that makes it impossible for me to even think about leaving. I want to stay here forever.

1103906203.content: Unfortunately, of course, sleep is like foam floating on the ocean—the harder you try to grab at it, the more it dissolves away. Finally, I slowly open my eyes.

1103906205.content: A gentle smile appears in my vision. Poseidon is sitting on the side of the bed looking at me in the morning light, holding the blanket in one hand.

1103906206.content: Slightly dazed, this almost feels like a completely normal morning to me. Poseidon must have woken up earlier than me and, not wanting to get out of bed, sat there looking at me from time to time and guessing how long it'd be before I'd get up.

1103906208.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906208.content: You look different sleeping from this angle than when you're lying in my lap.

1103906210.content: Poseidon reaches out to smooth out a few wild hairs standing up on my head. To my half-asleep eyes, the morning light shining down on her makes her look like a gentle miracle.

1103906216.content: My hand slides over to hers, climbing slowly over the ridges on her palm. She chuckles and intertwines her fingers with mine.

1103906217.content: My hand touches her warm and delicate cheek. Poseidon takes it in hers, moving it somewhere soft and smooth. I can feel her breath under my fingertips.

1103906218.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906218.content: #{nickname}#... the me you felt yesterday, that you're feeling now—it's all real.

1103906219.content: As if making sure herself, she holds my hand all the tighter. Her eyes radiate a gentleness as deep as the sea itself.

1103906220.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906220.content: I thought over a lot while you were sleeping.

1103906221.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906221.content: I thought about yesterday, about my bad mood lately... and about a lot of things that have happened since we met.

1103906222.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906222.content: Yesterday... everything that happened... I'm really happy about it all, Admin.

1103906224.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906224.content: I understand now, how important it is not to push bad feelings down deep inside. And...

1103906225.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906225.content: How important it is to share the things that are weighing on you with someone who makes you happy.

1103906227.content: She blinks, but doesn't say who that "someone" is for her, instead reaching out and touching my cheek.

1103906228.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906228.content: You know, I thought of a bit of a crazy wish...

1103906229.speaker: 波塞冬
1103906229.content: Will you sleep here with me a bit longer, #{nickname}#?

1103906231.content: She lowers her hand and drops the covers. Her warm body presses up against me again. I cuddle against her, a fish lost in her ocean.

1103906233.content: The blanket shields us from the sunlight and early morning, everything that isn't us. In this small, cozy space, the only sound is our rhythmic breathing.

1103906234.content: She reaches her hand out to me.

1103906236.content: When I return to my room from the restaurant that evening, I can't help but think back on everything that happened the previous day.

1103906237.speaker: 我
1103906237.content: But I feel like something's missing...

1103906238.content: Oh yeah! I forgot to give the bamboo leaf boat back to Poseidon!

1103906239.speaker: 我
1103906239.content: The whole reason we went out together was because of that boat and I ended up forgetting it...

1103906240.content: Having thrown myself for a bit of a loop, I open my drawer, planning to pull out the boat and set it aside to give Poseidon later.

1103906241.content: I fish the bamboo leaf boat out from underneath a stack of papers on top of it. To my surprise, another bit of dark green peeks out from among the files.

1103906243.content: Murky, long-forgotten memories surge to the forefront of my mind. If I remember right, I picked this boat up while doing some fieldwork a long while back. At the time, I was way too busy with work to give it much thought. I picked it up, then forgot about it completely.

1103906244.content: This also brings back to mind how nervous Poseidon got when I pretended to have found another bamboo leaf boat.

1103906245.content: Just what did she write in here? I open the boat and take a look.

1103906246.content:
"I think I'm falling for someone. But how should I tell them..."

"Why don't I let them lay on my lap first, and see where it goes from there..."

1109501001.speaker: 我
1109501001.content: A user's report on the Smart Office Chair? Division Two should write that. Don't give it to me...

1109501002.content: I throw the screen and its to-do list to one side and lean back in the chair, letting my tired and bloodshot eyes have a long-awaited rest.

1109501003.content: I hear someone walk lightly up to my side and stand by the corner of the desk. Whoever it is, they are moving quietly, like a cat at night. They pick up my terminal for a look.

1109501004.speaker: 托特
1109501004.content: I didn't realize a Division Nine Administrator's duties were so varied.

1109501005.speaker: 我
1109501005.content: These aren't even my job... I don't know what they're doing. Anything that could feasibly be Division Nine's work gets sent to me. What do they think I am, some kind of superhuman?

1109501006.speaker: 托特
1109501006.content: You know what you need? An assistant. A gatekeeper.

1109501007.speaker: 我
1109501007.content: I'd ask you to do it if you worked for Aether Gazer.

1109501009.content: Thoth returns the documents to the desk, smiling as she does so. Then a book catches her attention.

1109501011.speaker: 我
1109501011.content: Mainly for the illustrations. This is truly a masterpiece.

1109501012.speaker: 托特
1109501012.content: But you've read it, haven't you? What did you think of it? Any good?

1109501013.speaker: 我
1109501013.content: It was better than I expected. I thought it was going to be clichéd sci-fi, but I loved the characters. Especially...

1109501016.speaker: 托特
