1109501016.content: Because that's what you said before.

1109501017.speaker: 我
1109501017.content: You mean... I've read this book before?

1109501018.speaker: 托特
1109501018.content: Exactly. And you had the same reaction, more or less. Even liked the same character.

1109501019.content: ...I just suddenly feel like I've lost money.

1109501020.speaker: 托特
1109501020.content: I wouldn't say that. I think it's good you maintain a consistent opinion over time.

1109501021.speaker: 我
1109501021.content: I guess so... Anyway, it's been a long time since I enjoyed a book so much.

1109501022.speaker: 托特
1109501022.content: Sure. You even kept trying to make me read it.

1109501023.content: As she talks, Thoth is scrawling into a small notebook. She's using a quill, one with a star on it.

1109501026.speaker: 我
1109501026.content: I'm just looking forward to seeing "Kay's" masterpiece.

1109501027.speaker: 托特
1109501027.content:
I've been feeling uninspired lately. If that continues, there's no hope of finishing this year.
But as you're so keen, I'll expect you to spread the word when the new book comes out.

1109501029.content: We're silent for a while, until even the scratching of Thoth's quill stops. I look up and see her furrowing her brow in thought.

1109501030.content: There's a long silence, so long I check the clock in case time has stopped. Eventually, I have to speak.

1109501031.speaker: 我
1109501031.content: Is the writer's block that bad?

1109501033.speaker: 我
1109501033.content: I've seen online that writers need constant sources of new material. Maybe you could try that? Like, read something new?

1109501034.content: I stand up, trying to remember what I'd learned online.

1109501035.content: Thoth taps a finger on her notebook, apparently thinking of something. Her eyes turn to me.

1109501036.speaker: 托特
1109501036.content: Want to go on a date with me?

1109501037.content: Is it the date I'm thinking of?

1109501038.speaker: 托特
1109501038.content: For the material. I'm writing about a couple reconnecting, so it'd be great if you could come.

1109501040.content: I run a finger over my packed agenda, trying to squeeze out some time.

1109501041.speaker: 我
1109501041.content: I think... I could miss this meeting. Cross that out. And that one. That can go too...

1109501042.speaker: 我
1109501042.content: Then delegate this pile of work to...

1109501044.speaker: 托特
1109501044.content: If you've got that much work, I shouldn't make things worse.

1109501045.speaker: 我
1109501045.content: But you need help with your writing, don't you?

1109501047.speaker: 我
1109501047.content:
Well then.
Time is like the water in a sponge. The harder you squeeze, the more comes out.

1109501049.speaker: 托特
1109501049.content: These documents are all finished and ready to be stamped.

1109501051.content:
I nod and glance over the papers, quickly giving them the Division Nine e-stamp as I do so.
I've been battling with documents and data for days, but I can now declare victory.

1109501052.speaker: 我
1109501052.content: Phew. Finally cleared my inbox. I wasn't sure I'd ever manage.

1109501053.speaker: 托特
1109501053.content: I always believed you could do it.

1109501054.speaker: 我
1109501054.content: You have that much faith in me?

1109501055.speaker: 托特
1109501055.content: I know you do what you say you'll do.

1109501056.speaker: 托特
1109501056.content: You've worked hard these last few days.

1109501057.speaker: 我
1109501057.content: I couldn't have done it without you.

1109501058.speaker: 托特
1109501058.content: I know you'd do the same for me.

1109501059.content: Just as I relax, a coffee appears on my desk. Sweet milk, bitter coffee. I realize it's a combination I've become used to.

1109501060.speaker: 我
1109501060.content: Thanks. I'm starting to think you can read my mind.

1109501062.content: I lift the coffee and take a sip, remembering how Agent L in "Blade Rusher" also got to relax after finishing a tough mission.

1109501064.content: The Smart Office Chair makes a sound and suddenly reclines all the way back. A warm feeling spreads across my torso.

1109501065.speaker: 我
1109501065.content: I'm covered in coffee! This hunk of junk is getting a zero-star review!

1109501066.speaker: 我
1109501066.content: Sorry. Guess your coffee-brewing skills have gone to waste.

1109501067.speaker: 托特
1109501067.content: Never mind. It's just a cup of coffee. I can make a fresh one.

1109501068.content: Thoth hovers by my desk like some delicate bird, smiling and handing me tissues.

1109501069.speaker: 托特
1109501069.content: And now we know where to go on our date. Clothes shopping!

1109501070.speaker: 托特
1109501070.content: Come here. What about this one?

1109501071.speaker: 我
1109501071.content: I like it. It's much more comfortable than the last one.

1109501072.content: Thoth navigates us through the mall with ease, and before long, she's chosen several new shirts for me.

1109501073.speaker: 我
1109501073.content: Hey, how come you're so good at this?

1109501074.speaker: 托特
1109501074.content: Practice, that's all. Any agent needs to be a master of disguise.

1109501075.speaker: 我
1109501075.content: You must have a huge closet.

1109501076.speaker: 托特
1109501076.content: Ha ha... It's not all like in the books.

1109501078.speaker: 托特
1109501078.content: Some of it is the same, though. Our missions do require us to take on different identities and pretend to be all different kinds of people.

1109501079.speaker: 我
1109501079.content: That sounds so cool. I'd love to know what that's like.

1109501080.speaker: 托特
1109501080.content: You're obsessed with "Blade Rusher", aren't you?

1109501083.speaker: 我
1109501083.content: Well... it's not because of the book. It's not like I'm some superfan or anything.

1109501085.speaker: 托特
1109501085.content: Well, I guess I could share a secret or two.

1109501086.content: Thoth lowers her head a little and adjusts her tie. And with that, the performance begins.

1109501088.content: The young girl gives a charming smile as she fastens a button on my shirt for me.

1109501090.speaker: 托特
1109501090.content: An agent needs to be able to respond to sudden changes.

1109501091.speaker: 托特
1109501091.content: A good disguise and performance boosts mission success rates by 20% or more. And that's not book learning, I've seen it myself.

1109501092.speaker: 我
1109501092.content: How come I feel like I'm in a lab experiment...

1109501093.speaker: 托特
1109501093.content: Hey, #{nickname}#. Data analysis isn't just for the research department.

1109501094.speaker: 托特
1109501094.content: So, have you chosen a shirt?

1109501096.speaker: 托特
1109501096.content: Okay. I'll go settle up; you wait here.

1109501097.content: Thoth switches characters as easily as an actor on a stage. Blink, and she's a new person.

1109501099.content: Soon, she returns. This time, she's wearing her own usual smile.

1109501100.speaker: 托特
1109501100.content: Sorry for the wait. Ready to go?

1109501103.content: You're at your best when there's not a crisis going on.

1109501105.speaker: 我
1109501105.content: I guess... you're more genuine. I feel more at ease.

1109501106.speaker: 托特
1109501106.content: You're always saying things like that.

1109501109.content: Before I can ask further, a noise from my belly interrupts us.

1109501115.content: The smell of the food in the air, the look of the restaurant, the people... it all seems strangely familiar.

1109501117.speaker: 托特
1109501117.content: You should be. We used to meet here all the time.

1109501118.speaker: 我
1109501118.content: So that's why you chose this place?

1109501120.content: Thoth leads us to a window seat. We sit down, and I flick through the ordering interface on the screen.

1109501121.speaker: 我
1109501121.content: So what did I use to like?

1109501122.speaker: 托特
1109501122.content: I guess... this. It's their specialty, a set meal.

1109501123.speaker: 我
1109501123.content: Sounds like I was too lazy to choose and just ordered the specialty...

1109501124.speaker: 托特
1109501124.content: Then why not try the Xu Heng-style mapo tofu?

1109501125.speaker: 我
1109501125.content: Just the name makes me sweat... I'll pass.

1109501126.content: As soon as I say that, Thoth claps her hand to her mouth to cover a smile.

1109501128.speaker: 托特
1109501128.content: I just remembered something amusing, that's all. I was eating here once and... someone... got the bright idea of ordering mapo tofu. But it was too spicy for them. Ended up almost breathing fire.

1109501129.speaker: 我
1109501129.content: And that someone was... me, right?

1109501130.content: A sly smile is Thoth's only response.

1109501131.speaker: 托特
1109501131.content: Back to business. What are you having?

1109501132.speaker: 我
1109501132.content: That set meal. I'll see if I still like it.

1109501133.content:
We order. Thoth takes out her notebook and quill and starts scribbling.
I watch as she writes and an old question, something that's been bothering me, resurfaces.

1109501135.speaker: 托特
1109501135.content: Why are you asking that all of a sudden?

1109501136.speaker: 我
1109501136.content: I was just thinking... We kept in touch, but in an old-fashioned way?

1109501139.speaker: 托特
1109501139.content: Just an old habit. I guess if you want an actual reason...

1109501140.speaker: 托特
1109501140.content: Maybe it's because writing things down makes them more real. And that's twice as true for writing them by hand.

1109501141.speaker: 托特
1109501141.content: They say writers have to write about what they know, what they feel. If they make it all up, they might sell a few books, but they won't really move anyone.

1109501142.speaker: 我
1109501142.content: I think I understand... or maybe not.

1109501143.speaker: 托特
1109501143.content: You don't need to think about it too much. And it's just my opinion, anyway. It doesn't mean I'm right.

1109501144.speaker: 我
1109501144.content: Hang on, so you're saying... So what did I use to write?

1109501146.content: While we've been talking, our food has arrived. I lift my spoon and take a little taste of the food. I can tell it's going to be as delicious as the menu boasts it is.

1109501148.speaker: 我
1109501148.content: Let's just say I'm enjoying getting reacquainted with my past.

1109501149.speaker: 我
1109501149.content: Seems like past me had great taste.

1109501150.speaker: 托特
1109501150.content: I see. Do you want to try the cheesy asparagus? I bet that's as delicious as it used to be too.

1109501151.content: Thoth lifts a spoonful for me to try, but there's a wicked smile on her lips.

1109501153.speaker: 托特
1109501153.content: I thought you wanted to get back in touch with your past. Well, this is a part of that.

1109501154.content: The asparagus is hovering by my lips. It seems saying no isn't an option.

1109501156.speaker: 我
1109501156.content: That's... really good. I've never had such tender asparagus before.

1109501158.content: We laugh and talk as we eat. There's something about conversations with Thoth that I always find relaxing.

1109501159.content: And it seems Thoth has finally found her inspiration. When she finishes eating, she picks up her notebook and quill and starts writing at great speed.

1109501161.content: I'm on the edge of a food coma and have to shake my head to stay awake.

1109501162.speaker: 托特
1109501162.content: That's already decided. You're going back to your room, Admin.

1109501164.speaker: 托特
1109501164.content: You're tired and you've got some time off. The perfect time for a nap, no? Get some rest and we'll pick up again tomorrow.

1109501165.speaker: 我
1109501165.content: Oh. So where are we going tomorrow?

1109501166.speaker: 托特
1109501166.content: Meet me at 10 in the morning, at Seaside Park. Sleep well.

1109502001.speaker: 我
1109502001.content: I've got half an hour. That's loads of time.

1109502002.content: I'm feeling full of energy today. Perhaps because I slept so well last night.

1109502003.content: I stride off toward the park, where I'm due to meet Thoth. The girl with the gunsmoke hair is already waiting for me.

1109502004.content: To my surprise, she's wearing a casual black-and-white outfit. It's very different from her usual practical work gear.

1109502006.speaker: 托特
1109502006.content: I should say "Oh, I just got here myself"? Right? Like in the manga everyone's reading?

1109502007.speaker: 我
1109502007.content: Sounds about right for one of those romance stories.

1109502008.speaker: 托特
1109502008.content: Mm-hmm. And do you have anything else to say?

1109502009.content: Thoth puts her notebook away and looks up at me with those lovely eyes.

1109502012.speaker: 托特
1109502012.content: Well, today I have my writer's hat on.

1109502018.speaker: 托特
1109502018.content: For the greeting phase of our date, obviously.

1109502019.speaker: 我
1109502019.content: Huh? Should I have prepared better lines?

1109502020.speaker: 我
1109502020.content: "You sparkle like a diamond"? Something like that?

1109502021.speaker: 托特
1109502021.content: Ha ha. Save it for a sonnet.

1109502022.content: She flashes that brilliant smile and I find myself wondering how this young woman and the CORG agent can be the same person.

1109502023.speaker: 托特
1109502023.content: Anyway, diamonds can't sparkle without a light. And as for you, you can just be yourself.

1109502024.speaker: 托特
1109502024.content: Let's go. We're not stopping here.

1109502025.speaker: 我
1109502025.content: I've never been here before. I didn't even know this kind of place existed in Ain Soph.

1109502026.speaker: 托特
1109502026.content: Maybe you should get out more.

1109502027.speaker: 我
1109502027.content: I would, if I wasn't tied up with work all the time.

1109502028.speaker: 托特
1109502028.content: It's a hard life you lead...

1109502029.speaker: 托特
1109502029.content: Would you sit with me for a while?

1109502030.content: Thoth sits down and pats the bench beside her to show where I should sit.

1109502031.speaker: 托特
1109502031.content: Writers like to come here and watch the fountain. They say it gives them inspiration.

1109502032.content: The sun shines through the dancing plumes of water and the swaying branches of the trees. The light shimmers and ripples around us.

1109502034.content: Thoth pulls out her notebook and rests it on her knee, opening it and flicking through the pages. I see every page is full of notes.

1109502035.speaker: 我
1109502035.content: I've always been impressed by how much you write...

1109502036.speaker: 托特
1109502036.content: I've kept notes like this for ages. Any time I have an idea for my writing I put it in here. It's like a store of inspiration.

1109502037.speaker: 托特
1109502037.content: And it's interesting to flick through the things I've written before. The past flows away from us so quickly. It's easy to lose touch with it if we're not careful.

1109502039.speaker: 托特
1109502039.content: Yeah. Time flows backward, we go forward. You can't stop the river.

1109502040.speaker: 我
1109502040.content: No wonder you're always so protective of your notebook. You never even let me look at it.

1109502042.speaker: 我
1109502042.content: Don't play dumb. You can't have forgotten!

1109502043.content: Thoth doesn't reply. But there's a faint smile on her lips and she's fiddling with her quill. I can see her most recent notes are full of crossings-out and changes. It looks like she wasn't happy with her work.

1109502044.speaker: 我
1109502044.content: Seems you do a lot of edits.

1109502045.speaker: 托特
1109502045.content: I've figured out the structure of the story, but when I sit down to write... it never comes out how I want it to.

1109502046.speaker: 我
1109502046.content: How can I be of help to you?

1109502047.content: She lifts those crystal-clear eyes to look at me for a while. Then she reaches out to adjust my clothing and looks back down.

1109502048.speaker: 托特
1109502048.content: No. Just be here with me.

1109502049.content: And it's as if she's turned writing mode on. She says nothing, but her quill dances over the page. A note here, a sketch there.

1109502050.content: And all is silent, except for the scratching of Thoth's quill and the splashing of the fountain. It's not an awkward silence, though. It feels peaceful and relaxing.

1109502051.content: She writes and writes, turning her ideas into words on the page. New thoughts appear between the lines of crossed-out old thoughts.

1109502052.speaker: ？？？
1109502052.content: No... That's not right... Oh, that's no good either! This isn't what I want at all...

1109502053.speaker: ？？？
1109502053.content: None of these are any good! Argh! What am I going to do?

1109502054.content: The peace and quiet is shattered by a stream of complaints. Thoth and I raise our heads to find the source of the noise. It's a woman, hanging her head in dismay.

1109502056.speaker: 我
1109502056.content: I'll go and talk to her. We can't just ignore her.

1109502059.speaker: 谜之女性
1109502059.content: Uh... I'm not sure how to explain.

1109502060.content: She has a tripod and an expensive-looking camera, so I assume she's a photographer.

1109502061.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502061.content: I've been struggling to find inspiration lately... None of my photos look how I want them to look.

1109502062.speaker: 我
1109502062.content: Oh. We have the same problem.

1109502063.content: After I say that, she looks over my shoulder at Thoth, then back to me.

1109502064.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502064.content: So you're here looking for ideas too?

1109502065.speaker: 我
1109502065.content: Sure. It's the perfect place, right?

1109502066.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502066.content: Could I ask you a favor? Maybe you two could pose for photos for me? It won't take long! Then I'll go and leave you in peace.

1109502068.speaker: 我
1109502068.content: I feel like we should agree. It won't take long, she looks like she really needs the help, and then you can get back to writing in peace and quiet.

1109502069.speaker: 托特
1109502069.content: What if she goes back on her word?

1109502070.speaker: 我
1109502070.content: I don't think she's that kind of person. And if she does, we'd be justified in asking her to go.

1109502071.speaker: 托特
1109502071.content: I was kidding. I trust your judgment. And those of us lacking inspiration should help each other out.

1109502072.content: And so we modeled for the uninspired photographer.

1109502074.content: Thoth is giving the camera her standard work-issue smile.

1109502076.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502076.content: It's no good... I can't use this...

1109502077.speaker: 托特
1109502077.content: Is it my pose? Or should I change my expression?

1109502078.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502078.content: I'm not sure... But this isn't the photo I want to take.

1109502080.content: Thoth taps her jaw as she ponders the problem, then looks up and turns to me.

1109502081.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502081.content: How about this? Could you both be in the same photo?

1109502082.content: I'm not saying it's not good...

1109502084.content: We stand in front of the camera as the photographer stares intently at us, as if she's a hawk watching her prey.

1109502085.content: Thoth follows her instructions and moves closer to my side.

1109502087.content: This time, I move closer to Thoth.

1109502089.content: Again, Thoth moves closer to me, now almost touching me. I can feel her breath on my cheek. It's warm, like a summer breeze.

1109502090.speaker: 我
1109502090.content: D-does this seem okay to you?

1109502092.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502092.content: What are you two doing? I meant closer to the camera!

1109502093.speaker: 我
1109502093.content: Huh?! Thoth, you did that on purpose!

1109502095.content: Thoth sees how embarrassed I am and she can't help smiling.

1109502097.content: The shutter clicks and captures the instant Thoth smiles.

1109502098.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502098.content: Incredible! That's what I wanted! It's so natural. Like a breeze over a mountain ridge.

1109502099.speaker: 我
1109502099.content: Huh? A what over a what? Do all artists talk weird like that?

1109502101.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502101.content: Sorry, I was getting overexcited... I'm so grateful to you both. I've finally got the photo I need.

1109502102.content: The photographer turns the camera so we can see the image on the screen. Me, looking awkward, and Thoth smiling.

1109502103.speaker: 我
1109502103.content: Seriously? That's the photo you wanted?

1109502104.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502104.content: It's something natural. That's what I needed. A breeze over the mountain ridge.

1109502105.speaker: 我
1109502105.content: Whatever. As long as you've got the right photo.

1109502106.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502106.content: I won't bother you any longer. I hope you—

1109502107.speaker: 我
1109502107.content: Hold up! You haven't told us how you're going to use the photo.

1109502108.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502108.content: Oh, don't worry. I'm not making any money off it. I want it for inspiration.

1109502110.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502110.content: Oh. No problem, give me a...

1109502112.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502112.content: Let me thank you one more time, and I hope—

1109502115.speaker: 托特
1109502115.content: Could you give us a copy of the photo?

1109502117.content: The photographer nods and taps on her camera controls. Soon, we have a copy of the photo.

1109502118.speaker: 我
1109502118.content: Why did she have to take it when I was looking like that?

1109502120.speaker: 我
1109502120.content: How? I don't usually look that stupid.

1109502121.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502121.content: Oh, and take these too. As a thank-you.

1109502122.content: The photographer has put her camera away and is passing us two tickets.

1109502124.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502124.content: VIP tickets to a Star and Sun event. The deets are all on there.

1109502125.speaker: 我
1109502125.content: Star and Sun? You mean the new bookstore on District 15's Central Avenue? The most popular place in town? The one with the Omorfies-style decor?

1109502127.speaker: 托特
1109502127.content: How come you're such an expert?

1109502128.speaker: 我
1109502128.content: Let me give you three clues: Blade Rusher 2. Book signing. Today.

1109502130.speaker: 我
1109502130.content: They say the reclusive author Mr. Kawin is going to make an appearance, so tickets have been hard to get. I did think about going, but... I just couldn't get a ticket.

1109502131.speaker: 托特
1109502131.content: Wow. You really are a big Kawin fan, aren't you?

1109502132.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502132.content: There aren't many people who like novelists so much. You must love reading. A person of culture.

1109502133.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109502133.content: Okay, I really am going this time. I hope you find your inspiration, and that we meet again one day.

1109502134.content: She picks up her gear and leaves us with the tickets.

1109502135.content: We return to the bench, where Thoth picks up her notebook and quill. For some reason, though, she doesn't write anything.

1109502137.speaker: 托特
1109502137.content: It's more that... I think I've figured out why I'm struggling so much.

1109502138.content: She looks down at the page and crosses out everything she wrote earlier.

1109502140.speaker: 托特
1109502140.content: That thing she said that you thought was weird—a breeze over the mountain ridge.

1109502141.content: She tilts her head and smiles.

1109502142.speaker: 托特
1109502142.content: I think... maybe that's what I need.

1109502143.speaker: 我
1109502143.content: If you say so, but I still don't understand.

1109502144.speaker: 托特
1109502144.content: If I had to say, I guess I need... something real? Anyway, at least I feel like I have a better idea of what I'm looking for.

1109502145.content: Thoth looks at me for a moment before shaking her head and smiling.

1109502147.speaker: 托特
1109502147.content: Something I read in a book once. About how in the olden days, if you wanted to change the track a train was on, there was something called a railroad switch.

1109502148.speaker: 我
1109502148.content: And you thought of that because...?

1109502149.speaker: 托特
1109502149.content: Because I think maybe you're my railroad switch.

1109502151.speaker: 托特
1109502151.content: For a long time, my life has been on a certain track. But when I'm with you... it's like I take a whole new direction.

1109502152.speaker: 我
1109502152.content: Then maybe... how about trying another track? Maybe look elsewhere for inspiration? Where would you like to go next?

1109502153.speaker: 托特
1109502153.content: Actually, I was going to give you a surprise. But that photographer beat me with her VIP tickets.

1109502154.content: Thoth reaches into her pocket and pulls out two non-VIP tickets for the event.

1109502156.speaker: 托特
1109502156.content: In my story, the two protagonists meet in an Omorfies bookstore.

1109502157.speaker: 托特
1109502157.content: And... you like the book, right?

1109502159.speaker: 托特
1109502159.content: Let's get moving. There's more on the agenda after the bookstore.

1109502160.content: And so we set off for the Star and Sun bookstore.

1109502161.speaker: 我
1109502161.content: Where did all these people come from?

1109502162.speaker: 托特
1109502162.content: I'm glad we got the VIP tickets or we'd be in line all day.

1109502163.speaker: 店员
1109502163.content: Thank you all for attending the release of the Blade Rusher 2 special edition. Unfortunately... ahem... Mr. Kawin is unable to attend due to unforeseen circumstances.

1109502164.speaker: 店员
1109502164.content: To make up for that, the highest-scoring participants in today's competition will get a limited-edition Agent L figure and a lifetime membership to our bookstore!

1109502165.content: The announcement gets the crowd excited again.

1109502166.speaker: 店员
1109502166.content: Any customers not attending the event can enter here.

1109502168.speaker: 托特
1109502168.content: We've got VIP tickets, so we should take part, right?

1109502170.speaker: 托特
1109502170.content: Sure it will. It's all part of the process.

1109502171.speaker: 托特
1109502171.content: Okay. Well, if we're taking part we should aim to win, right?

1109503001.content: We show our tickets and get into the store, picking up some special-edition Blade Rusher postcards on the way.

1109503002.content: The store is full of Omorfies artworks. For a minute I'm not sure where I am.

1109503003.speaker: 托特
1109503003.content: It's so authentic. I bet the owner's from Omorfies.

1109503005.speaker: 托特
1109503005.content: Sure. It's just like a typical Omorfies bookstore.

1109503006.speaker: 我
1109503006.content: So how many points would you give it?

1109503008.speaker: 我
1109503008.content: I mean... when we met, you gave me points for my greeting, right?

1109503009.speaker: 托特
1109503009.content: Oh. I see what you mean.

1109503011.speaker: 店员
1109503011.content: Welcome to our event! There are three parts: The Blade Rusher Quiz, The Electrocardiogram, and The Last Letter.

1109503012.speaker: 我
1109503012.content: Oh, so we have to compete in pairs. That's why she gave us two tickets.

1109503013.content: The Electrocardiogram and The Last Letter are both well-known scenes from Blade Rusher. And I assume the Blade Rusher Quiz will be a quiz about Blade Rusher... That will be easy, I was reading it last night.

1109503014.speaker: 店员
1109503014.content: Are you ready? Then I'll start the quiz. In Blade Rusher, how many times does Agent L say "It's your bad!"?

1109503020.content: Thoth taps at a miniature terminal in the palm of her hand as she whispers to me.

1109503022.speaker: 托特
1109503022.content: Nobody said we weren't allowed to look online.

1109503023.content: Thanks to the miracles of modern technology, we make it through the quiz.

1109503024.speaker: 我
1109503024.content: Those were really odd questions. How is anyone meant to know about the publisher or the printing house?

1109503025.speaker: 托特
1109503025.content: If I didn't know better, I'd say the questions were designed to make sure nobody wins.

1109503026.speaker: 店员
1109503026.content: And now, it's time for The Electrocardiogram. Let's see how in tune you two are with each other!

1109503027.speaker: 我
1109503027.content: I have a feeling the questions are going to get even weirder.

1109503028.speaker: 托特
1109503028.content: As long as I can answer them...

1109503029.speaker: 我
1109503029.content: It's not that simple. I read the rules. They ask me a question and you have to guess what my answer is.

1109503031.speaker: 我
1109503031.content: And honestly, I'm not sure even I know what my answers will be.

1109503032.speaker: 我
1109503032.content: I see what they're up to. The store just wants to use a Blade Rusher 2 event to get people in. They don't want anyone to really win.

1109503033.content: The staff member asks me ten questions. Thoth guesses every one of my answers correctly.

1109503034.speaker: 我
1109503034.content: Okay, you have got to be a mind-reader.

1109503036.speaker: 我
1109503036.content: Well if you aren't, how did you get all those answers right?

1109503037.speaker: 托特
1109503037.content: You're the same as you've always been. No changes at all.

1109503039.speaker: 托特
1109503039.content: A leopard can't change its spots, they say.

1109503041.speaker: 托特
1109503041.content: Also, I always pay close attention to you.

1109503042.content: ...I just feel embarrassed when someone says it to my face.

1109503043.speaker: 我
1109503043.content: Why don't we... hey, any progress on your inspiration?

1109503044.speaker: 托特
1109503044.content: Zero. This event isn't as much fun as I'd hoped. Feels more like being on an assembly line than entertainment. And I don't like the boss.

1109503045.speaker: 托特
1109503045.content: That thing she said that you thought was weird—a breeze over the mountain ridge.

1109503046.speaker: 托特
1109503046.content: I think... maybe that's what I need.

1109503047.speaker: 我
1109503047.content: (Yeah... we came here looking for inspiration, not some boring competition.)

1109503048.speaker: 店员
1109503048.content: If you've finished chatting, we can start the final stage!

1109503049.speaker: 我
1109503049.content: Yeah, let's get this over with.

1109503050.content: The Last Letter, the final part of the event, is also based on a Blade Rusher scene. We have to face each other, write down what we want to say to each other, then read it out. We get scored on what we say.

1109503051.speaker: 店员
1109503051.content: I have an announcement! So far we've been keeping the scoreboard secret. Now, we reveal it!

1109503052.speaker: 我
1109503052.content: (Thoth and I have got every question right so far. So we've got to be close to victory, haven't we?)

1109503053.content: I look up at the scoreboard. Thoth and I have 5,000 points. The current leader has... 999,999 points?

1109503055.speaker: 店员
1109503055.content: No. That's the score the pair before you got. The third stage makes up the bulk of the available points.

1109503056.speaker: 我
1109503056.content: So what you're saying is that the first two stages were pointless?

1109503057.speaker: 店员
1109503057.content: Oh, no, not at all. It's just the way it works. Now, I have to help the next two competitors, so if we could hurry up...

1109503058.speaker: 我
1109503058.content: Just the way it works?! It's a scam! It's obvious they don't want to give out any prizes.

1109503059.speaker: 托特
1109503059.content: I can't believe they're so brazen...

1109503060.speaker: 我
1109503060.content: I bet if we win, they'll make us pay for the prizes...

1109503061.content: I look helplessly at the piece of paper in front of me as I fiddle with my pen.

1109503062.content: I work with documents every day. In ordinary circumstances, writing isn't a problem. But now...

1109503063.content: I've already given up any hope of winning a prize. But I have another aim: to find Thoth her breeze over the mountain ridge.

1109503065.content: I'm half-finished when I glance up at Thoth to see she is looking back at me.

1109503067.speaker: 托特
1109503067.content: Hmm... Not exactly. It's more like...

1109503069.speaker: 托特
1109503069.content: Nothing... Anyway, it's just a dumb competition. We don't need to take it too seriously. We can just write what we think will score best.

1109503070.content: Thoth looks back down at the page and starts to write at speed.

1109503072.content: I sigh quietly. I don't care about winning. What I want to do, what I should do, is...

1109503073.content:
What would I say? If I wasn't going to lie, if I was going to be sincere?
Something about our past? Our present? Or something else.

1109503074.content: Images flash before my eyes, one after the other. Each one brings its own emotions, but none tell me what to write.

1109503075.content: The clock ticks, second by second. The time limit was tight to begin with and I've almost wasted it all.

1109503076.speaker: 我
1109503076.content: In the end, what I want to say is—

1109503078.content: There's no time to pretty up the language. It's just a simple statement. I guess most of our heartfelt thoughts are like that.

1109503079.content: There's a round of unimpressed applause and our score increases. By 5,000 points.

1109503081.content: The judges might not be impressed, but Thoth seems stunned into silence.

1109503084.content: Thoth lowers her head, as if trying to hold something in.

1109503085.speaker: 我
1109503085.content: I know it didn't score well, but... I just wanted to help you find your inspiration. That's all.

1109503086.speaker: 托特
1109503086.content: How do you manage to do things like this so easily?

1109503087.speaker: 我
1109503087.content: I didn't do anything. I just said what I felt.

1109503088.speaker: 我
1109503088.content: I don't know if it was easy. Just... basic. I thought something so I wrote it down.

1109503091.speaker: 托特
1109503091.content: I mean... I think your message is the best.

1109503093.speaker: 托特
1109503093.content: And also... I still plan to win.

1109503094.content: When she raises her head and lifts her piece of paper, I can see she means it.

1109503095.content: She walks forward and starts to read. What she's written is so beautiful, so poetic, the judges are dumbstruck.

1109503097.content: This time, the applause is loud and rapturous. She finishes with a verse that has the whole audience cheering.

1109503098.speaker: 我
1109503098.content: I can see why you're a professional writer.

1109503099.speaker: 托特
1109503099.content: Oh, I was quoting someone else. Nothing special.

1109503101.speaker: 托特
1109503101.content: Sincerity moves people more than lies do, that's all. Using someone else's lines isn't that impressive.

1109503103.speaker: 托特
1109503103.content: Now, let's see how many points we get.

1109503104.speaker: 店员
1109503104.content: Miss Thoth has earned... 990,000 points! Congratulations. Your team has earned an unprecedented 1,000,000 points!

1109503105.content: The scoreboard is updated and there it is: 1,000,000 points. The cheering reaches new heights and fills the bookstore.

1109503107.speaker: 托特
1109503107.content: Maybe they planned this all along...

1109503108.speaker: 我
1109503108.content: Ha. Turns out it was a marketing trick.

1109503109.speaker: 托特
1109503109.content: And it looks like it worked... They've got everyone really excited.

1109503111.content: And after that, the event is a roaring success. Nobody, however, gets close to our score and we win the Agent L figure.

1109503113.content: The staff member hands the figure to Thoth, but she immediately passes it to me.

1109503115.speaker: 托特
1109503115.content: Don't mention it. And thank you.

1109503116.speaker: 我
1109503116.content: You look like you've found your inspiration.

1109503117.speaker: 托特
1109503117.content: All thanks to what you wrote.

1109503118.content: Thoth shows me her notebook. She's got a whole page of plot points jotted down.

1109503120.speaker: 我
1109503120.content: Although... You know I could have written something better if I had more time, right?

1109503121.speaker: 托特
1109503121.content: In that case, I'll look forward to getting your next letter.

1109503122.speaker: 我
1109503122.content: I didn't say I was going to write one...

1109503123.speaker: 托特
1109503123.content: No, but you said you could write something better with more time. And I'm sure Aether Gazer Division Nine's Administrator wouldn't make idle boasts. Would you?

1109503124.speaker: 我
1109503124.content: Okay, fine. I'll write you a letter! Just you wait, it'll be artfully crafted and full of emotional impact.

1109503125.speaker: 托特
1109503125.content: Cool! I'm looking forward to your letter-writing skills leveling up.

1109503126.content: She gives me a sideways glance and another flash of that wicked grin.

1109503127.content: Hang on... did I just fall into her trap?

1109503128.content: There's no point dwelling on it. I start to admire our prize.

1109503129.speaker: 我
1109503129.content: Wow, this really is special. Look at the craftsmanship. The sunglasses are cracked from a fight, just like in the book.

1109503130.speaker: 我
1109503130.content: I'll get them to have it delivered, though. We still have work to do and I don't want to haul it around.

1109503131.content: A gentle melody plays. It's a typical Omorfies tune, and despite being a bit of a cliché, it does add to the atmosphere.

1109503132.speaker: 托特
1109503132.content: That's an Ardisis tune... You know, I've liked everything that's happened today.

1109503133.content: Perhaps she's inspired by the music, but Thoth's quill is now moving even faster.

1109503135.speaker: 托特&我
1109503135.content: And it's all thanks to you.

1109503136.content: Our voices overlap, a chorus accompanied by the piano music.

1109503137.speaker: 托特&我
1109503137.content: See. We're in tune with each other.

1109503138.content: And with a contented smile, Thoth writes a final line.

1109503140.speaker: 托特
1109503140.content: I just need to get my ideas noted down. That's the important thing.

1109503142.speaker: 托特
1109503142.content: No. There's still one more thing to do.

1109503143.speaker: 托特
1109503143.content: The climax of the story I'm planning will be the two protagonists being reunited. On a yacht.

1109503144.speaker: 我
1109503144.content: You mean... we're going on a yacht?

1109503145.speaker: 托特
1109503145.content: Yep. Come on, I've already got tickets.

1109503146.content: As always, Thoth has thought of everything.

1109503147.content: But sometimes, the world throws obstacles in the way of even the best-prepared of people.

1109503148.speaker: 码头工作人员
1109503148.content: I'm very sorry, but the Silver Sparkle has been booked for a private event. I'm afraid the best I can do is offer you a refund.

1109503150.speaker: 码头工作人员
1109503150.content: Unfortunately, I checked and the next trip with spaces available is the day after tomorrow.

1109503152.speaker: 我
1109503152.content: So who books an entire yacht on short notice?

1109503153.speaker: 码头工作人员
1109503153.content: Mr. Kawin. He said his creative juices are flowing and he wants the whole yacht to himself, so he can write in peace and quiet. He even had a load of artwork brought on board.

1109503155.speaker: 我
1109503155.content: So he skipped the book signing to go on a solo yacht cruise?!

1109503156.speaker: 托特
1109503156.content: Sorry, #{nickname}#. Do you want to help me look for another boat trip we could take?

1109503158.content: Thoth and I check our terminals, but most of the yacht cruises need to be booked in advance. You have to be lucky to get a ticket at such short notice.

1109503159.speaker: 托特
1109503159.content: Argh... there really aren't any tickets.

1109503160.speaker: 我
1109503160.content: I see... Then I can take an extra day off. We'll come back the day after tomorrow.

1109503161.speaker: 托特
1109503161.content: There's no need. If you do that, you'll just have more work piling up.

1109503162.speaker: 托特
1109503162.content: It was just a little add-on, that was all. Let's call it a day.

1109503163.content: Thoth gives me the standard textbook smile she uses to cover up her feelings.

1109503164.content: She always keeps herself hidden in an air of mystery, artfully concealing her emotions. But this time I catch a flash of disappointment in her eyes.

1109503165.speaker: 我
1109503165.content: (What can I do? I need to think of something.)

1109503166.content: I glance around and notice a figure relaxing on a sun lounger up on deck.

1109503168.content: I stop her just before she turns to leave.

1109503170.speaker: 我
1109503170.content: I can get us on the yacht. Wait here.

1109503171.content: I run over to the woman on the lounger, shouting.

1109503173.content: She looks around in confusion before seeing me and becoming even more confused.

1109503174.speaker: 谜之摄影师
1109503174.content: Huh? What are you doing here?

1109504001.content: As "friends" of Mr. Kawin, we easily get onto the yacht. She disappears once we're on board, though, saying something about not wanting to be a third wheel.

1109504002.speaker: 我
1109504002.content: I would never have guessed that woman is the famous Mr. Kawin.

1109504003.speaker: 托特
1109504003.content: The world is full of surprises.

1109504004.speaker: 我
1109504004.content: I wish she hadn't disappeared, though. I didn't get a chance to thank her.

1109504007.speaker: 托特
1109504007.content: I knew it. Look what I've got for you.

1109504008.content: Thoth gives me a gentle tap on the forehead before conjuring a signed special-edition postcard from her bag.

1109504010.speaker: 托特
1109504010.content: When you were signing us onto the yacht, I took the opportunity to have a chat with her. And ask her to sign that.

1109504013.content: You didn't warn her not to spoil our date, did you?

1109504017.speaker: 托特
1109504017.content: Okay, snap mind-reading test is over. Come on, let's tour the boat.

1109504019.content: The setting sun has turned the water a rich golden hue and the boat is throwing up spray as it cuts through the waves.

1109504020.content: Thoth and I wander across the deck, which has been arrayed with beautiful paintings and sculptures. She's jotting down everything she sees in neat little notes on her pad.

1109504021.speaker: 我
1109504021.content: What's this painting? Just a circle? Does it signify anything?

1109504023.speaker: 我
1109504023.content: I can't figure it out. It just seems like a con to me. I guess I just don't understand abstract art.

1109504026.speaker: 托特
1109504026.content: Actually, I agree. Or maybe it's... an artistic con? Nobody can decide what it means, so they keep trying to make it mean something it doesn't.

1109504028.speaker: 托特
1109504028.content: Shh. Keep your voice down, people will hear. What if a crew member is a big fan of the artist?

1109504029.content: She places a finger on my lips to hush me, and gives a sly smile as she does so.

1109504030.speaker: 我
1109504030.content: Hey, there's even a movie theater.

1109504031.speaker: 托特
1109504031.content: They're playing an old classic. This place sure has its own style.

1109504032.content: In the movie, the heroine is standing at the prow of a boat, her arms outstretched. The hero stands behind her, holding her waist. It's a famous scene, I'm told.

1109504033.speaker: 托特
1109504033.content: But... I'm not sure it's a good choice to watch on a boat.

1109504035.speaker: 托特
1109504035.content: The boat sinks at the end.

1109504036.speaker: 我
1109504036.content: Oh. I guess they didn't watch it before deciding what to show.

1109504037.content: A pillar of water erupts from below the surface, distracting me. I run over to the railings.

1109504040.speaker: 我
1109504040.content: Up ahead. I saw the spout.

1109504041.speaker: 托特
1109504041.content: I can't see anything from here.

1109504042.content: Thoth snuggles up behind me, her head resting on my shoulder, like a bird resting on a branch.

1109504044.speaker: 我
1109504044.content: I think you could see it before.

1109504046.content: Thoth wraps her arms around my waist and holds me tight, just like in that movie scene. I can feel a warmth and solidity from her.

1109504048.content: I think back to the movie scene and can't help but tense up a little.

1109504049.speaker: 托特
1109504049.content: If you jump, I'll come rescue you.

1109504050.speaker: 我
1109504050.content: You jump, I jump. Isn't that the line?

1109504051.speaker: 托特
1109504051.content: I'm writing my own lines now.

1109504052.content: I can feel her breath on my ear. There's a short silence, then she takes a deep breath and whispers to me.

1109504056.speaker: 我
1109504056.content: You're making too much of it.

1109504058.content: The ocean breeze caresses us and the cries of the seabirds fade away.

1109504059.speaker: 我
1109504059.content: So, how many points does the boat get?

1109504063.speaker: 我
1109504063.content: I wanted to watch it more.

1109504064.content: We continue our tour of the boat, stopping here and there when something catches our interest.

1109504065.speaker: 托特
1109504065.content: This has been a double-win. I get inspiration for my writing and I get to appreciate some art.

1109504066.speaker: 我
1109504066.content: It's a shame we didn't bring our swimming gear. We could have gone for a dip.

1109504067.speaker: 托特
1109504067.content: We can save it for next time.

1109504069.content: I take a break on a sofa, stretching out.

1109504070.content: Thoth takes a seat on the other end of the sofa, deciding how the story she's working on will end.

1109504071.speaker: 托特
1109504071.content: And for the ending... Hmmm. That's it. Finished.

1109504075.content: I raise a fist in celebration.

1109504078.speaker: 我
1109504078.content: But Thoth, don't you think it's a bit TOO quiet here?

1109504079.content: Looking out at the surface of the ocean, so calm it's almost scary, something starts to worry me.

1109504081.content: There's a clap of thunder and dark clouds gather over our heads.

1109504082.content: Something is rolling toward us from the horizon. There's a niggling pain in my temple which I know means danger is incoming.

1109504083.speaker: 我
1109504083.content: Let's get inside. This does not look good.

1109504084.content: Thoth puts her notebook and quill away and we stand up. The gigantic wave is coming at us way faster than we had anticipated.

1109504086.content: The wave is so big it rocks even this ocean-going vessel. Thoth's notebook flies from her hand.

1109504089.content: An announcement is being made over the PA system, but I can't spare the time to stop and listen. I react automatically, my muscles taking over.

1109504090.content: Thoth is still regaining her balance. I stretch out as far as I can, trying to reach the notebook Thoth has spent the day filling. But the next wave hits soon after the second and I'm sent flying over the railing.

1109504091.content: A silver thread cuts through the air and the power it carries snatches me from the grasp of the cold sea. I fly back to the deck.

1109504092.content: Just as I regain my footing, a waist-deep torrent of water sweeps over the deck. It takes all my strength to remain upright.

1109504093.content: The wave passes and I move toward Thoth, who is standing at the railings, soaking wet.

1109504094.speaker: 游艇广播
1109504094.content: Due to the unexpected storm, we ask all passengers to move inside and stay clear of open decks and other hazardous locations.

1109504095.content: We lean over the railing as the boat rocks below us, watching Thoth's notebook drift off into the distance.

1109504100.content: There's a long pause and no reply. I turn to look at her and find she's looking back at me, smiling.

1109504102.content: Two hours later, in a hotel room.

1109504103.speaker: 托特
1109504103.content: I'm finished in the shower. Thanks for the shirt.

1109504106.speaker: 我
1109504106.content: Okay... Thanks for catching me, by the way.

1109504107.speaker: 托特
1109504107.content: And thanks for going after my notebook. I guess we both did the other a favor.

1109504108.speaker: 托特
1109504108.content: What's up? Why the long face?

1109504109.speaker: 我
1109504109.content: It's just... I was just wishing I could have saved your notebook.

1109504110.speaker: 我
1109504110.content: We spent so much time running about getting ideas for your writing... and now it was all for nothing.

1109504112.content: Thoth eyes close a little, as if in thought.

1109504113.speaker: 托特
1109504113.content: Hmm... I don't think you lose ideas just because you lose the notebook they're in.

1109504114.content: She follows that with a warm smile.

1109504115.speaker: 我
1109504115.content: But wasn't that all your inspiration? And not just from today, but since forever?

1109504116.speaker: 我
1109504116.content: That's why it was so important to you, no?

1109504117.speaker: 托特
1109504117.content: Oh, I think I saved the most important thing.

1109504118.speaker: 托特
1109504118.content: The notebook and the ideas... it's like trying to pick sand up. Doesn't matter how tight you hold it, it slips out through your fingers.

1109504119.speaker: 托特
1109504119.content: Or shadows. The notes are just shadows. What's real is memories.

1109504120.content: She looks out the window, contemplating the rainswept view.

1109504121.speaker: 托特
1109504121.content: Writing's always felt like trying to do a jigsaw puzzle. Sometimes you need a piece from here, a piece from there. But if I let my hopes and my dreams tell me what to put where... it comes together into a story.

1109504122.speaker: 托特
1109504122.content: But that's not all I have...

1109504124.content: Thoth brushes a strand of damp hair from her eyes. There's a trace of a smile on her lips as she watches me. It's a cat-like gaze. Elegant.

1109504125.speaker: 托特
1109504125.content: And what I really need is... someone genuine. Maybe even genuine to a fault.

1109504126.speaker: 托特
1109504126.content: Someone who is always direct and honest. Someone who puts others first. Someone who is the only person I can trust.

1109504127.content: It's as if she's telling some beautiful story. As she talks, she twists a strand of hair around her finger.

1109504128.speaker: 托特
1109504128.content: And as long as that person is there, I have what I need. Memories of the past, experiences of the present... I'll always have a story to tell.

1109504129.speaker: 托特
1109504129.content: That's what's important to me. Not some notebook full of the past. What matters is what fills me with inspiration right now.

1109504131.speaker: 托特
1109504131.content: What's up? Have you guessed who I'm talking about?

1109504132.content: I look into her eyes and see my own face reflected there. The world outside has fallen silent, as if we are the only two people in it. Even the rain has stopped.

1109504133.content: I see in her eyes what she yearns to tell me. I see the hair she twists around her finger, her gently trembling shoulders, and a faint blush on her ears.

1109504134.content: And with a look, I give her the answer she's hoping for.

1109504135.speaker: 托特
1109504135.content: Hmm. Maybe you're the one who can read minds.

1109504138.speaker: 托特
1109504138.content: It's hard to talk from the heart, after all. That's why people have to write things down when they want to be understood.

1109504139.speaker: 托特
1109504139.content: I mean, we can't all be so honest and direct.

1109504140.speaker: 我
1109504140.content: Thanks for the compliment. If that's what it was.

1109504143.speaker: 托特
1109504143.content: Anyway, you'd better not let me down. My writing career depends on you now.

1109504145.content: The moon shines through the window, dispelling the shadows. Thoth's quill sketches out yesterday's past and today's reunion. Tomorrow? We'll write that as we go.

1109504146.speaker: 我
1109504146.content: Hurry up or it'll be too late!

1109504147.speaker: 托特
1109504147.content: How come you're more excited than I am?

1109504148.speaker: 我
1109504148.content: It's your new book! I want to read it as soon as I can.

1109504149.speaker: 托特
1109504149.content: Nobody else is going to be buying it. There's no rush.

1109504150.speaker: 我
1109504150.content: Says who? The online reviews were epic! If we don't hurry it'll sell out.

1109504152.content: Thoth quickens her pace. She reaches my side and takes my hand.

1109504153.speaker: 我
1109504153.content: Which reminds me... how come you didn't go to the book signing?

1109504156.content: I look into those bright eyes and find I can't finish my sentence.

1109504157.content: I used to think of Thoth as a cat. Elegant but elusive. Hard to catch hold of. But now... now I think I understand how she thinks a little better.

1109504158.speaker: 我
1109504158.content: You've got an idea for a new story?

1109504163.speaker: 托特
1109504163.content: We're going to need to go on a very long trip for my research, though.

1109504164.content: She gives me her smile. A smile that floats across the distance between us and wafts into my heart. As light as a feather. As warm as the sun.

411011001.speaker: 托特
411011001.content: I could tell it was you from the sound of your footsteps.

411011002.content: Seated in the furthest corner of the restaurant, Thoth lays down the quill she was holding and calmly yet firmly keeps Lokken at bay with one arm as she packs it away with her notebook.

411011003.speaker: 洛肯
411011003.content: You still writing that dumb book? Do you really think anyone's actually gonna read it?

411011004.speaker: 托特
411011004.content: I can send you a free copy once it's published, if you'd like.

411011005.speaker: 洛肯
411011005.content: How much are you gonna sell them for?

411011006.speaker: 托特
411011006.content: Enough for you to order yourself something here.

411011007.content: Lokken shrugs and casually slumps into the seat opposite Thoth. She leans across the table and idly flicks through the menu, her other arm resting on the back of the chair.

411011008.speaker: 托特
411011008.content: Any normal person who's lived in the Slums for ten years would know by now that to attract attention is to attract trouble. Especially a "ghost" like you.

411011009.speaker: 洛肯
411011009.content: Are you comparing me to "normal people"? Are you feeling okay? Anyway, no matter what I do to fit in, I know I'll never be the same as them...

411011010.speaker: 洛肯
411011010.content:
Jeez, have you seen these prices?! Is this food made from gold or something?
Why don't we just go to your bookstore?

411011011.speaker: 托特
411011011.content:
We can't talk there.
And if you're hungry, order something. My treat.

411011012.content: The only thing on the table is a pot of tea—Thoth clearly has no intention of ordering any food either. Lokken rolls her eyes in frustration and crosses her arms, then sits up straight as she finally decides to pay attention to the other woman sitting next to Thoth.

411011013.content: She's wearing a hood that obscures her face, her hands quietly folded in her lap. She hasn't spoken or moved since Lokken arrived, like a robot on standby mode.

411011014.speaker: 洛肯
411011014.content: Is she another one of us "ghosts"?

411011016.content: Before Thoth can complete her sentence, Lokken leaps up and reaches out to pull the hood down.

411011017.content: But the second her fingertips touch the hood, another hand grabs her arm and holds it firmly in place. The hood flutters slightly, revealing a pair of delicate lips and locks of pink hair.

411011018.speaker: 戴兜帽的少女
411011018.content: Miss Thoth said I can't take it off.

411011021.speaker: 洛肯
411011021.content: Whatever, I don't care what you look like anyway. Can you let go of me now?

411011022.content: The pink-haired girl turns to look at Thoth, who sips her tea slowly before gently nodding her head. Only then does the girl release her grip on Lokken. She then picks up her own teacup and takes tiny, careful sips like a cautious kitten.

411011023.content: Thoth smiles apologetically at her startled companion, before turning her gaze back to Lokken. There's the unmistakable flash of a warning in her eyes.

411011024.speaker: 托特
411011024.content: Take her to see Brahmā. If you can't find her, then I want the two of you to lie low at your house.

411011025.speaker: 托特
411011025.content: Under no circumstances must you let anyone come into contact with her before she sees Brahmā, especially the other Meruism Mods. Do I make myself clear?

411011026.speaker: 洛肯
411011026.content: Sure thing, boss. It's your money.

411011029.speaker: 洛肯
411011029.content: But are you sure she's gonna listen to me? Things are getting heated in Gharpur these days, what with all the people from Xu Heng and CORG sniffing around for no good reason.

411011030.speaker: 洛肯
411011030.content: And I don't wanna be bringing some kind of ticking time bomb into my home, because sooner or later it's gonna blow.

411011031.speaker: 托特
411011031.content: I don't know who's more of a "ticking time bomb"—her, or you...

411011032.speaker: 托特
411011032.content: I want you to listen to Miss Lokken while I'm gone, okay?

411011034.speaker: 托特
411011034.content: You heard her. And she can't lie.

411011035.speaker: 洛肯
411011035.content: Well, she'll be easy to deal with then. Wait, is that milk she's drinking?

411011036.speaker: 戴兜帽的少女
411011036.content: Milk. It tastes weird, but I like it.

411011037.speaker: 托特
411011037.content: Order some too if you want. Come on, no need to be polite, honestly. I said it'll be my treat.

411011038.speaker: 洛肯
411011038.content: Only little kids drink that stuff.

411011039.content: Lokken licks her lips in thirst and takes a fruit juice from the refrigerator. She sits back in her seat cross-legged and begins to flick through the menu.

411011040.content: She then raises her hand and uses her Divine Power to soundproof their table. The pink-haired girl freezes in fear, but is quickly reassured by Thoth.

411011041.speaker: 洛肯
411011041.content: So what's this about, exactly? You said she's from the same experiment as me, but she doesn't have "that power" and I don't think she's all there mentally. Is Forgetower getting worse as it goes?

411011042.speaker: 托特
411011042.content: Her powers have been stripped, and it'll take a few more days for her mind to recover. If I told you the whole story, this place will close before I've even finished.

411011043.speaker: 托特
411011043.content: All you need to know is that she has baggage from her past. Even more than you. So don't get any funny ideas with her.

411011044.speaker: 洛肯
411011044.content: Me? Funny ideas? Who exactly do you take me for?

411011045.speaker: 洛肯
411011045.content: I'll have you know I'm a professional with a decade's experience under my belt. And now that I no longer have CORG to support me, I'd be an idiot to cut off my only source of income.

411011046.speaker: 托特
411011046.content: I'm sorry, but the you from ten years ago left quite the impression on me, and there's no changing it now, I'm afraid.

411011047.speaker: 洛肯
411011047.content: Hey, you were the one who saved me! Can't you at least try and be a bit more optimistic about me?

411011048.speaker: 洛肯
411011048.content: Ask anyone in Jivitabad. I've got a great reputation with those who work on the black market. They think I'm a genius.

411011049.speaker: 洛肯
411011049.content: And if you want my advice, you need to shut down that crusty old bookstore of yours. If you want to earn real money, come and work with me. With my brains and your contacts, I guarantee not a single coin that goes in your account would be dirty.

411011050.content: Thoth is momentarily taken aback by this business-savvy version of Lokken.

411011051.content: Feeling a tap on her shoulder, Thoth turns and sees the pink-haired girl holding up her empty cup. She sighs and refills it with milk for her, shaking her head in Lokken's direction.

411011052.speaker: 托特
411011052.content: She wouldn't become like you even if she lived in Shashvat for years...

411011053.speaker: 洛肯
411011053.content: Huh? Are you implying that's a good thing?

411011054.speaker: 洛肯
411011054.content: I'm free, I have no worries, what's wrong with that? It's better than being CORG's hired gun from birth...

411011055.speaker: 托特
411011055.content: In this aspect at least, you're becoming more and more like a human.

411011056.speaker: 洛肯
411011056.content: Careful now, before I think you're actually complimenting me... Okay, these will do. I'm surprised I understood any of the dish names on this menu.

411011057.content: Dropping the Divine Power shield, Lokken calls a server over to order her food, as well as another bottle of fruit juice.

411011058.content: Thoth takes out her quill and notepad, and continues writing her story as if no one is watching.

411011060.speaker: 托特
411011060.content: There's nothing in the rules against Modifiers having their own hobbies.

411011061.speaker: 洛肯
411011061.content: But I heard... you were raised by CORG.

411011062.speaker: 托特
411011062.content: I would advise against investigating my past.

411011063.speaker: 洛肯
411011063.content: Okay okay, there's no need to get so defensive. I was just curious how someone who grew up in that awful place could still have hobbies like a normal person.

411011064.content: Sensing that she's not going to get anything done with a chatterbox like Lokken around, Thoth puts her notebook away again and takes a sip of tea.

411011065.speaker: 洛肯
411011065.content: Hehe, is the writer about to tell me a story?

411011066.speaker: 托特
411011066.content: It's no story. At least, not one that any publisher would be likely to accept.

411011067.speaker: 托特
411011067.content: I was just thinking about what you said about being "free with no worries." Is that really how you feel?

411021001.content: Silence reigns in the locked-down streets as the CORG soldiers sweep through them, methodically clearing up the remnants of what happened before.

411021002.speaker: 科尔盖士兵A
411021002.content: Captain Thoth, all the surrounding streets have been cleared.

411021003.speaker: 托特
411021003.content: Good job. Tell B Squad to get ready to pull back.

411021004.speaker: 科尔盖士兵A
411021004.content: There's one more thing... Are you sure you don't want a medic to take a look at your injuries, Captain? You just bore the brunt of it out there.

411021005.speaker: 托特
411021005.content: It's all right, I know my body. You just focus on getting yourselves back to HQ.

411021006.content: The soldier knows better than to insist, so he simply salutes and leaves.

411021008.content: Thoth lightly clasps her hands together and can feel that the wound, which was very deep before, is healing itself at remarkable speed.

411021009.content: It's late at night by the time all the CORG affairs are settled, and Thoth is back in her civilian clothes on a quiet street in Molander City's Sudburg.

411021010.content: Most of the shops have long since closed for the day, but there's an old bookstore at the end of the street whose lantern is still burning.

411021011.content: As she approaches the entrance, Thoth notices a stack of unread mail in the letterbox. She takes it out and gently pushes the door open.

411021013.content: The store is in complete disarray. Even the chunky, hardcover books that nobody ever wants have been torn from the shelves.

411021016.content: Thoth runs to the back of the store, where she sees a hand poking out from among a heap of books on the floor.

411021018.content: Another book falls from its shelf and lands on the pile.

411021019.content: Thoth sighs and starts digging the woman out from the mountain of books, and picks up her wheelchair.

411021020.speaker: 托特
411021020.content: Why didn't you ask for help? Were you just going to sleep here all night if I hadn't have come?

411021021.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021021.content: It was late, and I didn't want to bother anyone. Besides, I can normally deal with things like this on my own.

411021022.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021022.content: Oh look, do you have my reply? It was supposed to arrive today, but I was writing all day and lost track of time so I didn't check the mail.

411021023.content: Thoth accepts the change of subject and hands over the mail she'd just taken out of the letterbox.

411021024.speaker: 托特
411021024.content: Here, I thought I'd bring these in for you.

411021025.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021025.content: Just as I thought. Returned again.

411021026.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021026.content: Oh well, I was prepared for this...

411021027.content: Ygritte shakes a manuscript in Thoth's direction.

411021028.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021028.content: Let's see what the old hack's reason is this time...

411021029.content: As Ygritte reads the response, she wheels herself over to one of the largest bookcases and begins restacking the books that had fallen to the floor.

411021030.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021030.content: Do I really need any more plot twists? Urrrgh...

411021032.content: Thoth rushes over to Ygritte, who is curled up in pain and sweating profusely. She quickly presses the emergency button on the side of her wheelchair.

411021033.content: Two beams of light sweep across her legs, covered by a blanket, followed by a mechanical whirring sound.

411021034.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021034.content: Oh, it's all right... I'm used to it by now.

411021035.content: Ygritte makes to continue picking up the books from the floor, but Thoth gently stops her.

411021036.speaker: 托特
411021036.content: Here, let me do that. You relax.

411021037.speaker: 托特
411021037.content: I'm guessing you haven't been taking your meds lately?

411021038.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021038.content: I don't think I did today...

411021039.content: Ygritte opens a compartment in the armrest of her wheelchair and takes out a pill box, and tosses a couple of colorful tablets in her mouth.

411021040.speaker: 托特
411021040.content: Those looked like vitamin tablets to me. Have you run out of meds?

411021041.content: Embarrassment flashes across Ygritte's face as she's caught red-handed, and she quickly swallows them down.

411021042.speaker: 托特
411021042.content: I hope you don't still feel like you owe me anything, do you? I've told you...

411021043.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021043.content: These are experimental drugs, and taking them is part of the experiment, right?

411021044.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021044.content: You keep saying that, but there are many other people out there who would give anything to get CORG's new trial drugs.

411021045.speaker: 托特
411021045.content: I'm not denying I pulled a few strings, but with your condition you definitely meet the criteria. You deserve these as much as anyone else.

411021046.speaker: 托特
411021046.content: And I've already added the cost of them to your royalties, so I'll come to collect as soon as your book's published.

411021047.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021047.content: Okay... I'd better polish this manuscript off as quickly as possible then so I can repay my debt.

411021048.content: Ygritte returns to her desk, scans the myriad objects scattered on top, and picks up an old quill. The nib is smooth from years of use, and the plume is tattered and dog-eared at the ends.

411021049.content: Despite the never-ending slew of electronic writing devices that are released every year, Ygritte still prefers to record her thoughts and feelings the old-fashioned way.

411021050.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021050.content: Thoth, do you still remember that day we met at book club?

411021051.speaker: 托特
411021051.content: Of course. And then you messaged me in the middle of the night saying that you disagreed with my ideas.

411021052.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021052.content: I don't know why I was so stubborn back then, always trying to pick a fight with you... But I never expected you'd actually show up here.

411021053.speaker: 托特
411021053.content: You're still stubborn now. At least before I only had to talk to you about literature, now it looks like I have to manage your whole life.

411021054.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021054.content: Haha! But you know, if it wasn't for you arguing with me these past few years, I might have... Forget it, I want to read my new draft instead. Maybe this time we'll find something we can agree on?

411021055.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021055.content: "The girl in the cage had nothing but the moon. Every night she'd watch it wax and wane through the tiny window in her room."

411021056.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021056.content: "During those interminable nights, the more she longed for the unattainable moon, the more she couldn't bear the shackles that bound her."

411021057.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021057.content: "Finally, on one full-mooned night, she offered to sacrifice herself to any god who was willing to listen in exchange for the ability to follow the moon."

411021058.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021058.content: "Suddenly, fine silver feathers began to sprout from her neck and her lips grew into a beak. Now a bird, she was able to escape her cage and flew up into the clouds in pursuit of the moon."

411021059.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021059.content: "But the moon remained distant from her. She soared over vast prairies and above jagged mountains, yet still she was no closer."

411021060.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021060.content: "Realizing the moon would forever be out of reach, her head drooped in disappointment and that's when she saw, in the darkness of the ocean beneath her, another moon floating on the surface."

411021061.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021061.content: "She stared down at it, then looked up at the moon in the sky for one last time before folding her wings and plunging down into the abyss below."

411021064.speaker: 托特
411021064.content: It doesn't feel right for her to end up like that after all the effort she put in.

411021065.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021065.content: Yes, but of course she was never going to reach the moon. And don't forget, she had nothing to begin with.

411021066.speaker: 托特
411021066.content: If you say so. Maybe the publisher will like it.

411021067.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021067.content: Heehee, I have a feeling that this one's going to work! Let's go and pay a visit to the editor tomorrow, so we can hear the good news in person!

411021068.speaker: 托特
411021068.content: Er, okay. And while we're at it, I'm going to take you for a check-up since you decided to stop taking your medicine.

411021069.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411021069.content: Huh? In that case, maybe it's better if I go talk to the editor alone...

411021070.content: But Thoth is already on her way out, waving goodnight to the woman behind her as she goes.

411021071.content: Her communicator starts to beep the second she steps out of the bookstore, sounding nearly ten times louder in the quiet of the night.

411021072.content: Thoth frowns as she sees who the caller is, and picks up.

411021073.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411021073.content: I'm afraid you're going to have to cut your vacation short.

411021074.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411021074.content: There's been an incident at the Neuhansa factory, and I need you to take a team there. I've already cleared everything with HR.

411021076.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411021076.content: The preliminary investigation is to start immediately. Formal action will be taken in one month's time.

411021077.speaker: 托特
411021077.content: Wait, why are you the one calling me at this hour? I'm guessing this is no ordinary factory.

411021078.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411021078.content: You're right—it makes military AGI Mechas, and we've got engineers from our research center stationed there. It's all highly confidential.

411021079.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411021079.content: I'll tell you more later. I just need to clarify some things first.

411021080.speaker: 托特
411021080.content: I won't be able to start until the day after tomorrow.

411021081.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411021081.content: Why not? Do you have plans tomorrow?

411021083.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411021083.content: Well, I'm glad to hear your private life has gotten busier over these past two years. Besides, based on where we're at right now, I probably won't be contacting you tomorrow anyway.

411021084.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411021084.content: Make sure you enjoy yourself. It'll probably be the last free time you'll have for a while.

411031002.content: Ygritte's voice manages to pierce through the bustle of the city center. Thoth massages her temples, then crosses the street.

411031003.speaker: 托特
411031003.content: Was your journey here okay? I still think you should have let me come pick you up.

411031004.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411031004.content: It was fine, I told you I don't need looking after. I've been living my life perfectly fine without you, haven't I?

411031005.speaker: 托特
411031005.content: Forgive me for not believing you after I had to fish you out from a mountain of books last night.

411031007.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411031007.content: No rush, I've arranged to meet with her later. I thought we could spend some quality time together first. When's the last time we went shopping?

411031009.content: Ygritte gaze is drawn to a display case containing a quill that combines an antique look with modern technology.

411031010.speaker: 托特
411031010.content: Your quill is on the verge of breaking. Why don't you swap it for a new one?

411031011.content: She's quiet for a moment, then shakes her head with a smile.

411031012.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411031012.content: I know it sounds stupid, but... I've always felt like my quill has magic powers.

411031013.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411031013.content: It used to belong to my mom. When I first got sick, I was angry all the time—I didn't want to study, I'd cry every day, and I'd be so tired I'd just lay in bed all the time.

411031014.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411031014.content: It was my mom who'd pick me and haul me to my desk. Then she made me hold this quill, and she'd help guide my hand as I copied out sentences from books, reading aloud softly in my ear as we went.

411031015.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411031015.content: Now, every time I pick up that quill, I can still feel my mom holding my hand and the words just flow out of it. It's like it's not even me who's writing.

411031016.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411031016.content: If I throw it away, I'm worried I'll lose the ability to write.

411031017.speaker: 托特
411031017.content: Your mother sounds like she was a very strong woman.

411031018.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411031018.content: She was, but obviously I haven't inherited any of her strength. Even now, I still need to rely on her quill.

411031019.speaker: 托特
411031019.content: But you did inherit her strength.

411031020.speaker: 托特
411031020.content: I've seen that strength in you ever since the day I met you, even when you're not writing.

411031021.content: Ygritte is stunned and doesn't know what to say. Thoth falls silent too, and the two of them continue to walk through the store without speaking.

411031022.speaker: 女性店员
411031022.content: Hi, you can pay over here.

411031024.speaker: 托特
411031024.content: Something to help you continue the "magic."

411031025.content: She watches as the clerk takes several quill repair kits out of the shopping cart.

411031027.speaker: 女性店员
411031027.content: Oh, I'm sorry, this scanner doesn't appear to be working. That's strange, it was fine earlier this morning.

411031028.speaker: 托特
411031028.content: It's all right, we're not in any rush. And, by the way, "Tho-Tho?"

411031029.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411031029.content: Haha it just slipped out, but don't you think it's cute?

411031030.speaker: 广播
411031030.content: From tonight through to tomorrow, the weather will be clear, clear, rainy, your weather is lost, please go to the cashier's desk, desk...

411031032.content: As if in answer to her question, there's a power cut and the store is suddenly plunged into darkness. Seconds later, an alarm begins to ring.

411031033.content: Thoth's terminal also begins to ring. She opens it, and the CORG system displays a number of Bane Energy fluctuations at several nearby streets. A series of messages are sent out in quick succession.

411031034.speaker: 托特
411031034.content: Great... Does your store have an emergency system?

411031035.speaker: 女性店员
411031035.content: Huh? Y-Yes it does, but why? Has something happened?

411031036.speaker: 托特
411031036.content: I need you to activate it for me. CORG will get here as soon as they can. Don't let anyone outside until they're done, okay?

411031037.content: The clerk triggers the emergency system, and low-level light is restored to the building.

411031038.speaker: 托特
411031038.content: Ygritte, it's going to be dangerous outside. I want you to stay put here until the CORG troops arrive.

411031039.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411031039.content: I won't go anywhere. But what about you? Surely you're not going out there?

411031040.speaker: 托特
411031040.content: I'll be right back. Look after yourself, and if anything happens just buzz me your location.

411031042.content: Ygritte's heart pounds in her chest as she watches Thoth run out the building.

411031043.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411031043.content: Has Tho-Tho always been doing such dangerous work with CORG?

411031044.content: Thoth soon reaches the assembly point, where a small squad has already gathered. The older soldier in charge looks at the new face with confusion.

411031045.speaker: 托特
411031045.content: Captain Thoth of the Egregious Crimes Department. I'll be taking control of things from here.

411031046.content: After verifying her ID, the soldiers nod and salute her.

411031047.speaker: 科尔盖士兵B
411031047.content: Captain Thoth, we've already tried to advance our position twice before you arrived, but we came up against far more Visbanes than are shown in the scan results.

411031048.speaker: 托特
411031048.content: I looked at the energy report, and I think we've got a Polymerized Type on our hands. If we don't kill it first, it'll just keep on summoning more and more low-level Visbanes to hinder us.

411031049.speaker: 托特
411031049.content: I'll deal with the PLMT, but I'll need you guys to place signal jammers around the periphery to lure it out.

411031050.speaker: 托特
411031050.content: Once I've engaged with it, I want you to concentrate your firepower on taking out the other Visbanes. I don't want them breaking through our defensive line and attacking civilians.

411031052.content: The constant stream of gunfire keeps the hordes of Visbanes at bay.

411031053.content: Up on a high platform, silver threads have embedded themselves in the Polymerized Type's skin, and flying daggers imbued with Divine Grace pierce its vital points from all directions.

411031055.content: Thoth's head whips round in the direction of the screaming, just in time to see an undetected Polymerized Type tearing its way through the CORG battle lines, and clearing a path for a flood of Visbanes.

411031056.content: She instantly kills the Visbane in her grip and flies down.

411031057.speaker: 托特
411031057.content: How are you? Can you still fight?

411031058.speaker: 科尔盖士兵B
411031058.content: It got my shoulder, but I've used an emergency medkit so I should be able to move about for now.

411031059.speaker: 托特
411031059.content: All right. I want you to take a small squad to kill the remaining Visbanes. Me and the others are going after the PLMT.

411041001.speaker: 科尔盖士兵A
411041001.content: Over there! They've gotten into the shopping mall!

411041003.content: A stream of terrified people bursts out of the mall. Thoth tries to spot Ygritte in all the hubbub, but she needs to take care of the Polymerized Type first.
