411041004.content: All of a sudden, her terminal begins to ring like crazy. She looks at it, and sees it's an emergency signal from Ygritte!

411041009.content: Thoth's Featherblade pierces through the Visbane's chest as silver threads interweave to form a translucent cocoon around Ygritte.

411041011.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041011.content: Tho-Tho! I... I thought I was a goner... Those monsters, they...

411041012.speaker: 托特
411041012.content: I know, I know. Let's get you somewhere safe.

411041014.content: The Polymerized Type has risen to its feet and pounces at them. Thoth instinctively wraps a silver thread around Ygritte and uses it to pull her out of the wheelchair and into her arms, before leaping out of harm's way.

411041015.content: The momentary weightlessness and approaching sky give Ygritte the illusion she's flying. There's a loud crash as her wheelchair is destroyed, and a force that had kept her bound this whole time is suddenly broken.

411041016.content: As the soldiers turn the last Visbane to dust, Thoth opens her terminal and calls CORG HQ.

411041017.content: Having lost her mobility equipment, Thoth leaves Ygritte on a bench, where she stares at her diary in a daze.

411041019.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041019.content:
Huh? Oh, nothing, I'm fine.
How about you, are you okay? It looked like you got hurt by those monsters just now, don't you want to take a look?

411041020.content: Ygritte pulls Thoth closer so she can examine her, but all she can find are some minor scratches.

411041021.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041021.content: What the...? I definitely just saw you...

411041022.speaker: 托特
411041022.content: I'm okay, honestly. You're the one I'm worried about.

411041023.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041023.content: But that was a seriously intense fight just now. Are you sure you're okay?

411041024.speaker: 托特
411041024.content: Relax. You should get some rest, someone's coming to pick you up shortly. I want to get you back to CORG HQ so we can run some routine tests.

411041025.speaker: 托特
411041025.content: And, just to be on the safe side, I want to give you a full-scale physical while we're at it.

411041026.content: Ygritte nods, and it's then that Thoth finally notices that she's trembling slightly. She pats her friend on the shoulder—it feels frailer than she remembers.

411041027.speaker: 托特
411041027.content: Here they are. I'll help you get in.

411041028.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041028.content: If they park right in front me, I'll be able to manage on my own.

411041029.content: Thoth stands aside as Ygritte gently removes the hand from her shoulder and struggles to slowly pull herself up and into the waiting car. Her white skirt is filthy from the battle.

411041030.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041030.content: See? Told you I could do it. Now get in so we can get out of here.

411041031.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041031.content: Are you sure this is all necessary, Tho-Tho? I feel fine.

411041032.speaker: 托特
411041032.content: That episode you had yesterday was almost as bad as before you'd started taking those meds. Do you remember?

411041033.content: Ygritte looks down at her feet and doesn't answer.

411041034.speaker: 托特
411041034.content: Treatment isn't hopeless. There are lots of other people just like you, and scientists are constantly making new discoveries in the field of spinal cord injuries. The important thing is that you never give up.

411041035.speaker: 托特
411041035.content: In a minute, I want you to be completely truthful with the doctor when you talk about your condition. That's the best way they can make you feel better.

411041036.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041036.content: Don't worry about me, I know I'm going to get better. And I finally got to see you in action today, and it was awesome! I'm going to include that scene in my book!

411041037.speaker: 托特
411041037.content: Haha, just make sure you change the details a bit. Remember, everything you saw today is supposed to be top secret.

411041038.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041038.content: Then I'm going to have to ask you to give it a quick checkover for me, just in case. Because, and I know it's probably not something you want to hear, your job is a bit like an adventure story.

411041039.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041039.content: Secret operations, killing monsters, saving the world... I saw how you swooped in to save me earlier, and it was so cool!

411041040.speaker: 托特
411041040.content: It's not as cool as you think. There are always missions you fail, and mission failure could mean lots of people die. Us included.

411041042.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411041042.content: Captain Thoth, and this must be Miss Ygritte. We're ready for you now.

411041043.speaker: 托特
411041043.content: Okay, let's get to it then. Thank you for your help with this.

411041044.speaker: 托特
411041044.content: And there's nothing for you to worry about here. It's just a couple of routine scans.

411041045.content: Thoth watches Ygritte get escorted to the test room, then goes to the researchers' room to observe the results as they come in.

411041046.content: She watches on the screen as Ygritte insists on making her own way to the bed, then slowly lies down in the narrow test chamber.

411041047.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411041047.content: Beginning the Bane Energy contamination test.

411041048.content: The scientist pushes a button and the machine begins to emit a high-pitched buzzing sound for the pre-operative scan. His expression darkens as the readouts are displayed on the screen.

411041050.content: He quickly interrupts the procedure and sends the data report to Thoth's terminal.

411041051.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411041051.content: Look at all these anomalies. I just retrieved her file and saw that her paraplegia is due to Bane Energy corrosion.

411041052.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411041052.content: The data shows that her memory was wiped ten years ago, which must be when she came into contact with Visbanes and they did this to her.

411041053.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411041053.content: But they didn't just damage her spinal cord—they got some of her consciousness data too. Which means there's a risk that this might affect her personality on some level in the future.

411041054.speaker: 托特
411041054.content: Bane Energy... So, this isn't just a normal medical condition.

411041055.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411041055.content: No. In fact, we've only ever seen one or two other patients like this, and their condition was much less severe than this.

411041056.speaker: 托特
411041056.content: Does this mean that, even if there are medical advances in the future, the chances of her being cured are...

411041057.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411041057.content: Very slim, to say the least. I would even hesitate to class this as a medical issue.

411041058.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411041058.content: But cases like her are very rare indeed, and the Medical Department would be very interested to study her further. We can provide her with the very best medical treatment available to try and stop her condition getting any worse.

411041059.speaker: 托特
411041059.content: If her consciousness data has been corrupted, does that mean a memory wipe could be more dangerous?

411041061.speaker: 托特
411041061.content: Okay, I understand. Thank you. Please, continue the scans.

411041063.speaker: 托特
411041063.content: Director Paracaesar, what are you doing here?

411041064.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041064.content: As head of research, any anomalous results are automatically and instantly reported back to me. Or did you forget that?

411041065.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041065.content: I must say your friend's condition fascinates me. And I have an idea that might offer her a healthy new body.

411041066.speaker: 托特
411041066.content: What do you mean? Her condition is so serious surely there's no medical technology out there that can help her?

411041067.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041067.content: I don't remember saying anything about medical technology. I just said I can give her a healthy new body.

411041068.speaker: 托特
411041068.content: You better not be talking about Project Blacksteel.

411041069.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041069.content: We'd probably get along better if you were slower on the uptake.

411041070.speaker: 托特
411041070.content: Her body is too weak to support bioaugmentation.

411041071.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041071.content: Not necessarily. Don't forget she was able to survive by willpower alone for five years after her initial exposure to Bane Energy radiation.

411041072.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041072.content: We've seen two similar cases here before. Despite intensive surgical intervention and long-term post-operative treatment, they didn't even survive three years.

411041073.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041073.content: She might have a rare mutation that grants her incredible adaptability to Bane Energy radiation.

411041074.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041074.content: And if we're able to augment her physical body on top of these capabilities, she'll be nigh-on unstoppable in battle against the Visbanes.

411041075.speaker: 托特
411041075.content: You mean she'll become another one of your tools.

411041076.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041076.content: I'm giving her a chance to live. To truly live.

411041077.speaker: 托特
411041077.content: A chance to live, sure. But judging from the mortality rate of your human CORG soldiers, she won't be living for very long. And that's before we even talk about the less-than-ideal success rate of bioaugmentation.

411041078.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041078.content: No one can guarantee a 100% success rate, but you know me—I'm not someone who likes to squander precious resources for no reason. A place in Project Blacksteel is very expensive indeed.

411041079.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041079.content: Besides, don't you think she should be the one who decides what she does with her life?

411041080.content: The young woman awakens from her light sleep, and the blue halo in her eyes shrinks into a slender ring. Her limbs still feel weightless.

411041081.content: She reaches out and feels something cool to the touch, and reluctantly she takes up the familiar hands in her own.

411041085.speaker: 托特
411041085.content: Not yet. We spotted something, and we need to discuss it with you.

411041086.content: Ygritte opens her eyes and sees Thoth leaning over her. Next to her stands a tall, red-haired woman.

411041088.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041088.content: Paracaesar, I'm the director of the CORG Egregious Crimes Department.

411041089.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041089.content: Director? What's a CORG director doing here? Has something bad happened?

411041090.speaker: 托特
411041090.content: It's your condition. The scan just now picked something up, and it turns out your disease is... very complicated.

411041091.content: Thoth tries to look Ygritte in the eyes, but she can't quite bring herself to.

411041092.speaker: 托特
411041092.content: I can't really give you too many details right now, but basically it looks like it's going to be very difficult to cure you... Even more so than we originally thought. We're not even sure that there's anything out there that can help you...

411041093.speaker: 托特
411041093.content: But the Medical Department have agreed to give you the best treatment they can to slow down the disease's progress as much as possible.

411041095.speaker: 托特
411041095.content: I'm not saying the situation is completely hopeless, and if we can stabilize you first...

411041096.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041096.content: Tho-Tho, do you know how many times I've heard things like that since I was a kid?

411041097.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041097.content: When I first woke up from the coma after the accident, I heard the doctors telling my mom that I probably wouldn't make it through the night.

411041098.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041098.content: And in all those years since, every morning I've woken up I've treated it like an unexpected blessing, and every night I make the preparations in case I never wake up again.

411041099.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041099.content: And what if I were to tell you there might be a way for you to not only survive, but to regain your ability to walk and maybe be even stronger than ordinary people?

411041101.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041101.content: CORG is currently running an experimental bioaugmentation program. If you agree to take part, not only might you be able to walk again, but you might even be strong enough to meet the criteria to join CORG.

411041102.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041102.content: Are you for real? But wait, what is this bio... augmentation you mentioned?

411041103.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041103.content: Bioaugmentation is when we replace damaged or dysfunctional organs with mechanical parts. If successful, you will have a brand new and even more powerful body.

411041104.content: Ygritte's gaze glitters imperceptibly, as though a shining silver bird had just flown in front of her eyes.

411041105.speaker: 托特
411041105.content: But if it's not successful, then she'll pay with her life.

411041106.speaker: 托特
411041106.content: And even if it is successful, she'll become the property of CORG.

411041107.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041107.content: Why are you always like this?

411041108.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041108.content: I admit it, the risks of bioaugmentation are high. The costs too, so yes, we will require her to do a little something for CORG to repay the "debt."

411041109.speaker: 托特
411041109.content: Ygritte, I know you've always dreamed of being able to walk again, but this is too dangerous. I couldn't bear to see you take this much of a risk.

411041111.speaker: 托特
411041111.content: And if the procedure is a success, this "little something" CORG will ask you to do will probably be even more dangerous and you'll have to give up everything you have now. If you want my advice, I say you should turn it down.

411041112.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041112.content: I'm sorry, but I can't make a decision right away... Can I have some time to think it over?

411041113.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411041113.content: I don't mind either way, but you should know that your condition is actually very serious. Even if you decide against bioaugmentation, you should still stay here for a while so we can get you stable again.

411041114.content: And with that, Paracaesar leaves the room. Thoth stays behind and sits on the bed next to Ygritte, and gently clasps her hand in hers. She tries to catch Ygritte's gaze.

411041115.speaker: 托特
411041115.content: Ygritte, I love your stories and they deserve to be written down. I can help you.

411041116.content: A ray of sunlight struggles to make its way into the closed-off, messy room, as though a dusty window is suddenly cracked.

411041117.content: Ygritte glances at Thoth. Her expression is as calm as ever, but she can see something glittering deep down behind her eyes, like a lone star in the dark night's sky.

411041118.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041118.content: Of course I'll write them down. And then, once I'm better, we can go see the publisher together!

411041119.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411041119.content: I want you to look after the bookstore while I'm not there.

411041120.content: Thoth smiles and squeezes Ygritte's hand. As she gets up to leave, the Land of Moons key in her hand flashes with a silver light.

411041121.content: Ygritte watches her leave, then looks down at the hand Thoth was just holding. The scar that was there has now disappeared, and the skin looks as good as new.

411041122.content: Ygritte absent-mindedly massages her useless legs.

411051001.content: There's a knock at the door. Thoth pulls it open and sunlight streams into the store.

411051002.content: Having gone nearly a month without seeing its owner, the bookstore is waiting quietly where it always has done. Everything looks exactly the same as Ygritte had left it.

411051003.content: A note from a loyal customer has been stuck to the window, now tattered and weather-beaten. Thoth takes it down and goes over the desk to read it in the light.

411051004.content: There, she finds an open notebook.

411051005.content:
"The bird swooped down into the endless abyss."

"The harsh winds clawed at her wings, and the heavy rain soaked her through her feathers. An ever-burning fire raged, yet still the snow-white bird flew through the flames."

"She flew through an abyss deeper than all other abysses, through darkness blacker than all other darknesses, until she reached the glimmering silver light in the distance."

"Her feathers were once again smooth, her body once again unburned, and she flew until she'd merged with the cool, gentle moon."

411051009.content:
The rest has been crossed out?

"Bathed in moonlight, the bird finally slept and had the most marvelous dream."

"When she awoke, she wanted to sing with joy, but she discovered that the smoke from the abyssal fires had rendered her mute, and the flames had burned away the feathers from her wings. She'd never be able to fly again."

"She had nothing except the moonlight."

411051013.speaker: 托特
411051013.content: Why did she write an ending like that? At least she crossed it out.

411051014.content: Thoth closes the notebook and examines the pattern on the front cover. She then places the note from the customer between its pages, so it will be a nice surprise for Ygritte when she comes back.

411051015.content: Thoth then opens her own communication log, where she finds two long messages from Ygritte.

411051016.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411051016.content: "You'll be pleased to hear I slept for so long that I forgot what happened in the attack! It's a shame, I was going to use it in my story."

411051017.speaker: 伊格莉塔
411051017.content: "I hope the publisher doesn't mind we missed our appointment. Once I'm better, you should come with me again to visit her!"

411051018.speaker: 托特
411051018.content: It sounds like she's had her memory wiped already.

411051019.speaker: 托特
411051019.content: But our bodies always find a way... I'm happy she seems calm and well-rested.

411051020.content: Thoth starts to tidy up the bookstore. She waters the plants and dusts the shelves. Once she's done, she stands by the entrance and smiles in satisfaction at her work.

411051021.content: She steps outside and locks the door, the smile already fading from her lips, before turning to walk away down the street.

411051022.speaker: 托特
411051022.content: I guess my next job is to... go back to CORG.

411051023.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051023.content: Thoth, prepare to connect to the Neural Network.

411051025.content: A message from CORG displays on her screen, and before she can even click on it, she can hear a familiar voice in her head.

411051026.content: The daylight seems to dim as a researcher in a white coat slowly takes form before Thoth's eyes, as vivid as though she were actually standing in front of her.

411051027.speaker: 托特
411051027.content: Can you give us some time to confirm?

411051028.content: Paracaesar is standing before a giant test machine. Black particles float around everywhere, slowly drifting into place to generate the rest of the scene.

411051029.content: Neural Network technology allows users to share sensory experiences together even when they're not physically in the same location—although it can cause confusion if used recklessly.

411051030.content: Although Thoth has taken several training courses on this technology in the past, it's still under development and she feels a strong sense of discomfort at having her mind forcibly taken over in this way.

411051031.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051031.content: I've told you before that hearing the instruction to connect will instantly increase your concentration.

411051032.speaker: 托特
411051032.content: But I don't want this to happen to me while I'm on the battlefield.

411051033.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051033.content: I'm only connecting you to the virtual machine, as a real person's consciousness is much more active and disorienting than this. Try and get used to it—this technology will probably save your life one day.

411051035.speaker: 托特
411051035.content: I'm assuming you're not using this highly experimental psychic technology just to call me up for a chat, huh?

411051036.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051036.content: There's been a problem at the factory.

411051037.speaker: 托特
411051037.content: The one from before? The Neuhansa one?

411051038.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051038.content: Correct. A batch of AGI Mechas was delivered from there to the CORG warehouse this morning, and this afternoon we received a system alert saying that there might be a problem with them.

411051039.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051039.content: I sent someone down to check, and they found that something strangely similar to Bane Energy is being stored in all of the machines.

411051041.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051041.content:
That's something you're going to ask someone on site.
Speak to Liberty, he's the chief engineer in charge of overseeing the weapon production lines.

411051042.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051042.content: He was involved in the early phases of Project Blacksteel, as well as research into the Neural Network, before applying to be transferred to Neuhansa.

411051043.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051043.content: Our investigations have shown that he might not have been entirely happy.

411051045.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051045.content: He's a talented mecha engineer. You probably came across his name when you were working at the Information Security Center.

411051046.speaker: 托特
411051046.content: He requested to leave Project Blacksteel?

411051047.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051047.content: You're not the only one with aspirations, you know?

411051048.speaker: 托特
411051048.content:
...But Bane Energy is the last straw.
So, my mission will be to investigate this matter?

411051049.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051049.content: Liberty will be leaving the factory tomorrow to attend a meeting to drum up investment. I need you to take advantage of his absence to bring me back the relevant research materials.

411051050.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051050.content: You should also look into the engineer who submitted the report. His resume looks clean, but he's worked with Liberty for a few years so we can't guarantee he hasn't been bribed.

411051052.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051052.content: Given Liberty's skills, who knows what he's capable of. I'm sending you a team just to be on the safe side.

411051053.content: As she says this, a group of armed soldiers approaches. Their strength is evident even underneath their armor.

411051056.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051056.content: Think of them as OPRICS' new reserve force. They'll be supporting you in this operation.

411051057.speaker: 托特
411051057.content: What does this mission have to do with President Red Fox?

411051058.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051058.content: Nothing for you to worry about. As you know, OPRICS' structure doesn't include a reserve force, so the Sigma squad is just regular troops.

411051059.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051059.content: This mission will be their first real test, and if they prove themselves in combat then they could be absorbed into the wider OPRICS organization. That's about as far as Red Fox's involvement goes.

411051060.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051060.content: Do you have any other questions?

411051061.speaker: 托特
411051061.content: Not about the mission, but on a personal note...

411051063.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051063.content: Well, they wiped her memory once her condition was stable, and she's recovering now and they should be sending her home soon. Why, haven't you heard from her?

411051064.speaker: 托特
411051064.content: Yes, but... It just seems like she's being kept in the CORG facility for too long.

411051065.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411051065.content: You'll get to see her again. You shouldn't let your personal life affect your work.

411051066.speaker: 托特
411051066.content: I know, I know. I'll set off as soon as I can.

411051067.content: The world begins to drain of all color and then shatters before Thoth's eyes. After a few seconds of disorientation, she finds herself back on the crowded street.

411051068.content: She opens her terminal and searches for information about Liberty. He joined and left Project Blacksteel very early on, so early that the project's direction had only just been officially announced when he left.

411051070.content: Thoth shakes the irrelevant thoughts from her head, then begins heading back in the direction of CORG.

411051072.content: In the factory's deserted industrial park, an out-of-control AGI Mecha charges wildly toward the main entrance.

411051075.content: A man in a white coat comes running after the mecha. Suddenly, the mecha crashes to the ground as thought it has tripped on something, but it is in fact tied up in silver thread that glitters coldly in the sunlight.

411051076.content: The man wastes no time in leaping on top of the mecha and connecting a terminal to one of its external ports. The mecha thrashes in resistance, but after a few seconds it stops moving.

411051077.speaker: 焦急的男人
411051077.content: Why did it just stop like that? Aha, there was a fault with the instruction recognition program. Luckily, the core data storage module appears to be undamaged.

411051078.content: He's about to reboot the AGI Mecha when he suddenly notices Thoth standing there, and his head whips up to look at her.

411051079.speaker: 托特
411051079.content: Are you Jolin? The whistleblower who leaked the report?

411051080.speaker: 乔林
411051080.content: I... And who might you be?

411051081.speaker: 托特
411051081.content: I'm from the CORG Egregious Crimes Department, and I'm here to investigate what happened.

411051082.content: Jolin's expression hardens, and he eyes Thoth and her soldiers with suspicion. She notices the knuckles of his hand holding the AGI Mecha have turned white.

411051083.speaker: 托特
411051083.content: There's no need to be nervous.

411051084.speaker: 乔林
411051084.content: I'm not. I've just never seen your uniforms before.

411051085.speaker: 托特
411051085.content: They come with the territory. But you must have been expecting us to come and investigate after you published your report?

411051086.speaker: 托特
411051086.content: We're here because we need your help. We're not here to make life difficult for you, or in retaliation for what you've done.

411051088.content: Jolin pretends to relax, but Thoth can see through the act. She nods her head and decides to change tack.

411051089.speaker: 乔林
411051089.content: Liberty isn't here at the moment, he's gone to some tech convention...

411051091.speaker: 乔林
411051091.content: But there really is some kind of problem with that batch of AGI Mechas. What are you guys going to do about it?

411051092.speaker: 托特
411051092.content: Any goods that are released with safety defects for any reason must be punished, and even more so since these are CORG's official military supplies.

411051093.speaker: 托特
411051093.content: There are definitely questions that I need Liberty to answer, seeing as he's the chief engineer and all, but the first thing I'd like to establish is why you felt the need to go over your superior's head with this report?

411051094.speaker: 乔林
411051094.content: I... When I found out what was wrong it was already too late, and Liberty had left for the convention, so this seemed like the best way...

411051095.speaker: 托特
411051095.content: You say it was too late, but not too late for you to keep writing reports and deleting them on your computer?

411051097.speaker: 托特
411051097.content: CORG's online systems track everything you type, everything you click on.

411051098.speaker: 托特
411051098.content: I noticed some differences between the report you deleted and the final one you submitted. Your first one was more detailed, and your speculations on the source of the abnormal energy turned out to be exactly the same as the conclusions our scientists reached after their investigations.

411051099.speaker: 托特
411051099.content: This corrosive energy is no accident. You knew about it and you deliberately sealed it within containers in the AGI Mechas you shipped to CORG.

411051100.speaker: 托特
411051100.content: Why? Why obfuscate the details? Why didn't you report the energy as soon as you noticed it?

411051102.speaker: 托特
411051102.content: Is it the case that you reported them because you knew how dangerous they are, but you didn't want to get into trouble by revealing too much?

411051103.speaker: 托特
411051103.content: Or is it because you're also involved in Liberty's unauthorized project? He may be in charge, but you'd also be considered an accomplice, wouldn't you?

411051104.content: Sweat appears on Jolin's brow and he clenches both his fists, but then his eyes flick to the Sigma squad's guns and his anger seems to leave him like a deflating balloon.

411051107.speaker: 乔林
411051107.content: As you know, this factory is responsible for the manufacture of military-grade AGI Mechas. Liberty and I were brought across because of our backgrounds in advanced mechanics, and we'd worked together on many projects in the past.

411051108.speaker: 乔林
411051108.content: If it weren't for him offering to go to all these technological conventions to find suitable investors, many of the things you see here would probably never have seen the light of day. And, as he's chief engineer, he's in charge of almost everything around here.

411051109.speaker: 乔林
411051109.content: In the beginning we were just a couple of robot buffs who wanted to invent something that would change the world. And we knew that, even if the research was unauthorized, your research center would turn a blind eye to it as long as it brought results...

411051110.speaker: 乔林
411051110.content: But recently, Liberty's research has been getting more and more risky. When he managed to generate that strange energy, I knew he'd gone too far.

411051111.speaker: 托特
411051111.content: It sounds like you two are close. Why didn't you talk him out of it?

411051112.speaker: 乔林
411051112.content: I knew I shouldn't go over his head, so before I wrote the report, I asked him straight: What the hell is in those containers?

411051113.speaker: 乔林
411051113.content: But he told me to keep my nose out, that I should just do as I'm told and he'll deal with any fallout.

411051114.speaker: 托特
411051114.content: So you deleted the details and just warned CORG that there's a problem with the mechas, in the hope that we'd treat it like an accident and that the resulting sanctions would snap him out of it.

411051115.speaker: 托特
411051115.content: But you didn't want the extent of your secret research to come to light, so you tried to throw us off the scent with an incomplete report. Stop me if I'm getting anything wrong.

411051116.speaker: 乔林
411051116.content: No, you're right. I was so panicked I wasn't thinking straight, it didn't even cross my mind that I was doing all this on CORG's internal network.

411051117.speaker: 托特
411051117.content: Well, since you had the conscience to at least report something to us, I'm hoping you'll continue to cooperate with us now that the truth has come to light.

411051118.speaker: 托特
411051118.content: After all, if your research is indeed as world-changing as you claim it is, CORG won't just abandon it like that. But if the bad outweighs the good, I guess you can imagine how we're going to handle it.

411051120.speaker: 托特
411051120.content: You said he often offers to find investors so you can continue your research. Do you know who any of them are?

411051121.speaker: 乔林
411051121.content: Not really... But I know the companies they work for. I have a list in my files somewhere.

411051122.speaker: 托特
411051122.content: Okay. And have you ever heard him mention a "Neural Network" before?

411051123.speaker: 乔林
411051123.content: No. Our research has always been focused on large-scale military mechas.

411051124.speaker: 托特
411051124.content: Have you noticed him behaving strangely recently?

411051125.speaker: 乔林
411051125.content: I barely see him anymore... He's always going away on business trips, far more than he used to.

411051126.speaker: 乔林
411051126.content: We used to be holed up in the workshop all day long, working for days at a stretch and usually forgetting to eat. But recently he's always traveling somewhere, and I can never find him during working hours even when he is here. I have no idea what he's up to.

411051127.speaker: 托特
411051127.content: Sounds like we need to add "skipping work" to the list of charges...

411051128.speaker: 托特
411051128.content: Mr. Jolin, could you please take us to the production line where the faulty machines were made?

411061001.content: A thick, nauseating smell permeates the closed workshop. Thoth stands at the operator's console and uses her portable terminal to crack the system password.

411061002.speaker: 男性西格玛
411061002.content: Captain, Jolin has gone back to his office.

411061003.speaker: 托特
411061003.content: Continue monitoring his movements. What's the situation outside the factory?

411061004.speaker: 男性西格玛
411061004.content: Nothing unusual to report. HQ has sent through Liberty's live location—he's on the fastest transport back, but it's still going to take him 20 minutes or so.

411061005.content: The faint sound of murmuring reaches Thoth's ears, as though a crowd of people are whispering in the next room.

411061007.speaker: 托特
411061007.content: It's nothing. Are you still comfortable using the Neural Network?

411061008.speaker: 女性西格玛
411061008.content: The training sessions were always in these big, open spaces, whereas this factory environment is quite enclosed... But I'll get used to it.

411061009.speaker: 托特
411061009.content: Let me just check your visual settings.

411061010.content: Thoth's mind becomes a blur as her visual field is suddenly split into a grid of thousands of tiny squares, and her mind is flooded with a massive amount of audiovisual information, far more than any ordinary human being can process.

411061011.speaker: 托特
411061011.content: Did Paracaesar configures these settings for you?

411061012.speaker: 女性西格玛
411061012.content: Yes, because each individual is slightly different.

411061013.speaker: 托特
411061013.content: Let's adjust this here. Your field of vision doesn't need to be so wide during the recon phase, it's too much for your body to take.

411061015.speaker: 女性西格玛
411061015.content: Sorry, Director Paracaesar doesn't let us do this.

411061016.speaker: 托特
411061016.content: A combat situation is nothing like virtual training. If you ever feel any discomfort, you should flag it immediately and I'll put in a request with Paracaesar.

411061017.content: Thoth had taken a look over their data on her way to Neuhansa. As she'd expected, all of these soldiers are highly bio-enhanced.

411061018.speaker: 托特
411061018.content: (This much augmentation is only going to accelerate their aging process... What was Paracaesar thinking?)

411061019.content: Her terminal starts buzzing with notifications that it has failed to crack the system's password.

411061020.speaker: 男性西格玛
411061020.content: Captain, there's no abnormal energy residue on the consoles here.

411061021.speaker: 托特
411061021.content: Hmm, they must have been cleaned. We can't access the security system with Jolin's credentials, so it must be something Liberty designed on his own.

411061023.speaker: 托特
411061023.content: That's very risky, and it might trigger a factory-wide alarm. I'll see if I can get into one of the Security AGI Mechas instead.

411061024.content: All of the information that has been gathered by the team is shared across the Neural Network, which Thoth can then use to generate a dynamic map in real-time.

411061025.content: She sneaks behind one of the nearest Security AGI Mechas and inserts an infiltration terminal into its external port before it can raise the alarm.

411061028.speaker: 托特
411061028.content: Nothing, it's just that my access has been blocked by an AGI Mecha with a higher security level. Seems like Liberty knew we were coming.

411061029.content: The mild discomfort from using the system lingers for a long time. Frowning, Thoth removes her terminal and tries to think of something else.

411061030.content: She hears the sound of footsteps running toward her, and turns to see the Sigma squad approaching.

411061032.content: Thoth once again hears the strange murmuring sound. She removes the device and eyes her companion.

411061033.speaker: 托特
411061033.content: Did you hear that whispering noise?

411061034.speaker: 女性西格玛
411061034.content: Huh? Maybe, I wasn't paying attention.

411061036.speaker: 女性西格玛
411061036.content: Yeah. I think that whispering sound you heard is just our encrypted emotional consciousness. Think of it as our "inner voices."

411061037.speaker: 托特
411061037.content: Oh, really? I don't remember that from training.

411061038.speaker: 女性西格玛
411061038.content: Sorry, maybe I forgot to mention it. My mind was everywhere after that first combat session...

411061039.speaker: 女性西格玛
411061039.content: Just increase the filter and you won't hear it anymore.

411061040.speaker: 托特
411061040.content: Wouldn't that have physical side effects?

411061041.speaker: 女性西格玛
411061041.content: If you just suppress your emotions, it shouldn't be too bad.

411061042.speaker: 女性西格玛
411061042.content: Being calm, cool, and collected is an advantage for us anyway, isn't it?

411061045.speaker: 托特
411061045.content: I was just wondering if you said something mean about me behind my back on that first mission.

411061047.speaker: 托特
411061047.content: I'm only joking. There, how's it feeling for you now?

411061048.speaker: 女性西格玛
411061048.content: Do you mean my precision operations after the consciousness connection has been established? My readout is saying... grade B.

411061049.speaker: 托特
411061049.content: Hmm, let me take another look. Connection adaptability is grade A, applicable targets is... All?

411061050.speaker: 女性西格玛
411061050.content: ...Yeah. This is the only way I was able to join the squad.

411061051.speaker: 托特
411061051.content: Okay, then I want you to cover me as I try to infiltrate the security system again.

411061052.content: In the cavernous workshop, Jolin lays the AGI Mecha he's just been repairing back down on the bench and slowly comes to a standstill.

411061053.content: He turns to look at the CORG soldiers stationed outside his door, then quietly picks up his communicator and searches for a name.

411061055.speaker: 利伯蒂
411061055.content: Halfway done, but they were definitely scraping the barrel with some of these attendees.

411061057.speaker: 乔林
411061057.content: ...Nothing. I just wanted to check how you were getting on.

411061058.speaker: 乔林
411061058.content: Have you managed to find any potential associates?

411061060.speaker: 利伯蒂
411061060.content: Don't worry, you'll get the research budget I promised you.

411061061.speaker: 乔林
411061061.content: And what would you do if you found someone who'd be willing to fund any research you wanted?

411061062.speaker: 利伯蒂
411061062.content: Then of course I'd put it toward making my... I mean *our* blueprint a reality.

411061063.speaker: 乔林
411061063.content: Even if it goes against what our original intention was when we designed these "weapons"?

411061064.speaker: 利伯蒂
411061064.content: My original intention was to create the impossible and push the boundaries of mecha weaponry.

411061065.speaker: 利伯蒂
411061065.content: You joined the design department because you believed in my vision. Surely you're not having second thoughts now that we're so close to success?

411061066.speaker: 乔林
411061066.content: I just think you need to be careful of who you pick to work with us.

411061067.speaker: 乔林
411061067.content: After all, you've poured your heart and soul into this for decades.

411061069.speaker: 利伯蒂
411061069.content: But don't you think I've already paid the price of my caution these past years?

411061072.speaker: 利伯蒂
411061072.content: See, what did I tell you? I know how CORG operates. They won't find a thing.

411061073.speaker: 利伯蒂
411061073.content: I guess I haven't been at the Assembly Line for a while though. Gotta dash, we'll talk more when I'm back.

411061074.content: There's a click as Liberty hangs up, the communicator's pale blue screen illuminating Jolin's tired face.

411061075.content: He knows there's nothing more he can do. Whether or not CORG actually find anything is entirely out of his hands now.

411061076.content: He brings up a blueprint on his screen, in which AGI Mecha soldiers are quietly waiting behind prison bars like slumbering titans.

411061077.speaker: 乔林
411061077.content: (Giving this to CORG would be the right thing to do...)

411061078.content: But all he can do is wait.

411061079.speaker: 科尔盖专员
411061079.content: Captain, here's the information Liberty has taken to this convention.

411061081.speaker: 科尔盖专员
411061081.content: He left for a while, but now he's gone back.

411061082.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411061082.content: Did our men manage to make contact with him?

411061083.speaker: 科尔盖专员
411061083.content: Not really. He didn't take the bait.

411061084.speaker: 科尔盖专员
411061084.content: This associate has offered some very generous conditions. Once the convention's over, they'll probably go straight back to Liberty's workshop given its proximity to the venue.

411061086.speaker: 科尔盖专员
411061086.content: Just some technical engineer who's working for a mecha start-up. I think they've been in talks with Neuhansa and some of the other big players.

411061087.speaker: 科尔盖专员
411061087.content: But this guy had just been working as technical support in some old factory for years before this. There's no way he would have met Liberty through any of his own connections.

411061088.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411061088.content: The technical issues Liberty must be experiencing probably can't be fixed by any old engineer. Whatever this guy knows, it'll be invaluable to us.

411061090.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411061090.content: Confirm this man's identity ASAP, find a way to separate them, then arrest Liberty as soon as you do.

411061091.speaker: 科尔盖专员
411061091.content: Roger. Shall we also send the Sigma squad's findings back to HQ?

411061093.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411061093.content: Only the bare essential information needs to be recorded for this op, you understand?

411071002.content: A quiet whining sound rings through the Neural Network. Thoth removes her device as the control center door opens from the inside.

411071004.content: The AGI Mecha that charges toward them is taken down in a single shot from the Sigma squad, and it doesn't take long to dispatch the remaining ones.

411071009.speaker: 女性西格玛
411071009.content: It's fine, just a normal side effect, I guess.

411071010.speaker: 女性西格玛
411071010.content: It's just my first time hacking into a mecha's head... I didn't realize they had so many thoughts.

411071014.content: Seeing the helpless smile creep across Thoth's face, the Sigma soldier comes up to her with an eyebrow raised.

411071016.speaker: 托特
411071016.content: It's nothing. I was just reminded of a friend.

411071017.speaker: 托特
411071017.content: Oh yes, your designation... I should only ever call you "No. 6" while you're part of the Sigma squad.

411071018.content: Thoth walks over to No. 6 and straightens her Neural Comms Device.

411071019.speaker: 托特
411071019.content: Considering that was your first fight, you did a good job out there, rookie.

411071020.speaker: 托特
411071020.content: But this mission will be even more dangerous than that. Prepare yourself mentally.

411071022.content: No. 6 stiffens her spine and places her fist against her chest in the CORG salute.

411071023.content: Thoth connects to the hacking tool and is able to see all of the factory's recent monitoring and production data.

411071025.content: The retrieved video footage shows a young man with a kind and honest face inspecting production lines with Liberty. The two of them then walk into Liberty's workshop.

411071026.speaker: 托特
411071026.content: No. 1, have you managed to located more video footage over there?

411071027.speaker: 一号
411071027.content: No, but we have found a shopping list.

411071028.speaker: 托特
411071028.content: Sync it to our neural comms.

411071029.speaker: 一号
411071029.content: Liberty made several component purchases from a new mecha company earlier this year. The man seen in the video is a sales representative from that company. He was the one who sent the purchase order.

411071030.speaker: 一号
411071030.content: Shortly after the acquisition of these components, Liberty reported a new discovery to the factory boss.

411071031.speaker: 托特
411071031.content: "The use of these components has greatly increased the Tranzist Ore's energy efficiency..."

411071032.speaker: 托特
411071032.content: Did the factory boss just believe all this just based on these components of unknown origin and experimental datasets that he'd never seen before?

411071033.speaker: 一号
411071033.content: It raises many questions. The company in question has launched no major products on the market, so Liberty's superiors would have had no reason to want to collaborate with them.

411071034.speaker: 一号
411071034.content: Business at the factory has been bad of late, and the majority of its current income is coming from orders placed by CORG.

411071035.speaker: 一号
411071035.content: Judging from the orders I can see, they haven't allocated a big budget to this client. I believe this was a test run.

411071036.speaker: 托特
411071036.content: "Greatly increased"... How much could that be by? None of the CORG researchers would be confident enough to make an assertion like that.

411071037.speaker: 托特
411071037.content: We've either got ourselves a secret genius squirreled away in Neuhansa, or... he's using power beyond the capacity of ordinary humans.

411071039.speaker: 托特
411071039.content: Yes. The strange energy signatures we're reading on the malfunctioning AGI Mechas does seem to point to this possibility.

411071040.speaker: 一号
411071040.content: But none of the AGI Mechas we've seen have exhibited signs of Bane Energy corrosion.

411071041.speaker: 托特
411071041.content: There could be a whole host of reasons why they're malfunctioning. Get all those files copied while I go search Liberty's workshop.

411071042.content: Their conversation is interrupted by the wailing of an alarm and a sudden burst of energy disrupts the Neural Network. Thoth's vision blurs.

411071045.content: Thoth dodges the attack and, together with No. 1, they take the mecha down. However, more AGI Mechas begin streaming through the door.

411071046.content: The terminal map lights up with enemy dots. The Sigma squad provides covering fire for Thoth as she runs back to the console. As she expected, the control room has been flagged red by the security system.

411071047.speaker: 托特
411071047.content: The security system has been activated. We've been spotted.

411071048.speaker: 一号
411071048.content: It was tripped when we transferred the data.

411071049.speaker: 六号
411071049.content: Some kind of energy is disrupting the neural network... Origin unknown.

411071050.speaker: 托特
411071050.content: Everyone, cover me. I need you to buy me some time.

411071051.content: The control room door groans as it starts to slowly close.

411071052.speaker: 托特
411071052.content: Cover me at the console while I shut down the security system!

411071053.speaker: 托特
411071053.content: That is a lot of AGI Mechas. And what's this high-energy signal?

411071054.speaker: 托特
411071054.content: Send an emergency message to HQ.

411071055.speaker: 一号
411071055.content: HQ has been alerted, but they haven't replied yet.

411071056.speaker: 托特
411071056.content: I've got a bad feeling about this... Keep trying to get hold of HQ.

411071058.content: The firepower matrix continues to mow down the AGI Mechas that try to come through the door. Thoth inputs a command code into the terminal.

411071059.content: Just as the control room door is about to close completely, the system beeps the all-clear. Without a target, the AGI Mechas come to a sudden halt in the doorway. There is a terrible screeching sound as the door begins to crush them.

411071061.content: One of the AGI Mecha arms is suspended in the air as it is trapped in the door, but the Sigma squad doesn't drop its guard for a minute—all of their weapons are still pointed right at it.

411071062.content: Their beating hearts reverberate around the room, as though swallowed by the eerie silence but continuing to thump beneath their feet.

411071063.speaker: 一号
411071063.content: The AGI Mechas have been disabled and the alarm has been deactivated.

411071064.speaker: 托特
411071064.content: Stay vigilant. The high-energy signal is still here.

411071066.content: The impact from behind the wall is enough to knock everyone off their feet. Seconds later, a giant AGI Mecha breaks into the control room and points its cannons directly at Thoth.

411071068.content: The first Sigma soldier to charge is sent flying by a strong mechanical arm. However, that split second is enough for Thoth to roll out the way of the incoming bombardment. She raises a hand to summon her Access Key.

411071069.content: The Featherblades coalesce within a storm of Divine Grace, then shoot out toward the AGI Mecha, striking its limbs in a series of booming explosions. The force is enough to stop it in its tracks momentarily.

411071070.content: The smoke and dust give Thoth a chance to take cover behind some debris. As she's trying to decide on her next move, a piercing screech fills the air.

411071072.content: A powerful gust of air flings Thoth into the air. The sound of a wall cracking coincides with a searing pain that shoots through her back, and the AGI Mecha takes her deep into the factory before she can do anything to react.

411071073.speaker: 科尔盖专员
411071073.content: Director, we've got an urgent request from the Sigma squad.

411071074.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411071074.content: They're finally through. Patch them to me.

411071075.content: There's a loud explosion of noise on the other end of the terminal, followed by intermittent shouts.

411071076.speaker: 一号
411071076.content: Director, we're under attack from a Mega AGI Mecha. Captain Thoth let it take her to protect us. Requesting immediate assistance.

411071077.speaker: 一号
411071077.content: This AGI Mecha has an extremely high destructive potential. The surrounding area must be evacuated immediately.

411071078.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411071078.content: A Mega AGI Mecha... So, he was hiding his secret research in the factory.

411071080.speaker: 一号
411071080.content: Some of them, but our systems are suffering from energy interference here so we haven't been able to upload most of them. I don't think they'll sync until we're out of here.

411071081.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411071081.content:
Have you forgotten your mission?
If you don't bring me proof that Liberty has double-crossed CORG, you won't graduate from the Sigma squad.

411071082.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411071082.content: And we don't have enough data on this Mega AGI Mecha. But if you take it head-on and the mission were to fail...

411071083.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411071083.content: I'd have no choice but to say that you'll never have what it takes to become fully-fledged members of OPRICS.

411071084.speaker: 六号
411071084.content: But Director, we haven't got all the files yet.

411071085.speaker: 六号
411071085.content: And we won't be able to access the core data without Captain Thoth.

411071086.speaker: 六号
411071086.content: I'm worried that AGI Mecha is going to try and raze the factory to the ground. And then you'll never be able to get the intel you want.

411071087.speaker: 六号
411071087.content: I request that we be allowed to carry on with the mission!

411071088.speaker: 六号
411071088.content: I am willing to sacrifice my life to get you the information you need, Director.

411071089.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411071089.content: Oh really? Do your comrades share your enthusiasm?

411071090.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411071090.content: I shall leave the decision to you. I only want to see the results.

411071091.content: There is a brief silence on the other end, then an ear-splitting crash floating above their heads like a butterfly.

411071092.speaker: 一号
411071092.content: The others believe the most important thing is to get out with the intel we've already gathered. They are going to evacuate from the factory as soon as this call is over, and they'll come to meet you.

411071093.speaker: 一号
411071093.content: I'm going to stay here with No. 6 and finish our mission.

411071094.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411071094.content:
Very good. The evacuation order has been issued, and CORG reinforcements will be on the ground soon.
Don't forget your orders.

411071096.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411071096.content: It's time to close the net and arrest Liberty.

411071097.speaker: 六号
411071097.content: Sorry, but if I didn't say that then the director would have aborted the mission...

411071098.speaker: 六号
411071098.content: I know we can save Captain Thoth. We can't just give up because it's dangerous!

411071099.speaker: 六号
411071099.content: The director has given us the right to choose, and I don't want to choose the option I might end up regretting.

411071100.speaker: 一号
411071100.content: You know I'm behind you every step of the way.

411071101.speaker: 一号
411071101.content: What is the point in OPRICS if not to fulfil our mission and deal with emergencies? We don't shrink away from something just because it's hard.

411081001.content: There is a rush of wind as a giant mechanical arm breaks through the smoke to attack Thoth, who is in freefall.

411081003.content: The Divine Grace on her weapon cushions some of the impact, and Thoth is bounced away like a ping-pong ball, crash-landing onto a mechanical platform.

411081005.speaker: 托特
411081005.content: (I can't win if I take it head-on. I need to activate the self-defense system first.)

411081006.content: Thoth switches on her optical camouflage and activates her jammer to render herself invisible to the Mega AGI Mecha's detection system, but the ominous rumbling sound reminds her just how close it is.

411081007.speaker: 托特
411081007.content: (I'm not strong enough for this, I need somewhere to hide.)

411081008.speaker: 托特
411081008.content: (Why are these mechas hanging from the ceiling? Am I near the production line?)

411081009.content: Her thoughts are interrupted by the sudden whirring of heavy machinery as the conveyor belt slowly starts up. The Mega AGI Mecha turns round and begins firing at the hanging mechas.

411081010.speaker: 托特
411081010.content: (Did No. 6 turn on the production line? At least it'll keep that thing distracted for a while.)

411081011.content: The hail of bullets shreds through the other mechas. The Mega AGI Mecha stands among the debris and scans its surroundings.

411081012.speaker: 托特
411081012.content: (Why has it stopped? Does it use motion tracking to lock on to human targets?)

411081013.speaker: 托特
411081013.content: (I need to exploit its detection system... NOW!)

411081014.content: Thoth uses her threads to leap onto the conveyor belt, where she hides behind a forklift mecha.

411081015.content: The conveyor belt is leading to the quality control room, which is just seconds away from Liberty's workshop.

411081017.content: The Mega AGI Mecha has cottoned on quicker than Thoth was expecting, and its barrels spew streams of fire along her trajectory.

411081018.content: One of the giant mechanical arms above the conveyor belt explodes and crashes to the ground, kicking up dust and debris. This causes the Mega AGI Mecha to temporarily lose its target, but it still knows the general direction it needs to go. It's only a matter of time before it finds Thoth.

411081020.content: A rubber bullet usually used for riot control pings off the Mega AGI Mecha's head in comical fashion, before bouncing to the floor harmlessly.

411081021.content: A small Security AGI Mecha seems to have been rebooted and, even though its weapons are mere toys in comparison, it squares up to the hostile Mega AGI Mecha.

411081023.content: The Mega AGI Mecha tears the smaller mecha apart before it has another chance, but within seconds it is surrounded by even more of them. Firepower blasts out in all directions, punching hundreds of holes in the walls.

411081024.speaker: 六号
411081024.content: (Captain Thoth, can you hear us? We're here! On your left! Look at me!)

411081025.content: Luckily Thoth had time to jump off the conveyor belt and dodge the gunfire. She crouches behind a heap of mecha corpses and searches for the source of the voice in her head.

411081026.speaker: 托特
411081026.content: (No. 6, are you the one controlling these AGI Mechas?)

411081027.speaker: 六号
411081027.content: (No, I'm the one in front of you! No. 1 is controlling the rest. But you need to get to me now, because I don't think he can hold on much longer!)

411081028.content: A nearby forklift mecha raises and lowers its arm in Thoth's direction.

411081029.content: Thoth scrambles over the mound of destroyed mechas until she reaches the forklift mecha being operated by No. 6. It gently pulls her into its shell, then speeds off toward the quality control room.

411081030.speaker: 六号
411081030.content: Phew! I don't think it's after us.

411081031.speaker: 六号
411081031.content: It had blocked off all the corridors leading here and we couldn't get round the rubble, so our only option was to try and take control of these mechas.

411081033.content: Thoth takes a deep breath in to suppress the pain burning through her, then takes out an emergency medkit to treat her wounds.

411081035.speaker: 六号
411081035.content: There's only me and No. 1. The others evacuated with the intel.

411081036.speaker: 六号
411081036.content: I... I couldn't just leave you here to face that thing on your own.

411081037.speaker: 托特
411081037.content: Oh really? Well, I have to say you've done one hell of a job for a Sigma rookie.

411081038.content: With the director not around, No. 6 gives a fist pump in excitement, but then halfway through changes it to a CORG salute, as though to hide her feelings.

411081039.speaker: 托特
411081039.content: We don't have enough information to take that Mega AGI Mecha down.

411081040.speaker: 托特
411081040.content: Not enough information nor enough manpower... I hate to say it, but I think it's time to retreat.

411081041.content: The forklift mecha slowly shakes its head from side to side.

411081042.speaker: 六号
411081042.content: I know you're worried about us.

411081043.speaker: 六号
411081043.content: But if we leave now, we'll never find out the secrets behind that monster... and it might go on to hurt even more people.

411081044.speaker: 六号
411081044.content: Do you trust us, Captain Thoth?

411081046.speaker: 六号
411081046.content: I know the original reason we were... augmented was to carry out missions.

411081047.speaker: 六号
411081047.content:
When I was given all this power, I realized I don't just have to sit around waiting to be rescued anymore.
I can pick up my own weapon and protect the people who need me.

411081048.speaker: 六号
411081048.content:
To be honest, I was terrified before we stepped foot in here.
But thanks to my teammates, and to you, I found the courage to look at the enemies in the darkness straight in the eyes.

411081049.speaker: 六号
411081049.content: Let's go and find the most important files and bring them back with us.

411081050.content: Thoth takes a minute to think, then claps her hand on the mecha's arm and gives it a squeeze.

411081053.speaker: 一号
411081053.content: No threats detected nearby, but controlling this many targets is exhausting.

411081054.speaker: 一号
411081054.content:
All of the corridors around here are blocked with rubble. I don't think we're going to be able to reach you anytime soon.
You've still got a way to go until you reach Liberty's workshop. You need to get to the first floor.

411081057.speaker: 一号
411081057.content: There's a distress signal coming from nearby. I'm going to go investigate.

411081058.speaker: 托特
411081058.content: Good idea. I think I'm fine over here. You and No. 6 can disconnect now, and we'll see each other at the meeting point.

411081062.content: The pixels on the AGI Mecha's display arrange themselves in something of a smiley face, before they fade away and the mecha comes to a stop.

411081064.content: Once the connection drops, Thoth realizes how quiet it is now. She studies her reflection in the AGI Mecha's black display screen.

411081066.speaker: 托特
411081066.content: When you join CORG, you accept that you might have to sacrifice your life one day.

411081067.speaker: 托特
411081067.content: We all made the choice to fight for our beliefs and to live and die without regrets.

411081068.speaker: 托特
411081068.content: The best thing to do is make sure their efforts haven't been in vain.

411081069.content: Thoth walks away from the AGI Mecha and her hand subconsciously goes to the Neural Comms Device, but all she can feel is silence.

411081071.content: There suddenly comes a loud rumbling sound from above her head, and Thoth immediately flattens herself against the nearest wall and activates her energy scanner. The flashing light indicates the Mega AGI Mecha's direction of movement.

411081072.content: She grits her teeth, lets go of the Neural Comms Device, and runs toward Liberty's workshop.

411081074.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411081074.content: Long time no see, Liberty. So, are you happy with the price I offered?

411081075.content: The smile freezes on the man's face, and he looks around at the soldiers in the room with a snort of disdain.

411081076.speaker: 利伯蒂
411081076.content: I see you haven't changed, Director. You did always love joking around with me.

411081077.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411081077.content: I see your new "associate" didn't invest enough to satisfy your cravings.

411081078.speaker: 利伯蒂
411081078.content: Associate? I'm just trying to find funding to keep this factory going.

411081079.speaker: 利伯蒂
411081079.content: Surely the bigshot director hasn't come all this way to Neuhansa because she's had a change of heart and is suddenly interested in the mecha program again?

411081080.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411081080.content: I'm more interested in your theft of CORG's intellectual property.

411081081.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411081081.content: The contract you signed for Project Blacksteel specifically forbade you from using any CORG technology in your own personal research.

411081082.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411081082.content: This is the warrant for your arrest. Is there anything you'd like to say?

411081083.content: Liberty stares at the warrant that's projected before him, his crimes listed on it in black and white.

411081085.content: He takes a step forward, his body passing through the arrest warrant, revealing a pair of eyes clouded by age.

411081086.speaker: 利伯蒂
411081086.content: I think you need to conduct your investigations more thoroughly, Director. I used completely different AGI Mecha technology to CORG's basic puppets in human skin!

411081087.speaker: 利伯蒂
411081087.content: If you want, feel free to bring in technical experts to take a look around Neuhansa. I guarantee there's absolutely no human experimentation going on here.

411081088.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411081088.content: Really? So, the Neural Network is also mecha R&D technology?

411081089.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411081089.content: You worked on the project yourself, so I'm sure you don't need me to remind you where that technology came from.

411081090.speaker: 利伯蒂
411081090.content: Hehe... So that's what you think is going on.

411081092.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411081092.content: We'll leave that for the courts to decide. Arrest him.

411081093.content: Two soldiers step forward and place electronic handcuffs around Liberty's wrists. Liberty glares at Paracaesar like he wants to kill her.

411081094.speaker: 利伯蒂
411081094.content: Director, have you ever used this technology to brainwash those manmade "puppets"?

411081095.speaker: 利伯蒂
411081095.content: Even if you haven't, you must have had some preliminary results already. After all, they did use this technology to break into people's homes and steal their stuff, right?

411081096.speaker: 利伯蒂
411081096.content: Thieves must pay the price for their actions! What's worse, they went in the wrong direction right from the start...

411081098.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411081098.content: You were doomed to failure as soon as you decided to show your hand.

411081099.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411081099.content: If you're trying to scare me by threatening the squad that entered your factory, I'm afraid that's not going to work.

411081100.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411081100.content: They were simply bait to lure you out.

411081102.speaker: 利伯蒂
411081102.content: Really? Let's see how much you really have under control then, Director!

411081103.speaker: 科尔盖专员
411081103.content: Director! The team following the associate—UGH!

411081104.content: The sound of heavy fighting suddenly breaks out on the other end of the line, accompanied by the roar of Visbanes and the screams of soldiers.

411081105.content: Even though Liberty can't hear any of this, he can tell from the slight furrow of Paracaesar's brow that something has happened, and he begins to beam.

411081106.speaker: 利伯蒂
411081106.content: Director, would you like to know what the surprise gift I got for you is?

411081107.content: He clenches his fists, and the electronic handcuffs immediately sound the alarm as abnormal energy is detected.

411081108.content: Paracaesar shoots at Liberty with her stun gun, the crackling energy forcing Liberty to drop to his knees as though electrocuted. His distorted face wears a mixed expression of fear and excitement.

411081109.speaker: 利伯蒂
411081109.content: I'll let these "puppets" tell the director themselves.

411081110.content: The room suddenly flashes with a blinding scarlet light that takes root in the nerves and control of the body. One of the soldiers behind Paracaesar twitches, then raises her gun at her boss.

411081111.content: Taken by surprise momentarily, Paracaesar quickly understands the situation and, sneering at Liberty, presses the emergency button on the terminal tucked behind her ear.

411081113.content: She takes out another gun and shoots down the "enemy" in front of her.

411091001.content: There is a flash of white light in the darkness, and one of the walls crumbles silently. Thoth sweeps aside the debris and crawls through the hole that's barely only big enough for her.

411091002.speaker: 托特
411091002.content: Design iterations for a weaponized AGI Mecha...

411091003.content: Thoth finds another terminal and plugs her decryption tool into it. It doesn't take long before Thoth is scrolling through screens of patented CORG mecha designs, one of which catches her attention.

411091004.speaker: 托特
411091004.content: Huh? What do we have here?

411091005.content: She doesn't fully understand the design drawing she's looking at, but by going back through the past drafts she can tell that the core energy module has been overhauled since its original conception.

411091006.speaker: 托特
411091006.content: (These Tranzist Ores are produced near where the Quake hit.)

411091007.speaker: 托特
411091007.content: (But exposure to Bane Energy doesn't explain why this ore generates such a strong energy reaction.)

411091008.speaker: 托特
411091008.content: (Was this just a ruse to gain Liberty's trust? Or is something else going on?)

411091009.content: More rumbling can be heard on the other side of the wall. Thoth finishes copying the terminal's files and tries to reconnect to the Neural Network. The particles come together to show a room full of dust and smoke, with muffled noises coming from the distance.

411091011.speaker: 托特
411091011.content: I'm here. I couldn't connect to you for ages, is everything okay over there?

411091012.speaker: 六号
411091012.content: It was probably because of the big guy... It's completely out of control and has started smashing down all the walls. The energy pulses are severely affecting the neural network.

411091013.speaker: 六号
411091013.content: No. 1 got hit pretty bad trying to protect me... We've found a safe place to hide for now, I'll send you the coordinates.

411091014.speaker: 托特
411091014.content: Was he hit by the AGI Mecha? Give him first aid, I'll be there soon.

411091015.speaker: 六号
411091015.content: No... By the other squad members.

411091016.speaker: 六号
411091016.content: I'll stay here and look after him. Be careful on your way here!

411091017.content: Thoth sprints toward the rendezvous point, dodging falling debris as she goes.

411091018.content: Pretty soon she spots a trail of blood, and follows it to the back of a warehouse where she sees her two Sigma squad members. No. 6 is standing guard over No. 1, who seems in a bad way.

411091021.speaker: 托特
411091021.content: Calm down and sync your data with mine.

411091022.speaker: 一号
411091022.content: Captain... The distress signal had been sent by the other squad members who'd left...

411091023.speaker: 六号
411091023.content: They ambushed us without any explanation. According to mission procedure, we had to...

411091024.content: No. 1 takes out some bloodstained Sigma dog tags and hands them to Thoth.

411091025.speaker: 六号
411091025.content: Captain... No. 1 did everything he could to protect me...

411091026.speaker: 一号
411091026.content: C-Captain, I think my sensory module has failed...

411091027.speaker: 一号
411091027.content: Syncing... data... H-Has the mission... failed?

411091028.speaker: 一号
411091028.content: If so... you must... get out... (Cough, cough)...

411091030.speaker: 托特
411091030.content: I've got all the files we need, and you have more than done your duty. Your decision and sacrifice have meant something.

411091031.content: No. 1 drops his hand weakly, but Thoth catches it before it hits the ground.

411091032.speaker: 托特
411091032.content: As far as I'm concerned, you've got what it takes to join OPRICS.

411091034.content: All that's left in the Neural Network is a serenity and relief that slowly dissipates like snow melting in the spring, until there's nothing left.

411091035.speaker: 六号
411091035.content: Captain! No. 1 has... He's... Isn't there anything I can do?!

411091036.content: Thoth crouches beside No. 1 and scans his vital signs. She shakes her head sadly.

411091038.speaker: 六号
411091038.content: What's the point in this new power if I can't even do anything?

411091039.content: Her blue armor reflects the dull grayness of the room. No. 6 looks at her cold hands and her vision blurs.

411091040.content: Thoth takes her hand but the machine is hard and cold, incapable of conveying warmth.

411091041.speaker: 托特
411091041.content: We need to keep going so that their sacrifice wasn't in vain.

411091042.speaker: 托特
411091042.content: Do you remember what you said to me? About picking up your weapon to protect people who need help?

411091043.speaker: 托特
411091043.content: Are you going to forget your promise that quickly?

411091045.speaker: 托特
411091045.content: Control your emotions and focus. Our duty isn't over yet. I found these blueprints in Liberty's workshop.

411091046.content: Thoth drags No. 6 next to a large chunk of wall and projects the file there.

411091047.speaker: 托特
411091047.content: This is Liberty's preliminary optimized design draft. What do you notice when you compare these locations?

411091049.speaker: 托特
411091049.content: Most of them are joints, to be precise.

411091050.speaker: 六号
411091050.content: Optimized... Do you mean enhanced? Because if these designs are meant to be stronger, why are these crucial parts exposed?

411091051.speaker: 托特
411091051.content: There are no other joint blueprints among the rest of the files. I think Liberty designed it this way on purpose.

411091052.speaker: 六号
411091052.content: On purpose... Do you think they were designed for Bane Energy augmentation from the very start?

411091053.content: No. 1's terminal suddenly lights up, its pale blue light flashing in the darkness of the warehouse. The call echoes briefly, and then the connection is forcibly made.

411091054.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411091054.content: Sigma squad, come in. We've got an urgent new mission objective.

411091055.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411091055.content: There are too many out-of-control AGI Mechas in the vicinity of the factory, and they're holding up the reinforcements. You're going to have to do without backup for the time being.

411091056.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411091056.content: The Mega AGI Mecha you reported before is a giant weaponized mecha developed by Liberty, which he calls "Apocalypse." That thing is also acting out of control.

411091057.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411091057.content: We haven't managed to fully evacuate the proximity yet, so if Apocalypse breaks out of the factory, the situation is going to get very bad very quickly. You have to stall it and keep it there until backup arrives.

411091058.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411091058.content: I've given you guys access to the Deep Consciousness Sharing function in the Neural Network—it'll help you coordinate your attacks during combat. HQ will also be online to offer you remote support.

411091059.speaker: 托特
411091059.content: Director Paracaesar, I need to report...

411091060.content: Thoth snatches up the terminal, but she raises it to her ear just in time to hear the click as Paracaesar hangs up.

411091061.content: They reorganize their combat gear, and the lack of Divine Grace becomes even more glaring.

411091062.content: Their medical supplies are also exhausted. Going toe-to-toe with Apocalypse is looking like a suicide mission.

411091063.content: There still isn't enough data about Apocalypse. If it charges at them again, there's almost no way they're going to be able to escape.

411091064.speaker: 六号
411091064.content: Captain Thoth, what is "Deep Consciousness Sharing"?

411091065.speaker: 托特
411091065.content: It's a memory synchronization function developed by HQ to compensate for rookies' inexperience in combat.

411091066.speaker: 六号
411091066.content: You mean my inexperience in combat... Does that mean I'll be able to fight like you? Jump, dodge, throw Featherblades...

411091067.speaker: 托特
411091067.content: Yes, but even despite all of that, the enemy is still far too strong for us.

411091068.speaker: 托特
411091068.content: No. 6, I want you to get out of here with the data and I'll stay behind to take care of Apocalypse. I don't want any arguing.

411091070.content: Vibrations and explosions rumble in the distance like approaching thunder. No. 6 takes one look at Thoth's hastily bandaged wound and shakes her head resolutely.

411091072.speaker: 六号
411091072.content: But this order came directly from Director Paracaesar.

411091073.speaker: 六号
411091073.content: You might think it's too dangerous, but that's not excuse for me to flee the battlefield.

411091074.speaker: 六号
411091074.content: You said earlier that I'd done a hell of a job. That won't mean much if I just abandon you here now...

411091075.content: No. 6 hoists her weapon in one hand and places the other on Thoth's shoulder.

411091076.speaker: 六号
411091076.content: Besides, you're gonna need someone to cover you.

411091077.speaker: 六号
411091077.content: I've made my decision, and I won't regret it no matter what happens.

411091078.speaker: 六号
411091078.content: I have to keep going forward, so that all those who have given their lives didn't do so in vain. So that I can really protect others.

411091079.speaker: 六号
411091079.content: I choose to fight by your side.

411091080.speaker: 托特
411091080.content: I understand... Let's activate this Deep Consciousness Sharing then!

411091081.speaker: 托特
411091081.content: Trust me, I'm going to get you out of here.

411091082.speaker: 托特
411091082.content: Configuration is complete. Just to reiterate, Deep Consciousness Sharing will synergize our thoughts.

411091083.speaker: 托特
411091083.content: Our consciousnesses will collide with each other while this is happening. It can be a bit uncomfortable at first, but just try not to panic.

411091085.content: The vibrations are getting closer, reminding them that the danger is getting ever closer. No. 6 nods, and Thoth activates the Neural Comms Device.

411091087.content: The sounds of the terminal notifications gradually fade as Thoth's consciousness melts away. What she sees in front of her constantly shifts, breaks down, and rebuilds, and the boundaries between her and No. 6's memories become blurred.

411091088.speaker: 女性的声音
411091088.content: Excellent, I'm sending someone to pick you up. The surgery will begin immediately.

411091090.speaker: 女性的声音
411091090.content: Ready for anything. You're in good hands, don't worry.

411091091.speaker: 女性的声音
411091091.content: Are you sure you want to keep your own memories? It may have adverse consequences when you use the system.

411091092.speaker: 女性的声音
411091092.content: In the worst-case scenario, it could leave you in a coma for the rest of your life.

411091094.speaker: 少女的声音
411091094.content: Who am I if I don't have my memories? Life would be meaningless.

411091095.speaker: 少女的声音
411091095.content: Even if it kills me... I at least want to walk down that path with my own two feet.

411091096.content:
The synchronization completes and Thoth is brought back to reality.
She stands there, eyes glazed over, for a few minutes while she recovers from the impact of experiencing someone else's memories.

411091097.speaker: 托特
411091097.content: (Were those No. 6's memories? It felt like it happened to me...)

411091098.speaker: 托特
411091098.content:
(Either way, something didn't feel right...
It was so familiar. Is it just a side effect of shared consciousness? Or...)

411091099.content: Real life doesn't give Thoth the time to dwell on this, as the AGI Mecha pierces through the warehouse wall as though it were styrofoam. There is an ominous whir as its weapons start to heat up.

411101002.content: Paracaesar lowers her gun and looks impassively at Liberty as he writhes on the floor in the restraining device. After a brief scuffle, the soldiers outside manage to subdue their brainwashed colleagues.

411101003.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411101003.content: Unleashing a virus in the Neural Network... You coded it well. Shame it was designed based on our old systems.

411101004.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411101004.content: And all you did was swap friend and foe identification and execute a forced elimination command. Nice and simple.

411101005.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411101005.content: But how long can your "virus" last, even without my countermeasures? The human brain is far more complex than that of your AGI Mechas.

411101006.speaker: 利伯蒂
411101006.content: I see why you're the director, if you take mind control so lightly.

411101007.speaker: 科尔盖专员
411101007.content: Director, the weaponized AGI Mechas outside the factory are attacking indiscriminately. The backup team is taking care of it.

411101008.speaker: 科尔盖专员
411101008.content: And we're trying now to contact the Sigma squad for the third time, but there's some pretty heavy comms interference inside the factory.

411101009.speaker: 科尔盖专员
411101009.content: We've managed to conduct a scan and... it doesn't look good in there.

411101011.speaker: 利伯蒂
411101011.content: How do you think your weak, pathetic puppets are any match for my Apocalypse?

411101013.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411101013.content: Our victory was assured the moment you decided to take a shortcut and use Bane Energy to amplify the Tranzist Ore.

411101014.speaker: 利伯蒂
411101014.content: Nonsense! Apocalypse is the perfect design, it doesn't need your silly Bane Energy!

411101015.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
